1a1(1): @// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu byed pa lde mig gi rgyud ces bya ba bzhugs so//
1b1(1): rgya gar skad du/ b+ha ga ban sarba su ga ta sa mu da ye tan+ta pra b+he da kur+t+ti ka tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa lde mig
1b2(1): gi rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang yum
1b3(1): kun tu bzang mo bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa/ rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'og min gyi gnas na mtha' dang dbus med cing gzhi tshad las 'das
1b4(1): pa/ rgya dang phyogs yongs su ma chad pa ye shes kyi rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang yon tan dpag tu med pas brgyas par gyur pa'i pho brang chen po rnam par dag pa na/ bde
2a1(1): bar gshegs pa til gyi gang bu bzhin du bzhugs pa rab tu gsal ba'i tshogs chen po 'dus pa la/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos chos thams cad
2a2(1): kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba lhun gyis grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos kun skye ba med pa la// mnyam pa
2a3(1): nyid kyi ngang gnas kyang // kun rdzob sgyu ma'i tshul gyis ni// ma skyes pa las ma 'gag mthong // rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// thams cad byang chub sems su gcig/ snang ba tha dad
2a4(1): sna tshogs te// gcig dang du ma brjod las 'das// kye kye/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// ngo po gcig las tha dad snang // dpe don mnyam nyid lhan gyis grub// nam mkha'
2b1(1): bzhin du brtag dka' zhing // ci yang med las cir yang snang / 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// ma rig pa yang yang dag lam// rnam par rtog pa'ang chos kyi sku// skye ba med pa gzhi yin te// ma 'gags snang
2b2(1): ba lam yin no// lhun gyis grub pa 'bras bu ste// skye zhing 'pho ba'i gnas med do// rdo rje lta bu'i dgongs pa la// byin rlabs thugs rje chen po yis// stong gsum rgyal ba'i skus khyab kyang // byang chub sems la
2b3(1): g.yo ba med// mkha' dang 'ja' tshon ji bzhin no// 'khor ba'i bde sdug rgyu 'bras dang // bde gshegs sku dang ye shes tshogs// byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ byang chub sems la skye shi med// chos kyi sku
2b4(1): la 'du 'bral med// 'khor 'das chos la bzang ngan med// mnyam pa nyid la rgyu 'bras med// sems nyid rtsal la 'gag pa med// gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i snang ba las// bltar med bsgom zhing dpyad pa
2b5(1): med// bsrung med thob med lhun gyis grub// ma nor ma bcos chos nyid la// rang bzhin skye med chos kyi dbyings// mi 'gyur lhun grub byang chub sems// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma 'gags chos// rgya mtshor chu bran
2b6(1): 'du ba ltar// 'khor 'das 'ub chub kun tu 'dus// bcud mchog snying po rdo rje'i don// bsam med brjod med bstan du med// nges pa 'di nyid ma rtogs na// rtog pa sna tshogs 'ching ba'i rgyu// nga ni rang byung
3a1(1): bcom ldan 'das// 'og min chos dbyings gnas mchog na// dag pa nyid la dag pa ston// mnyam nyid klong nas gsal bar nyon// kye kye/ dag pa dri ma med pa'i chos// bla med byang chub sgrub
3a2(1): pa'i thabs// 'khor ba'i rnam rtog gzhom pa dang // thugs rjes 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// gnyis med dgyes pa'i tshul du mdzod// ces bskul zhing glu blangs pas/ yum kun tu bzang mos bskul ba/ kye kye/ bde
3a3(1): bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid las// gang gis 'dul ba de bstan phyir// gtso bo mchog la gnyis med bya// zhes bskul to// de nas yab kyis bskul ba/ kye ho// dgyes pa chen po
3a4(1): gsang ba'i thugs// mnyam pa nyid las mnyam par bzhengs// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs kyi sras/ khyab pa'i don du mngon par dbyung // zhes bskul to// de nas yang yum gyis bskul ba// kye kye/ 'gro ba'i
3a5(1): ded dpon gnyen gcig po// ma rig mun pa 'joms pa'i bdag/ gnyis med bde ba'i dbyings dkyil du// bde ba chen po dbab tu gsol// zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad
3a6(1): kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin rdo rje chags pa'i rgyal po rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas dbyings kyi yum chen mo la rab tu bskul ba/ kye ho/ skye med mkha' dbyings dag pa'i
3b1(1): yum// bde chen dbyings kyi bdag nyid ma// thugs rje'i gdul bya bstan pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i bde chen skyed mdzod cig/ ces bskul to// de nas yang yum gyis bskul ba// ho// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i ded
3b2(1): dpon gtso// dges pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo yis// byang chub sems rgyun bde ba yi// sprin tshogs char chen dbab tu gsol// zhes bskul bas/ yab kyis sa ma ya ho// zhes bskul bas/ yum gyi sa ma ya s+t+waM/ zhes
3b3(1): bskul to// yab kyis ra ho&haM/ zhes bskul bas/ yum gyis rA ga yA mi/ zhes bskul te/ rol pa chen po mdzad pa las/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ya a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM dzaHhUM baM hoHoM hUM trAM hrIHha/
3b4(1): zhes bya bas bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs dpag tu med pa zhing khams kyi bkod pa chen po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rab tu rdzogs pa dang / zhi ba dang khro bo'i rnam pa dang / yab dang yum gyi rang bzhin
3b5(1): du snang ba dang / sku so so'i rgyan gcig par snang ba dang / sprul pa dang las sgrub pa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa dpag tu med pa rab tu snang bar gyur to// snying po de kho na nyid las/ rol pa chen po'i gleng
3b6(1): gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i cha lugs kyi bdag nyid can rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye kye/ bde bar
4a1(1): gshegs pa chos kyi sku// ma 'ongs phyi ma'i dus ci che// gdul bya 'dod chags can don du// rigs kyi bdag po zhi ba'i tshogs// kun nas rab tu bsgrub pa'i thabs// cho ga yan lag yongs
4a2(1): rdzogs pa// dman dang bar ma mchog rab don// rgyas bsdus shin tu rab tu bsdus// rtog pa'i dra ba gzhom pa'i phyir// ma lus gsal bar bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid
4a3(1): kyi zhal 'dzum pa chen po mdzad pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa khyab par mdzad nas/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs la 'di skad
4a4(1): ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs// ma lus bsdus pa'i sku gsung thugs// dam pa rigs brgya'i ngang nyid de// de nyid bsnyen cing bsgrub pa
4a5(1): ni/ phun sum tshogs pa'i bcud ldan pas// ma nyams snod dang ldan la bstan// ri bo dben pa'i gnas mchog tu// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// phun sum tshogs pa lnga ldan nas// sa yi cho ga rgyas pa
4a6(1): ste// brtag sbyang bslang zhing mkhyen par gsol// phyi nang gnas dang sbyar ba'i khyon// chag chag skud nul legs byas te// khro bo'i stangs stabs mtshams kyis bskor// bka' bsgo bskrad dang bsrung bar
4b1(1): bya// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i grogs dang bcas// byin gyis brlabs pa'i srad bu yis// dkyil 'khor pho brang thig gdab pa// rdo rje khu tshur byin brlabs nas// slob dpon shar bltas slob ma yis// nub tu
4b2(1): bltas te gdab par bya// pho brang rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dgu// rdo rje'i sa dang gdung gis bcad// spyi dang bye brag phyi dang nang // phyogs dang mtshams kyi phyed kyis dbye// bar khyams sgo dang rta babs
4b3(1): bcas// 'dod pa'i yon tan lha mo'i gnas// rin po che yi brtsig pa dang // ka ba rdo rje zla phyed dang // pad+ma dra ba mda' yab bcas// 'khor lo ri dwags gdugs kyi mdzes// rdo rje'i ra ba me 'od
4b4(1): 'bar// gzhan yang rgyan rtags sna tshogs pa// rin po che'am 'bru sna yis// phyi nang kun tu legs par bri// pho brang dgu yi dbus nyid du// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad kun tu ldan// de nyid gru chad khyams dang
4b5(1): bcas// bde gshegs rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma las kyi rigs rnams kyi// dbus nas shar lho nub byang sogs// dkar mthing ser dmar ljang gu yi// rim bzhin kha dog ldan pa'o// phyi rol phan chod gdab pa
4b6(1): dang // snang byed dra ba 'phyang bas brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dgod// mnyes pa'i yo byad sna tshogs bstar// cho 'phrul bzhi dang ting 'dzin gsum// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// cho ga gsum dang
5a1(1): yan lag bzhi// dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa kho na'o// snying rje'i yul la dmigs pa dang // byams pa dga' ba btang snyoms kyis// cho 'phrul bskyed de ma lus sbyang // stong zhing bdag med de
5a2(1): bzhin nyid// kun tu snang ba'i snying rje gsum// med pa las ni yod pa'i rgyu// phyi nang dngos po kun sbyang ste// ye shes sa la gnas pa las// gzung 'dzin mtshan ma kun bral zhing // rang bzhin chos nyid dang
5a3(1): gis gsal// stong nyid dang gnas chos kyi dbyings// me long la ni gzugs brnyan bzhin// yul dngos rigs kun gsal bar snang // chos rnams stong pa rab sbyor zhing // bdag gzhan mtshungs pa mnyam pa
5a4(1): nyid// ma skyes rang bzhin med pa yi// dmigs med chos la so sor brtag/ sems bskyed pa dang smon lam gyis// nus pa mthar thug nan tan bskyed// ji ltar bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus// pad+ma nyi ma zla/
5a5(1): ba'i steng // lha rnams so so'i yi ge nyid// rang gi kha dog mthun pa las// 'od zer sna tshogs rab spros pas// sems can khams kun thabs kyis sbyangs// slar 'dus dmigs pa dag mdzad de// yi ge snying po
5a6(1): phyag mtshan thugs// de las yan lag bzhi sbyar bas// rang gi lus kun yongs rdzogs te// 'khor lo dbus kyi gdan steng du// gtso chen rnam par snang mdzad dang // yum chen chos dbyings kun bzang
5b1(1): mo// phyogs mtshams 'khor lo'i rtsibs rnams la// mi bskyod pa dang rin 'byung ldan// snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub// spyan ma gos dkar mA ma ki// dam tshig sgrol ma rnams kyis bskor// shar phyogs
5b2(1): dkyil 'khor dbus nyid du// sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang // yum chen rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// de bzhin 'khor lo'i rtsibs dag la// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po dang // chags pa dang ni legs pa
5b3(1): dag/ sgeg pa ma dang bdug pa ma// lcags kyu ma dang me sgron ma// phyogs dang mtshams la rim bzhin dgod// lho phyogs dbus su 'jam dpal dang // rin chen dbyings phyug yum dang bcas// rdo rje rin chen
5b4(1): gzi brjid dang // rgyal mtshan dang ni bzhad pa ste// phreng ba ma dang bdug pa ma// zhags pa ma dang bde ba ma// yab yum phyogs mtshams rtsibs la'o// nub dbus spyan ras gzigs dbang la// yum chen
5b5(1): pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma// rdo rje chos dang rnon po dang // smra ba dang ni 'khor lo ste// dbyangs mkhan ma dang mar me ma// lcags sgrog ma dang gsal bkra ma// phyogs mtshams la ni rim bzhin dgod// byang phyogs
5b6(1): dbus su rdo rje 'dzin// las kyi dbyings phyug yum bcas la// rdo rje las dang srung ba dang // rdo rje gnod sprin khu tshur dang // gar sgyur ma dang byug pa ma// dril bu ma dang 'bebs pa ma// phyogs mtshams rim
6a1(1): bzhin bskor zhing dgod// shar lho tshams kyi dkyil 'khor dbus// sems dpa' sa yi snying po nyid// yum chen rdo rje sems mar bcas// phyogs mtshams rtsibs la dgod pa ni// sems
6a2(1): dpa' chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang // dbang phyug rgyal po bkod pa'i rgyan// rin chen 'od 'phro phyogs bzhir dgod// bde ba rgyas 'debs rmongs byed dang // tshe 'phel ma dang za byed ma// gsang ba'i yum bzhi
6a3(1): mtshams la dgod// lho nub 'khor lo'i dbus dag tu// gtso bo nam mkha'i snying po la// yum chen rin chen sems ma ste// phyag rgya'i rgyal po snang ba'i mchog/ spobs pa'i rgyal po spobs pa brtsegs// yum chen
6a4(1): khrus kyi lha mo dang // rgyal mtshan bla re gdugs lha mo// sems dpa' sems ma brgyad kyis bskor// nub byang dbus su byams pa dang // yum chen pad+ma'i sems ma la// pad+ma'i rgyal po dam pa dang // rdo rje mi
6a5(1): g.yo thogs med dang // pad+ma can dang 'dzin byed ma// skyon bral rnam rgyal ma yis bskor// byang shar dkyil 'khor dbus dag tu// gtso bo sgrib pa rnam sel dang // yum chen las kyi sems ma la// rin chen
6a6(1): dbang phyug thub pa'i las// dga' bar ston dang mi g.yo'i mtha'// lha mo skyabs can dri med ma// sgra gcan ma dang thogs med ma// thabs ldan sems dpa' sems mas bskor// phyi rol khyams kyi cha dag
6b1(1): la// lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // byol song yi dwags dmyal ba yi// thub pa chen po drug bzhugs bya// phyi nang phyogs kyi sgo bzhi ru// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog ma// dril bu ma rnams rim bzhin
6b2(1): bsgoms// de dag kun gyi phyag mtshan dang // sku mdog rgyan rtags ma lus pa// nga yis sngon du bshad pa bzhin// so so'i ming gis bskyed par bya// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid 'bar// mnyen lhug
6b3(1): 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// mtshan dang dpe byad ma lus rdzogs// mnyam la ma 'dres 'ja' tshon 'dra// gsal la mi rtog me long gi// gzugs brnyan bzhin du bsgom par bya// rigs kyi bdag po so so
6b4(1): yi// sku gsung thugs kyis byin brlab cing // ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// oM AHhUM/ gnas gsum so sor bsgom bya ba// dkar dmar mthing ga'i mdog ldan pa// 'khor lo rdo rje rgya gram la// khyad par
6b5(1): ldan pa bsgom par bya// oM hUM trAM hrIHhA/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// rigs kyi gtso bos dbu brgyan cing // ye shes sems dpa' rang lta bu// tshon gang so so'i snying la gnas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya
6b6(1): bA ka tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA shU n+ya ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA prat+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa
7a1(1): b+hA ba ar+tha karbaH/ a ma hA kr-it+ta muHNa dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hA ba yat+ma kan+yaH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ya nu ra ga Na badz+ra sa b+hA ba yAt+ma kaT+TaH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA da pra bad+d+ha pa badz+ra sa b+hA ba yat+ma ka6\u0f7f/
7a2(1): po khams dang skye mched dang // yul dngos snang ba ma lus tshogs// dam tshig sems dpa'i lhar bsgoms nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor dgug pa ni// gtso chen thugs ka'i yi ge las// 'od zer lcags kyu'i
7a3(1): rnam pa can// 'og min gnas su spros pa las// chos dbyings dkyil 'khor thugs rgyud bskul// nam mkha'i dbus kyi mdun bzhag nas// mchod bstod mnyes pas tshogs bsags te// gsol gdab
7a4(1): bshags dang sngo ba yis// bdag nyid rung ba'i snod du bya// slar yang 'od kyi cho 'phrul gyis// rang gi lus su gzud par bya// gsal ba 'od ldan gnyis med rdzogs// slar yang mnyes par bya ba ni// thugs
7a5(1): las sprul pa'i gsang yum bzhis// gzhal yas khang gi sgo bzhi nas/ gnas gsum mnyes pa'i phyag gis mchod// 'dod yon lha mo sna tshogs kyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa yis// mchod cing yongs su
7a6(1): rdzogs par bstod// bzlas pa'i spro bsdu bya ba ni// phyi nang gtso bo dgu rnams kyi// rang gi ye shes sems dpa' yi// snying dbus so so'i srog rten la// yi ge'i phreng sngags 'od 'bar 'phros// nam mkha'i
7b1(1): khams kun khyab byas te// bde bar gshegs kun mnyes mdzad nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bsdus// sems can khams kyi rgyud sbyangs shing // thams cad rang rig lhar gyur nas// chos sku thig le
7b2(1): gcig tu bsgom// yang na dam pa bsdus pa'i sngags// oM dz+nyA na pany+tsa sa ta kro d+ha mu ne ye swa hA/ gnas gsum yi ge gsum dag las// rang gi mdog ldan 'od 'phros pas// ma lus rgyu gsum dag byas
7b3(1): te// 'bras bu gsum la sbyar bar bya// de nyid 'od zer 'phro 'du yis// bdag gzhan don gyi bzlas pa rnams// brtan pa'i rtags dang ldan pa yi// dngos grub gang 'dod tshad dang sbyar// ting 'dzin thun gyi
7b4(1): mtshams dag la// bstod cing bshags dang mchod sbyin bya// grub pa'i tshad ldan 'dod pa smos// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbyings su gshegs// dam tshig tshogs ni sgo bzhi dang // phyogs mtshams byang gi ngos
7b5(1): nas brtsams// rim gyis dbus kyi gtso la bsdu// de nyid ye shes sems dpa' la// de yang thig le gcig la'o// de ni mtshan ma'i spros dang bral// de las slar yang lha rnams kyi// nga rgyal ldan pas spyod lam
7b6(1): bya// gal te bde ba'i gnas 'dod na// dpag med blo ldan skyes bu yis// lus gnad rlung dang bcas pa yi// rnam shes dang ni byang chub sems// ye shes thig ler rab sbyor ba// dus bzhi gcig tu mngon
8a1(1): mthong ba'i// blo can de yis kun tu bzang // nga dang gnyis med myur du 'grub// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po la rab tu gzung ba'i sbyor ba'o// // de nas rab tu sbyor ba yis// ma
8a2(1): 'ongs dus na bsgrub pa yis// rdo rje slob dpon thabs ldan gyis// rdo rje slob ma nyer bzung nas// rim pa'i dbang bskur byed 'dod na// bkra shis dben pa'i gnas dag tu// dus tshod gza' skar shis pa
8a3(1): la// 'dus byas dge bas tshogs bsags te// phyi nang srung ba yongs rdzogs nas// lhag gnas sta gon bya ba ni// sa yi cho gas yongs sbyangs shing // legs par bstar ba'i stegs bu'i steng // lha rnams so/
8a4(1): so'i bzhugs gnas sar// dri bzang thig le mdzes pa'i steng // me tog tshom bu dgod par bya// rang rang snying po dbab byas pa'i// 'khor lo'i gtso 'khor tshul bzhin bsam// yan lag bdun gyis tshogs
8a5(1): bsags shing // byin brlab dngos grub 'dod gsol bya// gtso chen dbus dang phyogs mtshams kyi// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i bum pa rnams// rten 'brel rgyan dang rdzas sbyar te// rang gi gnas su legs bkod
8a6(1): pa// 'khor lo'i bdag rnams nang du bskyed// sngar bzhin mnyes sbyang gsol bar bya// gzhan yang phyi nang gsang ba yi// rjes gnang stsal ba'i rdzas rnams dang // bsangs shing bkrus te sta gon bya// rdo rje slob
8b1(1): ma'i tshogs dag kyang / khrus byas rgyan gdags dris byugs te// sangs rgyas dang ni sras tshul gyis// thun mong ba dang khyad par gyi// yul gyi mchog la skyabs su 'gro// don dam kun rdzob smon 'jug gi// byang
8b2(1): chub sems ni rab tu bskyed// sdig pa sbyangs shing tshogs chen bsags// ku sha brim zhing so shing dor// srung ba'i sbyor ba 'bad par bya// 'di ni lhag gnas sbyor ba'o// nangs par skya rengs shar ba'i dus// sta
8b3(1): gon lha rnams mkha' la bzhugs// tshogs bsags dge ba cung zad bya// slar nyid rdul tshon pho brang bzhengs// mchod cing sgrub pa'i rgyan dang rdzas// legs par bsags te dgod par bya// de nas ji ltar
8b4(1): 'byung ba yi// lha rnams rang gi cho gas bskyed// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang bstim// mchod bstod bzlas pas mnyes par bya// de nas slob ma 'jug pa ni/ khrus byas phyag btsal sems bskyed de// rin
8b5(1): chen mdzes pa'i me tog thogs// phyi rol gnas nas gsol ba gdab// rdo rje slob dpon sangs rgyas des// bar chad dris te gnang ba sbyin// dkyil 'khor bdag por mkhyen par gsol// slob ma yis ni me
8b6(1): tog dor// gdong g.yogs bkrol te pho brang bstan// dam tshig rdzas dang bro tshig gis// mi 'da' phyag rgya mchog gis so// bsam pa brtan por bzung ba dang // lha rnams mnyes par bya ba dang // dngos grub
9a1(1): mtshan ma ma thob par// rab 'bring tha ma'i rtsal gyis sgrub// rtags dang mtshan ma mthong gyur nas// phyi nang gsang ba yongs rdzogs pa'i// dbang mchog dam pa skur ba ni// tshul bzhin sbyangs
9a2(1): pa slob ma'i tshogs// mdzes pa'i stan la 'dug nas ni// mthar zug mthong bar gsol ba gdab// rdo rje slob dpon mchog de yis// byang chub sems kyi nga rgyal gyis// rnam rgyal rtsa ba'i bum pa rnams// rnam
9a3(1): pa chu la ngo bo lhas// lus kun khyab par bstim byas te// nang gi bsam pa brtan po dang // sngags tshig sgra yi bden pa brjod// gzugs brnyan la brten de bzhin te// rin chen dpung bdun bkra shis
9a4(1): brgyad// tshul ldan de yis phyi dbang bskur// chos nyid gzugs brnyan me long dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // chos dung rdo rje rgya gram dang // cod pan phyag rgya ming gi dbang // las dang chos dang
9a5(1): gzungs sngags rnams// nang gi dbang du bskur bar bya// thabs dang shes rab mchog gi rgyud// rgyud dang 'bras bu rab sbyor ba// gnyis med mnyam pa'i bde chen te// nges par bstan pa gsang ba'i
9a6(1): dbang // de dag rdzogs nas smon lam gdab// slob ma bla ma lha rnams kyis// rim bzhin bshags byang me tog dbul// gtang rag tshul bzhin rgyas par mchod// bkra shis brjod cing bsdu gshegs
9b1(1): brtsam// rtag tu spyod lam dam tshig gzung // 'di ni kun bzang rdo rje 'dzin// go 'phang sbyor ba'i las yin no// rdo rje slob ma nye bar bzung ba'i las rab tu sbyor ba'o// // de nas rab tu bshad pa
9b2(1): ni// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs kyi rten// gzugs brnyan tsam la ye shes lha// rab tu gnas par bya ba ni// rgyas bsdus shin tu bsdus pa las// rgyas par sbyor la zhu ba pos// lan gsum par du gsol ba
9b3(1): gdab// ri bo rtsi shing skye ba'i dbus// bkra shis yid 'ong gnas mchog tu// ji ltar bshad pa bzhi yi las// ma lus rdzogs par byas nas ni// gang la bya ba'i rten la sogs// lhag par gnas pa rim bzhin
9b4(1): bya/ khyad par bgegs bskrad bsrung ba dang // bdug dang bcing dang bsreg par bya// rdo rje slob dpon sgrub pa pos/ khrus byas gos bgos brgyan byas te// bka' bsgo srung ba yongs rdzogs bya// sems bskyed
9b5(1): tshogs bsags dge ba sbyar// tshul bzhin bsgrubs la byin brlabs dbab// mchod sbyin rgya cher sbyar nas kyang // dbang dang mkhyen par gsol ba gdab// mtshan ma'i bsnyen pa rtags dbyung bya// de nas
9b6(1): dkyil 'khor shar phyogs su// rnam lnga'i stegs bu legs bshams la// grub pa'i rten de bzhugs su gsol// nye reg 'thor 'thung byas nas ni// sngags kyi sbyor bas bar chad bskrad// 'bras zan chang bus dri
10a1(1): ma phyi// me chu rlung gis bsreg gtor bkru// ba byung rdzas lnga yis kyang bkru// til mar 'bru mar bzang pos byugs// dar ram ras ser gyis byibs la// dbang stegs gnas pa'i steng du
10a2(1): bzhugs// tsan dan gur gum dzA ti dang // gla rtsi a ga ru yis byugs// dam tshig pa ni gang yin bskyed// de yi ye shes spyan drangs te// bzhugs shing bstims la phyag btsal zhing // de nyid mchod bstod bzlas
10a3(1): par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// bum pas dngos su dbang bskur bya// bkra shis brjod cing rol mo bsgrag/ byin brlab dbu rgyan cod pan sbyin// yi ge gnyis kyi go cha bgo/ slar yang mchod bstod
10a4(1): bzlas par bya// de nas lha rnams snyan gsan dbab// rten nyid na bzas g.yogs te bzhugs// yon bdag gam ni slob ma la// dbang bskur phyir ni bdag 'jug bya// de nas slob ma gzhug byas la// dbang
10a5(1): bskur ma lus rdzogs par bya// slar yang lha tshogs brtan bzhugs la// nga rgyal ldan pas ku sha'i steng // chos nyid thabs kyis nyal bar bya// de ni lhag gnas chen po'o// de nas skya rengs shar dus su// byin
10a6(1): brlabs ldan pas khrus byas te// mchod sbyin sngon song bum pa bsten// stegs bu la ni dri bzangs sbyar// lha rnams mchod bstod rdzogs par bya// de nas rten de zhal bshus la// bkru sbyang phyi ba sngar bzhin
10b1(1): bya// stong par sbyang zhing lha bskyed de// ye shes dbab cing bsre bsnan bya// gnas gsum 'bru gsum gsal bar dgod// gong bzhin dbang rim rdzogs par bya// rten 'brel sngags kyis brtan par bya// sngags
10b2(1): dang phyag rgya se gol gyis// skur gyur gdul bya'i ngo gang la// gang gis 'dul ba der bsam zhing // spyan dang shangs dang zhal dbye zhing // tshems 'bru dbu skra bshad dang gzhar// na bza' rgyan dang rol mo
10b3(1): dbul// longs spyod rdzogs dang sbrul skur dbye// yon bdag mdun du bkug nas ni// rten de mchod pa'i rjes gnas sbyin// gdan khri'i steng du drang por bzhugs// me tog la sogs mchod pa'i tshogs// ci
10b4(1): 'byor pa yis rgyas par mchod// sbyin bsreg gis kyang tshogs bsag bya// de rjes dkyil 'khor bdag por bya// de nas mchod pa maN+Dal dang // gtor ma rgya chen phul byas la// chos kyi srung mar bka' bsgo/
10b5(1): bya// bkra shis glu gar rol mo'i sgra// gal te glegs bam yin pa na// sbyangs shing bkru ba gzugs brnyan sbyar// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kun rdzob don dam ston pa yi// nges pa'i gsung du
10b6(1): bsgom par bya// de las gang yin lhar bskyed de// spyan dbye sku rags na bza' dbul// rgyas gdab sku gsung thugs kyi ming // rten 'brel bcas pa bri bar bya// sngar bshad rab gnas la sogs bya// gtsug
11a1(1): lag khang pa yin na ni// lha rnams so so'i sngags kyi ni// rang gi ye shes bskyed par bya// spyan dbye la sogs sngar bzhin no// mchod rten sku gzugs yid na ni// bkru sbyang bskrad pa byas nas
11a2(1): ni// rdul bral sku gsum rdzogs par bsam// mnyes pa'i bya ba sngar bzhin no// gal te bsdus par bya ba ni// gang la bya ba'i rten de nyid// cho ga gsum gyis sbyang bya ste// rang gi ye shes ngo bor bsam// yo
11a3(1): byad mchod pa ma lus bstab// yang dag rten du nges par bzung // shin tu bsdus pa skad cig gis// chos kyi sku yi ngo bor bsam// phyi nang snang srid ma lus kun// chos dbyings sku las ma g.yos na// dag pa'i
11a4(1): rten la smos ci dgos// thams cad mchod pa'i gnas yin te// dman pa'i blo la snang ba min// de bas blo ldan thabs chen gyis// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas ma lus bsnyen cing
11a5(1): bkur// gnas pa'i che ba mchog yin no// rten mchog tu bya ba'i las rab tu sbyar ba'o// / de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// tshe 'das phung po'i rnam smin de// 'byung ba'i me la bsreg pa'i phyir// dang po chas
11a6(1): su gzhug pa ni// dang po bgegs bskrad sngags kyis gdab// dri zhim sman gyis byugs shing bkru// bdud rtsis byugs pa'i ras kyis dkri// sngags dgod phyag rgya'i mtshan ma brdab// gnas lngar sa bon drug
11b1(1): dgod cing // phyi rol lha yi phyag mtshan dgod// mar me lha grangs mnyam par gzug/ zhi ba'i stegs bu'i steng du bzhag/ pho brang dkyil 'khor bzhengs gsol ba'i// steng du mdzes pa'i khri la bzhag khang bu
11b2(1): sum thog gru bzhir bya// tha ma zhi ba'i shing gis brdzangs// steng du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dgod// phyogs bzhir gzugs thag btags te gzung // rdo rje slob dpon las bdag gis// dkyil 'khor bsnyen pa
11b3(1): gzhung bsrangs la// phung po'i rnam shes gnas nas dgug/ las bdag 'jug pa tshul bzhin bya// phan pa'i dbang dang nus pa dang // nang dbang bcu gcig phyi dbang bcu// sgrub dbang bcu gsum gsang dbang
11b4(1): gnyis// sum cu rtsa drug bskur bar bya// yang na bka' rtags phyag rgya dang // rgyud 'dzin phyag rgya shes rab gzung // bkra shis rdzas dang rin chen bdun/ khyad par gdan dang mdzes pa'i rgyan// rdo rje ming dang
11b5(1): 'khor los sgyur// dbang bcu rim pas bskur bar bya// don ldan lus de rol mos bsu// bsreg khang nang bzhugs yol bas bre// phyi rol mchod rdzas rgyas par bshams// til 'bras gro dang yungs kar
11b6(1): dang // 'o ma zho dang mar dang bcud// yam shing rdzas dang dgang blugs bsar// bdag nyid las kyi lhar bsgoms la// phung po me lhar bsgoms pa yis// thugs kar lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom// ye shes me
12a1(1): lha spyan drangs te// mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas rim bzhin dbul// bstod cing phrin las gsol ba gdab// de nas lha rnams spyan drang bstim// mnyes byas mchod rdzas bdud rtsir bsam// phung po
12a2(1): sdig sgrib sbyang phyir dbul// lha rnams so so'i snying po la// che ge'i sarba durga ti shin+tiM ku ru swA hA/ zhes btags bdun las mi nyung bzlas// bsreg rdzas rnams kyang de bzhin no// bstod tshig sngags kyis lha rgyud
12a3(1): bskul// lhag mas me lha'i gtang rag bya// sdig sgrib ma lus sbyangs par bsam// bzod par gsol la ye shes gshegs// dam tshig rang gi gnas su bsdu// rnam shes lhar byas dbyings su bstim// thal chen
12a4(1): sku gdung 'bar bar sbyangs// thabs 'dis rang bzhin don chen rdzogs// kun bzang nga dang 'dra bar 'gyur// phung po'i lus rab tu sbyong ba'i sbyor ba'o// // gzhan yang rab tu bshad pa ni// gal te phung
12a5(1): por mi ldan na// ming byang la rten sbyang ba ni// gro ga shing shun ras dag la// gzugs mdzes ming rus ldan pa bri// 'phan gdugs bcas te rten la gdags// dkyil 'khor lho phyogs stegs bur bzhag/ lha
12a6(1): rnams mchod bstod rdzogs pa dang // bdag po'i ting 'dzin gsal ba yis// mchod sbyin rgya chen byas nas su// bar chod bgegs la bka' bsgo zhing // bden pa chen po brjod par bya// bar do rigs drug
12b1(1): gar gnas kyang // rnam shes 'od zer lcags kyus dgug/ gzugs la bstim ste gson bzhin bsam// lus ngag yid kyi bar chad bgegs// gshin rje gshid dang rta mgrin dang // rnam par rgyal ba'i ting
12b2(1): 'dzin gyis// yungs kar sngags te tshar gcad bya// 'jam dpal rnon pos rtog pa gcad// ngan song kun 'dren gyis ni drang // stobs po rdo rje gnod sbyin no// drag po'i nus pas mtshan ma gzhom// sgrib pa rnam
12b3(1): par sel bas bkru// ye shes me yis bsregs par bya// lan chags sbyin pas de nyid dpral// dug gsum sbyang ba'i khrus chab gsol// ngan song gsum dang bde 'gro gsum// rigs drug g.yang sa'i mtshan ma
12b4(1): bcad// de nas dkyil 'khor nang du gzhug/ skyabs 'gro sems bskyed tshogs bsag cing // me tog phul te lha ngo bstan// bum pa'i dbang bskur rdzogs par bya// lam sbrang chos bshad nor rdzas bstab// bsngo
12b5(1): ba smon lam rgyas par bya// lam bstan rgyal ba'i sras su bya// de nas bsregs sbyang rdzogs tshul gyis// thal ba chos sku'i rten du bsgyur// gnas pa dam pas mchog tu bya// go 'phang chen por gdon mi
12b6(1): dbyer med kun tu bzang po yin// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ las rab tu grub par byed pa'i sbyor ba lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis
13a1(1): pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs mnyes par bya ba dang / dam tshig can dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / 'gro ba phal pa dang / rigs skyong ba
13a2(1): dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang / gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas tshogs rab tu 'phel bar byed pa ni 'di dag bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus pa'i// sgrub pa chen po byed pa'am// yang na bar chad
13a3(1): bsal ba'i phyir// mchod mgron chen po dgye ba ni// gnas khang gtsang ma dris byugs la// snod gtsang mdzes pa du ma ru// chu gsum me tog bdug spos dang // mar me dri chab zhal zas dang // rol mo sgra dang
13a4(1): 'dod yon lnga// bla re gdugs dang rgyal mtshan 'phan// mchod pa'i dngos por rab bstar nas// sku gsung thugs kyi rten bkod de// khrus byas gos bzang bgos nas ni// rnam par mi rtog ngang nyid
13a5(1): las// dkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis// dri chab nang du hUM las ni// khro bo las rnams rgyal byed pa// mthing nag ral gri zhags pa thogs// mchod rdzas bgegs kun bskrad cing gzhom// oM swa b+hA ba
13a6(1): shud+d+haHsarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud+d+ho&haM/ oM badz+ra ya k+Sha hUM/ sbyangs shing bsang ba nyid du bya// oM AHhUM/ badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ badz+ra A lo ke hUM/ badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ badz+ra ne bi te hUM/ badz+ra A ha ra hUM/ badz+ra shap+ta hUM// lha rdzas
13b1(1): dam par byin gyis brlab// nam mkha'i dbus su dkyil 'khor bsgom// rang bzhin gnas nas snyan gsan dbab// snying ga'i 'od kyis spyan drangs te// zla ba chu skyes gdan la bzhugs// gnyis med dbab pa
13b2(1): mchog yin no// zhal bsil zhabs bsil brda sbyor ba'i// yon chab phul te 'dud phyag 'tshal// de nas me tog dbu la dbul// bdug spos shangs la mar me spyan// dri chab thugs kar dbul bya
13b3(1): zhing // bshos gtsang zhal la sgra ni snyan// rim pa'i rdzas kyis mchod pa'o// 'dod yon lnga dang rin chen bdun// lha mo brgyad sogs legs pa rnams// kun bzang blo yis sprul te mchod/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
13b4(1): rten khams kun gyis// spos sman rin chen dpag bsam shing // me tog shing tog 'bru bcud rtsi// chu gtsang sgra snyan gzugs mdzes pa// mchod 'os dngos po ma lus kun// bdag med blo yis blangs te
13b5(1): mchod// gnas gsum sbyor ba'i tshogs mchod kyis// 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes bdag nyid la// las sbyangs dngos grub gsal bar gsam// drin lan bsab phyir de dag la// cha lugs don rtags mthun
13b6(1): pas bstod// sdig pa bshags te yi rang dbul// 'gro don mdzad phyir bzhugs gsol gdab// skyabs song sems bskyed lam bstan cing // yongs su bsngo dang smon lam gdab// 'dod pa'i don gsol phrin
14a1(1): las bcol// ma dag bshags te bzod par gsol// bkra shis smon lam tshig brjod cing // ye shes gshegs te dam tshig bsdu// bsod nams tshogs kyi mchog yin no// gzhan yang mchod
14a2(1): sbyin stobs ldan ni// legs par bstar ba'i gnas de ru// gshos gtsang 'bras dang khur ba dang // zho dang 'o ma mar mthud phrum// gtsang mar sbyar ba gsum du bgos// sbrang spel rang mos 'thob byed
14a3(1): pa'i// bshad pa'i sngags kyis byin gyis brlab// oM AHhUM b+h+rUMH/ kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// bskrad cing dbang du bsdu bar bya// dang po phyi yi mchod mgron ni// mgon
14a4(1): mdzad bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal chen bzhi// dregs pa bcu dang lha chen brgyad// klu brgyad gza' brgyad gnod sbyin brgyad// rgyu skar tshogs dang bcas pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i chos
14a5(1): srung tshogs// bskyed cing rang gi[:]gnas nas dgug/ auHaHpreHtaHyaHk+ShaHaHpaHkro[:]ta[:]ya k+Sha[:]a[:]sa[:]byung ra[:]sha[:]na na[:]sa[:]yag[:]bi na[:]yang / iHaHyaHbaHyagaHgaHbiHnaHde de de de de de
14a6(1): phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHphuHra ra ra ra ra ra ra raHya ya ya ya ya ya ya yaHdza ba ri shaH/ rang gi ming dang phyag rgya yis// dam tshig pa la nges par dbab// spos dang me tog mar me dri// zhal zas stobs dang ldan
14b1(1): pa ni// rang gi ming dang sbrel te mchod// tshul ldan tshig gis rab tu bstod// dam las mi 'da' dngos grub gsol// las kun byed pa'i tshig brjod bya// cha gnyis pa ni bsngo ba'i yul// rgyud lnga rigs drug spyi
14b2(1): yin te// 'od zer lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug/ a nr-i su tri pre du badz+ra A gats+tsha hUM dzaH/ mdun gnas 'khor gyi tshul bsams te// rnam snang mdzad pas bsrungs shing brjod// rang gi 'dod yon tshogs
14b3(1): sbyin zhing // chos dang zang zing tshims par bsngo// tha ma nyid ni sha 'khon dang // lan chags tshul du byin brlabs te// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // gnod sbyin srin po mi'am ci// lto 'phye grul bum yi dwags
14b4(1): dang // srul po sha sa za lus srul po// skem byed smyo byed brjed byed dang // nam gru sa yi bdag la sogs// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs tshogs// rta mgrin can gyi ting 'dzin gyis// ma lus dgug
14b5(1): cing dbang du bsdus// bi nA ya ka ma ha ra bi dan ltar min nam ma tsa bi tan ta aM ku sha dzaHlen chags nor sbyin tshul du bsngo// bka' bsgo chos bshad bden pa bdar// drag po'i tshig gis spyo zhing bsdigs// rang gi
14b6(1): nas su gzir cing 'phang // byang chub sems skyes ma gyur bar// thar med mnar ba'i tha tshig brjod// slar yang go bgo bsrung bar bya// kun bzang mgon po rgyal mchog ste/ nyes pa'i lan du legs par
15a1(1): mdzad// 'di ni don grub tshogs chen rdzogs// gzhan yang mchod sbyin bya ba ni// dad ldan kun bzang rigs can gyis// rin chen snod mdzes chu yis dgang // sman lnga spos lnga rin chen
15a2(1): lnga// snying po 'bru dang me tog stsal// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// go bgos bsrung shing bar chad bsal// dag byed bdun gyis rgyud sbyangs te// tshad med bzhi yis gzhan don 'bad// mngon par byang
15a3(1): chub ting 'dzin gyis// gzhal med khang pa mngon gsal bya// cho ga gsum dang yan lag bzhi// rang gzhan dam tshig bdag po bskyed// sri zhu can rnams gnas nas dbab// yon tan lha tshogs phyi bzhin
15a4(1): 'brang // bar snang dang ni mdun gyi sar// pad+ma zla ba'i gdan la bzhug/ las bdag lha yis phyag 'tshal 'dud// mchod sbyin brtag pa'i las chen drug/ oM swa b+hA wa bi shud+d+haHsarba d+harmaHswa b+ha ba bi shud+d+ho&haMHna
15a5(1): \u0f7fsarba ta thA ga teb+h+yo bi shA mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tatrUM ut+ma te sgra ra na i maM ga ga na khaM swA ha/ oM a mr-i kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM na maHsarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki te oM saM b+ha ra saM b+ha ra hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a ba lo ki te na
15a6(1): maHsa man+ta sma ra Na rasmi b+ha ba sa ma ya ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dza lA ni swA hA/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nan gra he shwa ri pra b+hany+dza ti ma hA sa ma ya swA hA// sbyang zhing spel te mos par bsgyur// spyod par dbang bsgyur thob
15b1(1): par bya// phrin las bcol zhing dbang bsdus la// tshul bzhin bsngo ba rgyas par bya// bshags sbyang las sbyar bden pa brjod// chos kyi sbyin pa bsngos nas ni// 'phags pa rnams ni dbyings su
15b2(1): gshegs// gzhan rnams rang rang gnas su bskrad// skye med don gyis rgyas gdab cing // spyod lam kun bzang ngang gis spyad// mtshan ma rdzas kyi mchod sbyin yin// skad cig tsam gyis mnyes byed pa'i// blo
15b3(1): stobs ldan pa'i mchod sbyin dang // phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// byang chub sems kyis yongs su khyab// de nyid ma skyes dag pa'i ngang // chos dbyings zab mos rgyas btab pa// rtse gcig khyab pa nyid yin/
15b4(1): no// gzhan yang chos sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi// rten gyur bsod nams tshogs bskyed pa// chos dbyings mnyam nyid gnas mchog tu// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhi nyid la// ye shes lnga yi khri 'phang brtsig/ yang dag
15b5(1): mtha' yi bum pa bsgril// stong nyid snying po'i srog shing btsug/ bcu gsum sa yi 'khor lo 'bar// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gdugs kyis bkab// chos sku 'gyur med rin po che// mi rtog gzugs sku'i dar
15b6(1): 'phan 'phyar// rnam dag skyon bral na bza' bgos// chos nyid don gyi sku gdung yin// de yi don rtags 'byung ba ni// rtags mtshan sku gdung bzhed 'dod na// rdo rje las kyi ting 'dzin gyis// sa brtag byin
16a1(1): brlab bsrung zhing bskor// bdud rtsi 'khyil bas sbyang ba dang // brdung dang bskrad pa'i bar du bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin chu yis sgra// ting 'dzin chen pos 'bi 'bi bya// thams cad snying po'i til mar
16a2(1): bsku// gzugs sku 'byung ba'i brkos phor du// 'bi 'bi chos sku'i rnam par gsal// sor mo rigs lnga'i ngang gis dbyung // sku gsum tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bsam// stobs bcu ldan pa'i ri rab ni// byang
16a3(1): chub chos kyi sa la bzhugs// mi 'jigs bzhi yi bang rim la// so sor rig pa'i bum pas mdzes// rnam par thar pa'i sgo btod cing // tshad med bzhi yi bre bzhag nas// thabs dang shes rab skar khung
16a4(1): btod// srog shing stong pa bco brgyad de// 'khor lo pha rol phyin pa bcu// mkhyen pa'i thugs rje char khebs gdugs// rin chen tog ni sku gsum rdzogs// dril bu gsung dbyangs drug cu'o// dar dpyang rin
16a5(1): chen ma 'dres chos// bsrung med gsum gyi rgyal mtshan btsug/ na bza' bsnyel med chos nyid du// byin gyis brlabs shing bsam par bya// rang bzhin chos sku spyan drangs te// gzugs brnyan dag la bstim zhing
16a6(1): dbab/ khrus gsol gdan dbul gus phyag 'tshal// rdzas dang ting 'dzin blos sbrul dang // 'dod yon bdag bzung med pas mchod// don rtags tshigs gis rab tu bstod// dbang bskur mnga' gsol me
16b1(1): tog dor// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// 'phags pa'i tshogs kun de la dbab/ khyad par las kyi bye brag ni// lha rnams bsgrub dang sdig pa bshags// shi ba'i don la skye ba dang // bgegs bsal ba dang
16b2(1): bsod nams spel// rbod gtong bzlog cing nad gdug bcad/ khrims nyams gso dang dam tshig bskang // byang chub par chad bsal phyir dang // lhag pa'i lha dang sngags kyis bya// 'dod pa so so'i don gsol
16b3(1): zhing // smon lam gdab cing dge ba bsngo// bskor zhing 'dud pas brtan par bya// 'byung bas mi gnod gnas su bzhugs// tshogs gnyis rdzogs nas sku gnyis 'grub// gzhan yang tshogs chen bshad pa
16b4(1): ni// bkra shis dben pa'i gnas dag tu// ting 'dzin ldan pas bka' bsgo zhing // mchod sbyin rgyas par btang byas nas// byin gyis brlab cing sbyang ba dang // bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rab tu sbyar// stegs bu
16b5(1): legs sar bstar ba'i steng / khru gang khru phyed zlum por bskor// sor bzhi phyir dor dbus su ni// rdo rje sor brgyad tshad tsam bri// phyi rol me ri 'od kyis brgyan// bud shing dkar po 'o ma can// dri zhim khru gang
16b6(1): tshad du brtsig/ rtse mo lo 'dab 'bras bcas la// mchod sprin yam shing bya ba yin// 'bras chan til sogs 'bru sna tshogs// ku sha spos chu g.yas su bzhag/ mchod rdzas phal pa g.yon du'o// dgang blugs dam
17a1(1): tshig mdun bzhag nas// gos dkar rgyan bgos ku sha'i steng // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i nga rgyal gyis// sems dpa'i skyil krung tshul gyis 'dug/ 'khor yug dri zhim chu yis gtor// dag byed rtse mo phyir
17a2(1): bstan bskor// cho ga lnga'am gsum dag gis// lha yi rnal 'byor gsal bya ste// snying po hUM gi 'phro 'du yis// dgang blugs rdo rje dril bur bya// bum pa sbyangs te kyil 'khor bskyed// ku sha bdud rtsi 'khyil bas
17a3(1): bsang // gtsub shing me 'am bram ze'i me// rlung g.yob kyis sbar me yi lha// raM las mdog dkar drang srong tshul// tshangs pa'i skud pas rab tu brgyan// phyag g.yas dbyug pa bgrang phreng 'dzin// g.yon na gun+d+he
17a4(1): skyabs sbyin mdzad// rang dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes dgug/ bgegs bskrad bstim te mchod rdzas dbul// dkar gsum mngar gsum til dang nas// yam shing 'o ma 'bras chan rnams// rim bzhin phul te
17a5(1): bshags sbyang bya// bstod de 'bod pa'i phrin las bcol// me lha'i thugs kar dkyil 'khor gyi// lha rnams pho brang gsal byas te// ye shes phab la mchod rdzas dbul// lha rnams so so'i sngags phreng
17a6(1): la// mchod bsreg rdzas kyi sngags btag dbul// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad kyi bar du'o// dgang blugs kyis ni mthol bshags te// bstod cing gsol gdab phrin las
17b1(1): bcol// dkyil 'khor bsdus te me lha gso// mchod rdzas bsreg rdzas sngar bzhin bsgyur// bshags gsol bcol ba de bzhin no// ye shes gshegs te dam tshig bsdu// smon lam bsngo ste bkra shis
17b2(1): brjod// nad gdon par chad zhi ba dang // mthar thug sdig sgrib sel ba'o// phyi ma'i dus kyi sgrub pa yis// rnal 'byor gnas pa'i tshe bsring ba// phun tshogs dben pa'i gnas dag tu// pho brang legs par
17b3(1): gnas byas la// rin chen bum pa mdzes pa ru// bkru zhing brab bdug rgyan gyis brgyan// nang du bdud rtsi'i bcud kyis dgang // tshe bshos mdzes pa steng bzhag ste// rdo rje rgya gram rgya yis gdab// sems dpa'i
17b4(1): ting 'dzin skad cig gis// b+h+rUM las bum pa gzhal med khang // nang du sngar bshad lha rnams bskyed// gtso bo'i thugs kar tshe dpag med// dmar po tshe bum 'dzin pa bskyed// thugs kar rdo rje nyi zla sbyar// bla
17b5(1): gnas yi ge nr-i dang bcas// bsgom pa dam tshig mchog yin no// chos dbyings gnyis med de bzhin no// 'od zer lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis// 'chi bdag bdud dang gshin rje yi// lag nas bla tshe stobs kyis
17b6(1): dugug/ dpag med thugs ka'i ga bur sgra// de nyid gnas nas hUM brgyud nas// gzungs thag rdo rje'i khong sku gnas// mnyes byed 'od 'phros kun tu khyab// snod bcud tshe dbang bkrag mdangs bsdu// gnas
18a1(1): dbus su ni ma lus bstim// tshe dbang sngags kyi 'phro 'du yis// lha rnams nyi zla'i bar du gzhug/ snying po lnga po 'od du thim// gnas lngar yig 'bru 'od du bzhu// slob ma'i lus la bstim zhing
18a2(1): dbab// tshe dbang mthu stobs rgyas par bsam// gnas pa'i sa bon 'od du zhu// skye med snying po gyur pa las// mi 'gyur chos dbyings chen por bsgom// rdo rje las kyi slob dpon gyis// rtags byung bdag po'i
18a3(1): phyag tu drangs// de yis slob ma'i tshogs chen la// bden pa'i tshig brjod dbang bskur bya// 'chi med gzi brjid brtan par bsgom// g.yas g.yon bskor te smon lam dang // bkra shis bden pa brjod par
18a4(1): bya// 'di yis yun gnas sgrub pa'o// 'di dag ma lus thams cad kun// kun bzang nga yi ngang gis bsgrub// ces bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu byed pa las/ las
18a5(1): phra mo rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i snying po yang dag par gsang ba sgra'i tshogs sku
18a6(1): gsung thugs gsang ba chen po las rab tu phyung ngo // oM sngags sor bzhag ya ga smin pra be sha/ ba man+te ba nA ga yak+Sha rAk+Sha sa b+hu ta ya/ tsa ti pra ti si na dun du ya ya na// mu ta na pa sa ya mi hUM phaT swA hA/ bka' rab tu
18b1(1): bsgo ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA pra ti sa ya b+he b+he rna be sa ma ya s+t+waM/ mkhyen par gsol ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA A ra li hUM dza/ dbab pa'o// oM badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha bi shra tsakra nan/ bstim pa'o// oM bi shwa ma ru ma hA shAn+ya
18b2(1): tAtwatA dz+nyA na badz+ra sarba swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya su kra ma ti hUM/ dbye ba'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa na dzA lA ni/ k+Sho ba ga naM gan ka ra swA hA/ dra ba'i sngags so// na
18b3(1): maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+yo badz+ra kI li ki la ya A kaR+Sha ya swA hA/ rdo rje phur pa'i phyag rgya'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya sarba mu khe b+h+yaHbadz+ra pra ka ra Na ta thA ga tA naM/ ku ru ku ru tsaN+Da swA hA/ rgya gram gyi sngags
18b4(1): so// oM badz+ra ki li kI la ya pad+ma A lo ka sarba nan ma ra sha du ru du ru oM/ phur pa'i sngags so// oM ko ka la sha badz+ra dun du ru da ra swA hA/ mda'i sngags so// oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na shak+ti ha sa swA hA/ ral gri'i sngags so//
18b5(1): oM sha na bi drA a mo ka ka la sha bu pa la sha sa ta hAM// bum pa rnam par rgyal ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra b+han+na du na ta ta tsi ti na hUM/ skud pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta e h+ya hi b+ha ga wan dr-i sh+ya dza A ra li
18b6(1): ho// bod pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta tha ga ta pad+ma b+ha tra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ bzhugs pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta tha ga ta At+ma nAM ni ta yAr+ya mi pu ru sha ya ho// 'dud pa'i sngags so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha naM ga ga na sa ma ya
19a1(1): swA hA/ mchod yon gyi'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+he bi shud+d+ho ga tod b+ha ba swA hA/ dag pa'i'o// mo badz+ra puSh+pe su me ma hA me tri bu da ga te swA hA/ me tog gi'o// oM badz+ra d+hA be d+hu d+harma d+hA tu a nu ga te swA hA// bdug
19a2(1): spos kyi'o// oM badz+ra a rtsi te pa ri na da ga na a ti ri ye swA hA// snang ba'i'o// oM sarba ke du shi go ta thA ga ta swa b+hA sarba ka ti ya swA ha// bza' ba'i'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a shu te shap+ta ya swA hA/ sgra'i'o// na maHsa
19a3(1): man+ta bud+d+hA nAn// oM a b+hisma s+pha ra na hi maM ga ga na khaM// d+harma tang tha A kar sha ya sa man+ta ya/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta pa ri shA da maM ta le/ na ma pra ti su ma dz+nyA na b+ha ye/ sarba ta thA ga te b+ha se/ d+harma tad tha a sti ta na b+ha
19a4(1): sosaM tsa swA hA/ mchod pa chen po rab tu sgrub pa'i snying po rnams so// oM a d+hi tiSh+Tha dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM/ dam tshig gi sngags so// oM a sa me tri sa me ma hA sa me/ me tog gtor ba'o// oM pra ti gr-i h+Na hUM pra tits+tsha hoH/ sa ma
19a5(1): ya s+t+waM/ brtag pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra tsak+Shu pra be sha phaT// mig dbye ba'i sngags so// oM a hUM sid ti ta ya maM/ blta ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra badz+rod g+ha TA ya/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya shI g+h+raM/ sma ra sa ma ya hUM/ sgo dbye
19a6(1): ba ste shar gyi'o// oM sarba ta tha ga ta pU dza sta na At+ma nAM// niR+YA ta yA mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa twa a d+hi tiSh+Thi swa maM/ phyag btsal ba shar gyi'o// oM badz+ra A be sha ya a a/ dam tshig sbyin pa shar gyi'o// oM badz+ra ka/
19b1(1): la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ bkru ba'i shar gyi'o// oM rat+na pa tod+b+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha shI g+h+raM/ sma ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ lho'i'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta rat+na a b+hi She ka ta At+ma nAM niR+YA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta bra dza rat+na a b+hi
19b2(1): ShIShiny+tsa maM/ phyag gi lho'i'o// oM rat+na A be sha ya sa ma ya a/ dam tshig sbyin pa lho'i'o// oM rat+na ka la sha a b+hi ShIny+tsa traM/ bkru ba lho'i'o// oM pad+ma ka tod+b+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha shI g+h+raM/ sma ra sa ma ya hUM/ nub kyi'o// au
19b3(1): sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra bar+d+ha ya At+mA naM niR+YA ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma pra bar+t+ta yA nAM/ phyag gi'o// A~M pad+ma da ma A be sha ya sa ma ya AH/ dam tshig gi'o// oM pad+ma ka la sha a b+hi ShIny+tsa \u0f7f/ bkru ba'o//
19b4(1): karma ba tod+b+ha Ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha/ shI g+h+raM sma ra sa ma ya hUM/ sgo dbye ba'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza karma Ni At+ma nAM nIr+yA ta yA mi/ sarba ta thA badz+ra karma ku ru maM/ phyag gi'o// oM karma A be sha ya sa ma ya a/ dam tshig
19b5(1): gi'o/ oM karma ka la sha a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ bkru ba byang gi'o// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha ba tot+ta Ta sa ma ya pra be sha shI g+haM// sma ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ dbus kyi'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bud+d+ha kA ya bA ka tsit+ta pra Na me naM ban+da
19b6(1): naM ka ro mi/ phyag gi'o// oM swa b+ha ba bud+d+ha A be sha ya a a/ dam tshig gi'o// oM bud+d+ha ka la sha a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ bkru ba'o// oM badz+ra ka po ta mA le hUM/ stegs bu'i'o// oM AM hUM tAM hUM swa b+ha ba shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA shud+d+haHswa b+ha
20a1(1): ba a shu pa ki ra si ti hAM/ bum pa bskyed pa'i'o// oM tsa turma ha mu tra ka la sha sid+d+hi mu me sti ti/ phyi sbyang ba'o// oM ka la sha sarba bud+d+ha gu Na sid+d+hi hUM// nang sbyang ba'o// oM dz+nyA na rasmi ma hA ka ru Ni/ par
20a2(1): sha sid+d+hi hUM/ chu'i sngags so// oM rat+na pany+tsa sid+d+hi hUM/ rin po che'i'o// oM pany+tsa b+hi Sha dz+nyA ya/ sman gyi'o// oM d+hA pa pany+tsa sid+d+hi ku ru hUM// spos kyi'o// oM gar+b+ha pany+tsa sid+d+hi ku ru hUM/ snying po lnga sbyin pa'o// pany+tsa d+hA n+yaM sa ma ya sid+d+hi
20a3(1): hUM/ 'bru'i'o// oM AHhUM mu kha la bid sha swa hA/ rgyan gyi'o// oM kalpa br-i k+Sha srig sha hUM/ kha rgyan gyi'o// oM pany+dza li ga hUM/ mgul bcing pa'o// oM A yu d+hA ro sU tra ka pa shi sa ta ka ru hUM/ gzungs thag gi'o// oM shri
20a4(1): baibebai ro tsa na badz+ra satwa rat+na saM b+ha ba a mi d+he ba a mo g+ha sid+d+ha A yu She rA dza hUM/ yungs kar gyis dbang bskur ba'o// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta hUM// 'o ma btsal ba'o// oM ma hA pradz+nyA pA ra mi ta a d+hiSh+Tha na hUM/ oM dz+nyA na ka la sha badz+ra
20a5(1): sid+d+hi sid+d+hi pad+ma badz+rA ya// byin gyis brlabs pa dang bzhugs pa'i'o// oM bud+d+ha badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma a b+hi ShIny+tsa oM hUM trAM hrIHha// mu dra hri// phyag rgya sbyin pa'o// oM shu ba ri ka ri sid+d+hi hUM// ril ba sbyin pa'o// oM ma pa ne ka
20a6(1): na bi shud+d+he hUM/ chu sbyin pa'o// oM pany+tsa naM pa sid+d+hi hUM// 'bru sbyin pa'o// oM a mr-i ta pany+tsa rasmi ma hA ku ru hUM// sman sbyin pa'o// oM d+hU pa pany+tsa a ba de sha ma hA sid+d+hi hUM/ spos sbyin pa'o// oM sarba pany+tsa rat+na sid+d+hi hUM/ rin po
20b1(1): che sbyin pa'o// oM pany+tsa gar+b+ha sid+d+hi hAM/ snying po sbyin pa'o// oM kaM pa shri sha su me pa ta hUM/ gu na hUM/ kha rgyan sbyin pa'o// oM da na smi ti la ka shi ka si ka hAM/ mgul chings sbyin pa'o// oM shu pa ya sa ri su pa ka sha sa mi ta
20b2(1): ku ru hUM/ gzungs thag sbyin pa'o// oM ma hA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badz+ra a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ me long sbyin pa'o// oM dz+nyA na tsakra a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ 'khor lo sbyin pa'o// oM ma hA su ra ta ma ku ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ dung sbyin pa'o// oM badz+ra
20b3(1): rak+Sha ti ta baM hUM// rgya gram sbyin pa'o// oM bud+d+ha hUM badz+ra tAM rat+na hrIHpad+ma hA karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// dbu rgyan sbyin pa'o// oM sarba bud+d+ha ka ya a b+hi ShIny+tsa mi// bum pa sbyin pa'o// oM rat+na mA la a b+hi ShIny+tsa tAM/ phreng ba sbyin
20b4(1): pa'o// oM badz+ra a laM ba ne a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ cod pan sbyin pa'o// oM bud+d+ha badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma ma hA mu dra a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ phyag rgya lnga sbyin pa'o// oM nA ma pu tra a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ ming sbyin pa'o// oM sarba pany+tsa bid+yA d+ha ra man+tha a
20b5(1): b+hiShIny+tsa ya/ gzungs sngags sbyin pa'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta gu ya sa ma ya a b+hi ShIny+tsa a/ gsang ba sbyin pa'o// oM sarba ha thA ga ta ma hA ma hA pradz+nyA sa ma ya a b+hi ShIny+tsa maM/ thabs dang shes rab sbyin pa'o// rab tu
20b6(1): dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// na mo badz+ra kro d+ha ya ma hA daM Sh+Tot+ka Ta b+hai ra bA ya/ a si mu sa la pa ra shu pA sha hastA ya// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ kha kha khA hi khA hi tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+ta ban+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/
21a1(1): gardza gardza/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ bi s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+h+nAn bi na ya ka na/ ma hA ga Na pa ti dzi bi tan+ta ka rA ya sA ha/ bskrad pa'o// oM sarba sa man+ta da na badz+ra swA hA/ phyi ba'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu pra ra na sustI
21a2(1): sta re swA hA/ bkru ba'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka ya bi shra d+ha na swA hA/ byug pa'o// oM ra dza to a ba ha ri ni hUM/ bdar ba'o// oM AHhUM sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka sa ma ya shri ya s+t+waM/ dbang bskur ba'o// oM tsak+Shu maN+Da la
21a3(1): bi sho d+ha nA ya swA ha/ mig dbye ba'o// oM di ba bya karnA ya ne da ka lo ki ti pa sad ta hri/ rna ba dbye ba'o// oM di ba bya ga na sA sarba laM po daM ra hri hri/ sna dbye ba'o// oM di ba bya mu khA ya gan+d+ha swA hA/ kha dbye ba'o// au
21a4(1): sarba bo ki sha sa d+ha ra ni tri/ so shing sbyin pa'o// oM sarba sho da na kha tshe da hUM/ oM karma ni ha ra ni hUM/ skra breg pa dang bshad pa'o// oM rat+na a laM kA ra hUM/ rgyan gdags pa'o// oM di ba pa pra bu ye swA ha/ na bza' sbyin
21a5(1): pa'o// oM ba su tsa ga pa ri ga re swA hA/ rgyan dbul ba'o// oM rat+na maN+Da la u pa hUM/ gnas dbul ba'o// oM e ma ye ga ga na sa pa ri ka ra ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra si ta pa se ye swA hA/ bsil ba'o// oM AHhUM a mr-i ta
21a6(1): kuN+Da li sarba big sha ha na hUM phaT/ bsang ba'o// oM a ga ne te b+ha ga ya swA hA/ bskyed pa'i'o// A gats+tsha/ bod pa'o// oM ag+na ye d+hU pe puSh+pe A lo ke gan+d+he i maM gr-ih+Na pU dza a la la ho// dbul ba'i sngags so// oM
21b1(1): sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ya hAM/ til dbul ba'o// oM bi ma la ye swA hA// mar gyi'o// oM sarba pA pa maM b+han+na la swA hA/ chan gyi'o// oM A yu She swA hA// dAr ba'o// oM ye ma ye ga ga la pA ri ka ri ye swA hA/ 'bru'i'o//
21b2(1): oM be ne ta sta badz+ra swA ha/ yam shing gi'o// oM a ha ra su spre ma hA da re be sha shan+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ma lus pa'i sngags so// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ las chen po rab tu
21b3(1): bsgrub pa'i snying po'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i don rab tu dbab pa'i rnam par dag pa'i cha lugs kyi bkod
21b4(1): pa rgya chen po dang rang gi gnas dang yongs su mthun pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bstod pa 'di bka' stsal to// hUM rigs lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// gtso chen rigs kun bdag po ste// rnam snang mdzad pa sku mdog
21b5(1): dkar// byang chub phyag rgyas 'khor lo 'dzin// rdo rje mi bskyod sku mdog mthing // sa gnon phyag rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser// mchod sbyin rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// snang ba mtha'
21b6(1): yas sku mdog dmar// ting 'dzin mnyam gzhag pad+ma bsnams// don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang // skyabs sbyin rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// gnyis med rigs kyi
22a1(1): yum rnams ni// kun bzang spyan ma gos dkar mo// mA ma kI dang sgrol ma ste// so so'i yab kyi tshul bstan zhing // gtso la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugs// yab yum bcas la phyag 'tshal
22a2(1): bstod// shar phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po na// bcom ldan kun tu bzang po dang // yum chen rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// mdog dkar rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog dkar// phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga
22a3(1): 'dzin// rgyal po mdog ser lcags kyu 'dzin// chags pa mda' gzhu 'gengs mdzad dmar// legs pa ljang gu rgya gram bsnams// sgeg mo dkar mo rdo rje 'dzin// bdug pa mdog ser sprin 'phro ma// rdo rje
22a4(1): lcags kyu mdog ni dmar// rdo rje me sgron mdog ljang gsal// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ni// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gzhon nu dang // yum chen rin chen dbyings phyug ma// mdog ser rin chen ral gri
22a5(1): 'dzin// rdo rje rin chen 'dzin mdzad ser// gzi brjid mdog ser nyi ma 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa dmar// bzhad pa mdog ldang so phreng 'dzin// rdo rje phreng ba 'dzin ma dkar// rdo rje me tog 'dzin ma
22a6(1): ser// rdo rje zhags pa 'ching mdzad dmar// rdo rje 'bebs ma bsil mdzad ldang // nub phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po na// bcom ldan spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // yum chen pad+ma dbyings phyug ma// mdog/
22b1(1): dmar pad+ma dmar po bsnams// rdo rje chos dkar pad+ma 'dzin// rnon po mdog ser ral gri 'dzin// smra ba lce 'dzin sku mdog dmar// rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin pa ldang // rdo rje dbyangs dkar pi wang 'dzin// rdo rje
22b2(1): mar me 'dzin ma ser// rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin ma dmar// gsal bkra ljang gu rma bya 'dzin// byang phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po na// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje dang // yum chen las kyi dbyings phyug ma// mdog
22b3(1): ljang rdo rje dril bu bsnams// rdo rje las dkar rgya gram bsnams// srung ba ser po go cha bsnams// gnod sbyin dmar po mche ba bsnams// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin mdzad ldang // rdo rje gar bsgyur sku mdog
22b4(1): dkar// byug pa dri chab 'thor ma ser// rdo rje dgyes mdzad dril 'khrol dmar// rdo rje 'bebs mdzad chu rgyan bsil// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan sa yi snying po dang // yum chen rdo rje
22b5(1): sems ma ni// mdog dkar rin chen snye ma bsnams// rdo rje rgyal mtshan sku mdog dkar// chu srin gser mdog phyag na bsnams// dbang phyug rgyal po ser lcags kyu// bkod pa'i rgyan dmar me tog
22b6(1): bsnams// rin chen 'od 'phro ldang rin chen// bde ba rgyas 'debs kha T+wAM dkar// za byed ma ser mda' gzhu 'gengs// rmongs byed dmar mo phyag rgya bsnol// tshe 'phel ma ldang dril bu 'dzin// lho nub
23a1(1): mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan nam mkha'i snying po dang // yum chen rin chen dbyings phyug ma// mdog ser rin chen za me tog/ snang ba'i mchog dkar rdo rje bsnams// phyag rgya rgyal
23a2(1): ser mda' gzhu 'dzin// spos kyi glang po 'od phung dbang // spobs pa brtsegs ldang lcags kyu bsnams/ khrus ma dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rgyal mtshan 'dzin ma sku mdog ser// bla re 'dzin mdzad lha mo
23a3(1): dmar// gdugs 'dzin ma ni mdog ljang sngo// nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor na// bcom ldan byams pa chen po dang // yum chen pad+ma'i sems ma ni// mdog dmar klu shing pad+ma bsnams// pad+ma 'dzin
23a4(1): mdzad rgyal po dkar// pad+ma dam pa 'dzin ma ser// rdo rje mi g.yo dmar po ti// thogs med rgyal ldang lcags kyu 'dzin// lha mo pad+ma dpal be'u dkar// 'jigs byed ma ser 'khor lo bsnams// skyon bral
23a5(1): dmar po pad+ma bsnams// rnam rgyal ma ljang rgyal mtshan bsnams// byang shar mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// bcom ldan sgrib pa rnam sel dang // yum chen las kyi sems ma ni// mdog ljang phyag na po ti
23a6(1): bsnams// rin chen dbang sdud rin chen dkar// grub pa'i las ser rgya gram bsnams// dga' bar ston dmar me long bsnams// mi g.yo mtha' ldang bsam gtan mdzad// lha mo skyabs can gdugs 'dzin
23b1(1): dkar// lha mo dri med bum bsnams ser// sgra sgrogs dmar mo 'bud dung bsnams// thogs med ma ldang gser nya bsnams// kun kyang sems dpa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs// yab yum gnyis med 'dud pa'i
23b2(1): tshul// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi brjid 'bar// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// shar phyogs khyams na gnas bzhugs pa// brgya byin mdog dkar pi wang bsnams// thags bzang ris sngo go cha
23b3(1): bsnams// lho phyogs khyams kyi logs dag na// shAka thub gsil byed 'dzin gser mdog/ nub phyogs khyams kyi logs dag na// shAkya seng mthing po ti bsnams// nam mkha'i mdzod dmar rin chen
23b4(1): sgrosgom// byang phyogs khyams kyi logs dag na// chos rgyal mthing nag me chu bsnams// dkyil 'khor phyi yi sgo bzhin// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dkar// lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ser// nub sgor rdo rje lcags sgrog
23b5(1): dmar// byang sgor rdo rje dril 'khrol ldang // cung zad khro ba'i tshul gyis bzhugs// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag/ gtso chen yab la phyag 'tshal bstod// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// rigs
23b6(1): kyi yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// thabs mkhas thugs rje 'gro don mdzad// sems dpa'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// ye shes sgyu ma'i tshul 'chang ma// sems ma'i gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma lus don mdzad
24a1(1): rgyal ba che// sems dpa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnyis med phyag rgya 'dud tshul can// sems ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro drug so so'i don rdzogs mdzad// thub pa drug la
24a2(1): phyag 'tshal bstod// phyag rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa'i// sgo skyong bzhi la phyag 'tshal bstod// phyogs bcu so so'i bgegs rigs 'dul// chos srung tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di
24a3(1): dag gis// lha rnams la ni gang bstod pas// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// kun zang nyid dang mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu
24a4(1): 'byed pa las/ sku'i phyag rgya rab tu grub pa bstod pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rje rgya chen po rab tu grub pa gzhan gyi don dpag tu
24a5(1): med pa sbyor ba'i rigs sngags 'di dag bka' stsal to/ oM swA b+ha ba sarba d+harmAHbi shud+d+he swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni thams cad du dag pa'i sngags so// oM ba ra bi da na khargats+tshin+na ts+tshin+d+ra hUM phaT/ dang po rgyud kyi sgo gcad
24a6(1): pa'o// oM sarba du khaHsarba rak+She sha hUM phaT/ gnyis pa gcad pa'o// oM ma tha ma tha sarba tiR+Ya ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ gsum pa gcad pa'o// oM pa tsa pa tsa sarba pre ta ka ga te he huM hUM phaT// bzhi pa gcod pa'o// oM da
24b1(1): ha da ha sarba na ra ka ga te he tuM hUM phaT/ lnga pa gcad pa'o// i d+ha ma te kha tham// badz+ra sa ma ya na rag kan/ ma ra hr-i da ya// na ma pa ti nan/ sa ma rak+Sha sid+d+ha bi ti a mr-i ta he ho// gzhug cing bsgrag pa'o// oM b+ha
24b2(1): ba ya ag+na ye A ga ts+tsha ya ga ts+tsha ma dr-i sh+ya ho// sa ma ya staM/ dgug gcing bzhugs pa'o// oM b+ha ba ag+ne ye mA ma sarba pA paM shIn+taM ku ru swA hA/ ma mA sarba karma A ba ra Na bi shud+d+he shan+ti ku ru swA hA/ mchod cing sbyin
24b3(1): pa'o// oM brah+ma Ne sUr+ya tsan+da a d+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH/ oM be shra ma NA ya ma hA rA dza a d+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH/ oM d+hai tra raSh+Ta ya ma hA rA dza a d+hi pa tra ye hUM dzaH/ oM bi rU Ta kA ya suM ban+de/ ma hA rA dza a d+hi pa ta ye hUM dzaH/ oM bi
24b4(1): rArU pa k+Sha nA ga ma ha rA dza a d+hi pa ta ye hAM dzaH/ oM in+d+ra ya/ ag+na ye// ya mA ya/ nai ra r-i tA ya/ ba ya be/ ba ru NA ya/ ku be rA ya// I sha na ya// biSh+Ta be/ sUr+ya tsan+na ya/ A gats+tsha hUM dza/ ma hA de ba aSh+Ta b+h+yaHhUM dza/ phu
24b5(1): nA ga aSh+Ta b+h+yaHhUM dza/ gra ha aSh+Ta b+h+yaHhUM dza/ yak+Sha ma ha se na pa ta ye hUM dza/ badz+ra ha pa ri a ta ya hUM dza/ a d+hi pa ta ye hUM dza/ A gats+tsha ya A gats+tsha ya hUM dza/ bod pa'i sngags soH// oM brah+ma Ne// sAr+ya ya/ tsan+d+rA ya/ in+d+ha ya/
24b6(1): ag+na ye/ ya mA ya// rak+ta ya// ba ru NA ya/ bA ya be/ ku be rA ya// I sha nA ya/ biSh+Ta be/ de bA ya/ nA ga ya// gra hA ye/ yak+ShA ya/ i daM gr-i hA/ d+ha pe// puSh+pe/ A lo ke// gan+d+he/ ni bi d+ye pU dza ya sA hA// mchod pa
25a1(1): dang rab tu sbyin pa'i sngags so// o ti sta na badz+ra sa da ta hUM// bskyed pa'i sngags so// oM na maHsa man+ta naM hUM hUM/ gtsug tor gyi sngags so// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM ga ga pa ra lak+Sha na ka ru na ma hA
25a2(1): ta thA ga ta badz+ra tsak+Shu kru swA hA// ye shes spyan gyi sngags so// na maHsa man+ta badz+rA NAM badz+ra ka ba tsa rak+Sha hUM/ rdo rje go cha'i sngags so// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo sarba tad khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba le/ sarba ta thA ga ta pud na ni ra
25a3(1): dza te hUM hAM tra thA tra tha a pra ti ha te swA hA/ bsrung ba'o// oM A badz+ra aM ku sha nr-i tAM A gats+tsha hUM dza// ming byang la dgug pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha ya ma rA dza pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ lus la bskrad pa'o// oM badz+ra
25a4(1): ma ha kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hu lu hUM phaT/ ngag la bskrad pa'o// oM badz+ra ma ha kro d+ha bi dza ya ha na ha na hUM phaT/ yid la bskrad pa'o// oM badz+ra ma ha kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da hUM phaT/ thams cad du bskrad pa'o// oM ma
25a5(1): hA sarba durga ti bi sho d+ha ni ra dza ya dza/ drang ba'i'o// oM ma hA many+dza shri sarba khang+ga ti/ shag ti tik+Sha dza pa ya phaT/ sgrib pa gcad pa'i sngags so// oM sarba karma a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ya sarba dur ga ti bi sho d+ha ya dza la dza
25a6(1): la ka ta ka ta ha na ha na sa ra sa ra pra sa ra pra sa ra ha ra ha ra s+pho Ta s+pho Ta pre ta pre ta ma tha ma tha tra tha tra tha tshin+da tshin+na da ha da ha pa tsa pa tsa ma tha ma tha a ni nirgi te a pa ra hUM hUM phaT/ brab pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra
25b1(1): ma hA yak+Sha sarba pA paM pA paM kha kha khA hi khA hi/ bstab pa'i sngags so// na mo b+ha ga ba te a d+hi pa ti sarba pA bi bi shud+d+ha ye pra sa da ka ka ra ni swA hA/ bkru ba'i sngags so// oM sarba pA paM ka da ha na badz+ra yak+Sha dza la raM raM/
25b2(1): bsregs pa'i sngags so// oM na mo b+ha ga bA te sarba durga ti pa ri sho d+ha ni rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ ar+ha te samyaka saM bud+d+ha ya/ ta d+ya thA/ oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni/ sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni shud+d+he bi shud+d+he sarba karma A ba ra ni bi
25b3(1): sho d+ha ni swA hA/ sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM na maHtre ya d+hi ka nAM sarba ta thA ga hr-i da ya gar+b+he dza la dza la d+harma d+ha tu gar+b+he san+na ra ma ma a yusl-i sho d+ha ya ma ma sarba pA paM// sarba ta thA ga ta ya man+to Sh+NI Sha bi ma le bi shud+d+he swA hA/
25b4(1): mchod rten bya ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra rat+na sarba dz+nyA na hUM phaT/ sa byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kI li kI lA ya sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ phur pa gdab pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra sU tra ha phaT// thig gdab pa'i
25b5(1): sngags so// oM a mr-i ta pra ti ha ta ha na ha na hUM phaT/ yungs kar gtor ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kha na kha na hUM phaT/ sa rko ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra a mr-i ta mA ma ki bi shud+d+he swA hA// chu gdab pa'i sngags so// oM
25b6(1): badz+ra A yu She A be sha ya swA hA// brdzi ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na mung+ga rA A ko Ta ya A ko Ta ya hUM phaT/ brdung ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra dz+nyA na bo d+hi tsit+ta rat+na pany+tsa sid+d+ha ye swA hA// byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags
26a1(1): so// oM badz+ra bim+ba sA ra d+harma ka ya swA hA/ 'bi 'bi'i sngags so// oM ma hA d+harma d+ha tu dza la gar+b+he swA ha/ phyag rgya gzhug pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra A yu She dz+nyA na bo d+hi tsit+ta a a// gdab pa'i sngags
26a2(1): so// oM d+harma d+ha tu nirma saM b+ho ga kA ya d+harma swA hA/ dbyung ba'i sngags so// oM su pra tiSh+Tha badz+re swA hA/ bzhugs pa'i sngags so// oM dz+nyA na tsakra badz+ra pra marda ni swA hA// 'khor lo'i sngags so// oM ma ha a ra dze bi ra dze swA
26a3(1): hA/ na bza' gsol ba'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya ma Ni sha ta dIp+ti swA hA/ d+harma d+hA tu gar+b+he hr-i da ya swA hA/ gnas pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na pany+tsa kro d+ha sa twa mu na ye swA hA// da du pa ra ta bi
26a4(1): ru ma hA maN+Da la ga Na de ba tsakra/ badz+ra ka ni ki swA hA/ dkyil 'khor gyi sngags so// oM sho d+ha ni sho d+ha ni sarba pA paM bi sho d+ha ni sarba ta thA ga ta a pa nA ya swA hA/ las sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM a mr-i ta sarba bid badz+ra
26a5(1): tiR+Ya ka pre ta ka na ra ka ga ti pa ra na tra tha hUM phaT/ shi ba la phan par bya ba'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na a ba lo ki te/ sa man+ta s+pha ra na rasmi b+ha ba ma hA ma Ni du ru du ru hr-i da ya dza lA ni hUM/ oM puN+ye puN+ye ma
26a6(1): hA puN+ye a pa ra mi ta A yu b+h+yAM dz+nya na saM b+ha ro pa tsi te swA hA/ skye ba la phan pa'i sngags so// oM na maHsarba bud+d+ha nAn a mo de ba laM laM laM sarba a ba ra Na bi sho d+ha ne sarba yaM pA paM bi ma la A yur+d+ha ra puN+ye pu n+ye ma hA puSh+Ti
26b1(1): ku ru swA hA/ sgrib pa gcad pa'i sngags so// na mo badz+ra pA Na ye ma hA yak+Sha se na pa ta ye/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la ha na da ha pa tsa bi d+han+ma ya/ dza TI lam+bo da ra u tsuSh+pa kro d+ha hUM phaT/ bgegs gcad pa'i sngags
26b2(1): so// oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na ya ho/ b+ha ga bAn bid+yA rA dzA ya hUM phaT/ spong gdon gcad pa'i sngags so// oM ka kyi ka kyi du ru du ru hUM pa pa ra dza/ khe rgyas khe rgyas tsa sa me
26b3(1): na maM tshe/ nad b+hi sa nan/ d+ha re badz+ra ka ru da ta ya swA hA/ mdze nad gcad pa'i sngags so// oM tsa du ar+ya sad tA du kha pa ha sad ta oM sa mud ne d+harma ka ma ka/ thA k+Sha sa nad ar+ya au na ro ta ni rud da na de a smig sa
26b4(1): rba k+She shi sid+d+hi swA hA// oM rga man+ti a ti na ni ti ri mi ti swA ha/ sdom pa gso ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra tA sa ma ya/ na nu pA la ya/ badz+ra sa twa twe no pa/ tiSh+Tha dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba// su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su po
26b5(1): Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha/ sarba karma su tsa me/ tsit+taM shre yaM ku ru hUM/ ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga wAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ma me muny+tsa badz+rI b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya sa twa a/ dam tshig gso ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha bai ro
26b6(1): tsa na/ hUM badz+ra ak+Sho b+h+ya/ tAM rat+na saM b+ha ba/ hrIHpad+ma a mi de ba/ a karma a mo g+ha sid+d+hi/ bA gI shwa ra ya/ lo ke shwa ra ya/ badz+ra shar+ya sa ma ya d+harma kA ya nirma Na ka ya sam+b+ho ga kA ya maN+Da la sa ma ya hUM/ gzhugs pa'i
27a1(1): sngags so// dam pa'i rigs mchog brgya dag kun// sku yi phyag rgya chen po nyid// snang la rang bzhin yongs ma grub// gsung nyid sgra yi dam tshig yin// yongs su grags pa de nyid stong // rdo
27a2(1): rje thugs kyi dkyil 'khor de// yod med spros dang bral ba'o// 'di la gang zhig nges gnas pa// bde gshegs kun tu bzang po yin// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud
27a3(1): rab tu 'byed pa las/ nye ba'i las kyi rig pa chen po sprul par byin gyis brlab pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje mi 'gyur ba chen po yang dag
27a4(1): par spro ba las nye bar 'du ba'i sbyor ba chen po 'di nyid kyi gsang ba las phyung ngo // kye kye 'dus pa'i tshogs chen kun// kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ nga dang rang bzhin bdag nyid ni// ma rtogs pa dang log
27a5(1): par rtog/ phyogs tsam dang ni rab tu rtogs// don la dgongs dang dgongs min dang // ji bzhin sgra dang ma yin nyid// nges pa nyid dang drang ba tsam// sbas tshig spyi yi yi ge las// bdag po'i snying la nges
27a6(1): gnas pa// blun po gzhan la snying brtse dang // go ba bzang la rab bstan te/ lhag par spyod pa nyid la gdams// de yis dben pa'i gnas nyid du// ting nge 'dzin gyi yo byad bsten// tshangs par spyod pa'i
27b1(1): gnas bzhi dang // gzhan don sems la brtan byas te// mthing nag hUM gi 'bar 'phro las// dag pa'i tshogs rten rab tu blta// de la mnyes sbyang yi rang dang // phan pa'i don gsol bya ba yis// nang du rung ba
27b2(1): nyid yin no// bar chod bgegs kun gzhom pa'i phyir// snying po bzhi las skyes pa yi// rdo rje'i sa gzhir bsam par bya// rnam rtog 'du shes spang byas nas// bgegs kyi gnod pa ngang gis bsrung // dang po
27b3(1): byang chub sems nges pa// stong nyid skye 'gag med gsal nas// snying rje'i yul gyi sa bon mthong // 'phel 'grib med gsal spro bsdu ba// dngos grub brtan 'byung ye shes rgyu// mtha' bral nam mkha'i chos
27b4(1): 'byung la// g.yo sbrang bsreg cing brten byed rnams// rim 'byung so so'i nus par ldan// rin chen ri rab gzhal med khang // mtshan nyid kun ldan khyad par du// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi brgyad kyis mdzes// rtsal
27b5(1): stobs shugs mdzes rigs ldan pa// 'degs byed steng du drod bsil 'od// 'jam mdangs ldan pas gsum dbyung ste// rtsal chen steng du med pa'i rgyu// rdo rje chu skyes ming gis mtshan// gzugs sku 'jig rten
27b6(1): khams su spro// gzhan don mdzad pa rdzogs slar thim// phyag rgya yongs gyur byed pa'i yid// zhal gcig phyag gnyis brgyan dkar 'od// lnga bdag cod pan don mdzad bcas// bya ba'i chos bdag sgeg ldan
28a1(1): ma// in+d+ra nI la'i mdog 'dzin cing // thabs dang shes rab brda mdzad cing // rdo rje dril bu thugs kar 'dzin// pad+ma nyi ma 'od phreng ldan// 'dud pa'i tshul du bsams nas ni// gnyis med sbyor
28a2(1): bas kun 'dus nas// yab la kun thim gsang gnas phyung // yum gyi mkha' dbyings 'phro 'du las// dkyil 'khor rab rdzogs rjes chags kyis// yul rnams kun bsdus phyi rol dgod// 'jug par gsol
28a3(1): te 'od kyis sbyang // sems can don gyur byin brlab kyis// rang nyid ye shes ngo mtshar brjod// e ma phung po rdo rje'i 'od// 'byung ba'i nus pa dang bcas pa// sangs rgyas yab yum rnams su snang / khams dang
28a4(1): skye mched sems dpa' ste// byung mthong bcings grol rig ma rig/ gsang chen skyon bral nyid yin no// de bstan yum gyis 'di brjod do// e ma chos kun gdod nas dben// snyigs ma lnga yang bde ldan
28a5(1): te// gzhan nas btsal du yod min te// rang gi snying po rang la nye// de nas rgyal po gnas su dgod/ sbyong byed yi ge yab la thim// bde 'byung yum la gnyis su med// snyoms zhugs 'bru tshogs rab tu
28a6(1): 'phros// byang chub lnga dang bsam pa lnga// rtogs pa bzhi yis mngon du bskyed// gtso bdag chen po mthing ga'i 'od// zhal gcig phyag gnyis phyogs kun snang // phyag g.yas rdo rje thugs kar brten// g.yon pa
28b1(1): dril bus yum la bzung // btsun mo snang ba'i dbyings phyug ma// mthun pa'i tshul dgus rab tu 'khril// sna tshogs rigs kyis dbu rgyan cing // g.yon pa dril bu thugs kar brten// g.yas pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis
28b2(1): 'khril// phung po'i rnam shes lha ru bsgom// sku mchog bde chen gnas su bsgom// longs spyod gnas su AHyin no// snying ga lte ba gsang ba ru// hUM dang swA hA rim bzhin dgod// mthong thos tshor dang myong ba
28b3(1): la// k+Shi traM hrI dzi rim bzhin bsam// me b+hI hUM dang muM rnams ni/ de dag phyi rol yul la dgod// yi ge sku yi dkyil 'khor las// gnyis med sems dpa'i thugs ka nas// 'od 'phros sku gsung thugs bsdus
28b4(1): nas// mdun gnas de la gsol ba ni// oM 'bar ba'i rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad byung ldan// 'di nyid kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka
28b5(1): ya ba ka tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ sku gsung thugs kyi nga rgyal bskyed// yum gyi sgra yi dkyil 'khor dgod// 'dod yon lnga dang mAM bsgoms te// spyi bo mgrin par laM dang mAM// lhag mar mr-i pye taM ma
28b6(1): bsam// mthong zos tshor myong hUM trAM hrIHa/ phyi rol dzaHhUM baM hoHdgod// byin gyis brlabs pa'i gnas lnga ru// 'bru lnga bsgoms te sku rdzogs nas// dkyil 'khor sbrul phyir 'byin pa'i gnas// 'bru gsum rdo rje
29a1(1): pad+mar bskyed// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// yum gyi bde chen thugs dkyil du// byin brlabs thabs sogs yi ge las// sa bon mtshan ma'i sku rdzogs
29a2(1): nas// sum cu rtsa brgyad ming gis dbyung // rang gi cha lugs yongs rdzogs pa// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// sna tshogs 'od kye phreng bas 'khrigs// kun tu khyab cing lhun gyis grub// ma rig
29a3(1): sprin gyis bsgribs pa'i phyir// skal ngan gyi yang gzugs bstan pa// bcu gnyis mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// 'gro ba so so'i phyogs 'dul ba// rgyan ldan rdzogs par gsal bar ldan// thugs kyi sa bon 'od
29a4(1): phreng las// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// rang gi mdun du mngon par bsam// e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// 'bar ba'i
29a5(1): byin rlabs rmad du byung // de nyid kyi ni mnyam bzhugs pa'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ badz+ra sa ma ya hUM// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ rang shar dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor
29a6(1): ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa rab rdzogs dam tshig mchog/ ye shes dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bya// sgyu ma lta bu'i kun la brdal// mchod phyir dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing // de yi phyag
29b1(1): rgya chen por bsgom// bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon las// 'od 'phros phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi// mchod pa'i tshogs bsdus thugs kar thim// gsang bar phyung ste mkha' dbyings nas// 'od las mchod pa'i lha
29b2(1): mo 'phros// de yi bde gshegs dkyil 'khor la// dgyes pa'i glu dbyangs snyan pas bstod// rgyal bas gzhan don rdzogs mdzad de// slar bsdus thugs kar gsang bar bsgom// bde chen stangs dpyal gsum
29b3(1): mam lnga// dgyes ldan rab zhugs yid 'dod mnyam// cho ga lnga rdzogs yo byad lnga// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs shing // ma nyams 'jug par rab brtson na// zla gsum drug gam bcu gnyis kyis// dbang
29b4(1): bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// dus grangs mtshan ma ma thob par// rab tu bsnyen pa rdzogs par bya// zhing dag longs spyod rdzogs pa yi// 'bras bu mchog tu 'di 'gyur ro// zhes bka' stsal to// rtsa ba las
29b5(1): yang dag par bskyed pa'i sbyor ba'o// / de nas las kyi snying pa nye bar byed pa rnams bka' stsal te// ma hA t+ma rmAH/ a am+ba/ b+hA ba~M sha ba~M kud+d+he \u0f88\u0f90/ gzhi bzang ba'o// oM waH nAM prar+d+ha g+ha/ gr-i d+ha gr-i b+hA
29b6(1): gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-i h+NA pa ya hAM/ a na ya ho/ b+ha ga ban bir+ya rA dzA ya hUM phaT/ oM bi dza ya ma hA kro d+ha ha na ha na n+na/ oM ni la daN+Da ma ha kro d+ha da ha daM ha hA/ oM ya man+ta ka ma hA kro d+ha pa tsa pa tsa hAM/ oM Ar+ya a tsa la ma ha kro d+ha
30a1(1): badz+ra badz+ra nA/ oM pad+mAn krata ma hA kro d+ha hu lu hu lurbA/ oM ma hA krod+ha Tak+ka rA dza tiSh+ThatiSh+ThanA/ oM a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+harmAn+ta rban+dan+tu/ oM bag+h+nA nan ta krata ma hA kro d+ha than+d+ha b+hin+da hA/ oM ma hA kro d+ha hA ka ra ga
30a2(1): gardza hUM/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ma hA ba la s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM/ bsrung ba'i sngags so// oM dz+nyA na dza la dza la badz+ra badz+ra hUM phaT/ dbab pa'i sngags so// oM dz+nyA na tsakra dza la dza la hUM/ brdeg pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra mud ga ra hUM A
30a3(1): ko Ta A ko Ta ya hUM/ brdung ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kI li kI li ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ brdab pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na shak+ti ha la ha la hUM phaT/ gcad pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra raM pa raM dza la dza la hUM phaT/
30a4(1): bsreg pa'i sngags so// oM ma hA shAn+ya ta dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma hA kA ru Na hUM// oM ma hA su kha hUM/ rim pa'i sngags so// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta s+pha ra Na hUM phaT/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta saM ha ra Na hUM/ spro bsdu'i sngags so// e A ka sha maN+Da la/
30a5(1): yaM karma rak+Sha haM/ bi ma ma kA ni ra~M maN+Da la/ su d+h+yaM me hUM/ laM ti sha maN+Da la/ raM dz+nyA na dza la maN+Da la// b+hI rat+na tre lo kya bi shud+d+he hUM/ bskyed pa'i sngags so// saM ha maM khaM ga/ ma sur+ya maN+Da la/ a tsaN+Da maN+Da la/ baM pad+ma maH
30a6(1): la hUM/ raM rat+na maN+Da la hUM/ gding ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra tsit+ta A be sha a a/ a nud paM sata ta/ na mo ha ra ti/ badz+ra ti tsit+ta pra brta s+pha ra Na hUM phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ bzhag pa'i sngags so// oM muM d+hA tI shwa ri/
30b1(1): dzi na dza ka pad+ma maN+Da la e/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra hwA/ tsat+ta sid+d+hi s+pha ra Na phaT/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ra go&H/ ra ga ya me// dzaHhA ba ha/ tsi tr-i a pra maN+Da la hA s+pha ra Na phaT/ sa ha ra Na hAM/ dbab pa'i sngags so// ma la/ hwA ma?/ sa mA/
30b2(1): AM/ pAM/ hA/ tAM/ k+Shi/ hUM/ tr-i traM/ hri hrIM/ dzi aM/ me dzaHg+h+ri hAM/ hUM baM/ mr-i hoHhUM a/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ kr-i truM sruM k+ShaM br-i ye/ ming gi snying po dang bcas te dbyung ba'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta shAn+ti ma hA ka ru Ni ka e h+ye
30b3(1): hi b+ha ga bAn e a sa mo dri sh+ya ho// bod pa'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra pad+ma sa ma pra be sha ya A be sha ya/ sa ma ya s+t+waM// dbab pa'i sngags so// oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo b+ha ga ba te b+h+yo badz+ra swa ra pra
30b4(1): marda ni/ ta thA ga te b+h+yaH/ ar+ha te b+h+yaH/ samyak+saM bud+d+he b+h+yaH/ tad+ya thA/ oM badz+re badz+re ma hA badz+ra ma ha te dza badz+re/ ma hA bid+yA badz+re/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+re/ ma hA bo d+hi man+do pa saM kra ma Na badz+re/ oM badz+ra sarba karma A ba ra Na bi sho
30b5(1): d+han badz+re swA ha/ mchod pa'i sngags so// oM AHbadz+ra sur+ya to bi bi sha ma hA rat+na ga Na tsakra pA dza me g+ha pra ti ts+tsha ba len+ta/ ma hA maN+Da la su kha ho// pA dza kha kha khA hi khA hi/ bstab pa'i sngags so// las sna tshogs pa'i rig
30b6(1): pa'i sngags so// rab tu snang ba dbyung ba'i khyad par ro// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku dang thugs kyi gsang ba chen po la gsung gi sgra mnyes pa'i brjod pa rnam pa lnga spro bar mdzad de/
31a1(1): chos nyid kyi snying po rang gis rtogs pa'i don las sgra brnyan lta bur grags pa ni/ e ma/ ma skyes dbyings las skye ba'i cho 'phrul ni// dug lnga rnam dag sku lnga rigs lngar gsal// phyogs bcu dus
31a2(1): gsum rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// chos sku khyad par ye shes lnga yi dang // rnam par snang mdzad mdog dkar 'khor lo bskor// mi bskyod mthing ga rdo rje sa gnon mdzad// rin chen 'byung ldan ser po rin chen
31a3(1): dbyig/ snang ba mtha' yas mdog dmar ting 'dzin mnyam// don yod grub pa ljang gu rgya gram 'bar// go 'byed kun tu bzang mo dril bu bsnams// brtan mdzad sangs rgyas spyan ma thor tshugs
31a4(1): bsnams// bsreg mdzad gos dkar ma ni rin chen 'bar// sbyong byed mA ma kI ni pad+ma bsnams// bskyed mdzad dam tshig sgrol ma rgya gram bsnams// so so'i rigs mchog yab kyi tshul 'dzin ma// thabs kyi sku
31a5(1): las shes rab bskyed pa'i yum/ gsang mchog mkha' dbyings rnam dag bde 'byung gnas// bde gshegs sras tshogs ma lus yum gyur ma// 'gro don mdzad phyir thugs rje'i sku sprul ma// rigs lnga yab yum
31a6(1): tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi thugs kyi sras// sa lam yon tan ma lus rab rdzogs shing // 'gro kun bla med gnas su bgrod mdzad phyir// sa bcu'i rgyal tshab gnas bzhugs
31b1(1): sems dpa'i gtso// sa snying dkar po rin chen myu gu bsnams// nam mkha'i snying po mdog ser ral gri bsnams// spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar po pad+ma bsnams// phyag na rdo rje ljang gu dril bu bsnams/ kun
31b2(1): bzang mdog dkar rin chen snye ma bsnams// byams pa dmar ser klu shing gun+d+he bsnams// sgrib pa rnams sel sngon po po ti bsnams// 'jam dpal gzhon nu dmar ser ut+pal bsnams// tshogs brgyad dag
31b3(1): pa rnam thar brgyad rdzogs dang // sems dpa' brgyad kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rgyal ba'i sku gzugs mchod pas mnyes mdzad ma// 'dod yon tshogs kyis ma lus thugs dam skong // nyon mongs spangs
31b4(1): pas ye shes rab rgyas shing // sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs rgyud bskul mdzad pa'i// lA s+ye dkar mo me long rgya gram bsnams// mA le ser mo rin chen phreng ba bsnams// gir ti dmar mo pi wang rgyud mang
31b5(1): bsnams// ni rti ljang gu gar gyi phyag rgya bsgyur// d+hU pe dkar mo spos kyi sprin 'phro ma// puSh+pe ser mo me tog pad+ma 'thor// gsal ba'i mdangs ldan dmar mo mar me bsnams// gan+d+he ljang gu byug pas mnyes mdzad
31b6(1): ma// yul brgyad rnam dag sa brgyad rab rdzogs pa'i// sems ma brgyad kyi sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// rigs drug 'jig rten khams kyi don mdzad phyir// mthun 'jug thabs kyi spyod pa rab tu ston// bcu
32a1(1): gnyis mdzad pa'i tshul gyis gdul bya sbyong // mngon shes byin rlabs cho 'phrul sna tshogs ston// lha yi thub pa mdog dkar pi wang 'dren/ lha min thub pa sngon po go cha bsnams// mi yi thub pa
