32a2(1): ser po gseg shang 'dzin// byol song thub pa mthing ga po ti bsnams// yi dwags thub pa dmar po sgrom bu bsnams// dmyal ba'i thub pa nag po me chu bsnams// thugs rje chen pos 'gro drug so sor
32a3(1): 'dren// bcom ldan thub drug sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bde gshegs sku gsung thugs las sprul pa'i sku// dus bzhi rnam dag phrin las ye shes bzhi// rab tu rdzogs mdzad drag shul khro bo'i sku// gtso chen
32a4(1): las mdzad thugs rjes gdug pa 'dul// rnam par rgyal ba dkar po be con bsnams// ro langs ma ni mdog dkar lcags kyu bsnams// gshin rje gshed po mthing nag zod dbyug bsnams// mi pham ma ni
32a5(1): mdog sngon zhags pa bsnams// rta mgrin dmar po thod sbrul pad+ma bsnams// ral gcig ma ni mdog dmar lcags sgrog bsnams// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang gu rgya gram bsnams/ khro gnyer ma ni mdog ljang
32a6(1): dril bu bsnams/ khro tshul spyan gsum zhabs gnyis dor thabs bgrad/ khro rgyal yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// dbyings kun rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// thugs rje'i dbang gis 'dul byed skur bstan
32b1(1): pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// thabs dang shes rab sbyor la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces phyogs bcu thams cad du chos nyid kyi sgras khyab par mdzad de/ rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor sgyu ma lta
32b2(1): bu'i gzugs kyis thams cad la snang bar gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ dkyil 'khor bsdus pa'i sgo nas bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rab tu
32b3(1): bshad pa ni// sku lnga lhun rdzogs ye shes kyi// thig le snang ba'i rim pa ni// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa'i zhing // bsam yas rnam dag gzhal yas khang // dkyil
32b4(1): 'khor rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// ma lus mthong thos nye bsnyen dang // rgya cher gsungs pa'i don 'byung ba// ye shes mthun par snang ba'o// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin
32b5(1): nyid// sangs rgyas spyan gyis ma gzigs te// rab byung ye shes snang med snang // log par rtog pa'i rgyud dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan pa'i// thugs rje chen pos mi gtong ba'i// 'gro drug so so'i
32b6(1): lus su snang // de ltar rang lus dpal ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba bsgrub par bya// lus dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni lus kyis bsgom// lus kyi dkyil 'khor las byung
33a1(1): ba// sems dang lus kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le lus kyi dbyings// 'byung ba'i shes rab rigs kyi yum// thabs chen gsang rigs de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i
33a2(1): tshogs// yul snang kun bzang dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid lhag pa'i yig 'bru las// thugs rje ye shes sgyu mar snang // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dbyings la
33a3(1): mchod pa 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le de nyid dbyings// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi
33a4(1): dngos// phyogs bzhi dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag gi zhal mthong ba'i// dbang bsgyur mchog ni 'di yin no// 'byung ba phung po sangs rgyas lnga// rnam shes
33a5(1): brgyad dang de yi yul// sems dpa' sems ma brgyad yin no// 'byung ba bzhi ni sgo ma bzhi// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs thub pa drug/ lus las byung ba'i 'khor lo nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// ma
33a6(1): lus mnyam sbyor thugs rje 'byung // phyogs dus kun tu 'dus pa'i mgon// sgyu ma'i lus kyi sbyor ba yis// 'bad rtsol bral ba'i lus la spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i lus 'di la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i sbyor
33b1(1): ba yis// rang las byang zhing lhun gyis grub// gnas spyod 'phro dang rtsol ba gsum// gsang ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i gnas// mkha' dkyil thog ma dbyings nyi zla// ye shes bdag po yab yum bsgom// 'di ni
33b2(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ nang du rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// // rab tu gsang ba'i de nyid don// lus kyi de nyid rlung gi gnas// sems kyi de nyid ma bcos
33b3(1): pa// thabs dang shes rab rdzogs sangs rgyas// dri med dngas pa chos kyi sku// ma btsal gtan la dbab par bya// sems kyi gnas lugs de nyid ni// ma bcos dus na ngos bzung ba// kha sbyor snyoms 'jug rmi
33b4(1): lam bral// yid med lus dang btung bas myos// yul rtog ma zhugs sna tshogs te// rang gi de nyid mtshon med shes// skyod byed rgyu bas tshod bzung zhing // mi mthun gnyen pos rtags dang sbyar// dngos grub kho
33b5(1): na nyid du 'gyur// de bas de yi sgrub pa po// phrin las dngos grub gnang ba ni// lha klu gnod sbyin srin po dang // mkha' lding lto 'phye ma'am ci// dri za srin po sha za dang // 'byung po srul po lus srul po// skem
33b6(1): byed smyo byed brjed byed dang // gshin rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs tshogs dang // rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang // 'dus pa rnams ni yan lag bcas// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i
34a1(1): rnam grangs nad// lhan cig skyes dang glo bur ba// 'byung ba'i lus kyi mthun 'phrod dang // rten cing 'brel 'byung rtags dang ltas// gang gis gnod cing 'tshe ba'i phyogs// sdang zhing gdug dang
34a2(1): tshe ba dang // drag shul spyod dang sbyor sngags dang // rang la gnod dang gzhan la phyogs// rang gi de nyid yongs shes pas// nyon mongs rtsa ba yan lag bcas// gzung dang 'dzin pa ma lus pa// zhi bar gnas
34a3(1): pa nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas ye shes lhag par mthong // gnas shing goms pa brtan gyur pa// 'di ni zhi ba'i dngos grub bo// gnas pa'i tshe dang grub pa yi// las la dbang thob dngos grub ni// rdzas dang
34a4(1): longs spyod dpung dang 'khor// 'byor pa'i dpal dang snyan par grags// gzugs bzang dbang phyug ldan pa dang // stobs dang brtson 'grus rab rgyas shing // blta dang mthong dang g.yo ba dang // yod med
34a5(1): gshis la dmigs pa dang // bgrod dang 'gro ba sbyong ba rnams// chu dang 'o ma du ba me// rta dang skyes bu ji lta ba// rang bzhin rgyu 'bras tshogs pa kun// gcig nyid ye shes nyid yin yang // 'khor ba dang ni mya
34a6(1): ngan 'das// rnam pa dang ni ngo bo dang // mthar thug pa dang gnas skabs kyi// rgyu 'bras tshogs pa tha dad snang // snang ba dang ni mthong ba dang // sems dang sems su 'dzin pa dang // stong dang stong par byed pa
34b1(1): dag/ rang gi ngang du rgyas pa ni// dngos grub gcig tu 'gyur ba'o// 'jig rten chos phyir gzugs can dang // gzugs med khams kyis bsdus pa dang // lus dang longs spyod brtan pa kun// pha ma mkhan po
34b2(1): slob dpon dang // rgyal po rje bo'i tshul dag gis// rang gi yul du bya ba dang // nyon mongs pa dang nye ba yi// nyon mongs nyi shu la sogs dang // dge ba nges 'gyur kun 'gro dang // snang ba'i rang bzhin bcu phrag
34b3(1): brgyad// yul dang yul can ma lus pa// rang rig rgyal pos dbang bsgyur ba'i// phrin las dngos grub nyid yin no// rgyud lnga lam gyi snang ba dang // rigs drug 'khor ba'i g.yang sa dang // bar chad bdud
34b4(1): bzhi'i nus pa dang // bgegs dang 'byung po nyon mongs dgra// las dang las kyi 'bri bskyed kyi// rnam par smin pa bar ma'i chos// yang dag rgyu dang rkyen dang dmigs// nyer len lhan cig byed pa'i rgyu// drag
34b5(1): po'i brtul zhugs 'chang ba yis// mngon du spyad pa'i ye shes kyis// ma rtsol ma byung ma bsams par// yongs su snang ba 'byung mi 'byung // skad cig tsam gyi rgyu tshul gyis// ma lus ldog par nus pa ni// phrin
34b6(1): las drag po'i dngos grub bo// rgyu dang rang bzhin gzhi dang lam// gyad kyi lus gnas nor bu bzhin// mthong rtogs mngon du spyod pa ni// 'bras bu'i phrin las dngos grub bo// 'di las phra mo'i ting 'dzin
35a1(1): ni// ye shes bskyed pa sngon song nas// rig bcas rig med skur gnas dang // 'phen pa'i lnga phung la brten pa'i// rig bral myur dang rig pas drang // gzung ba che las brtan pa yis// mchod
35a2(1): sbyin gnang ba stsal ba dang // rten bsgrub pa dang spel ba dang // lus sbyong pa dang sems bsgyur dang // gtan 'pho nyid dang sgyu ma'i lus// dag pa'i mkha' dang du ba dang // srin bu'i tshul dang sgron me che// smig rgyu
35a3(1): 'od lnga pa yi tshul// 'gyu byed rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rmi lam par ma dor sbyang zhing // snga ma'i rten las gnas bsgyur te// 'pho ba dang ni 'jug pa dang // ldog pa dang ni g.yo ba dang // gnas gyur pa dang
35a4(1): tshig 'da' ba'i// dam par bshad pa la sogs pa// las kyi khyad par bsam mi khyab// nye bar spyod pa thams cad 'grub// gnas gsum dag pa'i las kyis ni// don du ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad nga
35a5(1): yi sku gsung thugs// longs spyod mi 'dzad kun tu bzang // rtsa ba yan lag gnas su 'gyur// kun rdzob tsam dang don dam nyid// byang chub sems las rab byung ba'i// tshogs gnyis rdzogs la bdag med
35a6(1): gnas// ting nge 'dzin dang mngon shes kyi// sa bcu'i spyod pa rlabs po che// mthar phyin rtse mo gsum la sogs// bskal pa chen po grangs med dag/ skad cig snang bar byin brlabs te// kun tu bzang po nga
35b1(1): nyid spyod// 'di la gnyis su ga la rtogs// gal te zhi bar mi nus na// rtog pa'i rtsa ba nyon mongs te// gti mug bde gshegs spyi yis spang // zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs kyis so// rin chen rigs kyis nga rgyal
35b2(1): te// 'dod chags pad+ma'i rigs kyis so// las kyi rigs kyi phrag dog sbyang // stong pa'i sems ni kun bzang ma// sha ni sangs rgyas spyan ma ste// drod ni gos dkar ma yis so// mA ma kI yis khrag sbyangs
35b3(1): te// rlung ni dam tshig sgrol mas so// sa yi snying pos mig dbang po// nam mkha' snying pos rna ba ste// sna ni spyan ras gzigs kyis so// lce ni phyag na rdo rjes so// phyi rol mthong bya byams pas sbyang // thos
35b4(1): 'gyur kun tu bzang pos te// tshor ba sgrib pa rnam sel lo// myong ba 'jam dpal rnon pos sbyong // gzugs snang sgeg pa mo yis sbyang // grags tshad glu dbyangs len mas te// snom pa kun ni dag byed ma// bro
35b5(1): yi ro ni tshims byed ma// 'jam rtsub reg pa myong byed ma// 'dod pa rang gi ngang gis sbyang // rnam par rgyal bas zhi bar bya// gshin rje gshed kyi rab rgyas shing // ha ya gri bas dbang du bsdu// bdud rtsi 'khyil
35b6(1): pas mngon du spyod// yum rnams kyis ni dgug pa dang // bcing bsdam dbab par bya ba yin// rigs drug sdug bsngal so so ru// brgya byin sprul pas lha rnams sbyang // thags bzang ris dang snang byed
36a1(1): kyis// mdzad pa'i sprul pas lha min sbyang // mi rnams shAkya thub pas so// shAkya seng ges byol song ste// nam mkha' mdzod kyis yi dwags te// chos rgyal sprul pas dmyal ba sbyang // lus ngag yid
36a2(1): ni sku gsung thugs// bya ba ma lus thams cad kun// bltams dang gzhon nu'i rol pa dang // nges 'byung dka' spyod rdzogs mdzad cing // byang chub pa dang chos gsungs shing // gshegs tshul mdzad dang sku
36a3(1): gdung bstan// zhing gnas bsam pa kha cig tu// skyabs su 'gro zhing sems bskyed dang // sdom pa kun la yongs gnas dang // dbang bskur 'jug pa'i tshul dag gis// gtan gnas spong dang spyod mdzad
36a4(1): cing // gnas bsgyur rang bzhin shes pa yis// blang dor bye brag mi gnas la// gdod nas 'gyur med shes pa yis// rtsol med dbyings su gnas pa yang // las kyi khyad par so so yis// grub pa'i mtshan
36a5(1): rtags dam pa'o// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ nang dang gsang ba'i phrin las dngos grub chen po so sor sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de
36a6(1): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs chen po lnga'i bdag po 'byung ba'i phung po nyon mongs pa sku dang ye shes rnam par dag pa'i ngang du grub par byed pa'i/ gsang ba chen po'i don nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
36b1(1): rdo rje las rab tu byung ba 'di dag bka' stsal to// rnal 'byor las la nye ba yis// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// stong zhing bdag med kun gzhi yi// rnam shes rig pa byang chub sems// rdo rje gsum du
36b2(1): dbyer med gnas// sems nyid skye med yi ge las// 'phro 'du'i las kyi sbyor ba yis// yum lnga'i mkha' dbyings 'byung ba lnga// phyi nang thun mong khyad par yin// 'dod yon 'byung ba'i gzhal med khang // seng
36b3(1): gege glang chen rta dang ni// rma bya nam mkha' lding gi gdan// rgyan ldan rdzogs pa bzhengs su gsol// gzugs brnyan ting 'dzin sbyor ba yi// mngon sum snang ba bsgom pa ni// oM hUM trAM hrIHha/ 'khor lo bzhi ldan po
36b4(1): brang du/ kha dog lnga ldan mdzes par bsam// spro bsdu yongs su rdzogs pa las// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma rgya gram rnams su gyur// de nyid slar yang gyur pa las// rigs lnga rang gi yum dang bcas// zhi
36b5(1): ba chen pa'i tshul dgur ldan// ye shes dam tshig ngang gis bzhugs// 'khor lo lnga yi bdag nyid can// gzugs brnyan rdul tshon de 'dra bar// rang bzhin gnas nas rab bskul te// rin chen khang par gnyis
36b6(1): med gnas// 'dod yon sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis// grangs med rdul mnyam lus gyis 'dud// rdzas kyis mnyes pa 'di yis bya// rigs mchog so so'i rdzas kyis mchod// sku lnga 'dus pa'i dngos grub
37a1(1): blang // rang gi ming gi sgra tshogs kyis// sa bon las ni sku rdzogs pa// grangs med brjod las 'das pa yi// yo ga'i gsung gi 'khor lo yis// dbab pa'i zhing kun bzhes mdzad de// dngos grub
37a2(1): lus dbyig bsdus shing // sems can khams kyi rgyud skrangs nas// rang gi rigs kyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rdzogs par mdzad// de la sku yi cha lugs dang // don rtags rnam dag sgo nas
37a3(1): ni// yon tan tshogs kyis bstod par bya// rdul tshon ting nge 'dzin la bsdu// ting 'dzin rang gi sems la bsdu// spyod lam kun tu nga rgyal bya/ 'di ni phyi yi rdul tshon la// brten nas dkyil 'khor bsgrub
37a4(1): pa'o// phung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni// rang lus dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// gzugs phung de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// rnam par shes pa rdo rje'i rigs// tshor ba'i phung po rin po che// 'du shes phung
37a5(1): po pad+ma'i rigs// 'du byed las kyi rigs yin no// sa sha de bzhin rigs kyi yum// nam mkha' rus pa rdo rje'i rigs// drod me rin chen rigs kyi yum/ khrag chu pad+ma'i rigs yin no// rlung dbugs las kyi
37a6(1): rigs kyi yum// mig dang rna ba sna lce lus// glo snying mkhal ma mchin mtsher dang // rgyu byed rtsa dang yan lag bcas// snod lnga rkang lag nying lag kun// rigs lnga nyid du ye nas gnas// dran pa tsam gyis
37b1(1): dbyings las bskul// gnas tshul shes pas gzhug cing bsdam// gnyis med mthong bas mnyes phyag 'tshal// rang la rang gnas rdzas kyis mchod// spyi gtsug mgrin pa snying ga dang // lte ba gsang ba gnas lnga
37b2(1): ru// rtsibs 'chang chu skyes rgya gram dang // gsal 'bar chos 'byung sngags rnams la// drug cu rtsa bzhir 'byed byed kyis// 'khor lo rdzogs pa'i rim pa yis/ kha dog lnga ldan yig 'bru 'phros// rnam shes bzhon
37b3(1): pa lnga nyid kyi// rtsa ba yan lag bcu sbyar zhing // gnas skabs lnga 'gyur bzlas pa'i mchog/ lhun grub lnga ldan don gyis bstod// gnas bsgyur grub pa'i dngos grub blang // phyi nang snod bcud ma lus kun// 'di
37b4(1): las mi 'da' 'gyur med pa'i// don chen gcig gis dkyil 'khor bsdu// phung po'i dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa'o// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bstan pa'i chos kyi phung po dag/ brgyad khri bzhi stong
37b5(1): gsungs pa ni// de nyid nyon mongs gnyen por bshad// rtsa ba gti mug zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog ste// yan lag sgo lnga'i rnam shes dang / khams dang skye mched ma lus kun// rnam dag rigs
37b6(1): lnga gsang rgyud ni// rang la nga rgyal rlom pa dang // chags shing zhen pas dug tu 'gyur// gzhan la zhe sdang khong khror bcas// phrag dog 'tshe zhing gnod pa'i dug/ gti mug ma rig blun rmongs kyis// kun la
38a1(1): gnod pa'i dug yin yang // skyed pa'i rgyu dang gnas pa'i gzhi// 'jigs pa'i rkyen dang 'gro ba'i sa// dkyil 'khor gyi ni 'khor lor gnas// phyi dang nang dang gnyis ka dang // stong dang stong pa
38a2(1): chen po yis// dkyil 'khor bdag po so so'i rigs// rgyu rkyen gnas gzhi med bzhin du// rang nyid dran pas bskul bar bya// mthong dang goms pas drangs shing dbab// ma chags spyod pas mnyes par
38a3(1): bya// mi smad pa ni bstod pa nyid// skye 'gyod yengs med bzlas pa'o// the tshom som nyi yid gnyis dag/ 'di la gang bral dngos grub thob// dug lnga rin chen lngar bsgrub pa'i// dug lnga'i rang bzhin de nyid
38a4(1): ni// ye shes lnga rnams kho na ste// zhe sdang gsal ba'i ye shes te// dper na g.ya' dang dri ma'i tshogs// bral byas me long dkyil 'khor la// dbyibs dang kha dog mtshan ma'i dngos// ma 'dres tha dad snang ba
38a5(1): nyid// ma grub bzhin du gsal ba ltar// rnam rtog glo bur dri ma dang // bral ba'i sems nyid dkyil 'khor la// phyi nang snong bcud rnam par brtag/ phung po khams dang skye mched tshogs// bde ba sdug bsngal
38a6(1): bsam mi khyab// gzugs brnyan sgra brnyan tshul bzhin du// ma 'gags so sor snang ba'i rgyus// yul la dmigs pa'i snying rje skye// de las nga rgyal mnyam pa yi// ye shes skye ba 'di lta ste// 'khor ba dang ni mya
38b1(1): ngan 'das// nyon mongs pa dang rab tu byang // kun rdzob don dam khyad par gyis// chos rnams stong par gnyam khyer bas// gang zag bdag tu 'dzin med cing // yul kun de yi tshul 'dra bar// chos su bdag
38b2(1): 'dzin bral ba yis// de la dmigs pa'i snying rje 'byung // 'dod chags dug las rtog pa yi// ye shes skye bar bsgrub pa ni// chos kun gdod nas ma skyes shing // rang bzhin med pa'i don bsgoms
38b3(1): nas// gzung ba'i yul dang 'dzin pa'i sems// mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyi yul// spros pa'i mtha' sogs bral bar bsam// dmigs med snying rje ngang gis 'byung // gti mug las ni chos dbyings kyi// ye
38b4(1): shes bsgrub pa snying rje'i rjes// gzung 'dzin yan lag kun bral ba// rang bzhin ngo bo nyid kyi bdag/ dngos po dang bral 'od gsal ba// mnyam bzhag stong pa nyid gnas na// ji lta ba yi ye shes so// phrag
38b5(1): dog gdug las nan tan gyi// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes ni// kun rdzob snying rje'i don rdzogs pas// sems bskyed pa dang smon lam gyis// gzhan don 'byung ba'i khyad par ni// ji ltar rigs pa'i sprul pa
38b6(1): rang gis tshul 'dra gzhan don du// don dam mya ngan 'das dbyings nas// kun rdzob rnam 'phrul 'jig rten du// mthun 'jug sna tshogs dag tu ston// rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes kyi// rgyu dang ngo bo rang
39a1(1): bzhin te// 'di la grol dang shes pa dang // ngang gis gnas las mchog tu 'gyur// dug lnga kho na ye shes lnga// bzhi dang gsum dang gcig dang gnyis// gti mug kho na gcig yin no// 'di la
39a2(1): gnas pas de bsgrub po// ye shes lnga las yongs rdzogs pa'i// sku lnga lhun grub bsgrub pa ni// gzugs kyi phung po gti mug bcas// snang mdzad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// rnam shes phung po zhe sdang bcas// rdo
39a3(1): rje sems dpa' chos kyi sku// tshor ba nga rgyal bcas pa ni// rin chen 'byung ldan sprul pa'i sku// 'du shes 'dod chags phung por bcas// mtha' yas mngon par byang chub sku// 'du byed phrag dog phung por
39a4(1): bcas// don grub mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku// mtshan bzang dpe byad ldan pa dang // dbyings las g.yo ba med pa dang // sna tshogs don du 'byung ba dang // gcig las gcig 'byung gcig pa dang // ma btsal 'gyur
39a5(1): med lhun grub ni// yongs rdzogs sku lnga dngos yin no// de dag kun gyi bya ba dang // nye bar bsgrub pa 'di yin no// oM ma ha bo d+hi tsit+ta sa tA hUM/ dz+nyA na d+ha tu a/ ma ha ka ru dza/ d+harma d+hA tu a// e yaM baM suM laM raM b+h+yAM/
39a6(1): laM haM maM aM khaM ma a paM/ oM hUM swA AMHha/ sa ya baM/ gzhi dang gnas dang brtan pa dang // rten dang gding ba'i rgyu yin no// bdag po rang gi ming mtshan te// yum dang bcas pa 'di las 'byung // mAM lAM mAM pAM taM
39b1(1): dzaHhUM bAM hoH/ sa ma ya hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta pany+tsa b+h+yo na maHa ti pu ho// sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bA ka tsit+ta ma hA sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM/ spyan dang bstim zhing mnyes pa dang // 'bras bu 'grub
39b2(1): par bya ba'o// rdul tshon kha dog lnga pa dang / 'byung ba lus kyi phung po dang // nyon mongs lnga dang ye shes lnga// rdzogs pa'i sku lngar bsgrub pa yis// sangs rgyas 'dus pa lngar bsgrub bya// 'di ni lnga phung rtog par
39b3(1): bcas// rigs drug rgyud lnga shes pa ste// nga nyid phrin las kun tu bzang // zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ rab tu bsdus pa'i rigs kyi rtsa ba'i
39b4(1): bdag nyid chen po tshul lngar sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs so so'i bdag nyid rab tu sgrub pa'i phyag rgya nye bar bstan pa// khyad par gyi gzhi dang
39b5(1): rang bzhin dang / thabs las byung ba'i 'bras bu chen po tha dad du snang bar byed pa nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba chen po las rab tu phyung ste bka' stsal to// ma 'ongs 'byung ba'i dus
39b6(1): dag tu// skyes bu gti mug zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog rnams// so so'i yan lag bcas 'chang bas// rang gi rigs mthun gnyen po ni// bde gshegs rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma las kyi rigs
40a1(1): kyi sgra// tha dad so sor bsgrub pa ni/ khyad par gti mug can dag gis// ma rig rmongs pa'i rtsa ba ste// shel mdog yo du gsal bar bsgom// tshor ba'i sgo nas spro zhing bsdu// rnam par shes pa'i
40a2(1): rten rnams kun// sa bon rdul phra gcig tu bsgom// gzugs sgra kha dog bcas pa kun// sgo gsum yul du gsal ba dang // rnam par snang mdzad sku gnyis brtan// dkar mdzes gsal ba 'khor lo can// phra
40a3(1): mor bsgom dang ril por bsgom// brtan dang g.yo ba rnam rgyu ba// rig pa chen po skyes bu'i gzugs// bdag nyid gsal bar gyur pa dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i dgra gsum dang // bar du gcod pa'i bdud
40a4(1): bzhi dang // rigs drug lhung ba'i g.yang sa rnams// tshe 'di nyid la choms shing chod// 'byung ba'i rgyu yis mi bskyod cing // nyon mongs rkyen gyis mi brdzi la// rang rig dbyings las mi g.yo bar// dag pa'i
40a5(1): sems la dbang bsgyur na// 'di ni de yi tshad yin no// gzhan yang zhe sdang khong khror bcas// nga rgyal rlom sems ldan pa dang // zhen cing gdung ba'i 'dod chags dang // phrag dog sreng len g.yo dang sgra'i// rtsa
40a6(1): ba dkar ser dmar dang ldang // hUM swA hrIHhA 'od gsal ba// spro bsdus so sor gsal ba dang // rdo rje sems dang rin chen 'byung // mtha' yas don yod grub pa rnams// rang gi sku mdog phyag mtshan
40b1(1): bcas// so sor sngar bzhin gsal bar bltas// grub pa'i tshad kyis rab tu brten// gal te ngag gis bsgrub 'dod na// dus gsum 'byung ba'i bde gshegs tshogs// ma lus sku gsung thugs bsdus
40b2(1): pa'i// gsang ba'i snying po 'di nyid ni// oM AHhUM zhes bya ba ste// sgra dang shub bu rdo rje'i bzlas// gsum gyis mjug gnas ldang ba'o// rgyu dang rtsa ba yan lag bcas// 'di la rnam shes rab zhon nas// sgo lnga
40b3(1): dbang po'i lam las byung // gzugs sogs yul la dmigs shing chags// kun rdzob tsam du brtag bzod de// don dam rang gi gshis yin zhing // gnas lugs gdod nas snang ma myong // de bas nyon mongs
40b4(1): lnga yi dug/ kun tu khyab pa'i gzhi nyid la// sa bon tshul du btab pa las// rnam shes yan lag chu lung rkyen// 'dod yon drod gsher nus pas smin// rgyud lnga'i 'bras bur gyur pa las// rigs lnga so so'i ye
40b5(1): shes kyi// mtshon gyis myu gu myur du bcad// lo 'dab 'bras bu bskyed mi nus// sa bon gzhi yi bag la skam// de ni gdod nas rang gi ngang // 'di la bcos su ci zhig yod// gal te rigs kyi rgyu 'bras
40b6(1): lnga// gcig tu bsdus te sbyang ba ni// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// the tshom bral ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sa gzhi legs par brgyan nas su// phyi nang bdud rtsi'i dri yis bgo ting 'dzin 'phel ba'i yo
41a1(1): byad rten// gzugs sgra chos kun 'bru gsum las// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpar bsam// lags pa'i 'du byed phyag mtshan 'dzin// nyi zla pad+ma lus bde'i rgyu// rgyan gyi mtshan dang dpe byad
41a2(1): dang // dbang po lnga yi longs spyod tshogs// ma lus pa ni mchod pa'i rdzas// rlung rgyu smra brjod bzlas pa ste// snyan pa'i tshig thos bstod pa yin// spyod lam kun ni phrin las so// stobs ldan rgyu mthun 'jigs pa
41a3(1): yis// rkyen gyis mi brdzi brtan pa'o// tshad dang rtags su nges par gzung // smon lam sems bzang brtan pa'i phyir// gzhan don phrin las spel ba ni// ji snyed pa dang ji lta ba'i// chos kun 'bru gsum dang
41a4(1): nyid du// ma lus 'dus pa'i sku gsung thugs// gtan la dbab pa'i gnad bsdus la// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo yi chos// zab dang rgya che gnad 'dir 'dus// khams gsum skye 'gro gnas gsum dang // mthong
41a5(1): bya bsgom bya dag pa gsum// smon lam ye shes bgrod pa'i sa// gnas gsum spyod pa 'bras bu dang // bsrung bya dgag bya dkyil 'khor gsum// ting 'dzin rigs dang ma lus sku// gsung dang thugs kyi
41a6(1): mthar zug gsum// bde dang rig pa snang ba yin// dbyer med gsal ba'i stong pa dang // thabs dang shes rab dbyings ye shes// don dam kun rdzob ma bcos pa'i// dbyer med gsal bar rang gi
41b1(1): ngadang // lus gnas rtsa dang der brten pa'i// dngos med rgyu dang zlum po'i dngos// yon tan phrin las mnyes byed dang // bsod nams mthar thug mchod sbyin las// dngos grub sngags dang phyag rgya'i
41b2(1): tshogs// sgrub byed bsnyen pa byin rlabs bcas// mthu dbang dam tshig cho ga dang // skyo ba byed yul dang dam pa'i sems// gtan 'pho rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa// dgra gsum bdud bzhi drod tshad rtags// mtshan/
41b3(1): mar bcas pa'i gnad yin no// 'bru gsum rgyu ba dang bcas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs// rang bzhin nyid du ye nas gnas// 'khor 'das ma lus kun gyi srog/ gcig tu gnas pa kho na ste// sgo
41b4(1): gsum 'di la gang gnas pa// rab tu lci ba'i sdig pa dang // gnas ngan len gyi rgyu bsags sbyang // so so'i thar pa'i rigs bdun dang // smon 'jug bslab pa nyi shur bcas// kun bzang tshogs kyis rab
41b5(1): bshad pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i khyad par dang // gzhi dang yan lag bslab bya las// gang 'das sor 'jug khyad par stobs// ngan 'gro'i srid las rab tu zlog/ gshis ngan dang ni dus min dang // 'chi dang
41b6(1): 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob// dpal 'byor phun sun tshogs 'grub cing // myur du mthar thug sar gnas byed// bris btags mtho dang bzlas pa yi// yon tan tshad gzung yod ma yin// mchod sbyin mnyes
42a1(1): shing tshim pa dang // longs spyod par thob 'di yis 'gyur// 'jig rten pa dang 'das pa yi// lha rnams bsnyen cing bsrung bzlog nus// da ltar dang ni ma 'ongs pa'i// mi 'dod sdug bsngal phyogs
42a2(1): spang zhing // bde 'dod thar pa ma lus 'grub// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can// tha dad blo rigs snang ngo la// dge sbyong dang ni gzhon nu'i gzugs// byang chub
42a3(1): sems dpa' rdzogs longs spyod// zhi ba'i tshul dgu ldan pa dang // kun tu bzang po rdo rje 'dzin/ khro tshul 'chang ba'i rigs kun gyi// bdag nyid thabs dang shes rab dang // snying rje dang ni stong par ldan// mi
42a4(1): 'gyur mi shigs sra ba po// blo dang ldan pa mthu ldan zhing // bzhon pa cha la rab brten nas// go cha bgos te bdud 'dul ba// gzhan don spro zhing the tshom med// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin// 'di ni mthong
42a5(1): bas kha cig spong // kha cig bsam pas spang bar byed// sngon du srid pa'i don la bsam// ma nor ma bcos mi 'gyur ba// ma rtogs kun la snying rje bsam// rang gis byed pa po 'di nyid// mthing ga hUM las spro
42a6(1): dang bsdu// mnyes sbyang las kyi rdo rjer gyur// 'bar gsal 'od du gnas pa las// bskyed pa rdo rje 'chang gi sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rang gi mdog/ thabs dang shes rab brda mdzad cing // pad+ma dang ni nyi
42b1(1): zla gnon// tshul dgu 'chang zhing mtshan dper ldan// yang na khro tshul gar dgur ldan// zhe sdang can dang 'dod chags can// rang gi rigs kyis so sor sbyang // snang dang grag pa'i rtog pa kun// ma lus sku
42b2(1): gsung thugs su brdal// ngo shes phrad dang bral ba yis// rang rgyud dngos po'i zhen pa gcad// ma rig sems dang sems las byung // stong dang cher stong rab tu stong // snang zhing rab snang snang la
42b3(1): sogs// gnyis med gcig med gcig kyang med// dus rnams kun tu 'di la bslab// rdul rnyed sangs rgyas lnga dang gcig/ bdag nyid ngad dang rang bzhin no// spyod lam dus bzhir chos kyi skus// mnyam
42b4(1): par spyod pa de yi mchog/ snang ba sku lnga yongs rdzogs shing // 'byung 'jug gnas pa gsum gyi gsung // bde 'od mi rtog snang ba'i thugs// 'dod yon rol pa ngang gis mchod// dam pa'i yid kyis rgyun du
42b5(1): bsgrub// 'di dag so so'i phrin las ni// gsal ba gsum dang 'od 'byung ba'i// gnas dang sgo gnas de yi thabs// yon tan gnas dang dgos pa'i don// drod tshad rtags gsum ldan pa yis// rang dang pha
42b6(1): rol sgrib pa sbyong // me rlung 'khor lo'i gzugs dang sgras// 'khor bcas las la sbyar ba'o// yul gsum 'phro 'du tsha ba yis// bar chad bgegs kun dpung tshogs gzhom// zla drug sbyor ba drag po yis// rtsa
43a1(1): ba yan lag nyams pa bskang // gnas gzhug dbab dang thim pa yis// 'bru gsum sku gsum thugs dbang bskur// dam pa'i gnas gsum spro bsdu ni// rten 'gyur lus kyi bskor ba dang // rang
43a2(1): dang pha rol nyes tshogs bskang // bkru sbyang las dang 'byung ba'i nad// mdog sbyong 'gro ldog bde drod bskyed// srid par dbang skur 'pho ba dang // sbar zhing bsgyur bas yul gzhan brten// thugs rje gsum
43a3(1): dang rtogs par ldan// tshogs mchod mchod sbyin stobs ldan gyis// mtho dman yul la khyad par dmigs// 'bab pa'i rgyun la brten pa yis// lus gnas bar du rkyen bsal cing // mthar zug tu ni don
43a4(1): gas byed// phrin las lam tu bsgrub pa'o// mtha' dang dbyings nas lhun grub pa// 'bru gsum rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor yin// skye 'gro thams cad rigs kyi bdag/ sku gsung thugs kyi lha nyid snang // phyi nang
43a5(1): gsang ba de nyid kyi// dag pa gsum ldan mchod pa'i rgyu// spro bsdu 'bru gsum zhi dang rgyas// dbang dang drag pa'i phrin las spyod// rgyu gsum 'bras bu gsum sbyar ba// gnas gsal dag pa bsnyen pa'o// cho ga
43a6(1): gsum gyis dngos grub bsdud// dus gsum gzugs sgra bsam pa ni// don gcig gsal ba tshad nyid yin// gsung dbyangs drug cu yan lag sbyar// brag cha sgra brnyan 'di nyid shes// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku
43b1(1): gsung thugs// yon tan ye shes ldan pas bstod// phyi nang snod bcud bem dang rig/ skye med chos dbyings phyag rgyar bsdu// gsang tshul shes pa dgu yin no// 'bru gsum las ni rgyu dang gzhi// skye gnas bzhi
43b2(1): rnams so so'i tshul// bcu gnyis mdzad pa'i rim pa yis// gzhan rgyud dag la snang byed pa// 'bru gsum bskyed cing rdzogs pa yis// gnas gsum gdan dang bdag por bcas// nyi ma zla ba'i phrin las
43b3(1): kyis// rang rgyud las la sbyor ba yin// rdzogs shing bskyed pa'i 'bru gsum ste// de ni zung du 'jug pa las// rab tu sbyangs te rnal 'byor mchog/ rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen por gnas// rab tu 'brel ba'i
43b4(1): bsgrub pa'o// lnga dang gcig dang drug dang gsum// thun mong 'jug pa'i khyad par gyis// bla med gsang ba chen bshad cing // bde bar gshegs pa kun bzang 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal nas// bcom ldan
43b5(1): 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi snying po de kho na nyid kyi ngang la mnyam par bzhugs te// dbyings kyi yum chen mo nyid dang // sku gsung thugs bde ba chen po'i ngang du 'du 'bral med par rol pa'i tshe
43b6(1): 'phrul chen po dang bcas te snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed par byed pa las rigs kyi snying po de kho na nyid mngon par byang chub pa nges par
44a1(1): 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste brtsa pa'o// // bde bar gshegs pa zhi ba'i tshogs rab tu bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po lnga las rab tu sbyor ba bstan pa'i skabs dang po rdzogs so// /
44a2(1): bde gshegs 'dus pa'i slad rab tu 'byed pa'i lde mig las khro bo'i skabs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dpal kun tu bzang po de ngo mtshar chen po rmad du byung ba'i dbang du zhi ba chen
44a3(1): po'i de nyid rgyas par bstan nas/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i bdag nyid dpal rdo rje he ru ka/ 'jigs byed chen po khro bo chen po rab tu khro ba'i sku 'bar ba'i rgyal po bstan te/ phyogs bcu'i
44a4(1): nam mkha'i khams mtha' dang dbus med pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa/ dur khrod chen po 'bar ba'i klong du gnas pa// gzim dngas dang ldan pa'i nam mkha' mthing nag yongs su dag pa'i klung na
44a5(1): rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po stobs dang ldan cing kha dog mdzes pa'i shugs des khrag gi rgya mtsho rba klong rab tu 'khrugs pa dmar ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa ste rab tu sbar ba'i steng na/ ma trang chen po'i phung po
44a6(1): rab tu bkram pas phyogs bcu ma lus par bsnyams pa// rus pa'i phung po rab tu gtams pa'i ri rab brtsegs pa'i dngos po bang rim bzhis mdzes par snang ba'i steng na/ drag po dang gtum po la sogs pa'i
44b1(1): gzhal yas khang gi rnam pa yan lag dang nyid lag gi gtso bo dag gis legs par brtsigs pa'i rim pa chen po gsum gyi rmang dang brtsigs pa bad rkos dang bcas pa/ gnam lcags 'bar ba'i gzer gyis
44b2(1): brtan par byas pa/ nya chen po dang chu srin dang sbrul dang rus sbal dag gis brgyan pa/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / skar ma'i tshogs dang bcas pas rab tu smras pa/ bla re dang chun 'phyang dang / zla ba
44b3(1): phyed pa dang / do shal gyi rnam pa dang / lnga ldi dang / phreng ba dang / za ra tshags dang / yol ba dang ldan pa'i rgyan dang / rin po che dang me dang nyi ma la sogs pa chags pa'i mdangs kyi 'od 'phro ba/ 'brug dang glog
44b4(1): dang sprin dang khu rlangs dang / na bun dang / kha char dang / ser ba dang / rab tu tsha zhing grang ba'i rlung 'khrugs pa dag gi sgra chen po sgrogs pa dang / lha chen po dang klu chen po dang yi dwags chen po dang gnod sbyin
44b5(1): chen po dang nam mkha' lding chen po'i tshogs dang / ba glang chen po dang / byol song gtum po dang / ti ra chen po dang / nyi ma dang zla ba dang / chu'i snying po dag pa chen po dang / khrag dang bcas pa'i pags pa dag
44b6(1): gi gdan bting ba/ yon tan chen po snang ba'i byang chub kyi sems dkar po dang dmar po'i 'od kyi mdangs las gzugs dang skra dang dri dang ro bro ba dang reg pa sna tshogs kyi yo byad kyis mnyes pa'i mchod pa
45a1(1): rab tu sbyor ba'i gnas de lta bu 'phrul par mdzad nas/ nyid kyi sku las dbyings kyi dbang phyug gi yum chen mo dpal 'bar khro mo chen mo mngon par phyung zhing sprul nas gnyis su med pa'i sku
45a2(1): gsung thugs mnyam par sbyor ba las/ 'khor sprul pa'i tshogs snang ba ni 'di lta ste/ zhe sdang rdo rje gar dbang he ru// nga rgyal rin chen gshin rje gshed// 'dod chags pad+ma dbang sdud mchog/ phrin las phrag
45a3(1): dog rdo rjer 'dud// bag chags mngon byung he ru ka/ ser sna 'dul byed dregs pa'i gtso// phra ma mthu chen stobs kyi bdag/ skye mchod rnam dag rang bzhin chos// gtso bdag dregs pa chen po brgyad// rang gi
45a4(1): rigs kyi yum dang bcas// sprul pa dpal gyi 'phro 'du las// sras 'khor sprul pa rnam byung ba// rigs kyi khro bo khro mo dang // phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams bzhi ru// gnas bcas rigs dang rang rang
45a5(1): 'khor// sgo bzhir phrin las byed pa dang // bka' sdod pho nyar bcas pa dag/ rang gi stan dang bkod pa dang / kha dog lag cha rgyan dang tshul// rnam 'phrul dang ni cho 'phrul dang // kun brjod pa dang rjes su
45a6(1): bstan// yongs su bstan pa dag dang bcas// rdo rje rgyal mtshan rin chen dang // chags chen las byed sna tshogs dang // rtags mtshan dus mtshams mthun 'jug dang // ming srid rigs 'chang lus rnal
45b1(1): 'byor// ngag yid las thabs yum dang 'khor// mkha' 'gro shugs 'gro phra men ma// 'bar ma gnod sbyin srin mo che// slas dang byi mo bran mo dang // mngag gzhug rigs dang bcas pa dang // cho 'phrul chen po
45b2(1): kun bstan pa// dbang phyug dang ni grol sbyin dang // rnam grol thams cad 'grub pa dang // nam mkha'i dbang mo rnal 'byor ma// dbang sdud ma dang rnam par gdung // gsang grogs ma dang sgrol ma'o// rdo rje nor
45b3(1): bu pad+ma dang // dam tshig snying po sangs rgyas che// bkod chen dbang phyug yid bzhin gter// chags bzhi rgyan ldan bsam mi khyab// byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms bde ba'i dbang phyug
45b4(1): ma// 'joms byed dga' dang khyab dbang phyug/ gnod sbyin srin po lha ma yin// lha tshogs khrag 'thung he ru ka/ thabs dang shes rab longs spyod bdag/ rgyal 'byed rol byed za byed dang // dran byed snyoms byed
45b5(1): rnal 'byor ma// rigs kyi cho 'phrul gsang ba'i 'khor// me 'da' tshad med rol pa dang // 'jigs byed 'joms byed za byed dang // gsang ba ma dang dga' ma dang // gus pa ma dang g.yo med dang // gso byed
45b6(1): 'dul byed dregs pa dang // mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba dang // zhi dang khro dang dpa' dang sgeg/ 'jigs dang gshe dang snying rje dang // dgod dang rngam dang bzhad pa che// ma lus snang bar gyur pa'i tshe// kun tu
46a1(1): bzang po he ru ka/ dbyings bdag kro d+hi shwa rI ma// mnyam nyid dmigs med sku gsung thugs// bzhengs bzhugs 'jug ldog rnam par 'das// g.yo med rnam rol mdzad pa'i dus// rdo rje kun
46a2(1): bzang kro d+hi shwa rI mas// rnam dag dbyings kyi don gyis rab bskul ba// e ma ho// ye shes nam mkha' rgya mtsho rnam grol klong // mi gnas mi dmigs chos sku he ru ka/ bsam 'das rnal 'byor byang chub sems
46a3(1): gyi rje// ma g.yos dgongs pa rnam dag dbyings nas bzhengs// zhes pas rab bskul don la dgongs mdzad de// ma lus chos kun stong nyid dbyings las shar// rdo rje mngon gyur nam mkha' dri ma med// nyi
46a4(1): zla'i spyan gyi 'od kyis gzigs mdzad de// zhal 'dzum ljags kyi rnam 'phrul bkod pa las// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs mngon par 'khrigs// rol pa'i glog 'khyug 'dir byon sgra sgrogs shing // thugs
46a5(1): rje'i char 'bebs ye shes myu gu skyed// glu gar snyan mchog rol pa'i rgyan g.yo zhing // rol pa'i spyod chen sbyor mnyes bstim pa dang // dgod dang steg dang 'khyud dang gtong ba dang // spro dang bde 'jo thabs kyi
46a6(1): rig pa dang // za 'thung myang 'cha' ldag dang 'thung ba dang // dga' chen khyab 'jug rol pa der snang mdzad// dbang sgyur yum chen 'dzum bag rnam 'dud cing // dgyes chags sku gsung thugs ldan mchog gis
46b1(1): bskul// e ma ho// rdo rje che mchog dpal ldan gar gyi bdag/ skal bzang longs spyod rdzogs sku rol pa'i gtso// tshogs gnyis mnga' bdag thabs ldan rgyal po che// thugs dam dbyings nas rol pa'i bde
46b2(1): chen bzhengs// de brjod bskul ba yab kyi thugs chud de// bde chen ngang las cho 'phrul skur bzhengs nas// rnam 'gying brjid pa gar gyi phyag rgya che// bzhad pa sna tshogs brkyangs bskum 'gyur bag dang // brda
46b3(1): dang sprul pa nam mkha' khyab mdzad de// thamasas cad mtshan ma rnam pa yod med dang // thugs kyi rang bzhin rdo rje he ru ka/ sprul ba'i bdag nyid tshul brgyad rang gi gtso// rab snang he ru ka sogs yum dang
46b4(1): bcas// sras 'khor phrin las sprul pa snang ba la// mngon gyur yum gyi thugs dam bskul ba ni// e ma ho// bde bar gshegs pa rgyal ba rgya mtsho che// thugs rje'i mnga' bdag sbrul sku 'byung gnas gtso// ye
46b5(1): shes sgyu mas rnam rol phrin las mchog/ thabs dang shes rab dpal gyi sbyor ba ston// yum chen gsung gis rab brjod bskul ba las// de nyid mkhyen ldan thugs kyis rab dgongs te// rdo rje'i rol pa de nyid
46b6(1): snang ba'o// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms mdzad cang mi gsung // de la 'dus pa'i 'khor gyis ngo mtshar mdzad// thams cad ma lus rab 'dus mgrin gcig tu// yid gdung glu yis bskul bzhing gsol ba ni// e
47a1(1): ma ho// nam mkha' lta bu'i gter 'byin sku yi mchog/ rdo rje gar mdzad cho 'phrul khyab pa che// bsgyings legs bkod pa mtha' yas rol pa'i gtso// cho 'phrul thogs med 'byung ba de ston
47a2(1): cig/ e ma ho// dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho mtha' yas la// sgra snyan brag cha ma 'gags snying po'i gsung // mi 'jigs sgra ldan gsang ba chen po'i brda// snyan grags dbang phyug legs sgra de gsungs
47a3(1): shig/ e ma ho// spros bral rnam par mi rtog bde chen thugs// de nyid kho na rnam grol ye shes che// mi g.yo rdo rje nges chen mtshon pa'i lung // snying po chos nyid don gsal de phyung zhig/ a la la/ ma rig 'khor
47a4(1): ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'dam bying ba// mi shes rmongs pa'i srid pa'i dra bas bcing // dman pa'i 'gro ba ma lus bsgral slad du// mi 'gyur thabs kyi gru chen de skyod cig/ gnyen po gsang sbyor sku gsung thugs kyi
47a5(1): bdag/ sgrub dang sgrub chen bsnyen dang nye bar bsnyen// las dang las chen skong dang nye bar skong // mi 'gyur gzer dang rnal 'byor yan lag dang // gcad dang brlab dang bskyed dang bstim pa dang // mchod
47a6(1): bstod bskul dang brjod dang sbyong ba dang // mthong dang goms dang spyad par bya ba dag/ sbyangs shing thob bya gnyen po spang bya dge/ mi dge gnod pa 'jug ldog spang dang blang // bya ba min pa bya ba las kyi
47b1(1): dngos// rab 'bring tha ma blo dang dbang po yi// khyad par gang yin yul gyis phye ba dag/ ji ltar rim bzhin gsang rdzogs de ston cig/ sa ma ya a la la ho zhes bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal chen
47b2(1): he ru ka dpal rje nyid kyis sprul zhing 'dus pa'i 'khor la gzigs/ zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po phyung // tshangs pa'i gsung gi nam mkha' khyab mdzad de// sku yi bkod pa du mar snang ba kun// ma lus
47b3(1): don gyi mchog la legs gnas shing // byang chub sems kyi thugs rje dpag med bskyed// sangs rgyas rje btsan rig 'dzin thabs kyi yab// byang chub chen po rnal 'byor rigs pa'i 'khor// khro mo dbang phyug
47b4(1): sku yi mnyam sbyor ma// che ba'i yon tan mchog gi gtsor gyur pa// thugs kyi rdo rje yang dag nges pa'i mchog/ sku yi sku mchog gshin rje kun gyi gshed// gsung gi gtso chen dbang gi ma chags chos// phrin las sna
47b5(1): tshogs rdo rje yan lag mchog/ mngon rdzogs dpa' bo byang chub he ru ka/ dam tshig bdag po 'jigs byed dregs pa 'dul// stobs chen rdo rje 'dzin rgyal mthu mnga' zhing // rgyud chen bdag po rgyal ba'i dbang
47b6(1): phyug che// gtso bo dgu yis gtso byas 'khor gyi tshogs// khyad phyogs mi mthun rnam pa las kyi gtso// ngo bo rigs dang phrin las rnam dag dang // ji ltar bshad pa de ltar 'dir bshad bya// zhes bka' stsal te//
48a1(1): bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i chud rab tu 'byed pa las/ khro bo mngon byung gi le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid dpal chen
48a2(1): po g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te bka' stsal pa/ kye ma rdo rje ma lus pa// 'dzin pa chen por snang ba'i 'khor// khro bo khro mo dbang phyug dang // sras dang lcam dral ming sring
48a3(1): tshogs// bran dang bka' sdod pho nyar bcas// ma lus sprul pa 'dir nyon cig/ rgyal ba rnams kyis cang ma gsungs// de nyid kyis ni rgya cher bshad// de dag sgra dang tshig min par// don gyi dam par mnyan
48a4(1): par byos// ma skyes snying po chos kyi don// spros med tshig tu brjod ma yin// don dgongs gzugs brnyan ltar gsal zhing // skye med tshig gis brdas mtshon pa// mi dmigs pa yi cho 'phrul te// rgyal
48a5(1): 'i thugs gsang snying po'i don// mnyam nyid byang chub theg pa che// dus gsum kun tu 'byung zhing bshad// gsang sngags spyod pa'i rnal 'byor don// chen por shes par bya ba ni// rmi lam sgyu ma smig
48a6(1): rgyu dang // gzugs brnyan sprul pa dri za'i grong // brag cha chu zla mig yor dang // chu bur lta bu'i tshul bcu ni// gsang ba bsgrub dang spyod pa dang // gnas drug sgra la sogs pa dag/ lta ba ting nge 'dzin cho
48b1(1): 'phrul// sna tshogs snang ba de brtag go/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sbyor ba las// yid 'phrog pa yi gzugs brnyan ni// gang snang de ni rang bzhin med// gsang ba chen po de bzhin no// chung ngu'i rlung dang drod sbyor
48b2(1): bas// nus pas rtog cing ri dwags dgud// de bzhin mtshan ma'i tha snyad ming // mi dmigs gsang sngags zhes su brjod// rmi lam snang ba yud tsam la// bde sdug bskal par myong ba yang // de bzhin spyod pa'i
48b3(1): khyad par las// cir snang ngo bo shes pas stong // me long la sogs gzugs brnyan dag/ ma grub bzhin du snang de bzhin// rdzas sngags ting 'dzin las rnams kyis// gang thob grub pa dmigs ma yin// dri za'i
48b4(1): gzugs lus grong khyer snang // de bzhin gzhal yas khang la sogs// gnas 'gyur kun gyi dngos po de// 'du ba bral ba de 'dra'o// bzlas tshig sgra ni brag cha ste// rkyen tsam zhig ni mi 'dor ba'o// zla ba chu la
48b5(1): snang ba yang // phyag rgya'i de bzhin rnam rtog bral// ting 'dzin mig yor gzugs lta bur// sna tshogs 'gyur ba de yin no// snang yang rang bzhin med blta ba// mgal me'i 'khor lo lta bur 'khor// sna tshogs
48b6(1): cho 'phrul rgyun du 'byung // mtshan ma mtshan bcas med gcig pa// rtog tshogs chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab snyoms par 'jug/ spros bral ma byung ma skyes pa// g.yo med rlabs kyi cho 'phrul
49a1(1): can// rnal 'byor chen po zhes su brjod// gang gis de rtogs gcig pu nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba che// dbyer med bdag nyid klong du 'dus// ye nas ma byung lhun gyis grub// gdal ba
49a2(1): kun khyab chos nyid de// thig le snying po gcig tu 'dus// de yi rjes su rnal 'byor ro// snang ba sna tshogs thabs kyi mchog/ bsam bral spros med byang chub sems// thog mar zab mo gang mthong ba/ de ni yang
49a3(1): dag lam chen de// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor chen po yin// rnal 'byor gsum gyi gang sbyor ba// chen po rjes su yongs rdzogs pa// de ni rab 'bring tha ma yi// lam gyis phye ba'i gang zag go/ skye bo 'dod chags
49a4(1): ldan pa la// sngon du nga yis brjod pa bzhin// zhi ba chen po'i thabs kyis sbyang // de nyid grub pa'i mtha' 'jug go/ zhe sdang can gyis rang gi yid/ khro dang khon du 'dzin chen po// sku gsungs thugs kyi mthu dang
49a5(1): stobs// rtog pa drag shul cher spyod cing // ma nges phyogs kyi dbang gyur pa// sna tshogs bstan pa de bzhin du/ khro bo de bzhin gshegs pas sbyang // blo zhan rnams kyis de ni rtog/ byis pa rnams la sngar ma
49a6(1): bstan// tshig gis sgra brjod bsam mi khyab// chos nyid nam mkha' lta bu ste// ming du brjod pas shes mi 'gyur// rnam par brtags pas de mi rtog/ sems dang sems can 'khor ba dang // lam dang gru dang
49b1(1): bzhon pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' bla na med// shes rab ting 'dzin gnas dag gis// phra zhing zab pas gting dpag dka'// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas dang chos// dang por 'khor 'jug sems can
49b2(1): te// sgrol zhing bskyod pa bde ba che// dran mkhas gsal bar gnas der phyin// zla bral rmad byung rab tu'ang 'phags// gting rdzogs gab pa phra zhing 'khyug/ sems can mthar phyin sangs rgyas te// de bzhin
49b3(1): gshegs pa yab yum sras// bdag gdung srog nor bran dang ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu zhes// thabs dang shes rab byang chub
49b4(1): che// dbang byed ma nor 'da' bar dka'// mi zad rnying rje gzi brjid dang // sna tshogs thams cad 'byung ba dang // mdzad pa'i tshogs ni lam yin te// 'dod pa'i 'tsho ba longs spyod che// cho 'phrul phyag rgya
49b5(1): bsnyen pa gnyis// bsgrub gnyis tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa la// yul gyi 'dod pa dmigs pa dang // rol zhing sgrub pa 'bras bur sbyar// smin cing don grub kun las log/ rang bzhin byed pa sna tshogs
49b6(1): 'byung // mtshan ma bstan pa rnam par 'dud// rab 'byed 'dod pa lhag 'dod sbyor// lhun grub pa yis shes pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu zhes// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i gzhi// mtshan ma yul dang
50a1(1): sems las byung // rtog pa dus gsum dngos po yin// don nyid phyogs bzhi log pa'o// dmun dang gdugs dang bskyed pa dang // gdung dang kun 'khrug nyon mongs lnga// rgyu 'dus de rkyen mtshan
50a2(1): ma dang // las dang rnam rig phung po lnga// mthong thos tshor dang myong reg pa// yul la spyod pa'i dbang po lnga// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dang // dus kyi skad cig rgyu drug gis// sa bon rtsa ba myu gu dang // sdong dum
50a3(1): yal ga yan lag dang // 'dab ma me tog 'bras bu smin// rnying dang skam pa rkyen bcu gnyis// gzugs mthong sgra thos dri tshor zhing // ro myong reg byed chos shes pa// skye ba'i skye mched bcu gnyis so// mthong
50a4(1): snang ma nor thos dang grag/ gsal tshor snoms dang tshims pa dang // ro myong bro dang byed par 'os// shes dang shes bya rtog pa dag/ rang bzhin chos nyid bco brgyad de// spyod chos mtshan nyid bcu gcig
50a5(1): ni// 'du shes bskur dang dbang du byed// rnam g.yo dbyeyang sgro 'dogs 'gal ba dang // rtsub 'tshal chags dang gnod par sems// log lha gzung 'dzin spyod pa yis// 'bras bu rdzogs dang rim pa dang // glo
50a6(1): bur gnas bsgyur lnga yin no// dka' thub snyoms 'jug spyod pa dang // gdung zhing spang ba lam lnga'o// bzod gdung nyams 'dod rtsod chags kyis// gnas pa drug tu gyur pa yin// dus dang rgyu dang rang bzhin
50b1(1): gyis// rang gis mu bzung lta ba gsum// shes pa gcig gis rgyu dang lam// kun rdzob don dam tshul gnyis po// kun tu brtags dang gzhan gyi dbang // yongs su grub pa rang bzhin tshul// rim 'jug rkyen sbyor
50b2(1): mngon 'byung dang // thams cad rdzogs pa thabs chen bzhi// rgyu lam bshad bya rtog pa dang // 'bras bu la gnas chos lnga ste// mig mgo yang dang rna ba skye ba dang // 'chi 'pho dang ni rdzu 'phrul te// gzhan blo shes pa
50b3(1): rig pa'o// 'pho 'jug bltam dang rab tu brtsam// mnyam sbyor nges 'byung dka' ba spyod// byang chub bdud btul chos ston cing // cho 'phrul 'da' byed sku gdung gtams// dbang mdzad chen po bcu gnyis
50b4(1): so// mi g.yo chos snang ltar kyang rdzu 'phrul dang // kun rdzob rjes bstan bsam gtan dang // byin rlabs skye ba chos nyid stobs// yon tan 'bras bu cho 'phrul gyis// bcu gnyis dag tu bstan pa yin// nang dang
50b5(1): phyi dang phyi nang dang // stong pa chen po don dam dang // 'dus byas 'dus ma byas dang mtha'// de las 'da' dang dus gsum bral// blang dor med dang rang bzhin stong // chos kun rang gi mtshan nyid stong // mi
50b6(1): dmigs dngos po med pa dang // ngo bo nyid dang dngos med pa'i// ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste// ye shes stong pa bco brgyad do// mi gos mi nyams mi bsgrib pa// rdzogs dang ma g.yos mnyam pa nyid// gnyis med
51a1(1): rnam dag kun legs dang // myur du rdzogs chub rig pa'i ste// bcu gcig sa yi yon tan yin// ngo bo nyid dang chos nyid dang // longs spyod rdzogs dang sprul pa dang // 'byung byed tshogs sbyor
51a2(1): mthong bsgom dang // mi slob mthar phyin bar chad med// 'bras bu yongs rdzogs mkhyen pa dang / khyab dang tshogs 'byung kun tu dbang // dgos 'dod tshang ba 'bras bu drug/ ma lus rdzogs pa'i byang chub
51a3(1): ni// 'bras bu chen po gcig yin no// de la rdzogs pa 'bras bu'i chos// ma nor gtan la phebs pa dang // the tshom med cing sgro skur bral// thabs dang shes rab nges pa'o// rlabs chen khyab pa brjod las
51a4(1): 'das// ldem po mnyam nyid dus gzhan dang // gnyen po grangs dang gzhan don bskur// kun rdzogs che ba de nyid dang // bdag nyid mngon par 'phags phyir ro// rigs dbang 'dres shing 'dus pa
51a5(1): dang // mnyam sbyor tshangs pa'i tshogs chen po// rnam dag sprul pa drag shul dang // dbyangs ldan dga' mdzad mtshan ma 'joms// gsang sbyor spros spyod mdzes par shes// mnyam 'gyur mthun spyod 'pho ba'i
51a6(1): tshul// gzhan don 'byung ba'i tshul bcu gnyis// phrin las bdud rtsi thig le dang // spyod pa'i rgyu dang rig pa 'dzin// thabs dang sprul pa 'byung ba che// rdzogs pa nyid dang mngon par rtogs// mi zad rgyu dang kun
51b1(1): tu snang // de bzhin nyid kyis bcu gnyis so// chos nyid nan tan rtog pa dang // mnyam nyid gsal dang don byed na// don byed rang gi ngo bo dang // snang mdzad sprul pa phyag rgya dang // kun 'byung rgyu dang stong pa
51b2(1): nyid// bco brgyad kyis ni ye shes 'byung // lhun grub yongs rdzogs rtsal sbyong dang // rig pa 'dzin dang lung chen thob// mtshan ma'i rtags dang spyod pa rgyun// gsang sgo rigs can bka' bstod las// sems
51b3(1): 'dun bcu gcig rnal 'byor yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// bde sdug bye brag mnyam mi mnyam// grub pa chen po bzhir 'gyur ro// las dang thugs rje sems dang chos// dbyings dang ye shes thabs
51b4(1): shes rab// rgyu dang 'bras bu sbyor ba lnga// bden pa mthong dang rdzu 'phrul thob// dmigs pa dag dang bdag nyid che// gnyis med ma skyes dngos grub bo// gzhan yang khyad par bcu gcig dang // bslab mthu che/
51b5(1): ba nyi shu dang // mthong dang bsgom pa'i spang bya dang // sems las byung ba brgyad cu dang // lnga bcu rtsa gnyis gang bshad dang // bdud bzhi gnyis sgrib g.yang drug dang // mi dge mtshams med yan lag
51b6(1): bcas// ma lus rtog pa bsam pa kun// gzhi lam 'bras bu 'di yis las// byed pa thams cad blo yin no// bya ba rnams kyang de nyid de// blo dang bral na ci rigs su// mngon par mtho dang nges par
52a1(1): legs// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub lam// bla med sku dang ye shes ldan// ma lus 'di las 'byung ba ste// de bzhin khyed kyis shes par gyis// gzhan du nga yis bshad pa med// ma bshad pa nyid
52a2(1): yang dag bshad// sku dang gsung dang thugs gcig las// bye ba dpag med bsam mi khyab// gang la gang du gang snang yang // nga las gzhan du srid ma yin// de nyid kho nar rtog pa gyis// de las gzhan du skyes
52a3(1): bu'i blo// che dang chung dang shin tu chung // mchog dang dman dang shin du dman// rab dang tha ma bar pa yis// sna tshogs srid dang mthong ba dang // thos dang rig dang myong dang tshor// spro dang bskyed dang 'gag pa
52a4(1): yis// rtog pa ji snyed snang ba dag/ byang chub sems kyi dbang sgyur nas// phrin las nang dang phyi rol dang // gnyis med rang dang gzhan la khyab// gang gis spyod pa 'dir bstan gyis// de dag khyed kyis legs
52a5(1): par nyon// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ tshul gsum nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// phyi ma'i
52a6(1): dus na skyes bu che// mkhas stobs goms pa che ba dang // phyi nang chos la sbyangs pa dang // bstan bya chos sku mthong ba dang // yang dag snying pa'i don shes shing // phrin las spyod pa nus pa yis// gnas pa shes pa
52b1(1): yo byad dang // 'khor rnams phun sum tshogs pa ni// ma lus kun gyi thun mong ngo // rdo rje 'dzin pas bgrod pa dang // rig pa 'dzin pa thob pa dang // shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi yi// dbyings dang rdzas kyi
52b2(1): mtshan nyid ldan// bsam pa dang ni sbyor ba dag/ rang gi zhi bde mi dmigs shing // ma lus kun gyi don 'dod pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i shes pa'o// yum ni mtshan nyid ldan pa dang // phyi nang mi 'khrugs mtshan
52b3(1): nyid sogs// sum cu rtsa gnyis yon tan ldan// 'khor lo gsum gyis sgyu rtsal shes// gnas bsgyur shes pa yid bzhin no// 'tshe ba dang ni mchod sbyin no// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// skye ba bdun pa'i yo byad
52b4(1): dang // nad dang bar gcod kun zlog pa// yo byad phun tshogs bsgrub pa'o// yum dang las byed rdul phyag gsum// bka' bstod mchod pa stob la sogs// 'khor du bsten pa'i dam pa ste// bya ba phyi nang rim pa
52b5(1): la// bklag dang mchod bstod sbyin pa rnams// rab tu rgyas par bya ba'o// nga yis thog mar bshad pa yi// sa der steng 'og par snang dang // phyogs kun legs par brtag pa ste// 'khor lo pad+ma rgyal mtshan
52b6(1): te// de dang ldan pa phyi'i mtshan nyid// chu dang me tog bcas pa dang // sa ro gseg ma gyo mo dang // rus pa sna tshogs slar nyung dang // dur khrod rdzas dang ldan par brtag/ snang dang mi snang mngon mi
53a1(1): mngon// legs bslang gnang ba thob pa dang // sngags dang phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin// mnyes pa mchog gis sbyang ba yis// phyi nang mthun pa'i gzhal yas khang // snang cha byin gyis brlab cing
53a2(1): bzung // tshogs gsog bdud 'dul mchod sbyin dang // sdig pa sbyong ba'i las bya zhing // bsod nams bya zhing gzhan don bya// tshogs bsog pa la 'bad pa dang // phrin las bcol zhing rtsod pa bzlog/ tshogs
53a3(1): chen 'gron dang len chags 'jal// bsod nams spel dang rnam pa bzhi// he ru ka dang mthu stobs can// dbang chen dbang dang thugs rje can// so so'i ting nge 'dzin gyis btang // phyi dang nang gis bkru bya
53a4(1): zhing // zhi dang rgyas dang dbang bsdu ba'i// tshar bcad rnams kyis bsreg pa'i bya// smon lam dang ni blo bskyed nas// phyi rol phyogs bzhi skyong ba dang // 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon po la// mthun pa'i sa la
53a5(1): brten btsugs te// mchod pa dang ni bstod pa dang // bskul zhing bcol ba de bzhin bya// mtshan ngan snod du dmigs pa'i gzugs// dmod pa'i tshig dang bcas te bri// gtum po'i rdzas dang bcas pa
53a6(1): ste// rang rgyud bsam pa can de dgug/ rdo ba rlung stobs can gyis gnan// phyi rol e dbyibs can du gzhug/ he ru ka yi ting 'dzin gyis// za byed rngam stabs ldan pa dang // sprul pa khro bcu rab bskyed
53b1(1): de// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa 'khor dang bcas// bar gcod byed pa phra mo mnan// sum+b+ha ni zhes bya'ang brjod// ma rungs pa yi byang bu la// 'dod pa'i rgyal pa'i gzugs bris te// rang bzhin gnas nas dgug
53b2(1): cing gzhug/ phyi rol khab kyi sgor bstan te// de yis gnod pa bzlog par byed// nang du bskrad cing bsdam pa la// chos kun stong pa'i ngang nyid las// rang snang ye shes mkha' bzhin bsgom// nyi zla'i steng du ye
53b3(1): ge hUM// spro dang bsdu ba'i las byas te// badz+ra d+h+r-ika ces bya ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' gsal byas te// bka' bsgo bskrad dang bcing sogs bya// rigs kyi khro bo dgu rnams kyi// sprul pa'i tshogs bcas gsal
53b4(1): ba dang // phyag mtshan mtshon cha rab ldan pas// kun tu bsrung ba'i las bya'o// de nas stegs bu gang sbyar te// rdo rje rgyal po rab bzhengs nas// mtshan ldan snod du dri chab sbyar// rang byung 'dud rtsi ye shes
53b5(1): lnga// byin gyis brlabs te chag chag gdab// gtso chen yab yum so sor bzhengs// ti ra'i rgyus pa sum bsgril gyis// byang chub sems chen dkar dmar bsgom// shar dang nub kyi phyogs nas 'then// rdo rje
53b6(1): mkha' gsang gnas su gsung // de nas bskul zhing legs gdab pa// steng du ye shes pho brang bzheng // sa gzhi che la gdab pa ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams bzhi ru// thig gdab spyi ru bshad pa'o// pho brang
54a1(1): chen po'i dkyil 'khor dgu// gru bzhi sgo bzhir bcas pa la// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad par khyams dang // mu khyud gru chad 'dod 'byung las// cha dgu rdzogs pa'i thig tu gdab// phyi rol khyams
54a2(1): dang sgo bzhir bcas// dur khrod 'bar ba ra ba dang // 'byung ba chen po gnas par bya// he ru ka rnams dgongs su gsol// rin chen 'bru dang sa dang rdo// rab 'bring tha mar sbyar ba'i rgyu// 'dir ni dur
54a3(1): khrod thal chen las// byang sems dkar dang sbyar ba shar// dri chen gyis sbyar lho ru ste// dmar po dang sbyar nub tu'o// dri chus sbyar ba byang du ste// kun gyis sbyar ba dbus su'o// sku lnga ye shes lngar byin
54a4(1): brlab// oM hUM trAM hrIHhA yis ni/ 'od kyi 'phro 'du bya ba'o// pho brang lte ba mthing nag ste// gcod byed rtsibs rnams dkar ser dmar// ljang gu dag tu bri bya zhing / khyams dang gru chad sgo rnams ni// rang gi rigs
54a5(1): kyi phyogs kyis dbye// thod phreng gdung dang mu khyud de// mdzes pa'i mtshan mar rab tu bri// phyi rol khang pa de bzhin te// rigs dang mtshan ma'i kha dog dbye// de ltar gnas pa snang ba bzhin// ma nor tshang dang
54a6(1): rdzogs par bri// de dag byin gyis brlab pa ni// e yaM ra s+t+waM ko raM b+h+rUM// yi ge sa bon 'phro 'du las// stong zhing bskyod dang gsher ba dang // brtan dang bsregs pa bstod pa yis// stong nyid snying rje snying por
54b1(1): bcas// 'dzin pa gsum las rab rgyu ba// nga yi gnas chen 'di ltar bsgom// rigs kyi dpal chen he ru ka/ rang gi 'khor dang bcas pa dag/ 'di ru byin gyis brlab par bya// de la rgyan btags gsol ba
54b2(1): ni// mtshan ldan lcang lo ka pA la// grangs dang mthun pa phyogs dgu'o// pags pa chen po'i bla re bre// rgyun ma'i dra ba dra phyed do// don snying rnams ni 'phyang 'phrul te// rak+ta zhal bu skyems su drangs// phyi rol
54b3(1): bsrung ba'i rgyan rnams ni// ral gri phur pa mda' dang mdung // phyogs mtshams ba su ta yis bres// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal thebs kyis// ye shes dbyings nas dgongs su gsol// bdag nyid 'jug pa'i sgo dbye
54b4(1): zhing // gsang ba'i ming phul gsol ba gdab// gus pas phyag 'tshal mchod rdzas dbul// nye bar bsnyen zhing bstod pa bya// phyi rol bsgrub pa'i grogs rnams kun// snga ma las ni phyi ma bzhin// dam tshig
54b5(1): rtogs pa bsre bya zhing // brab dang bcing dang bdug pa dang // bskrad dang gcad pa dag tu bya// skyabs su song zhing sems bskyed de// sdig pa ma lus bshags byas nas// rim pas gsol ba gdab byas
54b6(1): te// gnang ba thob nas me tog dbul// lha dang 'brel pa brtag par bya// de yi rjes bsrung dam tshig bsgrag/ mig phye nas ni dkyil 'khor bstan// slar yang mchod cing bstod byas te// sgrub pa po rnams gral
55a1(1): bshams nas// ji ltar rigs pa'i mnga' gsol nas// bshags bya gnang ba ma lus byas// de nas gtso chen rgyal po la// dur khrod chen po'i chas brgyad gsol// ma lus byin la rtags gdab
55a2(1): cing // dam tshig bca' ba nyi shu bya// byin brlab dbab cing thugs dam bskang // rigs kyi dngos grub tshul bzhin blang // rdo rje 'chang gi lha rnams bsnyen// las kyi rgyal pos tshul bzhin bsgrub// kun sbyor
55a3(1): gsum dang 'byung ba lnga// bkod pa gcig dang mdzes pa bzhi// kun tu khyab par rab bsgom ste// gtso chen cho ga gsum dang lnga// yab yum yongs su rdzogs pa bskyed// sngon du bshad pa de bzhin no// gang dag
55a4(1): rjes su bshad bya ba// de nyid kyang ni dus 'dir bshad// gtso chen dkyil 'khor yam yum bcas// bskul dang spro dang bsdu ba dang // dbab dang bskyil dang g.yo ba dang // nges par 'byung ba dag gis
55a5(1): ni// phyogs bzhi dang ni mtshams brgyad du// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rab phyung ste// phyi rol tu yang 'khor rnams sbrul// rang bzhin gnas nas de nyid dgug/ de dag gnyis su med par bya// slar yang las kyi
55a6(1): lha sprul te// mnyes bya kun gyis mnyes par bya// de nas ma lus 'khor bcas kun// sku gsung thugs su gsal gdab ste// slar yang srog gi dkyil 'khor la// chu shel dkyil 'khor gzugs tshad tsam// de
55b1(1): nyid la ni rang gi dngos// byang chub sems dpa' tshal 'dzin cing // de nyid kyang ni pad+ma steng // rin po che yi tshul du gnas// nyi ma'i steng du sa bon nyid// rang gi ming tshig snying po bkod// mthing ga'i 'od zer
55b2(1): 'phro bar bsgom// myong byed pad+ma 'dab brgyad la// rdo rje dkar po rtse gsum la// kun gyi gsung 'byung sa bon te// rang sngags dmar po'i 'od bcas bsgom// tshangs pa'i gnas su rtsibs brgyad pa'i// 'khor
55b3(1): lo nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// sku yi sa bon rang sngags bcas// 'od zer dkar po'i 'phro 'du bsgom// de nyid brtan byed tshig gis gsal// 'phro 'du ye shes rang gi rgya// phyi rol phyogs mtshams thams cad
55b4(1): du// 'phags pa'i tshogs kun mnyes par bya// tshur 'dus rnam rtog bag chags sbyang // gzugs dag sgra dang 'od dang bcas// phra mo'i ting 'dzin rig pa nyid// rang gi yid la gsal ba yis// gnas gsum
55b5(1): rnam par dag pa sbyang // de ni dang po'i bya ba'o// de yi 'og tu bsgom bya ba// sngar bshad las su rung ba na// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med pa'i// tshogs kyi dus gcig bsnyen pa la// kun gyi ye shes ngo bor
55b6(1): gyur// gnyis med brtan par gnas pa ste// ma lus nye bar gyur pa'o// tha ma'i dus su gnas bsgyur te// rdzas dang lha dang cho 'phrul de// dkyil 'khor kun tu tho rangs dus// bsgrub chen rnams kyis rgyan
56a1(1): rtags gsol// 'phro 'du'i 'od kyis phyi dang nang // snod bcud ma lus thams cad kyi// yon tan bcud ldan ma lus pa// thams cad ma lus gnas 'di ru// mkha' gsang dngos grub chen por
56a2(1): bsdu// de dag kun gyis dus chen du// bzlas pa'i skyon bzhi spang ba ni// lha dang dkyil 'khor mchod pa dang // dbyangs dang dngos grub phrin las kyis// chos nyid snying po shes pa brgyad// gnas sbyong dus su
56a3(1): bsam pa'o// nye dang spro dang thim pa gsum// bar pa'i dus su bsgom par bya// bsgyur ba gsum bzhi btsal ba bcu// gar sbyangs yan lag dgu dang bcas// de ni tha ma'i dus su spyad// rdo rje dril bu nyung dkar
56a4(1): dang // mar me mAM sa phyag mtshan dang // dpal rdzas 'khor lo dbang mchog dang // zas bcud tshe gal 'jam des dang // zla rgyas phrom dang 'phar ba dang // dpa' bo rnams kyi dngos grub sbyin// lha dang slob
56a5(1): dpon sgrub pa'i grogs// rim bzhin phan tshun bshags sbyang bya// bkra shis dang ni smon lam gyis// glu dbyangs mchod bstod lhag chad bskang // gter sbas gzir dang gnan par bya// bsdu dang bar chad
56a6(1): bsrung ba dang // chos nyid mi dmigs blo brtan te// yul mchog dam pa de mnyes bya// 'di byas dus kyi bsnyen pa ste// sgrub pa chen po gcig yin pas// kun tu bzang po he ru ka/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs su
56b1(1): 'grub// bsnyen pa chen po'i sbyor ba yin// 'di dag kun gyi thun mong bsrung // mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// phyi bshad 'byung ba chen po lnga// nang du drag po'i mtshon cha lnga// gsang bar rigs kyi khro
56b2(1): bopo lnga// de nyid ye shes rnam lnga'o// de las tshig tu brjod bya ba// hUM nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// sems kyi rang bzhin chos kyi sku// spros med rnam dag dngos dang bral// gdal ba chen po'i ye
56b3(1): shes kyis// phyogs bcu ma lus kun tu khyab// snod bcud snang ba dpag tu med// thams cad rang gi ngo bos stong // 'di las ma ltos chos gzhan med// rang gi sems nyid snang cha las// gzhan snang 'khrul pa
56b4(1): tsam nyid las// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i rtog pa de// gnyis med ngang du mtshams gcad bya'o// e dz+nyA na maN+Da la shun n+ya tA ma ha ra sngags rnams sor bzhag/ hUM// yaM rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba ni// dbugs kyi rang bzhin stobs
56b5(1): dang ldan// thams cad g.yo zhing ma lus 'degs// dngos po 'thor zhing mtshan ma 'joms// thogs med shugs kyi phrin las mdzad// phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad du// rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa
56b6(1): dang // ma rig pa yi sgrib pa'i tshogs// thams cad gtor zhing ma lus sbyang // blang dor yod med dgag bsgrub dang // spang blang rtog pa ji snyed kun// rang gi sems kyis mtshams gcad bya'o// yaM ma hA karmA spa
57a1(1): ra Na swa b+hA ru tra hUM// ba rgya mtsho chen po'i rgyun 'bab pa// rang gi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor te// chu yi rang bzhin gtsang zhing dngas// yan lag brgyad ldan yon tan rdzogs// bde chen byang chub
57a2(1): sems kyi rgyun// bag chags rtog pa'i dri ma 'khru// gzung 'dzin las kyi gnas ngan sbyong // gnyis snang 'khor ba'i rgyun lam bsal// ye shes chen po'i rba rlabs kyis// ma rig mtshan ma'i rnyog ma
57a3(1): grung // dngos dang dngos min sgrib pa'i tshogs// ma lus sbyang ba'i mtshams gcad bya'o// baM ma hA maN+Da la mu tra b+he sa ma ye hUM// raM 'bar ba'i rgyal po me yi dpung // bdag gi drod kyi rang bzhin te// gsal zhing
57a4(1): bsreg pa'i mthu stobs ldan// snod bcud khams kyi rang bzhin kun// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bar ba yis// nyon mongs rnam rtog bud shing bcas// ma lus sreg byed tsha ba yis// gnas ngan lan gyi phung po
57a5(1): bsreg/ ye shes me dpung 'bar ba ni// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phro// bskal pa'i me chen kha dog lnga// ma lus bsregs te mtshams gcad bya'o// hUM badz+ra s+pho Ta ya dz+wa la stas+t+ra ba ta ma hA tsar+ya hUM// laM khams
57a6(1): gsum brtan pa'i sa gzhi ni// bdag nyid sha las gyur pa ste// brtan zhing mi g.yo rnam par brjid// 'jig rten mthu chen kun gyis kyang // gzhig cing smad par mi nus te// rdo rje 'bar ba cher 'bar
57b1(1): ba// dpal ldan stong gsum srid pa'i gzhi// phyogs bcu dus gsum thams cad kyi// rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas pho brang ste// gzhal med khang chen rab tu brtag/ mi 'gyur mi shigs yongs su brtag/ bdag
57b2(1): nyid chen po'i mtshams gcad bya'o// b+h+rUM ma hA sa ma ya bud+d+ha lo tsa na sa ma a laM ka hUM// ye shes 'byung ba chen po lnga// bsreg dang gtor dang bkru ba yis// cis kyang gzhig par mi nus pa'i// stong pa chen po'i
57b3(1): bdag nyid kyis// ji bzhin 'dod pa rab bsgrub pa'i// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// tshig tu brjod pa'i don bsams shing // phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyi// snod bcud rnam rtog rab sbyang
57b4(1): bas// bar gcod 'dul ba'i mtshams bcad do// de nas nang du mtshon cha lnga// mi bzad 'bar ba'i mtshams bcad pa// he ru ka yi thugs ka nas// rdo rje 'khor lo tho ba dang // ral gri phur pa'i rang bzhin
57b5(1): dag/ hUM oM phaT AM hA las 'phros// steng 'og phyogs bzhi mtshams dang bcu// thams cad mtshon cha'i rang bzhin te// 'og nas sa gzhi gtams pa ste// steng nas sprin 'khrigs char du 'bebs// bar snang rlung
57b6(1): bskyed thog ltar rgyu// phyogs mtshams 'du 'phro me ltar 'bar// rdo rje 'bar ba gsor zhing brdeg/ 'khor lo 'bar ba bskor zhing gcod// tho ba 'bar ba 'phyar zhing brdung // ral gri 'bar bas gcod cing
58a1(1): gtub// phur pa 'bar bas 'debs shing 'bigs// bar gcod byed pa bgegs kyi tshogs// ma lus rdul du brlag par bya// oM dz+nyA na tsakra dza la hAM/ dz+nyA na badz+ra dza la hUM/ dz+nyA na tIg+h+na dza la hUM// dz+nyA na
58a2(1): shak+ti dza la hUM/ dz+nyA na kI la ya dza la hUM/ nang du khro bo rigs lnga ni// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa ni// zhi bas 'dul bar mi nus te// thugs rje chen po'i thabs mchog gis// thugs mchog zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// sku
58a3(1): yi cha lugs khro bar mdzad// rgyu 'bras gnod pa de 'dul phyir// rigs kyi khro chen 'bar ba lnga// dbus dang phyogs bzhi dkyil 'khor rnams// stong gsum 'jig rten khams kun gyi// dngos po rdzas dang
58a4(1): mtshan ma kun// sangs rgyas rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma phrin las khrag 'thung ste// thams cad dpal chen he ru ka/ khro bo'i tshogs ni nam mkha' gang / khro mo'i tshogs kyis sa gzhi khyab/ khro chung tshogs ni skar
58a5(1): ltar 'khrugs// dam tshig can ni dbyings nas bzhengs// sangs rgyas khro bos gti mug 'dul// rdo rje khro bos zhe sdang 'joms// rin chen khro bos nga rgyal 'joms// pad+ma'i khro bos 'dod chags 'joms// phrin
58a6(1): las khro bos phrag dog 'joms// dri za gshin rje klu rnams dang // phyogs mtshams gnas pa bgegs kyi tshogs// 'jig rten phyogs bcu gzhan du byer// 'di ni dpal gyi pho brang ste// bgegs zhes bya ba'i
58b1(1): ming yang med// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ ma hA bud+d+ha badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma maN+Da la badz+ra ya pany+tsa kro d+ha hUM phaT// hUM khro rgyal kun gyi ye shes ni// zhe sdang nga rgyal phrag dog
58b2(1): dang // 'dod chags gti mug ngang gis dag/ gti mug dpal chen he ru ka/ chos dbyings ye shes dang du gsal// kun tu ma bcos mtha' dang bral// zhe sdang dpal chen he ru ka/ gzugs brnyan ye shes dang du
58b3(1): gsal// ma nor ma lus mkhyen pa'i ngang // nga rgyal dpal chen he ru ka/ mnyam nyid ye shes dang du gsal// gnyis su 'dzin pa'i blta ba bral// 'dod chags dpal chen he ru ka/ rtog pa'i ye shes dang du
58b4(1): gsal// chos kun 'ub chub khong du chud// phrag dog dpal chen he ru ka/ phrin las sna tshogs dang du gsal// thams cad ma grub gang yang med// chos sku spros bral che ba'i mchog/ longs spyod rdzogs sku he ru
58b5(1): ka/ sbrul sku khro bo khro mo'i tshogs// rang bzhin mi 'gyur rdo rje'i sku// phrin las mngon par byang chub sku// thams cad sku dang ye shes la// bgegs su rtog pa gang yang med// bsrung bar bya dang srung byed
58b6(1): med// gcad dang gcod byed gang yang med// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa med// 'di la bsal du ga la yod// rang gi sems dang gzhan gyi sems// thams cad chos sku'i ngang du shes// chos sku kun bzang
59a1(1): he ru ka/ dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na ka ya pany+tsa bo d+hi ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// srung ba chen
59a2(1): po'i sbyor ba'o// de nas bde bar gshegs rnams kyis// yon tan ma lus rdzogs pa yi// byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgrub pa che// 'chi med bdud rtsi'i lung bshad pa// thog mar 'di la rtsom pa yis// nga yis
59a3(1): sngon du rab bshad pa'i// mtshan nyid rab rdzogs skyes bu de// dpa' zhing brtul phod blo dang ldan// rigs bzang yon tan rgyan dang ldan// ma lus thob pa de yis ni// thabs dang shes rab grogs bzang
59a4(1): btsal// ji srid spang bya ma lus pas// sangs rgyas drang srong grub pa dang // rdo rje phra men sbyor gnas dang // dur khrod chen po mngon du rgyu// dam tshig can gyi grogs byed cing // bkra shis rdzas kyis rab brgyan
59a5(1): pa// 'byung chen dang ni dregs chen dang // mi dang mi min dgra med cing // phun sum tshogs pa gtsang ma der// legs par brtag ste nges bzung zhing // kun la gnang ba thob pa dang // thabs kyi tsho gas legs
59a6(1): par sbyang // yo byad mchog gis bsnyen bkur zhing // thog ma bar dang mthar rdzogs pa'i// mi zad gter dang ldan par bya// sngon 'gro dkyil 'khor gru gsum la// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i phur pa gdab// phyogs
59b1(1): bcu kun nas bsrung bya zhing // zhe sdang chen po ting nge 'dzin// rdo rje khro bo'i lus ngag gis// ting 'dzin byin brlab rab tu bskor// gzhal med khang pa legs par bsgom// mchog dang dman dang bar ma
59b2(1): yis// yul gsum mchod pas kun mnyes nas// sgo gsum gyi ni nyes pa sbyang // rang gi rigs kyi lhar brtags nas// phyogs bzhir rten bzhi mnga' gsol zhing // phrin las ji ltar bsngags pa gsol// nang
59b3(1): du bya ba'i rim pa dang // gsang zhing bya ba rnams gyis skrad// dur khrod bdag po der dgug cing // gsad dang gnan dang bsrung bar bya// de nyid gzhir gyur sa gzhir bya// lus kyi tshad ldan mnyam pa
59b4(1): la// lus dri mdog bzang rnams kyis bstar// shes rab grogs kyis rab 'bad de// gnas lnga mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab// dri dang rgyan gyis rab bgos te// rgyu dang kha dog tshul ldan pa'i// thig skud rdo/
59b5(1): rjer byin brlab brjod// rdo rje dang ni pad+ma che// oM dang hUM zhes bya ba yis// oM hrIHa dang phaT kyis brgyan// 'bru lnga dang ni byang chub sems// oM AHhUM gi rang bzhin gyis// cho ga gsum dang ldan pas
59b6(1): gdab// mkha' dang gsang ba'i 'phro 'du yis// dkyil 'khor dgu'am lnga las ni// bcu drug cha yis phye zhing gsal// zhi dang shin tu zhi dang khro// rnam grangs kun tu khyab pa yi// rin chen ye shes tshon sna
60a1(1): lngas// ngas bshad bzhugs pa'i pho brang bzhengs// bsnyen par gnang ba bshad bzhin du// sku rdzogs phyag mtshan snying po la// rang gi rigs kyi mtshan ma yis// rdzas kyi khyad par mngon par
60a2(1): dbyung // phyi nang gsang ba bum pa'i rdzas/ khyad par 'di la bsngags pa yi// ye shes lnga ldan dbus su dgod// sku gsum lhun grub shar du ste// yid bzhin gter ldan lho ru'o// khams gsum sgrol mdzad nub
60a3(1): tu ste// cho 'phrul rtags 'byin byang du dgod// mi shigs mdzod ldan shar lho ste// srid gsum yongs sgrol lho nub tu'o// dug gsum gtan dkrug nub byang du'o// mtshan ma spros bral byang shar du'o// so so'i
60a4(1): ming gi mtshan ma dag/ rigs kyi rdzas mchog rnam pa lnga// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas// rdzas kyi rnam pa de sbyar bya/ kha dog rigs dang mthun pas bcing // dur khrod srung ba'i rdzas kyis bskor// thun mong
60a5(1): mchod rdzas rgyas par bsham// zhi ba g+ha na ta na'i dus// phyogs bzhi dag na rab brtan pa'i// dur khrod rdzas dang mar me dang // yum dang yab dang rgyu mchog sngags// nga yis sngon bshad rigs brgya dang // brgya
60a6(1): phyed lnga dang gcig nyid kyi// gnas mchog gsum du 'bru gsum gyis// ri bong 'dzin pa'i steng du gsal// ye shes lnga dang sku mchog dang // yab yum thun mong dbu rgyan gsal// dgug gzhug bstim pa tshang
60b1(1): byas nas// dam tshig dbang chen rnams kyis bsngags// rnam par rtog pa kun sbyang ste// bsnyen pa dam pas nye bar bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mri ta/ ra swa ya na ta na dza ya// gu h+ya sid+d+hi hU~M hrIH/ sman rnams thams
60b2(1): cad bdud rtsi lnga// bye ba sna tshogs sku gsung thugs// gsang ba'i dngos grub nye ba'o// sman dang dam tshig lha rnams ni// kun dang rgyas ldan dam pas sbyang // stod tshogs mchod bstod ting 'dzin gsal// bskrad
60b3(1): dang bsrung dang bar chad bzlog/ rtags rdzogs thod pa lngar dbye zhing // rigs lnga'i dam tshig dbab pa ni// rdzas mchog rnam pa lnga dbye ba// dbus su sems 'du rtsa ba brgyad// ga bur cu gang dwa ti dang // grwa
60b4(1): gum phrag sbrel lo shi dang // ka ko la thal kar rdo rje dang // sha ri ram dang bcas te dgod// shar du dri chen a ru ra// ma ga rba dang dzA ti dang // du ru ka la sogs pa dgod// tshe rum sa sring sna tshogs// zhog
60b5(1): rnams dang tsatra ka/ ka ko la laM sogs par dgod// nub tu pad+ma rak+ta dang // tsan dan li shai s+pha ru ra// rgun 'brum skar bra la sogs dgod// byang du dri chu sna tshogs dang // gur gum ce pog la sogs te// 6@
60b6(1): lo ma me tog 'bras// lus bcud dbang po yan lag dang // rtsa khrag chu la sogs pa kun// shar lho nub byang phyogs dang dbus// rang gi rigs dang 'khor du dgod// ya raM las ni bskyod dang bsreg/ dbus pa
61a1(1): a maM nyi zla la// oM hUM swA AM hA zhes pa// dkar mthing ser dmar ljang gu dbus// shar lho nub byang rim bzhin bskyed// 'od ldan rgyud lnga sbyong byed cing // snod bcud rab bsdus mtshan ma
61a2(1): ni// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma ral gri'i 'phro 'du dang // sku lnga yum dang bcas pa yis// gsal ba'i snod du blangs nas kyang // rdo rje pad+ma'i 'phro 'du dang // so so'i rigs kyi snying po dang // tshogs lnga ye
61a3(1): shes lnga dang bcas// chang chu 'o ma rin chen chu// mtshams bzhin so so'i 'dul sbyong gis// rtags dang ldan par gyur pa dang // gnyis med gsang chen rigs gcig gi/ rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du bsgom// oM
61a4(1): sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta/ badz+ra tsit+ta sa ma hUM/ zhu ba'i ngo bo nyid du bya// sbyor ba'i nus rtags rdzogs pa dang // mchod bstod dngos grub blang la sogs// shes rab kyis ni thabs mnyes bya// pho brang mchog la rdzas kun
61a5(1): bsdus// mnyam nyid thugs la bstim zhing sbyang // zhing dang rgyu yang rab tu dgug/ gnas ngan sbyang zhing brod pa bskyed// yi ge sku lnga'i 'phro 'du las// phrin las gsum gyi don kun rdzogs// lha dang dkyil
61a6(1): 'khor rdzas rnams kun// dur khrod chen po'i gsang ba mchog/ dpal kyi khro rtags cha lugs bsgyur// pags pa g.yang gzhi mchog steng du// dri mchog bdud rtsi lnga yis bsgo// dkar dmar sems kyi thig le
61b1(1): bri// rdo rje ging chen chas su gzhug/ mkha' gsungs thabs dang shes rab kyis// byin rlabs bdud rtsi 'khyil ba las// gtso chen dang ni 'khor gyi tshogs// rang gi rigs dang mtshungs pa yis// ye shes bdud
61b2(1): rtsi dbab par bya// sbyong ba'i bsnyen pas bzhu zhing btul// mtshan rtags las su rung ba dang // mtshan ma dbyings su sbyang ba'i phyir// gtso 'khor rim bzhin phyag rgyas dbab// btag btsag sbyang dang spel ba
61b3(1): ni// shar lho nub byang phyogs rim bzhin// sngags phreng bcas pas mthar phyung ste// bdug cing bskrad dang bsrung ba dang // glu bro gar dang mchod bstod bya/ khro bcu'i nga rgyal stangs stabs kyis// yon tan
61b4(1): brjod cing zhi bas bskrad// yi ge 'bru lngas bzhu dang btul// phrin las rnam bzhi'i sreg sbyang las// rdzas kyi phrad kyis mnyes par bya// mtshan ldan yum de brgyan byas nas// bzang po'i snod du rgyas btab
61b5(1): nas// rdo rje rgyal po lnga yis bzung // stong pa nyid dang snying rje dang // sems gsum dag pa'i byin rlabs dbab// phyi nang 'byung ba yongs rdzogs pas// dur khrod rgyan rdzogs gzhal yas khang // pho brang chen po
61b6(1): dgu bsams nas// rang gi gdan steng sa bon gyis// nga nyid che mchog he ru ka/ gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma dang sbyor// phyogs kun tu ni dkyil 'khor dbyung // phyogs mtshams brgyad du 'khor bcas
62a1(1): dgod// bdud rtsi 'khyil dang pad+mar 'khyil// de yi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// gsang ba rigs bzhi yum dang bcas// steng 'og yum dang pad+mar 'khyil// rlung dang me yi sbyor ba las// gzhal med khang
62a2(1): pa brgyad dbus su// gtso chen brgyad kyi dbu gsum brdzis// de steng bdag nyid he ru ka/ zhabs bzhi yis ni rab tu mnan// mkha' mnyam klong gi zhabs brgyad kyis// he ru ka brgyad dbu gnyis mnan// dbu
62a3(1): phyed rngub pa'i bdag nyid las// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzhi bcu gnyis// zhabs brgyad dbu brgyad rnams sbyor ba// rdzogs byed he ru ka nyid ni// dbu ma'i ljags la sa nu sbyor// thugs kar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
62a4(1): la// bum pa'i dbus la 'bru dgus bskor// 'di ni sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor bdun// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor brgyad dang ldan// he ru ka yi nga rgyal ldan// ye shes dkyil 'khor tshogs dgug cing // slar
62a5(1): bstim mchod cing bstod byas nas// bya ba chen po der 'jug pas// bdag nyid der sbyang sngags dang bcas// ting 'dzin me dpung rlung gis bskyod// don rtogs dpe dang ldan pa ni// ye shes chen po'i bdud rtsi
62a6(1): ste// mu tig dkar po dri med ldan// dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bzhu zhing btul// mnga' mdzad bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i// 'phro 'du gsum gyis don chen bsgrub// de 'dra'i sbyor ba dpag med kyis// rim
62b1(1): bzhin thabs kyi yan lag las// brtson 'grus stobs kyis 'bad pa ni// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rnams kyis gtsor byas nas// 'od dang du ba sgra dang dri// gzugs snang 'phel ba rab
62b2(1): tu ston// de la mchod bstod rgya chen bya// ting 'dzin bskyed cing bar chad bzlog/ sngags pa mchog gis gzung bar bya// 'dod pa rdzogs nas bsgril bar bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIHTha/ brgya rtsa brgyad
62b3(1): kyis ting 'dzin bsgyur// pho brang chen por dbab bya zhing // oM a mr-i sa ma ya pra be sha ya pheM pho hUM hrIHTha// bar du spogs shing ting 'dzin gsal// dngos grub gnyer zhing gsol ba gdab// pho brang dgu yi steng
62b4(1): gzhug nas// las dang mthun pa'i dbang rdzas bskur// phyogs bcur gnas dang nye ba'i lha// lhag 'gyur bla ma dus gsum mchod// de bzhin bdag gis dngos grub blang // re dogs spang ste phyag rgya
62b5(1): spel// dmigs med gsum gyis de la sbyar// a ho su kha d+harma kA ya a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hUM hrIH// nyi ma'i rdo rje hUM ldan bcas// rin chen dbang po'i sgo la thim// rigs kun so sor gnang ba dang // rdo rje slob mas me
62b6(1): tog gtor// rim pa bzhin du dbang sbyin pa// skul tshig dbyangs dang sngags rdzas bcas// phyi nang gnang ba de nyid tshul// yul gsum mnyes phyir gsum du'o// mchod rdzas chen po bstar ba yang // bsreg cing
63a1(1): mchod de gtor chen la// 'phags pa mchod cing gdod longs spyad// ri lu lcags sam za ma tog/ thog ma'i snod gzhug bsnyen cing bkur// rgyal sras byang chub sems dpar 'gyur// nyan thos
63a2(1): rang sangs rgyas la sogs// bskal pa grangs med skad cig gis// mnyam dang chos lhag yon tan rdzogs// phrin las rnam bzhi legs bshad cing // phyi nang kun mnyes gtang rag gtang // gnas bsrung lha
63a3(1): gzhan der mi bstod// kun gyi don tu bsngo bya zhing // mtshan ma spros bral dngos yin no// byang chub sems kyi yon tan te// mnyam nyid rtogs pa kho nas 'grub// nyon mongs dug rnams sman du bsgyur// ye shes
63a4(1): lnga yi longs spyod la// rdzas kyi dug rnams smos ci dgos// dpe don brda dang rtags yin no// gdul bya'i rigs la kha dog lnga// bsdus pa yon tan gser lta bu// rnam dag dpe mtshon dkar po ste// chags
63a5(1): chen dbang ni dmar por snang // phrin las kun rdzogs ljang gu'o// don ldan mi 'gyur mthing nag ste// ma lus kun rdzogs dri yin no// thams cad ro gcig de yi ro// dngos po'i rdzas su snang ba'i bcud// rang
63a6(1): bzhin yon tan che ldan las// bsgrubs pa'i nus pa bsam mi khyab// ma lus rang gi lus su 'dus// rnam par rtog pa ye shes sman// sangs rgyas gzhan du btsal ba med// don rtags chos dang sman gyis
