63b1(1): ni// dpal gyi mdzad pa de sbyong ngo // hUM zhi khro rgyal ba ye shes sku// 'gro la phan mdzad thugs rje can// srid pa gsum gyi gnyen gcig po// lha yi lha rnams dgongs su gsol// bde ba gshegs pa kun 'dus
63b2(1): pa// sprul pa rgya mtsho'i tshogs dang bcas// ma lus 'dus pa mkhyen par gsol// bdag ni rgyal srid longs spyod dang // rang 'dod nan cher mi bsgrub cing // 'gro gzhan don tu 'bad rtsol na// kun gyi dpal
63b3(1): du 'gyur bar bya// kun mkhyen ye shes spyan ldan pas// bdag gzhan kun gyi lhag bsam mkhyen// spyan sngar bdag gis dam bcas pa// rnal 'byor bslu bar mi bgyi'o// khe dang grags pa 'jig rten
63b4(1): chos// g.yo sgyu ngan pa'i sems spangs nas// kun tu bzang po byang chub sems// don dam kun rdzob tshul bzung ngo // sems can thams cad bdud gyur te// bdag la gnod pa rab sbyar kyang // shes rab snying
63b5(1): rje 'brel mas bskyang // yi dam lha dang bla ma dang // mchod bzung theg pa cher gnas pa// srog gi phyir yang mi spang bsgrub// snang sems rmi lam sgyu ma la// 'chi bas 'jigs pa ma mchis te// skye bo gzhan gyi
63b6(1): don 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yis// rang dbang du ni skye ba blang // bdag ni gcig pu'i zhi bde la// myur 'gro'i spro ba ma mchis pas// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// bskal pa rgya mtshor mi
64a1(1): skyo zhing // byang chub sems kyi dka' ba spyad// shes rab thabs kyis don mdzad tshe// 'gro ba las kyi 'dul skal la// so so'i blo dang skad bzhin du// ji ltar 'tshams pa de bstan no// rnal 'byor
64a2(1): chog lam zhugs pa yi// skes chen rig pa 'dzin pa rnams// nus pa ji snyed shugs kyis ni// brtson 'grus 'bad pas bsnyen bkur ro// gsang ba theg pa bla med la// rab sdang gdug pa'i tshul 'chang
64a3(1): ba// nus mthu drag rtsal ci yod kyis// myur du sgrol bar bdag 'tshal lo// de lta'i dus chen 'di nyid nas// theg chen bla med zug gi bar// dpa' chen bde bar gshegs rnams kyis// ji ltar dam bcas de
64a4(1): bzung ngo // zhes brjod don rnams dam bcar bzung // dam tshig chen po'i bsgrub pa'o// de nas rab tu bshad pa ni// kun tu bzang po kun gyi mchog/ he ru ka dpal bde ba che// 'di la nges par 'dod pa
64a5(1): yis// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// skyes bu rnams kyi don bshad pa// smin grol thob pa ma gtogs pa// tshig gcig tsam yang ma bstan te// rang gi rgyud sprin 'dod pa yi// skal bzang mchog ldan de
64a6(1): yis ni// srog lus blo dang rdzas rnams kyis// yul mchog mnyes byas 'dod pa blang // bum pa gsang ba gsang chen dang // theg pa kun 'dus blta ba 'di// rim pa rnams kyi dang po'o// las dang rig pa'i
64b1(1): brtul zhugs dang // sa bcu kun spyod mnyam bzhag steng // mngon par gnas pa'i rim bzhin du// phan nus cho ga lam gyi dang // rgyal thabs spyi blugs thabs chen yin// dang po'i las can de smin
64b2(1): pa// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sprul pa 'dzin rten bltams gyur tshe// lha klu'i dbang pos dngos dbang bskur// dge sbyong chen po sangs rgyas che// bdud bzhi dgra las rgyal byas nas// sa bdag
64b3(1): lha mos legs brjod nas// bkra shis bum pas de dbang bskur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad dgongs// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dag gis// sangs rgyas kun gyis blangs pa yi// dag pa'i snod phul de
64b4(1): dbang bskur// 'khor los sgyur rgyal des bu skyong // spyi bor bum pa yid bzhin btegs// 'khor lo yo byad sna bdun gyis// mngon par bstod pas de dbang bskur// dka' thub spyod pa gnas gyur na/ khyed
64b5(1): kyis bsam gtan 'di yis ni// mthar thug don chen mi thob pas// rang gi 'od gsal de zung la// rang dga'i gnas su khyod song la// byang chub mchog la de longs spyod// tshig rdzogs dam pas de dbang
64b6(1): bskur// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i rgyal rnams kyis// mtshan nyid ldan pa'i shes rab ma'i// btsun mo'i 'khor gyis rol mdzad pa// rig ma chen mos de dbang bskur// mngon byung de nyid ma dor nas// zab cing
65a1(1): gting dpag dka' ba dang / zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog/ spros med mtha' la yongs ma dmigs// 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// bdud rtsi skyon bral mchog thob pa// de ni rab rdzogs de
65a2(1): dbang bskur// rim pa bzhi yis de rdzogs te// de nas gang du spog ma byas// rang dang gzhan gyi tshul snang las// sku dang ye shes tshogs byung ba// dbang bzhi rdzogs pa'i phrin las yin// dur khrod chu gling ri
65a3(1): dang ljongs// dus ni rgyas dang 'byor ldan pas// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas nyid du// gsol ba gdab dang chos 'byung zhing // yon tan rab rdzogs 'phel dus der// byang chub sems ldan rgyud sbyangs
65a4(1): shing // skyon spangs yon tan rdzogs pa dang // yon tan de nyid thob 'dod pa'i// skyes bu blo ldan slob ma yis// rigs bzang sems kyis rab bskul ba'i// rten rgyud ltar ba'i spyan snga ru// brtag dang bslang
65a5(1): dang byin gyis brlab// sbyangs shing bzung ba sngon song ba'i// dkyil 'khor bum pa lha rnams dang // slob ma sta gon bya ba las// rjes su bsnyen pa legs bshad nas// byang chub sems rjes bzung ba yi// thig
65a6(1): bris tshon ni rin chen 'bru// rdo sogs ting nge 'dzin gyis bris// ye shes chen po nyer bsnyen nas// slar yang bzhi gzhi yang yi lam sbyang ste// pho brang sgo ru me tog sbyin// gsol ba gdab cing spro bskyed nas// ku
65b1(1): shas dag byas snying po bsgom// nang du rdo rje chen po bzung // ku sha so shing srung skud sbyin// de dag mtshan nyid ltas kyang brtag/ las gyi chu yis gtsang sbra spyod// cho gas yongs su smin pa dang // nang du 'dong la
65b2(1): dam tshig bsgrag/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i ye shes dbab// me tog phreng ba lha la dor// gang gi rigs su 'gyur ba rtag/ gsol ba btab pas mig phye nas// gzugs brnyan gtso 'khor legs par bstan// de nas
65b3(1): sngags pa'i sa la bzhag/ me tog phreng bas dbang bskur bya// lha dang bum pa dbu rgyan dang // rdo rje dril bu ming la sogs// rig pa chen po'i dbang bskur ro// rdo rje slob dpon gnang ba'i dbang // seng ge pad+ma
65b4(1): 'i khri steng du// rdo rje dril bu brtul zhugs dang // phyag mtshan dang ni dam tshig gsum// dbugs dbyung lung bstan phyir mi zlog/ phyi ltar bshad pa'i bum dbang ngo // bum pa'i bcud mchog bdud rtsi lnga// btung
65b5(1): ba'i dam pa blud pa ni// rang rdzas bum pa gsang ba'o// bde ldan lus kyi bum pa ni// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi// chu yis ye shes sems dag pa// shes rab dag pa'i bum pa'o// phyag rgya lus kyi bum pa
65b6(1): las// sems kyi chu rgyun babs pa yis// thabs mchog gsang ba dag byed pa// sbas pa'i bum pa bzhi pa ste// thun mong gsang ba khyad par dang // rab tu sbas pa de dag gis// lus su 'dzin pa'i phyogs kun
66a1(1): smin// thabs dang shes rab nges par dbab// lus kyi nyes gsum dri ma sbyang // sgrib tshul sa dang lam gyis sbyang // bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi lam// dam tshig ye shes sbyor ba'i
66a2(1): lam// gzugs brnyan mthong ba de nyid lam// kun tu gnas bsgyur bsgom pa'i lam// nges par thob pa mi slob lam// dang po las kyi sa yin te// gnyis pa mos pa spyod pa'o// dang po rab tu dga' ba
66a3(1): nas// bzhi pa brgyad pa'i bar du 'gro// phyi yi brgyud pa bskyed rim dang // phrin las bzhi dang grub chen brgyad// thun mong yan lag thabs chen dang // dang po'i las kyi spyod pa bstan// gnyis pa rjes spyod rnal
66a4(1): 'byor te// gsum pa la ni bden pa gnyis// kun rdzob spyod gsum mthar thug la'o// kun tu sgra ni ji ltar dang // ldem po ma yin drang ba dang // tshig tsam yan lag sna tshogs kun kyang tshogs kun bstan// ku sha la
66a5(1): sogs gtsang sbra yis// ltas dang me tog dor las brtag/ lus kyi brda dang phyag rgya bstan// mgo la dbu rgyan cod pan te// dag byed rdzas kun lus dang spyi'o// dam tshig rdo rje dril bu dag/ lag tu bskur te
66a6(1): nus pa dbyung // dur khrod chas rnams lus kun la// phyag rgya phyag mtshan lag la'o// dbugs dbyung yon tan spro ba bskyed// sgrub rdzas lung sbyin kun phyir ro// don dam phyir mi zlog la bstan// rgyan gyi khyad par
66b1(1): rang gi gnas// rin chen nye ba'i rin chen brgyad// bkra shis nye ba'i bkra shis kyis// tshul mthun ma lus rdzas kun gyis// sngags tshig smon lam rnams kyis sbyin// tshad med bzhi yi dgongs pa dang // rang
66b2(1): gis lhag pa'i lha rnams bstim// dag pa'i yon tan rgyud lnga sbyong // kun grub ye shes lnga rjes 'dzin// phyag rgya dam tshig grub pa lnga// slob ma rjes su smin byas nas// sgo gsum sgrib pa'i dri ma 'khru// phrin las
66b3(1): nus shing 'bras bu thob// de nyid sor chud bdud bzhi 'joms// rang bzhin gnas dang bsags pa dang // don rab sa dang lam gyi rjes// sangs rgyas sa yi yon tan ldan// thun mong dang ni mthar thug
66b4(1): pa'i// dngos grub kyis ni bzang 'dzin lhag/ bdud 'joms 'phrod pa'i yon tan no// nus pa sgrib 'khrud sgrib sbyong dang // las byed pa dang 'bras bu thob// mngon du phyogs dang bdud 'joms pa'o// phreng
66b5(1): bas ma dad dri ma 'khrud// mos pas spyod pa'i sgrib sbyong zhing // 'dod lha mnyes pa lam yin te// 'bras bu mthong ba'i lam ma phyogs// yi dam dngos grub nye ba yin// gzung 'dzin phung po'i bdud rnams
66b6(1): bcom// chu ni blo gnyis dri ma dang // dang po'i sa la dri ma 'khru// zhe sdang nga rgyal grogs su spyod// lam bsgom rim gnyis dngos grub yin// nyon mong rtog pa'i bdud rnams 'joms// ming gdags rdo rje dril
67a1(1): bu yis// phyi nang mtshan ma gnas ngan len// rang bzhin g.yeng ba lnga nyid dang // gnyis brgyad bar gyi dri ma sel// 'dod chags phrag dog rnam dag pa'i// rigs su byed cing 'bras bu
67a2(1): ni// mthar phyin sa la mngon phyogs shing // ltar sogs thun mong grub pa'o// 'chi bdag gnod pa'i bdud 'joms byed// gsum pas g.yeng ba phra mo dang // sa bcu tha ma nges gsal bas// sa lam gong ma de
67a3(1): bstan byed// brtul zhugs kyis ni me tog brtan// chu dang dbu rgyan dam tshig gis// bum par brtan pa bka' stsal to// lus brtan rdo rje dril bus byas// bdag po'i dbang gis dbugs dbyung ngo // rdo rje
67a4(1): 'dzin pa'i sa la phyogs// 'bras bu dngos grub brtan par byed// lha dang 'brel ba'i bdud 'joms nus// me tog gis ni 'bras bu zhi// dbu rgyan chu yis rgyu mthun byed// rnam smin rdo rje dril bu yis// ming gi
67a5(1): skyes bu rab tu byed// 'bras bu dri med brtan pa bzhi// ngas bshad yon tan ma lus pa// 'di yi 'bras bur 'gyur ba ste// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rten 'brel gyis// mthar zug nus pa 'byin pa ste// nga yi bstan pa
67a6(1): dang po'o// de nas rim pa gnyis pa ni// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rigs kyi bdag po rdo rje 'chang // gnas mchog dam pa 'di nyid du// 'dod chags rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
67b1(1): rab bsdus te// he ru ka dpal yab yum gyi// gsang ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rgyal thabs spyi blugs dbang blang ba// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// kun rdzob kyis ni don dam mchog/ rang gi
67b2(1): rigs su bsgrub pa las// dbang mchog chen por bskur ba ni// nga dang nga yi sras rnams kyis// rgyud chen dam pa de bshad do// gnas ni yab yum gsang ba'i mkha'// khyad par lhan cig skyes pa dang // dur
67b3(1): khrod zhing dang sngags las skyes// rang gi gnas dang rigs ngan dang // mtshan ma can dang stobs can dang // gar mkhan tshos ma gdol pa mo// g.yung mo mda' mkhan ma la sogs// rgyud sbyang yon tan phun
67b4(1): sum tshogs// nga yis bsngags pa'i mtshan nyid ldan// 'di ni gnas kyi dam pa'o// gang gi yon tan de rdzogs nas// pad+ma'i chu rgyun 'bab pa dang // he ru ka la gsol btab nas// gnang ba thob pa dus su
67b5(1): brtag/ yab yum gnyis med gsum blang yul// bum pa'i yon tan rdzogs pa dang // bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor brtul zhugs can// longs spyod 'dod pa len pa'o// thog mar lus kyi dkyil 'khor brtag/ rgya ni
67b6(1): 'dom gang de nyid do// legs par 'bab pa sgo bzhi ste// snang ba lnga ni kha dog yin// d+ha ti dbu ma tshangs pa'i thig/ g.yas g.yon gnyis ni rdo rje'i gdung // ka ba rkang brgyad de nyid ni// yan lag bzhi ni rta
68a1(1): babs yin// rtsa ba'i snying ni pho brang sgo// snying gzhan snod bzhir bcas pa ni// pho brang chen po brgyad yin no// sha dang rus pa brtsig pa ste/ khrag dang chu ser zham chu yin// pags chen phyi yi
68a2(1): 'khor yug ste// ba spu me ri 'bar ba'o// dbang po yul bcas gdan dang khri// skra dang mig ni rgyal mtshan mthong // phung po lnga ni gtso chen lnga// 'byung ba lnga ni yum chen lnga// rnam par shes brgyad yul dang
68a3(1): bcas// rigs kyi gtso chen brgyad yin no// sems dang sems las byung ba dang // snang ba dang ni de las skyes// rtog pa'i rang bzhin ma lus pa// zhi dang khro dang rnam par gnas// thams cad ma lus de yi
68a4(1): 'khor// bza' dang btung ba bdud rtsi lnga// mnyes pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs yin// lus la rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de// gzhung nas gnas pa de shes pa// de la dam pa de mchod do// rjes su gnas pa'i
68a5(1): dkyil 'khor ni// b+ha ga sogs pa'i gzhal yas khang // de la brtag bzung sbyang ba dang // byin brlab brgyan dang bdug dang bkru// mchod dang mnyes pa dgyes par bya// phyi rol du ni gdong bkab
68a6(1): nas// gsol ba gdab cing bskor nas su// phyag 'tshal me tog dbul bar bya// dam tshig gi ni rdzas kyis dbab// mig phye mthong brtag bstan cing brtag/ nang rol du ni gtso chen dang // khams gsum
68b1(1): bdag po mnyam sbyor bas// bzhi dang drug dang 'khor lo dag/ rim gyis phab ste sbyin par bya// dkar chu spos dang rgyun drag dang // tshangs sgor 'bar dang ming byin brlab// sgra dang bde dang blang ba dang // rnam
68b2(1): par mi rtog longs spyod dang // bde thob 'od dang gsal ba ste// phreng ba chu dang dbu rgyan dang // rdo rje dril bu ming dang ni// brtul zhugs lung bstan phyir mi ldog/ dbugs dbyung gsang ba'i dbang yin no// ga
68b3(1): pupur tsan+dan bdud rtsi lnga// dbab phyir khro bo'i khyi ma yang tshul du bya// sems can dbab pa de yi thabs// pad+ma gtso rtsi yin gsang ba mis yang min gsang ba'o// nod pa de ni sprul pa'i gnas// rdo rje pad+ma 'dus pa
68b4(1): dag/ skyon yon gsum gyis sku gsum mchod// 'gro ba'i sgor dbab sba zhing gsang // de nyid rnam pa bzhi yin te// rang bzhin chu 'bab bum pa las// ro myang ba ni gsang ba yin// rtog med lam thob gsum pa
68b5(1): ste// gnyis med ye shes bzhi pa yin// pad+ma gtso ste snang ba dag/ phyi nang gsang gnas ngag gi lam// yul gsum rgyu la dri ma med// sgo gnyis pa yi sbyong sngags te// dang po'i sa la slob pa yod// dgongs dang
68b6(1): nges dang ji ltar min// sbas dang ma lus ldan pa dag/ rnal 'byor chen po'i don yin no// sbas dang sbyor dang rig pa dang // zhi dang khro srogs brda rnams bstan// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa
69a1(1): dag/ longs spyod thams cad rab tu blangs// ji snyed sangs rgyas thams cad dang // gtso bzung thugs dam bskang ba las// gzhal yas khang gi dbus dag tu// bde byed yo ga gsang ba'i
69a2(1): rgyun// rdo rje pad+ma rab brnyes pa// sems mtshon mnyam 'dres bde bar gsal// thim sbyor bsam pa bsam dgongs pa// ngag gi las sgrib de dag kyang // thabs dang shes rab stobs kyis ni// bcu gnyis pa ni
69a3(1): mngon du byed// thabs kyis phung po'i bdud 'joms shing // nyon mongs bdud ni shes rab kyis// gnyis su med pas spro ta ste// spro ba yi ni lha rnams te// 'joms byed nus pa mthar thug gis// 'bad rtsol dri
69a4(1): med thabs shes rab// rgyu mthun len pa ngo bo nyid// rnam par bsnyen pa'i rim pa ste// yul gsum mnyes tshul dul ba'i tshul// phyogs rnams kun tu mnyes pa ste// rim pa chen po de bstan no// de nas rigs
69a5(1): kyi dkyil 'khor te// ngas sngon phal pa'i 'khor rnams la/ khyod kyis srog chags bsad pa dang // ma sbyin blangs shing mi tshangs spyad// brdzun tshig smra bar byos zhes bshad// de la kha cig dngangs pa dang // skrag
69a6(1): par gyur pa de bshad de// rgyas par gyur pa kun blangs nas// rab tu sbas te dgongs bshad pa// rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs dben pa// lus ni ri bo dgon pa'i gnas// rang byung sems ni sgrub pa
69b1(1): yis// mtshan nyid ldan 'bo la bde ba'i stan// snyed pa'i gnang ba brnyes pa'i gsang ba yang dbang thob dus// yab yum phyi nang bla ma yis// gong gnyis rdzogs dang gsang tshig la// mos shing nye gyur slob ma ste// rten
69b2(1): bzang tshe 'bras kyang 'phel la sogs min// 'khor lo bzhi yi dkyil 'khor dang // shes rab phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor te// bzung dang sbyangs dang byin gyis brlabs// byin gyis brlab bya gong du brtag/ lha dang
69b3(1): sngags kyi lung bstan nas// ngas bshad mtshan nyid kun ldan pa// bcu drug nyi shu lnga yi bar// lhan cig zhing dang sngags las skyes// ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs// 'di la rnam rtog yod ma yin// lha dang dkyil
69b4(1): 'khor sngon bzhin te// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi// gsal ba'i 'dab ma rang gi gnas// rtsa la yi ge'i rnam pa can// sngon du bshad pa rab bstan te// g.yas g.yon dbus gsum mtshan nyid
69b5(1): brtag/ rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// dris bsgos mchod tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// ma lus lhag pa'i lha ru bsgom// oM hUM phaT dag AHyis ni// rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab// gnas gzung 'jug
69b6(1): par gsol gdab ste// brtul zhugs blang dang dbab par bya// de nas de yi rigs kun la// dga' shing gus pa'i sems bskyed de// phyag 'tshal nas ni me tog gtor// shes rab sangs rgyas mig phye
70a1(1): ste// lus kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus bstan// chags chen glu gar rol mo'i brda// mtshan nyid bzhi sogs rgyun dbab dang // dang po'i sgo sbyar rdo rje dgod// bskyod pa'i sgra ldan hUM phaT 'bod// so
70a2(1): sor gnas bskur nges pa bskyed// lus kyi mi ma tog yang gtong ngag gis smras// pad+mar zung byed phyir mi ldog/ bum pa phreng chu dbu rgyan dang // rdo rje dril bu ming brtul zhugs// dam tshig dbugs dbyung lung bstan
70a3(1): no// phyi rim mthong ba'i ye shes che// shes rab bde chen 'khor los srog/ dbab cing myang ba nang gi ste// zhu bde skad cig rnam bzhi yis// kun tu bde thob gnas pa'o// phyi ru brda sprad bum pa ste// pad+ma rdo rje
70a4(1): phrad gsang ba// rab bde gsum pa ye shes bzhi// gnas kyi sems kyi blang bde'o// bud med sgyu ma sems kyis brdas// mtshan nyid rnam pa'i lus kyis myang // shes rab skal ba med pas kyang // rlung sems
70a5(1): 'gog pa'i thabs kyis kyang // bde chen skad cig mthar thug mtshon// sems sbyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes bsgyur// ma chags pad+ma can du sleb// sems rig rang bzhin 'od gsal brtan// rtsa gnyis kyis ni gzung
70a6(1): 'dzin 'gog/ gcig gis las rnams kun las brtag/ 'od zer 'phro dang bskyod dang 'bar// 'bab cing skyes gang bde chen sku// de nyid rtsa lnga rlung bcu yis// las su kun byed sprul pa'i sku// steng 'og sgo
70b1(1): dang bar rnams su// rlung dang sngags kyi de nyid kyis// rab sbyar 'byung dang rngub pa dang // bzlas dang rig dang sgyu ma'i tshul// bde dang gsal dang mi rtog las// rgyun mi 'chad pa'i ye shes kyis// 'khor dang
70b2(1): 'das tshul dam lus shing // ma nor de yis shes 'bras bu// phyi rol smig rgyu du ba dang // srin bu glog dang mar me dang // nam mkha' lta bu rim bzhin 'byung // brtan rdzogs rim pa lnga dag gis// skad cig
70b3(1): dga' dang brda bcu gnyis// rang rig bdud rtsi lnga spyad cing // de 'dod yon tan lnga nyid sprad// bde spyod cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi// spyi mgrin snying ga lte ba dang // gsang sbas gnas chen bcu drug las// yar
70b4(1): 'phel mar 'grib phyed phyed bzhi// a sogs yi ge cu drug dang // sum bcu rtsa gnyis drug cu bzhi// brgyad kyi phyed dang bzhi nyid kyis// ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha k+Sha// oM AHhUM dang haM gis ni// 'khor lo dbus su de
70b5(1): nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis gnyis sbyor// ting 'dzin lha dang lus dang rtsa// dbugs rlung bcu dang thig le lha// za mal sems dang byang chub sems// de la de brten rim par rdzogs// gnas dang
70b6(1): 'phro dang rab tu 'phro// thim pa sku yi nus pa ni// dang po dang ni bcu gcig pa'i// sgrib 'joms phyag rgya de thob nus// bcu gnyis pa yi rig pa 'dzin// spyi bo sprul pa'i bar 'khor los// nyon mongs nas
71a1(1): brtsam bdud bzhi 'joms// dam tshig 'khor lo pad+ma'i gnas// rdo rje bde skyed bde 'bab pa'i// sprul pa'i chos spyod bde ba che// rnam smin rgyu mthun chos kyi sku// dri med skyes bu sna tshogs
71a2(1): byed// de yi rjes su rnal 'byor des// 'di ni shes rab ye shes kyis// rim pa gsum par 'gyur ba yin// ngas sngon mtha' thug bstan pa la// byang chub sems dpa' khyed rnams kyis// ngag gsal ba yi ye
71a3(1): shes 'grub// rnam par rtogs pa der gsal na// de la de ni yod ma yin// rang gis rang rig ye shes te// theg pa'i blta ba spyi 'byams bstan// thugs mchog 'gyur med de la gnas// dus gsum dus med
71a4(1): dus kyi mchog/ sems nyid gang shes bla mar mos// bsam gyis mi khyab de yi sras// gnyis med ye shes dkyil 'khor de// rang gis gsang chod mi rig ste// de nyid gang mthong mig phyed pa'i// goms stobs
71a5(1): lam nus dkyil 'khor mchog/ kun la dbang bsgyur rang rig pa'i// rtsal chen rdzogs pa rang dbang mchog/ lta ba theg pa sgri 'byams kyis/ khong du chud pa'i rnam grangs yin// de nyid gsang ba gnyis pa
71a6(1): ste// gsum sogs brjod la bsam mi khyab// mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ste// gcig dang du mar 'dzin las grol// 'od gsal gzhi dang lam 'bras bu// sems nyid chos nyid ngo bo nyid// thabs gsum dang
71b1(1): ni shes rab gsum// snang ba gsum dang stong pa gsum// ma lus zung du 'jug pa ste// dbyer med yi ge 'khor lo nyid// rdzogs pa chen po'i sa zhes bya// bcu gsum de ni brjod las 'das// de la brtan bya/
71b2(1): yod min zhing // ston par byed pa med nyid bstan// snang dang stong pa ji snyed brda// rnam par rtog pa de yi rdzas// dgongs pa rang rig de yi rdzas// 'gran zla med pa de yi nus// kun gyi mchog gyur 'bras bu
71b3(1): yin// rim pa 'di bzhi tshogs pa ni// rten 'gyur gcig gis shes gyur gyis// kun la dbang bskur nges pa'i tshig/ kun mkhyen go 'phang rtogs pa'i thabs// ji ltar 'bad pa sgrub pa ste// phyogs kun mnyes
71b4(1): bya dam tshig ste// ma rdzogs pa yis rdzogs bya min// rdzogs la ma rdzogs de bzhin no// sku gsung thugs dang khyad par dang // spyi dang khyad par thun mong bcas// rdo rje 'chang ba mi smad cing // des gsung 'thun
71b5(1): pa'i bka' mi rdzab// der rtogs spun la'ang khro ba min// kun tu byams pa dor mi bya// byang chub sems kyang rab tu gzung // gzhan don phyogs kun sun mi dbyung // gsang ba yul min der mi brjod// sku
71b6(1): 'gyur lus la mi brnyas te// legs bshad som nyi ga la bya// bstan la rab sdang rjes gzung min// tha mal rtogs pa bskyang mi bya// lhag par mos pa sun mi dbyung // shes rab rten la smod pa spang // ngas
72a1(1): bshad gang yin cung mi 'da'// gang gis de la bshad bya zhing // yang dag sa la sbyar la sogs// nga yis thog ma bar mtha' mar// bshad pa de la ma 'da' zhig/ gal te rnam par ldog gyur
72a2(1): na// brjod pa'i tshig 'dis rab tu sbyangs// oM bde gshegs kun 'dus rgyal ba zhi khro'i ngang // chos sku spros bral bde chen gdod nas dag/ longs spyod rdzogs sku bsam 'das brjod mi lang // sbrul sku 'gro/
72a3(1): don rdzogs mdzad bdag la dgongs// oM kun tu bzang po che chog he ru ka/ 'gro 'dul thabs kyi gtso brgyad 'khor dang bcas// yon tan sku gsung thugs dang phrin las bdag/ 'dod 'byung kun rdzogs lha la
72a4(1): phyag 'tshal bstod// oM dpal ldan zhi khro dbang phyug gsang ba'i tshogs// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid mchod pa'i tshogs// sku gsung thugs mnyes nam mkha'i gter mdzod kyis// bla med mchod sprin mchog sbyar
72a5(1): mchod par bzhes// oM thog med dus nas 'khor 'das bdag gzhan tshul// gnyis med byang chub sems su gcig nyid kyang // las kyi 'khrul pas tha dad so sor gnas// gnyis 'dzin log lha'i yid kyis the
72a6(1): tshom byung // ma rig bag la nyal gyi rnam rtog gis// rgyal ba'i dgongs spyod zab mo gting ma phyin// thabs dang shes rab ma bral blang dor spyod// che mchog gsang ba'i dam las 'ga' zhing nyams// 'bras bu'i
72b1(1): don chen sgrib pa'i rgyur gyur pa// gnod 'gyod zhi ba'i sems bskyed lam sbyangs nas// rtsa ba yan lag sku gsung thugs kyi gsang // thun mong bye brag khyad par bsam mi khyab// ji ltar gdams pa'i gzhung
72b2(1): bzhin ma rtogs pa// bde gshegs rgyal bzhi khro 'khor dang bcas// thugs rje'i mnga' bdag khyed la bzod par gsol// ye shes rtsal gyis sangs rgyas sa ston cig/ dus gsum rgyun du mi 'bral dgongs
72b3(1): mdzod cig/ zhes brjod tshig gis mnyes shing sbyang // mchod rdzas chen po de bsgrub bo// de nas byin gyis brlab bya'i phyir// phur pa'i rdzas kyis bsgrub pa ni// gzhan gyi don la 'bag pa dang // rang gi dngos po
72b4(1): mchog 'dod pas// yi ge lnga las legs byung ba'i// sa gzhi mdzes par 'od lngar ldan// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// kun shongs yangs pa thog ma nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs
72b5(1): pa'i gnas// yon tan tshogs rdzogs rnal 'byor gyis// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas bgegs rnams bzlog khro bo'i tshul dang ldan pas bsgrub/ kha dog lnga ldan srad bu
72b6(1): ste// rang sngags yi ge lnga byin gyis// rdo rje khu tshur las kyis bya// pho brang dgu yi rgyan rtags kyis// mkhas pas byin brlab sna tshogs 'byung // gnod pa'i sbyor ba rgyun gcod phyir// 'jug pa las kyi sgo gsum
73a1(1): bya// de la rdzas kyi dam pa ni// phrin las chen po rigs bzhi yi// phyag mtshan gser dngul zangs dang lcags// shug pa gser shing tsan dan dmar// chu shing tsher ma can gyis ni// rgyu yi don
73a2(1): 'grub de bshad pa// gtso chen dgu dang rab sbyar ba'i// khros pa'i zhal dang phyag mtshan bcas// khru bzhi pa'am gsum du bya// lhag pa'i lha rnams de bzhin du// khru gang ba dang mdzub gang sogs// rigs dang
73a3(1): mthun zhing grangs dang mnyam// rdzas kyi gtso bo mchog tu bya// rang gi gnas su gtso la phyogs// mdzes pa'i gnas su dgod par bya// don dam phur pa dgug cing bstim// phyag 'tshal mnga' gsol mchod cing
73a4(1): bstod// he ru ka sogs 'khor dang bcas// nges par byin gyis brlab cing dbab// zhi dang rgyas dang dgug pa dang // drag shul spyod pa'i gnas dag tu// kun rdzob las kyi phur pa yang // grangs dang mnyam pa
73a5(1): de bzhin du// rang gi dbyig ldan mdun du dgod// sngags pa'i rdzas kyang rab tu bstar// rdo rje 'chang chen dgu 'am 'khor// rdo rje las phyed grangs dang mnyam// sngon bshad tshul dang rab ldan pas// srid pa'i
73a6(1): phur bu bsgrub pa'i phyir// de la dbang dang dngos grub blang // ye shes khro bo der gshegs nas// rtags dang mtshan ma ston par byed// de la dngos gzhi chen po yis// bsgrub pa'i lha rnams rang sngags la// ki
73b1(1): li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// ces sngags sngon du bsnyen par bya// gser gyi ba thag gzing ba dang // mgal me klad la bskor ba dang // lcags kyi tsha tsha gdab la sogs// 'od zer 'phro 'du'i rnam pa
73b2(1): 'phro// ye nas lha rnams sku gsung thugs// gnas gsum du ni rab tu bkod// 'di ni ma 'ongs dus su yang // b+ha dra tsar+ya su kha dang // brgya byin byang chub rgyal po yis// ma lus don gsal byed par
73b3(1): 'gyur// bsgrub pa cher spyod de yi gnas// phrin las bzhi gang gsang sngags bzung // rdzas dang ting nge 'dzin dang sngags// dmigs pa dag dang dgos ched kyis// las kyis rim pa der spyad de// phyogs brgyad
73b4(1): gru gsum sum brtseg gi/ kha khyer mi bzad phur bus bskor// drag po'i rdzas rnams kun kyang bsham// bum pa'am yang na ban+da'i snod// lcang lor bcas pa skam mam rlon// grangs dang mnyam pa dbus su
73b5(1): dgod// gzhan yang ji ltar bshad pa yi// rdzas mchog dam pa sna tshogs dgod// he ru ka chen dgu rnams kyis// so so'i 'khor gyi khang bu rnams// rdo rje phur bu'i 'od kyis mdzes// cho ga sna tshogs brtan
73b6(1): par bya// de 'dra'i ting nge 'dzin ldan pas// nang du gzhug cing drang bar bya// sngon bshad de bzhin tshogs bsags nas// rim pa bzhin du yang dag ldan// bsgrub pa de yi ting 'dzin ni// nam mkha'i khams kyi
74a1(1): dbus gnas su// snod kyi 'jig rten gzhal yas khang // bsam zhing gnas pa de gsal bya// bcud kyi sems can thog ma nas/ khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor de// rang la sngags pa'i phyag mtshan
74a2(1): dang // lhag par phur par 'dzin par bsam// gdod nas gnas pa de shes bya// de dag rab tu bstims byas nas// dkyil 'khor gtso bo 'khor dang bcas// spyi dang bye brag sngags rnams kyis// phur bu'i
74a3(1): ming gis spel te bsgrubs// rang lhar gyur pa'i rtags byung nas// thams cad spyi dril bsgrub par bya// las grub nus par gyur pa dang // so so'i dmigs pa mdun du bya// las kyi phur pa mnga' gsol te// bye
74a4(1): brag dgu yi ting 'dzin gyis// phur bu bskor ba zhes bya ste// che mchog gtso bos snying la gdab// badz+ra he rus mgrin pa ste// gshin rje gshed kyis klad pa la// rta mgrin dbang gis gsang ba ste// rdo rje gzhon
74a5(1): nus 'dus pa'i gnas// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos lag g.yon te// dregs 'dul gyis ni rkang g.yas la// stobs ldan nag po lag pa g.yas// rdo rje sems dpa' rkang g.yon la'o// 'khor rnams kyis kyang de
74a6(1): bzhin du// rang gis phyogs bcur bskor te gdab// las rgyud rtsad nas bcad pa dang // gsang sgo thibs kyis mnan pa dang // dug lnga spyi nas gzhom pa dang // 'gro dang stobs dang dpral ba dang // srid pa'i
74b1(1): skye rgyun gcad pa dang // phrin las chen po bzhi spyad phyir// so so'i gnas su gdab par bya// rtsa bar snying rtsa 'dab ma bzhi// kha dog so sor bstan pa las// yan lag rnam pa brgyad du gsal// g.yas 'dab
74b2(1): chos nyid rtsa gsum ste// ser po zla kham stong pa'i dbyings// g.yon 'dab rang rgyud rtsa gsum ste// dmar nag sbrul bzhin 'khyil ba'o// 'og 'dab yon tan gcig tu gnas// smug nag rgyu ma bzhin
74b3(1): du'o// steng du ye shes gcig gnas pa// mthing ga 'khor lo lta bu ste// kun gzhi rnam rtog nyon mongs yid// yid dang sgo lnga'i rnam shes gnyis// brgyad kyi dbus gnas dngas ma ni// mdog dkar rta rnga bzhin
74b4(1): du bsgril// tshe yi dngas ma brgya 'dra/ khrag gi dngas ma mtshal byi mgo/ drod kyi dngas ma me long gi/ ngad dang zil pa lta bu ste// rnam shes dngas ma 'od kyi dkyil// rang lhar gsal ba'i phyag mtshan te// ri
74b5(1): rab phur pa rdo rjes brgyan// hUM phaT ldan pa'i phur gsum la// rdo tshan chu 'dus bzhin du bsam// sgrub pa po yi thugs kar thim// zhi khro'i lha rnams sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rbod gtong
74b6(1): dang // mchod bstod drag shul rig pa 'dzin// so sor dus la bab ces brjod// pho nya bskul zhing rbad gsang bya// lcags dang seng ldeng bya phur dang // skyer pa tsan dan mchog phur gyis// gti mug bsal zhing
75a1(1): 'dod chags bskam// zhe sdang gsad cing phrag dog gdul// nga rgyal bsnyil zhing smad pa ste// thal 'byin dgongs pa byang chub sems// rtogs pa dang ni thugs rje yis// bdag gzhan ma lus
75a2(1): bsgral bar bya// 'di yis gal te rtags med na// sngar bzhin bsnyen bsgrub spogs par bya// de nas rtags dang ldan pa dang // sngar bzhin las la sbyar bar bya// bsgrubs pa de nyid byin gyis rlabs// nad dang
75a3(1): gdon dang bar chad phyogs// rang bzhin ma lus zhi bar byed// tshe dang dbang zang longs spyod tshogs// rab tu 'phel zhing rgyas par byed// log lha dgra bgegs mi mthun phyogs// ma lus dbang du sdud par
75a4(1): byed// drag shul can dang gdug pa'i sems// sgrol zhing mngon du spyod la sogs// thams cad 'grub pa 'bras bu ste// byin rlabs phur pa'i sgrub pa'o// de nas tshe yi lung sgrub pa// phun sum tshogs pa'i sngon
75a5(1): 'gro dang // stegs bu'i sbyor ba de nyid la// thog ma'o dkyil 'khor ling tshe dgu// dbus su 'khor lo rtsi bas brgyad de// shar du rdo rje rtse brgyad de// lho ru rin chen zur brgyad bri// nub tu pad+ma 'dab brgyad
75a6(1): de// byang du ral gri lce brgyad do// mtshams bzhir thig le gling brgyad de// dbus rnams zla gam kha sbyor te// mtshan bzang kun rdzogs bum pa ni// phyi nang blta ba rdzogs mthun spyad// oM AHhUM badz+ra a mr-i ta A
75b1(1): yun+ma na b+h+rUM/ zhes pa'i sngags rnams bris pa ni// so so'i rigs kyi mdog dang bstan// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su'o// byang chub sems dang rdzu 'phrul che// rtags dang ldan pa'i 'brang rgyas te// gtso bo
75b2(1): rnams kyi grangs ldan pa// 'bru bcud zhal zas tshogs las bsham// rin po che yi rgyan rtags kyis// legs par brgyan pa bdud rtsi yi// bcud dang bcas pa der stsal nas// dar 'phan za ra tshags kyis
75b3(1): brgyan// nas 'bras 'bru yis brgyan par byas// 'bru lngas byin brlab gzungs zag gdags// rigs chen lnga yi gtso bo yis// so so'i phyag tu bzhes nas ni// che mchog he ru ka nas ni// badz+ra he ru rdo rje
75b4(1): mchog/ rat+na he ru gshin rje gshed// pad+ma he ru rta mgrin dpal// karma he ru gzhon nu mchog/ rang gi rigs kyi gsang sngags la// badz+ra A yu She dz+nyA na hUM dzaHzhes btags bsnyen pa 'dzab tu bya// de nas
75b5(1): mtshams bzhi gtso dang sngags// de bzhin du ni bya ba yin// rigs kyi thugs gsang rin po che// zla kham gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus/ oM hUM trAM hrIHhaM rnams ni// zla ba la ni 'od bcas gnas// 'khor 'das
75b6(1): kun gyi byang chub sems// 'chi med tshe yi rang bzhin ni// 'gyur med rdo rje'i lam nas byung / shangs kyi rlung sgom steng nas bteg/ lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor te// kun tu bzang po che dpag med// he ru
76a1(1): ka yaM sku gsung thugs// dus gsum rgyal ba yab dang yum// sras dang 'khor bcas rdo rje'i tshe// rin chen srog las nyi zla'i 'od// 'phro 'du phreng ba rab gsal ba'i// snying po gsang ba'i bsnyen
76a2(1): par bgrang / khyad par bdag nyid gsang ba yi// dbus kyi gtso bo'i thugs ka nas// dkyil 'khor zla kham ga'u'i nang // tshon gang ye shes sems dpa' de// so so'i rigs bzhi'i 'khor dang bcas// yab
76a3(1): yum rnams kyi thugs kar 'phros// phan tshun 'phro ba'i 'khor lo yis// 'og min gnas nas ye shes klong // rang bzhin 'od gsal thugs kyi dkyil// byang chub sems kyi 'chi med tshe// gnyis su med pa'i 'phro

76a5(1): brjod// slar yang bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin spro// rtags dang yon tan yongs rdzogs nas// 'od phung sgrub pa'i rdzas la bstim// de ni tshe sgrub bsnyen pa'o// de nas sgrub pa chen po ni// rab rdzogs ltar gsal lus
76a6(1): kyi tshe// ye shes sems dpa' srog gi tshe// rigs kyi lha mo gzugs kyi tshe// 'dod yon lnga ldan longs spyod tshe// srid par gnas pa yun gyi tshe// bsam pa tshe srog dpal gyi lha// bkod pa zas nor bcud kyi
76b1(1): lha// bzlas pa rgyun chags ngag gis lha// hUM las rdo rje srog dang ldan// a las 'gyur med tshe dang ldan// baM las rdo rje lu gu rgyud// 'di ni 'ching ba'i las yin no// rdo rje bsdam pa'i phyag rgya las// mdzub mo
76b2(1): lcags kyu lta bur bya// bsam gyis mi khyab spros te dgug/ rlung sgo gnyis nas hUM bskyil bas/ khyad par skye 'gro mang po'i tshe// byang chub sems kyis dbang bsgyur dag/ skar mda' bzhin du blangs nas
76b3(1): bsnan// skye 'gro srog gis bsdus pa las// bstims te dbang bskur don byas pas// rab tu spel ba'i ting 'dzin ni// kun gyi yum gyur phyag rgya yis// ma lus mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma// thugs gar sku
76b4(1): mchog tshon gang las// gzi mdangs bstar bar A yuHbstim// sku gsung thugs kyi sngags 'di dag/ so sor 'bum du bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra A yu She dzaHA yu dz+nyA na tshe b+h+rUM// 'di ni sku yi snying po'o// oM badz+ra a
76b5(1): mr-i ta ma hA b+ha dra tshe b+h+yAM// 'di ni gsung gi snying po'o// oM badz+ra A yu She ma hA puN+ye pu N+ye a pa ri mi ta dz+nyA na b+h+yAM// zhes pa thugs kyi snying po'o// sku yi tshe ni lus la ste// phung po lnga la rab tu thim// gsung gi tshe ni ngag
76b6(1): la ste// dri med dbyings las rab tu thim// thugs kyi tshe ni yid la ste// byang chub mchog gi sems la thim// rigs kyi gsang ba'i snying po las// a b+hi Shiny+tsa a zhes pas// kun tu bstim par bya ba'o// skal
77a1(1): ldan bsnyen pa mchog gi lung // bdud rtsi 'chi med sman gyi tshe// dbang mchog dam pa rigs kyi tshe// byin rlabs phur pa sprul pa'i tshe// zla kham rdo rje dbang gi tshe// bsgrubs pa'i 'bras bu bla na
77a2(1): med// rin chen srog gi gzhal yas khang // le brgan gsung gi dkyil 'khor tu// kun tu bzang pos rgyas btab nas// he ru ka yi rtsal bskyed de// gshin rje gshed kyis bsdu bar bya// rta 'grin dbang gis
77a3(1): bsrung ba ste// rdo rje gzhon nus dbab par bya// mngon rdzogs rgyal pos bcing bya zhing // dregs pa 'dul bas bskrad pa ste// stobs ldan gyis ni rab tu dgug/ rdo rje chos kyis bstim pa ni// so so'i rigs kyi
77a4(1): phrin las yin// ma lus 'khor bcas tshe la bskul// phyag mtshan tshe yi bum pa bsnams// bkod pa'i rdzas la rab tu thim// rin chen tsit+ta'i dbyibs kyis blang // phyi nang gsang ba'i 'byung ba rnams// rim gyis
77a5(1): bsdu ba'i sbyor ba yis// dus bzhi mnyam pa'i rdzas nus dgug/ kun gyis stsal ba'i rdo rje tshe/ khams gsum kun 'dus grub pa'i rtags// phyi nang 'byung ba'i bcud len ma// lha mo'i tshogs kyi dngos grub
77a6(1): gter// legs par gsol ba gdab gyur nas// sgrub pa po la bstim pa yis// skye shi med pa'i don gsal byed// rig pa 'dzin pa 'grub par 'gyur// byin gyis rlob pa'i sgrub pa che// dus gsum sangs rgyas
77b1(1): kun gyi lam// bde bar gshegs pa kun 'dus rgyud// rnal 'byor gsum gyis rab bsdus pa// thog ma med nas mtha' ma'i bar// rgyun mi 'chad du ngas bshad do// skal med rnams ni logs par rtog/ kha
77b2(1): cig 'jig tshogs lta ba 'dzin// kha cig bdag med phyogs 'ga' tsam// kha cig rang gi snang ba 'dzin// kha cig kun rdzob don dam blta// kha cig bdag gzhan bzang ngan 'byed// kha cig thabs kyi cha
77b3(1): skrospyod// kha cig res 'ga' shes rab ston// 'di ni tha dad ma yin te// thams cad gcig las byung ba ste// gcig tu ma lus 'dus pa'o// ma 'ongs dus su rgyud 'di nyid// shin tu rnyed dkar gyur nas
77b4(1): ni// skal bar ldan pa 'ga' zhig las// skal med dag gis rtsod par byed// de nyid dus su 'di rnyed pas// rang rgyud tsam du mi bsten te// rtsa ba yan lag bshad pa dang // lung bshad sgrub thabs mtha' dag
77b5(1): gis// don bzang nges par gtan la dbab// de ltar snod ldan rigs kyi sras// dad brtson ldan la rim bzhin bstan/ zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa
77b6(1): las/ byin gyis rlabs pa'i bsgrub pa chen po bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rab tu phan gdags pa'i// las mchog rab tu bshad pa ni// rigs dang ldan pa sngar bshad bzhin// rten
78a1(1): 'brel rnam pa lnga yin te// rdzas su bsgrub dang thal chen dang // gnas sbyang ba dang bsgral ba dang // gshed chen bgeg rnams 'dul ba ste// dang po srid pa'i bam chen yin// ston pa 'khor dang
78a2(1): gnas dang dus// yo byad ji ltar ngas bshad bzhin// tshul dang mthun pa'i las kyis sbyang // snang zhing srid pa dur khrod klong // thugs rje chen pos rig cing gzigs// 'khor ba'i skyabs gling chen po
78a3(1): las// rigs drug 'khor ba ma lus 'dul// rgyud drug 'dus pa'i rnam shes bsreg/ dug gsum mtshon gyis bsad pa ni// rtag chad mthar shi'i ro gling nas// gti mug chen po'i rgyu blang ste// byang chub sems
78a4(1): su gsal ba'i phyir// rgyu mchog chen po btsal bar bya// ye shes spyan dang phyag rgya'i tshogs// rdo rje'i 'gros dang 'byon tshul te// dang po rigs brgyud mtshan dang ldan// skye ba bdun pa brtag par bya/ khams
78a5(1): gsum dbang du bsdu ba dang // srid gsum zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'gros kyis btsal bar bya// yid bzhin nor du gter 'byed pa// dgos 'dod skong ba phyag rgya'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro'i dam rdzas
78a6(1): pa'i phyir// ma mo'i 'byon tshul stabs kyis btsal// phung po gshed dang dbral ba'i phyir// seng ldeng phur pa sor brgyad pa// stobs chen khro bo'i skur bsams te// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du
78b1(1): bzlas// gson dang gshin gyi bdud dang bgegs// gzugs dang mtshan mar bcas pa de// phur bus btub te ro shun gril// khung bur mnan nas ro gzir la// de nas rdo rje'i gar gyis blang // rdo rje'i
78b2(1): 'gros kyis khur nas ni// gnas su 'ongs te phyi mtshams bcad// de nas dam sri gnan par bya// sgo nas phyi rol 'dom gang du// mkha' 'gro'i khung bu brus nas ni// dur khrod gnas kyi thod pa la// nang du
78b3(1): dam sri'i snying po bri// dur khrod rkang gi phur bus gdab// nang du stegs bu tshul bzhin brtsig/ sgrub rdzas mchod bstod rdzogs par bya// de la gzigs stangs rnam pa drug/ dngos grub gshin dang slob ma
78b4(1): dang // lha dang ru dra sgrub pa'i rdzas// dang por dngos grub blta ba ni// skye ba bdun pa lta bu ste// yid bzhin nor bas ches lhag pas/ khyad par bsgrub pa mi dgos te// mchog dang thun mong rigs pas
78b5(1): 'grub// tshe 'das nyid du gzigs pa ni// dpyang zag chad nas 'khyams pa de// thugs rje chen pos gzung phyir ro// phung po nyid la rnam shes dgug/ gang dag 'di la gzhan brten dang // 'di nyid gzhan la
78b6(1): brten pa rnams// he ru ka ni dran tsam gyis// thams cad bred cing brlag par 'gyur// 'gro drug rgyud lnga'i sgrib pa sbyang // bag chags sbyang phyir bro bzhis gdul// shar du zhos 'gro gnas kyi bro// dri chen steng du
79a1(1): bzhag cing brdung // lho ru sha chen dkyil 'khor la/ khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro brdung ngo // nub tu rta gdong zhal gyi bro// pad+ma rak+ta'i steng du'o// byang du dri chu'i maN+Dal steng // gdul sbyor rtags kyi bro
79a2(1): brdung ngo // de ltar bro bzhis sbyangs byas nas// rang gi longs spyod skal thog ste// slob ma'i ngo bor blta ba ni// bag chags sgrib pa bkru ba'i phyir// sman spos bdud rtsi chab kyis bkru// mos bcas brtse gdung
79a3(1): shes pa yis// sems bskyed yon dbul me tog dor// gsol ba gdab ste dkyil 'khor gzhug/ mig phye lha ngo bstan par bya// phyag btsal yon dbul dam tshig bsgrag/ byin gyis brlabs te snod sbyangs
79a4(1): nas// phan dang nus dang rig pa dang // sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las lnga ru byin gyis dbab// de nas lha yi ngo bor blta// dkyil 'khor dbus su khri steng du// skyil mo krung bcas shar du
79a5(1): blta// de nyid phyag rgya'i tshogs chen bsgom// rdzas kyi rnam grangs gtams nas kyang // rigs kyi lha rnams rnam par bkod// gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlab// dran pa'i thad kar bkram nas kyang // rang gi
79a6(1): gnas su thig le dgod// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis mnga' gsol ba// rdo rje rgyal po las mkhan dang // 'dzin ging sgrol ging rdo rje byan// stobs pa dang ni rkang mgyogs dang // ji ltar rigs pa mnga' gsol
79b1(1): nas// sman smras dpal gyi chas rnams gsol// rtags rgyan gdab cing rdzas gzhan dgram// dngos grub ci 'dod dmar byang bstsal// che mchog rol pa'i gtsor bskyed cing // rigs chen brgyad kyi dkyil
79b2(1): 'khor bstim// thig chen gdab nas bsgos la gdab// cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs bya zhing // 'dzab bzlas rdo rje'i bsnyen pa bya// byin phebs rtags gsum byung ba na// dngos grub blang zhing dbang rdzogs
79b3(1): bskur// ru dra'i ngo bor gzigs pa la// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor gsal// skong rdzas ji snyed pa dang bcas// phung po tshogs su phul nas ni// bam chen sbom pos bskang ba dang // phung po rdul du bshigs
79b4(1): nas kyang // sha khrag rus pas skang bya yang // byang shar mtshams su bsgral bya ste// ru dra bsgral ba'i zhing yin pas// pho nya dgug 'dren btang nas kyang // dgra bgegs rnam shes dgug cing bstim// lha dang
79b5(1): dpral phyir rdzas kyis bdug/ 'jig rten dregs pa'i dmod pas brab// srid gsum lha 'dre'i dmag dpung dbab// lus la rigs drug yi ge dgod// ngan song dgag pa'i snying po bzlas// sbyong ba lnga dang grub
79b6(1): pa lnga// skong ba lnga yi dgongs pa bya// byang chub las la bgrod pa'i phyir// ba su ta ni byin gyis brlab// rdo rje thig gi bcu tshal gdab// rigs pa 'dzin pa'i skos kyis gdab// phung po gnas lnga bkru ba'i
80a1(1): phyir// mtshon cha lnga yi char yang dbab// he ru ka yi gnas bcu dang // dur khrod gnas brgyad rdzogs pa'i phyir// ro yi bsha' thabs rgyab nas bsha'// dbang ldan gnas pa'i phyogs su
80a2(1): bsgral// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mtshon chen gyis// dngos grub log rtog phral nas kyang // rdo rje sbyor phyogs ma nor bar// shel phur gnyis kyis rtsad nas bzung // nges par brtag pa'i gzhi ma la// cung zhig stong de
80a3(1): steng 'og bsgyur// bzhin phyogs gar blta legs nyes brtag/ de nas rdzas su blta ba ni// lha dang bdud rtsi mchod rdzas dang // dngos grub rgyan dang sbyin sreg rdzas// de la lha ru blta ba ni// don snying snod dang
80a4(1): dbang po dang // sha khrag rus pa pags pa spu// yan lag nying lag thod tshal dang // sgal tshigs rtsib ma ro lpags dang // gnas skabs bzhi yi byang chub sems// gnas dgu 'byin pa'i lam gsum ni// pho brang
80a5(1): dgu yi lha rnams snang // gnyis med mthun pa'i rdzas su bsgo// bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i rdzas su bya// rtsa ba yan lag brgyad yin te// mngon pa'i phyi dang gnas pa nang // bzhi bcu'i yan lag tshang bar bsgo// dam
80a6(1): rdzas rlon sbyor mchod pa'i rdzas// bza' dang btung dang myang dang ldag/ sdom dang gcud dang bdug par bya// dngos grub rdzas kyang de nyid do// dur khrod rgyan du bya ba ni// ban+d+ha gling bu mchog phur dang // bla re
80b1(1): rgyal mtshan ba dan gdugs// mar me khu ba zhag la sogs// phreng ba chen por bya ba'o// sprin sreg hom du bya ba ni// de nyid bdud rtsis chag chag gdab// thig bzhi gdab pa'i ling tsho dgu// 'khor lo rtsibs
80b2(1): brgyad lte ba la// phrin las chen po bzhi dag gi/ kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma dag/ spyi dang bye brag bsngags par bya// slar yang mtshams bcad rim pa lngas// bar du gcod pa'i bdud rnams bzlog/ snod
80b3(1): bzang mtshan gsol brjod cing dgram// rdzas rnams so sor bsngos nas kyang // phyag rgya gzhug pa'i gnas rnams su// ma nor so sor dgod par bya// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod dgu la// rmad du byung ba dgu
80b4(1): dgod de// 'bar ba chen po gnas rnams su// brjod pa'i tshul gyis gsal bar bsgom// phyag rgya gzhan yang legs par bkod// b+han+d+ha snying la sogs pa kun// he ru ka nas rim bzhin du// so so'i gnas su
80b5(1): dgod par bya// spyan drang brtan pa nyid du bya// ma lus mchod pas mnyes pa dang // bsreg pa'i rdzas kyis mchod bya zhing // ye shes lha dang me lha dang // slar yang sbyor ba'i cho ga dang // chad par 'gyur ba de
80b6(1): bzhin du// rab tu rdzogs par bya ba'o// sbyin bsreg lha rgyud dag par bya// phrin las rnam bzhi gang rigs bshad// mkha' 'gro mchod dang gzir mnan dang // mi zad gter du sba la sogs// las kyis rgyal
81a1(1): pos rim bzhin spyad// 'di ni dam tshig chen po ste// rdzas mchog bam gyis las yin no// sgrub pa'i sbyor ba rab tu bya// de las gzhan pa bsreg pa'i las// rnal 'byor chen po bya ba ni// gzhung
81a2(1): dang mthun pa'i gnas dag tu// yo byad phun sum tshogs par bya// phyogs skyong sprin gtong lan chags gzhal// bka' bsgo mtshams gcad sngar bzhin bya// pho brang dgu pa bzhengs su gsol// gnas dang yo
81a3(1): byad byin gyis brlab// mchod rdzas sna tshogs tshogs par bsham// sgrub pa'i rdzas ni bum pa bzang // rgyan rdzas mtshan nyid ldan pa dag/ lha yi grangs dang ldan pa dag/ las kyi cho ga rdzogs par dgod// de nas
81a4(1): dmigs pa gang yin pa'i// ming gzugs mtshan mar ldan pa la// rgyan dang cha lugs mdzes par gdags// rnam par shes pa dgugs byas nas// rigs gcig rigs lnga rigs dgu yi// ting nge 'dzin gyi
81a5(1): dkyil 'khor bzhengs// chos dbyings rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te// spyan drangs bzhugs la mos phyag btsal// mchod bshags phrin las bcol ba yis// 'od zer dra bas srid gsum gyi// nyon mongs dri ma ma
81a6(1): lus bsal// rin chen shel sgong ltar bsams la// sdug bsngal rnams la skyo bskyed de// thugs rjes rigs drug gnas nas dgug/ chu skyes gzugs gdag bzhi la brten// a nr-i su pre du zhes// dbus su
81b1(1): rigs lnga'i snying po bri// lnga dang rigs lnga lcags kyu la// phyi rol 'dab ma bzhi po yis// mchod sbyin gyis ni lan chags gzhal// gsang sngags drag pos gshed dang dpral// bdud rtsi dri chus phyi nang
81b2(1): bkru// rigs dbang lnga yi yum la bskur// ye shes lha dang gnyis med par// ngo bo stong pa nyid du bya// rigs drug gnas nas bton nas ni// slar yang dngos su byas nas ni// pho brang chen po'i drung du
81b3(1): khrid// sgo bzhi dbye bar gsol ba gdab// gnang ba thob nas phyag 'tshal zhing // yon phul nas ni skyabs su gsol// ye shes lnga dang sku lngar bya// gzugs sku dngos su thob bya'i phyir// gos sam ras sam
81b4(1): shing shun la/ khro tshogs snying po ming spel bcas// gnas yul dag tu legs par dgod// sangs rgyas zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor rnams/ khyod kyi steng dang 'og tu sbyin// thugs rje tshad med bzhi ldan nas/ khro bo
81b5(1): 'jigs byed skur bstan nas// gdug pa can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// so so'i snying po brjod nas ni// gnas kun byin gyis brlab par bya// nyon mongs skyon gyis ma gos phyir// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhag nas
81b6(1): ni// sngar bzhin dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya// de nas slang yang byin dbab cing // rdo rje'i dgongs pa la zhugs nas// bsnyen pa sngags kyi 'phro 'du bya// rdo rje'i las ni rdzogs par spyad// mchod cing
82a1(1): bshags te bskang zhing bcos/ khrag 'thung bdun brgya nyi shu la// bstod bskul gyis ni dmigs pa dgug/ bka' sdod pho nya dam bdar zhing // bskrad dang brdeg pas bar chad bsal// slar yang
82a2(1): bkru dang bskur ba dang // phung po khams dang lhar sbyangs te// smon lam bsngo ba la sogs kyis// 'gro ba'i don la bskur bar bya// de ltar lnga'am bdun la sogs// zla ba phyed dam ci rigs kyis// las dang
82a3(1): nyon mongs bag chags sbyang // de nas dngos gzhi sbyin bsreg bya// pho brang dgu yi steng nyid du// ka ba bzhi'am brgyad kyis btegs// rnam bzhi'i las kyi hom khung du// bzhi 'am brgyad kyi mar me sbar// 'byung
82a4(1): ba lnga yi yam shing las// mchod sbyin dngos po bsreg sbyang thim// nad gdon rnam rtog zhi ba dang // tshe dbang longs spyod rgyas pa dang // log lta mi mthun dbang bsdu dang // dmigs pa drag pos bsgral 'dod
82a5(1): rnams// gang la bsngags pa der spyad de// zlum po gru bzhi zla kham e// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri dkar ser dmar dang nag/ 'o ma can dang 'bras bu smin/ kha dog dmar dang tsher ma can// bram ze
82a6(1): rgyal po smad 'tshong ma// sme sha can la blangs pa'i me// snga dro nyin gung dgong mo dang // srod kyi dus su shar lho dang // nub dang byang nas rim gyis sbar// bsreg rdzas sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// bsangs te byin gyis
82b1(1): brlabs la dbul// ye shes lha dang me lha dang // thun mong thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang // slar yang me lha'i cho ga dag/ dkyil 'khor dgu yi lha dang sbyar// shAn+ti puSh+Ti ba shaM dang // mA ra zhes pas mtha' bsgyur
82b2(1): te// lha dang me lha'i snying pos sbyang // bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs pa che// gang gis sgor zhugs de bzhin sbyang // gsang ba'i chos gsum ma mthong zhing // lha bsgom spyod la ma sbyangs pa// tha mal pa dang mos pa
82b3(1): tsam// rnal 'byor nyid du sbyar bar bya'o// de las bzlog pa rang gi lha'i// zhing khams rnam par dag pa ste// lha dang gnyis med lam bstan gshegs/ khyad par blta ba nyams pa de// ji ltar ma nor hom khung
82b4(1): du// ji snyed ma lus yam shing gis// gnyis med ye shes me sbar te// ma rig rnam rtog bsregs shing sbyangs// rang byung rgyu rkyen bral ba'i phyir// bsod nams tshogs las mi ltos pas// gdod nas snying po byang
82b5(1): chub pa'i// mi rtog ting 'dzin rgyun du bsgom// gal te de ltar min pa na// sku gdung bgos te tsha tshar gdab// sngar bshad cho gas tshogs chen bsag/ bzlog pa'i bsnyen pa de dag ni// rang bzhin lhun gyis
82b6(1): grub pa ste// skye med dbu ma'i snying por gnas// ma lus mnyes par bya ba bstan// bsreg dang spang pa bzhi yi las// phan pa'i yan lag las kyi mchog/ de nyid gnyis pa'i sbyor ba'o// thog ma nyid nas sems
83a1(1): can khams// rnam dag dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // bdag 'dzin 'khrul pas 'khor bar 'khyams// de la rgyal ba rnams kyis dgongs// kun bzang nga nyid he ru kar// mngon byung sprul pas
83a2(1): mdzad pa yis// ye shes bsam mi khyab pa las// byang chub chen po'i lam 'di bstan// ji ltar bshad pa'i gnas chen du// phun sum tshogs pa'i yon tan bsam// sngon du 'gro ba rdzogs byas te// dkyil
83a3(1): 'khor dgu pa tshul bzhin bya// mtshan ma gsum gyis brgyan byas te// nam zhig 'tshang rgya'i ming bstan pas// lhag pa'i lha yi gnas rgyas gdab// bzang mor byin brlab bum pa brgyan// dbye ba'i rdzas la
83a4(1): gnyis dang gcig/ rdo rje las kyis bya ba byed// rgyan bris ri mor bri bar bya// gsal rdzogs mchod pas byin phab la// thugs rjes dgug dral dam tshig bstim// mchod 'os bsgrub par 'phags pa'i
83a5(1): tshogs// bshad pa'i lung bzhin mthar phyin bya// bsgom sbrang mchod bstod bskul bar bya// rgyud lnga'i lam nas btsal zhing drang // sras gyur bshags byas lam bstan te// thugs rje sems dpa' gsal bar
83a6(1): gzud// blta ba chos nyid ma nor bstan// rab tu bsngags pa de nyid gsal// thugs las sems dpa' rab tu gsal// thabs dang shes rab sbyar ba las// rnam thar gsum gyis e yis bsgral// a nu rA ga
83b1(1): zhes su brjod// rang byung me yis gsal byas te// yab yum 'og min gnas su 'phangs// byang chub sems kyi dbab par bya// tshogs dang smon lam 'bras bu bskul// las dang bag chags gtan sbyang
83b2(1): phyir// ting 'dzin 'bar ba'i ye shes lha// thugs rje tshad med skur bzhugs nas// tshom bu dgu pa rgyan ldan bri// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad sgrib pa gcod// gru gsum 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// rdzas kyi dam pa
83b3(1): rgyan dang ldan// dngos dang yo byad mchod par dgram// stang stabs dang ni tsham rngams bya// grangs mnyam bkod pa bsam mi khyab// rdzogs pa bzhin du bskyed par bya// gong bu gcig tu dbul ba dang // sna
83b4(1): tshogs mthun pa dgram pa dang // rim pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed pa dang // sngar bshad dang po'i 'jug tshul zhing // bkru dang sbrang dang smon lam gdab// dur khrod shing gi me sbar te// las kyi sgrib pa phyir bsal
83b5(1): la// mtshams gcad bsreg cing bstim par bya// cig car ba dang rim gyis pas// so so'i mthun pa'i rdzas kun btab// de yi smon lam de bzhin no// gral du bos te tshogs mchod dbul// 'phar lam bskul
83b6(1): pas mthar dbyung ngo // tha ma'i rdzas kyi mchod cing bskyang // gtang rag gtang zhing gter du sbas// tshe sprin bsrungs te bsod nams spel// lus bsrung go bgo dkyil 'khor bsdu// las kyis 'bras bu bsngo
84a1(1): bar bya// sa gsum bgrod pa'i smon lam gdab// gdung rdzas ring bsrel tshul du bsdu// nor bu rgyal mtshan rtse la mchod// tsha tsha sku bzhengs 'gro don bskul// gshin nyid 'gro drug sems can
84a2(1): dang // gdos pa dag dang slob ma dang // lha dang dkyil 'khor yam shing dang // bsreg rdzas nyid dang bdud rtsi lnga// stong pa nyid dang rgyu ru shes// kun gzhi'i rnam shes bcud phyung nas// gdos bcas phung po'i
84a3(1): snyigs ma can// dkar nag las kyi stangs 'dzin cing // dge dang mi dge dran byas pa// byang 'gyur ting nge 'dzin gyis su// bkru sbyong spro dang byin gyis brlab// lam bstan nyid kyi rgyan bya ba// rdo rje rgyal po nyid
84a4(1): kyis las// gnas sbyor mchod pa smon lam gyis// bla mas skabs sbyor bla mas bya'o// bshags sbrang bskang bya sor gzhug pa// slob ma nyid kyis bya ba de// las kyis khyad par 'di dag nyid// tshe las 'das pa
84a5(1): shin tu gyur// de yi don du he ru kas// nges pa'i rab tu sbyor ba'o// bla med rnal 'byor theg pa la// rab zhugs phrin las sgrol ba ni// shes rab ting 'dzin zabs ldan pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub
84a6(1): 'grub// ting 'dzin las su rung ba dang // shes rab phun sum tshogs pa dang // thabs mkhas blo dang ldan pa yis// rtags dang drod tshad ngos bzung shes// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po des// zhi khro rgyun gyi
84b1(1): ting 'dzin bsgom// gang la dmigs pa de drangs te// mchod pa'i tshogs kyis de mnyes bya// thugs rje chen pos de nyid bskul// de nyid khro bo'i ting 'dzin bsgom// phrin las rtse gcig mdzad par 'gyur// shes
84b2(1): rab phyag rgya bcings te bskul// hUM mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang // chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa ni// phyag rgya chen po'i gnyis med pas// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// oM ka re ka re ra tsa sa ma ya karma sa ma
84b3(1): ya s+t+waM/ thabs kyi rgyal pos 'di skad du// mu mtha' mi 'dzin mi 'gog pa'i// mnyam nyid rnal 'byor thod rgal du// zhi khro gtums rngams mdangs dang ldan// sna tshogs byang chub sems yi g.yo// a sa ma tsa la
84b4(1): d+harma d+hAr+d+ha swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM// zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs// lag pa g.yas pa sta zur bstan// phyogs mtshams bla 'og kun bltas nas// skye shi mtshan nyid 'jig rten gsum// thar pa'i rgyu ni ci yang
84b5(1): med// ngan 'gro gsum gyi gting brgyud la// snying rje bskyed nas 'di skad brjod// byams pa tshad med khro gtum snang // snying rje'i bsod nams mthar phyin pa// bsgral ba'i mtshan nyid dga' ba'i mchog/ btang
84b6(1): snyoms yal bar mi 'dor ro// oM ma hA ka ru Ni ka ma hA me tri// swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// de nas lhan cig skyes bgegs la// lan chags dpral ba'i gtor ma gtong // phyi nang gsang ba'i mtshams kyis
85a1(1): gcad// thabs dang shes rab gnyis ka yis// 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyogs su blta// dur khrod bdag pos bsdig pa'i phyir// oM sarba pA paM karma he ta ba sa ta sha ma ma trang ga ru dra hUM phaT/ oM sarba pa
85a2(1): paM ka ra te ti bi to ti kha T+wAM ga ru dra hUM phaT/ oM sarba ka ra te ha pa si ta ma hA a kar sha ru dra hUM phaT/ lho phyogs su ni lan res mchod// ba ya ge shra tsit+ta hUM phaT// pra dz+nyA ge sha tsit+ta dza la hUM phaT/ ldang zhing gsor
85a3(1): bas lan gsum brjod// sta zur g.yas g.yon re re zhing // gzigs 'brums tshul du blta bar bya// e pra dz+nyA u pa la hUM kro d+ha e sha ho// gar gyis gom gsum slar song nas// yul rnams kun la rab
85a4(1): gzigs nas// yi ge dag gi tshogs su snang // rab bsgril gar gyis srid pa kun// bdud rtsi'i mdog gzigs mchod cing bstab// kha kha mi ka ta yas a la la ho// oM pany+tsa a mr-i ta yo gi ni kha raM khA hi// rdo rje
85a5(1): zhal du bstab pa ni// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sems can 'di// bsgral ba kho na'i las su rung / bstab bo dpal chen zhal du bstab/ khro mo sbrul dang bcas la sogs// yul rnams 'dul ba'i skal du
85a6(1): bzhes// ta na chen po'i zhing du sbyor// ging chen rdo rje'i phyag tu dbul// ye shes rgya mtshor bzhes su gsol// de nas khro bo'i sngags kun dang // lha mo kuN+Da lI'i sngags kyis// bar du gcod pa'i bgegs bsal
85b1(1): nas// dkyil 'khor du drang 'di skad du// thar pa'i las byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// dga' zhing spro bas 'ong ba ltar// skal par ldan pa'i sems can khyod// shin tu bde zhing legs par 'ongs// bde
85b2(1): gshegs thugs rje thabs la mkhas// blo ngan sems can snying rje'i yul// gnyis med thabs kyis bsgral bar bya// thabs dang shes rab tshogs pa kun// gnas par gyur nas las kyi rje// rgyal ba rgya mtsho
85b3(1): 'khor dang bcas// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa rnams// spyan 'dren tshur byon gshegs su gsol// ha ha ki li ki li zhes// bzhad pa'i gad mos stong gsum khengs// bde mchog bde mchog bde spyod mkha' klong du//
85b4(1): yang / bde gos dkar klong du// slob ma'i tshul cig gnang bar mdzod// 'dod pas rol cig dgongs shig khA hi// sprin no bskul lo gsol cig rol// ngo mtshar mchog tu bstab po zhes// zla sogs dmar chen
85b5(1): snying po lnga// mAM sa ro mchog cher 'phel gsol// rak+ta me tsa rgyud chen gsol// zhi ba'i sgrub pa bsgrub 'tshal gyis// dri med gzi ldan mchod pa 'di// ye shes rgya mtsho rnams kyis bzhes// thabs dang shes rab
85b6(1): tshogs kun gyis// rgyu dang yul las dmigs tshul blta// g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub der gtad de// ye shes mkha' lding gter chen gyis// 'khor ba'i bye'u phrug blang ba ni// bu phrug ma yis zas ster
86a1(1): bzhin// 'dus pa'i tshogs kun rab tu dgyes// ha b+ha ha phra mo tri sarba du pra sha/ stegs bur bzhag ste 'di skad brjod// mi rtog ye shes dkyil 'khor de// zag med sems kyi ting nge
86a2(1): 'dzin// gzugs brtan rnam pa lta bu ste// 'dus shing tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan// thabs kyi rdo rje rnam grangs ni// chos kyis dbyings las chos nyid gnas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// su
86a3(1): dag phyin pa phyir mi ldog/ oM ta na tsit+ta mo k+Sha ga Na ma d+ha la pra du sha hUM// pho nya khro bo'i tshogs kun bskul// lam rgyud dgag pa'i snying po lnga// 'bru gsum bcas pa'i nus pa bsam// raM las me dpung spros pa
86a4(1): yis// rgyud dang phyogs bcu'i sems can gyi// rtog pa ma lus bsreg par bsgom// so so'i phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis// rgyud lnga drag po'i sngags kyis gzhom// sprul pa sems can rgyu las bsdu// bar gcod pho&
86a5(1): spros dgug ste// sku lus khro bcu'i snying po dang // stangs stabs mtshon cha sngags dang bcas// rtse gcig ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyangs// nga ni dus gsum bzhugs pa yis// sangs rgyas yin te ye shes sku// ye shes
86a6(1): rno dpal mtshon cha yis// log rtog 'khor ba rgyun gcad do// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' ring las// thugs rje chen po'i rol pa yis/ khams gsum cig car bsgral ba'i phyir// dug gsum rtsad nas gcad par
86b1(1): bya// mnyam nyid don la khyad 'byin dang // dam tshig 'khu byed can nyid brlag/ log rtog 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod pa// gshin rje'i gsal shing mi bzad pa// gdug par gyur pa rnam par 'joms// gshog pa'i
86b2(1): ral gri karta ri// gdug pa'i 'khor lo mi bzad pa// khong nas khros pa'i phung po 'joms// rno gdug drag po rtse dgu la// tshe dang phung po bcas pa 'joms// b+hI da ra tsa hUM/ i ha na ra tsa hUM// ki ma la tsakra pa tsa
86b3(1): hUM// d+ha ra tsa ma ma hA kro d+ha hUM// badz+ra ni ka na pa ra tsa kro ru hUM// sti ra ra ka ma ra na hUM/ badz+ra ga na tsit+ta hUM/ kro d+ha ra tsa ma ta he ru ka ma ha lo tsa hUM/ gang la bya ba'i dngos po 'di// gshed byed thams cad dbang bar
86b4(1): byin// gsang sngags kyis ni byin brlabs te// rig sngags kyis ni rdzogs byas nas// 'di la longs spyod rtag tu sbyar// 'chab pa'i phyogs nas ci bde bar/ khyod kyis 'di la longs spyod cig/ bdag gis
86b5(1): bcol ba'i las rnams kun// ma lus 'grub par byin gyis rlobs// ngan 'gro sbyong byed rab brtags te// ka tar ral gri gtad nas kyang // rdo rje pho nya king ka ra// ka tar sngon po 'di longs la// a b+hi Shiny+tsa
86b6(1): gnas skyod do// 'jam dpal rnon po'i zhing du bskyod// 'khor lo'i rtsa ba drung nas phyung // tsit+ta b+han+d+ha'i nang du stsal// shes rab yum gyis 'phang du bzhag/ rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog/ zhi ba lhun
87a1(1): gyis grub par sbyor// bu khyod rgyal ba'i sras yin te// nga ni shes rab pha rol phyin// dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum yin pas// mkha' dbyings bde ba'i gnas mchog na// rgyal sras bde ba'i de
87a2(1): bzhin gshegs// oM pra ti pu ru sha dzaHho// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dbyings su dgug/ rigs lnga zabs kyis byin brlabs nas// lhar skyes 'og tu bskyod byed bsam// 'chi ba med pa'i srog gdon pa'i// rdo rje
87a3(1): sems dpa' rlung lta bu// gang dag bsgral nas rdo rje'i tshe// de nyid sras kyi dam par ni// rdo rje sems dpar khyod nyid stabs// thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pas longs// srid par 'khor lo rtog pa'i
87a4(1): lam// 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod mya ngan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i rtags// 'khor lo chen po'i gdan la bzhugs// oM badz+ra tsakra hUM/ mnyam nyid rdo rje dbyings phyug gis// stong nyid seng ge'i sgra
87a5(1): bsgrags pas// bdud bzhi rab tu bcom pa'i rtags// 'jigs byed seng ge'i khri la bzhugs// oM badz+ra si d+ha hUM/ mya ngan mi 'da' thugs rje'i ngang // nyon mongs ma spangs gos pa med// bag chags rang bzhin
87a6(1): med pas na// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs par gyis// oM badz+ra pad+me hUM/ zhi ba'i mtha' la mi gnas te// 'jig rten kun dang mthun 'jug phyir// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i rtags// nyi ma zla ba'i gdan la
87b1(1): bzhugs// oM sUr+ya tsan+da hUM/ dge dang mi dge'i chos rnams la// lhag par brten par mi bya ste// mnyam nyid rig pa'i klung zhugs nas// ci la'ang thogs pa med par mdzad// kun gyis 'og min gnas su
87b2(1): sbaspar// g+haN+Da'i sgra yis bskul ba yis// dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// 'od zer 'phro bas rab tu brjid// mi 'khor mi lhung don gyi phyir// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// rdo rje rgya gram dbyings kyi
87b3(1): bcad// e ma dga' bde bla na med// ngan song gnas rnams hUM gis stongs// dus gsum sangs rgyas hUM gis bskyed// 'jigs byed chen po he ru ka/ zhe sdang khro tshul rtog mi mnga'// log lta thabs kyis 'dul
87b4(1): bar byed// thugs rje'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bsgral// rigs kyi rgyal po lnga rnams la// gzugs kyi phung po 'di 'bul gyis// seng ge glang chen rta mchog dang // rma bya mkha' lding lngar gyur te// 'jigs
87b5(1): byed bkod nas gdan mchog 'bul// ye shes lnga la rol nas kyang // stobs dang mi 'jigs rig pa dang // dbang dang rdzu 'phrul dngos grub stsol// 'byung ba chen po lnga rnams ni// rigs kyi yum chen dpa' mo
87b6(1): lnga// gsang mchog dbyings su 'di 'bul na// gnyis med chen por rol nas kyang // mi 'gyur gzungs kyi dngos grub stsol// 'og min pho brang mchog gi gnas// thabs dang shes rab yab dang yum// rang
88a1(1): bzhin lta ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ bde gshegs sras po khyod yin gyis// lus su 'jug par ma byed cig/ 'gro ba sgyu ma'i rang bzhin te// 'di la mtha' ni dmigs su med// chos 'dir gnas
88a2(1): nas mya ngan 'da'// de bas rnal 'byor dbang phyug gis// dgongs pa chen po dang ldan pas// dmigs pa gang yin 'di la 'bad// de nas phung po'i lhag ma dag/ legs bsdus sku gsum sa la
88a3(1): bzhengs// thabs chen dpag tu med pa dag/ nga dang rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad// de dang de las brjod pa bzhin// ma lus cho gas dag byas te// rang bzhin snang ba chos kyi sku// gzugs sku sprul pa longs spyod
88a4(1): rdzogs// 'gro ba'i don byed sprul pa'i sku// 'di ltar shes pa rtogs pa yis// bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bsgral zhing // gzhan du snang la thugs rje yis// bla med pha rol bde bsgral bya// de ni mthar thug bsgral ba
88a5(1): yis// las kyi sbyor ba spyod pa'o// 'gro rnams 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur pas// las kyis 'phan pa sna tshogs shar/ khyad par skye rga na dang 'chi// dus dang dus min 'byung ba la// dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad
88a6(1): dang // gshis ngan 'gum pa bco lnga srid// glo bur 'byung ba phyi nang las// rtsa ba yan lag sna tshogs las// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa yis// thugs rje tshad med bzhi las ni// gdul bar bya ba'i sras
88b1(1): rnams kyis// ston pa dus las yol ba med// sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa gsum// rigs kyi thog mar 'byung ba ste// many+dzu shI dang ka ru ni// lo ke shwa ra ma hA ni// pA Ni badz+ra kar ti ni// sprul pa du ma 'byung zhing
88b2(1): mdzad// dus gsum 'byung ba dpag tu med// khyad par du ni mtshon cha'o// gnod pa rkyen du gyur pa dang // rwa dang mche ba me dang chu// dug dang sa steng 'byung ba lnga// gshis ngan yin te gdul bar bya// de yang
88b3(1): he ru ka yi rigs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i las can des// sngon du bya ba rjes bsgrub cing // bsnyen bsgrub chen po gzhir bzhag nas// phan gdags las su bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rol phyogs mtshams
88b4(1): brgyad// hom khung mda' gang gru gsum brtsig/ rang rig kha dog ldan pa la// shug pa tsher ma can la sogs// gdug pa can gyi shing brtsigs te// dug dang skye tshe nyung dkar sogs// yam shing thun gyi rdzas su
88b5(1): bya// slob dpon cha lugs gnas pa dgu// gtso dang 'khor gyi tshul du bya// gdul bya shes pa dgu'am drug/ bam chen bsgrub pa'i dus bzhin bya// me lha'i cho gas mnyes byas nas/ khyad par mtshon gri me yis
88b6(1): gdul// lag na bdud rtsi ku sha dang // til mar lcags ram rde'u phran/ khyad par gsang ba de yi rdzas// rwa dang lcags kyis dug gri gdul// me ni chu las gdul ba ste// chu ni sa yis gdul bar bya// dug la
89a1(1): sngags pa'i sman gyis bdug/ sdig pa me dang mtshon gyis te// rbab du ltung ba de yi gri// rgod kyi pog zil gdul bar bya// dom dang dred kyi g.yang gzhi dang // sman pa dang ni gnas rnams
89a2(1): dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri yis gdul// 'di dag ma lus phyi ma'i dus// mu tra a ka ra yis ni// he ru ka bzhin bsal bar byed// kun tu bzang po thugs kyi rje// sgrol ba'i rgyu dang mtshungs par
89a3(1): bshad// bsgrag dang sgrub dang mnan pa dang // gnas nas drangs pa las kun gyis// bya ba ma lus kun bsdus te// thams cad gdul ba'i las su spyad// dang por shes pa bsgrub pa'i dus/ bar du drangs pa
89a4(1): gnas kyi dus// tha mar bsreg pa sbyang ba'i dus// dus shes kun rig 'di la sngags// rjes kyi bya ba tshe dang khrus// dbang dang byin gyis brlab pa dang // dngos grub cho ga rnams kyis ni// byang chub chen por
89a5(1): gnas 'gyur nas// gson gyis bskang ba'i las su bya// de nas yon gyi bdag po yis// rdo rje 'chang la drin gsol zhing // de la bskur dang legs bshad bya// gri zhes bya ba gsod pa'i gri// de yi gnod pa
89a6(1): gdul ba'i las// mthar phyin bsod nams dpag tu med// rang gzhan kun gyi don rdzogs 'gyur// mdor na phan pa'i las 'di dag/ rdzas su bsgrub dang sbyin par bsreg/ gnas nas drangs dang rgyu drug
89b1(1): bsgral// shin tu gyur pa gdul ba'i las// tshe 'das gshin las phan pa'i las// rnam pa lnga ru ngas bstan gyis// u rgyan yul gyi skye mchog gis// rdo rje chos kyi gsung bzhin sgrubs// shaM b+ha la yi shAkya'i
89b2(1): rigs// rA dza sri ka de yis mthong // 'gro ba rgyud nas longs spyod rtsal// phyogs bzhir rgyud pa de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ las rnams nges par
89b3(1): bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / khro bo dang khro mo dang / rigs dang rigs kyi sprul pa dang bcas
89b4(1): pa rnams kyi don mdzad pa'i phyir/ nyid kyis sku sna tshogs su sprul pa mdzad de 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung ba yi// he ru ka yi sgrub pa po// rnal 'byor gsum gyi bdag nyid can// blo dang
89b5(1): dbang po bsam pa'i mchog/ rab 'bring tha ma'i rten can gyis// bde bar gshegs pa rgya mtsho che// kun 'dus tshom bu dgu yi gtso// 'khor lo bcas pa de mngon phyir// rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'di rnams kyis// ji
89b6(1): ltar bshad pa'i gtso dang 'khor// rang gi sku mdog phyag mtshan dang // pho brang chen po'i bzhugs tshul dag/ mngon du 'dod pa de nyid ni// spros la dga' ba'i gang zag gis// rnal 'byor chen po'i tshul du
90a1(1): bsgrub// gal te bsdus la dga' ba yis// blo dang dbang po 'bring dag gis// rang gi gtso bo mchog rnams la// rigs kyi gtso bo bzhi rnams ni// yum dang grogs su bcas pa'am// rang
90a2(1): rigs gcig pu'i tshul dag gis// so so'i 'khor lo la gnas pa// pho brang bsdus pa'i khyad par gyis// rjes su rnal 'byor tshul du bsgrub// de nyid kyang ni cher bsdus shing // shin tu bsdus la dga'
90a3(1): ba'am// blo dang dbang po mthar gnas pas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pho brang la// gtso bdag chen po he ru ka/ yum dang bcas pas dgu bsgom ste// rang gi mtshon byed dang ldan pas// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor
90a4(1): bapabar du bsgrub// rten mchog drag shul cher spyod cing // gsang ba'i don du skrod 'dod pas// bsrung dang tshogs bsag bsgrub pa dang // phrin las yongs su rdzogs pa dag/ sngags kyi sbyor ba yongs shes
90a5(1): pas// shin tu myur ba de bsgrub bo// gang zag shin tu brtson ldan pas// rgyun tu myur bar de nyid kyis/ kho na yang dag yi dam du// bar chad med par bsgrub pa ni// rang 'dod lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// rdo rje
90a6(1): lus kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// smin byed lam gyis rab sbyangs nas// de nyid mthong ba'i nges pa yis// rnam par dag pa'i mthar son nas// lha gzhan logs nas mi 'tshol te// tsit+ta gsang chen pho brang
90b1(1): dbus// rten gzhan brgyad ni de yi 'khor// sgo brgyad phyogs mtshams pho brang ngo // sems kyi rgyal po he ru ka/ che ba'i mchog ste dbus na gnas// sgo lnga dag gi rnam shes dang // kun gzhi nyon mongs yid rnam
90b2(1): shes// rang gi rigs dang phyogs dag gis// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi gtso bo ste// snang zhing rtog pa ma lus pa// de yi 'khor du bkod pa'o// snod drug la sogs de yi gnas// bza' btung la sogs mchod pa
90b3(1): stob// mnyes pa'i spyod lam phyag 'tshal ba'o// dga' ba'i bstod pa de nyid de// lus kyi phyi rol sha tshil pags// gzhal med khang gi brtsig pa ste// keng rus sgal tshigs ka gdung dang // thod rus rgyal mtshan
90b4(1): ba dan bcas// ba spu me ri 'bar ba ste// rten dang brten bcas dkyil 'khor ro// rtag tu gnas pa rang la snang // 'gro dang 'ong ba byon zhing gshegs// snang ba sprul pa'i sku yin te// de gsal longs spyod
90b5(1): rdzogs sku yin// bde chen thob pa chos kyi sku// nyer thob thim pa bar ma dor// mngon par byang chub sprul pa'i sku// mthar zug 'od gsal zung du 'jug/ rab brtan 'gyur med rdo rje'i sku// de nyid shes na
90b6(1): gnas pa yin// 'di ni rnal 'byor yi dam rgyun// nar mar bsgrub pa'i tshul yin no// 'di dag dang por he ru ka/ brjid pa'i dbu ni nyi shu gcig/ mdzes pa'i phyag ni bzhi bcu gnyis// rdo rje dbyings mchog
91a1(1): bkod pa'o// gnyis pa'i dus su nga yi sku// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad de// ma mo phra men bcu drug gis// g.yas dang g.yon du rnam par mdzes// zhal gsum phyag drug bsdus pa ste// zhabs
91a2(1): brgyad bzhi dang gnyis kyis bstan// sngags spyod pa la ci rigs te// rgyun du bsgrub pa rnal 'byor pa'i// blo yi rim pa de bzhin no// de yang sems kyi rnal 'byor pas// phrin las bsgrub pa'i yan lag
91a3(1): gis// bstod dang bskul ba sna tshogs pa// lha rnams kun gyi phyag mtshan dang // sku mdog dang ni bzhugs tshul gyis// gdan khri dag gi gnas sgo nas// ji ltar snang ba de bskul zhing // ming gi rnam grangs spros
91a4(1): pa dang // pho brang gnas kyi mtshon pa dag/ che 'bring chung ngu rnams kyis bskul// rnam par dag pa'i don rtogs la// rgyas dang bsgrub par brjod pa yis// chen po'i skye ba brjod pa dang // bstod pa mchog gis
91a5(1): mnyes byas nas// nyes pa bshags shing bskang ba la// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams kyis ni// thugs kyi rdo rje sems dpas bsdus// sprul pa bram ze mi thod can// gang gis gang la gang gi phyir// gang bstan de dag
91a6(1): don gyis ni// lha rnams dbang btsugs nyes bshags ltar// 'gyod tshangs brjod pa'i bshags pas bskang // bdud rtsi bcud mchog dza gad phud// gtsang sbyor chen po'i mchod pas kyang // zhi khro'i dkyil 'khor
91b1(1): ma lus pa// 'jig rten dregs pa'i lha dang bcas// dus bzhi dang ni drug dag tu// bskang ba yis kyang de brnyes bya// srog chags rnam shes brten ldan rgyu// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu der dmigs nas// phung po
91b2(1): bzhir gnas mchod pas kyang // de dag rab tu bskang bar bya// slar yang de yi rdzas la sogs// thim par gyur pa de yis ni// phung po don snying sha khrag snod// rus pa la sogs tshogs kyis bskang // phyi nang
91b3(1): rin chen las byung ba'i// rgyu mchog rigs kyi yo byad la// ri rab gling bdun gling bzhi dang // gling phran mu khyud rgya mtsho che// 'dod spyod lha dang tshangs par bcas// stong dang stong gnyis bar ma dang // stong
91b4(1): gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams// spyi phud bye ba phrag brgya'am// mdzes pa gcig gi tshad kyis ni// ri rab chen po'i yang steng du// mtshams bzhi dbus su rnam par rgyal/ khang bzangs rnam par bkra ba ni// rang
91b5(1): bzhin bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// tshogs kyi bdag po he ru ka/ che ba'i mchog gi pho brang gnas// mtshams bzhi log ni re re la'ang // rang gi rigs kyi he ru ka/ yum dang khro tshogs sgo srung bcas// de dag
91b6(1): 'khor gyi pho brang ngo // bang rim gnyis pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// sku gsung thugs dang phrin las bzhi'i// he ru ka bzhi 'khor bcas kyi// gnas yin de yi mtshams su ni// rbod gtong mchod bstod drag sngags
92a1(1): dang // rig pa'i 'dzin pa'i he ru ka/ 'khor dang bcas pa'i gnas su bya// tha ma de la lha rnams kyi// chung ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang ging gi tshogs// ma mo sring mo pho1
92a2(1): dang // 'bar ma dang ni sa bdag mo// de dag kun gyi pho brang ste// gling bzhi 'gro ba phal pa'i gnas// de dag rang gzugs pho nya dang // longs spyod sems ldan 'dab chags dang // ri dwags gcan gzan
92a3(1): phyugs rnams dang // sa chu bar snang gnas rnams kyang // kun gyis bskang ba'i rdzas su bya// pho mo byis pa yul 'khor dang // lus sems dag gis mthun glud dang // longs spyod lnga yi glud du 'bul// tha ma
92a4(1): phrin las rnam pa bzhi// gang la dmigs pa de spyad bya// 'dod yon mthun pas bskang ba yin// rjes su spyad pa'i phrin las ni// bsrung dang mnan bsreg bzlog pa yi// las kyi gzer bzhi bsad thun
92a5(1): lnga// 'gyur med kun gyi thun mong ste// 'khor lo thod pa bsreg rdzas dang // gtor ma dang ni thun rdzas kyis// spyi dang bye brag so so yis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i las la sbyar// 'di dag gis ni don bsgrub
92a6(1): phyir// sngags bsdu ba dang bzlas pa dang // skyon yon sgra dang 'khrul dmigs dang // yan lag lnga yis kun shes bya// bza' dang btung dang bgo ba dang // spyod lam yan lag sbyor ba'o// dus bzhi thun bzhi'i
92b1(1): rnal 'byor lnga// rgyun tu legs spyad lam yin no// phyir sbyang nang gi rnal 'byor gyis/ khyad par rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni// rdo rje lus kyi gnas lugs lnga// gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa byang chub
92b2(1): sems dang ni// mi shigs thig le rnam lnga dag/ smin grol lam la de bzhin sbyar// de dag 'bras bu thob pa yang // bral dang spang thob mi gnas pa'i// sku gsum sa la goms pa la// yi dam lha dang bar gcod
92b3(1): bdud// gsang ba'i dgra dang rigs drug la// phung po nyon mongs lnga rnams la// de nyid gzer gyis mi 'byung zhing // de yi ngang du gsal zhing brtan// ma lus pa dang ye shes kyi// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa
92b4(1): yin// bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po mchog/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rbod gtong mchod dang rten// drag sngags rig 'dzin sgrub pa yi// thabs 'di dus gsum thams cad du// rgyal ba
92b5(1): rnams kyis legs bshad pa// mnga' bdag sangs rgyas gtso chen gyis// rnal 'byor gsum gyi don chen yin// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las// phrin las kyi kha bskang
92b6(1): ba'i thabs mdor bsdus te bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan he ru kas// gsang mchog rnam par 'phrul pa yi// ting nge 'dzin gyis dgongs mdzad de// 'di skad tshig tu bka' stsal
93a1(1): to// e ma nam mkha' lta bu'i chos// mi gnas mi rtogs bsam dang bral// rnam dag sems kyi dkyil 'khor che// chags med yul las 'di brjod do// gzugs brnyan snying rje byang chub
93a2(1): sems// nyi ma'i 'od ltar kun la gsal// de nyid kho na las gzhan pa'i// 'khor ba'i sa ni rtog pa'i yul// hUM zhes grags pa'i byang chub sems// cho 'phrul chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu// gsal zhing 'bar 'phro/
93a3(1): 'od dang bcas// mi 'gyur rdo rje sku yi hUM// e ni kun gyi rang bzhin te// stong pa mchog gis dbyings las byung // mtha' dang dbus med kun tu khyab// bsam 'das gru gsum mthing nag e// yaM ni g.yo ba'i
93a4(1): cho 'phrul ldan// stobs chen sra mkhregs dbang gi rgyal// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje ldan// ljang nag kha gdengs bskyod pa'i yaM/ khaM ni chu yi dngos po ste// gsher rlan thugs rjes kun la snyoms// mkha' mnyam
93a5(1): byin gyis rlabs chen g.yo// ma lus sdud pa'i dmar chen khaM// suM/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i rang bzhin klong // mi dmigs dag pa brjid pa'i stobs// kun shongs sra ba'i bdag nyid kyis// bcu gsum rdzogs pa'i
93a6(1): smug nag suM// raM/ gsal byed sreg pa'i mtshan nyid can// 'bar ba'i stobs kyis dngos po 'joms// 'od chen cho 'phrul dregs pa'i bdag/ 'phro 'dus rig byed dmar gsal raM// laM/ phyi nang gsang ba'i
93b1(1): rin po che// rdo rje brtsigs pa'i ri rab 'bar// mtha' dbus phyogs bcu mkha' dang mnyam// rim par rtse mor rab rdzogs laM// b+h+rUM/ dpal ldan rdzogs pa yum gyi mkha'// zhing khams chen po bsam mi
93b2(1): khyab// rnam dag tshogs rdzogs gzhal yas khang // bkod pa tshad med 'od ldan b+h+rUM// rab brtan snying po'i tshig 'di'o// oM/ chos rnams sems las gud na med// gdod nas ma skyes brjod las 'das// blang
93b3(1): dor med pa'i ngang nyid las// mnyam pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o// oM ma hA shU n+ya taM dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ a// de nyid ma rtogs 'khrul pa la// mkha' ltar mkha' nyid snying rje che// ma lus khyab pa'i ye
93b4(1): shes kyis// kun la snang ba de bzhin bsgom// oM ma hA d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ hUM/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// gdod nas dag pa gsal ba'i rgyu// mthing nag 'od kyis phyogs kun
93b5(1): gsal// thams cad ma lus rnams 'byung hUM// oM ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta dz+nyA na sa twa kro d+ha hUM/ e// chos kun ye nas dag pa la// mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' ni// kun tu bzang po'i dbyings kyi ngang // stong nyid
93b6(1): sems kyi rang bzhin rdzogs// e A ka sha maN+Da la hUM// yaM las bskal pa'i 'thor rlung ni// bag chags sdug bsngal ma lus gtor// dam tshig sgrol ma dbyings kyi mkha'// skyod byed dbugs kyi nus par
94a1(1): ldan// yaM karma rak+Sha su b+ha tra maN+Da la hUM/ khaM las khrag gi rgya mtsho ni// 'dod chags 'khor ba kun sbyangs nas// pad+ma gsang ba dbyings kyi mkha'// chags gzhi khrag gis rang bzhin gnas// oM mahA
94a2(1): su kha rak+ta maN+Da la hUM// suM las gru gsum bsgral ba'i sa// rdo rje rgya gram mi zad gter// sangs rgyas spyan ma dbyings kyi mkha'/ gti mug sha yi dpung du bsgom// oM ma hA baM smin+ta maN+Da la hUM/ raM/ 'bar ba'i
94a3(1): stobs kyis srid gsum 'joms// sreg byed gsang ba'i mtshan nyid can// 'od 'phrul gos dkar gsang ba'i mkha'// drod kyi 'phro 'du dmar gsal 'bar// raM dz+nyA na dza la tsan+d+ra li hUM/ ko/ zhe sdang ma spangs
94a4(1): kun gyis sbyangs// dkar zhing 'tsher ba byang chub sems// ye shes gsang ba'i dbyings kyi yum// lhag par snang ba rus pa'i gzhi// oM ma hA kau ni ri ti dza ku ta shi kha maN+Da la hUM/ de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams
94a5(1): kyis// sku yi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gsang ba mchog gi bdag po yis// gdan dang gtsug tor man chad du// lhun grub yongs su rdzogs par mthong // 'dod
94a6(1): khams khrag gis rgya mtshor rdzogs// gzugs kyi khams ni sa gzhi ste// keng rus gzugs med khams su'o// ri rab kha bad nor bu 'od// dman pa'i theg pa gsum rdzogs pa'i// rdo rje brag chen gtams pa
94b1(1): la// bya spyod rnal 'byor las rnams rdzogs// pad+ma las ni rnal 'byor gsum// nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// dbang phyug chen po yab yum bcas// nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib sbyang phyir// dpa' gtum
94b2(1): 'jigs byed gdug pa can// gtum po'i stobs dang brjid pa dang // 'dzin dang zhe sdang rab sbyor las// stag gzigs seng ge dom dang glang // me dang chu srin sbrul gyi ni// lha dang klur bcas rab tu
94b3(1): spel// dur khrod chen po brgyad kyis bskor// he ru ka yi gnas bcur ldan// yongs su rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang // tshig brjod 'di yis gsal bar bya// hUM nam mkha' mtha' mnyam gzhal yas
94b4(1): khang // dkyil 'khor chen po'i pho brang dgu// theg pa rim dgu rdzogs pa'i rtags// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnam par mdzes// tshogs brgyad gnas su dag pa'i rtags// chos sku spros med lte ba zlum// ye shes
94b5(1): bzhi ldan gru chad bzhi// bar khyams dang ni sgo bzhir bcas// phyi rol bskal pa'i me ri 'bar// rin chen sna lnga'i 'od zer 'phro// nang gi thod pa tshar gsum brtsigs// mthu chen bdud kyi mgo bcad
94b6(1): pa'o// 'jigs byed khro bo'i gzer chen btab// ka zhu nyi ma zla bas brgyan// rnam thar brgyad kyi them skas bris// phyogs skyong bcu ni bla re bklubs// lha chen dbang phyug rgyal mtshan 'phyar// gdug pa sbrul gyi za
95a1(1): ra tshag/ sbrul chen rigs lnga'i chun po 'phyar// gnam lcags gzer chen btab pa la// b+han+da 'jigs pa'i gzer chen ldan// zhing chen g.yang gzhi bla res phug/ zhing chung pags pa khra la la// ba
95a2(1): su ta yi zhags pas sbrel// dri chen dri chu'i zham chu 'bab// kang ka dur bya 'phur zhing lding // seng stag dom dred mchong zhing rgyug/ nyi zla gza' skar 'khrug cing 'phen// ye shes lnga ldan 'od zer 'phro// bde bar
