95a3(1): gshegs pa kun 'dus pa// zhi khro rgyal ba'i pho brang mchog/ b+haM bi shwa bi shud+d+he b+han+da ga ta dz+nyA na tsakra maN+Da la hUM/ de ba ma hA na ga ma hA ru tra ti ra baM/ ma sUr+ya maN+Da la/ a tsan+d+ra maN+Da la// paM pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ hUM s+pha ra na
95a4(1): phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ gzhal yas khang chen 'bar ba las// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha'// gnas dgu rdzogs pa'i pho brang la// dbus kyi gdan steng yi ge yi// 'phro 'du 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyis// kun tu
95a5(1): bzang po he ru ka/ che ba'i che mchog gyur pa ni// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// dus gsum sangs rgyas rdzogs par gsal// zhal ni gsang ba'i dur khrod de// spyan 'bar he ru ka yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
95a6(1): phyag gis ni// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te// rang gi rigs mtshan yongs su rdzogs// dur khrod chen po brgyad gyis brgyan// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i gdan la zhugs// oM shrI ma hA he ru ka hUM phaT// b+h+yo hUM
95b1(1): kun tu bzang mo dbyings kyi yum// kro d+hi shwa rI dbang phyug ma// rnam par thar pa'i dbu dgu ldan// stong pa bco brgyad phyag rnams kyis// g.yas pa rdo rje ma mo brgyad// g.yon pa dril bu phra men brgyad// gtso chen
95b2(1): 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'dzin// zhabs bzhi mnyes sbyor sku la 'khril// oM ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI dza la ni b+h+yo hUM// yab yum gnyis su med pa yi// mkha' gsang byin rlabs cho 'phrul las// baM maM hUM aM a phaT ces pa
95b3(1): yis// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hUM rdo rje// pad+ma ma chags zla ba aM// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // nyi zla mkha' gsang dbyings su sbyor// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nA rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// hUM bde mchog sku
95b4(1): ma'i brdas mtshon te// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// dbyings kyi bde chen 'byung ba ni// rang byung ye shes 'od zer 'phro// oM sarba ta tA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM// b+h+yo khro mo 'dod chags ye shes
95b5(1): che// he he dgyes pa'i gzi ma dngas che// rin chen pad+ma rgyas mdzad de// gnyis med 'khril ba'i sbyor bas thim// oM pad+ma sarba yo gi nI pra be sha phaT/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ b+h+yo gnam zhal pad+ma'i gzhal yas su// bde
95b6(1): chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spros// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus pa// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyor bas bstim// oM sarba tA ga ta pU dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// oM dang ldan pa'i thig le las// sku
96a1(1): sa / la / na dugs sa da
96a2(1): brjod pas// byang chub sems kyi sbyin chags las// tshig gsam gyi gyur ba sas/ khro ba'i dkyil 'bar smin grang gag/ swA swA hA hU~M ts+tsha hA hA s+t+wa~M/ rkang gsum tshugs bcu rdul byed ces// rna
96a3(1): cab dkyil lar \u0f7f/ dag sangs rgyas mad par thar/ chags bca'i dregs pa pa thas btal/ a brdasamalas// 'a re ba bde'i ngo'i shing de dag / khanas can byas
96a4(1): bzhin med par bsgral sa/ @#na par ldan/ kasaHka ba sha 'a/ thA \u0f7fna / dkyil 'ang brgyad kying zang dang // rtags paca na dang /
96a5(1): 'bar ba'i gdan steng du// 1ru ka dang gzhan rje gshed// rta mgrin rdo rje gzhon nu dang // mngon rdzogs rgyal dang drags pa 'dul// stobs ldan mchog dang reg 'dzin gaH// rang gi rigs dang tham
96a6(1): bcas// rdur bzhin sbyar ba'i then rlabs las// rnas 'bar thal pa'i chags bcas pan// rang thags gsang ba'i chagags pa// hA hU~M tA d+hA T+Ta b+hU hrA b+h+ya/ nA Sh+Ta nA d+hu tA d+hA d+ha hA// de rang du
96b1(1): gsal ba dang // byin gyis brlabs shing dbang bskur nas// dam tshig pa la brtan bzhag ste// ye shes dkyil 'khor dbab pa ni// oM a hri ha hUM dzaHbaM hoH/ hUM chos dbyings rnam dag gsal ba'i pho brang
96b2(1): sa// rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs dbyings nas bzhengs// rigs lnga yab yum sems dpa' lcam dral dang // mthar byed sgo ba sbrul sku thub pa drag/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lha rnams gshegs su gsol// zhi
96b3(1): khro'i tshogs 'dus dpal chen he ru ka/ yon tan tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dbyings nas bzhengs// he ru ka dpal yab yum khro bo bcu// ta krita sgo ba'i tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// ye shes lhun grub
96b4(1): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dpal chen khrag 'thung yab yum dbyings nas bzhengs// rigs lnga khrag thung yab yum ma mo'i tshogs// sgo bzhi srung ma'i tshogs bcas gshegs su gsol// 'phags pa'i rgyal
96b5(1): po khro rgyal gshin rje gshed// chos sku byang chub sems kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// gshed chen rigs lnga sbyor sgrol yum dang bcas// phyogs skyong sgo skyong 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// dbang gi rgyal po khro
96b6(1): rgyal rta mchog dpal// gsung mchog lha tshogs chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs// khams gsum dbang sdud yab yum sras 'khor bcas// phra men sprul pa sgo ma gshegs su gsol// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings
97a1(1): kyi dkyil 'khor nas// srid pa'i phur pa bsgrub phyir dbyings nas bzhengs// dpal chen khro bcu yab yum sras mchog rdzogs// dpal 'byung phra thabs phra men gshegs su gsol/ khams
97a2(1): gsum thams cad yum gyi b+ha ga'i rgyan// snang srid 'byung lnga'i bdag mo sku bskyod cig/ bla med yab yum dbyings kyi yum chen dang // tshogs bdag sman mo 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// chos sku lhun grub
97a3(1): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bde gshegs rigs pa 'dzin pa dbyings nas bzhengs// byang chub sems mchog grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin// rigs bzhi khro rgyal rig 'dzin gshegs su gsol// 'jig rten
97a4(1): dregs pa 'dul mdzad khro bo che/ khams gsum spyi 'dul yab yum dbyings nas bzhengs// bdud dang gshin rje lha klu gnod sbyin gtso// sde dpon chen po 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol// mthu stobs stsal
97a5(1): 'chang dpal chen 'byung bdag yum// sngags bdag dregs pa 'dul byed dbyings nas bzhengs// 'jig rten drag sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'chang ba'i// sngags bdag dregs pa 'khor bcas gshegs su
97a6(1): gsol// bstan pa rgya mtsho so so'i dkyil 'khor nas// dam tshig pa las bzhengs pa'i rdzu 'phrul can// dpal gyi bka' sdod rigs kyi mthu ston pa'i// phrin las bsgrub pa'i srung ma gshegs su gsol// oM
97b1(1): a thA ga ta b+hi ru d+he ba ga Na e A ra li hrI hrI/ de yis ye shes lha rnams ni// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'od dang rnam 'phrul byin rlabs bcas// sprin tshogs 'bar zhing bkod pa las// dam tshig
97b2(1): tu ni dbab pa'i phyir// gnyis med pa la thim par bya// hUM sangs rgyas kun 'dus che mchog he ru ka/ dpa' 'bar khro mo gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma// sras 'khor sprul pa las kyi pho nyar bcas// byol song gtso
97b3(1): bo lha klu bsnol ba dang // nyi zla pad+ma brtsegs pa'i gdan steng du// dam tshig gnyis med ngang du bzhugs su gsol// dbus mtha' med pa'i chos dbyings pho brang du// bde gshegs rigs lnga yab yum sras
97b4(1): 'khor bcas// gtso mchog rgyal po'i phyag gi dkyil 'khor la// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad 'khor lo'i lte ba la// he ru ka dpal rigs kyi gtso chen
97b5(1): brgyad// dpal chen dbyings kyi yum dang mnyes mdzad rnams// ru dra chu glang klu dang lha yi gtso// mkha' gsang ma trang ti ra dar 'phan dang // nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// gtso chen so so'i rigs
97b6(1): kyi sras mchog dang // gnyis med yum chen dang du sbyor mdzad cing // phyogs rnams 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi pho brang la// rigs mchog mdzes pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// gnas brgyad dkyil 'khor phyogs
98a1(1): bzhi'i bar khyams la// ma mo bcu drug phyogs skyong bcu gnyis yum/ khro brgyad khro bcu yab yum phra thabs bcas// tshogs kyi ma mo phyogs bzhi dregs pa can// rigs 'dzin 'khor bcas sngags
98a2(1): bdag yab yum rnams// ti ra mchog phran gdan la bzhugs su gsol// phyi nang dkyil 'khor phyogs kyi sgo bzhi la// gdong mo gshin rje pho nya phra men ma// srid bzhi dreg pa las kyi bka' nyan bzhi// phan
98a3(1): mdzad slob dpon bzhi rnams so so yi// phyogs bzhir mnyam pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// dbus dang phyogs mtshams pho brang mu ran la// ce sbrang ma brgyad dbang mo nyi shu brgyad// gong chen bco brgyad
98a4(1): khyi spyang pho nya'i tshogs// phur srung mo ging sman mo lnga bcu brgyad// lha srin sde dang mkha' 'gro ging dang bcas// rang gi gdan bcas gnas su bzhugs su gsol// phyi rim par khyams phyogs bzhi'i gdan steng
98a5(1): du// lha chen yum dang mkha' 'gro ging gi tshogs// ma bdun rdo rje'i pho nya sring mo bzhi// sa bdag mo dang bka' yi bstan srung rnams// ti ra bam chen rang gnas gdan khri la// pho nya bka' sdod tshul du bzhugs
98a6(1): su gsol// oM a thA ga ta b+hi ru de ba ga Na sarba ma ha sa ma ya tiSh+Tha/ badz+ra ma ra na hUM/ gnyis su med par mthong gyur nas// de dag sku gsung thugs mnyes phyir// mchod pa chen po bcu gnyis te// dam tshig
98b1(1): las kyi lha yis so// de nas lha phyag 'tshal ba ni// ho bcom ldan kun bzang rigs lnga 'dus pa'i gtso// kun tu bzang mo rgyal ba kun gyi yum// sras 'khor sprul pa khro bo'i tshogs dang bcas// zhi mchog rgyal
98b2(1): paba'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ gsang chen mnyes mdzad dbyings phyug khro mo'i rgyal// sras mchog yab yum khro mo sgo srung bcas// che ba'i yon tan rgyas la phyag 'tshal
98b3(1): lo// rigs lnga khrag 'thung yab yum khro bo che// gnas yul rnam dag ma mo phra men bcas// phrin las rnam bzhi bdud 'dul khro bo bzhi// thugs mchog 'gyur med lha la phyag 'tshal lo// gshin rje 'dul mdzad
98b4(1): sku lnga sbyor sgrol yum// phyogs skyong khro bo yab yum phra men bzhi// tshe dang srog la dbang mdzad gshin rje'i tshogs// sku yi khyad par bstan la phyag 'tshal lo// dbang gi rgyal po khro mo yum dang bcas// sras
98b5(1): mchog sprul pa lcam dral dregs pa'i tshogs// ma lus zil gnon khro rgyal gnyis med yum// las kyi pho nya sprul pa'i sgo ma bzhi// gsung rdzogs dbang gi lha la phyag 'tshal lo// las kyi rgyal po rig lnga gtso mo
98b6(1): yum// khro bo khro mo phra men lcam dral tshogs// sras mchog sprul pa sgo bzhi'i khro mo dang // phrin las bsgrub pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// bla med khrag 'thung nyid bzhi yum chen mo// dbyings dang ye shes las kyi
99a1(1): sman mor bcas// so so'i 'dul byed rigs kyi skur bstan pa// rbod gtong las kyi bdag la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid skye med dgongs pa lhun grub cing // mkhyen rig ye shes thugs rjes
99a2(1): mkha' ltar khyab// 'gro ba'i don rdzogs gnyis med rig pa 'dzin// rgyud kun bdag po mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dregs pa'i tshogs 'dul khro rgyal yab yum gtso// phrin las dbang gis sangs rgyas bstan pa
99a3(1): bsrung // 'jig rten phrin las sgrub pa'i dregs pa can// mchod bstod phrin las sgrub la phyag 'tshal lo// stobs ldan 'jigs byed gnyis med lha mo yum// drag sngags sprul pa sde dpon las kyi lha// phrin las
99a4(1): bka' sdod phyag brnyan gsang ba'i bdag/ gtso 'khor dmod pas bsdigs la phyag 'tshal lo// dus gsum rgyal ba rnams kyi spyan lam du// rab sbrul gzugs bstan gsung gi gnyer blangs shing // dam tshig
99a5(1): dbang gis thugs kyi dgongs pa bsgrub// bka' yi bstan srung rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// a tha ga ta b+hi ru de ba ga Na na mo ban+da naM ka ro mi// de yis rab tu mnyes byas nas// mthun pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa
99a6(1): ni// ma bcos rdzogs pa'i che mchog he ru ka/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis phyag gi dkyil 'khor ni// rgyal ba yab rnams phyag g.yas thabs kyi ngang // kun bzang mthing ga rdo rje dril bu bsnams// snang mdzad dkar po
99b1(1): chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// mi bskyod mthing ga sa gnon rdo rje 'dzin// rin 'byung gser mdog nor bu mchod sbyin mdzad// mtha' yas mdog dmar ting 'dzin pad+ma'i rgya// don grub ljang gu rgya gram skyabs sbyin
99b2(1): phyag/ sa snying dkar po rin chen myu gu bsnams// nam mkha'i snying po mthing ga ral gri bsnams// spyan ras gzigs dbang dkar po pad+ma bsnams// phyag na rdo rje ljang gu rdo rje dril// byams pa dmar skya gar gyi
99b3(1): gun d+he bsnams// kun bzang dkar po rin chen myu gu bsnams// sgrib pa rnam sel sngon po po ti 'dzin// 'jam dpal dkar ldang me tog ut+pal 'dzin// gshin rje gshed po mdog dkar thod dbyug
99b4(1): bsnams// stobs chen sngon po rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams// rta mgrin dmar po thod sbrul pad+ma bsnams// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang gu rgya gram bsnams// lha yi thub pa mdog dkar pi wang bsnams// lha min thub
99b5(1): pa sngon po go cha bsnams// mi yi thub pa gser mdog gseg shang bsnams// sangs rgyas yum rnams phyag g.yon shes rab dang // bya ba'i chos ni mthing ga mnyam gzhag 'phro// kun tu bzang mo mdog dkar
99b6(1): dril bu 'khrol// sangs rgyas spyan ma mthing nag thor tshugs bsnams// gos dkar ma ni mdog ser rin chen bsnams// mA ma kI ni dmar gsal pad+ma 'phyar// dam tshig sgrol ma ljang gu rgya gram bsnams// lA
100a1(1): s+ye dkar mo me long sgeg par 'dzin// mA le sngon mo rin chen phreng ba 'dzin// gir ti dmar mo pi wang rgud 'dren mdzad// ni rti ljang gu gar gyi cod pan phreng // bdug pa'i sprin 'phro dmar ser
100a2(1): spos khang 'dzin// dag pa'i mdangs ldan sngon mo pad+ma 'phro// gsal ba'i 'od ldan dmar mo mar me 'dzin// dag byed ljang gu dung phor dri chab 'thor// ro langs dkar mo 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu bsnams// mi
100a3(1): pham sngon mo rdo rje zhags pa bsnams// ral gcig dmar po rdo rje lcags sgrog bsnams/ khro gnyer ma ni ljang gu dril bu bsnams// byol song thub pa ser po po ti bsnams// yi dwags thub pa dmar po rin chen
100a4(1): sgom// dmyal ba'i thub pa mthing ga me chu bsnams// yab yum gnyis med thabs dang shes rab sbyor// zhi dul phyag rgya'i mchod par bzhes su gsol// gnyis med yum chen gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma// dbu
100a5(1): dgu phyag ni bco brgyad stong pa'i dbyings// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje dril bu bsnams// g.yas kyi 'og ma dbyings kyi ma mo brgyad// g.yon gyi 'og ma yul gyi phra men brgyad// rang rigs rtags kyi phyag rgya
100a6(1): mchod par bzhes// bcom ldan che mchog rak+Sha he ru ka/ smug nag dbu gsum phyag drug dkar dmar zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po 'khor lo b+han dmar bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni ti ra rgyu zhags 'dren// tha ma
100b1(1): gnyis ni khyung chen ba su 'dren// rak+Sha kro d+hi smug nag zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis yab 'khyud 'khor lo dung khrag stob// che mchog gu h+ya he ru ka dpal rje// dbu gsum ser nag mthing dang dmar ba'i
100b2(1): zhal// phyag g.yas rin chen ri rab dgra sta 'phyar// g.yon pas thod khrag stong gsum rgyu zhags sdom// gu h+ya kro d+hi rin chen dung dmar stob// bi shwa he ru dmar nag dbu gsum ni// dbus ma dmar nag g.yas
100b3(1): mthing g.yon dmar zhal// phyag drug dang po pad+ma b+han+da 'phyar// bar ma gnyis na stong gi 'jig rten bsnams// mtha' ma gnyis ni dgra sta thong gshol 'dzin// sa nu kro d+hi pad+ma dung khrag stob// bcom ldan dpal
100b4(1): chen yak+Sha he ru ka/ dbu gsum ldang nag dkar dang dmar pa'i zhal// phyag drug dang po rgya gram b+han+da dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na ral gri zhags pa bsnams// tha ma gnyis na rgyu phreng ti ra bsnams// yak+Sha kro d+hi
100b5(1): rgya gram zod khrag stob// dri za 'dul byed tri shul 'khor lo dkar// me lha 'dul byed me dpal dbyug zo dmar// gshin rje 'dul byed dgra sta zod dbyug mthing // srin po 'dul byed smug nag ral gri
100b6(1): zhags// klu rnams 'dul byed pad+ma spu gri dmar// rlung lha 'dul byed rnga yab b+han+na bsnams// gnod sbyin 'dul byed rgya gram dril bu ljang // bgegs kun 'dul byed dgra sta rtse gsum mthing // lha rnams 'dul
101a1(1): byed sngo skya mda' gzhu 'gengs// sa bdag 'dul byed dud kha zod pa zhags// ya man+ta kreta dkar po lcags kyu bsnams// pra dz+nyAn+ta krita ser po zhags pa bsnams// pad+mAn+ta kr-ita dmar po lcags
101a2(1): sgrog bsnams// big+h+nAM ta kr-ita ljang gu ral gri bsnams// dus gsum sangs rgyas yon tan 'dus pa'i tshogs// rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// shar gyi phyogs nas dkyil 'khor gtso bo'i
101a3(1): bdag/ bcom ldan khrag 'thung badz+ra he ru ka/ dbu gsum mthing nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rdo rje kha T+wAM rnge'u chung g.yas// ti ra'i dbyug pa dung dmar rgyu zhags g.yon// kro d+hi shwa rI kha T+wAM thod
101a4(1): khrag stob// bcom ldan dpal chen bud+d+ha he ru ka/ dbu gsum spug nag mthing dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rdo rje khyung chen ti ra g.yas// rgyu zhags b+han dmar ti ra ba su g.yon// bud+d+ha kro d+hi zod khrag kha T+Ta
101a5(1): 'dzin// bcom ldan dpal chen rat+na he ru ka/ dbu gsum ser nag mthing ga dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rin chen byis dbyug dgra sta g.yas// stong gi 'jig rten b+han dmar rgyu zhags g.yon// rat+na kro d+hi
101a6(1): rin chen dung dmar stob// bcom ldan khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka/ dbu gsum dmar nag mthing ga dkar ba'i zhal// phyag drug pad+ma be con dgra sta g.yas// ri rab b+han dmar thong gshol g.yon na
101b1(1): bsnams// pad+ma kro d+hi pad+ma thod khrag stob// bcom ldan khrag 'thung karma he ru ka/ dbu gsum ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rgya gram ral gri dgra sta g.yas// stong gsum 'jig rten par ma thong
101b2(1): gshol g.yon// karma kro d+hi rgya gram thod khrag stob// go rI mthing ga b+han dmar byis rgyu 'dren// tsau rI ser mo thabs kyi mda' gzhu 'gengs// pra mo dmar mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'phyar// be tA nag mo ro za rdo rje
101b3(1): 'phyar// puk+ka dmar ser bus pa'i ba su 'dren// g+hasma ljang gu dung khrag dkrug cing 'thung // sme sha mthing nag bus pa'i snying 'byin za// tsaN+Da ser skya ti ra mgo lus 'bral// sid+ha ser mo zhing za seng ge'i
101b4(1): mgo/ bya g+h+ri dmar mo stag mgo lag gnyis bsnol// sri la nag mo byig ldag wa yi mgo/ shwa na mthing ga sha 'drad sbrang ki'i mgo/ gr-i d+ha dmar mo dung gi bya rgod mgo/ kang ka dmar smug zhing khur dur bya'i
101b5(1): mgo/ ka ka nag mo b+han gri bya rog mgo/ u lu mthing nag lcags kyu 'ug pa'i mgo/ rta gdong dkar mo 'gugs byed lcags kyu 'dzin// phag gdong nag mo 'ching byed mche zhags sdom// sbrel gdong dmar mo
101b6(1): sdom byed lcags sgrog 'ching // sbrang gdong ljang gu gnyis byed dril bu 'khrol// thams cad thugs 'dus bde chen lha yi tshogs// rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor lha
102a1(1): rnams 'dus pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen khro rgyal gshin rje'i gshed// mthing nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus na
102a2(1): gzhal// phyag drug be con ral gri dgra sta g.yas// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub mdung thung b+han dmar 'dzin// be tA nag mo dgra sta dung dmar stob// ral gcig sngon nag tri shul g.yang gzhi 'phyar// sras mchog
102a3(1): ya ma rA dza gshin rje gshed// dbu gsum mthing nag g.yas dkar g.yon dmar zhal// phyag drug 'khor lo ral gri lcags kyu g.yas/ kha T+wAM dgra sta rgyu ma'i zhags pa g.yon// g.yu yi ral gcig nag mo dung
102a4(1): dmar stob// lha mo dpal 'bar ral gri ne'u le 'dzin// sras mchog myos byed 'bar ba gshin rje'i gshed// dbu gsum g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ser nag/ phyag drug be con ral gri dgra sta
102a5(1): g.yas// g.yon pa b+han dmar 'khor lo lcags kyu bsnams// gtum mo dug hrul ser nag b+han dmar stob/ khrag gi bdag mo spu gri tsit+ta 'dzin// sras mchog gshin rje gshed po me ru tse// dbu gsum g.yas
102a6(1): dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug be con dbyug to kha T+wAM g.yas// b+han dmar 'khor lo rgyu ma'i zhags pa g.yon// lha mo 'od zer dmar mo dung dmar stob// gling bzhi gtsug 'byams snying dang b+han+da
102b1(1): stob// sras mchog ral pa tshar dgu gshin rje'i gshed// ljang nag g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus ljang zhal// phyag drug be con gtun shing dgra sta g.yas// b+han dmar rgyu zhags 'khor lo g.yon na
102b2(1): bsnams// bdud 'dul nag mo khram shing b+han+da g.yon// srin mo mgo 'phyang dung khrag dgra sta 'phyar// nag 'joms mthing nag rdo rje dgra sta bsnams// nag mo ral gcig yab 'khyud dung dmar stob// phya
102b3(1): sangs dkar po bum pa rdo rje gshol// shel gyi gdong dgu yab 'khyud zangs gri thogs// brag 'joms dkar ser brag dang 'khor lo 'dzin// shel mig khro mo lcags kyu dung dmar stob// glang mgo smug nag
102b4(1): kha T+wAM lcags kyu bsnams// dkar skya mche gcig skar mda' dung dmar stob// yab ti sngo nag ral gri lcags kyu 'dzin// dred kyi a bsham khram shing b+han+d+ha thogs// mig dmar smug nag ral gri dbyug pa g.yas//
102b5(1): khrag gi ral gcig g.yas g.yon dung dmar stob// sdig pa dud kha lcags sgrog phreng ba bsnams// klu mo pus 'gro gtso la dung dmar stob// tel pa sngo nag s+tha gri rak+ta 'dzin// spyan gsum mche gtsigs b+har+tha
102b6(1): rak+ta stob// bdud 'joms smug nag tho ba b+han dmar bsnams// smug nag ral cig yab la dung khrag stob// chos rgyal dkar ser rdo rje khram nag 'dzin// rdo rje ral gcig zhags pa dung dmar stob// 'bar
103a1(1): ba dmar po ces byang gtun shing 'dzin// dmar mo mgo dgu tri shul b+han dmar stob// thod dbyug mthing nag zhing dbyug sho rde'u bsnams// nag mo phag mgo zhags pa zod khrag stob/ dung gi
103a2(1): rgod mgo rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// nag mo stag mgo rin chen zhags pa 'dzin// kang ka dmar po pad+ma lcags sgrog 'dzin// ljang nag spyang mgo rgya gram dril bu 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa sku mchog 'dus
103a3(1): pa'i gtso// rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// nub phyogs dkyil 'khor lha rnams 'dus pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen rta mgrin rgyal po'i sku// dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi
103a4(1): bgrad// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje kha T+wAM sbrul zhags g.yas// dril bu b+han dmar lcags sgrog g.yon na bsnams// e ka dza Ti kha T+wAM dung khrag stob// sprul pa phra
103a5(1): men las kyi rgyal po gnyis// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog dmar nag 'bar// phyag gnyis so sor rdo rje thod phrag dang // rdo rje ri rab phur pa 'dzin zhing 'dril// dpal chen sprul pa'i zil gnon khro bo
103a6(1): brgyad// dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo rta skad thengs gsum 'byin// zhi ba'i lha rnams zil gnon rta mgrin ni// phyag drug 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen g.yas// pad+ma ral
103b1(1): gri dril bu g.yon na bsnams// brkyang bskum zhabs kyis zhi ba rigs lnga gnon// mi pham khro mo sku la dgyes par 'khril// las kyi khro bo zil gnon khro bcu gnon// phyag drug pad+ma dbyug tho spu gri g.yas/ kha T+wAM
103b2(1): dgra sta rgya gram g.yon na bsnams/ khro gnyer dmar mo sku la dgyes par 'khril// ma mo zil gnon dbyings kyi yum drug gnon// phyag drug sdigs mdzub lcags kyu 'phrul zhags g.yas// lcags sgrog rnga chung kha
103b3(1): TaM g.yon na bsnams// ro langs dmar mo sku la dgyes par 'khril// khyung rnams zil gnon rigs lnga khyung chen bsnams// phyag drug rdo rje sa dang me khyung g.yas// nam mkha' chu rlung bya khyung g.yon na
103b4(1): bsnams// spyan gcig dmar mo sku la dgyes par 'khril// pho rgyud zil gnon dregs pa'i lha brgyad gnon// phyag drug rdo rje thod khrag rgyu zhags g.yas// dung khrag thod rlon zhing dbyug g.yon na bsnams// rdo
103b5(1): rje las byed dmar mo sku la 'khril// mi rgyud zil gnon ma bdun sring bzhi gnon// phyag drug rdo rje ral gri mda' ni g.yas// zhags pa sdigs mdzub gzhu ni g.yon na bsnams// gshin rje las byed dmar mo
103b6(1): sku la 'khril// klu rnams zil gnon gdug pa'i sbrul brgyad gnon// phyag drug sbrul dkar ser dmar g.yas na bsnams// sbrul khra sbrul ljang nag po g.yon na bsnams// klu mo las byed dmar mo sku la
104a1(1): 'khril// gza' rnams zil gnon nyi zla gza' brgyad gnon// phyag drug rdo rje zhags pa ral gri g.yas// dung khrag seng sdeng dbyug pa khyung nag g.yon// gnod sbyin las byed dmar mo sku la
104a2(1): 'khril// yum chen rnams ni kha T+wAM thod khrag stob// sgo bzhi'i pho nya dkar ser dmar ldang mdog/ lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril bu 'dzin// dus gsum bde gshegs gsung gi dbang phyug tshogs// rang
104a3(1): rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa zhes su gsol// byang phyogs dkyil 'khor lha rnams 'dus pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu'i sku// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sku mdog mthing // dbu gsum
104a4(1): g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal/ g.yas pa rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga bsnams// g.yon pa kha T+wAM me dpung 'bar ba bsnams// tha ma gnyis ni ri rab phur pa 'dril// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs kha T+wAM thod
104a5(1): khrag stob// sangs rgyas sras mchog bud+d+ha kI la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dkar zhal// phyag drug dang po rdo rje dgra sta bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni ral gri zhags pa 'dzin// sras mchog
104a6(1): rin chen rat+na kI la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// phyag drug dang po be con dgra sta bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni rin chen ral gri bsnams// dbang gi sras mchog pad+ma kI la
104b1(1): ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ser dbus dmar zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po ral gri mdung thung bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni mda' gzhu 'gengs shing 'phen// phrin las sras mchog karma kI la
104b2(1): ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ldang zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po mdung dang gri khug bsnams// bar ma gnyis na lcags kyur ral gri 'dzin// kun kyang tha ma ri rab phur pa 'dril// sku smad
104b3(1): gser dngul zangs lcags phur pa ni// gru gsum 'bar ba e yi gdan la bzhugs// hUM chen sngo skya ser dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis ni mda' gzhu
104b4(1): 'gengs shing 'phen// rdo rje sgra 'byin be con thod khrag stob// yab yum sprul pa phag dang smrig bu'i mgo/ rnam rgyal dkar po sngo dang ljang ser zhal// bar ma phyag gnyis 'khor lo tri shul bsnams// rdo rje snyems
104b5(1): ma ral gri b+ha na dmar stob// yab yum sprul pa stag dang bya rgod mgo/ dbyug pa sngon po dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis me dpal dbyug pa bsnams// rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu b+han dmar
104b6(1): stob// yab yum sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo/ gshin rje gshed po sngo skra ljang sngon zhal// g.yas g.yon bar ma thod dbyug dgra sta bsnams// dur khrod bdag mo thod dbyug dung dmar stob// yab yum sprul
105a1(1): pa sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo/ mi g.yo mgon ni ljang sngon spug nag zhal// bar pa'i phyag gnyis ral gri zhags pa bsnams// rdo rje gtun khung tho ba dung khrag stob// yab yum sprul pa gzig dang kha ta'i
105a2(1): mgo/ rta mgrin dmar po dkar dang sngo ba'i zhal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis spu gri zhags pa thogs// rdo rje gtum mo spu gri dung khrag stob// yab yum sprul pa byi la pu shud mgo/ 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar nag ljang
105a3(1): gu'i zhal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis rnga yab bsnams// rdo rje mda' snyems tho ba dung khrag stob// yab yum sprul pa sbrang ki khra yi mgo/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag dkar dmar zhal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis rgya
105a4(1): gram dril bu bsnams// rdo rje rlung 'byin dgra sta dung khrag stob// yab yum sprul pa seng ge pha wang mgo khams gsum rnam rgyal mthing dkar dmar ba'i zhal// bar ma'i phyag gnyis rdo rje sbrul zhags
105a5(1): bsnams// rdo rje skul byed gri gug dung khrag stob// yab yum sprul pa dam tsha dom dang sre mo'i mgo/ stobs chen dud kha mthing nag ljang gu'i zhal// bar ma gnyis na tho ba zhags pa bsnams// rdo rje skyod byed rtse
105a6(1): gsum thod khrag stob// yab yum sprul pa dred dang byi ba'i mgo/ khro bcu rnams kyi phyag gnyis dang po yis// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa dung khrag dkrugs// tha ma'i phyag gnyis ri rab phur pa 'dril// thugs kyi
105b1(1): sras mchog phra men khra thabs tshogs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rang gi mtshan ma dang // rdo rje ri rab phur pa 'dril zhing 'debs// sgo bzhi bsrung mdzad phra men sgo ma bzhi// pu shud mgo can dkar mo lcags
105b2(1): kyuklu thogs// skye ka'i mgo can ser mo zhags pa 'dzin// srin bya'i mgo can dmar mo lcags sgrog 'dzin/ khra yi mgo can ljang gu dril bu 'dzin// dus gsum bde gshegs phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// rang rig
105b3(1): phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// shar lho'i dkyil 'khor bde bar gshegs pa'i gtso// bcom ldan mngon rdzogs bla med he ru ka/ dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus mthing zhal// phyag drug rdo rje
105b4(1): sbrul khyung sbrul zhags g.yas// b+han+d+ha zhing lpags ga'u g.yon na bsnams// kun tu bzang mo nyid bzhi mkha' bzhi'i klong // dbu gcig zhal lnga phyag drug phyag mtshan ni// rdo rje dril zhags bdud rtsi g.yas na
105b5(1): bsdams// dril bu b+han+d+ha g.yang gzhi g.yon na bsnams// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro seng gdong rnam snang gsal// phyag drug dang po rdo rje b+han+dar ldan// bar ma gnyis kyis dgra sta gtun shing brdeg/ za ma'i phyag
105b6(1): gis seng ge mchog chen bstod// lho yi mkha' 'gro 'od gsal ba lang gdong // phyag drug dang po rin chen b+han+dar ldan// bar ma gnyis na me dpal dbyug zo bsnams// tha ma'i phyag gis stag mo zhing phran
106a1(1): bstod// nub phyogs mkha' 'gro mnyen gsal sud ka'i gdong // phyag drug dang po pad+ma b+han+d+har ldan// bar ma gnyis na zhags pa tri shul bsnams// tha ma'i phyag gis ce sbyang zhing chung
106a2(1): bstod// byang phyogs mkha' 'gro khyung gdong yang gsal g.yos// phyag drug dang po rgya gram b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar ma gnyis na dbyug tho rgyu phreng 'dzin// tha ma'i phyag gis sbyang ki zhing chung bstod// nam mkha'i
106a3(1): mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal rdo rje'i mchu// phyag drug dang po 'khor lo b+han+dar ldan// bar ma gnyis na rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin// tha ma gnyis kyi 'ug pa zhing chung bstod// dbyings kyi yum chen rtag pa'i rgyal mo
106a4(1): lnga// dbu gsum zhabs bzhi rang rigs sku mdog gsal// srid pa bde 'gro dbu gsum sku mdog mthing // phyag drug dang po 'khor lo rin po che// bar ma g.yang gzhi b+han+da dmar gyis bkang // tha ma gnyis ni
106a5(1): tshe bum lcags kyu 'dzin// nyi zla zod phreng mdog dkar 'ja' 'od gsal// phyag gnyis zangs lcags snying phreng zhags pa 'phen// nyi ma khros ma mdog dkar skra gri 'dzin/ khrag 'thung khros ma sngon mo thod khrag
106a6(1): 'dzin// bdud rtsi khros ma dmar mo bum pa bsnams// bde sbyor khros ma ljang nag ti ra 'phyar// srid pa'i rgyan byed dkar mo skra zhags 'dzin// sngon mo dbyings phyug zhing gi dbyug pa thogs// bdag nyid dmar
106b1(1): mo rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'phen// gcig spyod ser mo zhing lpags g.yang gzhi brdebs// dkar mo mig gcig b+han+da zlum po thogs// nag mo mche gtsigs b+han+na ser po thogs// dmar mo dbang sdud b+han+da lcang lo
106b2(1): 'phyang // ser mo las mkhan thod pa rgya gram thogs// srid pa chags byed mthing nag mi snying bsnams// srid pa cha snyoms dmar mo thod khrag 'dzin// 'dod khams gtso mo sngon mo khram shing bsnams// ral
106b3(1): gcig dmar mo kha T+wAM mi ro 'dzin// gling bzhi spyi phud dkar gsal lcags kyu thogs// rin chen srid 'degs sngon mo ga'u 'dzin// pad+ma gar dbang le brgan thod khrag thogs// rdo rje gar dbang ser mo b+han+da
106b4(1): 'dzin// har ting dkar mo me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun ting nag mo yi dkyil 'khor thogs// shan+ting dmar mo chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo klung gi dkyil 'khor thogs// srin mo skam mo
106b5(1): dkar mo shel phur thogs// srin mo phor thogs sngon mo zod khrag 'dzin// srin mo g.yang gzhi zod sbram b+han+da 'dzin// srin mo za ba dmar mo zhing lpags brdebs// srin mo gsod byed ser mo lcags
106b6(1): k+Shu thogs// srin mo dmar ser thod phrag zhags pa 'dzin// srin mo snom byed sngon mo lcang lo 'phyar// dkar mo mche gtsigs thod pa dkar po thogs// nag mo kha 'byams b+han+tha[:]sngon
107a1(1): mo thogs// dmar mo mchu 'jibs b+han+d+ha dmar mo thogs// ser mo las mkhan b+han+da ser po 'dzin// lha yi sring mo dkar mo rdo rje bsnams// gshin rje'i sring mo sngon mo thod dbyug thogs// klu yi
107a2(1): sring mo dmar mo sbrul zhags thogs// gnod sbyin sring mo ser nag ne'u le 'dzin// bde bar gshegs pa rbod gtong 'dus pa'i bdag/ rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// nub byang dkyil 'khor
107a3(1): 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul ni// dbug gsum phyag drug kham nag smug mthing zhal// dang po'i phyag gnyis rdo rje dung khrag dkrugs// g.yas g.yon phyag bzhis lha
107a4(1): brgyad klu brgyad mgo khams gsum spyi 'dul phyag g.yas rdo rje 'khyud// phyag g.yon dung khrag gtso bo'i zhal du stob// lha chen mthing nag gri gug tsit+ta g.yon// btsun mo u ma rtse gsum thod khrag
107a5(1): bsnams// seng ge glang chen gshibs pa'i khri la bzhugs// ya ma rA dza mdog nag be con g.yas// g.yon na thod dbyug ma he chu glang bcibs// sgrol byed nag mo srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// bdud po skos rje
107a6(1): mthing nag khram shing g.yas// g.yon na dgra sta bdud rta nag po bcibs// nag mo re ti khram shing nad rkyal bsnams// drel rta dmar mo rkang gsum chibs su bcibs// nag po glog phreng glog gi phreng ba
107b1(1): 'dzin// sbal mgo khrag mig khrag phor zhal du 'dzin// yab yum gnyis med 'brug dang rnga mo bcibs// yak+ka me dpal mthing nag rin chen bsnams// g.yon na mtshon thogs stag seng rngam pa bcibs// mon
107b2(1): mo nag mo phyag g.yas spu gri bsnams// g.yon na sbrang ki'i lcags kyi phag mo bcibs// srid pa'i rgyal mo mdog dkar 'khor lo g.yas// g.yon na me long 'brug mo sgra chen bcibs// e ka tsa tI smug mthing
107b3(1): tsit+ta g.yas// g.yon na g.yu spyang dre'u rta nag po bcibs// nag mo mgyogs byed g.yas na mtshon drub bsnams// g.yon na nad rkyal so bya nag po bcibs// rdo rje bdud 'dul mthing nag khrag thun
107b4(1): g.yas// g.yon na mdung zung dre'u rta nag po bcibs// srog zan dmar po bse mdung dmar po g.yas// g.yon na mda' gzhu chibs su rta dmar bcibs// skyes bu dmar 'bar shang lang g.yas na
107b5(1): bsnams// g.yon na zangs zhags chibs su rta dmar bcibs// bgegs kyi rgyal po mthing nag kha T+wAM g.yas// g.yon na zod khrag chibs su rta nag bcibs// kA la nag po phyag g.yas rtse gsum
107b6(1): bsnams// g.yon na thod khrag chibs su rtsal chen bcibs// dmu bdud nag po g.yas na shang langs bsnams// g.yon na mda' gzhu dmu rta mchod rgod bcibs// gang ba bzang po dkar po ba dan
108a1(1): g.yas// g.yon na shel gyi gnam ru dkar po bcibs// spyi bdud rgyal po mdog dkar ru mtshon g.yas// g.yon na ral gri rdo rta gro bo bcibs// gnam mthil dkar po g.yas na dar dkar
108a2(1): bsnams// g.yon na ral gri chibs su rta dkar bcibs// tshangs pa dkar po g.yas na nyi zer bsnams// g.yon pa spu gri seng ge dkar mo bcibs// rdo rje chung rgyal dkar po bdud zhags g.yas// g.yon na
108a3(1): spu gri ba glang sna ring bcibs// skyes bu sku lha mdog dkar rdo rje g.yas// g.yon na ru mtshon tsa ra khams pa bcibs// legs ldan nag po gri gug g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na beng chen bdud rta nag po
108a4(1): bcibs// gza' bdud rgyal po mdog nag sku smad sbrul// phyag g.yas mda' gzhu g.yon na sbrul zhags bsnams// thog gi bu yug dmar skya thog ser 'phen// yab yum gnyis med 'brug chen yid mgyogs
108a5(1): bcibs// klu mdud nag po sbrul zhags nad rkyal bsnams// sku smad sbrul gyi chu srin sngon po bcibs// yak+ka nag mo nad rgyal dug thun bsnams// sku smad sbrul 'khyil rus sbal nag po mnan// 'jig rten
108a6(1): las byed dreg pa can gyi tshogs// rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// byang shar dkyil 'khor drag sngags lha yi tshogs// bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug mthing
108b1(1): nag drag po'i zhal// phyag drug dang po rdo rje dung khrag dkrugs// 'og ma'i phyag bzhis lha klu tsit+ta bsnams// 'byung lnga'i bdag mo zhal gcig sku mdog mthing // g.yas g.yon phyag gis mkha' 'degs sa gzhi
108b2(1): mnan// 'chi bdag mthing nag thod pa gri gug bsnams// btsun mo nag mo gtso chen yab kyi tshul// bdud mo nag po kha rlangs tri shul g.yas// nag mo khrag 'dzag khram bam thod rlon bsnams// gsod byed
108b3(1): nag po ral gri thod khrag g.yon// sring mo nag mo gri gug mi mgo bsnams// gnod sbyin sngo nag ral gri ru mtshon bsnams// ral gcig sngon mo zhing lpags dar nag bsnams// lha chen dkar po b+han+d+ha shel gri
108b4(1): bsnams// thar pa nag po mchod gtor mthun gtor bsnams// rje btsan nag po dar nag zhags pa bsnams// yak+Sha nag po kha T+wAM gri gug bsnams// har mdzes dkar po shel gri dar dkar bsnams// yam
108b5(1): shud dmar po mdung dmar ral gri bsnams// rdo rje mdzes pa dmar po ru mtshon 'phyar// pho nya lag dgu mdog ser sprul pa 'gyed/ khyab 'jug nag po khram shing dgra sta bsnams// gzhon nu gtum po bum pa
108b6(1): sa sgal 'dzin// sngags kyi bdag po dregs pa bco brgyad rnams// kun kyang zhing lpags rlon pa'i na bza' gsol// zhabs gnyis dgra dang bgegs kyi snying la gzer// dmod pa'i mtshon chang lha yi tshogs
109a1(1): chen bsnams// rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// lho nub dkyil 'khor rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// grub pa chen po brgyad la dbang bskur zhing // mthun 'jug theg pa rab ston byang
109a2(1): chub sems// phyag rgya che dang lhun gyis grub pa dang // rnam par smin dang tshe la dbang ba dang // man ngag lung ston shes rab rgyun spel zhing / dam tshig dbang bskur nyams pa bskang mdzad pa'i// rgyal tshab rig
109a3(1): 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rang rig phyag rgya'i mchod pa bzhes su gsol// 'di dag rang gi phyag rgya ste// dang po mchod pa chen po yis// gnyis pa rab tu bstod pa ste// yon tan rtags bcas tshig
109a4(1): gis mnyes// gsum pa 'dod pa'i yon tan tshogs// gzugs sgra dri ro reg chos so// bzhi pa nyon mongs lnga nyid de// lnga pa sgrol ba skye 'chi med// drug pa 'bral med sbyor ba ste// bdun pa dug gsum phung pos
109a5(1): mchod// brgyad pa dug lnga sman yin te// dgu pa rmad byung mchod pa che// bcu pa dam tshig bdud rtsi'o// bcu gcig pa ni zhal zas tshogs// bcu gnyis gtsang sbyor lhag ma ste// 'di dag gis ni nga
109a6(1): dang bcas// dus gsum rgyal ba kun mnyes 'gyur// de yis bsgrub par bya ba dag/ kun gyi mthar phyir yon tan tshogs// ma lus skyed byed 'di yin no// kye ma dpal ldan he ru ka/ dpal chen nga yi dgongs
109b1(1): chen po// rigs brgyad dgu yis rab mdzes pa'i// rten 'gyur gcig gis sgrub pa la// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las rbod gtong sgrub mchod dang // dmod pa drag shul bstan bya rnams// zhi
109b2(1): da rig pa 'dzin dang bcas// zhi dang khro dang thun mong bcas// pho nya las kyi byed pa dag/ nga yis bshad pa gang yin pa// ma 'ongs dus na brtse ldan pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// phyi dang nang
109b3(1): dang sbas dang gsang // thun mong khyad par bye brag rnams// gang gis bsngags pa rnams la ston// zhes bka' stsal to// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu 'byed pa las/ lha nges par
109b4(1): dbyung zhing bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas he ru ka rigs lnga la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po khyod kyi
109b5(1): sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las kyi khyad par dang / rbod gtong dang pho nya dang dmod pa la sogs pa khro bo khro mo drag shul spyod pa'i las/ nges par bzung ba 'di dag bstan pa dang bshad pa
109b6(1): dang brjod pa'i yul ni gang / dus ni ji tsam zhig na lags/ tshul ni ji lta bu/ yon tan ni ci zhig yod pa lags/ bdag cag gi the tshom bcad du gsol// zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan
110a1(1): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kye ma he ru ka yi tshogs// 'khor dang bcas pa kun nyon cig/ phyi ma'i dus na nga yi sku// sprul pa thun mong snang ba 'di/ chos sku mnyam pa nyid gyur tshe// thos pa dang ni
110a2(1): rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu rnams kyi yid la gnas// rin chen dgu yi sprul pa'i gzugs// 'jam dbyangs lha dang bcas pa yis// legs bkod nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ston// kun tu bzang pos nyer snang
110a3(1): zhing // 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs bcas kyis// dpal ldan mkha' 'gro'i gnas dag tu// gsang ba'i rgya yis btab byas pa// lo ni brgya dang nyi shu nas// kun bzang dgongs pa skong byed pa// rig pa 'dzin/
110a4(1): pa rnams la snang // yan lag phyogs bcur rgyas par byed// rdo rje gsang ba'i myu gu yis/ khyad par bsam gyis mi khyab pa// gdul bar bya ba rnams la ston// mtha' 'khob sham+b+ha la zhes par// de yi gtso gyur
110a5(1): 'jig rten mgon// shwa ra b+ha gi lha yi bu// rnam sprul bkod pa mchod dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' rig pa 'dzin// dbang bsgyur yongs rdzogs der 'byung gis/ khyod rnams bshung bar ma byed cig/ ces
110a6(1): bka' stsal nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka yum dang gnyis su med pa sku'i zhing bkod pa dang bcas pa chos kyi dbyings su thim par gyur to// 'khor 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das
110b1(1): nyid kyi gsung rjes su bsgrub cing thugs zhi ba chos kyi skur mthong bar gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon par bstod do// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgyud rab tu
110b2(1): 'byed pa las/ phyi ma nges par 'byung ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // khro bo chen po mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i yid bzhin gyi yon tan chen po nges par bstan pa'i skabs te gnyis
110b3(1): pa rdzogs so// // bde bar gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i rgud rab tu 'byed pa'i lde mig lta bur bshad pa rdzogs so// // zhi ba la le'u bcu/ khro bo la bdun te bcu bdun yod pa/ rgya
110b4(1): gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya//
110b5(1): rgya gar skad du sarba ta thA ga ta shan+ta sa mA dza mU la ma hA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba thams cad 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag
110b6(1): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes rang byung gi rgyal po de nyid/ gsang ba ma bcos pa'i thig le chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngang la
111a1(1): mnal te bzhugs so// de nas dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mo de nyid/ rtsa ba byang chub sems kyi 'gro ba thams cad thugs rje'i chus brlan par mdzad de/ dpal kun tu bzang po la thugs rje'i
111a2(1): rol pa tshad med pa zhes bya ba'i glus bskul to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chos nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis ngang la mnal ba la// byams pa chen po'i thugs rjes sad par mdzad de/ yul
111a3(1): sems can la rab tu dmigs pa dang lam la dmigs pa dang / kun tu dmigs pa med pa dang / stong pa chen po las rab tu skyes pa'i rtsal ma 'gag pa las/ byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa/ brjod pa thams
111a4(1): cad las 'das pa chos kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i yi ge a zhes bya ba'i rang bzhin du gyur nas// skye ba med pa las sgra 'di byung ngo // e ma ho/ chos nyid gdal ba'i klong // e ma ho snying rje rgyun chad med// e
111a5(1): ma ho gsal ba'i yig 'brur shar// e ma ho yon tan dpag tu med// e yaM baM laM raM b+h+rUM/ 'di ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// ye nas ma bcos rdzogs sangs rgyas// snod bcud rnam rtog gis brtag pa// rgyal
111a6(1): bapaba'i dkyil 'khor phyag rgya che// nam mkha' rlung chu sa dang me// gdod nas rnam dag yum lnga'i mkha'// ngo mtshar gzhal med sna tshogs dang // dag pa'i ye shes gzhal med khang // gdan khri 'od kyi snang ba
111b1(1): rnams// zhi ba rol pa'i gdan mchog ste// dag pa chen po'i 'jig rten las// ma dag pa ni yod ma yin// ma rig 'khrul pa'i bag chags las// ma dag pa yi khams su snang // yum lnga'i mkha' klong dag pa
111b2(1): las// ye shes 'byung chen rnam lnga ste// ye shes lnga las gzhal yas 'od/ rtog pa can gyis shes par bya// zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung ba dang // snang grags kyi dngos po thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i skur ma bcos
111b3(1): par lhun gyis grub par bstan pa'i phyir// 'di ltar snod du snang ba thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams su byin gyis brlabs so// de yang 'byung ba rnam par dag pa nam mkha' yongs su dngas pa ni//
111b4(1): chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i mkha' klong / ye shes chen po'i nam mkhar lhun gyis grub par bstan to// de bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni sgrol ma'i mkha' klong rnam
111b5(1): par dag par bstan to// chu'i dkyil 'khor ni mA ma kI'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'o// sa'i dkyil 'khor ni spyan ma'i mkha' klong rnam par dag pa'o// me'i dkyil 'khor ni gos dkar mo'i mkha' klong rnam
111b6(1): par dag pa'o// 'di ltar nang gi gzhal med khang rnam par dag pa gdan dang bcas pa ni// yum thams cad kyi mkha' klong rnam par dag pa ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin 'dus pa ni/ lha'i gzhal yas 'jig rten
112a1(1): pa'i yon tan las 'das pa ste/ shar phyogs ni shel gyi rang bzhin las grub pa/ lho phyogs ni gser gyi rang bzhin las grub pa/ nub phyogs ni pad+ma rA ga'i rang bzhin las grub pa/ byang phyogs
112a2(1): ni in+d+ra nI la'i rang bzhin las grub pa/ dbus kyi cha ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin las grub pa'i ye shes kyi sa gzhi yongs su dag pa'o// de'i brtsigs par snang ba yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin// thams
112a3(1): cad kyi rang bzhin mu tig dang / shel dang / gser dang / pad+ma rA ga dang // in+d+ra nI la'i 'od du 'phros// 'od zer gyi snang bas rab tu brtsigs pa'i gzhal yas khang / rdo rje'i 'khor los spras pa/ gru chad glo
112a4(1): 'bur du bcas pa/ khyams dang sgo'i g.yas g.yon rdo rje'i ka bas brgyan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rgyan gyis spras pa/ dril bu dang zar tshags dang / rin po che pha gu'i brtsigs pa/ dar gyi lnga ldis brgyan pa/
112a5(1): yid las byung ba'i mchod pa chen po dang rig pa'i lha mo rnams kyis mchod pa 'bul te/ rta babs kyi rgyan chen po bzhi dang bcas pa/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin las grub pa/ rdo rje'i thog phub pa/ zag pa med pa'i
112a6(1): phib chen pos btibs shing yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i tog 'bar ba dang bcas par byin gyis rlabs so// de nas 'jig rten pa'i gdan khri'i rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir pho brang gi dbus su saM las seng ge'i
112b1(1): gdan dang / shar du haM las glang po che'i gdan dang / lhor g+haM las rta'i gdan dang / nub tu maM las rma bya'i gdan dang / byang du khaM las shang shang gi gdan dang / de dag gi steng rnams dang / phyogs dang mtshams
112b2(1): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snam bu dang gra rnams su/ skyon rnam par dag pa'i rtags su paM las pad+ma'i gdan dang / nyon mongs pa'i mun pa sel ba'i rtags su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan dang / thugs rje chen pos
112b3(1): rjes su bsil bar mdzad pa'i rtags su zla ba'i gdan rnams bkod cing sprul te byin gyis rlabs so// de nas dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// chos dbyings rnam dag ye nas
112b4(1): rdzogs pa las// 'gro ba'i don phyir cho 'phrul skur bstan pa/ 'jig rten snod kyi rnam par rtog pa kun// ye nas dag pa'i gzhal med khang chen te// ma bcos lhun rdzogs lha rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam
112b5(1): dag gdan dang bcas pa ngang gis gsal// che ba'i tshe mchog dpal chen kun tu bzang // gnyis med rol pa lha yi cho 'phrul ston// snang srid chos la skyon med gzhal yas nyid// rang byung chen po'i zhing khams
112b6(1): dag pa 'dir// bcud kyi sems can mnyam nyid rdzogs pa'i sku// gzugs sku zhi ba'i rol pas gang bar mdzad/ ces gsungs so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ snod kyi 'jig rten rnam par dag pa gzhal
113a1(1): yas khang bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzugs brnyan gyi rol pa rnam par dag pa ma 'gag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
113a2(1): snyoms par bzhugs so// de nas de ma thag tu snying rje chen po skye ba med pa las byung ba'i yi ge a de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su seng ge'i khri gdan dang bcas pa'i steng du babs par gyur to// de'i 'od
113a3(1): zer gyi rnam pa las gzugs kyi sku dpag tu med pa spros te/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par song nas/ 'gro ba thams cad dag pa'i sa la bkod ste/ de yang kha cig tu ni chos kyi skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad
113a4(1): do// kha cig tu ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad do/ kha cig tu ni sprul pa'i skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// la la ni byang chub sems dpa'i skus 'gro ba'i don mdzad do// de bzhin du kha cig tu
113a5(1): ni 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / kha cig tu ni bram ze dang / kha cig tu ni khyim bdag dang / kha cig tu ni tshong dpon dang / kha gcig tu ni dmag dpon dang / kha cig tu ni skyes pa dang // bud med dang sdig
113a6(1): to can dang / byol song la sogs pa'i gzugs kyi gshegs nas/ sems can kyi khams ma lus par zad par mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la sku gsung thugs la mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'phul te slar
113b1(1): rang gi sa bon a la 'dus pas/ rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa'i bdag nyid du gyur te/ slar yang rdo rje de nyid las gzugs kyi sku'i 'od zer gyi rang bzhin can snga ma bzhin du spros zhing 'dus pa las/ bcom ldan
113b2(1): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin/ phyag g.yas kyis rdo rje rtse lnga pa thugs kar bzung ba/ g.yon pas dril bu dku la bsten pa/ mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang
113b3(1): po brgyad cus rab tu brgyan cing 'od 'dom gang ba dang bcas pa/ phyogs skyong ba brgyad kyi gzhal yas khang gi phyi rol du dad cing lhags te bskor bas mdun gyis bltas pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes kyi bde ba
113b4(1): de'i bdag nyid la dmigs pa dang ma bral ba/ thugs rje byams pa'i stobs mnyen zhing lkugs pa/ gzhan yang sku'i cha lugs tshul mdzes pa dgu dang bcas par bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
113b5(1): dpal kun tu bzang pos rigs kyi phung po lnga yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te// nyid kyi thugs ka'i dbus kyi mdun las hUM mthing ga 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa dang
113b6(1): bcas pa phyung ste/ hUM mthing ga de las bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thugs ka nas hA oM swA hrI ha zhes 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs dang bcas pa byung ste// hUM mthing nag las bcom ldan 'das/ sogs kyang byung / rdo rje sems dpa' sku mdog mthing ga rdo rje
114a1(1): dang dril bu 'dzin par gyur nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas mdzad pa'i phrin las/ sems can gyi rnam par shes pa'i phung po dag par mdzad nas slar 'dus nas/ dpal kun tu
114a2(1): bzang po'i mdun du rang nyid ji lta ba'i yum dang lhan cig tu seng ge'i khri la 'khod do// de nas dpal kun tu bzang po'i dbus gtsug tor nas/ oM dkar po las rnam par snang mdzad sku mdog dkar po 'khor
114a3(1): lo dang dril bu 'dzin pa phyung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas/ sems can gyi gzugs kyi phung po'i rang bzhin dag par byas nas tshur byon te/ shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs la glang po che'i khri la
114a4(1): rang nyid ji lta ba'i lha mo dang lhan cig tu 'khod do// de bzhin du dbu'i g.yas phyogs nas sna las rin chen 'byung ldan sku mdog ser po rin po che dang dril bu 'dzin pa phyung ste 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du
114a5(1): song nas sems can gyi tshor ba'i phung po sbyangs nas/ lho'i 'khor lo'i rtsibs la rta'i khri steng du rang gis lha mo dang 'khod par gyur to// lhag pa'i phyogs nas hrIHdmar po las snang ba mtha' yas sku mdog
114a6(1): dmar po pad+ma dang dril bu bsnams pa 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ sems can gyi 'du shes kyi phung po dag par mdzad de/ nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du rma bya'i khri la rang gis lha mo dang 'khod
114b1(1): par gyur to// g.yon gyi phyogs nas ha ljang gu las don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang gu ral gri dang dril bu 'dzin pa 'jig rten gyi khams su song nas/ sems can gyi 'du byed kyi phung po dag par mdzad de tshur
114b2(1): byon nas/ byang du 'khor lo'i rtsibs la mkha' lding gi khri steng du rang nyid lta bu'i lha mo dang lhan cig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// kun bzang
114b3(1): yangs pa thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// ye shes rol pa sgyu ma'i skur bstan pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // phrag dog ma spangs rgyal ba'i skur snang ba// gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes
114b4(1): rnams// rang dag rang gzhi mnyam pa chen po las// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med lhun gyis rdzogs// rgyal ba rigs lnga yab yum gnyis su med// ces gsungs so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las rigs
114b5(1): lnga rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos thugs rje ye shes chen po'i stobs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yul dang yul de'i bdag po
114b6(1): yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de ma thag tu/ spyan dang / ljags dang / snyan dang / shangs dang / sku dang / thugs kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor las/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i
115a1(1): snying po mdog dkar po rin po che'i myu gu 'dzin pa phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ste/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dag par sbyangs te/ tshur byon nas steng gi phyogs su 'khod do// de
115a2(1): bzhin du nam mkha'i snying po mdog ser po ral gri bsnams pa/ byams pa dmar ser klu shing gun d+he bsnams pa/ spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar po pad+ma 'dzin pa/ phyag na rdo rje ljang gu dril bu bsnams
115a3(1): pa// kun bzang dkar po rin po che'i snye ma 'dzin pa/ sgrib pa rnam sel ser po po ti bsnams pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu dmar gser po ti ut+pal 'dzin pa rnams phyung ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
115a4(1): khams thams cad du song nas/ sems can gyi rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dag par sbyangs te/ tshur 'dus nas shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gi
115a5(1): phyogs dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dag tu zla ba dang pad+ma'i steng du rang rang gi yum/ lha mo la s+ye dkar mo rgya gram 'dzin pa dang / ma le sngon mo rin po che'i
115a6(1): phreng ba 'dzin pa dang / gir ti dmar mo pi wang gi rgyud 'dren par byed ma dang / nir ti ljang gu gar bskur ma dang / bdug pa ma dkar mo spos sprin 'phro ba dang / mdzes ma ser mo me tog 'thor ba dang / gsal
115b1(1): byed dmar mo mar me 'dzin pa dang / dag byed ma ljang gu byug pa byed pa ste/ de dag dang lhan cig tu 'khod do// de nas dpal kun tu bzang pos bdud thams cad mthar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
115b2(1): snyoms par bzhugs nas/ de ma thag tu nyid kyi sku'i mdun dang rgyab dang g.yas g.yon gyi phyogs nas/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes bya ba'i yi ge 'od zer dang bcas pa phyung bas khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang /
115b3(1): gshin rje'i gshed ces bya ba dang / rta mgrin dbang phyug ces bya ba dang / bdud rtsi thal sbyor zhes bya ba rnams sku mdog dkar po dang / mthing ga dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dag/ phyag gis be con lcags kyu
115b4(1): dang thod dbyug zhags pa dang / pad+ma lcags sgrog dang / rgya gram dril bu 'dzin pa dag byung ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang /
115b5(1): phung po dang / lha dang / 'chi bdag bdud kyi tshogs thams cad bcom nas slar byung ba gzhal yas khang gi sgo bzhi/ shar gyi sgo dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang gis phyogs su pad+ma'i steng dang zla ba'i steng du
115b6(1): 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'gro ba rnams zhi ba chen pos rab tu 'dul ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ de ma thag tu sku'i steng 'og gi gnas dang phyag dang /
116a1(1): zhabs kyis mthil dag nas/ sprul pa'i dge sbyong chen po drug byung nas spro bar mdzad pa ni/ dkar po pi wang 'dzin pa dang / sngon po go cha 'dzin pa dang // ser po gsil byed 'dzin pa dang /
116a2(1): mthing ga po ti 'dzin pa dang / dmar po rin po che'i sgrom 'dzin pa dang / nag po me dang chu'i rnam pa 'dzin pa dag/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song nas/ rigs drug tu snang ba'i 'gro ba
116a3(1): rnams rang rang gi sdug bsngal gyi dngos po thams cad sbyangs nas/ slar rang gi gnas su phyogs drug gi gdan la 'khod par gyur to// de nas yum kun tu bzang mos 'di skad ces gsungs so// mnyam nyid mi
116a4(1): g.yo mkha' ltar dag pa'i thugs// bsam 'das gnyis med thig le chen po las// rol pa'i cho 'phrul 'gro la rab bstan pa// sgyu ma'i phyag rgya ci yang sa ler ston// mig dang rna ba sna dang de bzhin lce// yid
116a5(1): chos gzugs sgra dri ro reg dang chos// dbang po tshogs brgyad dngos yul ma lus pa// ma spangs rang dag ye nas lhun rdzogs pa// rgyal tshab sras po byang chub sems dpa'i sku// bde gshegs gnyis
116a6(1): mdzad mchod sprin lha mor bcas// yab yum thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pas// dgyes mdzad chags pas ye shes gnyis su med// gshin rje bgegs dang dag pa'i pad+ma dang // shes rab chen pos
116b1(1): mthar zug sar phyin pa/ khro chen rgyal po ye shes sgo bzhir gsal// 'gugs 'dren 'ching bsdoms rab tu 'gyes par mdzad// lha dang lha min mi dang dud 'gro dang // yi dwags dmyal tshogs 'jig rten ma lus
116b2(1): pa// nges don dbyings su ye nas sangs rgyas kyang // thub mchog sbrul sku dge sbyong bla na med// ces gsungs so// de ltar dpal kun tu bzang pos/ zhi ba chen po'i rol pas gzugs dang sgra'i chos thams cad
116b3(1): snod dang bcud ye nas rnam par dag pa/ phyogs bcu kun tu rgya yongs su ma chad pa'i dkyil 'khor rten dang brten par bcas pa/ dag pa'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs pa thams cad rtsol med lhun gyis
116b4(1): grub pa'i rang bzhin du sangs rgyas so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo yongs su bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
116b5(1): pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la 'jug pa rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ snyoms par bzhugs ma thag tu/ yum kun tu bzang mos glu'i dbyangs kyis
116b6(1): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// ye shes gsal ba dri med pa// byang chub sems ni rin po che/ bla na med pa bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang //
117a1(1): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos chos thams cad gnyis su med pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma sems ni
117a2(1): lus kyi rtsa ba ste// lus kyang sems kyi snang ba'o// sems kyang tshig tu mtshon pa ste// tshig ni sems kyi ngo bo nyid// e ma kun tu bzang po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje can// zhes bka' stsal to// de
117a3(1): nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mi bskyod pas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma dngos po 'di dag ma skyes te// chos can med cing chos nyid med// nam mkha' bzhin du dmigs med pa'i// byang chub
117a4(1): sems 'di bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma chos rnams skye ba med pa ste// yi ge med cing gnas med
117a5(1): la// rtogs pa'i dra ba rab spangs pa// bskyed par bya ba'i don mchog yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung ldan gyis byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma dngos po de dag
117a6(1): dngos med de// chos kyi mtshan nyid spang ba yin// bdag med chos las legs byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das tshe dpag med kyis byang chub kyi
117b1(1): sems 'di gsungs so// e ma dngos po skye ba med pa las// dngos po med cing bsgom du med// nam mkha' go 'phang thob nas su// de ltar dngos rnams rab tu brjod// ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan
117b2(1): 'das don yod grub pas byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod nas dag cing rnyog pa med// sems can med cing srog kyang med// sangs rgyas med cing byang
117b3(1): chub med// ces gsungs so// de nas sa'i snying po la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma khams dang rigs dang rnam par shes// dbang po yul gyi snang ba
117b4(1): kun// ma bsgribs snang ba med pas na// mya ngan 'das pa'i sa la phyin// zhes gsungs so// de nas rigs drug 'dul ba'i sprul pa drug gi byang chub sems 'di gsungs so// e ma g.yo zhing rtsod dang 'gyur ba
117b5(1): dang // 'dod dang rmongs pa sdug bsngal spyod// 'di dag rang gis ngo bos stong // brtag na myong ba ci yang med// ces gsungs so// de nas khro bo chen po bzhis byang chub kyi sems 'di gsungs so// e ma 'jig/
117b6(1): tshogs mthar 'dzin blta// log 'dren bdud kyi ming btags kyang // yul gsum mtshan ma ma dmigs pas// gcad bya gcod byed yongs ma grub// ces gsungs so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ byang
118a1(1): chub sems mnyam pa nyid du rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po rab tu bstan pas/ phyogs bcu
118a2(1): na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi thugs rgyud bskul te rab tu g.yo bar 'gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po gang na ba der gshegs nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po mthar bzhugs
118a3(1): pas nam mkha'i khams til gyi gang bu sa bon gyis gang ba bzhin du gnas par gyur to// de ltar gyur ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa las/ spobs
118a4(1): pa dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid can gyi lag na rdo rje can zhig phyung zhing mdun du 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lag na rdo rje la gzigs te zhal 'dzum
118a5(1): par mdzad do// 'dzum pa de mdzad ma thag tu lag na rdo rjes de nyid stan las langs te/ rdo rje gsor zhing bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji
118a6(1): ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyu ma 'chis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa gang gi slad du gzigs pa dang 'dzum par mdzad// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
118b1(1): dpal kun tu bzang pos thugs rje chen pos rjes su gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs ste// 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal to// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
118b2(1): kun// rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i// the tshom kun nas bsal ba'i phyir// de ni nges par rabs bshad bya// nga ni che ba'i rgyal po ste// 'chad pa po'ang nga nyid yin// chos dang srid dang zhi ba kun// thams cad nga
118b3(1): yi rang bzhin yin// de bzhin bcings dang grol ba dang // don dam kun rdzob snang dang mnyam// gzugs dang sgra dang mthong dang thos// mtha' dang mtha' min dbus kyang nga // ye shes thig le nga yin/
118b4(1): te// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'ang nga nyid do// ji ltar nga yi dkyil 'khor ni// sbrul dang bsgom dang bri ba dang // rin chen rnams kyi brtsig la sogs// de nyid du ni 'jug pa dang // dam tshig tshul bzhin nod pa
118b5(1): dang // ting 'dzin bsgrubs la brtson pa dang // bskyod pa'i brtul zhugs bla med pas// mchog dang thun mong phun tshogs kyi// dngos grub chen po sgrub pa dag/ tshe 'di nyid la rnyed pa yi// skye bo snod dang ldan
118b6(1): pa'i rigs// phyi ma'i dus na 'byung 'gyur ba// de dag mthong nas rab dga' ste// rgod dang blta dang 'dzum pas bzung // nga ni snying rje'i rang bzhin pas// skal bar ldan la dngos grub ster// dad mos ldan la
119a1(1): 'bebs par byed// brtson par spyod dang lhan cig gnas// 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams ma lus pa// blo yi the tshom bsal gyis nyon// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byang
119a2(1): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad dang / gzhan yang 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad chos kyi gsung bdud brtsi lta bu nyan par 'dod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la
119a3(1): 'di skad ces gsol to// dpal chen kun bzang rdo rje 'chang // rigs kun bdag po rigs kyi gtso// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor che ba'i mchog/ rgyu 'bras dbyer med lhun rdzogs pa// sbrul dang bsam dang bri
119a4(1): ba dang // rin chen rnams las brtsigs pa ru// gnasad kyi khyad par gang dag tu// 'jug pa'i gang zag 'di lta bus// ci 'dra ba yi tshul gyis 'jug/ rten pa bzhengs pa ji ltar mdzad// der ni ting 'dzin ci
119a5(1): zhig gis// 'jug pa'i rim par ji ltar 'tshal// dam tshig sdom pa ci zhig sbyin// nus par ldan cing phan pa gang // de yi bsnyen bsgrub ci ltar bgyi// dmigs shing bskyed pa gang zhig lags// gsang sngags
119a6(1): de yi bzla thabs gang // rdzogs dang rab rdzogs ji lta bu// de dang mthun pa'i spyod pa gang // de dag 'bras bu ji tsam zhig/ ma 'ongs skyes bu 'dul don du// kun tu bzang pos bka' stsol cig/ ces gsol pa
119b1(1): dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig sems dpa' rdo rje 'dzin// sgrub pa po phan bya ba'i phyir// ji ltar khyed kyis spobs pa bzhin// rim pa'i tshul gyis bshad par bya// ma rtogs pa dang log
119b2(1): par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul bar dgongs dang gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don nyid ni// sgras btags yin no ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te//
119b3(1): khong nas gab sbas don 'byin thabs// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis bzung // snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la bsten// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin/ zhes bka' stsal to// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las//
119b4(1): don rjes su bzung ba rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas//
119b5(1): 'khor 'dus pa rnams la 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma chos kyi don byung ba// ma 'ongs skye bo nyon mongs can// zag pa'i mdud pas dkris pa yis// sems can sdug bsngal bzod dka' bas// gdungs
119b6(1): pa'i 'gro ba kun 'dul phyir// rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ ma bcos dbyings su rdzogs pas na// rdo rje dbyings su rab tu brjod// 'di don bye brag bsam yas pas// rang bzhin snang dang byin gyis
120a1(1): brlabs// yid las byung dang 'du byed dang // myur ba'i 'du byed las rnams te// gsang mchog lhun grub 'og min du// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ngang gis gsal// nam mkha'i dbyings kyis
120a2(1): dkyil 'khor du// byin gyis brlabs te sprul par bya// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs shing // ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs gnas shing // ri dwags gcan gzan rgyu ba dang // mi ro gsar rnying yod pa'i
120a3(1): sar// rnal 'byor brtul zhugs 'dzin pa'i gnas// kang ka dur bya 'dab chags lding // rig 'dzin mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i gnas// de ni ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom// gtsug lag khang dang mchod
120a4(1): rten nam// dben khang gsar rnying gang yang rung // yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs der// bris pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// nags tshal chen po'i phyogs dag gam// ri phug chu 'gram gling sogs gsar// me
120a5(1): tog snam bu rab rgyas shing // bya skad sna tshogs sgra sgrog de// yid 'ong dga' ba'i gnas yin pas// rdul tshon lnga yis dkyil 'khor brtsegs// der ni slob ma bzang dge bar// dad ldan shes rab gsal ba
120a6(1): dang // g.yo sgyu spangs shing gtong dang ldan// rang bzhin dang bzang brtul phod la// brtson 'grus ldan zhing brtul phod pa// rgyal sras tshul du bzhugs par bya// rang bzhin sprul pa ting 'dzin dang // ras bris
120b1(1): rdul tshon de bzhin du// lhun grub rig 'dzin sa la gnas// rtog pa'i gdeng can dad sems ldan// rim pa bzhin du bzhug bya ste// de las gzhan du don mi 'gyur// 'dren byed bla ma'i mtshan nyid ni// ye shes
120b2(1): lha yi rjes bzung dang // bskyed rim ting 'dzin dmigs pa gsal// las kyi cho ga rnams la mkhas// bsam pa che dang ldan pa yis// dkyil 'khor chen por slob ma rnams// rim pa ji bzhin gzhug par
120b3(1): bya// yid 'ong gnas su phyin nas ni// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor bzhengs pa la// thog mar sa phyogs brtag par bya// snang dang snang bar ma gyur pa'i// mi dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// yul dang sa yi bdag
120b4(1): rnams la// sa rin gzhal zhing bslang bar bya// oM na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yo bi shra mu khe b+h+yaHsarba tad khaM ut+ka te s+pha ra Na i maM ga ga na khaM swA hA// oM AHhUM sarba ni ri ti swA hA// ma hA ba li ta khA hi khA hi// oM AHhUM
120b5(1): sarba b+hA ta bu ga big+h+nAM ma hA ba li ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ me tog la sogs kyis mchod cing // gtor ma rgya chen byin brlabs nas// brtan ma 'byung po bgegs kyi tshogs// ma lus pa ni mnyes par bya/ bden pas
120b6(1): byin rlabs bkra shis brjod// de rjes sa rnams dag byas te// shing sogs rdo sogs bsal bya ste// tshad ldan stegs bu rab tu bstar// snying nyid snying pos byin gyis brlabs// ba yi lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// rab
121a1(1): tu sbyar bas chag chag gdab// rdo rje'i srad bu'i thig gdab ste// dang po nam mkhar dgongs thig gdab// de nas sa thig rim pa bzhin// dgu dgu'i bdag nyid bco brgyad du// cha yi rnam pa
121a2(1): legs par bgo/ khyad par dkyil 'khor thig gdab pa// phyi dang nang du dbye bar bya// rgyas dang bsdus dang shin tu bsdus// rang gi rigs kyi thig gdab bo// de nas rin chen sna tshogs lnga// bsreg sbyangs
121a3(1): bkrus pa'i snying po yis// dag par byas te so sor yang // rig gi sa bon bkod pa las// so so'i rigs su bskyed par bya// ye shes bkug ste gnyis med mchog/ bstod nas rab tu dgyes par bya// sngon po
121a4(1): ser dmar ljang gu nyid// shar lho nub byang rigs yin te// dbus ni shel gyi snying po'o// dkar sngo ser dmar ljang gu nyid// brtsigs pa lnga la go rim bzhin// kun gyi phyir ni mthing ga'o// dra ba phyed dang pha gu
121a5(1): dang // dar bu khang dang bar 'khyams rnams// legs pa nyid du bskor bar bya// ka ba brgyad dang 'khor lo bcas// pho brang 'khor lo de bzhin te// rta babs dang ni tA ra na// chos kyi 'khor lo gdugs dang
121a6(1): bcas// phyi rol rdo rje me 'od 'bar// 'jig rten pa yi 'khor yug ni// kun nas rab tu bskor ba bri// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma dgod// lnga ldi za ra tshags kyis brgyan// mtshon cha phur pa rnams kyang
121b1(1): dgod// phyogs mtshams kun tu ngas bshad pa'i// rgyan mdzes rig pa rnams kyis brgyan// bla ma'i man ngag thob pa yis// blo dang ldan par nye bar bstan// zhes bka' stsal to// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud
121b2(1): las/ gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba thugs rje'i 'od zer gyis yongs su 'dzin pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
121b3(1): bzhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// rnam par dag pa'i rim pa yis// slob ma bzhag pa'i cho ga bshad// 'jug pa yi/
121b4(1): ni sngon rol du// rdzas dang bdag po slob ma rnams// tshul bzhin du ni sta gon bya// maN+Dal byi dor byas pa la// dris byug mdzes pa'i mtshan ma dgod// stong dang snying rje rgyu smos nas// phyi yi 'byung ba rim bzhin
121b5(1): bskyed// gzhal yas khang pa rdzogs par bsgom// gdan steng dkyil 'khor bdag po bskyed// dbyings nas spyan drangs dbyer med bstim// mchod pa'i tshogs kyis mnyes par bya// bsnyen cing bstod dang
121b6(1): gsol ba gdab// dkyil 'khor ba dang dkyil 'khor bdag/ gzhan yang phyogs bcur bzhugs pa yis// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// bdag la dgongs par mdzad du gsol// khyed rnams la
122a1(1): ni mchod pa dang // slob ma kun las phan gdags phyir// bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba yis// sang ni dkyil 'khor bri lags kyis// gnas 'dir sangs rgyas kun bshegs te// byin gyis rlob cing
122a2(1): dbang bskur mdzod// de nas rin chen las byung ba'i// bum pa mdzes pa dag byas nas// rin chen sman 'bru snying po dri// shis pa'i rdzas bris chu yis dgang // lha yi grangs dang mnyam par dgod// so so'i yum
122a3(1): dang lha bskyed de// gnyis med spyan drangs 'dzab bsnyen 'bul// de dag 'od zhu bdud brtsir bsgyur// rgya chen bum pa dgang bar bya// dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug 'dod pa'i// slob ma'i tshogs rnams mdun
122a4(1): du bzhugs// pus btsugs thal mo sbyar ba yis// bla ma che la gsol ba gdab// dpa' bo thugs rje ches gzigs nas// dang po skyabs mgon sbyin bya zhing // de nas sems skyed sdom pa dpog/ de nas theg
122a5(1): mchog gsang sngags su// gzhug phyir sems rgyud sbyang bar bya// dang por phyag bya mchod pa dbul// bshags shing rjes su yi rang zhing // 'bras bu'i theg pa'i skyabs gsum blang // de nyid las ni sems bskyed
122a6(1): bya// dge ba 'bras bu'i theg par bsngo// rdo rje yol ba'i nang du drang // dag byed shing la 'bru gsum gyis// byin gyis brlabs te dor byas nas// mthong ltas phyogs kyi phrin las brtag/ nyes par gyur na cho ga
122b1(1): bsgyur// de nas srung skud rang gi tshad// lha mos sngags kyis byin rlabs te// pho mo g.yas g.yon dpung par bcing // de yis bar chad bgegs rnams 'joms// dag byed rtswa yi chun po ni// bdud rtsi dri yi/
122b2(1): sngags bzlas pa// mthong phyir sngas dang gdan du sbyin// gnod pa zlog phyir skyor chu blud// sgra bsgrag rgyal mtshan ba dan 'phyar// gangs ri la sogs bstod nas phyin// rten bzang mthong zhing sems ma
122b3(1): zhum// sgro dga' dang bcas bzang zhing dge/ gzhan yang lus bkrus rgyun dbab dang // gru gzings la sogs lam bzang 'gro// bzhon pa bzang dang bar snang 'gro// 'od chen mthong dang rin chen rnyed// lung
122b4(1): ston che ba brjod pa ni// dge ba'i rtags su ngas lung bstan// de las bzlog pa'i rtags rnams kun// ngan par bshad de gang mthong yang // tshogs bsags dag pa'i don la'ang // bsgyur zhing lta ba'i cho ga/
122b5(1): bya// de ltar rab tu brtags nas ni// bla ma dpal chen nyid la bshad// de steng dgo'o zhes smra na// rmi lam la brten dngos grub blang // mi dge'i sgra la sbyin bsreg bya// gsang sngags cho ga rnams kyis
122b6(1): bzlog/ 'di ni sta gon cho ga ste// kun tu bzang po nga yis bshad// de ltar slob ma rgyud sbyangs nas// dkyil 'khor chen por gzhugs pa'i phyir// bsod nams tshogs ni sngon 'gro bas// ting 'dzin rim pa
123a1(1): rdzogs byas la// rdul mtshon dkyil 'khor dmigs pas bskyed// ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs shing // gnyis med bstim zhing mchod pas mchod// bstod de so so'i sngags bzlas
123a2(1): nas// slob ma'i mig la brda byas te// mchod bstod gsol bas rgyud sbyangs nas// sems bskyed rigs kyi sdom pa bzung // dam tshig bsgrags shing bro bor la// ye shes sems dpa' snying la dbab// oM
123a3(1): AHhUM a we sha ya a a/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i sgo bzhi nas// phyag rgya dang ni mchod bstod bya// de nas me tog phreng ba dag/ dkyil 'khor gyis ni dbus dag tu// gtso bo'i spyi bor rab tu gtor// de nyid
123a4(1): blangs te mgo la bcings// gdong g.yog brda phyed dkyil 'khor bstan// zhes bka' stsal to// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga bshad pa'i
123a5(1): le'u ste bdun pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i sdom pa rab tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'dus pa'i
123a6(1): 'khor tshogs rnams// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gang bzhugs pas// srung zhing sdom par bya ba dag/ spyi dang khyad par lhag pa yi// rnam par dbye bas bzung bya ste// so sor thar dang byang chub sems// bya spyod rnal
123b1(1): 'byor rgyud rnams las// bsrung bar bya ba gang gsungs pa// thun mongs spyi yi dam tshig yin/ khyad par bye brag bsrung bya ba// rtsa bar gyur pa bzhi dag dang // yan lag nyi shu rtsa lnga ste// ji ltar smon dang 'jug
123b2(1): pa yi// byang chub sems gsum bsgom pa yis// rdo rje thugs kyi dam tshig go// rang nyid yi dam lha tshogs kyi// sngags dang phyag rgya rab 'dzin pa// dus kun tu ni rgyun mi gcod// rdo rje gsung gi dam tshig
123b3(1): yin// rgyud bkrol dbang bskur de nyid bstan// bla ma nyid dang lhan cig 'grogs// lus ngag yid kyi bskur ba ni// rdo rje sku yi dam tshig go// gzhan yang sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// bye brag phye ba gsang
123b4(1): ba'i snod// blta zab spyod pa bslab pa dang // ming gzungs rtogs pa grub pa'i rtags// dus rnams kun tu gsang bar bya// bsgrub gnas rdzas dus grogs rnams ni/ khyad par de nyid dus su gsang // gzhan
123b5(1): yang slob dpon mched dang lcam// gsang ba sgrags dang gnas skabs dang // de ltar 'os pa shin tu gsang // gsang bar bya ba 'di rnams kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig go/ sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa
123b6(1): dang // rdzun dang ngag brlang brjod pa rnams// thabs mchog nges pas zin pa yis// gnas skabs gsal bar shes par bya// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog nyon mongs lnga// rang bzhin
124a1(1): shes pas mi spangs te// rang rig ye shes nyid yin no// dri chen dri chu sha chen po// pad+ma byang chub sems kyi chu// bdud brtsi dam tshig rdzas chen lnga// rdo rje 'dzin pas dag par blangs// sangs rgyas
124a2(1): rdo rje sems dpa' dang // rin chen 'byung ldan 'od dpag med// don yod pa dang rnam snang rdzas// ye shes lha yi rang bzhin te// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las lnga ru rab tu bsgrub// sa dang chu
124a3(1): dang me dang rlung // nam mkha'i khams gzugs tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed tshor ba dang // mig sogs 'dzin dang de yul lnga// rgyal ba yab yum byang chub sems// mchod pa'i lha yi tshogs su
124a4(1): bsgrub// gzhung don lhag pa'i dam tshig ni// rab tu lhag par bsrung bar bya// gcan gzan rgyal po'i khri mi bshig/ za ma tog tu dug mi blug/ rin chen lcags phran mi bsreg cing // zhun khol lta bu mi btung
124a5(1): ste// pad+ma'i ze'u 'bru kha mi gsed// bug rdol snod du bcud mi blug/ don dang mi ldan rdzas mi ster// shel sgong 'dam du bsnur mi bya// ma dag snod du dag pa min// yid bzhin nor bu mi bsreg ste// khyung chen
124a6(1): gshog pa'i ya mi da bral// gnam lcags ur mo'i mtshon mi gdab// gcan gzan dgod pa'i lhag mi spyad// rdo rje'i brag chen mi zhig cing // ra ba dra ba'i mtshams mi dral// sgron ma rlung gis bsad
124b1(1): pa min// ye shes chu rgyun gcad pa spangs// bka' rtags phyag rgya mi 'phyi zhing // rdo rje pha lam mkhar mi bzlog/ gtsug gi nor bu sma mi dbab// 'di dag bsrung bar bya ba ste// lhag par gces pa'i tshig yin/
124b2(1): no// 'di dag legs par bsdam 'gyur na// skye ba 'dir yang nad med cing // tshe dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // gsang sngags nus pa myur 'grub cing // dgongs pa zab mo rtogs pa dang // gsang ba chen
124b3(1): po'i snod du 'gyur// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub ma lus 'grub pa ste// bdud las rgyal zhing mngon 'tshang rgya// de bas rab tu 'bad pas bsrung // 'di ni gces par gzung bar bya// gal
124b4(1): te dam tshig las 'das na// 'jig rten 'dir yang tshe thung zhing // nad dang sdug bsngal mang ba dang // 'khor dang longs spyod dang 'bral zhing / yid la 'dod pa mi 'grub ste// brtsam pa phyin ci log tu
124b5(1): 'gyur// gal te tshe yi dus byas nas// mnar med la sogs 'jigs rung ba'i// dmyal ba bshad par de 'gyur zhing // bskal pa bsam yas sdug bsngal myong // de bas rnal 'byor chen po rnams// 'di la mi
124b6(1): myong mi bsam ste// nyams par nges pa'i rtags med na// rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya ba// ngan 'gro ma lus ches lhag pa'i// sdug bsngal tshad bshad mi lang zhing // thar zhes bya ba srid ma yin// de phyir dad brtson/
125a1(1): skyes bu yis// bzlog pa'i gnyen po myur du bsten// de yis yon tan kun ldan nas// rdo rje 'chang ba nyid du 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dam tshig dang sdom pa
125a2(1): rab tu 'byung ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rgyal ba yongs su smin par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/ 'di
125a3(1): skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig gzhan yang rab bshad pa// phyag rgya che ldan rnal 'byor pas// bskyed dang rdzogs dang chen po yi// lam la 'jug par 'dod pa la// rim pa dbang bskur sbyin par
125a4(1): gsungs// rang gi de nyid dbab byas shing // bsrung bya khas len nus pa la// phyi nang gsang ba rgyal thabs kyi// dbang bskur dam pa bstsal bya ba// phrin las 'dod pa'i phyogs de ru/ khri stan bzang po bshams
125a5(1): pa la// rdo rje slob dpon de bzhugs te// dbang stegs bzang la slob ma'o// dang po phyi yi bum pa yi// rdzas kyi dbang bskur bya ba ni// kha rgyan mgul mching bzung zag dang // spos sman 'bru dang rin po
125a6(1): chetshe// snying po rnams kyi rdzas kyi dbang // bkra shis rdzas dang yo byad bdun// dbu rgyan snying po phyag rgya dang // sku gsung thugs ni rgyan gyi dbang // rdo rje dril bu me tog dang // phreng ba go cha yo byad do// gdan khri
125b1(1): gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang // nyan cing 'bri dang bshad pa dang // sgrub pa bdag po'i dbang yin te// bsgrub bya chu yi rnam pa gnyis// ngo bo lhar bsgom gsal ba ste// gtso chen rigs lnga yum
125b2(1): dang bcas// sems pa brgyad dang sems ma brgyad// sprul pa drug dang khro bo rnams// nang du dag pa'i gnas sbyar nas// phung po'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i dbang // lha rgyud brda thabs byin rlabs kyis// 'di
125b3(1): las mi 'da' ngo spyod pa// lam dang cho ga'i khyad par ro// 'dod pa'i yon tan longs spyod dang // mthong thos tshor myong reg pa dag/ de yi rang bzhin longs spyod shes// rang gi gnas su grol ba dang // rigs
125b4(1): kyi ngo bo dam tshig rdzas// sha lnga dri gsum khu ba gnyis// rang grol spang blang med pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa che// spyod pa nus pa dbang yin no// dbang po lnga yi mngon shes dang // mtshan rtags ye
125b5(1): shes lnga yi dngos// dngos su grub pa nang gi dbang // 'di dag dbang po yul dang bcas// dmigs pa rdzas kyi gzugs brnyan bstan// che ba'i yon tan bstod tshig sgra// rna bar brjod pa thos pa'o// ming tshig
125b6(1): rtog pa sna dang lce// yid kyis smon cing bsam pa la// gnang zhing nges pa thob pa yis// dngos por 'dzin pa'i dri ma gsal// phan nus byed pa dbang zhes bya// nang du bstan pa nyid yin no// thabs dang shes
126a1(1): rab dbang gi dngos// don dam kun rdzob 'khor ba dang // mya ngan 'das sogs ltos pa'i chos// so sor 'dzin pa de bsal la// gnyis med ye shes rtogs bya'i phyir// rdo rje lus kyi nus
126a2(1): pa'i chos// tshe gcig sbyor ba ston pa de// blo chung shes rab dman pa dang // skal med don la gsang bas na// phyir brjod bud med sgyu ma'i lus// sum cu rtsa gnyis yon tan ldan// khyad par rlung gis bskyod
126a3(1): pa'i gnas// gsum dang gsum nyid steng dang 'og/ rtsa bar gyur pa yan lag rnams// stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyang // lha dang byed pa por gnas pa'i// bskyed dang rdzogs pa rab sbyor ba// rim gyis 'dzin
126a4(1): pa'i sngon 'gro dang // dngos su grub dang snyoms 'jug gis// bde zhing gsal bas mi rtog pa// rnam par shes tshogs rang bzhin gyis// 'od gsal ngang du gnas pa de// mthong zhes brjod med yul dang
126a5(1): bral// rang las gzhan du ma yin pa// ltos 'gro'i gtsug nas nor bu de// blangs te mchod cing longs spyod na// phun sum tshogs pa 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar bstan pas byang chub che// bla na med pa rdzogs
126a6(1): pa'i dbang // rang rig thabs kyi rgyal po yin// shes rab skad cig sbyor ba yis// kun la khyad par bkur bya ste// e ma rang byung bcom ldan 'das// kun tu bzang po chos kyi dbyings// ma skyes rgyu las ma
126b1(1): 'gags rkyen// byang chub snying po bde ba che// rang gis rig cing rang gis mthong // rtogs shing thob pa 'di kho na// gzhan na yod cing tshol ba med// ma bsgrubs de nyid sar rdzogs pa'o// de ni 'bras bu rdzogs
126b2(1): pa'i dbang // 'di ru ma rdzogs gang yang med// the tshom som nyis 'grub pa min// skad cig ma yi yul yin no// ma 'ongs dus kyi skyes bu dag/ ma 'khrul myur du rdzogs pa'i lam// 'di la sbyor ba gang yin/
126b3(1): pa// tshe 'dir bzang po mchog 'grub byed// ces gsungs so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ lam yongs su nye bar smin pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i phyag rgya chen
126b4(1): po mngon par rol pa yid kyi 'dzin phur dbyung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kun// 'jig rten rtog blos bskyil ba
