126b5(1): yi// ma rig mun pa bsal ba yis// tha mal lus ngag yid gsum po// rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs nyid du// rab tu mngon par rtogs bya'i phyir// grol byed rim pa rab tu bshad// nga yis sngon byung sprul pa
126b6(1): yi// rim pa chen po de bzung nas// dben pa'i gnas su mkhas pa yis// phyag rgya yo byad bsam sbyor bas// dul bar spyod pa'i zhi gnas dang // rang rig rnal 'byor rab spangs te// byed pa'i rgyu ni mthing nag
127a1(1): hUM// 'phro 'du rten gzhi dag pa yis// mchod bshags yi rang gsol btab pas// dag pa'i snod du bya ba dgrol// bsrung bya stong nyid snying po las// 'bar ba'i sa gzhi rab tu dbyung // nga rgyal
127a2(1): chen po rab bskyed de// bar du gcod pa ngang gis gdul// e ma sangs rgyas chos kun gsang // ma byung ma skyes rnam dag dbyings// chos bdag med pa'i stong pa las// ma 'gags pa yi thugs rje
127a3(1): che// dmigs pa gnyis med gnyis kyi bsgom// de yi brdal ba byung ba ni// skye med sa bon spyi gtsug tu// gsal 'tsher ldan pa'i 'od zer gyis// gnas gsum nges par sbyangs byas nas// phung po gsal ba
127a4(1): nyid du gyur// 'phro 'du las kyi sbyor ba yis// las kun mdzad pa'i cho 'phrul gyis// rtog pa'i rlung dang chu rnams kun// mi shigs pa dang bdud rtsi'i rgya// brtan byed yid bzhin 'byung ba ni// sgrol ma mA ma ki/
127a5(1): dang spyan// rang gi mkha' dbyings rnam par dag/ de bzhin drod dang gos dkar mo// kun bzang dbyings su khyab byed bsgom// e kro d+hi shwa ri ma d+ha la hUM/ e yaM karma e d+ha tA rA yaM/ baM ma ma kI baM/ laM bud+d+ha tsak+Shu
127a6(1): maM/ raM sa na dza na si ta ta raM/ rin chen lnga yi ri rab ni// b+h+yAM gyi spro bsdu las byung ba'o// b+h+yAM b+hi sha b+hi shud+d+he hUM/ gzhal yas khang pa gru bzhi pa// dbus nas 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// mu khyud gru chad khyams dang
127b1(1): bcas// sgo bzhi rta babs rgyan gyis mdzes// oM sarba tsakra badz+ra hUM/ de dag tshig 'dis bskul bar bya// hUM mkha' mnyam klong chen thig le'i ngang // byar med lhun rdzogs nyid kyi dbyings// brjod med spros bral
127b2(1): yum gyi mkha'// sgra bsam yul las 'das pa'o// oM ma hA su kha hUM hUM/ mu med brdal ba'i dbyings nyid las// snang med rig pa'i ngang gis gsal// tshon gang 'od las thig ler bskyil// nam mkha' las ni
127b3(1): nam mkha' bsgom// tsit+ta s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ ske shi med pa'i sems nyid 'di// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin la// yi ge mchog tu bsgom par bya// a k+Sha ra tsit+ta s+pha ra
127b4(1): Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ hUM rgyu yi ting 'dzin shes rab las// hUM de nyid byang chub sems su gyur// 'byung ba yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems las rim bzhin byung // e las nam mkha' mtha' dbus
127b5(1): med// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te// baM las chu yi rba klong dkyil// suM las gser gyi sa gzhir chags// laM las rin chen ri rab ste// raM las me 'od rab tu 'bar// e a b+h+yAM// b+h+rUM las rin chen gzhal
127b6(1): yas khang // nam mkha'i dbyings dang rab mnyam pa// tshul bzhin byin gyis rlabs pa yis// gzhal yas gsal bar gyur par bsgom// saM siM ha/ ha ha sti ka aM a ra ga/ maM ma ra daM nyi// g+haM g+ha ru tsa/ ye shes
128a1(1): 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su// seng ge glang chen rta bya khyung // ma ma sUr+ya/ a a tsan+d+ra/ paM pad+ma/ raM rat+na/ nyi zla pad+ma rin po che/ gtso dang 'khor la rim bzhin gsal// badz+ra tsit+ta mo ha ra te dza/ hrIHs+pha ra
128a2(1): Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ khams gsum ye shes sgron ma las// rin chen mdzod ni thig les brgyan// rgyal ba'i sku mchog don dam bde// snying po nyi ma yid bzhin sku// a we sha ya a a/ pra be sha ya ho ho/ rdo rje
128a3(1): pad+ma gdan byas nas// mkha' dbyings nyi ma'i 'od ltar shar// byang chub sems mchog mdzes par gsal// yig 'bru mtshan ma rim par bsgom// hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika mAM d+hA ti shwa ri/ b+h+rUM b+hi sha b+hi shud+d+he/ hUM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ pad+ma
128a4(1): ma d+ha la AM/ sAr+ya ma d+ha la au/ sa ma ya hoH/ sa ma ya stAM/ ra ho haM rA ga yA mi/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ hrIHphaT/ oM lAM/ sA mAM/ AM bAM/ ha taM/ k+Shi hAM/ tAM tAM/ hri hri/ dzi eH/ mai dzaH/ b+hI hAM/ hU~M baM/ mAM hoH/ kri truM sr-i praM k+ShaM ye/ hUM
128a5(1): #
128a6(1): hrIHgirti/ dz+hi ku ru pA Na/ aM nirti rA ga yA mi/ mi tri d+ha ra Ni/ dza d+hA pe/ b+hI nisma raM b+ha ya/ hUM puSh+pe/ hUM swa rA dzA ya/ baM dI pa/ mAM shrI AM rA ga ya/ ho gan+d+he/ mu ne kr-i/ mu ne hUM draM/ mu ne suM/ mu ne praM/ mu ne k+ShaM/ mu ne ye/ au
128b1(1): ya mAn+ta kr-ita/ pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita/ pad+mAn+ta kr-ita/ big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ pA sha hUM/ s+pho Ta baM/ g+haN+De hoH/ hrI s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hAM/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang // dbang bskur byin
128b2(1): rlabs tshul bzhin bya// phung po khams dang skye mched kun// ye nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor snang // badz+ra sa ma ya dzaHhUM/ dmigs med mkha' ltar dag pa'i sku// ye shes dbyings nas gshegs su gsol// rang
128b3(1): snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor lha// bdag la dgyes nas thim par bzhugs// dbyings kun rnam par dag pa las// sprul pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag rgya rgyal ba'i tshul bzhugs te// mnyam pa'i ngang du
128b4(1): rtogs gyur na// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// phyag rgya'i sku las 'da' ba med// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus la// gar dbyangs mchog dang dam tshig rdzas// nam mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin// rdzas
128b5(1): mchog mi las 'das pa'i lha// rgyal po chen po longs spyod mchog/ phyag rgya bzhi dang nyon mongs lnga// gnyis su med dang 'chi ba med// 'dod pa'i yon tan bdag gis med// bsam sbyor dmigs pa las byung
128b6(1): ba'i// longs spyod 'byor tshogs ji snyed kun// ma lus mnyes par bya phyir dbul// snyan pa'i tshig dang mthun pa'i don// che ba'i yon tan mtshon pa'i rtags// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnams kyis bstod// nges
129a1(1): par gsal bar gyur pa dang // gsungs dbyangs ngag gi 'phro 'du bya// de las gzhan pa bya 'dod na// gzugs brnyan dang ni dbyings kyi bdag/ gtsang ma'i gzugs brnyan gnyis pa
129a2(1): ltar// gnas su gshegs sam rim gyis bsdu// gal te bcu dang gnyis dang gcig/ bsdus dang shin tu bsdus pa las// bskyed pa'i rim pa de bzhin bya// zhes gsungs so// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las//
129a3(1): bskyed pa'i rim pa rab tu bsdus pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsung gi 'khor lo ma 'gags pa rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas/
129a4(1): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sems can don kun sgrub byed pa// sngags kyi rgyal po gsang ba che// rang bzhin gdod nas lhun grub pas// dag pa'i gsang sngags rab tu bshad// hUM badz+ra tsit+ta hUM hUM/ a badz+ra sa
129a5(1): man+ta b+ha drA a a// oM badz+ra bebai ro tsa na dzi na dzi ka/ mo badz+ra d+h+r-ika badz+ra satwA hA/ oM rat+na d+h+r-ika rat+na sam+b+ha ba tAM/ oM ya ro le ka a mi ta b+hA hrI/ oM pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a/ oM mA~M d+hA ti shwa ri trAM/ oM la~M dwe Sha ra ti hAM/ ma
129a6(1): mo ha ra ti hUM/ oM bAM rA ga ra ti hUM/ oM taM badz+ra ra ti hUM/ rtsa ba'i rigs kyi snying po'o// oM k+Shi hi rA dza hr-i da ya swA hA/ oM traM a gar+b+ha ya swA hA/ oM hrIHtsak+Shu pad+ma pA da ma swA hA/ oM dzi ku ru pA Na hrIHswA hA/ oM mai tri d+ha ra Ni sA
129b1(1): hA/ oM b+h+r-i nisma raM b+ha ya swA hA/ oM b+ha dra b+ha dra sa man+ta swA hA/ oM many+dzu shri ai rA ga ya swA hA/ hwA lA s+ye sa ma ya stAM/ tAM ma le sa ma ya so/ hrI gi ti rA go&H/ a nirti rA ga ya mi/ dza d+ha pe pra be sha phaT/ haM puSh+pe A be sha ya
129b2(1): a a/ baM dI mra ge ni yang pa a lo ke ba su ki ni swA hA/ ho gan+d+he tsit+ta hoH/ oM mu ne kr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne tAM swA hA/ oM mu ne suM swA hA/ oM mu ne praM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ oM bi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM ya mAn+ta kr-ita
129b3(1): hUM phaT/ oM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM big+h+nAM ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dzaH/ oM rat+na kro d+h+waM shwa rI hUM/ oM pad+ma kro d+hi shwa rI baM/ oM karma kro d+hi shwa ri hoH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan ma hA ka ru Ni ka ma hA brad+d+ha pany+tsa bo d+hi sa
129b4(1): tA ma hA kro d+ha mu ne sa ma ya stAM/ A gats+tsha ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ pad+ma maN+Da la hUM/ a ti pu hoH/ pra tits+tsha hoH/ oM AHhUM su ra ta pi pa ka ma la ha ra Na pra tits+tsha ba li ta pU dza hUM kha kha hUM/ sa ma ya shud+d+haHsid+d+hi sid+d+hi hUM/ rdo rje dam
129b5(1): tshig chen po yi// gsang sngags las kyi de bzhin nyid// ma lus las kyi dngos grub ste// yang dag rdzogs pa'i gsang tshig go/ bdag nyid dam tshig rab gsal ba'i// snying po tshon gang de yi dbus// gsal
129b6(1): ba'i dkyil 'khor phra mo'i 'od// rdo rje'i yi ge shin tu 'phra// oM b+ho d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+ha tu aH/ zhes pas bskor bar bsam la bzlas// de nyid ye shes 'od zer ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal ba
130a1(1): bzhin// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' khyab spros// yul gsum sgrib pa ma lus byang // thams cad ye shes spyod yul te// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi don// nyan thos zhi 'gog sa las
130a2(1): bgrol// myur 'gro thabs kyi don la btsud// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams// shes bya bag la nyal ba yi// sgrib pa ma lus rdo rje yi// sa bcu ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyangs// 'phags pa'i thugs dam
130a3(1): dbyings nas bskul// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas kyis// rigs kyi gtso bdag nyid du dgongs// 'od zer bcas pa slar 'dus pas// gnas dbus sa bon mchog la thim// brten pa de nyid la
130a4(1): khyab pas// gnas gsum de nyid dag par bsgom// phyi rol bzlas pa'i sbyor ba'o// yab yum gsal ba'i skur bsgoms te// mkha' gsang byin rlabs sbyor ba'i tshul// bzlas pas shes rab sems dbus
130a5(1): nas// de nyid thabs kyi gnas de ru// mthing nag yi ge 'bru tshad spros// dngos po sbyangs te badz+ra'i gzugs// rtse lnga'i dbus su gsal ba'i dkyil// oM zhes bya ba dkar po bsgom// thabs kyi dbus nas shes
130a6(1): rab gsang // mkha' la til 'bru tsam du spros// sngar bzhin mdzad pa'i 'od gsal las// chu skyes ngos bzhi'i dbus dag tu// skye med byi ru'i mdog 'dra bsgom// dgug bzhug bcing dang dgyes pas
130b1(1): bskor// rdo rje can gyi pho brang nas// de yi lam nas shu kra byung // shes rab klong du rab 'phros pas// sems ma'i sbubs nas thabs dkyil thim// 'od zhu dag gi lam du bzhugs// rtsa chen gnyis nas de
130b2(1): la thim// dgyes pa'i dus gcig brten par bsgom// pad+ma'i khu ba dmar la dngas// rgyu ba stobs bcas bsgrub gnas zhugs// nyi shu brgyad kyi lam la brgyud// sku yi gsang ba'i lung nas phyung // mkha' nas
130b3(1): 'od dmar 'bab pa las// rdo rje'i sbubs nas rlung dang bcas// steng du drangs pas bdag po gyur// nA swa g.yas nas g.yon tu thim// shes rab dbyings ma rab tu gyur// sgra dang bcas pa'i hUM gis
130b4(1): drangs// chos ma byang chub sems ldan pas// rlung nas rgyud pa de la gsal// dkar dmar 'od 'dres bde ba che// rnam par rtog med lhun gyis grub// 'di ni nang la dmigs pa'o// skad cig ting 'dzin gsal
130b5(1): bsgom pa'i// lus ngag yid kyi 'jug pa dang // sku gsung thugs su shes pa yi// gnyis med gsang ba shes par spyod// rang gi ngang gis grub pa ni// gsang ba rab tu sbyor ba'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
130b6(1): kyi// gsung gi sgra dbyangs rdzogs pa ste// gsang sngags dgongs pa'i gting phyung nas// rnal 'byor ngag gi che ba'o// zhes bka' stsal to// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsang sngags kyi de kho na nyid kyi rab
131a1(1): tu sbyor ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po sems rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
131a2(1): bzhugs nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i tshogs rnams kun// gsang sngags rol pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// phrin las mdzad pa sna tshogs pa'i// las kyi bye brag gsungs pa
131a3(1): yang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i dngos grub ste// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur// de bas de nyid rtogs bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen lam// rdzogs dang rdzogs pa chen por bshad// 'khor 'das
131a4(1): dus gsum phyogs bcu yi// rdzas dang dngos po rnam pa dag/ rnam shes 'byung ba phung po dang // yul dang skye mched bsam pa ste// 'di dag rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin pas// phung po lnga ni yab lngar rdzogs// 'byung
131a5(1): ba lnga nyid yum lngar rdzogs// rnam shes tshogs brgyad sems dpa' brgyad// yul brgyad sems ma brgyad du rdzogs// mu bzhi'i sgo bzhir gnas pa ste// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs thub pa drug/ yid kyi byed pa kun tu
131a6(1): bzang // chos su bya ba kun bzang mo// ye nas mnyam du gnas pa la// phyi nas brtsal zhing bsgrub tu med// sngar bzhin dbyings su gshegs pas na// de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba// ngo bo nyid kyi bde bas
131b1(1): na// bde bar gshegs te rdzogs sangs rgyas// ma spangs pa nyid spangs pa ste// ma thob pas na thob pa'i mchog/ gtong ba dang ni mthu dang blos// theg pa gcig gi mthar thug par// go cha sbyor ba mchog ldan
131b2(1): pas// sems dpa' chen po'i rang bzhin no// de yang snang ba nges med pas// sgyu ma lta bu'i lus zhes bya// rang bzhin lam dang 'bras bu dang // sems nyid chos nyid de nyid kyi// ngo bo rtogs pa'i dri ma
131b3(1): dang // las kyi rnyog ma bral ba dag/ 'od gsal snang bar gyur pa'o// dbyings dang ye shes thabs shes rab// snang stong srid dang zhi ba dang // de la gnas dang lhag par mthong // mnyam par bzhag cing rjes
131b4(1): kyi thob// rtog pa dang ni snol ba'i chos// ma lus gnyis med sbyor ba yi// mnyam nyid zung du 'jug par 'gyur// dbyer med de la gnas pas na// rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor zhes su brjod/ rten pa'i gzhi/
131b5(1): ni gzhal yas khang // longs spyod mchod pa'i tshogs chen po// pha ma bu dang bu mo ni// yab yum sras dang sras mo ste// phyi nang 'khor ni nye du dang // bran 'bangs mngag gzhug la sogs yin// dang po nyid nas
131b6(1): rdzogs pas na// chen po'i rdzogs pa zhes bya ste// snang ba sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku// rtog pa longs spyod rab rdzogs te// mi rtog ye shes chos skur rdzogs// 'di la ma rdzogs zhes brjod pa'i// skal med de dag
132a1(1): 'khor bar ltung // de bas rdzogs pa'i tshul shes pas// rnal 'byor sems dpa' chen po ni// gnas gsum sbyor ba ci 'dra yang // ngo bo nyid kyis sku gsum rdzogs// ting 'dzin dmigs pa'i
132a2(1): gdeng thob pas// de dag myur du mngon dbyung phyir// rig pa'i spyod pa mngon dbyung bya// sngon bzhin spyad par bya ba ste// dang por spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// phal pa'i 'jig rten mi mthun phyogs// rang la
132a3(1): gnod pa gzhan la spang // phan pa'ang de bzhin bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni phan gnod bral// ma rung bkren dang 'khrug pa dang // dbang dang bag med log lta can// chags dang zhen pa yongs mi
132a4(1): 'dor// de nyid mchog tu gyur la spang // 'phags pa snying rje'i gnas min te// lam gyi grogs su ga la 'gyur// rlom sems khe grags phan yon dang // phrag dog can dang dbang med 'gyod// bsam pa'i dri
132a5(1): mas 'bags pa min// gnas dang snang ba gnod pa'i yul// rang bzhin bsgrub pa myong ba'i rgyan// bzod cing ma chags gdon dang bcas// dka' ba spyod nus spyod pa'i grogs// dus 'dir ma rung ma phan
132a6(1): cing // 'khrul pa'i gnas ngan yul yin no// thabs dang rnam 'phrul ma dag blta/ stong pa snying rje can sbyor zhing // rlabs chen 'jug pa pha rol 'das// kun rdzob bden pa'i dag pa'o// dus gsum don yod
132b1(1): bcas pa dang // phra mo'i rnal 'byor yongs su rdzogs// 'tsho ba bdud rtsi bzhin du spyad// dran dang shes pa bag yod bsten// dge dang sdig pa'i byed pa bgrang // bsngo bya gcig las gzhan du min// sgyu ma sgra
132b2(1): brnyan rmi lam bzhin// bdag dang dngos po sems can dag/ dbye ba med cing yongs ma grub// gus shing ma 'dres ltos pa med// nyon mongs med par spyad pa ni// thun mong chos su spyod pa'o// dman
132b3(1): pa'i bden 'bras mi smon cing // gcig pur gzhi la mi gnas pa// yul gsum dag par sbyor ba ste// ma lus dbye ba med pa'o// khyad par 'di yi spyod pa ni// dkyil 'khor gsum dang mchod pa lnga// 'dod pa'i
132b4(1): yon tan ma lus pa// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa dag/ rang gi de nyid yongs shes pas// rdzogs par longs spyod de nyid do// brtul bzhugs sna tshogs gang 'dzin pa'i// skyes bu dam pa'i rjes su zhugs// phyi dang
132b5(1): nang gi gsang gyur dang // rab tu gsang ba'i dus dag tu// rang gi spyod pa yongs mi 'dor// mkhan po slob dpon lha rnams dang // nyan thos rang rgyal sems dpa' dang // 'jig rten phal par bcas pa
132b6(1): dag/ rang dang lhan cig tha dad min// gang dang gang gis dmigs pa de// mchog gyur sngags kyi spyod pa'o// de las rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu ni// gdod nas dag pa'i zhing khams la// dag dang ma dag gnyis med
133a1(1): phyir// bral dang thob pa mi dmigs kyang // ming tshig tsam gyi 'bras bu ni// ma 'ongs skyes bu drang ba dang // lam don bsgrub phyir rab tu gnang // rang bzhin ting nge 'dzin dang ni// ngo bo nyid
133a2(1): dang spyod pa'i tshogs// ye nas rnam par dag pa la// 'bras bu zhes su bshad pa ste// bsgrub cing rtsol ba ga la yod// mtshan nyid mtshan gzhi spros dang bral// mtshan dang dpe byad gzugs sna tshogs// tha dad
133a3(1): mthong ba 'bras bu ste// grub pa'i dngos po yod ma myong // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// 'og min gsang ba'i pho brang snang // zhing gi bkod pa sna tshogs dag/ med pa nyid kyis phyogs bcur
133a4(1): khyab// lnga dang brgyad dang drug sogs kyi// rnam par phye dang myong ba dang // sna tshogs rigs kyi 'khor lo'i tshogs// rtogs pa rang byung ngo bo'i lus// skye 'gag rtag chad 'gro dang 'ong // yod med mtha' las
133a5(1): rab 'das shing // gdod nas gnas dang sgom pa yis// zhing dang tshom bu 'khor lo dang // thabs dang shes rab gcig nyid kyis// brtags shing snang ba tsam du 'gyur// mchog gyur dman dang bar ma'i sku// sna
133a6(1): tshogs las kyang sna tshogs te// rigs dang mthun pa'i bdag zhen pas// ches lhag yul du gyur pa yin/ gnas skabs mthar thug dus dang thabs// thun mong khyad par yongs su 'byung // ma lus pa dang ma nor
133b1(1): ba'i// rang dang gzhan gyi snang ba yi// yod dang med pa'i mtha' 'dzin pa// shes dang mi shes rtog pa sangs// de la sgrib byed kho na'i dngos// sdig to las kyi dri ma dag/ rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// las kyi
133b2(1): mtha' yis de mi mthong // bslab cing bsdom pa bsrung las rnams// dman pa'i las la cher lhag pa// nyon mongs pa las rang dga' ba// thar med gnas kyi sgrib pa'o// ting nge 'dzin dang sprul pa dang // sdug
133b3(1): bsngal byed pa tha dad dang // shes bya yul dang yul can dang // mthong dang bsgom dang rtog pa yis// gnyen po rim gyis stobs gyur pa// de nyid kyis kyang mthong mi nus// kun rdzob don dam rang bzhin
133b4(1): shes// bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal gyi// ngo bo mngon du rgyu las min// bag la nyal gyi rnam pa yang // blta ba'i chos kyi de mi mthong // gzugs brnyan mthong dang ma bsam dang // mnyam nyid rab tu rtogs pa
133b5(1): dag/ bya ba rjes bsgrub sku gsung thugs// phrin las sngon 'gro rjes su byed// dus gsum kun tu ma chags shing // theg pa med la bstan du med// ma bsgrubs pa yis lhun gyis bsgrubs// ma bltas pa yis
133b6(1): mthong ba ste// ma lus mkhas pas thob pa'o// shes dang shes bya skad cig ma// g.yos pa med par ngang gis gnas// ma bsags ma thob dman pa spangs// ma brtags ma shes mthar thug ste// 'du bral med pa
134a1(1): 'bras bu min// zhes bka' stsal to// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba 'bras bu mthar phyin pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das
134a2(1): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal nas/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yum dang bcas pa'i byin gyis rlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs pa de dag dang / dus gsum du
134a3(1): bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lag na rdo rje 'chang ba sras kyi thu bo chen po dang bcas pa rnams rab tu dgyes shing yid rang bas 'od zer gyi rnam pa dpag tu med par gyur nas/ yang khams gsum pa'i
134a4(1): dngos po ma lus par sbyangs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la thim par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid ni yum dang gnyis su med par slar yang chos nyid zhi ba'i klong rnam par dag pa'i
134a5(1): dbyings de nyid du mnal te bzhugs nas/ phyi ma'i 'gro ba'i don bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la rang bzhin gyis dgongs nas mi 'da' ba nyid du mdzad do// zhi ba 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ rdo rje dbyings
134a6(1): kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dgongs pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur zhing gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla
134b1(1): dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya/ dge'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ shri b+ha ga wAn ma hA he ru ka b+hi ru mA la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus
134b2(1): pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po che mchog he
134b3(1): ru ka chen po de/ 'og min gyi gnas chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang rnam par dag pa b+ha ga yangs pa'i klong chen po/ nam mkha'i dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rin po che sna tshogs las byas pa'i gzhal med khang
134b4(1): rnam par 'phro ba/ dur khrod chen po'i nang 'jigs par byed pa na/ sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa chen pos bzhugs pa'i tshe/ gsang ba chen po'i 'khor dpag tu med pa 'dus pa ni 'di lta ste/ de
134b5(1): bzhin gshegs pa rab tu rnam par snang mdzad pa dang / rab tu mi 'khrugs pa dang / rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang / 'od dpag tu med pa dang / gdon mi za bar grub pa dang / rdo rje rol pa dang / sa rdo rje ma
134b6(1): dang / chu rdo rje ma dang / me rdo rje ma dang / rlung rdo rje ma dang / nam mkha'i rdo rje ma dang / gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa yab dang yum du snang ba dpag tu med pa
135a1(1): dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / kun nas khro ba dang / zhing gi bkod pa rnam par snang ba dang / rab tu rdzogs pa'i gzhal med khang gi rnam par snang ba dang / thabs dang shes rab kyi rang bzhin du snang ba
135a2(1): dang / sprul pa dang / sprul pa'i yang sprul pa dang / bran dang bran gyi yang bran gyi tshogs dang / brjod kyis mi langs pa'i yang brjod kyis mi langs pa rnams dang yang thabs gcig go/ de nas 'khor gyi tshogs de
135a3(1): dag thams cad kyi bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la bltas te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po he ru ka/ che ba'i che mchog kun gyi gtso// dpal ldan rje btsun 'gro ba'i mgon// khyed
135a4(1): kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dag/ rnam par bzhi las khro mdzad cing // nam mkha'i mtha' khyab gzhal med khang // dag cing gtsang ba'i ngang nyid las// dur khrod ltar mdzad ci yis phyir// chags med nam mkha'i rang
135a5(1): bzhin las// shes rab snyoms mdzad ci zhig lags// sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid la// khyod kyis nges par mdzad pa gang // gzhan yang khyod kyi chos nyid las// rnam par 'phrul pa ma lus pa'i// don de deng 'dir
135a6(1): bstan du gsol// a la la ho zhes gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ sems rab tu dad pas
135b1(1): nyon cig/ 'di lta ste/ sngon bskal pa chen po grangs med pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu 'das pa'i yang sngon rol du/ bskal pa chen po gdul dka' ba rab tu dga' ba zhe bya ba la/ 'jig rten gyi
135b2(1): khams sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba zhig tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ skyes bu 'dul ba/ kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi
135b3(1): ston par gyur pa/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron mar gyur pa/ zhes bya ba 'byung ste/ de'i tshe yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
135b4(1): gsang ba chen po don gyi de kho na nyid yang dag par nges pa dang / nges pa ma yin pa dang / sgra'i tshul du rnam par brjod pa dang / sgra'i tshul dang rnam par ma yin par brjod pa dang / dgongs pa zab mo'i tshul du
135b5(1): brjod pa dang / rang gi don mngon gsum du brjod pa'i sgo nas chos bstan pas 'dul bar gyur to// de'i tshe 'khor gyi tshogs der 'dus pa'i skyes bu zhig/ bdag tu 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa drag pos phyi rol
135b6(1): gyi yul nye bar bzung nas/ rgyu'i khyad par dang 'bras bu'i khyad par dang / las dang las kyi khyad par ma brtags te/ spang bar bya ba rnams ni blangs la blang bar bya ba rnams ni spangs te/ gsang ba'i tshig la
136a1(1): log par blta bar gyur pa'i dbang gis/ las mi bzad pa drag po nye bar bsags pas/ srid pa las byung ba'i sa bon rab tu rtsub mos 'phangs nas/ rab tu rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bus
136a2(1): mnar med pa'i gnas su skye bar gyur te// yang de nyid du bdag sdug bsngal gyi dngos po 'di las thar bar gyur na ci ma rung snyam pa dang / de'i 'og tu rab tu tsha ba dang / tsha ba chen po la sogs pa rnams kyi
136a3(1): sdug bsngal rim gyis nyams su myong bar gyur to// de nas yang bdag tsha ba'i sdug bsngal 'di las thar nas grang bar gyur na ci ma rung snyam pa dang / pad+ma ltar gas pa la sogs pa grang ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu
136a4(1): med pa myong bar gyur to// de ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po ji snyed pa rnams kyi nang du/ bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis kyi bar du sdug bsngal nyams su myangs te/ de las thar bar 'dod pa dang / yi
136a5(1): dwags chen po rnams dang / byol song gi lus chen po dag tu skyes te/ bskal pa stong phrag gcig gi bar du sdug bsngal chen po nyams su myong bar gyur to// de nas yang las ngan gyi shugs mi bzad pa de bag tsam
136a6(1): bsrabs par gyur nas/ sngon gyi khro zhing gtums pa'i bag chags kyi rgyu mthun pas nying mtshams sbyar nas 'jig rten gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po yab yum gnyis kyi srid pa blangs te yum gyi lhums na yang
136b1(1): 'jig pa'i sgra drag po 'byin pa la thon pa dang / yi dwags kyi gtso bo srin pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rab tu khro zhing gdug la gtum pa/ thal ba'i mdog can mig dmar ba/ ral pa rab tu
136b2(1): 'bar ba gyen du brdzes pa/ kha gdangs pa'i mche ba gtsigs shing dri dad dang kha rlangs drag pos gzhan bskrad par nus pa/ dud 'gro'i gtso bo dang / gcan gzan khro bo dang / srin po'i rgyal po pags pa lus la
136b3(1): bgos pa/ mgo dang sked pa dang / yan lag gi tshigs rnams ni/ dug sbrul nag po kha nas me 'bar ba dang / mgo bo'i phreng ba 'jigs su rung bas dkris pa/ lag pa drug gi g.yas na ni/ tri shUl dang / thod pa
136b4(1): dang / cang te'u dang / thod pa'i phreng ba dang bcas pa'i dgra sta dang / zhags pa dang / ral gri thogs pa/ g.yon na ni/ kha T+wAM ga dang / rgyu ma'i phreng ba dang / me 'bar ba dang / dbyug pa chen po dang / lcags kyu
136b5(1): dang / gri gug dag bzung ba/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa ni/ lus gcig la mgo brgya stong pa/ mgo gcig la lus brgya stong pa dang / yan lag nyid lag pa spu'i tshogs rnams las mtshon cha'i tshogs du ma
136b6(1): 'gyed par byed do// de'i las dang mthun pa'i chung ma srin mo nag mo 'gyed gi nyi ma yang ti ma zhes bya ba yang rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mdog nag cing ral pa 'khrigs pa kha mig nas me rab tu 'bar ba/
137a1(1): yan lag gi rnam par 'phrul pa las kyang las kyi srin mo chen mo za byed ma zhes bya ba dang / brag byed ma dang / chu byed ma dang / rlung byed ma dang / sham sham mo dang / skam pa mo dang / dbyangs can
137a2(1): ma dang / dri snom ma dang / chang 'thung ma dang / phor thogs ma dang / thod phreng ma dang / g.yang gzhi ma dang / de dag la sogs pa 'byin pa/ de'i bran dang / pho nya'i tshogs dag kyang / khyi dang / wa dang / phag dang /
137a3(1): stag dang / seng ge dang / bya rog dang / 'ug pa dang / bya rgod dang / khra ma dang / pu shud dang / byi la dang / byi ba dang / sre mo dang / rmig bu'i mgo can gyi tshogs kyis rab tu bskor ba/ gzhan yang log srid can
137a4(1): gyi rigs las byung ba'i srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / yi dwags dang / sha za dang / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang bran tu byas te/ de dag thams cad kyang 'jigs tshul drag po dang bcas te mtshon cha bzung zhing
137a5(1): 'dug pa'i nga ro sgrog pa/ dbugs tsha ba dang rab tu grang ba'i rlung drag po phyogs bcur 'byin pa las/ rims dang dug dang / dbyig dug la sogs pa nad dang mtshon gyis char 'babs pas/ gtsang ma'i rigs
137a6(1): kyi lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang dbang po dang / khams dang skye mched dag ma rung bar byed cing pho nyar bcas te/ gang gsod pa dang gcod pa'i las la 'god par byed pa thams cad phyag
137b1(1): brnyan par byas te 'dug go/ las de lta bus khams gsum pa'i sems can ma lus pa rnams ngan 'gro'i las kyi lam mi gzod pa la log par gzhol ba de'i phyir/ nga'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang
137b2(1): ba'i sde de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phrin las yang dag pa las bstan pa yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dag/ de lta bu'i skyes bu de ni gcig du ma zad de/ bdag tu lta ba'i yid kyi phyi rol gyi yul dag la
137b3(1): dngos po dang mtshan mar brtags nas bdag gir gyur pa ni snod bcud kyi dngos po thams cad la khyab par gnas so// yang nang du bdag med pa la mtshan ma'i mtshan mar brtags nas/ nga dang bdag tu
137b4(1): bzung ba las gyur pa ni/ dran pa'i tshogs la gnas par byed/ las dang las kyi 'bras bu mtha' dag yongs su chad cing med par bzung ba las gyur pa ni/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa'i ngag gi yul dang
137b5(1): nam mkha'i khams dbang byed pa ste/ de'i phyir nga'i grogs po phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs brtse gcig pa'i snying rje chen po dang / yon tan gyi tshogs dang 'phrin las kyi mdzad pa chen
137b6(1): pos nga la yongs su bskul te/ spyan rnam par dag pas gzigs shing se gol gyis sgras mngon par go bar mdzad de/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyid kyang chos kyi sku zhi ba chen po'i ngang las
138a1(1): gzugs kyi sku rol pa chen po'i snang bar bzhengs nas/ 'od zer chen po rdo rje kyo ba'i rnam pas drangs pas/ de nyid til gyi gang bu bzhin du gyur pa de byang chub kyi sems rdo rje'i ngo bor zhu nas
138a2(1): gsang ba'i lam nas byung ba so sor snang zhing ma 'dres pa nyid kyi thugs yi ge'i ngo bor gnas pa/ dbugs dri zhim zhing ring bar gyur par byed pa rdo rje'i sna'i rtse mo la dril zhing tha mi dad cing dbye ba med pa
138a3(1): gsang ba'i pad+ma'i ge sar gyi rtse mo la yang reg cing 'phro bar mdzad nas/ yum pad+ma'i dbyings su bab pa rgya mtsho ltar bskyil ba la byin gyis rlabs kyis/ nga'i phyag rgya'i ngo bor gyur nas/ khro mo rdo rje dbang phyug ma
138a4(1): yang 'od kyi tshul du snang bar gyur par mngon par 'du mdzad nas/ zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i sku nyon mongs pa'i bud shing thams cad bsregs pa'i 'od dang ldan pa'i bskal pa'i me chen po dang ldan pa/ khrag gi
138a5(1): rgya mtsho chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas byung ba'i keng rus kyi ri rab chen po'i rtse la/ dur khrod chen po'i rang bzhin can gyi gnas chen po brgyad du sprul zhing gnang bar byas te/ skyes bu dag tu lta ba de'i las kyi rnam
138a6(1): par smin pa sbyang ba'i phyir/ thugs rje'i shugs drag po mngon du phyung nas/ de bas kyang ches lhag pa'i rol pa'i cho 'phrul bstan cing de gdul ba'i phyir snang ba yin gyi/ khyed rnams nga'i sku dang gsungs
138b1(1): dang thugs kyi gsang ba'i mdzod 'di la the tshom dang som nyi za bar ma byed cig ces bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
138b2(1): phrin las yongs su mdzad pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas yang 'khor rab tu 'dus pa de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das/ ma 'ongs pa phyi
138b3(1): ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa khyod nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rdo rje'i tshogs 'di dag chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong du ma gyur cing / khams gsum pa'i sa la snang
138b4(1): bar gyur nas/ tshul 'di lta bu dang mthun pa'i log sred can dag las rnam par ma dag pa 'byung ste/ bla na med pa'i sa thob par 'dod pa dag la yang rab tu rnam par 'tshe bar 'gyur na/ khyod kyi sngon gyi phrin
138b5(1): las ji lta ba de bzhin du bgyi bar 'tshal na/ bdag cag la brtse ba chen pos dgongs te/ yang dag par bstan du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / de nas dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi sku'i ngang las
138b6(1): gzugs kyi sku 'jigs byed 'bar ba thams cad kyi nang na che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa he ru ka chen po'i ngo bor bzhengs te/ gsung gcig gi dbyangs kyis nam mkha'i khams thams cad khyab par mdzad ste 'di skad
139a1(1): ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i tshogs chen dag/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// ma 'ongs dus na 'byung ba yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// bdag nyid chen po rtag pa
139a2(1): yi/ khro bo'i tshul du sngon byung ba// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro drag gtum po yis// 'o dod 'bod cing ltung bar gyur// mi bzad chen po'i sdug bsngal te// dug gsum mkha' la mngon zhen
139a3(1): pa'i// ji ltar mdzad pa'i thabs kyis gdul// srid gsum bdag po 'dul ba'i phyir// nga rgyal chen po'i skur bstan te// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid nas/ khro mo dbang phyug mngon phyung ste/ gnyis su med
139a4(1): pa'i cho 'phrul las/ khro bo 'chol ba'i dmag bsdus nas// sngon gyi phrin las ji lta ba// sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs par spyad// oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par
139a5(1): mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad/ khro bo'i tshul 'chang khros pas kyang // 'jig rten gsum rnams sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis/ khams
139a6(1): gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// thugs rje che dang ldan pa yi// kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs// dam tshig la sdang rnam sbyang phyir// dur khrod gar gyi phyag rgyar gsal// oM ma hA shrI he ru ka kro tI shwa rI sa ma ya
139b1(1): de byi sho d+ha ya sta na hUM phaT/ hUM kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus byas nas// khams gsum 'khrugs pa'i bdud chen po// zhi bar bstan pas 'dul ma yin// khro bo'i tshogs
139b2(1): kyis gdul bar bya/ kha trang kha ru tra A kaR+Sha ya ma ta kha ru lu ru lu mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de yis dregs pa'i bdag po de// phung po nyam thag gan rkyal mnan// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar
139b3(1): mtshams su brkyang // stong gsum 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'dzam bu'i gling gi sa yi char// dur khrod chen po brgyad du byas// de yi 'khor byung lha brgyad bsgral// rang byung mchod rten chen po brgyad// srin mo
139b4(1): sham sham mo la sogs// gnas las grub pa'i ma mo brgyad// yon tan brgyad ldan mkha' 'gros bsrung // pho nya seng ge stag la sogs// rang gis lus dang mthun pas btul// za ba mo la sogs pa
139b5(1): yis// srin mo nyi shu brgyad rnams kyang // btul te bka' yi bsrung mar bzhag/ de yi rnam shes hUM du bsgyur// byin rlabs sprul pa'i sbyor mtshams su// 'phangs te rgyal bas sras su byas// thal bas rgyan pa'i
139b6(1): zhing khams su// thal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba'i// sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan gyis// las kyi lhag ma tsam nyid las// rang dang chos mthun tshar gcod cing // sgrol byed nag po chen po yin// de yi 'khor
140a1(1): gyi thog mar byung // phyogs kyi dregs pa'i bdag po bcu// bsgral cing tshar bcad 'du byed pa'i/ khro bcu'i zhabs kyi gdan yin no// gnod srin mo ni mig gcig ma// glog 'gru ma dang rlung shugs
140a2(1): can// klu 'dul ma rnams khyo dang bcas// bsgral cing tshar bcad 'dul byed pa// mthar byed chen po brgyad rnams sprul// de yi gnas dang pho brang yang // gzhal yas khang du byin gyis brlabs// de yi phung po
140a3(1): sha phrag ni// bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs te rol// mdor na 'dod khams dbang phyug gis// dregs pa khyo shugs g.yog 'khor bcas// ma lus bsgral zhing tshar gcad de// kha cig 'khor dang pho nyar
140a4(1): mngag/ la la gnas dang gdan du byas// ma 'ongs dus na skyes bu dag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas kun ngo bo// sku gsum phrin las che ba'i mchog/ kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ he ru ka yi tshul 'chang
140a5(1): brtul bzhugs bzang po de la ni// ma rig log par blta ba'i tshogs// bdud bzhi'i phyogs su rtogs rnams kyis// 'tshe zhing bar du gcod pa'am// gdug cing 'da' bar nus ma yin// de la 'di yi
140a6(1): gzhi nyid kyang // ngo bo sems rgyun ma chad cing // tshig las 'da' bar mi bya ste// bde bar gshegs pa dam pa'i tshig/ rtsa ba nyid du gyur pa ste// snyigs ma'i dus kyi ston pa dang // da lta sangs rgyas 'di dag
140b1(1): la// tha dad du ni cung mi brtag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i grogs dag kyang // de dang rjes su mthun par blta// sgo gsum gus pas brtson bya zhing // dam pa'i tshig las 'da' mi bya// de bzhin he ru ka yi tshogs// ming
140b2(1): las byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen// spro bsdu las la sbyar ba dang // dus bzhi'i phyag rgya de nyid ni// sngags dang rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// rgyun mi chad par bsnyen cing mchod// nga yi thugs la mnyes bsam pa// rdzas
140b3(1): dang yo byad gnas dang dus// phyag rgya cho ga dkyil 'khor dag/ gsang bar 'os pa gsang ba'i bar// 'di dag kun la gnyer du gtad// dug lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// nam yang spang bar mi bya zhing // gshang gci
140b4(1): khu ba sha dang khrag/ longs spyod chen po rtag tu rol// bsad cing rku ste mi rigs spyad// brdzun zhing rtsub la blang ba'i tshig/ der ni rtag tu smra bar byos// phung po dang ni 'byung ba kun// nga yi rigs kyi yab yum
140b5(1): ste// yul dang rnam shes de yi 'khor// 'khor dang skye mched gzhan rnams kyang // de las byung bar shes pa yis// rigs kyi sku lnga rab tu bsgrub// mthong dang rig dang shes dang spyad// 'di las 'da' bar ma
140b6(1): gyur na// log par blta ba 'dul nus shing // sangs rgyas rnams dang nga nyid 'grub// bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyi ma mngon par 'byung ba dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i le'u ste
141a1(1): gnyis pa'o// // de nas kun bzang he ru kas// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mngon sprul pa// chos kun gud na yang med de// nam mkha' yangs pa'i dbyings nyid las// mi rtog rang byung thugs
141a2(1): rje'i shugs// rang bzhin ma 'gags cir yang gsal// rnam par shes pa'i gzhi nyid kyang // bskyed pa'i nus pa rgyu dang ldan// dngos por snang ba 'jig rten bsregs// bag chags sdug bsngal
141a3(1): ma lus gtor// 'dod chags 'khor ba'i rgyan lam bkrus// gti mug mi zad gter du gtams// zhe sdang keng rus 'bar ba brtsegs// dug gsum thod pa sna tshogs dang // lha klu gza' dang rgyu skar
141a4(1): bcas// chu srin sbrul dang rus sbal dang // dregs pa rA tra bsgral ba yi// sha khrag rus pa pags pa dang // don snying snod bcas rnams kyis brgyan// gzhal yas khang pa dur khrod bcas// gang gis 'dul ba de
141a5(1): ltar blta// dngos po ma lus chos dbyings las// rdul tsam g.yo ba med pa ste// nga ni chos dbyings he ru ka/ nges pa'i don de nga yi gnas// nga la yul dang phyogs ma grub// phyogs bcu kun tu khyab pa ste// 'di
141a6(1): ni nga yi bzhugs pa'i gnas// bsgral ba'i zhing bcu mngon spyod kyis// bsgral te thugs rjes mi rtog 'dzin// ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pa la bstan// 'di ni nga yi lung gi gnas// phyogs bcu dregs pa'i bdag po
141b1(1): bcu// khro chen bcu yi gdan du gsal// nga yi bsgrub pa'i gnas zhes bya// 'byung ba dang ni phung po rnams// nga nyid gzhi yi gnas yin no// dman pa'i theg pa drang ba'i phyir// 'du shes bcu ni bsam pa'i
141b2(1): gnas// lam lnga dang ni rnal 'byor lnga// 'gro ba'i gnas su nga yis bshad// rig dbang stobs lnga brten pa'i gnas// dug lnga rgyu lnga sbyangs pa'i gnas// bdud brtsi sha rnams bsten pa'i gnas// 'di las ma
141b3(1): gtogs dngos gzhan med// rigs lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// thob byed sa bcu 'di la gnas// thams cad rdzogs pas gnas shes brjod// khyad par du ni 'dul ba'i sa// 'phags lam dang ni rnam thar
141b4(1): brgyad// dman pa'i theg pa brgyad nyid dang // sa brgyad ma bcos rdzogs pa ni// ka ba rin chen pad+ma dang // 'khor lo dag gis nges par byas// byol song gtso bo chen po dang // dregs pa'i bdag po lha chen
141b5(1): brgyad// thabs dang shes rab 'od kyi dkyil// 'dam skyes mdzes pa bsam mi khyab// sa bon phra mo ting nge 'dzin// 'phro 'du las kyi mnyes shing sangs// bsdus shing bstan pa 'di nyid de// mthing nag zhal
141b6(1): gsum phyag drug ldan// chos kyi sku la 'gyur med cing // sku gsum pha rol phyin drug rdzogs// nyon mongs skyon bral g.yas zhal dkar// thugs rje chags pas g.yon zhal dmar// ye shes lnga rdzogs sangs rgyas
142a1(1): lnga// rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga dang // rtse gsum g.yas kyi phyag gis 'dzin// thod pa tshar gsum g.yon na bsnams// theg pa rim dgu ngang gis rdzogs// nyon mongs lnga 'joms ye shes lnga// khams
142a2(1): gsum sbyor zhing dug gsum gcod// bdud bzhi 'joms mdzad zhabs bzhir bgrad// gnam zhal dbyings phyug khro mo ni// chos nyid rol pa'i dges pa stob// gnyis med snang ba 'od kyi tshul// dril bu thod
142a3(1): khrag 'dzin cing stob// A~M badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka kro d+hi shwa rI dza la ni hUM phaT/ 'bar zhing gsal la rdzogs par blta// gal te gdul bar ma nus na// hUM spro zhing bsdu ba bstan pa las// dbu dgu phyag ni bco
142a4(1): brgyad de// theg pa'i 'dod pa yongs rdzogs shing // khams chen bco brgyad rtsad bcad nas// stong pa bco brgyad ngang du sbyor// rnam thar brgyad kyi zhabs bgrad cing // phyag dgu g.yas kyi dang po yi// chos
142a5(1): nyid mi 'gyur rdo rje 'dzin// dug gsum rtsad gcod kha T+wAM ga/ chos kyi sgra sgrog rnga bo che// 'khor los 'khor ba rtsad nas chod// dgos 'dod 'byung ba'i rin po che// pad+ma chags med skyon dang bral// ral
142a6(1): gris nyon mongs dra ba gcod// dgra snas bdud kyi dpung rnams 'joms// zhags pas khams gsum rgyud drug 'dren// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag ni// thugs rjes 'gro don khyab par mdzad// zhing dbyug rdos
142b1(1): pa'i phung po 'joms// nyon mongs thal ba rlog pa'i gshol// nyi ma dang ni zla ba yis// ma rig mun pa'i tshogs rnams sel// ri rab dreg pa rU tra gnon/ khrag gis rgya mtshos gnas ngan 'khru// me dpung las
142b2(1): dang bag chag bsreg/ dngos 'dzin dri ma gtor ba'i rlung // bco brgyad phyag gi 'gro don rdzogs// che mchog dpa' ba'i chas brgyad ni// glang chen ko rlon stobs bcu ldan// stag lpags 'phrin las rnam bzhi
142b3(1): mdzad// sbrul rgyan gdug pa'i dug rnams 'dul// zhing lpags nyon mongs rtsa ba gcod// rak+ta'i thig le 'gro don chags// thal chen mtshan mas phrin las brtson// zhag gi zo ris nyon mongs rngub// bskal
142b4(1): pa'i me dpung rtogs tshogs bsreg/ 'bar ba'i spyan ni dgu phrag gsum// gzigs pas ma lus bde la 'god// lha mo dbang phyug khro mo'i rgyal// zhal gsum phyag drug rdzogs pa la// sngar bshad yab kyi phyag
142b5(1): mtshan 'dzin// kun nas rab tu bskyod pa'i tshul// sngon gyi phrin las ji bzhin du// gnas gsum yul du gsal bar bya// de yi 'dul ba'i las rnams byed// gal te 'dul bar ma nus na// hUM b+h+yo s+pha ra Na phaT/
142b6(1): saM ha ra Na hUM/ oM badz+ra ma ha shrI he ru ka ma hA tsan d+ha sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ badz+ra ma hA kro ti shwa rI da ra ma b+h+yo hUM/ nga ni kun bzang he ru ka/ che ba'i che mchog dpal gyi sku// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig/
143a1(1): ldan// sa dang ye shes ma lus rdzogs// bzhi cu rtsa gnyis phyag na ni// ji ltar bshad pa'i sangs rgyas ni// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis rdzogs par bzhugs// zhabs brgyad bgrad pas lha chen
143a2(1): brgyad// byol song brgyad dang bcas pa gnon// ting 'dzin brgyad dang chos nyid sbyor// ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// smin mtshams sna phrag glog stong 'gyu// 'bar ba'i spyan ni drug cu gsum// sdang mig
143a3(1): zhe la gdon cing gzigs// shangs nas 'thor rlung spor zhing 'tshub// snyan nas drag po'i 'brug stong sgrog/ rngams pa'i zhal gyis khams gsum rngub// gnam lcags mche ba zangs yag gtsigs// le brgan
143a4(1): ljags 'gril glog stong 'gyu// ba spu thu lum me stag 'phro/ rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkhar khyab// dpa' zhing sgeg la 'jigs su rung // rgod cing gshe la 'jigs par ston// snying rje'i rngam dang zhi ba'i
143a5(1): tshul// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phyogs bcur khyab// khro mo 'dod chags ye shes che// he he dgyes pa'i gzi gdangs can// rin chen pad+ma rab rgyas la// mnyes pa'i sbyor ba'i rol pa stob// dbu dgu sa dgu'i rtogs
143a6(1): pa 'joms// stong pa bco brgyad phyag dang ldan// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje yi// chos sku 'gyur med tshul gyis bzhugs// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag gsol// dug gsum ma lus stong par gsol// g.yas kyi phyag
143b1(1): brgyad 'og ma na// go rI ma mo brgyad 'phyar zhing // g.yon gyi 'og ma phra men brgyad// zhabs bzhi rigs bzhi dbyings su gnon// dur khrod dpa' ba'i chas la sogs// ji ltar bshad pas tshul 'dzin
143b2(1): pa'i// 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis sku la 'khril// hUM A oM hUM phaT AH/ zhes nyid kyi sku'i dkyil 'khor de lta bu'i ded dpon dbang phyug la sogs pa rnams la de ltar snang bar mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das dpal
143b3(1): che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku'i dkyil 'khor che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa rtsa ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas kun bzang he ru kas// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor dbyung ba'i phyir// mkha' dbyings
143b4(1): rdo rje byin gyis brlabs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hUM ldan dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor oM dang ldan// chags med pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA
143b5(1): ga ta pA dza badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM badz+ra pad+ma sarba yo gi ta pra we sha phaT/ mkha' klong pad+ma'i gzhal yas su// bde chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// rab dgyes mnyam
143b6(1): pa'i sbyin pas bstim// A~M sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya pU dza pra bar ta na badz+ra swa b+ha At+ma ko&haM/ au dang ldan pa'i thig le las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bskyod// hUM gis mkha' la phab byas te// thabs dang
144a1(1): shes rab byang chub sems// mkha' la gsal dag nyi zla'i 'od// sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ra ho haM/ rA ga yA mi/ byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las/ khro bo 'chol ba'i dkyil 'khor spro// sangs
144a2(1): rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs bya'i phyir// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa ma lus bsgral// oM badz+ra kro ta bi shwa dza la A kaR+Sha ya ya da ha dza la hUM phaT// e h+ye hi hUM b+h+yo s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ hUM

144a5(1): yum/ 'khor lo b+ha na d+ha stob cing 'khril// bcom ldan gu h+ya he ru ka/ ser nag g.yas mthing g.yon dmar zhal// rin chen ri rab dgra sta g.yas// thod khrag ri rab rgyu zhags g.yon// gu h+ya kro ti shwa rI ni//
144a6(1): rin chen b+han dmar stobs cing 'khril// bcom ldan bi shwa he ru ka/ dmar nag g.yas mthing g.yon dkar sku// pad+ma be con dgra sta g.yas// b+han dmar ri rab thong gshol g.yon// bi shwa kro ti shwa rI
144b1(1): ni// pad+ma zod khrag stob cing 'khril// bcom ldan yak+Sha he ru ka/ ljang nag g.yas dkar g.yon dmar zhal// rgya gram ral gri dgra sta g.yas// b+han d+ha zhags pa zong gshol g.yon// yak+ka kro ti shwa rI ma/ rgya

144b3(1): par bzhugs// gnas mchog de yi phyi rim la// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa 'dul byed pa// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan pa bcu// mdog dkar 'khor lo tri shul 'dzin// me dpal dbyug to 'dzin dmar
144b4(1): ser// mthing nag thod dbyug dgra sta thogs// smug nag ral gri zhags pa 'dzin// spu gri sbrul zhags thogs pa dmar// dmar sku b+han+d+ha rnga yab thogs// ljang gu rgya gram dril bu thogs// mthing nag dgra sta rtse
144b5(1): gsum 'dzin// sngo skya mda' gzhu 'geng shing 'phen// dud ka tho ba zhags pa thogs// kun kyang zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum gyis// so so'i phyogs kyi dregs pa gnon// ji ltar 'jug pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// shes
144b6(1): rab gshin rje pad+ma dang // stobs chen khro bo chen po bzhi// dkar po 'gugs byed lcags kyu 'dzin// ser po zhags pas 'ching byed cing // lcags sgrog sdom byed dmar po ste// rdeg byed dril bu can mdog

145b1(1): gsum ma lus 'jig rten gang / oM AHhUM/ au hUM swA hrIHha/ ka ya wA ka tsit+ta k+Sha a d+hiSh+Tha na A we sha ya/ prA we sha ya hUM/ bud+d+ha badz+ra rat+na pad+ma karma a b+hi Shiny+tsa AH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ badz+ra g+ha na tsakra ma d+ha la/ e A ra li dzaH/
