148a5(1): 'dzin 'thob par 'gyur// sred med bu dang khyab 'jug gi/ de yi zag pa'i dri gshang gci// chu klung gangs kyi 'gram du skye// nye'u shing dang ram nye'u// nang khrol don snying nad rnams sel// zag pa zad de nam
148a6(1): mkhar 'gro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i go 'phang thob// dang po srid pa'i bdud rtsi la// lha dang lha min rtsod cing 'thab// brgya byin dbang po'i lag pa la// lha ma yin gyis mtshon phog lhung // de yi sha khrag smin cing
148b1(1): bskyed// dbang po'i lag dang byi tshe lag/ dngos grub blang ba'i phyag rgya ste// nor dang 'bru rnams 'du bar 'gyur// rta mgrin dbang gi dngos grub thob// yul 'khor bsrung gi bu thu bo// drang srong yan lag
148b2(1): dga' ba ste// ming ni rgyal po bshes gnyen can// b+hu su ku ni rgya cher mdzad// 'dod khams lha yi gtso bor skyes// bod pa 'phyis pas drag po 'phros// lha chen de yi dpral ba nas// mig gcig lhag par 'dug
148b3(1): pa las// smin cing bskyed pas sa steng khyab// 'bu su lug mig rnam gsum gyi// mig gi mngon shes thob par byed// sa yi snying po'i dngos grub thob// nga yi sngon gyi phrin las kyi// lha chen tshangs pa bsgral ba
148b4(1): las// sna nas khrag zag bskyed cing smin// sna ma'i 'bras bu srin gyi shing // dri yi mngon shes thob par byed// nam mkha' snying po'i dngos grub thob// 'das pa'i dus na sngon gyi tshe// rta mgrin dbang gi phrin
148b5(1): las kyis/ kha 'bar bzhi yi lce bcad de// smin zhing bskyed pas bdud rtsir gyur// do ba dang ni gnya' ba dang // lta ba dang ni se ba bzhi// me tog rma lo kri kri dang // gser gyi mdud can ha lo tri// spyad pas lce
148b6(1): yi mngon shes dang // skran ras gzigs kyi go 'phang thob// nga yis srin po bum sna bsgral// chung ma srin mo dza mun ti// rna ba a sho kan d+har gyur// smad pa'i rna ba'i nad rnams sel// sgra yi mngon shes mnga'
149a1(1): bar byed// phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub thob// til mar bu ram sbrang rtsi dag/ lan tshwa mar dang snying po lnga// bdud rtsi gtso bo'i yan lag ste// rlung mkhris bad kan chu ser dang // 'dul
149a2(1): ba'i nad rnams sel bar byed// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub thob// go sa ha dang le seng dang // gi haM chu taM ma dza haM/ me tog lnga zos yon tan gyis// bad mkhris glo dang dug rnams sel// rigs kyi yum lnga'i
149a3(1): dngos grub thob// shing thog rgun 'brum ka ko la// a 'bras pa na 'bras bu lngas// sha khrag rus pa chu ser dang // lus kyi nad rnams sel bar byed// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin las lnga yi
149a4(1): dngos grub thob// nA ga ge sar shing tsha dang // sug smel ga ta pa tra dang // skyu ru ra dang dri sna lngas// sha khrag rus pa chu ser dang // dug gi nad rnams sel bar byed// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // las
149a5(1): rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rgya spos dza ti pha la dang // ga pur tsan+dan li shi lnga// tsha ba'i nad rnams sel bar byed// tshul khrims rnam dag dngos grub thob// 'bras dang so ba mon khre'u// nas dang gro
149a6(1): dang til rnams ni// mu ge'i bkres pa sel byed cing // tshe dang stobs dang bkrag mdangs gzi// longs spyod phun sum tshogs par byed// gser dngul zangs lcags g.yu dang lnga// dbul zhing phongs pa sel
149b1(1): byed cing // rigs lnga thugs kyi dngos grub thob// rang bzhin spyad pa'i yon tan las// bsgrub pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// kye ma tshangs pa drang srong dang // lha klu dri za bram ze sogs/ khyed kyi brtul zhugs
149b2(1): dka' thub kyis// bsten cing spyad pa'i rdzas 'di rnams// sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus nyid nas// bshang gci khu ba sha khrag gis// ma bskyed pa dang ma byung med// thams cad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin// gtsang sbras
149b3(1): nyams par gyur ta re// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de bor la// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// bka' yi dam pa 'di zung zhig/ ces bka' stsal pas/ tshangs pa dang drang srong la sogs pa'i 'khor de
149b4(1): dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi gtsang ba dang sme bar 'dzin pa'i longs spyod rnams bshang ba dang gci ba dang byang sems kun+da lta bu dang / pad+ma lta bu dang / mi dang / rta dang / khyi dang / ba glang dang / glang po che'i
149b5(1): sha dang / myos par byed pa 'bru bcud kyi btung ba rnams kyi rlabs te/ rgya mtsho dang chu'i rgun lta bu dang / rigs kyi nang na gdol pa dang / khyi dang / phag dang / bong bu'i tshogs rnams kyi khu ba dang / khrag gi klong
149b6(1): chen po snang bar gyur nas brgyal te/ gtsang bra dang sme ba'i rnam par rtog pa drag pos gzir zhing 'dug pa la/ rang rang gi las dang mthun par gdul bar nus pa'i ston pa 'jam dpal dang / sa'i snying po la
150a1(1): sogs pa nyid kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba chen po las phyung ste/ 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig/ 'di dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
150a2(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang gting dpag dka' zhing / rgya che ba'i brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa yang dag pa ste/ tshul 'di lta bus longs spyad na/ blo mchog tu gyur cing yangs pa dang ldan pa rnams
150a3(1): kyi don rgya chen po mdzad do// da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang phrin las chen po spyod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur yang // sems can blo chung ba rnams kyi mig lam du snang bar mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dag
150a4(1): khyed rnams ni sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag pa'i bya ba byas shing byang chub sems bskyed de/ smon lam rgya chen pos 'gro ba'i don rnam par spyod pa la rab tu gzhol ba'i spro ba dang ldan pas/ sems can gyi rigs
150a5(1): dang khams dang / bag la nyal dang las dang bsam pa mthun pa rnams 'dul ba'i dus dang tshod la bab pa ste skrag par ma byed cig/ 'dir ni bdag cag gi ston pa kun tu bzang po he ru ka nyid kyis bdag cag
150a6(1): la sogs pa tshul 'di lta bus 'dul bar 'os pa rnams kyi don du mngon par sprul pa ste/ don dam par ni chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong zhing 'dus ma byas pa/ bdag med pa/ rnam pa zhi ba/ zag pa med
150b1(1): pa/ kha na ma tho ba med pa 'jig rten las 'das pa/ de bzhin nyid las g.yo ba med pa las sprul pa tsam du zad kyis/ the tshom za bar ma byed cig/ ces dbug dbyung ba mdzad do// de nas tshangs pa dang drang srong
150b2(1): dang bram ze'i tshogs de dag la/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par rol pa chen po mngon du bstan te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis tshangs pa dang drang srong la
150b3(1): sogs pa de dag la sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur bar mdzad pas/ de dag thams cad rang gi lus ni rigs kyi lha dang lha mo'i tshogs su snang bar gyur la/
150b4(1): ngag gis ni thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin no// zhes bya ba'i sgra rgyun du brjod de/ phyi dang nang gi rnam par rtogs pa las grol zhing / thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings chen por ro gcig par gnas par gyur
150b5(1): to// mi gtsang zhing sme ba'i rdzas kyi dngos po rnams kyang dri dang kha dog dang ro phun sum tshogs pa/ lta na sdug cing / longs spyod kyi gtso bo yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che lta bu 'dod pa'i don ma lus pa thogs pa
150b6(1): med par 'grub pa/ dngos grub kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa'i gter chen por gyur te/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi mchod pa mnyes par 'grub cing / rigs 'dzin pa'i byang chub
151a1(1): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yang longs spyod dam pa'i mchog tu gyur to// gzhan yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma rigs kyi
151a2(1): bu dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sems can gang dag bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang / byin gyis rlabs kyi tshul 'di dag nyid kyis 'dul ba ma rtogs pa kha cig ni/ yang dag
151a3(1): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i byin gyis rlabs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas don byed par 'gyur ro// gzhan kha cig ni 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dang / lag na rdo rje dang / sa'i snying po
151a4(1): la sogs pa rnams kyi don byed de/ gzhan kha cig ni 'jig rten gyi lha tshangs pa chen po dang / rgyun shes kyi bu la sogs pa'i drang srong chen po rnams dang / tsa ra ka dang / nab so skyes dang // tha skar gyi bu la
151a5(1): sogs pa gza' dang rgyu skar gyi ded dpon chen po rnams dang / g.yon phyogs kyi lha dang rkang gnyis spyod pa la sogs pa klu'i gtso bo dang / zang la gnas dang me bzhin 'jug la sogs pas don byed do// me lha
151a6(1): dang rlung lha'i gtso bo khyed rnams ni lo ma dang / me tog dang 'bras bu las gyur pa rnams longs spyad de/ dri dang ro dang nus mthu dang 'bras bu'i yon tan gyis sems can gyi nad rigs bsal ba'i phyir/ sngon
151b1(1): gyi gnas kyi rigs rjes su gzung bar gyis shig/ bram ze gzhon nu'i sprin la sogs pa rnams kyi ni sman chen po'i bcud kyi len gyis/ sems can gyi rigs kyi tshe dang kha dog dang stobs dang lang tsho bkrag dang
151b2(1): gzi brjid rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir rigs rjes su gzung bar gyis shig 'bras skyong gi bu mo dang / dzam b+ha la dang / da ba shu'i bu mo dang / lha dang klu'i bu mo rnams kyis ni rang rang gi longs spyod pa'i
151b3(1): rdzas gang gis longs spyad pa de dag la// so so'i bcud dang byin gyis rlabs dang dngos grub gsol ba'i phyir rigs rjes su gzung bar gyis shig/ khyed rnams ni bcom ldan 'das kyi phrin las yang dag par
151b4(1): gzung ba'i phyir mngon du mdzad pa yin gyis don chen po yal bar dor bar ma byed cig ces smras pa dang / tshangs pa dang drang srong la sogs pa'i 'khor de dag gis 'di skad ces smras so// kye bcom ldan 'das
151b5(1): bdag cag la sogs pa sems can thams cad thugs rje chen pos yongs su 'dzin par mdzad pa'i kun tu bzang po he ru ka che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag cag rnams ni khyod 'khor dang
151b6(1): bcas pa rnams kyis ji ltar bsgo ba dang / ma 'ongs pa'i gang zag rnams kyis smon cing ltos pa las bdag cag 'da' bar byed re kan zhes bro bor ro// sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta sa ma ya na ra kan zhes brjod de/ tha
152a1(1): tshig la gnas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dam tshig chen po'i las nye bar bsgrub pa dngos grub kyi rig 'dzin gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de
152a2(1): nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi dam tshig chen po rab tu gsal ba'i tshogs de dag nye bar bsgrub pa'i
152a3(1): gnas dang ston pa dang 'khor dang yo byad kyi khyad par dang / de'i thabs dang 'bras bu dang / yon tan gyi tshogs ji snyed pa dag dus phyi ma'i tshe na 'byung ba'i sems can nyon mongs pas rab tu dkris pa rnams
152a4(1): kyis grol ba dang thar pa thob par bya ba'i phyir thugs brtse ba chen pos nye bar dgongs te bstan du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i dkyil
152a5(1): 'khor chen po bdun dang rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po'i sbyor ba'i byin rlabs yang dag par spro ba brgyad mngon par sprul te kun tu snang bar mdzad nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
152a6(1): rnams// legs so legs so shin tu legs/ khyod kyi dri ba 'di nyid kyis// bsod nams byas pa'i khyad par ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pas// bskal par gsungs kyang mdzad mi nus// de bas rigs
152b1(1): kyi bu rnams nyon// mthong zhing goms la brtul zhugs gnas// re zhing dogs med gtsang ba ste// zab cing mthar phyin dpa' bskur la// thabs mkhas blo che brtan zhing gsal// ston pa nyid kyis rjes bzung
152b2(1): bas// lus ngag yid kyi nyes byas zad// blo ldan gtong phod brtson 'grus che// mi phyed dad can rigs dag la// brtul phod ma zhum nges par spyod// nus pa bskyed dang smin pa'i dus// ji ltar bshad pa'i
152b3(1): mtshan nyid dang // yon tan rgyan rtags ldan pa'i gnas// mi mdza'i phyogs kun rab bzlog rdzas// zla ba phyed pa byung nas brtsam// tshogs bsag bar chad bsal la 'bad// rang nyid zhe sdang rdo rje yi// sngon gyi
152b4(1): phrin las ma lus sbyar// gzhi de brtag cing sbyang ba dang // bdag gir bya ba mchog yin no// dam tshig rdzas kyi mdzes par mnyam// rang gi rigs dang phyogs dag gnas// rdo rje ba su ta yis gcad// nyi zla
152b5(1): gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// 'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'du gsal// grub med nor bu rin po che// rigs kyi mtshan mas brgyan pa'i snod// nyid kyi phyogs su gsal bar dgod// rigs lnga rtsa ba'i dam
152b6(1): tshig lnga// yan lag dri dang kha dog gis// dman pa sgrib byed mthun pa'i skyobs// rgyal po blon po dmangs dang bcas// ma lus pa ni thams cad kun// mthun pa'i rigs kyis rab tu dbye// pho brang de yi rgyan
153a1(1): dang rtags// dgod dang byin brlab la sogs kun// ngas bshad don las 'da' mi bya// phyag mtshan bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// dam pa rigs brgya'i ting nge 'dzin// byin brlab dbang
153a2(1): bskur cho 'phrul gyis// mchod cing bstod de sbyang ba dang / bsdu zhing bstim pa myur bar bya// oM sarba pany+tsa dz+nyA na sa twa kro ta mu na ye swA hA/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka kro tI shA rI ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ 'di la bstod cing
153a3(1): bshags byang dang // ma lus pho brang dbab pa dang // 'jig rten dman pa'i rnam rtog gzhom// snga ma phyi ma dus kyi bdag/ gnyis su blta zhing ngag gi sgra// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ra sA ya na sta na dza ya g+hu h+ya
153a4(1): sid+d+hi hUM hrIHTha/ rdo rje sems dpa'i nga rgyal 'chang // bskyed pa'i byin rlabs dngos la bsdu// 'phro 'du gsal te rtags dang sbyar// rigs kun 'dzin pa dag pa'i phyir// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lngar bsdus pa// oM
153a5(1): AHhUM swA ha/ 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma rgya gram 'od dang ldan// dug lnga rgyud lnga sbyangs shing drang // 'ja' tshon lta bu de mnyes bya// snying gar thabs dang shes rab 'od// sbyor bas 'phro 'du 'phros pa
153a6(1): las// mnyes dang sbyang ba bsdu byas pa/ thim pas mi bzad 'khor lo'i dbyings// sku dang ye shes gsal bar blta// oM AHhUM sA hA dz+nyA na pany+tsa s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ phyag rgya lnga nyid mnyes par
153b1(1): bskang // dngos grub bcud kyi gang bar blta// sngon gyi phrin las ji bzhin spyad// de nyid lnga ru snang ba yang // gcig nyid kho na yin pa'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du brtag/ rdo rje pad+ma 'khor lo la// oM
153b2(1): AHhUM badz+ra sa twa sa ma ya swA hA/ 'bru gsum kha dog ldan pa ni// bskor zhing lhag mar bcas pa bzlas// kun gyi phrin las gcig gi ngang // dang por bya ba'i las yin no// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa'i dkyil 'khor
153b3(1): ni// stong dang snying rje'i sa bon las// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM hrIH/ zhes pas 'di yi bdag po nyid// mdog dkar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon pa yis// bdud rtsis
153b4(1): bkang ba'i thod pa 'dzin// gzhi nyid kun bzang yab yum mkha'// ngo bo bde ba byang chub sems// dkar dang dmar ba'i sprin tshogs 'dus// thugs rgyud bskul zhing mos pa bskyed// gnas ngan sbyangs shing sa
153b5(1): la dgod// yon tan thob cing gzhan don rdzogs// rab tu mnyes shing dbang byin stsal// 'bras bu blangs shing bar chad bzlog/ 'phro 'du 'dzam bu na da bzhin// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kuN+Da li ha na ha na raM/
153b6(1): de las gzhan pa'i bya ba'i gtso// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus dag tu// gtsang dang rnam rtog de nyid las// sbyangs shing bar chad phyir bsal phyir// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta mu sa la g+ha gzhan nas gra han+te ha na ha na
154a1(1): hUM phaT/ yang byung / hi a na ya hoHba ya hUM phaT/ de yi bye brag phyed par bya// gnyis med bdud rtsir rab sbyang phyir// bcud bzhi'ang mnyam pa nyid du sbyar// oM a mr-i ta dza gad byi ti la sho d+ha ya/ rat+na tsa ta
154a2(1): bi shud+d+he kuN+Da li swA hA// rgyal ba'i mchod sbyin me lha'i tshogs// ma nyams de yis mnyes par bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta mu sa la hUM hrIHTha/ chos ma rdo rje mdzes ma yis// dngos grub spel phyir mnyam par
154a3(1): gzhal// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta ha ya g+h+ri wa hu lu hu lu hrIH/ rgyas gdabs byin gyis brlab par bya// dngos grub rkyen du bsngags pa rnams// nga yis bshad pa bzhin du bya// rgyal ba mnyes pa'i thabs
154a4(1): rnams kyis// mchod de yan lag tshang bar spyad// rol pa chen po'i pho brang gsal// nga yi dgongs rgyud sbyor ba ni// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// stong gsum 'jig rten khro bcur gsal// steng phyogs
154a5(1): rigs bzhi'i he ru kas// dpa' bo gnyis gnyis zhabs kyis brdzis// slar yang gtso bo'i zhabs bzhis mnan// de steng dbyings ma'i zhabs brgyad kyis/ khrag 'thung g.yas g.yon dbus gnyis
154a6(1): mnan// dbus ma de yi mkha' la rdzogs// de la rdzogs pa'i he ru ka/ zhabs kyi dbu brgyad brdzis mdzad cing // smin mtshams dbyings su gsang mchog rdzogs// de yi zhal dbus ljags steng du// sras mchog
154b1(1): sa nu he ru ka/ mdog dkar gsal ba yab yum bcas// tshon gang de yi ljags dkyil du// 'bru dgus mi 'gyur don la bskor// oM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hrIH/ de 'og dmigs pa'i pho brang du// rang gi sa bon
154b2(1): las byung ba'i// gtso chen gsang ba'i yum bzhir bcas// bsdus pa'i mkha' la dbang gi lha// mdog dmar zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// phyag g.yas pad+ma g.yon pa yis// rdo rje rgya gram pho brang gnon// phyed
154b3(1): tsam mkha' nub sbyor ba ste// 'phro 'du byin rlabs rab bskul ba// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta hUM hrIHTha/ sgra dang 'od kyi brtul bzhugs kyis// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs 'khyil// sangs rgyas ma lus mnyes
154b4(1): par blta// dkyil 'khor bdag po he ru ka'i// snying ga'i 'bru dgu 'od zer gyis// gtso bo'i dbu btsugs lam nas zhugs// ljags kyi dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du mdzad// phyag mtshan dkyil 'khor bcas pa
154b5(1): yang // thabs dang shes rab 'od ldan de// gtso mo yum gyi zhal sgor 'bab// de nyid he ru ka dpal lo// rigs bzhi'i dbang mchog khro bcu rnams// yum bcas bde chen gcig tu gyur// slar yang pho brang chen
154b6(1): po ru// rigs kyi bdag po rnams su gsal// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro// gnas mchog de yi phyogs kun nas// 'od phung 'bar bas dngos nyid sbar// byin gyis rlabs kyis khro tshogs dang // dbang
155a1(1): chen yum bzhi gnang bar mdzad// de yi rigs bzhi gsang mchog dang // sku gdung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // rigs bzhi gtso dang 'khor rnams las// 'od sprin steng phyogs 'bar ba
155a2(1): las// yum chen mkha' mnyam klong gi dkyil// gsal ba'i zhabs dang gsang ba'i dbyings// dbu ma'i byin rlabs spyi btsugs 'bar// 'chi med rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor mthong // 'od byung phyogs kun phyag
155a3(1): mtshan tshogs kun gyis// byin phabs ljags kyi sbyor ba las// dbang gi dkyil 'khor yum dang bcas// 'phro 'du ma lus khyab byas te// sbyangs shing btul te tshar bcad de// gtso chen steng phyogs 'thim par
155a4(1): blta// rgyun du gnas pa'i yan lag las// mthun 'jug sbrul sku'i mdzad pa yis// ma lus gzhan don rdzogs par dmigs// mnyes bya bskul zhing dbab dang bzlog/ phrin las rgyun du 'bad pa las// 'od
155a5(1): dang du ba dri dang sgra// lha mo'i gzugs kyang ston par byed// mang du 'phel na grub rtags yin// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta gu h+ya sid+d+hi a b+hi Shiny+tsa A/ gal te tshul bzhin ma gyur na// kun nas sgregs te bsar
155a6(1): zhing 'bad// dbab bskyil bsdu zhing blang bar bya// oM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta A be sha ya pheM pheM kun+da li hUM hrIHTha/ ha ya g+hI wa hu lu hu lu b+han+da b+han+da hUM hrIHTha/ many+dzu shri bya ba lo ke te hUM hrIHTha/ a ho su kha d+harma kA ya ni
155b1(1): a mr-i ta sid+d+hi hUM hrIHTha/ rdo rje slob ma'i tshogs rnams kyis// me tog dor te gsol bar bya// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta ma hA sa ma ya ho// rdo rje rgyal po de yis ni// yid bzhin pho brang de la bstan// oM AHhUM ma
155b2(1): hA shrI he ru ka kro tI shwa rI staM/ sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa a be sha ya a aH/ srog gi snying po rgyud gsum po// gnas gsum byang chub sems la thim// IM AHhUM sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta kA ya wAka tsit+ta A yu pha la
155b3(1): sid+d+hi hUM/ mkha' dbyings phyag rgya che ba'i mchog/ dpal gyi tha tshig gtam pa dgrol// pad+ma sa ma ya pra be sha ya phaT/ don dam gnyis med thig le las// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rjer gyur// ma hA gu h+ya kA ya wa ka
155b4(1): tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi hrIHSha hUM/ thams cad mkha' yi mtshan nyid ste/ kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma grub// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// rim pa'i don la 'jug par gyis// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dbang
155b5(1): bskur spyod yul dam pa ste// dam tshig phyag rgya srung ba'i mchog/ bsod nams mchog tu phyin pa ste// bla na med pa myur du 'grub// de bas khyed kyis brtson par gyis// zhes gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das
155b6(1): dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dam tshig chen po byin gyis rlabs pa'i thabs yang dag par bsdu ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gtso chen he ru kas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad
156a1(1): gsungs// kun tu bzang po he ru ka/ nga ni yon tan gtso bo ste// che ba'i mchog tu gyur pa yin/ 'di la the tshom ma za cig/ dman pa'i 'jig rten chos kyi ni// rgyu dang las dang nyon mongs
156a2(1): kyi// sdug bsngal phung po bskyed pas na// nga yi yon tan shes mi 'gyur// log pa'i brtson 'grus shes rab kyis// rags pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu dag/ me long rtogs te phra ba min// dka' thub brtul bzhugs
156a3(1): mchod sbyin dag/ 'dod pa'i khams dang gzugs yod med// nga rgyal snyoms 'jug mngon shes lus// tshe dang bskal pa thob zin yang // srid pa'i sa bon ma zad pas// nga yi yon tan rtogs pa min// rgyun
156a4(1): bzhugs mi rtogs rang rgyal bas// blta dang sgom pas spangs bya ba'i// kun nas ldang bar rags pa tsam// spangs pa'i dgra bcom thob zin kyang // 'gyu byed phra mo bag nyal bas// nga yi yon tan ga la
156a5(1): rtogs// kun rdzob don dam tshul shes pas// shes pa nyid dang nyon mongs pa'i// sgrib byed spangs te ston pa'i sa// rlabs chen gsos kyang cung tsam las/ yang dag mthar zug shes pa min// bya ba lus ngag
156a6(1): rab spyod dang // mnyam pa'i gzugs brnyan gsum dag gis// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma snang mod kyang // thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde chen ro de ma myongs shing / 'dod pa'i lam la rgyab phyogs
156b1(1): pas// nga yi yon tan ma mthong ngo // gang dag chags sogs srid pa'i gzhi// rigs byed pa dang tha dad dang // nyon mongs nye ba'i nyon mongs dag/ rang gi de nyid yongs shes shing // bag chags dang bcas
156b2(1): kun gyi gzhi// rnam par shes pa'i yul tshogs rnams// zag bcas zag med 'dus ma byas// rang bzhin byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das// dbang po'i longs spyod yul gyur rnams// de nyid shes pas yongs
156b3(1): bsgrubs pa// nga yi yon tan mthong ba yin// nam mkha'i mtshan nyid ji bzhin du// bcing ba med cing grol ba med// dbyer med mtha' gnyis mi gnas shing // chags med chags dang bral ba med// rnal 'byor
156b4(1): bzhi dang sku lnga dang // ye shes phrin las ma lus pa// snang med tshul gyi snang ba de// nga yi yon tan shes pa yin// de bas rigs kyi bu khyed rnams// nga yis ji ltar bshad pa yi// yon tan chen po 'di long
156b5(1): la// dman pa bar ma mchog tu gyis// yul dang dngos po sems rgyun dang / khams dang byed pa las rnams kun// nga la dman pa yongs med pas// de bas nga nyid kun tu bzang // che ba'i mchog ste mchog tu
156b6(1): gyur// ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yon tan gyi tshogs nye bar bsdu ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gtso chen he ru kas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la
157a1(1): 'di skad gsungs/ khyad par sgrub pa rgyal ba'i bka'// snang srid snang bar shes pa'i sku// rgyu gnyis rkyen gsum las byung ba'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub 'di// bde chen mnyam nyid thugs
157a2(1): kyi ngang // bdag 'dzin rnam dag shes rab sku// chags pa kun bral skye med dbyings// gnyis med don las sna tshogs ston// 'di ni don gyi bdud rtsi'o// ma skyes kun bzang che ba'i mchog/ bde chen klong 'dus
157a3(1): dbyings phyug ma// nyon mongs rnam dag rigs kyi gtso// ye shes lnga rdzogs sku lngar grub// dug lngar rtog pa rang grol ba// 'di ni ming gi bdud rtsi'o// 'dul ba'i thabs mkhas khro bo'i sku// sgra tshig
157a4(1): sbyangs mdzad 'khor lo'i gsungs// 'chi med las kyi bdud rtsi'o// chos nyid rig pa byang chub sems// 'dres dang ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs// nyon mongs ma rig mi gtsang nad// chos nyid ye shes nus pas
157a5(1): sbyong // tshang lugs brgyad ldan chos kyi ro// shes pa brgyad kyi don bdud rtsi// sman rnams bdud rtsir dmigs pa ste// bsgom pa brgyad kyi dam rdzas so// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// bdud rtsi de nyid
157a6(1): rnam lnga ste// so so rang nyid rtsa ba brgyad// dbyibs dang kha dog phyi dang nang // thabs dang shes rab ro dang mthu// sku dang gsung dang thugs nyid dang // yon tan phrin las yan lag go/ ngang dang rang bzhin
157b1(1): bdag nyid rgyu// dus gsum de nyid shes par spyod// bdud bzhi nyon mongs nad 'joms sel// skye shi 'du bral med pa'i don// lta spyod dam tshig phrin las dang // ye shes dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i lung // phyi
157b2(1): dang nang gi 'byung ba dang // sems dang sems nyid chos dang ni// chos nyid gsang ba de nyid do// bde ba dang ni sdug bsngal dang // 'khor 'das chos dang gtsang mi gtsang // log rtogs spang len lam du
157b3(1): rdzogs// sbyor ba'i don du dkyil 'khor brgyad// mnyam nyid thugs chud klong du bzhag/ skye 'chi med cing ma bcos la// phung po snod lnga ye shes lha// rang byung kun bzang yab yum ste// 'di ni dag pa'i dgongs
157b4(1): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rnam par dag pa'i dgongs pa'i khyad par nye bar bsdu ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gtso chen he ru kas// 'dus pa'i
157b5(1): 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// spyi dang khyad par bye brag gis// yongs su rdzogs dang so so yi// nus pa gcig pur dbyung ba'i phyir// dam tshig rtsa ba rnam pa lnga// yan lag phan yon bcas pa ni// nga yis sngar
157b6(1): bshad de dag las// rang gi rigs mthun gnyen po dang // grogs dang skyob kyi khyad par las// rgyal po blun po dmangs lta bu// skad cig zug phrad bstan pa yis// tshe ring nad med bde ba dang // lang tsho kha
158a1(1): dog stobs dang gzi// 'phel zhing dbang po rig pa gsal// mkha' la 'gro zhing pha rol gyi// nus stobs gnod pas mi tshugs shing // kun gyis bkur sti'i 'os su mthong / khams kyi zas dang
158a2(1): ma 'brel zhing // gos med mkha' la gcer bur spyod// sngon gyi rgyal ba che rnams kyi// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gral thob 'gyur// de nyid ma rig bar du yang // nad dang mu ges mi tshugs shing // bar gyi bskal pa
158a3(1): 'jigs las thar// gzhan la phan pa sgrub la sogs// yon tan chen po dpag med thob// de bas rnal 'byor che rnams kyis// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung bzhin myur du 'bad par
158a4(1): bsgrubs// kun bzang nga dang rigs lnga yis// bsdus pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bka' 'di 'jam dpal rnon po yis// tshangs dang 'jog po li tsa byi// drang srong bram ze rjes gzung phyir// ji ltar bshad
158a5(1): pa bzhin long la// dam pa rjes su bsgrub par gyis// bstan pa 'di bzhin gang bsgrub pa// 'khrul pa'i rnam rtog 'ching ba las// 'di nyid du ni grol bar 'gyur// da lta thub pa chen po yis// 'dzam bu gling gi
158a6(1): sa yi char// tshul 'di nyid kyis bstan gyur kyang // blo dman skal ba gzhan pa yis// gtsang sgra dka' thub spyod par rtogs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa gcig/ bsrung gcig dag gis nges bstan
158b1(1): kyang // rang gi rnam pa'i tshul gyis go/ 'di ni bdag gi don spyod ces// mthun pa'i gdul bya kha cig blta// de bas rig pa 'dzin pa yi// sems dpa' chen po khyed rnams kyis// gang la gang gis 'dul ba
158b2(1): yis// rigs chen gnyen po de bzung la// lha dang drang srong bram ze dang // mkhan po slob dpon cha byad kyis// nus pa gang yin de nyid la// ji ltar 'dul ba de ston cig/ phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe dag na// nga yi
158b3(1): bstan pa'i tshul 'di la// mos dang mi mos 'dul mi 'dul// tha dad so sor 'byung 'gyur te// gsang zhing bstan pa'i tshul de nyid// skad cig dus la rig par gyis// zhes gsungs nas/ longs spyod rdzogs
158b4(1): sku'i dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su sbyor ba dang bcas pa de dag 'od zer gyi kyo ba chen pos drangs te rdzu 'phrul gyi lus kyi phyag rgya rab tu bstan pa'i phyir mi mjed kyi khams la sogs pa rnams su sprul pa'i sku sna
158b5(1): tshogs snang bar mdzad nas sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa'i don grub par snang ngo // sa chen po la rtogs pa'i 'dus pa'i 'khor de dag ni/ nyid kyi sku gsung thugs gsang ba'i mdzod chen por bzhugs
158b6(1): nas/ nam mkha'i khams lta bus dbyings na 'tsho zhing gzhes pa la// rigs chen po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams rjes su yid rangs te mngon par bstod do// // tshangs pa la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams
159a1(1): kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang / sa'i snying po la sogs pa rang rang gi rigs kyi ston pa de la/ dus de nyid du dga' zhing rjes su yi rang ba'i tshig gis mngon par rab tu bstod
159a2(1): cing 'dug go// bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dam tshig gi yan lag gi yon tan rjes su bstan cing gdams pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das dpal che
159a3(1): mchog 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o// // rgyal po'i bla
159a4(1): dpe'o// // gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya// /
159b1(1): rgya gar skad du/ shri he ru ka sa mu dA ya mU la tan+t+ra na ma/ bod skad du/ dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
159b2(1): bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka chen po// gsang ba chen po'i mkha' dbyings rnam par dag pa'i pho brang na/ 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ bud+d+ha he ru ka dang /
159b3(1): rat+na he ru ka dang / pad+ma he ru ka dang / karma he ru ka dang / bud+d+ha kro d+hi shwa rI ma dang / rat+na kro d+hi shwa rI ma dang / pad+ma kro d+hi shwa rI ma dang / karma kro d+hi shwa rI ma dang / hUM ka ra dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / nI la daN+Da dang /
159b4(1): ya mAn+ta ka dang / Ar+ya a tsa la dang / ha ya g+ni ba dang / a pa ra dzi ta dang / a mr-i ta kun d+ha li dang / tre lo kya bi dza ya dang / ma hA b+ha la dang / ko'u rI ma dang / tso'u rI ma dang / pra mo ha dang / be ta lI dang / puk+ka
159b5(1): si dang / skasma rI dang / sma sha nI dang / tsan d+ha li dang / sid+d+ha mu kha dang / bya g+h+ri mu kha dang / srig la mu kha dang / shA na mu kha dang / gr-i D+ha mu kha dang / kang ka mu kha dang / ka ka mu kha dang / yu lA ga mu kha dang / aM ku
159b6(1): sha ma dang / pA sha ma dang / s+pho Ta ma dang / g+haN+De ma dang / las byed pa'i ma mo bdun phrag bzhi dang / mkha' 'gro'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / thabs cig tu rol pa chen pos bzhugs so// de nas 'dus
160a1(1): pa'i 'khor de dag rnams kyis/ dpal he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan he ru ka/ dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun// thugs rje zhi ba'i rang bzhin la// khyod nyid khro ba
160a2(1): ci zhig lags// he ru ka ni ji lta bu// thabs dang shes rab sbyar ba gang / ma 'ongs dus na skyes bu yi// khyod dang bdag cag lhan cig tu// nye bar byed pa'i thabs ci lags/ thams cad khyod dang gcig pa
160a3(1): yis// 'gro ba'i don kun ji ltar bsgrub// 'dul bar bya ba'i don ched du// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// zhes zhus so// de nas dpal chen he ru kas// 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad
160a4(1): gsungs// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te// khro bo de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pas ni// gdug pa ma lus 'dul bar byed// thams cad dbang du gyur
160a5(1): nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' nyan bran bzhin gnas/ he ni dgongs shing bzhad pa'i gsung // ru ni kun la chags pa'i thugs// ka ni mnyam nyid ye shes sku// shrI ni snying rje bdag gzhan rtogs// ma skyes
160a6(1): dbyings ni shes rab ste// ma 'gags sprul pa de yi thabs// dus gsum dngos po thams cad kun// mnyam nyid gnas pa sbyor ba yin// phung po lnga nyid he ru ka/ kro d+hI shwa rI 'byung ba lnga// ma mo rnam par shes pa
160b1(1): brgyad// de yi yul brgyad phra men gyur// 'du shes bcu nyid khro bor gyur// 'gyur ba bzhi ni khro mo ste// sems las byung ba mkha' 'gro'i tshogs// thams cad nga yi sku gsung thugs// ye nas gnas shing lhun
160b2(1): gyis grub// 'dus ma byas shing g.yo ba med// ma rig rtsa ba yan lag bcas/ sgrib byed de yi gnas ma mthong // gal te bdag nyid shes 'dod na// yang dag grub pa gcig pu nyid// sangs rgyas bde chen kun
160b3(1): 'dus pa// rnal 'byor zab mo sku gsum rdzogs// mkha' 'gro sgyu ma bde mchog bde// 'gro ba sna tshogs thabs kyis 'dul// don dam nges pa'i lung 'di nyon// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa
160b4(1): rtsa ba'i rgyud las// gleng gzhi'i don bsdus pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// dpal chen he ru ka yi rje// ma 'ongs sems can skal med cing // gdul bar dka' ba gang zhig
160b5(1): la// ji ltar nges pa'i don bstan yang // myur du rtogs pa ma yin pas// bsgrub pa dang ni chen po dang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye ba dang // las kyi khyad par ma lus pa// rim pa bzhin du bstan du gsol// zhes
160b6(1): zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// phyi dus snyigs ma byung ba'i tshe// blo dang ldan pa'i skyes bu yis// dur khrod dgon pa'i phyogs dag gam// nges par brtags pa'i sa gzhi la// rdo rje dur khrod
161a1(1): bdag po'i lus/ rab tu nyam zag bsgyel ba ste// nga yi sngon gyi phrin las yin// mkha' dang brtan zhing gsal ba dang // g.yo zhing sreg par rab snang ba// dkyil 'khor lnga ru byin gyis
161a2(1): brlabs// lus dang lus kyi phung po la// gdug pa'i khrag 'thung tshogs rnams bsgom// phun sum tshogs pa'i sa blangs la// lag gang sa la sogs pa yi// rgya cher bskyed la bdud rtsis gdab// sha rus khrag
161a3(1): sogs mtshon pa yi// rim pa'i bye brag 'di lta ste// mthing ga dkar ser dmar dang ldang / dbus dang phyogs bzhi rab tu mdzes// gnas pa'i pho brang lnga'am dgu/ bcu drug gam ni lnga bcu brgyad// drug cu rtsa
161a4(1): brgyad la sogs pa'i// tshogs pa'i tshad dang mnyam pa la// dmigs pa gsal ba rab tu bsgom// bdag dang ye shes sems dpa' gnyis// so so ma yin tha dad min// mchod bstod mnyes pa bzlas pa
161a5(1): dang // dgug dang gzhug cing bstim pa dang // bcings dang dbang du bya ba dang // dgyes pa bskyed cing las la sbyar// thun mong dang ni mthar zug pa'i// rang gi de nyid yongs shes shing // gnyis su 'dzin pa
161a6(1): ma lus dor// yod med skye 'gag rtag chad dang // 'gro 'ong la sogs spros pa'i mtha'// ji snyed pa ni rang gi blo// de dang bral ba'i sgrub pa po// nga'am nga dad 'dra ba yis// sangs rgyas rnams dang de yi
161b1(1): sras// kun nas rab tu bsgrub pa yin// byams pa dang ni snying rje yis// khams gsum gnas pa ma lus pa'i// 'gro ba thams cad bsgral 'dod phyir// nga la bsnyen pa bsgrub pa che// rnal 'byor ye shes rang gi
161b2(1): ngag/ yi ge sngags kyi 'phro 'du yis// smra bsam brjod med tshig las 'das// 'dzin med brag cha lta bus bsnyen// sems can rnams kyi phyi dang nang // gsang ba yongs su shes 'dod pas// dul ba'i sems su
161b3(1): bzhag nas ni// dam tshig chen po bde bar gnas// bsnyen par gnang ba'i dbang thob nas// bsgom dbyangs yi ge 'bru brgyad bstan// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM// dbang mchog thob nas 'khor dang bcas// ston
161b4(1): pas bstan pa'i lung bzhin du// bsgom rgyud gsal bar ci nus bya// de yi ngang la nye bar bsnyen// gang zhig bdag gzhan don gyi phyir// phung po mchod rdzas bya ba dang // rtsi bcud bdud rtsir bsgrub pa
161b5(1): dang // bstan la rab sdang bsgral ba dang // lus bral dang du drangs pa dang / nga nyid kun rdzob gnas pa dang // chags can gnyen pos gdul ba'i rigs// de nyid dbang du bya ba dang // brtag dang dbab pa la
161b6(1): sogs kun// nga la nye bar byas pas 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// he ru ka'i las yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas 'khor gyis
162a1(1): yang zhus pa// mgon po he ru ka dpal rje// skal med sems can gdul dka' ba// shin tu snyigs mar gyur pa'i lus// nyon mongs pa yi sems can rnams// shes rab phun sum ma tshogs
162a2(1): shing // rab tu 'bad pa chung bas na// shin tu bsdus min rgyal min par// khyod kyi rang bzhin bsgrub pa dang // gtso dang 'khor gyi bsdus pa'i gnas// rang gi rigs dang phrin las dang // sgrub dang mchod dang
162a3(1): bsgral ba dang // bskul zhing gnas nas drang ba dang / bsdu dang sbyang zhing gsad dang gso// las dang las la mngag pa rnams// mchog dang dman dang bar ma yi// blo dang yid la gang rigs pa'i// 'bar ba'i
162a4(1): rgyal po sku bzhengs la// rol pa'i cho 'phrul rab ston cing // gsung gi yi ge 'khor lo'i gnad// 'od zer rab tu khyab mdzad de// thugs kyi gsang ba klong brtol nas// ma 'gags thabs kyi rang bzhin
162a5(1): las// sa dang 'gro ba smin pa'i chos// da lta nyid du bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pa dang // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka chen pos// de bzhin gshegs
162a6(1): pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga yangs pa'i klong // dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis rlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i
162b1(1): gzugs byang chub kyi sems rdo rje khro bo chen po'i longs spyod rab tu rdzogs pa'i sku/ 'jigs byed 'bar ba kun tu bstan te/ dges pa chen po'i gad mo'i sgras// stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu gang
162b2(1): bar mdzad nas// rdo rje drag po chen po'i thugs gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po// thams cad kyi ngo bo rab tu gsal bar mdzad de// 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus
162b3(1): pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// dang po mnyam pa'i gzhi nyid las// 'das dang ma 'ongs bcings dang grol// brtan dang g.yo ba srid dang zhi// yongs su grub dang kun tu brtags// gzhan gyi dbang du gyur pa
162b4(1): yis// nga nyid gtso bo lta bur snang // phung po lnga dang rnam shes brgyad// yul brgyad dang ni 'du shes bcu// 'gyur ba bzhi dang bcas pa kun// yang dag mthong ba gong ma'i gnas// yid las byung ba'i rtogs
162b5(1): pa'i dngos// ma lus lus pa med pa kun// bdun phrag brgyad phrag bzhi bzhi dang // bco brgyad dang ni drug cu bzhi// bzhi dang bdun dang bzhi gnyis dang // grub par shes pa 'og ma'i gnas// nga nyid ngar snang
162b6(1): rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas gti mug de bzhin gshegs// nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ba ste// pad+ma chags rab he ru ka/ phrag dog las ni rab tu bsgrub// gzugs dang rnam shes tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed lnga rang
163a1(1): bzhin// ma bcos pa dang zhi ba dang // rab tu rgyas dang dbang du byed// tshar gcod drag po ji bzhin bsgrub// ngang nas shes shing gnas pa yin// zhes gsungs so// ngang la khrag 'thung 'dus pa
163a2(1): rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gnas dang rigs bsdus pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas he ru ka dpal gyis// 'dus pa'i 'khor la 'di skad gsungs// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ lus ngag yid gsum
163a3(1): bsgrub 'dod pas// shes rab kyis ni blo phye nas// gus pa yi ni dam tshig dang // gtsang dang 'jigs pa'i brtul zhugs bcas// srog lus yan lag rdzas rnams kun// bla ma mnyes par bya phyir
163a4(1): dbul// dngos grub 'dod phyir gsol ba gdab// blo zhan shes rab chung ba yis// bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// phung byed gnyis ka bsreg pas na// de bas gzhan du bstan pa med// nges par
163a5(1): brtags pa'i sa gzhi la// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan nas// dur khrod sa ni rab tu brtags// 'byung po'i gtor ma btang nas kyang // gsang ba don gyi las rnams spyad// rnam par rtog pa bgegs yin
163a6(1): te// rnam rtog rang gi sems las 'byung // sems nyid ye nas dag shes na// gzhan nas bgegs zhes bya ba med// mthun pa'i gnyen pos 'dul don du// zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// mkha' la khro bo
163b1(1): 'chol ba spro// bskrad dang brdeg dang gcod par bya// snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te// rdzas dang sa gzhi brtags pa der// slob dpon ji bzhin stan bder gnas// rab tu mnyam pa'i tshad gzhal te// rang byung
163b2(1): bdud rtsi'i chag chag gdab// ba su ta yi thig gi bcad// re mig thod pa'i phreng ba bzhi// pho brang zla gam chen po dgu/ mthing ga dkar ser dmar dang ldang // rab tu dmar ba dag tu bya// 'khor lo rtsibs
163b3(1): brgyad brgyad gnyis bya// phyogs bzhi sgo bzhi nang khyams bcas// 'od kyi rang bzhin brtsig pas bcad// phyi rol 'dod yon gnas la sogs// mkha' 'gro dur khrod gnas chen kun// ji ltar gsungs pa
163b4(1): bzhin du bri// sngon gyi phrin las shes par bya// rdul tshon gzhal yas khang de la// ji ltar dgos pa'i rdzas rnams ni// lha rnams rab tu 'byung ba yi// gnas rnams so so de nyid du// thod pa rU pa bri ba dang // so
163b5(1): so'i yi ge phreng ba'i sngags// snang ba'i 'od dang bcas pa dang // lha zhal ldan pa'i phur pa rnams// sku gsung thugs dang phrin las rten// mtshan dang ldan pa'i snod nang du// 'bru bcud bdud rtsi rab sbyar
163b6(1): pab// yon tan dngos grub 'byung ba'i rten// rdzas kyi 'khor ba mdzes par gzhag/ phyi rol bar chad srung ba'i rgyan// mig gi rten yang mngon par dgram// rdo rje slob dpon rgyal thebs dang // shes rab ma dang
164a1(1): las mkhan dang // dral gyi dgos pa tshangs pa yis// phyi dang nang gi 'grul bcad de// lhag pa'i rtags kyi kun mtshon nas// sgrub rdzas de dag byin gyis brlab// rang gi gnas su mnga' gsol
164a2(1): te// mchog tu bya phyir rab tu brtan// dmigs med stobs kyi gdeng can gyis// sku mchog 'bar ba'i tshul du bsam// khams gsum khrag tu dmigs nas kyang // dur khrod kun tu khyab par bsam// zhi ba'i
164a3(1): tshul gyis bka' bsgo zhing // khro bo'i las kyis bsrung ba ni// 'bar ba'i me dang mtshon cha lnga// khrag 'thung lha rnams sprul pa'i tshogs// lta ba rnam dag don rnams kyis// phyi nang gsang ba kun tu
164a4(1): bsdams// tshogs bsag phra mos kha bskangs shing // zhi ba'i mchod pas mnyes pa dag/ bsnyen po'i don du 'di dag bya// de ltar bdag nyid brtan byas nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni// dang po chos
164a5(1): kyi dbyings nyid las// dmigs pa med pa'i don gyis bsgom// chos dbyings ye shes de nyid kyis// ma khyab pa la thugs rje bskyed// dngos ni hUM du byin brlabs nas// rin chen gsal bar shar ba dang // byang
164a6(1): chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phros// mos pa'i thugs la mnyam bsams te// 'od 'dus thog ma'i hUM la gzud// sangs rgyas mkha' 'gro yum lnga yi// mkha' dbyings rnam dag 'byung ba lnga// rang gi sa bon lnga las
164b1(1): bskyed// de nas dur khrod bdag po dag/ phyag rgya che dang ldan pas ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsgom byas te// de yi nang du sngar bshad pa'i// tshad med gnas te bsgom bya ba// sku gsum ldan pa'i thod pa ni// skam
164b2(1): po sha ris thod rlon rnams// rmang dang brtsig pa kha bad la// lha chen phung po ka ba la// gza' klu rgyu skar rnams kyis phubs// dbang phyug dang ni 'khor los sgyur// ba dan phyar zhing rgyal mtshan phyar// kun gyi
164b3(1): tshul dang ma lus ldan// drag po'i gnas kyi dbus dag tu// rU tra nyi zla pad+ma'i steng // gnas gzhan rnams su ti ra'o// lha rnams rang gi sa bon las// phyag mtshan snying po phra mo dag/ brtan par gyur nas mkha'
164b4(1): la gzhag/ bskul ba'i rang bzhin kun 'dus pas// des kyang spro ba'i las rnams byas// nga yi rang bzhin lha rnams kun// so so'i sku mdog phyag mtshan dang // bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i lha dag bsgom// de yi
164b5(1): rim pa'ang 'di lta ste// mi dmigs chos la blo brtags shing // ye shes can gyi byin stobs kyis// thams cad dam tshig chen po yi// bde mchog sgyu ma'i brda' mtshon te// rdo rje pad+ma ldan byas nas// dbyings kyi
164b6(1): bde chen las byung ba'i// rang gi ye shes de las bskyed// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal dag pa'i// sprin med nyi ma'i 'od ltar 'tsher// rang gi byin gyis brlabs las byung // rigs kyi bdag pos rang
165a1(1): dbang bskur// las kyi khyad par bstan nas kyang // so so'i gnas su brtan par bsgom// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// bzhugs dang rten dang mi g.yo bas// dam tshig zil gnon phyag
165a2(1): bya dang // mchod dang bstod dang bza' ba dag/ tshul bzhin goms pa'i blo dag gi/ ci rigs su ni spyad par bya// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa dang // skul tshig dbyangs kyis de dag mnyes// 'khor bcas
165a3(1): mchod pa rdzogs nas ni// bsnyen pa'i lung bzhin brtson par 'bad// zhag grangs dus ni brtags pa'am// mtshan ma brtan po byung ba na// bsgrub pa chen po brtsam par bya// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i
165a4(1): rgyud las/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i sku
165a5(1): gsung thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya byin gyis rlobs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi// byang
165a6(1): ba kyi sems rdo rje ji snyed pa thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i skar byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'di skad bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ rnam par grol ba
165b1(1): mtshon pa'i phyir// badz+ra he ru ka dpal gyi// rtags kyi phyag rgya 'di ltar ro// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// rdo rje kha T+wAM rde'u chung g.yas// dril bu rgu
165b2(1): zhags khyung khra/ dril bu dung dmar rgyu zhags g.yon// g.yon// he ru ka yi ye shes rgya// shes rab dbyings ma'i phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas pa thabs kyi yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung
165b3(1): dmar gtso la stob// kro d+hI shwa rI dbyings kyi rgya// bud+d+ha he ru'i phyag rgya ni/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// smug nag mthing dang dmar ba'i zhal// ti ra/ 'bar ma tar byung canags rdo rje khrung chen
165b4(1): g.yas// b+han dmar rgyu zhags pa su g.yon// bud+d+ha kro d+hI yum dang sbyor// rat+na he ru ka yi phyag rgya ni/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad/ ser nag mthing dang dmar ba'i zhal/ rin chen byis dbyug dgra
165b5(1): stalha g.yas/ b+han dmar ri rab rgyu zhags g.yon/ rat+na kro d+hi yum dang sbyor// pad+ma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dmar nag mthing dang dkar ba'i zhal/ pad+ma be con dgra sta
165b6(1): g.yas// b+han dmar thang gshol ri rab g.yon// pad+ma kro d+hi yum dang sbyor// karma he ru'i phyag rgya ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ljang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// rgya gram ral gri dgra sta
166a1(1): g.yas// zod khrag ri rab zang gshol phur pa g.yon gang / g.yon// karma kro d+hi yum dang sbyor// yum chen rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis 'khyud// so so'i gtso bo'i sku
166a2(1): mdog la/ g.yas pa kha TaM yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kun// nyi zla pad+ma rA tra gnon// khro bo'i gar nyams dgu ldan zhing / dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas
166a3(1): kyis brgyan// ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// ko'u ri b+han dmar byis dbyug sngo// tso'u ri mda' gzhu 'gengs ma ser// pra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// be ta byi za rdo 'phyar nag/ puk+ka dmar ser byis rgyu
166a4(1): 'dren// g+hasma dung dmar khrag 'thung ljang // sma sha mthing nag byis snying za// tsan d+ha ser skya mchog lus 'bral// phra men rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// seng ha ser mo zhing za ser// byA g+h+ra dmar mo lag bsnol stag/ sri
166a5(1): la nag mo byis ldag wa// shwa na mthing ga sha 'drad sbyang // gr-i D+ha dmar mo dung gri rgod// kang ka dmar skrag zhing khur dur// ka ka bya rog b+han gri gnag/ u lha mthing nag lcags kyu 'ug/ lha mo dang ni phra men
166a6(1): rnams// khro mo'i lus la cung zad zhi// khro bo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// hUM ka ra ni sku mdog sngo// phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs shing 'phen// rnam par rgyal ba sku mdog dkar// g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon tri
166b1(1): shUshAl// dbyug pa sngon po sku mdog sngo// me dpal g.yas la dbyug to g.yon// gshin rje gshed po sngo skya'i mdog/ g.yas pa thod dbyug g.yon dgra sta// mi g.yo ba ni mdog ljang sngon// ral gri g.yas la
166b2(1): zhags pa g.yon// rta mgrin can ni sku mdog dmar// spu gri g.yas la lcags sgrogs g.yon// 'dod pa'i rgyal po dmar skra'i mdog/ b+han+da g.yas la rnga yab g.yon// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag
166b3(1): ste// g.yas pas rgya gram g.yon dril bu// khams gsum rnam rgyal sku mdog mthing // rdo rje g.yas la sbrul zhags g.yon// stobs po che ni dud kha'i mdog/ tho ba g.yas la zhags pa g.yon// khro bo 'di
166b4(1): dag thams cad kyang // dpal gyi chas kyis rab brgyan pa'o// rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu 'dren// phag gdong sngon mo mche zhags bsdam/ spre'u gdong dmar mo lcags sgrog 'chings/ spyang gdong ljang gu dril
166b5(1): 'khrol brdeg/ khro mo'i chas kyis cung zad brgyan// kun kyang gtso la 'dud cing blta// de nyid rigs kyi dbu brgyan cing // rang gi sems dpa' snying la gnas/ gzugs su brtags pa'i dngos po kun// nga yi/
166b6(1): phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya'i tshogs yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
167a1(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des// dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad gsung gi rdo rje gsang ba'i snying po yang dag par 'byung ba 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
167a2(1): snyosgoms par zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jigs pa'i sgra chen pos g.yo bar mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hA hwA hA hUM hUM/ b+h+rU~M b+hU b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha/ he he he he/ 6
167a3(1): hete/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ rtsa ba'i snying po'o// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ nye ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka hUM/ oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM/ oM rat+na shrI he ru ka hUM/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM/ oM karma shrI
167a4(1): he ru ka hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ bud+d+ha kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ rat+na kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ti s+t+waM/ oM karma kro d+hi shwa ri s+t+waM/ badz+ra ko'u rI ha/ badz+ra tso'u rI ha/ badz+ra pra mo he ha/ badz+ra be ta lI ha/ badz+ra puk+ka sI ha/ badz+ra g+hasma
167a5(1): rIri ha/ badz+ra sma sha ni ha/ badz+ra tsan+da lI ha/ badz+ra sid+d+ha mu kha he/ badz+ra byA g+h+ri mu kha he/ badz+ra shri ga la mu kha he/ badz+ra shwa na mu kha he/ badz+ra gr-i D+ha mu kha he/ badz+ra kang ka mu kha he/ badz+ra ka ka mu kha he/ badz+ra u l+yA mu kha he/
167a6(1): ka ra hUM/ badz+ra bi dza ya hUM/ badz+ra nI la daN+Da hUM/ badz+ra ya mAn+ta ka hUM/ badz+ra Ar+ya a tsa la hUM/ badz+ra ha ya grI ba hUM/ badz+ra a pa ra dzi ta badz+ra a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hUM/ badz+ra trai lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ badz+ra ma hA ba la hUM/ badz+ra AR+Ya te dza
167b1(1): tang dza/ badz+ra a mu khe hUM/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra b+hasmi ba la ya ba tu ho/ rab tu bskyed pa'i snying po'o// A~M badz+ra shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa ri staM/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ rA go&haM/ rA ga yA mi/ badz+ra sarba ta thA ga ta A nu
167b2(1): rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko&haM/ hUM s+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ nges par 'byung ba'i snying po'o// A~M sarba ta tA ga ta tsakra ka ya a d+hiSh+Tha na AM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra pad+ma wAka a d+hiSh+Tha na AH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta
167b3(1): badz+ra tsit+ta a d+hiSh+Tha na hAM/ byin gyis rlabs pa'i snying po'o// AM ma hA shwA n+ya ta a d+ha ri sha sa ma tA pra t+ya be k+Sha Na kr-i tu nuSh+TA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa maM/ dbang skur ba'i snying po'o// A~M badz+ra shrI he ru ka
167b4(1): kro d+hi shwa ri e tsakra maN+Da la A ra li hring hring dza dzaH/ bod pa'i snying po'o// IM badz+ra shri he ru ka kro d+hi shwa ri e tsakra maN+Da la sa ma ya dzaH/ pra be sha tiSh+Tha a AH/ bzhugs pa'i snying po'o// IM badz+ra shrI he ru ka kro d+hi shwa ri
167b5(1): ka ru Na ma hA mAM sa rak+ta a mr-i ta i daM gr-i h+Na ba li ta pi pa ho// kha kha khA hi khA hi a la la ho// bstab cing bza' ba'i snying po'o// oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka kro d+hI shwa ri ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta dz+nyA na a ho su kha/ ka ya wA ka tset+ta sid+d+hi
167b6(1): sid+d+hi hUM hUM hriM hriM/ dngos grub bsdu ba'i snying po'o// thams cad nye ba ni 'dis bya'o// oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dag pa'i he ru ka nyid kyis// gnyis med don la rab brtson pas// dbyangs drug blangs pas don drug
168a1(1): rdzogs// sngags kyi yi ge'i sgra bsgrags pas// dkyil 'khor lha rnams gsal bar bskyed// 'brug ltar zab cing sgra bsgrags pas// gtum dang gdug pa lhan ner 'gyur// mkhur ba dbugs kyi
168a2(1): rlung 'byin gyis/ khro bo khro mo'i sprul pa 'gyed// rdo rje srin po'i ngur skad kyis// gdug pa can rnams spa bkong 'dul/ 'khun cing gdung ba'i sgra 'byin pas// dregs pa'i tshogs rnams rdul du rlog/ tshangs pa
168a3(1): dbyangs kyi 'dren tshul gyis// thams cad ma lus dbang du sdud// ces gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yi ge phreng ba'i don yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug
168a4(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje de kho na nyid kyi snying po chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
168a5(1): mnyam pa nyid rnam par spro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi don dam pa lhun gyis grub pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por byin gyis brlabs
168a6(1): nas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'khor ba'i sems can rnams// nga yi ngang las ma 'das kyang // nyon mongs las kyi 'khrul pa yis// brtags te nga la gzugs su mthong // sgra dang dri ro reg dang
168b1(1): chos// thos shing tshor myong brtags shing spyad// skye bo de yis nga mi mthong // nga la gzugs med mthong ba med// sgra med thos pa'ang yod ma yin// ro dang reg med myong tshor med// yi chos rtog pa ga la yod//
168b2(1): brten pa'i gzhi ni gzhal med khang // 'byung ba lnga ni dag pa'i yum// phung po lnga ni grol ba'i yab/ dbang po dag pa phyag yin te// phyag mtshan drug ni yul drug 'dzin// khams chen bco brgyad dpa' bo
168b3(1): yi// nyams dgu dang ni chas brgyad do// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs dbu gsum ste// khams bzhi zhabs su snang ba yin/ de nyid stong zhing shin tu stong // rab tu stong pa chen po'i ngang // grol zhing shes pas nga yi/
168b4(1): gzugs// dges shing chags pa'i thugs rje yis// snyoms mdzad ye shes gang yin pa// he ru ka ste nga yi sgra// dri ni dag pa'i phung po lnga/ ro ni sku drug ye shes drug/ stobs dang mi 'jigs reg pa yin// ma
168b5(1): 'dres chos ni bco brgyad de// sems can rnams kyi sems byung dang / ye nas 'brel pa nga yi rgyud/ rang bzhin rnam par dag pa las// cung zad 'khrul pa rgyud kyi gzhi// lam ni smin cing grol ba'o// rang gi de
168b6(1): nyid legs mthong zhing / sar gnas dbang thob 'bras bu ste/ bsags shing thob la rten gyur pas/ nga yi sku zhes brjod pa yin// yang dag mtha' dang ma lus pa// mi rtog pa yi rtogs pa ni// ye shes yin te nga
169a1(1): nyid mthong // kye tshogs kun brtson pas nga la nyon// nga la gnyis su ma blta zhig/ nga dang so sor ma 'dzin cig/ bshang gci khu ba khrag dang sha/ nga yi tshogs rnams mchod pas mnyes// dur khrod
169a2(1): mi gtsang bam pa'i rdzas// ma byin blangs te yid bzhin spyad// ma dang sring mo bu mo sogs// nus dang ldan la mi tshangs spyad// blo chung shes rab dman pa yis// skal med rnams la rdzun du smra// log pa'i lam
169a3(1): zhugs stobs can ni// ka du Na tsha ga ru Da yis bsad cing bsgral// sbar zhing mchod de sbyangs pa yis// nga yi dang du gzhag par bya// e ma yul dang bsam pa'i dngos// skye 'gag rtag chad 'gro 'ong
169a4(1): dang // yod med rtag chad bral ba ste// rnal 'byor gsum gyi rab bsnyad nas// nga dang gnyis su med pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ snying po de kho na nyid yang dag

169a6(1): bar gyur pa'i snying po rab tu bsdu ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rig pa ma yin pa'i dngos po ma lus pa rnam par dag pa mchod pa'i rdzas su byin gyis brlabs
169b1(1): te/ gtsang ba dang sme ba'i rtog pa ma lus par bzlog pa/ rdo rje dam tshig chen po rab tu blang ba'i phyir/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs nyon// phun sum tshogs pa bzhi ldan
169b2(1): zhing // tshul rim goms pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sngon du 'gro ba'i las spyad de// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen yang // 'jigs pa med pa'i sems kyis bzlog/ dngos grub sbyin pa'i gzugs brnyan
169b3(1): yang // re dang chags dang dogs pa yis// ngan pa'i don gyi sems mi dbyung // byin gyis brlabs pas ma lus byang // nga dang lnga bcu rtsa brgyad pa'i// ji ltar bshad pa'i pho brang du// rigs chen rigs lnga b+han+da
169b4(1): lnga// rnam par dag pa'i bcud kyi dngos// phyi nang gsang ba'i dam tshig ste// sdong po lo ma me tog dang // 'bras bu gar+b+ha shun pags dang // rtsa ba dang ni skogs ma'o// don snying lnga dang b+he ra log/ lam gnyis
169b5(1): brgyad ni nang yin no// sems bcud dri ni gnyis dang ni// go ro tsa na mAM sa lnga// gsang ba yin te rtsa ba brgyad// mngon pa phyi dang sbas pa nang // rgyal blon skyobs dang bcas pa ni// lo thog shing thog me tog
169b6(1): dang / rtsi thog 'bru dang rdo shing bcud// sems can bcud dang rin po che// ma lus lus pa med pa kun// dug lnga sman du bsgrub pas na/ dgag bya gang yang yod ma yin// ro dang nus pa kha dog rnams// rnam
170a1(1): dag rtsa ba yan lag bcas// spang bya gang yang yod ma yin// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas su dgod// snang ba chen po shar ba dgram// sgrub pa po rnams rgyan rtags ldan// so so'i gral du 'khod
170a2(1): nas ni// khrol bu btags btsags phye ma dang // gong bu skyo ma lde gu dang // ri lu byas pas so so yis// dus dang rtags kyi rim pa bzhin// lnga dang de nyid nyi shu yi// bar du sbyar bar bya ba ni// snga ma'i dkyil
170a3(1): 'khor las la gzhug/ tshangs pa dang ni drang srong tshogs// spyan drang gzhug cing rtog pa bzlog/ mdzes dga' spro ba'i spyod pa brten// ngo bo rnam dag ngang du gsal// 'od zer 'phro 'du bya ba dang / thams cad
170a4(1): bdud rtsi'i sngags kyis sbyangs// de nas rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor dang / dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i sngags kyis sbyangs// ye shes lha rnams spros nas ni// dbang gi rgyal pos bsrung bar bya// rdo rje rigs kyi bsdus shing
170a5(1): sbyangs// slar yang thabs dang shes rab kyis// mthun pa'i rdzas ldan btag cing btsag/ gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor bzhengs// yi ge dgu yi sngags kyis sbyangs/ 'bras bu lnga sbyar bdud rtsir
170a6(1): bcas// mu sa la yis sprad cing sgrol// rgyas gdab mnga' gsol gdab par bya// gcig tu bya ba'i tshul dag kyang / dkyil 'khor bdun dang sbyor ba brgyad// bzhu dang btul dang dbab dang bskyil// yi ge dgu
170b1(1): yi 'phro 'du yis// mdzad pa'i tshul gyis 'gro don spyad// mchod bstod bskul dang bshags pa dang // bzlog cing bskul dang bcol sogs kyis// rtags dang ldan par mthar dbyung ste// rtsa bzhi'i rgyud ldan
170b2(1): dgongs par bya// tshogs chen mchod pa rgyun mi gcod// gtsang sgra gsum la gnas par bya// tshogs chen gcig gi bsod nams ni// rtag tu nyan thos brgyar bsags pas// bcu drug char yang mi phod
170b3(1): do// mthar thug par ni de bshad bya// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// dngos grub chen po blang bar bya// mchod chen 'di ni yon tan mchog/ lha rnams nyer skong las rnams 'grub// rig 'dzin bzhi dang grub pa
170b4(1): brgyad// thams cad nga yi gsungs bzhin du// 'grub par 'gyur te gdon mi za// gal te bsod nams yon tan la// gzugs dang dngos po grub 'gyur na// 'jig rten srog chags ma lus kyis// brjod par
170b5(1): nus pa 'gyur ma yin// rdo rje bdud rtsi mchod chen te// phyi nang gsang ba ldan pas bshad// mdor na de yi bsod nams kyis// bde bar gshegs pa kun mchod pas// 'di nyid bsgrub pa'i khyad par ni// lhag
170b6(1): pa bas kyang ches lhag ste// 'di ma rtogs pa'i mchod pa'i stobs// phyogs gzhan kun na yod ma yin// de bas rtag tu 'bad par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ mchod
171a1(1): pa chen po'i las yang dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin
171a2(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi khams gsum gyi dngos po myur du bde ba chen po'i sa la sgrol zhing 'god pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ khams gsum pa thams cad kyi rnam par shes pa dang rigs thams
171a3(1): cad rab tu bsgral ba'i zhing du byin gyis brlabs te// byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen pos bdag gi ba dang pha rol tu 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yang dag par sgrib pa/ rdo rje dngos grub chen po'i las rab tu bsgrubs
171a4(1): par bya ba'i phyir// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bsnyen pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dngos grub myur du bsgrub 'dod na// rdzas mchog mtshan ldan brtag la btsal// rdzas bzhi gang la brtags te
171a5(1): sbyar// rgyal rigs dang ni bram ze dang // rje rigs la sogs rigs btsun zhing // byad bzhin bzang la sprin dkyus ring // sgra ni bung ba ltar gnag la// so dam mchu ni bim pa 'dra// mtshan dang ldan pa bkra
171a6(1): shis rdzas// lus bzang skad snyan tshig gsal zhing // skra kham shel mig so zur lhag/ skra mtshams nas ni sna rtse'i bar/ sme ba bdun ldan skye bdun par// mi lus skyes pa'i rtags mtshan te/ dag pa'i lha rdzas
171b1(1): yin zhes bshad/ skyes pa gzhon nu 'bad rtsol can// glang po g.yul du zhugs pa de// bsgrub pa mchog gi rdzas yin no// bsgral zhing spyad pa'i bsgrub rdzas ni// mi rta glang chen mkha' lding khyi// shel nag smug
171b2(1): dang tsa ra sogs// thugs dam bskang zhing tshangs par bya// sgrub pa po yis rol pa'i rdzas// ma traM bsgral ba'i zhing bcu de// dmigs kyis bsgral zhing mngon sum btsal// gzhan yang dbang phyug chen po
171b3(1): yis// dur khrod rdzas mchog ma nyams pa// blangs te bsgrub pa bya ba yang // rgyud bzang rigs btsun mtshan dang ldan// bkra shis gtsang zhing yid tu 'ong // dus tshod rab 'bring tha ma la// dus la bab pas
171b4(1): blangs pa'i dus// bdag nyid khrag 'thung yab yum gyi// rgyal thebs karma ging gsum la// dbang bskur bsrung ba byas nas ni// mtshon cha bskur te pho nyar btang // srid pa'i rgyu mchog bsgrub rdzas 'di// rnal
171b5(1): 'byor dbang phyug dngos grub rdzas// kha T+wAM mtshon cha thogs nas su// dpal chen khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// khams gsum zil gyis gnan pa'i phyir// nyi zla'i spyan gyis gsang bar bya// rdo rje'i 'gros kyis rab
171b6(1): tu btsal// gshin rje'i khang khyim gzhom pa'i phyir// kha T+wAM rdo rje sa la gdab// 'chi bdag bdud dang dpral ba'i phyir// gshin rje gshed kyi phur pas btab// dug lnga skye bzhi rtsad gcad phyir// rdo rje sder mos
172a1(1): blang bar bya// ro nyid gshed dang dpral ba'i phyir// seng ldeng phur bu sor brgyad tshad// stobs po che yi skur byas la// drag sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzlas// snga ma'i bdud dang phyi ma'i
172a2(1): lcags// gzugs dang mtshan mar bcas pa ni// phur bus btab ste snga gos grib// khung bur mnan te de srod gzir// phrin las bzhi yi gzir gnan bya// nor bu yid bzhin gyur bsam ste// las kyi karmas
172a3(1): khyer nas ni// rgyal thebs kyis ni byin gyis brlab// ging gis phra men 'jo tshul bya// dur khrod ma mo khro ba'i gnas// srin po stag dred 'thab pa dang // gcan gzan 'dab chags 'dus sar drangs// gnas
172a4(1): der bsrung dang bskrad par bya// sgom du stsal te rgya yis gdab// las dang ye shes pho nya yis// de yi rnam par shes pa dang // 'dod yon rdzas su bcas pa kun// snga ma las ni gnas bsgyur te// khrag 'thung
172a5(1): dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// phung po rdos bcas bem po de// phyogs bzhir bro bzhis sbyang bar bya// ye shes lha dang mkha' 'gro ma// thugs dam bskang zhing bskul bar bya// khrus byas zla gam nub tu
172a6(1): bzhag/ 'bru lnga bkod la lam lnga dgag/ de la lha rnams dgod pa ni// bdag nyid yab yum sa bon las// yan lag lnga la bsam pa ni// rigs lnga yab yum dgod par bya// mdun rgyab gnyis su dgod pa
172b1(1): ni// A li kA li bsam par bya// rnam shes dbang po yul dus la// sems dpa' yab yum dgod par bya// spyi bo rgyab dang lce yi steng // rkang mthil yan chad thub pa drug/ mtshan khung gnyis dang mkhal khung
172b2(1): gnyis// sgo ba yab yum bsgom par bya// rnam smin zag bcas phung po la/ phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal bkod nas// 'od zer 'phro 'dus sbyangs byas te// don gnyis mthar phyin phyag rgya grol// cho ga lnga dang
172b3(1): yan lag lngas// yang du yang du sbyang bar bya// byang shar mtshams su drangs byas la// de yi bsha' thabs rgyab nas bsha'// de nyid khrag 'thung lha tshogs rdzas// glo snying dpal chen yab yum gyi'o// mig dang rna
172b4(1): ba sna dang lce// rigs bzhi phrag 'thung yab yum rdzas// bum pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// dpung pa g.yas g.yon bzhag sha dang // rgyu mchin mgo sha gsang ba rnams// rtsa ba'i lha dgu'i rdzas su bzhag/ go ro tsa na
172b5(1): rgyurgyang ba dang // rkang dang tshil bu sha dang khrag/ srog rtsa mkhris pa brgyad rnams ni// mu kha phra men brgyad kyi rdzas// yan lag rnam thar bzhi rnams ni// ye shes sgo ma bzhi yi rdzas// skal tshigs phrugs rer bsdeb
172b6(1): pa ni// dbang mo nyi shu brgyad kyi'o// nying lag che phrar bsdeb pa ni// rang byung khro bo bcu yi rdzas// sha khrag rus pa rkang dang tshil// mkha' la 'gro ma kun gyi rdzas// mtshan dang ldan pa'i b+han+da ni// dpal chen
173a1(1): bzhugs pa'i rten yang yin// dngos grub chen po bsgrub pa'i snod// de yi nang du stsal ba'i rdzas// go ro tsa na dri chen dang // snying dang srog pa rtsa yi khrag/ mAM sa mkhris pa dri chu dang // de dag mnyam
173a2(1): pa'i chang dang sbyar// tshil chen snying po lngar sbyar ba// brla rkang gnyis dang rje ngar rkang // dung chen 'bud pa'i sgra yi rdzas// dpung pa'i rkang 'go rnams gnyis ni// rak+ta sbreng ba'i gzar bu'o// ba su ta yi rgyu
173a3(1): zhags ni// thig gdab maN+Dal bskor ba dang // bi nA ya ka bcing ba'i rdzas// shun chen zhing gi g.yang gzhi ni// bla rer bre dang dpa' bo'i chas// ya 'gal ma 'gal gnyis po de// kha tham bya ba'i rdzas kyang
173a4(1): yin// de dang sogs pa'i ma mdo ni// ya ma dam sri mnan pa'i rdzas// shar sgor dngos grub gsol byang dang // rdo rje dang ni dril bu dang // bdud rtsi bum pa dngos grub rdzas// de dag kun tu bya ba ni// dngos
173a5(1): grub rdzas dang ngo bo nyid// slob ma lha dang rA tra dang // bsgrub pa'i rdzas su blta ba rnams// gnas su dgod cing lha ru dmigs// sman du bgro dang rdzas su bsgrub// mchod par dbul dang rgyan du dgram// 'bar
173a6(1): bapar bsregs dang bgegs su mnan// nga yi spyod pa mthun par spyad// he ru ka dpal nyid du 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dngos grub chen po nye ba'i sgrub pa yang
173b1(1): dag par bsdus pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka khrag 'thung gi rgyal po des khams gsum pa thams cad rang gi sku gsung thugs
173b2(1): kyi ngang nyid du brtan par bya ba'i phyir/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por phyi dang nang gi dngos po ma lus par snang bar byas nas/ chos kyi rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur bar bya ba bla na med pa'i sa non
173b3(1): par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang 'phags pa'i tshogs ma lus pa rnams kyis bkur ba'i gnas su 'os pa// lha dang mi dang lha ma yin pa// gnod sbyin la sogs pa dregs shing gdug pa'i
173b4(1): tshogs thams cad 'dul zhing tshar gcod par nus pa// rang gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' ma lus pa thams cad he ru ka'i rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i gzugs kyis 'gro ba'i don ma lus par byed
173b5(1): pa'i thabs chen po 'di dag bka' stsal to// rdo rje rigs kyi gnas mchog ni// dur khrod dang ni lha rten gnas// ma mo'i khyim dang yid 'ong gnas// der ni sa yi cho ga byas// skyes bu rtogs pa'i blo gros
173b6(1): can// dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa yis// srog lus man chad rdzas rnams kun// ser sna med pa'i sems kyis dbul// tshul dgu ldan pa'i bla ma yis// rtag par dbang bskur dam par bya// he ru ka nyid don
174a1(1): gnyer zhing // 'jig rten dregs pa'i phyir ma yin// brtul zhugs spyod pa mngon nus la// khur chen khur du khur nus pa'i// ye shes rdo rje 'thob byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// pho
174a2(1): brang snying po dam pa 'dir// bdag gi slob ma gzhug par bya// rin chen me tog gang gtor ba// gang la bab pa de yi rigs// gtso bor bltas nas bsgrub na ni// dngos grub myur bar the tshom med// ye shes
174a3(1): dkyil 'khor gzugs brnyan ni// kun rdzob gzugs su bstan pa yin// 'di la dad pa rab tu bskyed// dngos grub ma lus mngon du 'gyur// dam tshig mchog ni 'di bzung bas// bla ma spun grogs lha dang
174a4(1): 'khor// sngags dang phyag rgya gsang tshig rnams// bskur dang mi spang bsgrub pa dang // rgyun mi gcad cing ltang ma btang // 'di ni gzhi yi dam tshig yin// spang bar mi bya dang du blang // spyad par bya zhing shes par
174a5(1): bya// bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig rnams// sems dang sems nyid 'dres pa na// ma bcings pa dang bsgrub pa dang // gcig pu dang ni lhun gyis grub// de las mi 'da' dam tshig yin// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal
174a6(1): ba'i chu// dam tshig nyams na bsreg par bya// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis grub// rang bzhin lhun grub dkyil 'khor du// slob ma rab zhugs dbang bskur te// bya bral
174b1(1): rdzogs pa'i man ngag bstan// ting 'dzin brten pa'i dkyil 'khor du// slob ma 'bring gzhug dbang bskur te// bskyed rdzogs grub pa'i man ngag bstan// gzugs brnyan bsnyen sgrub dkyil 'khor du// tha ma
174b2(1): gzhug cing dbang bskur te// rim gyis blo sbrang man ngag bstan// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po kun tu bzang po he ru ka chen po de la/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam
174b3(1): par snang mdzad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul snyed du phra ba snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la dam tshig chen po'i dkyil
174b4(1): 'khor du byin gyis brlab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po de dbang bskur ba yongs su rdzogs shing mnyes par bya ba'i phyir/ nyid kyi sku bud med kyi gzugs su
174b5(1): sprul nas bzhugs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po de/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa la sogs pa he ru
174b6(1): ka rigs lnga// byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la bzhugs so// de'i tshe nam mkha'i khams kyi dbyings thams cad rdo rje'i ngo bor gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
175a1(1): 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs mnyam pa nyid 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ rig pa'i skyes bu chen po'i
175a2(1): gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag por byin gyis brlabs so// dbang bskur ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ he ru ka zhal gsum phyag drug par de bzhin gshegs
175a3(1): pa thams cad kyis gzigs par gyur to// de'i tshe na nam mkha'i khams kyi dbyings na gnas pa'i sems can ji snyed du byang chub kyi sems rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs shing / dbang bskur ma thag tu thams cad kyi
175a4(1): bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur nas/ mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ gsang ba byang chub sems kyi dbang la ngo mthon du ngam zhing
175a5(1): bstod do// yang de'i skal ba dang mi ldan pa'i sems can gyi khams rnams kyi don gyi phyir na/ phyogs bcu'i nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te// byang chub sems dpa' don thams
175a6(1): cad rab tu grub pa zhes bya ba dka' ba dpag tu med pas byang chub kyi snying por gnas pa ga na ba der gshegs te// thams cad longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rab tu 'bar bar bstan nas// 'di skad ces bka'
175b1(1): stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// dka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa la spro bar byed// 'di ni rnam par dag pa ma yin zhing mthar thug
175b2(1): par mi 'gyur ba'i bsam gtan te// rang gi sems nyid 'od gsal zhing dri ma med pa la gnas par byos shig ces bka' stsal nas// thams cad kyi phyag gis spyi bo'i gtsug tu reg par mdzad pas// byang chub
175b3(1): sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byin gyis rlabs kyis bskul te dbang bskur bar rig nas/ phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes brjod de/
