175b5(1): 'ongs pa'i dus su// za hor me ri 'bar ba dang // gnam lcags me ri 'bar ba dang // ma la ya yi rtse mo dang // lang ka grub pa'i yul dag dang // chu bo gang ga'i 'gram dang ni// ang+ga ma ga d+ha yi yul// shrI na
175b6(1): lan+da'i yul du ni// byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro// sngon tshe tshe rabs grangs med nas// dge ba'i las kyis bstan pa yi// lhag pa'i lha ni gang yin pa// da lta nyid du khyod la dbab// A~M
176a1(1): dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas su// rdo rje'i skur ni mdzad du gsol// oM bud+d+ha be ro tsa na A~M// AHchos kyi ngag lam
176a2(1): dpal dang ldan// rdo rje mi phyed gsum bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rdo rje'i gsung du mdzad du gsol// a mi de ba hrIHA/ hUM dpal ldan thugs ni rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje mi phyed gsum
176a3(1): bsgoms nas// deng bdag byin gyis brlabs nas ni// rdo rje'i thugs su mdzad du gsol// hUM badz+ra satwa hUM// 'di ni sngon du 'gro ba ste// phyi nang gsang bar yongs su sbyor// bum pa dbu rgyan cod pan dang // me
176a4(1): tog phreng dang phyag rgya dang // b+han+da rdo rje dril bu dang // 'dod yon lnga dang bdud rtsi lnga// sha lnga dang ni rdzas brgyad dang // rgyal po'i bka' rtags rnam pa bdun// thun mong byin gyis rlabs pa'i rdzas// khyad par
176a5(1): gsang bar gyur pa ni// yid 'ong bkra shis rigs kyi yum// zhi rtags rgyan gyis mdzes par bya// thabs ni g.yas kyi phyogs su ste// de bzhin shes rab g.yon du'o// thabs kyi bdag nyid gnas lnga ru// dpa'
176a6(1): bopo 'bru lnga'i snying po la// rgyas gdab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// bde gshegs yab lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal// de yi gzugs kyi phung po la// bde bar gshegs pa'i sa bon lnga// 'phro 'du gsal bar
176b1(1): gyur pa ni// rgyas gdab byin brlab dbang bskur nas// bde gshegs yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor gsal// spyi bo'i gtsug dang lce yi steng // nu ma'i bar dang lte ba'i steng // gsang gnas yan lag dbang rnams
176b2(1): ni// rigs lnga sems dang sgo ba bsam// zhi ba dang ni khro bo rnams// sbrang dang bstan pa'i tshul du bya// lha rnams brda' 'phrad 'od zer gyis// dkyil 'khor spyan drang mchod bstod nas// dbab cing bstim pas
176b3(1): yab yum gnyis// rgyal po rgyal mor byin gyis brlab// ye shes dam tshig chen po yis// pad+ma rin chen ldan byas nas// bde mchog sgyu ma'i brdas mtshon te// dbyings kyi bde chen 'byung ba ni// rang rig ye
176b4(1): shes de la 'od// ji bzhin mkha' la gsal dag pa'i// dri med nyi ma'i 'od pas 'tsher// byang chub sems ni kun tu dag/ khams gsum rab tu 'das nas kyang // ma lus snying rjes khyab byas te// 'dod par bya/
176b5(1): ba rab tu mnyes// 'od 'dus thog ma'i gzugs la gzud// rgyal po yab yum gnyis med sbyor// rang rig bde 'byung gsal ba'i rgyun// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i rin chen gyis// slob ma byin brlab dbang bskur
176b6(1): bya// de ni phan pa'i byin rlabs so// nus par byed pa'i byin rlabs ni// nyan pa dang ni bsgrub pa dang // las byed pa dang 'chad pa dang // nus pa chen por bsgrub pa'o// de yi khyad par bsgrub pa ni// zla gam
177a1(1): gcig gam drug cu'i bar// rdo rje rgyal po rgyal thebs dang // sbyor sgrol ging dang las mkhan dang // bsgrub pa grogs mchog dbang rnams ni// thabs dang shes rab dbang chen te// rdo rje dril bu'i
177a2(1): rig pa 'dzin// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba yi// chos la 'dod bzhin byin gyis brlab// blo bral 'di la gnas pa yis// rnal 'byor de ni skal ba bzang // bdag dang gzhan don mi 'byed pas// sgyu ma lhun
177a3(1): grub yul la rol// rang gi mthu yi rig pa las// chos ni gzhan nas 'byung mi 'gyur// ci ste rnam pa yongs kyis med// rnal 'byor nam mkha'i lam la gnas// ma byung ma skyes snying po la// sgro btags chos
177a4(1): kun ga la yod// dbang thob mdzes pa de dag gi// dul ba'i sems su bzhag nas ni// dam tshig chen po bde bar gnas// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// rdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// ma byin par yang
177a5(1): khyod kyis long // pha rol bud med spyad par bya// rdo rje'i lam ni 'di dag gis// sems can thams cad bskul bar bya// dka' thub dag gis gzir mi bya// ci bde bar ni bde bar spyad// 'di ni sangs rgyas
177a6(1): byed spyod yin// rnal 'byor longs spyod thams cad la// cis kyang ma 'jigs dga' bar gyis// sdig pa med kyi khyod ma 'jigs// gzhan yang dag tshig la sdang zhing // skye bo gang dag bstan la gnod// brtul
177b1(1): zhugs khyod kyis de drangs la// khrag chen po ni btung bar gyis// skal ngan 'jig rten nyan thos la// nam yang dga' bar mi bya ste// skal bzang he ru ka dpal gtso// khyod kyis rtag tu bsgrub par gyis// zhes
177b2(1): gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ he ru ka byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje dam tshig 'byung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
177b3(1): bdag po rab tu gnas par byed pa'i he ru ka chen po des/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ba spu'i bu gar bsdus te/ sku'i dbyibs su brgyud cing rdo rje'i lam du phyung ste/ yum gyi mkha' la
177b4(1): phab nas/ byang chub kyi sems hUM gi rang bzhin du byas nas/ dpal he ru ka 'jigs byed chen po'i sku la/ dur khrod chen po'i chas kyis brgyan pa/ phyag na gdug byed kyi mtshon cha thogs pa de bzhin gshegs
177b5(1): pa thams cad kyi sku'i ngo bor bzhengs te/ srid gsum gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// zhe sdang chen po'i skur bstan te// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid nas// khro mo dbang phyug mngon du phyung // byang chub sems kyi
177b6(1): sprin tshogs las// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// chos kun gnyis med byin gyis brlabs/ dbang bskur thabs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// gnas mchog dam par byin gyis brlabs// rol pa chen po'i ting
178a1(1): 'dzin gyis// sgrub pa'i bdag por byin gyis brlabs// shes rab snying rje'i ting 'dzin gyis// yum dang rgyu la byin gyis brlabs// tshogs chen rdzogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sgrub pa'i rdzas mchog
178a2(1): byin gyis brlabs// rigs kyi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// slob ma gsar bu byin gyis brlabs// khams gsum yongs sgrol ting 'dzin gyis// ta na chen po'i byin gyis brlabs// srid gsum bde sbyor ting
178a3(1): 'dzin gyis// ga Na mkha' 'gro'i byin gyis brlabs// de bzhin nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang chos kun byin gyis brlabs// kun tu snang gi ting 'dzin gyis// snying rje'i yul rnams byin gyis brlabs// rnam
178a4(1): dag rgyu yi ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi sems nyid byin gyis brlabs// dbang chen mkha' dbyings ting 'dzin gyis// phyi nang 'byung ba byin gyis brlabs// bsod nams gter 'byin ting 'dzin gyis// gzhal
178a5(1): med khang pa byin gyis brlabs// yi ge 'phro 'du'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs// phyag rgya 'bar ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs// gnas gsum
178a6(1): dag pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// mchod pa'i rdzas kun byin gyis brlabs// shes rab rtsal gyi ting 'dzin gyis// lhag pa'i rgyan rtags byin gyis brlabs// dus bzhi mnyam sbyor ting 'dzin gyis// sbyor dang sgrol ba
178b1(1): byin gyis brlabs// zhes gsungs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i phrin las kyi bdag nyid byams pa dang snying rje rab tu brtan pa/ byang chub kyi sems kyi ngang las thugs chos nyid kyi zhi
178b2(1): ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang khro bo 'bar ba khrag 'thung chen po'i tshul du phyung ba ni// mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang // chos kyi sku las bzhengs nas kyang // sems can thams cad khro ba'i phyir// rdo rje yang ni khro
178b3(1): bar bya// zhes gsungs nas// nyon mongs can gyi sems can ris so so'i gnas nas drangs pa dang // dngos grub kyi rnam par bsdu ba dang // gnas sbyang ba dang / bsgral zhing slar gso ba dang // las rab tu
178b4(1): grub par bya ba'i rim pa dag dang // gzhan yang dpal chen po'i ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa phyi dang nang gi rnal 'byor ma dang / grub pa mo dbang phyug chen mo dang bcas pa dpang du gsol
178b5(1): te/ gang zhig bstan pa la sdang ba thugs rje chen pos ma bsgral du zin na// rnal 'byor chen po'i sgo zhugs kyang tshul bzhin du ma gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ma bzung bar 'gyur bas// rnam par
178b6(1): shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral bar bya ba ni// chos nyid kyi khyad par ro// thar pa chen po'i lam chen 'dir// brod pa can dag 'gro ba ltar// skal bar ldan pa'i nang na khyod// bde bar 'ongs so legs
179a1(1): par 'ongs// bde gshegs thugs rje sgrol la mkhas// blo ngan sems can snying ring can// gnyis su med par bsgral bar snang // khams gsum nas byung sems can rnams// rdo rje'i sku yi khyad
179a2(1): par gyis// 'od zer tshul gyis bsdus nas ni// de dag bdag gis gzugs la gzud// spro bsdu rdo rje thams cad kyi// sku dang ye shes mchog tu bsgral// las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// dus la bab pa'i
179a3(1): sems can 'di// gnyis med phyag rgya chen po yi// dus la bab po sa ma ya// A~M ka re ka ha tsa ro pa ho sa ma ya s+t+waM// mtha' med 'gog med mi 'dzin pa'i// rnal 'byor mnyam nyid zod rgal du// khro gtum rngam zhi
179a4(1): la sogs pa// sna tshogs ston yang sems mi g.yo// a tsa la sa ma ya d+harmA d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ khro bo'i mtshan med byams par gnas// gsod byed snying rje'i mtshan nyid de// bsgral nas bstab pa dga'
179a5(1): ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor btang snyoms so// oM ma hA ka ru Na ma hA mi tri swa b+hA wa at+ma ko&haM/ drod dbugs rlan las raM yaM khaM// bsreg cing rtog la bkru bar bya// chu shel dkyil 'khor skye med bsam// zhe
179a6(1): sdang ser sna gti mug ni// dmyal ba byol song yi dwags lam// nga rgyal 'dod chags phrag dog ni// lha dang lha min mi yi lam// dge bcu bsam gtan snyoms 'jug ni// gong ma gsum du skye ba'i rgyu// de dag
179b1(1): rang bzhin med shes shing // sems mi skye ba skye rgyun gcod// a nr-i su tri pre du dzaH/ rgyud drug 'khor ba rtsad bcad nas// rgyud lnga lam gyi sgo dgag phyir// au AHhUM hrIHswA hA// so so'i skye gnas sgo bkag
179b2(1): nas// mnyes pa lnga dang stong pa lnga// skong ba dang ni grub pa lnga// 'bras bu lnga yi 'di dag bstan// zhes gsungs so// zhes dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po sgrol
179b3(1): bab bla na med pa'i phan yon yang dag par bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po he ru ka de/ 'dus pa'i 'khor rab tu bsdig
179b4(1): pa'i phyir// nyid kyi sku las khro bo chen po nyon mongs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa zhal du rngub par byed pa'i khrag 'thung gi tshogs bye ba grangs med pa dang // khro mo dbang phyug gi gtso mo dang // ma mo dang phra men ma
179b5(1): dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo dang / srin mo dang / lu gu rgyud dang / pho nya mo dang / sa'i bdag mo dang / lang ka'i tshogs dang / ging gi gtso bo dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang / 'bar ma dang / srin mo'i tshogs
179b6(1): dang / bar snang yangs pa la rgyu ba'i mkha' 'gro ma rnams mngon du phyung ste/ de dag kyang sha za khrag 'thung ba la dga' ba dang / mche ba can dang / gshog pa can dang / nu ma can dang / sder mo can gyi tshogs ji
180a1(1): snyed pa gang dag gi/ gang dag 'da' bar byed pa rnams tshar gcod par dbang bskur te/ bran gyi tshogs bzhin du mdzad nas/ dam tshig gi bya ra la bzhag ste/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nyon
180a2(1): cig gdug pa can gyi tshogs// nga yi bstan pa'i tshul 'di nyid// ma 'ongs pa na snyigs ma'i dus// shin tu gdul bar dka' ba 'byung // byams dang snying rjes gzhi bzung ba'i// kun tu bzang po'i sa chen
180a3(1): la// myur du 'bad pas bsgral bar bya// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag/ tshe lung rdo rje'i dngos grub gzhi// khyed kyis de la myur du gsol// nyon mongs las dang bag chags dang // rnam par smin pa snyoms
180a4(1): par 'jug/ sprul pa dang ni chos kun gyis// nga yi sa la sgrib pa sbyangs// rtogs pa dang ni thugs rje yis// gzas pa po dang bdag nyid dang // thun mong phal pa bsgral zhing gso// rgyal po me dang chu dang
180a5(1): dug/ sbrul dang gcan gzan khro bo dang // mi rgod chom rkun gdon rnams kun// nga la gang ltos zhi bar gyis// tshe dbang dpal dang dbang phyug dang // grags pa dang ni langs spyod tshogs// gang 'dod de la rgyas
180a6(1): pas gsol// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang // rgyal po rje dpon tshul dag ni// ma lus de yi dbang du bsdus// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs dang bdud// mi dang mi ma yin gyi tshogs// nga la mi mthun mngon
180b1(1): du spyod// kye kye khyed rnams brtson pas nga la nyon// nga yi bstan pa 'di lta bu// 'das dang ma 'ongs dus rnams la// shin tu bkod zhing rnyed par dka'// de phyir nga yis khyed rnams la// gdams shing yongs su
180b2(1): bstan pa yin// zhes gsungs so// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas dpal chen po nyid las sprul pa'i khro bo dang khro mo'i tshogs
180b3(1): dang // ma mo dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dang // phra men ma dang // pho nya'i tshogs dang bcas pa de dag gi mgrin gcig tu// 'di skad ces bstod do// bdag med phyogs bral don dam thugs chud cing // byams
180b4(1): dang snying rjes dgra zin mi mnga' zhing // gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'jig byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes pa la sogs pas bstod de// phyag 'tshal zhing zhabs la spyi bos gtugs
180b5(1): nas// dpal chen po nyid kyi bstan pa'i gnyer gtad pa rnams bsrungs shing skyong bar khas blangs shing // dam bcas so// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang phrin las rnams la rjes su yi rang zhing mngon
180b6(1): par dga'o// de nas 'khor gyi tshogs ma lus pa de dag ni// dpal chen po nyid kyi sku la 'od zer gyi tshul du thim par gyur te/ dpal chen po he ru ka yab yum nyid kyang / rol pa chen po'i ros tshims par
181a1(1): mdzad nas/ bde ba chen po'i ngang skye ba med pa'i chos kyi sku mnyam pa nyid kyi klong du thim par gyur to// sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyang / dpal chen po yab yum
181a2(1): gyi byin gyis rlabs kyis// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob ste// chos kyi mig rnam par dag nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la rab tu nye bar gnas par gyur to// dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/
181a3(1): byin gyis rlabs pa'i cho 'phrul gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par bsdus pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das gsang ba dpal he ru ka'i gal po bsdus pa/ dpal khrag 'thung 'dus pa rtsa ba'i
181a4(1): rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo ts+tsha bai ro tsa na bdag gi bskur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/
181a5(1): sgras rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya//
181b1(1): @// rgya gar skad du/ ya mAn+ta ka sa mu dA ya mU la tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyal po
181b2(1): chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gshin rje thams cad kyi gshed/ sku 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po chen po de/ 'og min gyi gnas ri
181b3(1): rab chen po'i khang bzangs dam pa yangs shing rgya che ba/ nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa na/ sku gsung thugs kyi rol pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pas bzhugs pa'i dus kyi tshe/ 'khor 'dus pa ni/ sku
181b4(1): gsung thugs kyi sras dam pa'i mchog tu gyur pa gshin rje gshed kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / myos byed 'bar ba zhes bya ba dang / 'phags pa dmar po zhes bya ba dang / ral pa dgu pa zhes bya ba dang / rigs kyi
181b5(1): sras chen po de dag gi sku la dgyes par sbyor ba'i yum/ ral pa gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / gtum mo chen mo zhes bya ba dang / 'od zer can ma zhes bya ba dang / dpal chen mo zhes bya ba dang / de dag gi phrin las
181b6(1): rdzogs par byed pa/ sgrol ba'i yum nag mo chen mo zhes bya ba dang / 'dod chags khrag gi bdag mo zhes bya ba dang / gling bzhi rab tu 'byams ma zhes bya ba dang / srin mo mgo 'phyangs ma zhes bya ba dang / gzhan
182a1(1): yang gshin rje'i gtso bo chen po nag po'i tshogs 'joms zhes bya ba dang / dbang phyug rdzogs pa zhes bya ba dang / srid pa 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / dom gyi glang mgo can zhes bya ba dang / ya ba ti
182a2(1): zhes bya ba dang / mig dmar zhes bya ba dang / rab tu dmigs pa zhes bya ba dang // shin tu tel tsha rtil pa zhes bya ba dang / bdud 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dang / 'bar ba dmar po
182a3(1): zhes bya ba dang / thod dbyug can zhes bya ba dang / de dag gi sku la rab tu sbyor ba'i yum nag mo ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / shel gyi gdong dgu ma zhes bya ba dang // khro mo shel mig ma zhes bya ba dang / dkar
182a4(1): skya mche gtsigs ma zhes bya ba dang / dred kyi ag sham can zhes bya ba dang / khrag gi ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / klu mo bus 'gro ma zhes bya ba dang / spyan gsum mche gtsigs ma zhes bya ba dang / smug nag
182a5(1): ral gcig ma zhes bya ba dang / rdo rje'i ral pa can zhes bya ba dang / dmar mo mgo dgu ma zhes bya ba dang // nag mo phag mgo can zhes bya ba dang / gshin rje bya rgod kyi mgo can zhes bya ba dang / stag gi mgo
182a6(1): can zhes bya ba dang / kang ka'i mgo can zhes bya ba dang / sbrang ki'i mgo can zhes bya ba dang / gzhan yang gsod par byed pa'i pho nya bzhi dang / gsod par byed pa'i bdud bzhi dang / khram la 'debs pa'i rtsis
182b1(1): pa bzhi dang // srog la dbang ba'i bshan pa bzhi dang // gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can po dang mo'i rnam pa dang / rje dang bran gyi rnam pa dang / 'khor dang g.yog gi rnam pa dang / bu dang bu mo'i rnam pa
182b2(1): dang / gzhan yang lha'i gzugs dang / lha ma yin gyi gzugs dang / nam mkha' lding gi gzugs dang / klu'i gzugs dang / gnod sbyin gyi gzugs dang / srul po'i gzugs dang / lus srul po'i gzugs
182b3(1): dang / yi dwags kyi gzugs dang / sha za'i gzugs dang / grul bum gyi gzugs dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gzugs dang / dri za'i gzugs dang / srin po'i gzugs dang / dud 'gro'i gzugs dang / byol song gi
182b4(1): gzugs dang / dmyal ba'i gzugs dang / sku'i sprul pa dang / gsung gi sprul pa dang / thugs kyi sprul pa dang / yon tan gyi sprul pa dang / phrin las kyi sprul pa dang / rnam par smin pa'i sprul pa dang / de la
182b5(1): sogs te thugs zhi ba chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyis ngang las ma g.yos kyang / sku dang gsung gi cha lugs dang / nga ro'i sgra drag po dang / gtum po dang / 'jigs pa'i sgra dang / gdug pa'i
182b6(1): gzugs dang / mtshon cha sna tshogs 'chang ba dang / ma rungs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa rnams dang / thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ thams cad kyang 'gro ba ma lus pa'i don rjes su bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phrin las kyi
183a1(1): rol pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / dpag tu med pa dang gzhal du med pa mdzad par gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnas der rab tu 'dus par snang ba
183a2(1): ni 'di lta ste/ gti mug de bzhin gshegs pa dang / zhe sdang de bzhin gshegs pa dang // nga rgyal de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'dod chags de bzhin gshegs pa dang / phrag dog de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje
183a3(1): de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa dang / pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa dang / ral gri de bzhin gshegs pa dang / 'khor lo de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dpal gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
183a4(1): grags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / ye shes de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pa dang / gzugs de bzhin gshegs pa dang / brtson 'grus de bzhin gshegs pa dang / bdud
183a5(1): bcom pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la yang dag par bskul ba ni/ kye kye de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan
183a6(1): 'das// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku yi sku ste sku yi mchog/ rnam par dag pa'i dbang phyug che// gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// ma lus thob cing spangs pa'i bdag/ bsags dang sbyangs pa
183b1(1): las byung ba// ji bzhin ma lus sna tshogs pa'i// mkhyen pa dang ni ye shes bdag/ rang dang gzhan dang phyi rol ba// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa la// che chung tshad ma'i skur ston pa// gang la dges pa der
183b2(1): snang zhing // ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas sbyin pa// yang dag pa dang nges pa dang // brang ba'i gnas dang lam tshol dang // ji bzhin ma yin dgongs pa dang // ldem po dang ni spyod pa dang // sar gnas pa dang rdzogs
183b3(1): pa dang // rang byung ba dang rtsol ba dang // rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa dang // gzhi dang khams dang bsam pa dang // las dang rigs dang gnas la sogs// ma lus rtogs pa'i bdag nyid can// thugs rje che
183b4(1): la thabs mkhas pa'i// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug po// mthu stobs 'chang ba'i dregs pa can// yi dwags gshin rje kun gyi gshed// 'jam pa'i dpal las byung ba yis// 'jigs byed chen po sku bzhengs
183b5(1): la// khyod kyi zhing khams gzhal yas khang // bsgrub pa nye ba'i sgrub pa dang // mngag pa'i las dang yon tan rigs// rang ngo gtan tshigs bye brag dang // khyad par de yi dgos pa dang // gnas sbyor ba dang
183b6(1): tshogs chen dang // 'gyur ba'i gnas dang rang gi mtha'// phrin las dang ni mthar thug pa// gsal bya rjes bzung longs spyod dang // dmigs pa'i ched du bya ba dag/ rang gi 'khor lo legs par ston// gdul
184a1(1): bya yongs su min mdzod cig/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngon gyi phrin las dam pa'o// zhes bskul te// skad cig de nyid la rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du gshegs par gyur
184a2(1): to// gshin rje gshed 'dus rtsa ba'i rgyud las// gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gshin rje'i khro bo kun gyi gshed// sku gsung thugs kyi rol pa che// rab tu bstan nas
184a3(1): 'di skad gsungs// nyon cig 'jigs byed chen po'i 'khor// nga ni thog ma med pa nas// ngang gis gnas te shin tu bgros// rang rig byang chub sems kyi gzhi// spros med brjod pa'i mtha' las 'das// nyon
184a4(1): mongs sems can las kyi mnar// skye 'chi 'khor ba'i gshin tshogs la// 'dul zhing sgrol ba'i gshed yin pas// de dag nyid kyang skyob pa'i rjes// rang bzhin dang ni bgrod pa dang // grub pa dag ni las
184a5(1): rnams kyi// gzhi dang thabs dang 'bras bu ste// gdul bya sna tshogs snang ba yis// las kyi sde dang zhi gnas dang // rang sangs rgyas dang 'gog pa dang // sbyang bgrod rab tu dka' spyad dang // 'gyur ba 'gog
184a6(1): dang bzang ngan blta// dag pa'i cho ga gtsor spyod las// brtag shes mthong bas khyad par yin// blo dang dbang po bsam pa yis// myung 'gro rdzogs pa'i don du bstan// las kyi 'khrul 'khor gshin rje'i
184b1(1): tshogs// gnas ngan len tshogs de yis sbyongs// thun mong ba dang khyad par gyis// phung po ma yin las las ldog/ 'byung ma phung po khams dang ni// skye mched rten cing 'brel la sogs// rnam par dag pa'i ting
184b2(1): nge 'dzin// rgyu stobs ldan par 'gyur byed do// gnas dag gcig gnyis gsum bzhi dang // lnga dang drug gi yon tan tshogs// ji snyed ji bzhin ma lus pa'i// shes bya dang ni sbyang bya dag/ thogs med mkhyen pa
184b3(1): grub pa'i mtha'// mi 'dod pa dang dbang med dang // gnod pa zhi dang sbyor ba dang // rang dbang thob dang tshar gcod pa// de yi phrin las rdzogs pa yin// gsal bya rang bzhin rtags dang ni// thabs dang
184b4(1): 'bras bu nges par bya// rang bzhin bde ba chen po yi// mtshan nyid bzhi dang mtshan nyid dngos// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// thams cad de nyid kho na'o// 'khor ba'i gnas lugs shi ba'i gshin// kun
184b5(1): gzhi'i rnam shes de yi rje// de dag 'dul sbyong gshed du 'gyur// rtags ni ma lus gzugs kyi sku// rang gi gdul bya gnyen pos 'dul// sgrub byed rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// gnas gsum shes pa thabs
184b6(1): yin no// mi gnas grol ba'i sku gsum gyis// dag pa gsum gyi bdag nyid ldan// gzhi dang lam gyi rtog pa 'joms// khams gsum 'gro ba rigs drug dang // khyad par gdug pa can gyi rigs// gnas ngan
185a1(1): len pa che la sogs// thams cad ma lus gzung bya'o// gnas srid sprul pas yongs su gcod// dus gsum bde gshegs thams cad kyi// sku yi bsgrub pa dmigs pa'i ched// 'di dag rigs
185a2(1): kyi bdag po'o// de yi gsung du snang ba yang // a zhes bya ba chos kyi sgo// ma skyes thabs kyis rdzogs pa'o// kro zhes bya ba de nyid las// ma 'gags snang ba'i bdag nyid yin// te ni gnyis med rang byung
185a3(1): ste// zung 'jug mthun par ston pa'o// ka ni sku ste sna tshogs snang // rang gi gdul bya rtogs pa'o// ya ni gsung ste stong nyid sgra// grag pa med par brjod pa'o// mAn ni thugs kyi ngo bo ste// ma lus 'dul ba'i
185a4(1): bdag nyid can// ta ni yon tan rdzogs pa te// srid zhi mthar thug rtogs pa'o// ka ni thugs rje shugs kyi rtsal// 'jig rten chos la snang ba'o// ha ni phrin las grub pa ste// rang gi dmigs pa ched du byed// na
185a5(1): ni ming gi sgro 'dogs te// sna tshogs btags pa ma 'gags chos// ma ni yi kyi rnam rtog la// ma lus skyob byed rab tu brtags// tha ni 'gro ba'i ded dpon rje// gnas brtan rgan po skye dgu'i bdag/ b+ha na ni
185a6(1): 'ching byed rgya las grol// 'khor ba'i 'brel thag bcad pa'o// dzaHni bdud las rgyal ba ste// byang chub sems kyi khyad par ro// IM ni rigs kyi gtso bo ste// hUM gis rab tu brtags pas sdud// phaT kyis las
185b1(1): kyi phung po gtor// gsung gi dbang phyug smra ba che// ma 'gags rtsal gyis longs spyod byed// thugs ni rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid// rab tu spros pa ma g.yos chos// gnas pa'i 'khor lo g.yo ba med// srid pa'i
185b2(1): 'khor lo longs spyod che// sprul pa'i 'khor lo 'gro don rdzogs// spyod pa'i 'khor lo drag shul spyod// 'di ni rigs kyi 'khor du shes// zhes bka' stsal to// gshin rje gshed 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// sku
185b3(1): gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin rnam par dag pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo bzhi// lta ba dang ni longs spyod dang // cho 'phrul phrin las
185b4(1): ston mdzad phyir// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen la// dgyes pa'i mdangs kyis bka' stsal pa// e ma nga ni yon tan tshogs// ma lus kun gyi ngo bor snang // yid bzhin nor bu ji lta bar// yang dag thugs kyi ye
185b5(1): shes de// rab tu mchod cing bstod par bya// shes bya'i yul dang shes byed gzhi// sna tshogs nga yi thugs la gnas// bsam zhing 'dod pa 'di las byung // rang gi byang chub sems nyid 'di// thams cad 'dus
185b6(1): pa'i bdag nyid de// sku gsum rdzogs par rang la gnas// rig pa'i rgyal pos dbang bsgyur dus// phyi dang nang dang bar ma dang // snang dang srid dang rtog pa dang // bsdus pa dang spros dang 'tsham pa
186a1(1): dang // thams cad rang rig sems las byung // de nyid gnas su gyur pa yis// gzhi dang ngo bo rang bzhin dag/ ma bcos ma byas grub pa ni// spros bral chos kyi sku yi gnas// de nyid gzugs su
186a2(1): bstan pa ni// 'dod pa'i yon tan ma bkag chos// ji ltar 'dod pa ngang gis rdzogs// longs spyod mi zad 'khor lo las// bya dang byed pa snang ba'i dus// gnas 'gyur rung ba spyod dus na// thogs med 'dod
186a3(1): pa yid las skyes// don rigs snang ba sbrul sku'i gnas// ye shes thugs ni nam mkha' bzhin// stong zhing snang ba'i mtshan nyid can// 'ba' zhig snang ba skye med pa// chos dbyings ye shes gnas pa'o// sgro dang
186a4(1): bsdu ba phyag rgya'i las// 'dod pa'i dngos po ma lus pa'i// me long chu zla la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan snang ba dang 'dra zhing // shes dang shes bya ma lus gsal// sna tshogs snang ba dngos po de// ma grub rang
186a5(1): gi ngang du gsal// gsal ba'i ye shes gnas pa'o// rang rig thugs la bkod pa yi// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po lnga dang rnam par shes// yul lnga kha dog byed pa lnga// yab yum rigs dang phrin las
186a6(1): lnga// ma lus rnam dag ye nas gnas// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnas// de dag kun gyi gzhi dang yul// khams kyis bsdus pa'i sna tshogs lus// ma lus dbyings su rim gyis mnyam// mnyam nyid ye shes
186b1(1): rang rig gnas// kun gyi rang rig byang chub sems// de las byung ba'i phrin las ni// nan tan spyod pas kun la khyab// ye shes bzhin du gnas pa'o// sems nyid me long brtags pas ni// sngar byas byang chub
186b2(1): de nyid do// 'jig rten gsum yang rang gi dngos// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yang // sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan med// de nyid 'khor ba las kyi sa// mya ngan 'das pa ltar snang zhes// rang gi thugs
186b3(1): la de nyid gnas// don dam snying po byang chub sems// thams cad bden pa'i chos nyid do// brtags shing dpyad pas shes min te// nam mkha' lta bur spros dang bral// kun rdzob snang dang srid pas
186b4(1): bsdus// log pa dang ni yang dag ste// rtog pa phyir 'gyur med bzhin snang // ma 'bres brtags bzod gnyis su gnas// don gyi gnas lugs blta ba ni// mig gi dbang po ji bzhin du// mthar zug rdzogs
186b5(1): par mthong ba yis// spang blang skyon yon sbyang thob dang // shes bgrod yul dang gnyen po'i tshogs// ma lus rtog par nyams su myong // yan lag nyid lag bya ba bzhin// 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug spyod lam
186b6(1): gyis// gnas dus yul gyi bye brag la// byas shing spyod pa chud ma zos// rang gzhan gnas kyi don spyod cing // yid la 'dod rdzogs spong ba'i gnas// thun mong pa dang khyad par gyis// phyi nang rtsol ba ma
187a1(1): 'gags pa// sna tshogs pa dang kho na yis// nges par spyod pa thabs kyi gnas// shes rab kyis ni blo phye nas// de bzhin nyid du yang dag mtha'// gnas nyid skyon med phyogs kun rtogs// mngon
187a2(1): par byang chub shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gyi sems zhi nas// de nyid ngang la ma bcos gnas// stobs kyi ye shes lhag par mthong // phyin ci ma log spyod pa'i gnas// rlabs chen rnam par dag par
187a3(1): sbyang // sems las rung ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// dri ma med pa'i shes rab kyis// sku gsum mngon du gsal bar rdzogs// yang dag ye shes thugs kyi dngos// nges pa yis ni bkag pa dang // bsgrub pa med pa'i
187a4(1): chos thams cad// 'khrul gzhi 'khor ba'i 'khor lo'o// las kyis ma lus gcod pa ste// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dag/ ye shes rig pa'i mtshon cha yis// mnyam nyid dbyings kyi ngang du gcod// 'khor
187a5(1): ba'i bag chags gnas ngan len// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// rab tu 'brel ba'i ye shes kyis// nyon mongs bag nyal len cing bsreg/ brtse ba gsum dang snying rje las// don dam kun rdzob gnyis
187a6(1): med pa'i// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// cho 'phrul sna tshogs snang ba yis// 'khor ba'i mun khang thib po 'joms// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pa'i// don dam ma bcos rang byung me// 'khor ba'i
187b1(1): nyon mongs sbur ma dang // mi gtsang ldan ljin ma lus skem// gnyis med thugs kyi 'khor lo dag/ phrin las thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis// rab bskor srid pa'i gsum gyi dngos// mi shes rmongs pa rab tu
187b2(1): gcod// rtogs pa dang ni thugs rje yis// bdag dang gzhan du snang ba las// srid pa sgo nga mngal dang drod// de ma thag tu brdzus te skye// gnas gzhi rtsa ba yongs gcod cing // bsreg 'joms gcod dang skem
187b3(1): pa yin// thugs las byung ba'i nyi ma bzhis// dus gsum sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// dgongs pa dang ni ye shes tshogs// khams gsum 'gro ba thams cad kyi// las dang sdug bsngal rgyu 'bras dag/ gsal
187b4(1): bar smin rgyu gzhan dag las// ma ltos pa dang rang la rdzogs// thugs kyi nyi ma bzhi yin te// gnas pa lte ba'i 'khor lo ste// ma lus yongs su rdzogs pa'o// srid pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba// kun gyi lto phal
187b5(1): gnas pa ste// gnas ni 'jig pa'i mkhar lta bu// dbang gal gnad bcud rdzogs pa ste// de bzhin 'jam dpal mkha' las byung // gshin rje kun gyi gshed gyur pa// gnyis med thugs kyi ye shes
187b6(1): 'chang // 'dod khams gzugs khams gzugs med khams// lha klu mi yi srid pa dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// dbang po lus ngag yid gsum dang // thig le gnas dang longs spyod
188a1(1): gsum// rtag chad dbu ma mtha' dang bcas// skye 'jig gnas pa rang gi gzhi// ma lus sku gsum 'du zhing rdzogs// rang gis dbang bsgyur spyod pas na// gsang gang dbang rdzogs pa'i spyod
188a2(1): pa'o// mngal skyes srid pa dang po yi// lte ba'i gnas na brtsam pa ste// btsan khang khri mon bcug pa yis// steng 'og par gsum zo khyu'i khyud// las kyi shugs kyis 'khor zhing chags// stobs gzhan gyis ni
188a3(1): bskyod mi nus// 'jigs byed chen po bdag nyid kyis// las kyi gshin rje gzir ba yis// lto na srid pa gsum gnas shing // 'khor ba'i sems can thams cad kyi// rnam par shes pa'i rten 'phos tshe// de
188a4(1): nyid las kyi rgyal po yis// phyag gi 'du byed byas pa yis// las kyi 'phen pa gnas mthud cing // nying mtshams phung po nyer len pas// srid pa'i 'khor lo zhes kyang bya// kun gyi ma rig 'khrul pa
188a5(1): las// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rtog pa yis// chags dang zhen pa rab tu brtag/ srid pa'i rtse mo man chad nas// las kyi mnar med yan chad du// las kyi dbang gis 'khor bas na// 'khrul pa'i snang ngo zad mi
188a6(1): shes// las kyi 'khrul 'khor de nyid las// rtsa ba yan lag sna tshogs kyi// nyon mongs phra rags ma lus pa// rang byung shugs kyi ye shes kyis// ma lus mthar thug gcod par byed// shes pa'i srid pa gnas ma
188b1(1): yin// zhi la mi gnas snying rje dag/ tshogs gnyis lam gyi yon tan gyis// ma lus gcod pa'i 'khor lo'o// de las yon tan sprul pa yis// 'khor lo cho 'phrul 'byung ba ni// sems dpa' gnyis kyi zhabs
188b2(1): 'og gnas// rmi lam sgyu ma'i skyes bu bzhin// ci dran cir snang cir spyod pa'i// las kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ gshin rje rgyal po brjid pa'i zhabs// 'bar ba'i stobs kyis gnon pa ni// rtsa ba'i nyon mongs
188b3(1): drug las byung // nyon mongs gzhi bcas 'gro ba drug/ snang ba yul gyi tshogs drug dang // sgo lnga lam gyi rgyud drug dang // sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal chos dang gsum// las dang
188b4(1): nyon mongs sprul pa drug/ rang gnas las kyi 'khor lo drug/ 'gyur med rang gi sar gnon cing // thugs rje thabs kyi sprul pa drug/ rigs dang khams dang byed pa drug/ las dang dbang po bsam pa
188b5(1): dag/ mthun 'jug blo yis don mdzad cing // tha dad snang ba sprul pa ste// so so'i las kyi rnam smin gyis// gcig nas gcig tu kha brgyud cing // 'khrul zhing 'khor bas 'khor lo ste// nyon mongs drug po gcod
188b6(1): byed las// sna tshogs 'byung ba'i cho 'phrul te// don la ma nges snang ba'o// phrin las gcod pa'i 'khor lo ni// gdug byed mtshon cha rnon po bzhin// phyag mtshan 'dzin pa'i tshul gnas shing // gang la dmigs
189a1(1): pa thogs med gcod// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyi// phyag mtshan 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi// zhi bar bya dang rgyas par spel// dbang du bsdu dang tshar gcod pa'i// las kyi rnam bzhis dngos po
189a2(1): gcod// zhi bas 'jigs pa brgyad las skyob// skyob pa'i bar gcod de yis gcod// rgyas pas 'byor pa drug ldan zhing // 'byor pa'i bar chod gcod cing sel// dbang gis mos pa rnam bzhi 'du// gang gis
189a3(1): mi 'du la phyogs kun gcod// drag pos dgra bgegs tshar gcod cing // mi 'dul bar gcod 'khor los gcod// phrin las bzhi yis gang dmigs gcod// gcod pa'i 'khor lo phrin las mchog/ rtsol med
189a4(1): rang byung shugs las 'byung // rab tu 'khor bas 'khor lor brjod// gnas pa gzhi yi 'khor lo ni// ma lus sems la 'dus pa las// bcos med snying po'i don dang ldan// chos kyi sku zhes bya

190b1(1): ba rta dang ma he'i bar// bskrad pa rnga mo'i gsang sgo ste// smyo 'bog ri dwags rgyab tu'o// lkugs pa lug gi khog pa ste// gnan pa ri rab rmang du bskor// rang gi yon tan chos mthun gyis// dbang du bsdu dang drag

192a1(1): gsum gsal zhing brtan pa dag/ zhi gnas lhag mthong ting nge 'dzin// gzugs brnyan sa yi sbyor ba yis// bsnyen pa'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// gzugs dang sgra dang chos rnams ni// dbang po
192a2(1): gsum gyi yul du 'gyur// rin po che dang 'bru mchog dang // sa sna lnga yi yo byad ni// rab 'bring tha ma'i 'byor pa ste// gang gis brtsam par gyur pa des// phyi nang gsang ba'i yo byad kyis// phangs pa med pa'i
192a3(1): 'bad pa dag/ mchod cing bstab pa'i longs spyod kyis// yongs rdzogs mnyes par bya phyir rtsol// de nas rab tu bsrung bya zhing // mngon du snang dang mi snang las// bka' bsgo dbang bsdu mtshams bcad
192a4(1): de// sbrang dang bsreg dang gtor ba dang // bskrad dang bcing dang mnan pa yis// ma lus tshar gcad rdzogs par bya// de nas tha mal rtog sbrang phyir// dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mkha' las sbrul// phyogs bzhi sgo
192a5(1): bzhir gsol gdab cing // gzhal yas blta ba'i smon pa bya// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba yis// phyag 'tshal gsol ba gdab pa dang // rkyen gyur phyi nang gsang ba yi// mchod pa'i khyad par rim pa yis// mchog
192a6(1): gi sku gsung thugs mnyes bya// de nas bsgrub pa'i dam bca' zhing // lhag pa'i ye shes byin rlabs blang // nyes pa bshags shing tshangs par spyad/ rang gi byin rlabs yongs rdzogs pas// gnas sbyangs
192b1(1): rgyud smin snod bzang 'gyur// lhag pa'i lha yi nye bar bsnyen// de nas rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir// dngos dang dngos min chos dang rten// ma lus rang gi mtha' la blta/ de nyid ma rtogs snying rje'i yul// rgyu ba
192b2(1): kun la dmigs pa bsam// rang gi snying po de nyid ni// dmigs pa gsal rdzogs rgyu ru bsgom// de la spro dang bsdu ba yis// sbrang dang mnyes pa'i las rnams bya// thog ma'i gzugs la thim bsam nas// rang
192b3(1): bzhin gnas dang grub pa yis// dag dang ma dag gnas gyur pa// ye shes 'byung ba lnga nyid kyis// rang gi sa bon rnam par bsam// eHyaMHraHsuMHraM koH/ mthing nag ldang ser dmar dang dkar// gzugs
192b4(1): bral zla gam gzhu 'dra zhing // gru gsum gru bzhir rab tu brtsegs// rang gnas de nyid ye shes dang // 'phro 'du las kyi sbyor ba yin// bdag med stong pa'i ngo bor bya// kun rdzob nus pa rdzogs ldan
192b5(1): zhing // rang gi mtshan nyid so sor 'dzin// 'ja' tshon sgyu ma'i tshul ltar snang // de yi steng du bsam pa ni// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan pa la// rgyu ni 'jigs byed rnam
192b6(1): par snang // rang gi khams dang byed pa dang // gdul bya dang ni 'dul bar byed// gang la bsngags pa der snang zhing // tshad med rdzogs pa nyid kyis gsal// ma bsgribs mnyam nyid ldan par bsgom// rang
193a1(1): sngags snying po las kyi gzhi// byin rlabs cho 'phrul byung ba ni// a dang maM dang paM dag las// gsal byed snying po bsil byed can// dag pa gsum la spyad pas mnyes// ma he chu glang brjid pa
193a2(1): ni// ha yi haM gyi yang rnam par spros las byung // de dag steng du bsgom pa ni// hUM chen 'bar ba'i 'od 'phros pas// 'jam dpal mkha' las byung ba ni// gshin rje kun gyi gshed gyur pa// chos kyi dbyings las
193a3(1): 'gyur med pas// mthing nag 'bar ba'i 'od mdog can// zhal g.yas dkar ba zhi ba'i ngang // phrin las drag po gtsor spyod pas// g.yon zhal dmar nag gtsigs pa'o// sa dgu rdzogs shing gnon pa
193a4(1): yis// spyan dgu sdang mig rab tu blta// chags pa'i thugs rje dang ldan pas// spyan rtsa dmar zhing phyogs bcur 'phrul// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa yis// mche ba bzhi ni rab tu gtsigs// sgrib pa'i bag chags
193a5(1): gtor ba yis// shangs nas ye shes 'thong rlung mdzad// ag tshom dmar po mer 'bar bas// gdug pa'i tshogs kun zil gyis gnon// dregs pa dbang du sdud mdzad pas// zhal nas hUM sgra drag po
193a6(1): sgrogs// rgyud drug dbyings su sgrol ba yis// phyag drug mtshon cha rang rtags 'dzin// g.yas pa'i dang po dug lnga'i tshogs// gtan nas 'joms mdzad be con bsnams// bar ma ral gri 'dzin pa yis// skye shi'i
193b1(1): 'jigs pa rtsa ba gcod// 'og ma dgra sta 'dzin pa yis// stobs kyi dug zhi gnas bzhi 'joms// g.yon gyi dang po sdigs mdzub kyis// gdug byed zil gnon 'bigs pa'i brda'// bar ma thugs kyi ye
193b2(1): shes kyis// 'khor ba'i gting 'byin mdung ring bsnams// tha ma dbang sdud thod khrag 'dzin// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs kyis// dregs pa mang po dbang du sdud// sku gsum rang bzhin lhun grub
193b3(1): pas// thod pa gsum gyi phreng bas brgyan// gdug pa klu yi dug 'joms pas// rigs lnga'i sbrul gyis lha tshigs bsdams// blo yi theg pa sna tshogs rdzogs// phrin las bzhi yi cho 'phrul ston// ru tra gdug pa
193b4(1): sgrol mdzad pas// glang chen stag dang mi dbang po// lpags pa sku yi na bzar gsol// dug gsum gtan nas 'joms 'dul bas// rak+ta thal chen khu ba yis// thig le'i tshom bu ri mor byas// mtha' gnyis
193b5(1): spangs shing khyab pa yis// rdo rje rin chen gshog pa gdengs// nyon mongs rtsa ba yan lag tshogs// bsreg mdzad bskal pa'i me dpung 'bar// gti mug ma spangs don mdzad pas// ma he chu glang zhabs kyis
193b6(1): gnon// skyon med gsal ba'i ye shes ldan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// chos dbyings ye shes don rtogs pas// g.yon phyogs khro mo be ta lI// nag mo gtum chen dbyings kyi yum// sku gsum rdzogs
194a1(1): pa'i spyan gsum ldan// khro gnyer rlabs kyis rab tu bskyod// 'khor ba ma lus gnas nas 'dren// dbu skra kham nag rab tu 'tsher// skra yi cha lugs gdug pa 'dul// za byed rngam pa'i rol pa'i
194a2(1): stabs// zhal gdangs tshems gtsigs ljags 'dril zhing // me dpung 'bar ba'i nang du bzhugs// dug gsum rtsad gcod dgra sta g.yas// g.yon na b+han+d+ha khrag gis bkang // spros bral nyon mongs zhal du
194a3(1): rngubs// sgrol mdzad ral pa gcig ma ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // dbu yi thor tshugs gcig tu 'khyil// chos nyid yang dag ye shes dbyings// ma lus rtogs pa'i rtags yin te// g.yas kyi
194a4(1): tre shUl rtse gsum 'dzin// dug gsum 'dzin pa rtsad nas gcod// g.yang gzhi pags pa'i ru mtshon gyis// bdud bzhi'i rtog pa zil gyis gnon// g.yon na thod pa khrag gis bkang // 'khor ba'i nyon mongs
194a5(1): dbang du sdud// 'gro drug dbyings su sgrol ba yis// khro gnyer drug gis rab tu 'bar// gtso chen dgyes pa'i rol pa stob// ha hi gsang ba'i nga ro yis// rang sngags gsang ba'i sgra sgrogs shing // rdo rje pad+ma
194a6(1): mnyam sbyor bas// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer 'phros// yig 'bru'i rnam pa cho 'phrul gyis// 'dul byed rang gi sprul pa dag/ ji bzhin pa yi snang ba las// rigs kyi sras mchog byung ba ni// hUM zhes bya ba yi/
194b1(1): ge'i gzugs// mthing ga 'od dang ldan pa dag/ rang gi gnas su bskyed pa las// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i shar phyogs su// ya ma rA dza zhes bya'i sras// mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa// g.yas dkar g.yon
194b2(1): dmar dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo ral gri lcags kyu g.yas// kha T+wAM dgra sta rgyu zhags g.yon// sbyor yum nag mo ral gcig ma// gtso la 'khyud cing dung dmar stob// sgrol yum nag mo nam gru yang / re ma
194b3(1): ti// g.yas g.yon ral gri ne'u le 'dzin// lho phyogs su ni myos byed 'bar// ser nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// be con ral gri dgra sta g.yas// b+han d+ha 'khor lo rgyu
194b4(1): zhags g.yon// gtum mo ser nag sbyor mdzad ma// gtso la 'khyud cing dung khrag stob// ser nag khrag gi bdag mo ni// g.yas na spu gri snying zhags g.yon// nub phyogs 'phags pa ma ru tse// dmar nag dbu

195a1(1): gtun shing rgya gram g.yas// dung khrag 'khor lo rgyu zhags g.yon// re ma ti ni sbyor ba'i tshul// srin mo ljang nag mgo 'phyangs ma// dgra sta 'phyar zhing dung dmar stob// sras mchog yab yum
195a2(1): 'khor rnams ni// so so'i rigs kyi sku mdog dang // rgyan bcas gtso bo yab yum gyi// tshul ldan rab tu rdzogs pa'o// phyi rol khyams sam 'khor lo la// gdul bya'i gshin rje bskyed pa ni// steng phyogs gnas
195a3(1): pa'i gshin rje ni// nag po'i phyogs 'joms zhes bya ba// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon dgra sta// nag mo ra la gcig yum dang bcas// dbang phyug rdzogs pa sku dkar
195a4(1): ser// tshe bum thong gshol phyag gis 'dzin// gdong dgu ma ni sbyor ba'i yum// brag 'joms mdog dkar g.yas rdo rje// phyag g.yon gyis ni 'khor lo 'dzin// khro mo shel mig ma dang bcas// smug nag chen

196a1(1): ldan pa dag/ rang sngags gsang ba'i don gyis dbyung // khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dag/ nga dang gnyis med dus gsum gyi// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byin rlabs kyis// sku gsung thugs su byin

196a3(1): gsal bar rab tu bsgom// de la brtan par gnas pa dang // gnyis med ye shes dkyil 'khor che// rang bzhin grub pa'i pho brang na// khyad par nga rgyal snying po nyid// lhag pa'i gnas su sbyong byed pa// mnyam

196b5(1): dang // za dang 'thung dang nyal ba dang // bya dang byed dang gnas pa dang // gnas 'gyur rtog pa'i khyad par spyod// ji ltar gang la cir spyod pa// 'jigs byed gshed kyi brtul zhugs te// dang po ba dang mnyam

197a1(1): sngags 'di dag go/ au a kro te ka ya man+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT// rtsa ba'i nye ba'i snying po'o// IM ka la rU pa hUM phaT/ sku'i snying po'o// IM ya mAn+ta ka hUM phaT// gsung gi snying po'o// au hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi
197a2(1): kri tA nan hUM phaT// thugs kyi snying po'o// IM ya ma rA dza sa do me ya/ ya me do ru Na yo da ya/ ya da yo ni ra ya k+She ya/ yak+She yats+tsha ni rA ma ya hUM phaT/ rab tu gsang ba'i snying po'o// IM a sngags mar bzhag kro te ka hUM phaT/
197a3(1): au b+he tA li rak+Sha ma na hUM phaT/ IM e ka dza Ti trag rak+ta mu tra snying kha rag ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM phaT/ A~M ya ma rA dza ti ta tha tho la ya hUM phaT/ A~M ya ma rA dza pre ta b+hi tri ti ma ra ta ka hUM phaT/ A~M ya ma rA dza pre te dza la hUM/

197a5(1): b+ho// IM he ma de b+h+yo hAM/ au ya ma de b+h+yo hAM/ IM na ga de b+h+yo hAM/ IM kha rag de b+h+yo hAM/ A~M badz+ra ya ma rak+ta kro ta hUM phaT/ IM ya ma hri ti hUM phaT/ IM ya ma ma hA pa ta hUM phaT/ au ya ma tri ku ru hUM phaT/ au ya ma ya ba ti hAM
197a6(1): phaT/ oM ya ma ar+ya da ra hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rak+Sha tsa li hUM phaT/ oM ya ma sarba pa ta hUM phaT/ oM ya ma a mr-i baM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma d+harma rA dza hUM phaT/ oM ya ma dza la raM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma hri ti baM hUM phaT/ oM ma ma rag mo
197b1(1): ru lu b+h+yo/ au rag mo rak+Sha ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma rag sha hri ti snying ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma rak+ka ma ti ru lu b+h+yo/ au rag mo sta na ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma na ga ru lu b+h+yo/ au ba ya d+he ba ru lu b+h+yo/ au yag
197b2(1): mo yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ IM ma ma badz+ra e ka ru lu hUM/ IM ma ma yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ IM ka la rag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ IM ya ma aM gu sha dzaH/ IM ya ma pa sha hUM/ IM ya ma s+pho Ta baM/ IM ya ma g+han+te hoH/ rab tu bskyed pa'i snying
197b3(1): po'o// IM sa man ya many+dzu shrI mu tra yA man ta ka pa tsa te ro ni hUM dza/ ma ma e ka dzaHti trag rak+Sha kha mun+na/ mu tra ma ma snying kha rag+ma b+h+yo/ rag mo te/ ke tsa tsha kha la ma hi b+h+yo/ ya ya lo na tsin+tan ma ma b+h+yo dza/ snying kha rag
197b4(1): srog la b+h+yo b+h+yo/ bsgrub pa bya ba'i snying po'o// e ma ma te k+She ra tsa sa twa ru na yo ni ra ya tsa ni hUM phaT/ ya ma ra tsa sa twa me ya/ a mu ka pra ma ya ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT// ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ a mu ka ra ga ta ra tsa ya
197b5(1): ni sha ku ru hUM phaT/ ya ta yo ni ra ya k+She ya// srog rtsa a mu kaM ni sha ku ru ni hUM phaT// ya k+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ a mu kaM ma ra ya ni sha ku ru hUM phaT/ phrin las kyi snying po'o// gshed chen lto ba dkrugs pa yi// srid
197b6(1): sgraslar yab yum 'khor lo bskor// brab dang 'phangs dang las kyi mchog/ bzlog dang gzir dang dkrugs par bya// zhes gsungs so// dpal gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i snying
198a1(1): po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sngon gyi phrin las dgongs mdzad de// gang gis btul ba'i gdul bya de// phyi ma'i dus na dgongs mdzad de// mngon du spyod pa
