198b6(1): traitri ku ru rak+Sha khA hi/ sta sha rA tra mA ya/ rA tra thu na ya/ rA tra thu na ya/ rak+ta thun rbad/ rak+ta thun rbad/ bdud tri ni ra zung / ya tri ni ra zung / tri tsa pa la ni ra zung / chu ma shig yang tri ni ra zung / dun tri ba tri da na tri sho
199a1(1): ma tri thun dza/ ma ra tri dza dza/ ya ya/ zing thaM/ kro ta ni kro ta ni/ pa tra pa tra/ ga shu la ga shu la/ d+ha sha g+h+ri wa d+ha sha g+h+ri wa/ yag sha g+ni ba yag sha g+ni ba hUM phaT/ badz+ra badz+ra da ra libs/ kha la mu ting snying
199a2(1): gang chod/ mu la dun ting mA ra ya rbad/ badz+ra tig+na rbad/ tsakra du tri rbad/ badz+ra shu tri da ra tri ya rbad su rbad su/ rbad du rbad du/ da ra ka sha ta sa ma ya/ mdangs dang ldan pas bod par bya// nye dang bsnyen pa'i rtags
199a3(1): mthong nas// las la sbyar ba 'di dag go/ ging ka ra ging ka ra srog la rbad su rbad su/ sha la ha ba ha ba/ rus la chem chem/ rtsa la myag myag/ khrag la hub hu ba/ rbad rbad rtsub rtsub/ a mu ka tsit+ta mugs/ ra ma mA
199a4(1): ra ya khug ling / snying khrag ti ma tsa ti rbad thun rmugs khram hor rbad/ a mu ka mA ra ya ma trig na gug ling rbad/ bdud tri rbad thum ri li li/ a mu ka shig kha la ku ru/ a mu ka mu tri hri ma du na tri pho ba ya/ ya tri
199a5(1): rbad thum ri li li/ rbad rbad/ d+ha sha g+h+ri ba rbad/ zu ma ri li li/ yak+ka g+h+ri wa rbad bu thum ri li li/ yak+ka tsakra tsit+ta mA ra ya b+h+yo/ sa ma ya da ma dza dza/ taM ti du na rbad/ su da ra breng breng rbad/ rat+na tsakra a mu ka ha ri ni
199a6(1): b+h+yo/ ya ma mun ting sha ling tri tsa ra nr-i tri ba ra tri rbad rbad/ ging ka ra tsa d+ha ma ru tse las la yam yam rtsa la rgyug dbugs la hur zum/ srog la dun dza/ sha la gug thun// sngags 'di rdzas la bzlas shing
199b1(1): gdab// byung dang brtan dang las byed dang // grub dang mthar phyin rtags dang sbyar// dang pos 'bod cing gzugs la dbab// gnyis pas dpung dang dpral bar bya// gsum pas gnas su dgug cing
199b2(1): bcings// bzhi pas bsad dang brdegs pa ste// nyi ma bzhi pa'i 'khor lo yis// g.yas gcod g.yon gcod go rim gyis// 'phang dang bsreg dang gnan pa dang // las kyi mtha' ma rdzogs pa yis// gcod
199b3(1): pa'i 'khor lo cho 'phrul yin// gzugs med gzugs can 'dod pa'i khams// ma lus ngo bo nyid kyis bde// 'khrul pa'i las kyis 'khor lo rdzogs// gnas nas 'pho zhing sdug bsngal gyi// ngang gis bde la
199b4(1): sgrib cing gcod// de las bzlog pa de nyid de// 'khor zhing 'pho dang gcod pas so// byang chub lam dang srid pa'i gnas// rten 'brel phyogs chos rjes 'gro zhing // bzlog pa ma lus kun tu brtag/ de nas
199b5(1): gzhan dbang bsam pa'ang 'byung // yongs su grub pa rjes yin no// dus bzhi skye ba'i gnas bzhi dang // sdug bsngal bzhi dang 'gyur ba bzhi// yul bzhi khams dang byed pa bzhi// lam bzhi sa bzhi ye shes
199b6(1): bzhi// sku bzhi rdzogs pa'i lta ba bzhi// ma lus 'pho dang gcod pa dang // 'gro zhing ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste// bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu gnyis dang // bcu drug bar gyi gnas yul mtshon// phyi nang yul dang
200a1(1): dngos thams cad// gzhi dang gnyen po 'byung ba dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu byed pa'i rkyen// 'jig dang gnas pa'i rten 'brel 'byung // brtan g.yo dbang po drug gi yul// rang gi nus par bcas
200a2(1): pa dag/ rang bzhin dang drangs bdag nyid kyis// bya dang byed dang chags sdang dang // bag la nyal dang kun nas sdang // 'byung dang ldog pa'i rten 'brel gyis// bag chags las dang nyon mongs dang // shes bya
200a3(1): tsam gyis sgrib par 'gyur// bcu gsum pa dang yan lag dang // sbyor dang mnyam nyid rig pa yis// rgyu mthun dbang dang rnam smin gyis// dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu bskyed// nga ni thog ma med pa nas// dus
200a4(1): gsum spros bral chos skur gyur// chos mthun longs spyod rdzogs par bstan// cho 'phrul byin rlabs 'khor lo bzhis// ma 'gags thabs las sprul pa'i sku// dag pa rang gi ngo bo nyid// phrin las sna tshogs
200a5(1): 'byung ba las// som nyi za bar ma byed cig/ ces bka' stsal to// gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// gcod pa'i 'khor lo'i khyad par gyi las bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de
200a6(1): nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// khyad par sku yi ngo bo bdag/ bsdus pa'i yon tan 'di gsungs so// hUM chen 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du dang // rdo rje rtse lnga'i byin rlabs
200b1(1): kyis// 'jam dpal mkha' las byung ba'i sku// bcom ldan gshin rje kun gyi gshed// gnyis med kun la khyab pa'i sku// chos kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // ye shes sgyu ma'i skur snang ba// 'gyur med rdo rje
200b2(1): sku yi mchog/ zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// chos nyid mi 'gyur sku mdog mthing // sku gsum rdzogs pa'i dbu gsum gsal// rgyud drug sgrol ba'i phyag drug ni// dug lnga 'joms mdzad be con
200b3(1): 'byar// skye shi rtsad gcod ral gri gdengs// bdud bzhi 'dul ba'i dgra sta 'dzin// gdug byed 'bigs pa'i sdigs mdzub mdzad// 'khor ba'i gting 'byin mdung zung bsor// ma lus dbang sdud zod khrag
200b4(1): stob// srid zhi mnyam nyid zhal mdog can// bde gshegs kun gyi ye shes kyis// rnam dag sku yi rgyas gdab cing // dbu skra ral pa srid rtser 'bar// sa dgu rdzogs pa'i spyan dgu gzigs// nyon mongs bag
200b5(1): chags sgrib pa'i tshogs// shangs kyi ye shes rlung gis gtor// sma ra me 'bar srid gsum bsreg/ zhal nas hUM chen chos sgra sgrogs// ljags kyi klog 'od khams gsum gsal// mche ba gtsigs pas skye bzhi
200b6(1): sgrol// khro gnyer brjid pas dbang du sdud// sku gsum rdzogs pa'i thod phreng brgyan// gdug pa 'joms mdzad sbrul gyis dkris// theg pa rim pa dgu rdzogs pas// glang ko rlon pa na bzar gsol// phrin las
201a1(1): rnam bzhi rab rdzogs pas// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs gsol dkrig/ dregs pa rA tra 'dul mdzad pas// mi dbang lpags pa sku la gsol// rak+ta'i thig les 'dod chags 'joms// thal
201a2(1): chen mtshan mas gti mug sel// zhag gi zo ris zhe sdang spong // rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkhar gdengs// rin chen gshog pas 'gro don rdzogs// mtha' gnyis ma spangs kun la khyab// bskal pa'i me dpung klong
201a3(1): na bzhugs// bag chags rtogs pa ma lus bsreg/ dug gsum sa gsum rab sbyor bas// yi dwags ma he chu glang gnon// ye shes gsum gyis don mdzad pas// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// snyoms mdzad
201a4(1): rgyal ba kun gyi yab// sku mchog gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// chos dbyings gnyis med sbyor ba yi// yum chen khro mo be tA lI// gtum chen dbyings kyi yum gcig ma// mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku mdog
201a5(1): can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro gnyer ma// dug gsum rtsad gcod dgra sta g.yas// nyon mongs rngub mdzad thod khrag stob// dpal chen sku dang gnyis su med// chos nyid dbyings su yang dag sbyor// sgrol
201a6(1): mdzad yum chen ral gcig ma// bai DUr sngon po'i mdog 'dzin ma// g.yu yi ral gcig gtsug tu 'khyil// zhal gcig phyag gnyis khro mo che// dpal 'bar khro mo mi thung ma// g.yas kyi tri shUl rtse gsum
201b1(1): 'dzin// dug gsum rtsad nas gcod cing sgrol// g.yon na zhing ljags rgyal mtshan phyar// bdud bzhi'i rtog pa 'dul bar mdzad// gtso chen phrin las myur bsgrub ma// sbyor dang sgrol ba'i bdag nyid
201b2(1): kyis// 'gro don rdzogs mdzad dpal 'bar ma// chos dbyings rgyal ba kun gyi yum// 'dul mdzad yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnyis med thugs kyi sprul pa las// phyogs bzhi 'dul ba'i gshed chen
201b3(1): bzhi// zhe sdang ye shes gshin rje'i gshed// gti mug ye shes gshin rje'i gshed// 'dod chags ye shes gshin rje'i gshed// phrag dog ye shes gshin rje'i gshed// 'jigs byed chen po'i skur bstan
201b4(1): pa// gsung gi dbang phyug 'jam pa'i dpal// thugs mchog rnam dag chos kun gsal// yon tan mnyam nyid ma lus rdzogs// phrin las mi bzad gdug pa 'dul// sbyor dang sgrol mdzad yum dang
201b5(1): bcas// byang chub sems kyi phrin las kyis// srid pa'i 'khor lo gnas nas sbyongs// ye shes sems dpa' rgyal ba'i sras// 'khor lo bzhi yi bdag nyid rdzogs// gshed chen tshogs la phyag 'tshal
201b6(1): bstod// bcom ldan sngon gyi phrin las las// bdud 'dul pho nya'i las mdzad pa// gshin rje ma mo mkha' 'gror bcas// phyogs mtshams steng 'og ma lus pa'i// phyi nang skyong ba'i dam tshig can// nyi ma bzhi
202a1(1): pa'i las mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bka' stsal nas// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu nam mkha'i
202a2(1): khams thams cad ma lus par khyab par mdzad nas/ sems can gyi khams snang ba thams cad/ rang rang gi mdun na de bzhin gshegs pa rang rang gi rigs dang khams byed pa dang // las kyi khyad par dang
202a3(1): rab tu mthun pa'i chos ston cing gnas pa dang / srid pa dang / sprul pa dang / gcod pa'i sgo nas/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / tshangs pa dang / brgya
202a4(1): byin dang / dbang phyug chen po gzhon nu dang / lha dang / klu dang / bram ze dang / glang po dang / cang shes dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang / ru ru dang shing rta mo dang / sdig pa dang nya dang srin bu la sogs pa sems can
202a5(1): gyi gzugs sna tshogs bdag gis/ kha cig la ni zhi ba dang / kha cig la ni rgyas pa dang / kha cig la ni dbang du bsdu ba dang / kha cig la ni tshar gcad pa dang / kha cig la ni bskrad pa dang / bcing ba dang /
202a6(1): dgug pa dang gnan pa la sogs pa gang gis gnyen por gang 'gyur ba de bzhin du bstan te/ thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i zhing khams su snang bar mdzad do// gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa
202b1(1): rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo'i yon tan rdzogs par snang ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de nyid kyis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams
202b2(1): cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi de kho na nyid gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba rmad du byung ba'i rol pa'i phrin las de dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus su snyigs ma lngar gyur pa'i sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir// byang
202b3(1): chub sems dpa' rdo rje 'chang la gdams te yongs su gtad nas/ smon lam gyi dbang gis mi 'gyur bar mdzad de// nyid kyi thugs khyad par du dka' thub kyi lus rnam par dag pa'i phung po las bzhengs nas
202b4(1): dge sbyong du sprul te/ de dag dang mthun pa'i chos bstan pa sna tshogs kyi thun mong ba dang / drang ba'i don dang sgra ji bzhin pa dang / dgongs pa ma yin pa dang / spyi'i don dang yi ge'i don dag gis rjes su bzung
202b5(1): ste thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa la myur du 'god par dgongs so// bcom ldan 'das dpal gshin rje gshed rab tu 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen
202b6(1): po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lots+tsha ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya po'i bla dpe/ gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya// /
203a1(1): rgya gar skad du/ shri b+ha ga bAn ma hA ba shaM sa mu dA ya mU la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bcom ldan 'das dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po la phyag
203a2(1): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid dbang gi rgyal po de/ 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba'i bde ba chen
203a3(1): po/ rnam par dag pa'i dbyings/ pad+ma mchog gi pho brang dam pa rgya dang tshad med pa'i gzhal med khang rnam par dag pa na/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen pos dges pa'i bde ba dang ldan pa la/ dkyil
203a4(1): 'khor chen po'i rang bzhin gyi rigs kyi sprul pa snang bar gyur pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi lha tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang rin po che dang pad+ma dang las kyi rigs su snang ba'i zhi ba'i tshogs dang /
203a5(1): rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang / gtso mo chen mo dbyings kyi yum chen mo drug dang / 'dab chags kyi gzugs kyis 'gro ba 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo rigs lngas bsdus pa rnams dang /
203a6(1): 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can po'i tshogs dang / mo'i tshogs su gyur pa rnams dang / stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi klu'i rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / klu dang srin po'i tshogs ma rungs pa las
203b1(1): byung ba'i gza' dang rgyu skar gyi tshogs dang / de dag la sogs pa dregs pa'i tshogs mthu'i rdzu 'phrul dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa// 'dul bar mdzad pa'i phyir sprul pa'i 'od zer rab tu 'phro ba las byung ba'i
203b2(1): zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo chen po brgyad yum dang bcas pa'i dang // phrin las bzhi so sor bsgrub pa'i phyir sgo bzhir gnas pa'i lha mo bzhi dang / gzhan yang sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin
203b3(1): las sna tshogs las sprul pa'i mkha' 'gro bzhi dang / ye shes las byung ba'i spyan dang ldan pa'i sprul pa brgyad dang / phrin las kyi pho nya za byed chen po'i tshogs kyi gtso bo bcu drug dang / lus kyis mkha' la 'gro
203b4(1): ba'i tshul du sprul pa'i phrin las kyi mgyogs ma brgyad dang / sbas pa'i ma mo rtsal dang ldan pa'i mgos brgyan pa'i mo tshogs kyi srin mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi las la grub pa'i lha dang klu
203b5(1): dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / nam mkha' lding dang mi'am ci la sogs pa'i 'khor gdug pa can bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po gsung
203b6(1): gi mnga' bdag/ snang ba mtha' yas de nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chen po chos nyid mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos kyang / thugs rje chen po dang byams pa chen pos gdul byar mi nus pa'i dregs pa can rnams
204a1(1): 'dul ba'i phyir/ sku gsung thugs 'jigs byed chen por sprul pa 'di lta ste/ phyogs bcu ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i khams thams cad ni mthing nag gru gsum yum kun tu bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings
204a2(1): rlung gi khams thams cad ni 'thor rlung drag po ljang gu zla gam rgya gram/ rigs kyi yum dang dam tshig sgrol ma'i mkha' dbyings chu'i khams thams cad ni chags pa'i gzhi khrag gi rang bzhin dmar zhing zlum pa/
204a3(1): rigs kyi yum mA ma kI'i mkha' dbyings sa'i khams thams cad ni phung po ti ra'i rang bzhin/ ser po gru bzhi pa/ rigs kyi yum sangs rgyas spyan gyi mkha' dbyings/ me'i khams thams cad ni rab tu 'bar zhing
204a4(1): sreg par byed pa rigs kyi yum gos dkar mo'i mkha' dbyings/ byang chub kyi sems kyi rnam pa thams cad ni/ keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab chen po/ rab tu rngams pa'i gzugs/ rigs thams cad kyi bdag po
204a5(1): chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du sprul zhing byin gyis brlabs so// gzhan yang snod kyi 'jig rten rin po che'i gzhal med khang mdzes par snang ba rnams ni thod pa skam po dang rlon pa dang sha khrag
204a6(1): ras ris su chags pa brtsigs pa'i gzhal med khang rdzogs pa'i sku gsum gyi rang bzhin/ 'jig rten gyi lha dang klu dang gza' chen po bsgral zhing tshar bcad pa dag la ka gdung gi tshul du byas pa ni dman
204b1(1): pa'i theg pa brgyad kyi rang bzhin/ bar snang gi lha bran dang rgyu skar gyi tshogs thog grab kyi tshul du byas pa ni/ bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rang bzhin/ nyi ma dang zla bas gsal ba'i 'od 'phel 'grib med pa ni
204b2(1): mthongs khung gi tshul ni/ thabs dang shes rab rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin 'jig rten gyi mthu dang dregs pa can dbang phyug chen po dang gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dbang du bsdus te rgyal mtshan du btsugs
204b3(1): pa ni/ chos kyi sku dngos po ma lus pa thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i rang bzhin// phyogs bzhir sgo bzhir snang zhing dus bzhi shes la 'byed pa ni tshad med pa bzhi'i rang bzhin/ phyi dang nang gi phyogs thams
204b4(1): cad du bskal pa'i me 'od chen po 'bar ba ni ye shes rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin stong gsum gyi klu'i rgyal po gdug pa can gdan du byas pa ni nyon mongs pa'i dug ma lus pa 'joms pa'i rang bzhin/ pad+ma rnam par
204b5(1): dag pas gdan byas pa ni/ thugs rjes sems can la chags par mdzad kyang // de'i skyon gyis ma gos pa'i rang bzhin nyi ma dang zla ba pad+ma 'bar bas bteg pa ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam par
204b6(1): dag pas bskyed pa ste/ de ltar snod kyi 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad dbang du bsdus pa'i sprul pa rnam par 'phro bar mdzad do// gzhan yang bcud kyi 'jig rten skye 'gro gzugs su snang ba thams cad kyang
205a1(1): bdag nyid dbang gi rgyal por snang bar byas pa'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ nga ni bde gshegs kun gyi gtso// nga ni skye 'gro kun gyi yab// nga ni gshin rje kun gyi gshed// nga ni ma mo kun gyi rje// nga na
205a2(1): sbyor bdag chen po ste// yag sha shrI he ru ka/ nga ni sgrol bdag chen po ste// rag sha shrI he ru ka/ nga ni sbas pa'i rang bzhin te// gu ya dpal chen he ru ka/ nga ni dam tshig chen po ste// sa ma ya shrI he ru ka/ nga ni
205a3(1): dus gsum mngon du dbyung // dus gsum 'di ni nga yi dbang // thams cad nga yi dbang du bsdus// bka' dang dam las khyod 'das na// gso glag med par dmyal zag gcod// de bas nga yi las rnams
205a4(1): sbusgrubs// zhes gsungs shing thams cad dbang du sdud pa'i rol pa'i cho 'phrul chen po drag cing rtsub pa'i shugs spyod pa kun tu bltas pas 'jigs par 'gyur ba rab tu bstan te/ gsung yang 'di skad rab tu
205a5(1): sgrogs so// IM pad+mAn+ta kr-i ta ha ya b+hI ba ma hA kro d+ha e ka dza Ti sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hAM/ A ra li dza/ hrIHsngags sor bzhag/ de ma da ri ha ya g+hI wa e ka dza TI sa ma ya hu lu hu lu hrIHdzaHdzaH/ e dza b+h+yo nr-i dza rbad/
205a6(1): hrIHpad+man+ta kr-ita ha ya g+h+ri wa e ka dza Ti hu lu hu lu hrI dzaHdza/ a ti sarba b+h+yo bzlog/ ces pa'i gsung gi sgra stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas pas/ phyogs bcu'i dregs pa can gyi tshogs thams
205b1(1): cad 'jigs shing sngangs skrag brgyal bar gyur te/ sa la kha bub tu 'gyel nas dbang gi rgyal po'i bka' nyan cing bran bzhin du las byed par khas blangs shing dam bcas so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa
205b2(1): ba'i rgyud las/ pad+ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mngon par sprul pa gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po de la 'khor gyi thog ma rigs kyi khro bo pad+ma he ru ka
205b3(1): chen po chu bdag gi rigs dpag tu med pa rnams dang lhan cig mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma bcom ldan dbang gi rgyal// pad+ma rigs mchog de bzhin gshegs// dus gsum sangs
205b4(1): rgyas thams cad kyi// gsung gi rang bzhin gsung gi bdag/ gsung gi gtso ste gsung dbyung ba// gsung mchog rnam par dag pa'i sku// ma chags mi chags chags med gsung // gsung gi dbang phyug smra ba
205b5(1): che// bdag cag nyan par 'tshal lags kyis// khyod kyi sku yis ci zhig mdzad// de bzhin gsung gis ci zhig gsung // thugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu// khyod la yon tan ci zhig mnga'// mdzad pa'i phrin las ji
205b6(1): lta bu// gzigs pa yis ni ji zhig blta// ting nge 'dzin ni gang la bsgom// dus bzhi yis ni spyod pa gang // 'thob par bya ba ci zhig lags// bdag cag rnams kyi the tshom 'di// myur du chod cig lha yi/
206a1(1): lha// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten khams// ljags kyi dbang pos khyab mdzod la// khams gsum ma lus thams cad kun// gsung dbyangs snyan pa'i sgra brjod de// gsal la rdzogs shing ma 'dres
206a2(1): la// lhag dang chad pa'i skyon bral bar// legs pa nyid du bstan du gsol// zhes gsol te gus pa chen po dang bcas pas mdun du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
206a3(1): cad kyi gsung gi dbang phyug des/ chos thams cad kyi sgra'i snying po gsung gi phyag rgya'i 'od zer rnam par 'phro ba yang dag par rtogs par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ yab yum gnyis su
206a4(1): med pa'i rol pa chen po rnam par 'phro ba rab tu bstan te zhal gyi dkyil 'khor ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho// nga ni thams cad sku yi rgyan// nga ni thams
206a5(1): cad gsung gi klong // nga ni thams cad thugs kyi dbyings// nga ni thams cad yon tan tshogs// nga ni phrin las ma lus mdzad// nga nyid gzung 'dzin bral bar blta// mnyam nyid g.yo ba med par bsgom// ma
206a6(1): 'gags rtsol ba med par spyod// sku dang ye shes dbyer med par// nga yi thob par bya ba yin// gal te khyod kyi the tshom dag/ sel byed nus pa ma thob na// nga yi legs par bstan gyis nyon// dus gsum
206b1(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis nga'i lus byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta ste/ 'khor ba'i sems can la thugs rjes rab tu chags pas sku dmar po'i kha dog dang
206b2(1): ldan pa'o// rdzogs pa'i sku gsum dang ldan pas dbu gsum gyis mdzes pa'o// dbu skra ral pa gyen du brdzes pa ni ma rig pa tshangs pa'i sgo'i sbubs gnon pa'o// spyi bo'i gtsug na rta mgo ljang gu rta skad drag po
206b3(1): 'tsher ba ni khyad par du dbang gi phrin las kyi sgo nas dregs pa can tshar gcod cing dbang du sdud pa'o// zhal nas hrIHdang phaT kyi gsung sgra drag po sgrogs pa ni/ ma rungs pa log par lta ba can rnams 'dul
206b4(1): bar mdzad pa'o// shangs nas rdo rje'i rlung 'tshubs ma drag por 'khyil ba ni// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad g.yo zhing mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la sogs pa 'dul bar byed pa'o// ag tshom dang smar
206b5(1): smin ma ser po la bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar bar snang ba ni/ mi shes mun pa'i phyogs ma lus par sel bar byed pa'o// spyan dgu nyi ma dang zla ba'i zer ltar 'bar zhing 'tsher ba ni/ 'gro ba rnams la thugs rjes
206b6(1): gzigs nas rang gi rigs la 'god par byed pa'o// phyag drug gis ni mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pas 'gro don mthar phyin par mdzad pa'o// rdo rje dang dril bu 'dzin pa ni/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis
207a1(1): su med pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa'o// kha T+wAM ga ni nyon mongs pa dug gsum gyi dngos po rtsad nas gcod pa'o// sbrul chen po'i zhags pa 'dzin pa ni gdug pa can rnams gdul zhing thugs rjes
207a2(1): 'dzin par mdzad pa'o// b+han+da dmar po khrag dang zhag gis bkang ba gsol ba ni// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal ma lus pa thugs rje chen pos zad par mdzad pa'o// lcags sgrog gi rgyun 'dzin pa ni// khams
207a3(1): gsum thams cad thugs rjes mi gtong bar bde ba chen po'i ngang du 'khrid par mdzad pa'o// glang po che'i pags pa dang zhing lpags chen po gsol ba ni/ theg pa rim pa dag gi gang du phyin cing thugs rje chen
207a4(1): po'i sprul pa rgyun du 'phro ba'o// stag gi pags pas sham thabs su dkris pa ni/ phrin las kyi khyad par ma 'dres par so sor grub par mdzad pa'o// dur khrod chen po'i chas brgyad kyis brgyan pa ni/ ye shes dang
207a5(1): las las grub pa'i ma mo mkha' 'gro'i tshogs dbang du sdud pa'o// klu'i rgyal po chen po rigs lngas brgyan pa ni/ gdug pa can gyi tshogs zil gyis gnon pa'o// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums dang dor stabs
207a6(1): su bzhugs pa ni/ bdud dang mu stegs kyi phyogs 'dul ba'o// klu pho mo gdan du bting ba ni zhe sdang dang gti mug rang sar sbyong ba'o// pad+ma dang nyi zla'i gdan bting ba ni/ ma chags pa'i bsod nams dang ye
207b1(1): shes kyi tshogs skyed pa'o// yum e ka dza Ti ral gcig ma dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba ni// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med pa'i ngang la gnas pa'o// sku mdog dmar nag la 'od 'phro ba ni// chags
207b2(1): pa dang bde ba chen po gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin no// zhal gcig ni chos sku mnyam pa chen po gcig tu mtshon pa'o// phyag gnyis ni snying rje dang stong pa zung du 'brel ba'o// kha T+wAM ga ni sku gsung thugs kyis
207b3(1): 'gro ba'i don rgyun du mdzad pa'o// zod khrag ni 'khor ba'i nyon mongs pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad zad par stob pa'o// gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa ni/ thabs thugs rje'i rol pa chen pos//
207b4(1): 'gro ba'i don rnam par 'phrul bar mdzad pa'o// nyon cig pad+ma he ru ka/ nga yi sku yi rang bzhin ni// chos kyi sku ste spros dang bral// nga yi sku yi ngo bo ni// longs spyod rdzogs te mtshan dper ldan// nga yi sku yi
207b5(1): mtshan nyid ni// sprul pa'i sku ste 'gro don rdzogs// ma lus lus pa med pa yi// zhing gi rdul dang mnyam pa'o// sems can khams kun thams cad la// nga yi sku ni re re gnas// gol te 'khrul pa'i dbang gyur
207b6(1): pas// ma mthong ma rtogs las kyis nongs// 'di la goms par byas pa ni// nga dang gnyis su med par spyod// mthong dang rtogs pa lta ci smos// zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las//
208a1(1): sku rnam par dag pa'i dbang phyug gsang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des khams gsum
208a2(1): pa thams cad yi ge sgra'i rtog pa rnam par spong ba 'khor lo yongs su gcod pa'i dbyangs stong zhing grags pa nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam par mdzad de/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hrIHde nas yang de bzhin
208a3(1): gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs rdo rje'i snying po 'di spro ba chen pos smras so// au pad+man+ta kri ta ha ya g+hI wa e ka dza Ti sa ma ya ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM A ra li dza/ rab tu bzlas pa'i snying po'o// hrIHb+h+yo dza dza/
208a4(1): hrIhriHhrIHhrIHhrIHhrIHhrIHhrIHhrIH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ ha ha ha ha/ ha ha ha ha/ he he he he/ he he he he/ muM muM muM muM/ muM muM muM muM/ muM muM muM muM/ muM muM muM muM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/
208a5(1): rab tu 'grub par byed pa'i snying po'o// oM ha ya g+h+ri wa hUM dza/ oM e ka dza Ti hUM dza/ oM pad+ma he ru ka hUM dza/ oM pad+ma kro d+hi shwa rI hUM dza/ oM badz+ra tsakra rat+na pad+ma karma hUM dza/ oM pad+ma kro d+hi/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa
208a6(1): tsa/ b+han+da b+han+da/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ sIn+da smin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ gardza gardza/ spr-iT s+pho Ta hUM dza/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM badz+ra pa sha hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De so/ oM A ra li hrI hAM dza dza/ ming gi bod pa'o//
208b1(1): ru lu ru lu ta sha ma ta ga ru ga te tsit+ta baM baM laM ru tra yo he sa ma ya/ k+She na ro sha kha/ ma ra pra be sha/ pra ta tsa la/ b+ha ru b+hi bi ta na ga b+hin du hi ra ya dung dung tsa/ rung ga pa sha ga pa/ ma hA ka ma la hUM/ ha he hUM pra be sha
208b2(1): phaT/ ba ha b+han+da b+han+da tig+ta pra be sha na ga le du ma ba le/ a ka le/ s+pho ta le a ka ra sha i na ta b+ha ha b+ha ha phra ma phra ma bram bram yak+Sha sa ma ya pra be sha phaT phaT/ bsgral te dbang du bya ba'i snying po'o// ta ki/
208b3(1): na ta ki na hAM/ ta ke ta kaM phaT/ b+ha na d+ha b+han d+ha chom/ tik+Sha tik+Sha shig rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM/ tshin+da tshin+da phaT/ kro ta kro ta raM/ ha la ha la baM/ rag sha rag sha baM/ dz+nya na tsakra ke tu traM/ rab tu bsgral ba'i phyir sbreng ba'i snying
208b4(1): po'o/ e kro d+hI shwa rI ma d+ha la hUM/ yaM karma rak+Sha hUM/ ra rak+ta dza la ma d+ha la hUM/ baM tik+Sha ma d+ha la hAM/ ko ni ri ti dza la ma d+ha la ko raM badz+ra dza la raM/ b+h+yAM bi shwa bi shud+d+he dz+nyA na tsakra ma d+ha la hUM b+h+yAM/ gzhi rab tu bskyed pa'i snying
208b5(1): po'o// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku/ sa'i khams ma lus pa'i rdul gyi cha dang mnyam pa'i tshad kyi rang rang gi gsung tshad dpag tu med pas bskal pa khri phrag bcu'i bar du nga'i gsung gi
208b6(1): mtha' brjod par mi lang ste hrIHhUM zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi snying po yang dag pa'i sgra'o// 'di ni phyogs bcu ma lus par khyab pa'i sngon du lhun
209a1(1): gyis grub pa'i rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa rnams kyi sku gsung thugs dbang gi rigs mthun pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i lha mor gyur te/ mchod pa dang bstabs pas mnyes par byed cing sems
209a2(1): can gyi khams kyi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len pa mtha' dag sbyangs shing zad par byas nas/ 'od zer gyi tshul du spros pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar snang bar byed pa'o// oM
209a3(1): hrIH/ e ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ chos kyi gsung ni dpag tu med// e ha hi yi yan lag ni// dregs pa can rnams dbang du sdud// ces gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gsung
209a4(1): rnam par dag pa dbang phyug gsang ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thugs kyi de kho na nyid rang bzhin
209a5(1): yongs su dag pa'i ngo bo de nyid 'gro ba ma lus pa la snang zhing gsal bar mdzad pa ni/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// byung dang mthong dang myong ba dang // gnas dang dran pa ma
209a6(1): lus pa// snying po byang chub sems yin te// 'di las g.yos pa ci yang med// gzugs dang kha dog mtshan ma dang // ming dang brda' dang tha snyad kun// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin te// snang yang 'di las
209b1(1): 'gyur ba med// 'on kyang rang las 'byung zhing snang // byung ba nyid kyang rang byung la// snang ba de yang rang las snang // rig pa'i dus na rang gis rig/ rnam par shes pa mi gcig pas// rtogs dang ma rtogs tha
209b2(1): snyad snang // 'on kyang gang gis gang nyid la// gang du ji ltar ji bzhin du// rtogs su yod pa ma yin te// tha snyad tsam du rtogs zhes brjod// kun rdzob don dam rang bzhin las// yod dang med dang gzung dang
209b3(1): 'dzin// skye dang 'gag dang rtag dang chad// snang stong srid dang zhi ba dang // bde dang sdug bsngal stong mi stong // mtshan ma med dang mtshan ma dang // smon med smon pa yod pa dang // bdag dang bdag med 'gro
209b4(1): dang 'ong // zag pa med dang zag bcas dang // kha na ma tho yod med dang // 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das dang // sgro dang bsdu ba la sogs pa// dngos dang ngo bo tha dad dang // mthu dang nus pa sna tshogs
209b5(1): dang // rang gi mtshan nyid so so dang // ming dang brda' dang tha snyad du// btags pa tsam ni ma lus dang // rgyu dang 'bras bu rten dang gnas// phyi nang snga phyi dus gsum kun// sems dang sems las byung ba
209b6(1): dang // rtog dpyod rigs dpyod mkhas dpyod dang // bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang // mngon du rgyu dang g.yo ba dang // yongs su grub dang kun tu brtags// gzhan gyi dbang las gyur pa dang // gang zag bdag
210a1(1): las byung ba ste// nga yi thugs las ci yang med// dper na mkha' la sprin tshogs dang // 'ja' tshon khug rnan bun dang // rdzi rlung kha char 'od dang glog/ snang yang mkha' las g.yos pa med// de
210a2(1): bzhin nga yi thugs kyi bdag/ ma skyes mi skye skye ba med// ma 'gags mi 'gag 'gag pa med// ma g.yos mi g.yo g.yo ba med// snying po don gyi gzhi nyid las// rang bzhin du ni lhun gyis grub// rtogs pa tsam
210a3(1): gyis mngon du 'gyur// rtsol med rgyu ni ye nas sbyangs// rang la rdzogs shing gzhan la snang // e ma ngo mtshar rmad du byung // zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thugs rnam par dag
210a4(1): pa dbang phyug gsang ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan phun sum
210a5(1): tshogs pa rab tu snang bar sgrub par byed pa'i don rnam par dag pa'i che ba 'di nyid ston pa 'di lta ste/ sku gsung thugs kyi cho 'phrul cir yang 'gyur zhing ston pa thams cad la snang yang gcig tu ma nges pa'i
210a6(1): phyir/ thugs kyi che ba nyid dang / gsung gi che ba nyid dang / sku'i che ba nyid la sogs pa gang yang ma 'gags pa'i sgo nas/ byin gyis rlabs sna tshogs su 'byung ba ni/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i
210b1(1): don// zab pa dang ni rgya che ba dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnams kyi theg pa chen po blta bas ma mthong ste/ 'dul ba'i dus la gnas pa'i sbyong bas par snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin mthu bo ches rgyu nye bar
210b2(1): bzhag pa dge ba'i chos la spyod par nus shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig la gzhag par sla'o// nyan thos kyi skyes bu ni smad par bya ba rnams 'dul zhing rang gi sa la dgod nus par zad kyi/ bla na med pa'i
210b3(1): lam la spyod par mi nus pa rnams kyang // nga'i thugs dang gsung dang sku'i yon tan thogs pa med pa spyod pa la ni rgyu tsam du yang mi nye'o// de ltar dbang gi rgyal po nga'i thugs nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'od
210b4(1): kyis thugs rjes stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa le snang ba bzhin/ sems can gyi khams rnams kyi sems kyi rgyu las snang ba thams cad bdag gi ye shes la snang bar byung ba ste thub pa chen
210b5(1): po yan chad yin no// ri rab kyi rtse mor rnam par snang mdzad gang gi mtsho chen po'i lus lha'i rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu'i tshe na/ nga'i rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen por sems bskyed do// bdag dang 'khor
210b6(1): bcas pa rnams// mthon mthing lcang lo can bskur te// bar snang khams kun rab snang zhing // phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng 'og kun// khro bo khro mos bkang byas te// rin chen rtsal chen seng ge dang // rta dang
211a1(1): glang chen nam mkha' lding // grangs med gnon pa 'og min gnas// rdo rje khro bo rnam par rgyal// zhabs 'bring rdo rje rol pa mo// bye ba khrag khrig rjes su 'brang // lus dang yan lag thams cad
211a2(1): kun// thod rlon phreng dang sbrul gyis brgyan// spyan dgu 'bar bas sa dgu gzigs// dbu skra ral pa me stag 'phro// rin chen 'bar ba'i zur phud lnga// se mo do dang do shal dngar// mgur chu chun 'phyangs za ra
211a3(1): tshags// de bzhin zhabs kyi chas brgyad kyis// khro bo chen po brgyad 'dul bas// tshangs dang brgya byin smos ci dgos// dbang chen nga yi 'khor rnams kun// bka' bzhin byed pa yon tan yin// gzhan yang nga
211a4(1): yi yon tan ni// blo dang dbang po bsam pa dang // khams dang rigs dang yul dang dngos// dman dang bar ma mchog tu byed// bya ba'i chos dang byed pa'i yid// gzugs dang tshor dang 'du shes dang // 'du byed
211a5(1): rnam shes phung po'i tshogs// dbang po yul dang skye mched khams// de ni nga yis rab tu byed// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang // rig 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang // nyan thos rang rgyal lha rnams
211a6(1): kyi// yon tan tshogs kun ji snyed pa// nga la de nyid mnga' ba ste// tshig dang ming dang rnam grangs dang // dpe dang tshad kyis brjod mi yang // gzhan yang nyon cig he ru ka/ nga la gzugs dang tshad dang
211b1(1): dbyibs// yod dang dngos por ma blta cig/ nga la rigs dang rgyu dang rkyen// byed pa po ni ga la yod// 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// thugs rje mkhyen pas thabs dang ldan// 'di ni nga yi chos kyi
211b2(1): sku// ston byed pa dang dus dang 'khor// gang gis bstan pa'i ngo bo de// nges pa can du rnam pa lnga// nga la phun sum tshogs pa ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa nga yi sku// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
211b3(1): dang // dman pa nyan thos rang sangs rgyas// 'di las gzhan pa'i phyi rol pa// dbang phyug dang ni tshangs pa dang // drag po gtum po gzhon nu dang // lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang // seng ge glang chen ri dwags
211b4(1): dang // 'dab chags srin bu la sogs pa// gang gi gang la gang gis phyir// ji ltar nus pa'i dbang mdzad cing // rang dang gnyis med mnyam sbyor ba// nga yi sku las rnam sprul sku// bsam gyis mi khyab brjod
211b5(1): las 'das// shes par byos shig he ru ka/ zhes gsungs so// dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yon tan rgya chen po nges par bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang
211b6(1): gi rgyal po des/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phrin las ma lus pa bsgrub par byed pa dang / de la nye bar byed cing skal ba can du byed pa dang / myur du 'grub par byed pa dang / legs par 'grub
212a1(1): par byed pa dang / yang dag par 'grub par byed pa dang / bde bar 'grub par byed pa'i thabs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i gsang ba dang gsung gi gsang ba dang thugs kyi gsang ba
212a2(1): chen po nye bar bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi dkyil 'khor rang nyid la rdzogs par gsal bar mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye kye dbang chen he ru ka/ ma 'ongs shin
212a3(1): tu snyigs ma'i dus// tshe dang dus dang longs spyod dang // las dang blta bas mnar ba'i tshe// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog ser sna yis// rab tu gzir zhing nyon mongs pas// gdung
212a4(1): ba'i sems can rnams kyi phyir// nga'i sgrub mchog bshad par bya// byang chub sems dang ldan pas nyon// dper na mkha' la 'gro ba'i lus// de nyid kyis ni 'dul ba ltar// nyon mongs tshogs rnams de nyid
212a5(1): kyis// rnam par rtog pa'i tshogs kyis 'dul// de bas blo ldan skyes bu yis// thog mar nga yis bsgrub pa'i gnas// nub tu kha bltas dben pa'i gnas// brag dmar cho zangs 'dra ba'i ni// rang gi rigs la
212a6(1): gshis pa'i gnas// chags chen mdog dmar shes rab ldan// bsgrub pa'i grogs la bsngags pa yin// ting 'dzin yo byad phun tshogs pas// rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya// khams gsum pa yi ngo bo
212b1(1): nyid// snang dang srid pa 'di dag kun// me dpung 'bar pa'i 'od bzhin bsgom// nam mkha'i khams kyi dkyil 'khor dbus// srog rten snying po yi ge hrIH// spro dang bsdu bas brtan par bzhag/ yul dang de yi
212b2(1): yul can kun// ma lus dmigs pa rab tu bya// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi dngos// so so'i las kyi rab tu sbyang // nga dang mtshungs par gyur pa na// mi g.yo tshad kyis brtag par bya// de yis thog mar bsnyen pa
212b3(1): yin// bsnyen pa yi ni ting nge 'dzin no// de nas nye bar bsnyen pa'i phyir// skad cig tsam mam yud tsam gyi// rang gi lus kyi nus pa gsum// dbang chen sku gsung thugs su blta// bar chad brtsams pa bzlog
212b4(1): pa'i phyir// phyi nang gsang ba'i las rnams kyis// bsrung dang bzlog dang bskrad par bya// rngams pa'i 'khor tshogs mkha' la sbrul// sgo dbye gsol zhing 'dud par bya// mnyes par bya ba'i yo byad bsten// tshul
212b5(1): bzhin ma gyur tshangs par bya// byin gyis brlab pa nyid la gzung // dam bca' brtan po bdag gir gzungs// thugs kyi snying po spro zhing bsdu// las su rung ba tshad kyis blta// de nas chos kun ngo bo ni// yang
212b6(1): dag pa la bdag med bsam// de yi mtshon par ma nus pa'i// yul rnams la ni rjes chags bya// nyid kyi dran pa'i rgyal po de// srog gcig 'bru la dmigs pa bsgril// cho ga yan lag 'phro 'du yis// mchod
213a1(1): bstod mnyes dang sbyang ba rdzogs// rang gi ngo bo nus dang ldan// hrIHs+pha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ e yaM ra suM raM hri s+tha ra na phaT/ saM ha ra na hUM/ stong zhing g.yo dang bskyod dang gzhi// gtsang sbra chen
213a2(1): po lnga dag ni// dag pa'i dag byed ting nge 'dzin// b+ha ga yangs pa'i dkyil 'khor lnga// rang gi ngo bo las bskyed pa'i// byin gyis rlobs pa'i mchog yin no// b+h+rUM s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM// sra zhing mkhregs
213a3(1): pa'i rgyu 'di las// mdzes shing 'jigs pa'i phyi dang nang // ji ltar bshad pa'i rgyan dang rtags// 'byung ba'i nus pa 'od ldan zhing // rol zhing 'bar ba rnam par bsam// gzhi rab tu bsgom pa'i ting nge
213a4(1): 'dzin no// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dbang gi rgyal po nga yi lus// che ba'i che mchog rta mgrin can// dges pa'i yum dang mnyam sbyar nas// 'phags pa'i tshogs kun ma lus pa'i// mnyes pa'i
213a5(1): mchod pa rab bstab ste// 'gro ba rnams kyi zhing dang rgya// dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du sbyangs// slar nyid sa bon mngon du gyur/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya stam/ rA go&haM/ rA ga ya mi/ hrIHsarba ta thA ga ta a nu rA ga Na badz+ra
213a6(1): swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ nga nyid dbang chen rdo rje ste// khams gsum ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir// sras kyi tshul du mngon par gzung // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi phyogs su dgod// nga nyid pad+ma he ru ka/ mdog dmar zhal
213b1(1): gcig phyag gnyis te// phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon thod pa// de dang rjes su chags pa'i yum// kha T+wAM zod pa 'dzin cing stob// phyogs nas gcod pa'i lce bzhi las// dbang po yi ni phyogs ngos su// rdo rje dbang
213b2(1): chen he ru ka/ mthing nag gzhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po rdo rje thod khrag bsnams// gshin rje gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu// rin chen dbang chen he ru ka/ ser nag zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po rin
213b3(1): chen thod khrag bsnams// klu dbang gnas pa'i phyogs dag tu// pad+ma dbang chen he ru ka/ dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po pad+ma zod khrag bsnams// gnod sbyin gyi ni phyogs de ru// phrin las
213b4(1): dbang chen he ru ka/ ljang nag zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// dang po rgya gram thod khrag bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni sbrul zhags dang // kha T+wAM rtse gsum 'dzin par mdzad// tha ma dbang gi phur pa 'dril// dbang
213b5(1): chen khro bo 'di dag kun// dbus ma'i zhal ni sku yi mdog/ g.yas zhal dkar la g.yon zhal ldang // rta mgrin ljang gus kun la mdzes// dur khrod dpa' ba'i chas kyis brgyan// zhabs gnyis brkyangs bskum
213b6(1): phyogs dag gi/ dregs pa pho mo brdzis pa ste// 'di dag kun gyi rol pa'i yum// rigs kyi dbang phyug khro mo bzhi// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma las// so so'i yab la 'khril mdzad cing // zhal gcig phyag gnyis chags
214a1(1): pa'i tshul// sku yi kha dog yab dang mtshungs// cung zad dmar ba'i mdangs kyis mdzes// kha T+wAM thod pa phyag gis 'dzin// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kun// khro bo'i gar nyams dgu dang
214a2(1): ldan// spyan gsum gzigs shing mche ba gtsigs// me dpung 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs// rang gi phrin las nges par mdzad// IM ha ya g+hI wa badz+ra kro ta hUM/ IM ha ya g+h+ri wa rat+na kro d+ha hUM/ au ha ya g+hI wa pad+ma kro d+ha
214a3(1): hUM// au ha yag+ni wa karma kro d+ha hAM/ b+h+yo e ka dza Ti badz+ra kro d+hI hAM/ b+h+yo e ka dza Ti rat+na kro d+hI hAM/ b+h+yo e ka dza Ti pad+ma kro d+hI hAM/ b+ho e ka dza Ti karma kro d+hi hAM// hrIHhrI/ hrIHhrIH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+ho b+h+yo/ hrIHA ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/
214a4(1): baba'i dbang chen bsgom pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ hrIHhrIHhrIHhrIH/ hrIHhrIHhrIHhrIH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+r-i b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ hrIHswa ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ nga nyid dbang chen rdo rje ste// srid gsum zil gyis gnon pa'i
214a5(1): phyir// 'jigs byed sprul pa rnam par 'phro// 'bar ba'i khyams la mdzes par dgod// khro bo chen po 'di rnams ni// mdog dmar zhal gsum phyag drug po// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// dbu
214a6(1): gtsug rta mgo re re zon// 'jigs byed dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// khyad par zhi ba zil gnon ni// 'khor lo rdo rje rin chen g.yas// pad+ma ral gri dril bu g.yon// sangs rgyas rigs lnga zhabs kyis
214b1(1): gnon// mi pham khro mo yum dang sbyor// las kyi khro bo zil gnon ni// pad+ma dbyug to spu gri g.yas// kha T+wAM dgra sta rgya gram g.yon// las kyi khro bcu zhabs gyis gnon// lha mo khro gnyer ma dang sbyor// ye shes ma
214b2(1): mo zil gnon ni// sdigs mdzub lcags kyu sbrul zhags g.yas// lcags sgrog rnga dang kha T+wAM g.yon// gtso mo dbyings kyi yum drug gnon// ro langs ma dang gnyis med sbyor// ye shes khyung rnams zil gnon
214b3(1): ni// rdo rje sa dang me khyung g.yas// nam mkha' chu rlung khyud ni g.yon// zhabs kyi rigs lnga'i khyung rnams brdzis// khro mo spyan gcig yum dang sbyor// pho rgyud zil gnon rta mgrin ni// rdo rje thod skam sbrul nus
214b4(1): zhags g.yas// thod rlon thod phreng zhing dbyug g.yon// dregs pa'i lha brgyad zhabs kyis brdzis// rdo rje las byed ma dang sbyor// mo rgyud zil gnon rta mgrin ni// rdo rje ral gri g.yas na bsnams// g.yon na
214b5(1): zhags pa sdigs mdzub ste// tha ma mda' bzhu 'gengs pa'o// ma bdun sring bzhi zhabs kyis gnon// gshin rje las byed ma dang sbyor// klu rnams zil gyis gnon pa ni// klu rigs drug gi sbrul zhags
214b6(1): 'dzin// rigs bzhi'i klu ni khyo shug gnon// klu mo las byed ma dang sbyor// dregs pa'i gza' rnams zil gnon na// rdo rje zhags pa ral gri g.yas// dung khrag dbyig pa khyung chen g.yon// gza' chen brgyad ni
215a1(1): zhabs kyis gnon// gnod sbyin las byed ma dang sbyor// khro mo yum chen 'di rnams la// mdog dmar chags pa rgyas pa'i tshul// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab la 'khyud// kha T+wAM 'dzin cing zod
215a2(1): khrag stob// yab sum bcas pa'i khro tshogs kun// shar nas brtsams te rim bzhin dbyung // oM pad+ma kro d+ha ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+ha da ha da ha hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+ha pa tsa pa tsa hU~M phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+ha tiSh+Tha
215a3(1): tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+hats+tshin+dats+tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+ha b+han+da b+han+da hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+ha b+hin+da b+hin+da phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+ha hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM gu h+ya kro d+hi hAM/ oM dz+nyA na kro d+hi hUM/ oM rA ga kro d+hi hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi hUM/ oM
215a4(1): ya ma kro d+hi hUM/ A~M na ga kro d+hi hUM/ oM yag mo kro d+hi hUM/ oM tsit+ta kro d+hI hUM/ dregs pa can gyi tshogs zil gyis gnon pa'o// khro bo dbyung ba'i ting 'dzin ni// nga ni dbang chen rdo rje ste// phrin las rnam bzhi bsgrub pa'i
215a5(1): phyir// sprul pa pho nya las la khrid// tshad med sgo bzhir gdab par bya// dzaHhUM baM hoH// khro mo mdog dkar lcags kyu 'dzin// ser mo zhags pa 'dzin ma dang // dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom byed ma// ljang mo dril
215a6(1): bu 'dzin ma ste// phrin las bzhi mdzad pho nya ma// rim par phyogs kyi sgo la dbab// oM badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ IM badz+ra g+haN+De hoH// pho nya 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin no// dbang chen
215b1(1): 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa nye ba'i lha rnams nges par dbyung ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// // gzhan yang nga yis bshad kyis nyon// bdag gi dam tshig brtan gyur nas// gsal
215b2(1): zhing mi g.yo tshad ldan na// gnyis med ye shes gzhug par bya// bsam gyis mi khyab nam mkha'i dbyings// bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin// longs sku rdzogs sku kun gyi mchog/ thams cad nga yi tshogs kyis
215b3(1): gang // dag pa'i mkha' la skar tshogs bzhin// dam tshig pa la rab tu dbab// dbye ba med pa'i chos nyid kyis// chu la chu bzhag bzhin du blta// de la 'dud cing mos pa dang // stob cing mnyes pa ma lus
215b4(1): pa// chos nyid sgra las byung ba yi// rang las sprul pa'i lha rnams kyis// ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'grub// de nas khyad par bya ba'i las// gnyis med lus kyi srog gi dbus// chu skyes phyogs bzhi rab ldan
215b5(1): pa'i// thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi dbus// nga yi sems kyi ngo bo nyid// tshon gang dmar po zhi zhing khro// rang gi sku dang mtshungs gyur pa// nyin mtshan gsal nus 'od ldan pa// sran tsa na yi phyed cha'i
215b6(1): steng // kun gyi gsung ste khyad par thugs// srog yig le brgan til 'bru'i tshad// gsal zhing 'od dang ldan pa la// yi ge phreng ba'i gzugs kyis 'dud// de ni tshogs pa'i tshad dang mnyam// rang gi lus dang
216a1(1): tshul gcig pa// kun nas re rer bzhugs par bya// rang gi ming gi sgra brjod pas// nam mkha'i khams kun gsal bar 'phro// dus gsum gyi ni 'phags pa mnyes// kun tu sbyor ba gsum rnams
216a2(1): kyis// srid pa'i zhags pa ma lus gcad// thams cad kyang ni rang gi tshul// nyid las gzhan pa yod ma yin// de nyid brtan pa'i tshad kyis bltas// gal te lhag par bsgrub 'dod na// ji ltar 'dod pa'i
216a3(1): gzugs rnams kyis// brten pa'i gnas gsum pho brang du// gcod byed 'dam skyes rdo rje la// rgyu gsum rtsa ba rnam dag med// shel mdog bye ru bai DUr+ya// yan lag bzhi dang ldan pa yis// dngos po ming
216a4(1): dang rtogs pa yid// ma lus nga yi ngang du sbyangs// khyad par du ni dbang gi rgyal// nga yi sngon gyi dam tshig ste// lus kyi steng phyogs mthar thug pa'i// rigs kyi bdag pos lus kun gnas// rta gdong zhal gyi
216a5(1): dkyil 'khor bcas// rlung gis bskyod cing spros pa yis// gser gyi ba thags gzings pa dang // mgal me'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang // me dpal tsha ba 'phro lta bus// rang dang pha rol phyi dang nang // kun tu spro
216a6(1): ba'i las rnams kyis// sbyangs shing bsdu dang bsgral dang gso// mchod bstod par dang bcol zhing bskul// gang dang gang la bsngags pa des// 'bad pa'i stobs kyis dmigs par bya// slar 'dus rang gi
216b1(1): gzhi nyid la// thim pa'i tshul gyis byin brlabs nas// gnas pa'i ngo bo de nyid du// rdzogs dang rab tu rdzogs pa yis// don de nyid la bsam zhing blta// nga dang gnyis su med par 'gyur// dpal dbang chen
216b2(1): 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ nye bar byed pa'i las rdzogs par sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po des yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
216b3(1): kyis gsung 'grol bar byed pa'i tshig ma lus pa yang dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas nyid kyi ming gi 'khor lo sgra tshig rab tu g.yo bar byed pa/ gsung gi ngo bo 'ub cing
216b4(1): chub pa rang gi ngo bo las mi gzhan pa// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad nye bar sdud cing sbyong ba/ las thams cad thog pa med par bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// oM ni ye shes lnga
216b5(1): nyid rtogs pa'o// pad+ma dngos po kun la ma chags pa'o// ta kr-ita khro bo'i gar dgu rdzogs pa'o// ha ya g+hI ba ni khams gsum dbang sdud rta mgrin no// ma hA kro ta che btsan 'dul ba'i khro bo chen po// e ka dza
216b6(1): ti ra la gcig ma dang gnyis su med cing dges pa'i nyams dang ldan pa'o// sa ma ya dam tshig la dgongs pa'o// ru lu ru lu khro bo khro mo'i tshogs kun dang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs rnams dbang du sdud pa'o// hUM
217a1(1): dregs pa'i tshogs rnams bod pa'o// b+h+yo de dag las la rbad pa'o// hUM dngos grub nye bar bsdu ba'o// A ra li dza thams cad mnyes par bsgrub pa'o// drag sngags gsang ba 'di nyid la// bsnyen
217a2(1): pa'i lung bzhin 'bad par bya// hrIHthams cad nga yi ngang du bsam// pad+man+ta kr-ita pad+ma rigs kyi khro chen tshogs// di ma dA ri thams cad 'dus pa'i gsungs yin no// ha ya g+ni ba ma lus dbang gi rgyal po'o// e
217a3(1): ka dza tI sbas pa'i yum dang sbyor ba'o// ru lu rigs kyi sras dang bcas pa'o// ru lu sprul pa'i zil gnon yab yum mo// hrIHdza dza ni dbang gi pho nya sgo ma'o// e ka dza b+h+yo lha rnams 'gugs shing rbad pa'o// dam
217a4(1): tshig tshogs kyi bsgrub pas na// rbad pa'i lung bzhin brtson par bya// pa hrIHdregs pa'i tshogs bcas dbang du sdud// di ma dA ri kun la go bar byed pa'o// ha yag+ni ba rta mgrin dbang gi lhar gsal ba'o// e ka
217a5(1): dza Ti chags rab don gyis bskyod pa'o// hu lu hu lu khro tshogs sprul pa 'gyed pa'o// hrIHdza dza pho nya las la rbad pa'o/ a/ ti lang pri sarba b+h+yo bzlog/ pha rol nus pa bzlog pa'o// pu dza nA ga rbad// klu gdug pa can
217a6(1): rnams 'dul ba'o// pha rol nus pa 'joms byed pa// bzlog pa'i dus su mngag par bya// dbang chen gsang ba lta rgyud kyi// srog snying thugs rgyud bskul ba ni// 'bar zhing gsal ba grangs las
217b1(1): 'das// bsrungs shing bzlog dang gsad dang 'dul// gang la dmigs pa myur du 'grub// oM ka ya tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ bAk+ka tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ tsit+ta tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ gu Na tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ karma tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ sarba tsit+ta ma b+h+yo/ kham rgya ma
217b2(1): drug gi drag sngags so// oM shwa ri khA hi shwa ri khA hi hUM// rgyab sbrel rnams kyi drag sngags so// oM tip+ta tsakra shra na mu khA kha long kha hUM phaT/ oM ku ku rA dza rak+ta rak+ta tsa mun ti kha lang ka hUM phaT/ pho nya khyi spyang drag sngags
217b3(1): so// hUM hUM phaT/ hrIHhUM phaT/ trAM hUM phaT/ hUM hUM phaT/ mche gshog bzhi yi drag sngags so// oM dza na lang te tse te/ yak+Sha ku ru b+hany+dza hUM phaT// 'brug mo bzhi yi drag sngags so// oM badz+ra sha ra sing ha hUM// rat+na sha ra sing
217b4(1): ha hUM/ pad+ma sha ra sing ha hUM/ karma sha ra sing ha hUM/ rtsal chen rnams kyi'o// nyon cig dbang gi 'khor tshogs rnams// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ yon tan dang ni phrin las dang // ma lus bsgrub par 'dod
217b5(1): pa yis// shes par bya ba 'di dag yin// lus kyi mdun rgyab yab dang yum// g.yas dang g.yon ni dbang gi sras// snod dang don snying bcas pa ni// dbang chen rigs bzhi yab yum mo// yan lag nyid
217b6(1): lag thams cad kun// khro brgyad yum dang bcas pa ste// mthil bzhi sgo srung bzhi ru bsam// spu dang ba spu bka' nyan tshogs// bya ba'i chos dang byed pa'i yid// phyi dang nang gi shes pa yis// gzung ba'i yul
218a1(1): dang 'dzin pa'i sems// yul lnga nyon mongs rtogs pa dang // rnam shes brgyad dang de yi yul// dag pa'i 'byung ba bzhi nyid kyang // rim gyis shes par bya ba yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan
218a2(1): 'das// dge dang mi dge'i rnam rtog ni// dbang chen nga la yod ma myong // snang ba snang min sku yi tshogs// grags dang grags min gsung gi bdag/ stong dang stong min thugs kyi ngang // yod dang yod min yon
218a3(1): tan te// bsgrub dang bsgrub min phrin las so// 'di la the tshom byar mi rung // zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku gsung thugs kyi phrin las gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid kyi
218a4(1): le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kyi bdag nyid can du gyur te// chos thams cad kyi dbyings ma lus pa la rab tu gzigs
218a5(1): pa'i lta stangs chen po mdzad nas// 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor// nga ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// dbang mdzad dbang gi lha yin no// nga yi dbang du gyur pa las// sangs rgyas
218a6(1): nyid du ma lus mthong // 'di la blta bar bya ba med// ma bltas pa nyid blta ba yin// de bzhin mthong dang dran pa dang // blo dang rig pa yod min yang // kun rdzob tsam du rig par snang // phyi rol dngos po
218b1(1): snang ba'i yul// ma 'gags dpyad cing btags yod tsam// 'di ni phyi yi dbang chen no// nang du 'dzin byed sems kyi dngos// ma skyes rang gi ngang gis stong // nang gi dbang chen yin zhes bshad// gnyis
218b2(1): 'dzin rtog dpyod rlung lta bu// dri ma med cing 'od gsal ba// sbas pa yin te kun la snang // 'di la dbang thob gyur pa na// dbang gi rgyal po mngon du gyur// nga ni ma yengs mi rtog pas// gang yang bsgom par
218b3(1): bya ba med// ma nor ma bcos kho na nyid// dmigs med tsam du snying rje'i ngang // rang la gnas pa bltar ma nus// 'khrul pa'i gzugs la blta ba yang // kun rdzob tsam du bsgom zhes bya// phung po nga rgyal brtan
218b4(1): gyi bar// 'byung bzhi mthun pa'i phyogs tsam spyod// bla med gnas su ma stobs par// dus bzhi mnyam par lus kyi lam// bar chad gdug pa gdul gyi bar// ma rig mun pa thibs po 'joms// ngan song
218b5(1): gnas rnams stongs par byed// khams gsum srid gsum dbang du sdud// dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// bla med byang chub gnas su 'god// dug lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// tshogs drug mngon par shes par
218b6(1): drug/ yul brgyad yid chos 'byung ba bzhi// stobs dang mi 'jigs rig pa'o// khams dang skye mched bco brgyad po// ma 'dres bla med rdzogs pa'i chos// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// so sor rtogs pa/

219a2(1): cher skye ba de// bdag po rgyu dmigs de ma thag pa'i rkyen// 'brel pa bzhi ni thams cad// sems kyi chos nyid bdag nyid cig chos nyid shes rab shes bya byed// slob bu gdam ngag snod dang bcud// slob
219a3(1): dpon slob bu thugs rje las// sems kyi skye tshul rnam pa dgu// che chung blo yi rims gcig 'char// zhen dag ma dag zag bcas 'char// rims spangs ma spangs thod rgal tshogs// sems gsal mi gsal
