219a6(1): pas/ bka' stsal pa/ rnam grangs mang yang mdor bsdus dgu// sgrib med rang gsal rnam dag sems// rang gi rang gsal rang rig sems// ma bcos rnal ma chos nyid sems// ma btsal kun rdzogs lhun
219b1(1): grub sems// blang dor med pas mnyam nyid sems// dngas snyigs dgag bsgrub med pa'i sems// zla med nyag gcig gnyis med sems// gdangs khyab bde chen rtog med sems// mtha' med yang dag bla
219b2(1): med sems// mtshan med mi mthun don khyad med// ces bka' stsal pa/ yang gsol pa/ gtan tshigs gtan la dbab pa zhes// gsungs pa gang lags bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka' stsal pa//
219b3(1): gtan tshigs gtan la dbab lugs gsum// lung dang man ngag rigs pa'o// lung gsum snyan brgyud mngon du phyung // kun la dbab dang gsum du bshad// snyan khung brgyud la rnam pa gnyis// bde gshegs
219b4(1): brgyad dang gang zag brgyud// snyan rgud byin rlabs ngo bo dang // sdigs sdebs sbyor legs gsum du bshad// mngon byung lung la dran don nges// lam bstan lung bstan sar 'dren gsum// mthong lam 'bras bu
219b5(1): drang don nges// nges lung dpe don rtags gsum ste// nam mkha' chos nyid sems nyid do// gtan la dbab pa'i lung la gnyis// sems can nyon mongs blo tshad la// brgyad khri bzhi stong theg pa bshad// nges
219b6(1): par gtan la chos rnams 'bebs// snying po byang chub sems nyid do/ zhes gsungs pas/ yang gsol pa/ rig pa gtan la dbab ces pa// gang lags rgyas par bshad du gsol// ces gsol pas/ bka'
220a1(1): mdzad de// hUM hrIHdbang chen rdo rje thog dang ser chen 'bebs// hrIHdang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ hUM mdzad hUM gi byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho
220a2(1): skem// mtshon chen gnam lcags 'bar ba'i mthu rtsal gyis// gsang sngags log par lta ba'i dregs pa 'joms// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol gnyis ka ru// gdug pa 'dul zhing dug gsum rtsad nas
220a3(1): gcod// srid gsum 'dul ba'i bdag tu dbang bskur ro// oM ha ya g+hi ba sarba bi nA ya ka a d+hiSh+ThA na a b+hi Shiny+tsa a A/ zhes dregs pa'i tshogs ma lus pa 'dul zhing tshar gcod par dbang bskur ro// 'jig rten
220a4(1): las 'das pa dang 'jig rten pa rnams kyi dbang gi rgyal por bzhag go/ de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi bdag po rnams kyis// dbang gi rgyal po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams la
220a5(1): rang gi snying po 'di phral lo// oM bud+d+ha be ro tsa na oM// hUM badz+ra satwa hAM/ sA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ hrI pad+ma a mi de ba thI/ hA karma prany+dza d+h+wi ka/ de nas 'jig rten gyi bdag po lnga'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po yab yum 'khor dang
220a6(1): bcas pa rnams kyis rang gi srog gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM ma hA de ba u ma de ba lang phra ma ni rak+ta kaM ka pa ya hUM d+he ba ra tsa g+ha na hUM dza/ de nas gshin rje'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM
220b1(1): ya ma me da k+She rA dza sa do ru Na yo ni ra yats+tsha ni hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA nan/ ya ma snying la khrag baM ri la rbad/ de nas klu'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// au nag po ti ba tsa ya nA ga rA dza he phul la phe sha
220b2(1): phos phos shig shig chum chum tu ya tir ya dza dza/ de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// A~M yak+ka a ba ma ra b+ha ru da ri ma g+ha la b+ha ga sha ru tra ma ru tra hUM dza/ de nas bdud kyi tshogs
220b3(1): rnams kyis rang gi srog gi snying po 'di phul lo// bdud tri ru tra tsa pa snying khrag tir rbad dug mug hri ti ra to rbad/ de nas srin po'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi srog gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM rag sha mu la sa mun
220b4(1): dza ru tra hur b+h+yo rak+Sha mu lo shig tri ta hu ra dza/ de nas 'jig rten gyi ma mo'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// au trag rak+Sha snying kha rag ma tsit+ta ma srog tsa khrag la breng breng / kha la dun ting mu la sod/
220b5(1): de nas gza'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// oM pa sha me ki ru ru ma ti dza la ti a tra biSh+Ti sa tra rA hu hri ni dza/ de nas mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnams kyis rang gi snying po 'di phul lo// ma ma trag
220b6(1): sha snying khrag la hubs badz+ra ma ni snying la thun rag mo myog rbad dza/ gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can ji snyed pa thams cad kyis kyang rang gi ming dang snying po phul te// thams cad kyis dbang gi
221a1(1): rgyal po nyid kyis bka' ji ltar stsal pa bzhin las sna tshogs bsgrub cing bsgo ba mtha' dag nyan par khas blangs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ ji ltar bsgrub pa phrin las kyi
221a2(1): khyad par gyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang dbang gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i bdag nyid can du bzhugs te/ stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams longs spyod rdzogs pa'i
221a3(1): sku'i ngo bor snang bar mdzad nas/ 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma 'dus pa'i 'khor rnams nyon// nga yi sku yi ngo bo ni// rang rig byang chub sems las snang // rta mgos skad gsangs mthon po yis// bde
221a4(1): gshegs gsung gi dngos grub sdud// yang dag don nges chos kyi sku// gzugs su snang ba mtshon pa'i rtags// dper na rta yi 'gros dgu yis// ji ltar smon pa'i sar 'gro bzhin// theg pa'i rim pa ngang gis
221a5(1): grod// rtsol med rab tu rdzogs par snang // rta skad yon tan mang ba ltar// lam lnga dang ni sa bcu dag/ yongs rdzogs de nyid ngang las mnga'// dpe dang don gyi rtags rnams kyis// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid
221a6(1): kyi// gsang sngags lam gyi bye brag shes// gdul bya'i thabs su snang ba yang // chos rnams dkyil 'khor lhun grub cing // snang srid ma lus bsgral ba'i rgyu// bka' sdod phrin las rdzogs par mdzad// sngon
221b1(1): gyi tha tshig dbyings nas bskul// brda' sprad klong rdol dbang bsgyur te// ma lus 'dul ba nga yi thabs// ye nas ma bcos nga yi sku// thabs dang shes rab dbyings ye shes// don dam kun rdzob snang dang
221b2(1): stong // gnyis med ngo bo'i don yin no// dbang gi rgyal por bsam sbyor bas// khros pa'i phyag rgya gsung gi sgra// 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs chen kun// dbang med skrag pa'i tshul bzung zhing // myur du phrin
221b3(1): las gnas bzhin byed// dbyings nas gzugs snang thams cad kun// dbang bskur snang ba mnyes mdzad de// 'gal ba de nyid ngang du sbyangs// bsrung dang bzlog dang tshar gcad pa'i// rig pa'i rgyal po spu
221b4(1): gri'o// oM thub thub myag myag mug mug/ shar shar da ha klag klag du haM du haM// rbad rbad dza dza hUM hUM// zhes gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las kyi le'u
221b5(1): ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal po yis// rab tu bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// nub tu phyogs pa dbang gi gnas// shis pa'i rdzas dang ldan pa'i drung // chags ldan rigs kyi khyad par
221b6(1): gyis// yid dang mthun pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsigs// sku gsung thugs kyi gnas byin brlab// phyi nang gsang ba mnyes pa'i rdzas// ci 'byor pa yis rgyas par dbul// sngags tshig bstod pas nye gyur
222a1(1): nas// dmigs pa'i ched dang sbyar ba ni// sgrub pa po nyid bsrung ba dang // pha rol gzhan gyi nus pa rnams// bzlog cing gzhig dang gtor ba dang // bsreg cing gnan dang 'phar ba dang // bskrad
222a2(1): dang bcing dang dbab pa dang // gug cing mngag dang dbang du bya// IM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha ha ya g+h+ri ba hu lu hu lu ma hA ka s+ya rak+Sha rak+Sha swA hA/ A pris sarba ma ma ra tsa thun b+h+yo bzlog/ tro ma ri sha sha thun b+h+yo
222a3(1): bzlog/ he ka sa ra ke dum phra ma ya thun b+h+yo bzlog/ rU tra srog ti rbad thum thum// tsa pa sha ling sa ma ya shig shig/ ma ma e ka dza ti phyung yaM rbad// ro du ro du rag mo tsit+ta la rbad rbad// nA ga hu ya nag po ti pa tsa
222a4(1): ya// tsa re tsa dus du shag yaM/ nA ga rA dza sod sod/ byangs byings rmugs rmugs ha la hal dun dun/ myos myos bying bying rbad rbad/ thum ril ri la dza/ snying rbad ya khrag ro ma ro brag sha ya/ g+ho khrag dza tri chod sa la
222a5(1): sod mu la sod a mu ka mA ra ya phaT/ hu lu hu lu dza dza nA ga badz+ra yag+ma kI li ki li ya mA ra ya phaT// a mu ka sarba sha truM mA ra ya rbad nr-i hur thum dza/ ma hA pa sha ha ki dza la dza la ram ram/ b+hi sha tsakra ha la ha la staM
222a6(1): b+ha ya nan nan// d+ha ru nan d+ha ru nan// a mu ka ha li hi mu hod sod// tri pra ta mA ra ya sod/ nr-i yag+ga rak+ta ka li ra tsa nA ga tri du mA ra ya sod// a ni lu pri du tri/ krang ka ri krang ka ri/ mi tsi mi tsi ra ra/ tr-i hr-itr-i
222b1(1): traitre gam gam gum gum u pa ra tsa yaM d+ha she baM he/ nA ga rA tsa sru sru trai ri trai ri pra pri lam lam/ sarba a pa sma ra b+hin+da b+hin+na b+han+na b+han+na/ ti li ti li/ ma ta ma ta/ pra b+ha na pra b+ha na/ pa tsa pa tsa/ da ra da ra/ tshin+da tshin+da/ !
222b2(1): na ha na/ hu lu hu lu/ ku ta ku ta/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tri ta tri ta ma ra ma ra/ mA ra ya mA ra ya rbad thun rbad thun/ kI li ki la ya thun rbad/ hu lu hu lu ka ma ha la myos myos thun rbad/ tik+Sha tik+Sha shag ti shag ti tshal
222b3(1): tshal thun rbad rbad/ a mu ka ka ta ka ta thun rbad/ ma ra ma ra thun rbad/ ta ra ta ra thun rbad/ mo ta ma ta thun rbad/ phra mo ta phra mo ta thun rbad/ sarba pu ta ma ra ma ra thun rbad/ ya ra ya ra thun rbad/ ma ra tri sod
222b4(1): sod/ rig pa'i rgyal po gsang ba'i sngags// ji ltar bsngags pa'i rdzas dang bcas// zla gcig drug gi sbyor ba yis// gang la dmigs pa myur du 'grub// ces gsungs so// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i
222b5(1): rgyud las/ yi ge'i phreng ba drag po'i snying po rnams brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas dbang gi rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi bdag nyid chen po des/ nyid kyi
222b6(1): dkyil 'khor rnams la gsung gi sgra chen pos rab tu go bar mdzad de/ bka' stsal pa/ kye ma 'ongs pa'i dus phyi ma// snyigs ma'i dus rab tu snyigs mar gyur pa na/ rigs kyi bu gang dag nga dang nga'i bdag po
223a1(1): snang ba mtha' yas dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa/ pad+ma'i rigs 'chang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la dad pa dang 'dun
223a2(1): pa dang mos pa dang gsol bar byed pa de dag la ni/ bdag cag rnams kyi tshe dang stobs dang dbang phyug dang / grags pa dang longs spyod dang / yon tan gyi tshogs dag myur du stsol bar byed do// gzhan yang nga'i
223a3(1): sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi de kho na nyid yang dag par yongs su shes par 'dod pa'i yon tan dag la/ bde ba dang dga' ba dang spro bar longs spyod par nus pa dag gis ni/ nga dang dus gsum du phyogs
223a4(1): bcu dag na 'tsho zhing zhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs mnyes par byas shing gnyis su med par bsgrub pa yin te/ nga'i tshul 'di lta bu 'di la ni/ gang zag dbang po dman pa dang / blo chung
223a5(1): ba dang / shes rab rtul ba dang / yid mi gzhung ba dang / blang ba dang dor bar spyod pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / log par blta ba can dang / skal pa chung zhing myos pa
223a6(1): rnams kyis gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / blta ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / bstan pa dang / bshad pa dang / mnyan pa la sogs pa'i rdo mi thogs shing dbang du mi 'gyur te/ rna lam du
223b1(1): yang grags par mi 'gyur ro// de bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rig pa 'dzin pa rang bzhin grub pa dang / sa la spyod pa dang / tshe ring bar dbang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag
223b2(1): gi thugs nye ba'i sras su gyur pa/ khyed rnams kyis yang dag par zung zhig longs shig chongs shig/ klog cig/ sgrubs shig gzhan dag la yang rgya cher rab tu ston cig/ 'di ni nga'i bstan pa bla na med pa/ gong
223b3(1): na med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpe med pa/ zla med pa/ mchog tu gyur pa/ rab dang gtso bo dang / phul dang dam par gyur pa ste/ rnyed par dka' zhing ngo mtshar ba 'di/ khyed rnams la rjes su
223b4(1): gtad kyis/ nga'i bstan pa 'di yal bar ma dor cig 'di nyams par 'gyur ta re/ zhes gsungs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa rgya chen po de dag 'od zer gyi tshul du
223b5(1): spro ba mdzad de/ yang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba'i klong du rab tu bsdus nas/ rol pa chen po'i 'od zer gyis khyab par mdzad de/ thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings
223b6(1): dmigs su med pa mnyam pa nyid g.yo ba med pa la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// dpal dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ yongs su bstan pa'i nye bar gtad pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum
224a1(1): pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das dbang chen 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgud rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan za slob dpon chan pa pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / zad kyi mo sta dra zar can bdag gis
224a2(1): bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ rgya rgya rgya// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta sarba karma sa mA dza kI la ya mA la tan+tan+t+ra nA ma/
224a3(1): bod skad du/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las 'dus pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phrin las thams cad gdon mi za bar yang dag par grub pa
224a4(1): popo thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis zos pa'i dus gcig na/ 'og min gyi gnas gsang ba mchog gi dbyings/ phrin las rgya chen po rnam par rol par mdzad pa'i dur khrod
224a5(1): chen po rab tu bskyod cing 'khrugs par byed pa'i rlung ldang nag 'bar ba/ phrag dog gi ye shes las grub par byed pa'i pho brang chen po na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las rdo rje
224a6(1): sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ 'jig rten gsum rab tu sgrol bar mdzad pa de/ dbyings kyi yum chen mo 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma dang gnyis su med pa'i rol pa chen pos mnyam zhing dges
224b1(1): par bzhugs pa la// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i drag po'i phrin las yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa'i 'khor 'di lta ste/ bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sras kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ bud+d+ha kI la ya dang / rat+na kI la ya
224b2(1): dang / pad+ma ki la ya dang / karma kI la ya dang / bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi rgyal po hUM ka ra dang / rnam par rgyal ba dang / dbyug pa sngon po dang / gshin rje gshed po dang / g.yo ba med po dang /
224b3(1): rta mgrin can dang / gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / stobs chen por gyur pa dang / gzhan yang rol pa'i yum chen mo sgra 'byin ma dang / snyems
224b4(1): ma dang / sder mo dang / dur khrod kyi bdag mo dang / gtun khung ma dang / gtum mo chen mo dang / mda' snyems ma dang / rlung 'byin ma dang / gsod byed ma dang / spyod par byed ma dang / de dag thams cad kyang
224b5(1): sprul pa dang / sprul pa'i yang sprul pa dang / sprul pa'i pho nya dang / pho nya'i pho nya dag dang bcas pa rnams kyis mdun du bdar cing bskor te/ gzhan yang byis pa so so skye bo dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas
224b6(1): kyi skyes bu dang / bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i bar du bgrod cing sbyangs pa la smon pas dka' ba spyod par brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis nye ba'i thugs mi thub cing 'dul ba'i skal ba dang mi ldan
225a1(1): zhing / longs spyod thams cad rab tu rdzogs pa'i sku khro ba dang / rab tu khro ba dang / 'jigs pa dang rab tu 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi
225a2(1): sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa khro bo chen po drag shul can du snang bar mdzad kyang / thugs rab tu zhi ba thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i thugs gsang ba chen po las byung ba'i khro bo'i tshogs chen po rnams kyis nyid kyi
225a3(1): sku'i yon tan dkyil 'khor chen po rnam par dag pa'i gzhal med khang chen po dang bcas pa la rab tu spro zhing ngo mtshar ba'i sgo nas/ dga' ba chen po yang dag par 'khor rnams kyis mgrin gcig gis mngon
225a4(1): par bstod pa/ e ma ho// mtha' dang dbus med nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// rlung nag rdo rje rgya gram gtams pa'i steng / khrag gi rgya mtsho rba klong 'khrugs pa'i dkyil// keng rus chen po brtsegs pa'i ri rab
225a5(1): steng // gser gyi sa gzhi zhing chen ti ras gtams// me ri smug nag gru gsum 'bar ba'i klong // nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam rdzogs gzhal yas khang // rin chen 'bar ba thod pa gsum gyis brtsigs// lha
225a6(1): klu nyi zla gza' skar sbrul gyis brgyan// ye shes tshad med gru chad sgo bzhi rdzogs// phyi nang me dpung rin chen 'od dang ldan// dregs pa'i bdag dang nyi zla pad+ma'i dbus/ med pa'i rgyu las yod par mngon byung
225b1(1): ba// bde gshegs dpal chen phrin las rdzogs pa'i sku/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum stabs// g.yas kyi zhal gdong dkar bar bstan pa ni// bde chen longs spyod rdzogs sku mthar phyin
225b2(1): cing // g.yon zhal dmar nag sbrul sku'i 'gro don mdzad// yongs rdzogs sku dang dbus zhal mthing nag ni// skye med chos kyi sku la 'gyur ba med// ral pa gyen brdzes dbang drag dus gcig rdzogs// ye shes
225b3(1): lnga bdag rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// spyan dgus sa dgu mi dmigs dbyings la gzigs// snyan drug rgyud drug nyon mongs 'khor bar 'dren// shangs nas stong gsum sgrol ba'i rlung nag 'byin// zhal
225b4(1): gsum nyon mongs dug gsum dbyings su sgrol// rdo rje'i mche bas bdud bzhi rtsad nas gcod// le brgan ljags 'dril shes rab mthar phyin gsal// gsung gi nga ros 'jig rten mthu chen dang // phyag drug
225b5(1): phyag mtshan rang rtags yon tan ni// rdo rje rtse dgus sa dgu'i yon tan rdzogs// rtse lngas rgyud lnga rtsad bcad rigs lngar sbyor// me dpung 'bar bas nyon mongs dug lnga bsreg/ kha T+wAM rtse gsum dug gsum rtsad
225b6(1): nas gcod// rdo rje'i phur pa srid gsum dbyings su 'debs// zhabs bzhi tshad med rnam bzhi'i phrin las mdzad/ dpa' bo'i na bza' rgyan gyi che ba ni// glang chen ko rlon theg mchog stobs bcus bgrod// stag
226a1(1): gi sham thabs phrin las sna tshogs mdzad// zhing chen g.yang gzhis thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul/ sbrul gyi chun pos dpa' chen gdug pa 'dul// thod pa'i phreng ba sku gsum ngang la gnas// don dam
226a2(1): bcud ldan gzi brjid sa la dgod// rak+ta'i thig le chags med pad+ma'i spyan// thal chen mtshan mas sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs// rdo rje'i gshog pas ma lus zil gyis gnon// rin chen gshog pas dgos
226a3(1): 'dod re ba bskang // ye shes me dpung rnam rtog bag chags bsreg/ gnyis med yum chen don dam dbyings su sbyor// yon tan mtha' yas kun gyis rab brgyan pa'i// phrin las rgyal po khyod la phyag 'tshal
226a4(1): bstod// chos dbyings skye med ngang las ma g.yos kyang // sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul cir yang ston mdzad pa// thugs rje'i thabs kyis gdug pa 'dul slad du// drag shul spyod pa'i phrin las kun gyi bdag/ don dam byang
226a5(1): chub sems las 'gyur med kyang // ting 'dzin longs spyod thabs kyis 'gro don mdzad// byin rlabs phyag rgya'i 'od zer 'phro 'du'i klong // rang bzhin spros bral nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bstod pas
226a6(1): slar yang rol pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs shing snang bar gyur to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ gling gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas yang 'khor chen
226b1(1): po de rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan 'das/ 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar gyi// 'dus pa'i sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i// phrin las khyod mdzad ci yi phyir// rdo rje
226b2(1): zhes ni ci phyir brjod// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// gzhon nur grags pa ci zhig lags// dngos por snang ba'i chos nyid la// khyad par phur pa ci'i phyir 'dzin// thugs rje zhi ba'i ngang nyid las// khro zhing
226b3(1): 'jigs par ston mdzad cing // drag po'i rgyan bcas mdzad pa gang // gzhan yang khyod kyi sku gsung thugs// gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba// rmad du byung ba'i cho 'phrul la// bdag cag the tshom skyes gyur
226b4(1): te/ ji ltar ji ltar mdzad pa yi// don de bdag la nges ston cig/ ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las mdzad par bya ba'i phyir// de bzhin
226b5(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi ngo bor bzhengs te/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad sngon du 'gro bar mdzad nas// nyid kyi gsung gi gsang ba chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
226b6(1): las bsgrub par nus pa'i yang dag pa'i snying po 'di sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje gsang ba pa las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra ki li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// 'di phyung ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad
227a1(1): g.yo bar gyur te// gang dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs rje zhi ba chen pos 'dul bar mi 'gyur ba'i dbang phyug la sogs pa'i dregs pa can rnams kyang rab tu 'bar zhing sngangs skrag ste brgya la
227a2(1): zhing sa la lhung nas shi ba'i dus la ma bab tsam du gyur pa la/ yang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi thugs rje chen po'i 'od zer gyis de dag gi lus khyab par bkye nas/ thams cad kyang lus dang ngag dang yid bde ba
227a3(1): dpag tu med pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / dpung gi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams zhi ba dang dul ba'i sems kyis gnas nas gsung rjes su bsgrub pa'i bran bzhin las
227a4(1): byed par khas blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor chen po 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thabs kyi spyod pas
227a5(1): 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba'i// sangs rgyas phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin rlabs 'dir gsal bas// mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje yis// 'dus byas rdzas las ma byung
227a6(1): zhing // dus gsum kun tu 'dus ma byas// spros pa'i mtshan ma kun dang bral// gdod nas ma byung skye ba med// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i ngang // de ni sra mkhregs rtsal shugs ldan// cis kyang mi shigs rdo/
227b1(1): rje'o// dper na pha lam rnon po bzhin// sus kyang gzhom par mi nus shing // stong nyid snying por ldan pa yis// go cha mchog gi rdo rje'o// dus gsum bzhugs pa ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes
227b2(1): sku// nga nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag skyed cig/ myur du sprul pas gzhon nu ste// nga la bgres rgud yongs mi mnga'// skad cig nyid las byung ba'o// oM shrI
227b3(1): badz+ra ku mA ra ki li ki la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// thabs kyi shes rab yum dang sbyor// byang chub sems rgyun ye shes che// oM tIp+ta tsakra ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// gnyis med ye shes 'od zer gyi// 'phro 'du gsal ba'i byin
227b4(1): rlabs las// rdo rje gzhon nu'i rigs 'dzin rnams// srid pa rdo rje 'grub par mdzod// srid pa rdo rje phur pa'i lha// ye shes khro bo 'grub par mdzod// oM bud+d+ha kI la ya hUM phaT// oM rat+na kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma
227b5(1): kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM karma ki la ya huM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hAM ka ra hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hI dI pa ya ti hUM/ oM badz+ra sA ka ra mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra i khu ba mu khI hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta bi dza ya hAM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi lA se
227b6(1): ki hUM/ oM badz+ra byA g+ha mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra gr-id+d+ha mu khI hUM/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i ta nI la daN+Da hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi ta na pa ti hUM/ oM badz+ra tsa ma ra mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra dro Na mu khI hUM/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM kro ta ya mAn+ta ka/
228a1(1): nA/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi thA sha na par+N+Na hA/ oM badz+ra ha ri Na mu kha rbA/ oM badz+ra ul+yA ka mu khI hA/ pa tsa pa tsa hU phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ar+ya a tsa la hA/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi mu sa la hA/ oM badz+ra brAg+h+nAM mu kha T+Ta/ oM badz+ra ba pa
228a2(1): sa mu khI hUM/ b+han+da b+han+da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi tsaN+Da lI hUM/ oM badz+ra pi DA la mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra pak+Sha ti mu khI hUM/ oM badz+ra pa tsa la mu kha hUM/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta a pa ra dzi ta hUM/
228a3(1): oM badz+ra kro d+hi sa bya ti hUM/ oM badz+ra shwa na mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra pa tri mu khI hUM/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN+Da li hAM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi sa mi ra NA hAM/ oM badz+ra sid+d+ha mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra kro ti ti la mu khI hAM/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tsha
228a4(1): phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha tre lo kya bi dza ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi mA ra Na hUM/ oM badz+ra tak+Sh+Na mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra na ku la mu khI hUM/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA ba la hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hi tsun+da hUM/ oM badz+ra r-ik+Sha mu kha hUM/ oM badz+ra
228a5(1): mu Shi mu khI hUM/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra yak+Shi Ni hUM/ ang+ga sha dzaH/ oM badz+ra b+hai ra ba hUM/ pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra a mr-i ta hUM/ s+pho Ta baM/ oM badz+ra ma ra Na hUM/ g+haN+De hoH/ hri s+pha ra Na phaT/ saM ha ra Na hUM/ 'di ni srid pa'i tshul
228a6(1): du byung // yab yum byang chub sems las bskyed// yi ge 'phro 'du'i rkyen las gyur// rang las byung ste dbyings su 'debs// srid pa'i phur pa zhes su bshad// snang zhing gsal ba'i chos rnams kun// ma lus
228b1(1): 'di yis legs par btab// 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// 'ub chub 'dus pas phur pa ste// kun rdzob rtags su nga yis bzung // yon tan tshogs chen las byung zhing // ma lus phrin las rdzogs
228b2(1): mdzad phyir// phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas zhing // kun gyi mdzad pa rdzogs spyod cing // sems can khams kun yongs sgrol ba'i/ 'jigs byed khro bcu byung ba ni// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
228b3(1): bzhugs// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa gnon par mdzad// phyag drug dang po gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje dang ni thod khrag 'dzin// tha ma phur pa 'dril zhing sdom// hUM chen sngo skya mda' gzhu 'gengs// rnam rgyal 'khor lo tri
228b4(1): shul dkar/ dbyug sngon me dpal dbyug to 'phyar// gshin rje gshed ni mthing ga ste// thod dbyug dang ni dgra sta 'dzin// mi g.yo ljang sngon ral gri zhags// rta mgrin zhags pa spu gri dmar// 'dod rgyal dmar
228b5(1): skya b+han+d+ha ra yab// bdud rtsi ldang nag rgya gram dril// khams rgyal sbrul zhags rdo rje mthing // stobs chen dud kha zo ba zhags// yum rnams yab kyi mdog ldan zhing // sgra 'byin ma ni g.yas be con// snyems ma
228b6(1): ral gyi 'dzin par mdzad// rdo rje sder mo lcags kyu'o// dur khrod bdag mo thod dbyug 'dzin// gtun khung ma ni tho ba'o// rdo rje gtum mo spu gri 'dzin// rdo rje mda' snyems tho ba can// rlung 'byin ma ni dgra
229a1(1): sna'o// rdo rje gsod byed ma gri gug/ skul byed rdo rje rtse gsum 'dzin// phyag g.yon rnams ni zod khrag stob// yab yum 'di dag thams cad kyis// srid pa'i phur pa spros pa las// rang gi sku
229a2(1): mdog dang mthun pa'i// zhal gcig phyag gnyis lcam dral tshul// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs gnas shing // yab yum phyag mtshan so sor 'dzin// g.yon gyis mtshon byed phur pa 'dzin// sngon gyi 'dul gzhi
229a3(1): las byung ba'i// so so'i gdong gi khyad par ni// stag dang bya rgod bya rog g.yag/ sha ba 'ug pa gzig dang khwa// byi la pu shud spyang ki khra// seng ge pha wang sre mo dom// phag dang smig bu byi ba dred// rim bzhin du
229a4(1): ni rang gnas blta// phyogs bzhir pu shud skya ka dang / srin bya khra yi mgo can rnams// kha dog dkar ser dmar dang ldang // lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// rim bzhin g.yas bsnams g.yon phur
229a5(1): bu// nye ba'i sras mchog phur bu ni// bde gshegs rin chen pad+ma las// zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dkar ser dmar dang sngo ba'i zhal// khyad par bud+d+ha kI la ya// zhal gsum mthing dmar
229a6(1): dbus dkar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje rgyu zhags g.yas// g.yon na dgra sta ral gri'o// sras mchog rat+na kI la ya// zhal gsum dkar dmar dbus ser zhal// g.yas na beng dang ral gri'o// g.yon na dgra sta be
229b1(1): con 'dzin// dbang gi kI la ya zhes pa// zhal gsum dkar ser dbus dmar zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po ral gri mdung // bar pa gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs// phrin las mdzad pa'i sras mchog ni// zhal
229b2(1): gsum dkar dmar ljang gu ste// g.yas na mdung dang lcags kyu ste// g.yon gyi gri gug ral gri'o// tha ma'i phyag gnyis thams cad kyi// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po yi// ri rab phur pa rim bzhin 'dzin// 'di
229b3(1): dag ma lus thams cad kun// dpa' brjid dur khrod chas kyis brgyan// phyi rol dngos po'i chos rnams kun// gzugs su snang dang sgra ru grag/ dran dang bsam dang rtog dpyod tshogs// 'di dag rnams kyi sku
229b4(1): gsung thugs// 'di dag nyid kyang de dag ste// chos nyid khyab pa'i phur pa'o// de nyid thabs kyi shes 'gyur zhing // shes rab nyid kyang de yi thabs// don dam gnyis med phur pa ste// kun gyi dam pa 'di zung
229b5(1): zhig/ rtog pa'i 'ching bas 'ching byed cing // grol ba yang ni de nyid do// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang chen 'di// rtogs pa dang ni shes bya'i yul// khyod kyis the tshom ma bskyed cig/ ces gsungs so// phrin
229b6(1): las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sku yongs su rdzogs pa phrin las rtsa ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// dam pa'i dgongs pa 'di bshad do// ngo bo rig pa byang chub
230a1(1): sems// kun gyi sa la ma lus 'debs// chos nyid ye shes gnyis su med// chos can kun la gdab par bya// de nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// chos nyid mnyam pa nyid du'o// ma lus mkhyen pa de
230a2(1): yis ni// dngos po chos can de bzhin no// rnam rtog tshogs la chos skus gdab// yid kyi rnam shes ldan pa'i lha// kun rdzob snod bcud snang la gdab// thugs rje chen po thabs kyi mchog/ ma lus sems can
230a3(1): khams la'o// mtshon byed rdzas kyi gnod pa 'joms// ji snyed btags pa'i ming tsam mo// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med// spros med gsal la phyogs dang bral// chos dbyings rig pa'i ye shes te// skye
230a4(1): 'gag med pa'i klong du'o// snang zhing srid pa de yi yul// gnyis med sems su rtogs pa thabs// de las de nyid 'char zhing stong // mthong yod sems las ma 'das par// de nyid kyi ni yon tan yin// dkar
230a5(1): dmar snang ba byang chub sems// mnyam nyid yum gyi mkha' la btab// thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med// skye 'gro rigs kyi sras su grub// mngon gyur longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// 'gyur med gsal ba
230a6(1): 'bras bu yin// snying rjes sems can blos mi 'dor// ma dag sdug bsngal sbrang phyir gdab// rgyud drug yul te tshad med bzhi// dag pa'i go 'phang snang bar byed// 'khor ba'i gnas ngan sbar ba yin// de nyid
230b1(1): rtogs pa sprul pa'i sku// 'og min bde chen lhun grub gnas// rgyud dag chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa// de yi bdag po de 'dir gnas// bsgom bya rnam par rtog pa'i lha// snang zhing nges pa sprul pa'i tshogs// zhi
230b2(1): rgyas dbang drag bye brag gis// rang gi dmigs pa'i yul la'o// sngags rdzas ting 'dzin de yis grogs// yon tan rtags dang 'bras bur bcas// mthar phyin de yi byed pa'o// rigs bzhi sras kyi mchog gyur
230b3(1): pas// dmigs pa'i rA tra sems kyi rten// gnas gsum rtsol bas de bsgral tshugs// gang 'dod las la sbyar bar nus// byin gyis brlabs pa'i rtags 'byung nyid// phyogs dbus rigs lnga ye shes lnga// tshad
230b4(1): med bzhi dang rnam thar brgyad// rigs lnga stobs bcu mi 'jigs rig pa bzhi/ zhes pa'ang 'dug khro bcu sgo ba bzhi// thugs rje'i shugs kyis sku gsung thugs// sbrul par bcas te rdzogs pa'o// 'di nyid rten dang brten pa
230b5(1): dang // phyag mtshan po nyer shes par bya// shes rab blo che dbang po rno// 'dod chags lam nus brtson 'grus che// dad ldan snying rje gzhan don spro// blos bcas zhe gdug gnag par ldan// 'di dag don byed
230b6(1): nus pa'i rgyu// rdzas bzhi so so'i nus mthu bsgrub// chu shel bdud rtsi me long dang // nyung dkar dmigs pa'i rdzas yin te// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor thig le dang // ting nge 'dzin dang gzugs brnyan te// de
231a1(1): nyid dang bsnyen bsgrub gsang ba yis// lha dang sprul pa po dang mo// lha ni gcig lnga brgya rtsa brgyad// sprul pa phyi nang gsang ba yis// sku yi phyag rgya gsung yig 'bru// gru gsum rgya mdud e khram
231a2(1): bcas// 'chol dang 'dus dang bsad pa dang // bang rim gsum pas mtha' bsdus te// 'dus byas rdzas su snang ba yin// 'di dag nga yi tshul shes pas// ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang // ji ltar gnas pa'i
231a3(1): mthar zug don// de 'dir rig pa bya ba yin// zhes gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ thugs rnam par dag pa'i dgongs pa rab tu bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas khro
231a4(1): bopo'i rgyal po yis// rim par bsgrub pa 'di gsungs so// shin tu gtum zhing gtum pa'i gnas// byang gi phyogs su gzhol ba der// mthun pa'i rdzas dang yo byad bstar// bla ma mnyes byas grogs kyi
231a5(1): mchog/ gang la dmigs pa de ldan zhing // re dang dogs pa'i sems spangs te// brtul phod drag pos 'jug par bya// phyi nang bsrung ba 'bad pas brtsam// rnal 'byor cho ga yongs rdzogs nas// nam mkha'
231a6(1): sbyangs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// oM ma hA shu dz+nyA ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko&haM/ chos rnams de nyid yin mod kyang // sdug bsngal spyod la thugs rje bskyed// oM ma hA d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ 'dus sbyangs
231b1(1): rtags kyi gnyen po ste// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs pa shar// 'bar bas mi rtog yi ge hUM// rtog pa bskal pa gsum gyis sbyangs// ye shes
231b2(1): 'byung ba yum gyi mkha'// rnam dag dbyings las shar ba'i b+h+rUM// phrin las yongs gyur gzhal med khang // rang lus rdzogs pa 'di nyid de// mtshon chen rdo rje hUM sngon po// lus kyi sgo bcur shar ba dang // 'phro
231b3(1): 'du gsal ba'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa' yab yum gnyis// snying ga'i dbus su bsgom par bya// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas bzhi ru// rigs kyi sras bzhi bsam pa'o// spyi gtsug hUM mdzad yab
231b4(1): yum ste// dpral bar rnam par rgyal ba'o// mgrin par rta yi mgrin can dang // snying gar bdud rtsi 'khyil pa bsgom// lte bar gshin rje gshed po ste// gsang ba'i gnas su stobs po che// dpung pa g.yas su
231b5(1): dbyug sngon can// g.yon du khams gsum rnam rgyal lo// rkang pa g.yas la mi g.yo ba// g.yon la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// yan lag mthil bzhi sgo ma bzhi// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad kyang // hUM sngon 'bar ba
231b6(1): rdo rjer bsgom// phung po rdo rjes gtams byas nas// steng 'og gnas gsum sku gsung thugs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor hUM ldan pa'i// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer bsgom// spyi gtsug ye shes rgyun sbyar bas// dri ma
232a1(1): bsal bar rigs chen lnga// snyoms mdzad byang chub sems kyi rgyun// mgrin par babs pas dngos por 'dzin// bsal ba'i 'bras bu snang mtha' yas// ye shes 'khor lo lha mor gyur// bdag
232a2(1): la thim pas bde bar gyur// shes rab ye shes gsal ba'i dbang // gnyis med thim pas dbang bzhi rdzogs// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// ma lus mdzad pas kun drangs te// rgyal ba'i sras su bya ba
232a3(1): las// gsad cing gnan par ma yin te// 'phro 'du las la kun sbyor bas// 'di ni bsnyen pa'i mchog yin no// gsol btab dbang bskur rab rdzogs nas// mkha' dbyings gsang gnas byin brlabs

232a6(1): bdag dang // tshangs pa nyi zla 'di rnams kun// rang gi ming nas byung ba'i steng // 'khor bcas rdzogs pa'i lus su blta// bdag nyid gsal ba dam tshig gi/ snying ga'i 'od 'bar hUM sngon las// srid pa'i phur
232b1(1): bu bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye shes khro bo gshegs nas kyang // mthun pa'i gzugs la rab tu dbab// oM badz+ra ku mA ra kI li kI la ya g+ha na tsakra e A ra li hUM hUM hraM hraM/ sa ma ya
232b2(1): tiSh+Tha lhan/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// srid gsum gdug pa bsgral ba dang // nga rgyal bdud rnams gzhom pa yi// dpa' bo rdo rje 'khor bcas la// rtse gcig yid dang lus kyis 'dud// thun mong dang ni khyad par

232b4(1): badz+ra gi ti hI/ oM badz+ra ni ra ti a/ oM AHhUM badz+ra mAM d+hA tI shwa rI/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ pAM rA ga ra ti// maM mo haM ra ti/ pU dza g+ha na tsakra sa ma ye hUM/ oM AHhUM/ ma hA ba liM ta i daM gr-i h+Na sa ma ya kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA mAM sa go
232b5(1): ro tsa na ba su ta tsit+ta rak+ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA pany+tsa a mr-i ta kha kha khA hi khA hi/ oM ma hA dza gad ma ma gar ti sarba kha kha khA hi khA hi/ ma hA rak+ta ga ta ru ru ti kha kha khA hi khA hi/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i ting 'dzin ni// 'dod
232b6(1): pa'i yon tan sbyin ma yi// btab cing gsal ba nyid du bya// khro bo khro mo rnams bzhugs pa'o// sngon gyi thugs dam chen po ni// rtag dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // kI la ya yi dngos grub stsol// sku gsung thugs
233a1(1): kyi byin rlabs kyis// bdag la byin gyis brlabs mdzad cing // bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams// 'grub par byin gyis brlabs pa'o// bsgril zhing rgyan yang bsgril ba la// sems kyi chos

233a6(1): ya yis nges phyung ste// gtso dang mthun pa'i sku mdog la// sku smad zur gsum sku gsung thugs// rgyan ldan 'bar ba'i klong na bzhugs// ye shes khro bo de 'dra dbab// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyis// mnyes pa'i
233b1(1): cho ga tshul bzhin bya// 'bru nag dug khrag bdud rtsi yis// dbang byin brlabs te las la mngag/ snying dbus sa bon las sngags spro// tshul 'dra'i gzugs la nges par bstim// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM
233b2(1): baM hUM phaT// ldeg 'bar 'od dang sgra 'byin dang // bzang po ma mthong bar du'o// skyo dub thun mtshams bya ba'i dus// 'di ni sgrub pa bla med pa'o// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bsnyen pa dang bsgrub pa
233b3(1): bstan pa rtsa ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan khro rgyal gyis// nyid kyi sku yi dpa' bo'i chas// yon tan khyad par 'di bshad do// glang chen ko rlon theg chen stobs// dpa' gtum za byed
233b4(1): stag gi rgyan// mnyen lcug 'khril yum sbrul gyis brgyan// byang chub sems ldan tsarma ste// thod phreng gsum ni sku gsung thugs// thugs rje chags pa rak+ta'i rgyan// gdul bya'i phrin las thal chen po// zhag gi ri
233b5(1): mo don dam bcud// rgyu yis mtshon nas don drug ldan// glang chen rgyas stobs ches rgyab yang // lus rags rin zang che 'gyur zhing // khrom btags gzhan gyi dpung 'joms nus// theg chen 'dir ni lam kun
233b6(1): shongs// dge dang mi dge mnyam par 'degs/ mtshams med las sogs byas pa'ang shongs// nyon mongs 'dod yon ma spangs 'grub// lam 'di yon tan dpag tu med// ma rig zag pa myur du
234a1(1): 'joms// stag lpags mdzes shing dpal 'bar 'dzin// rtsal ldan sha rus mi 'byed za// ri dwags chen po'i gnyen por 'gyur// gcan gzan phra mo zil gyis gnon// dug lnga rigs lnga shes
234a2(1): pas dpa'// nyon mongs ye shes grub pas mdzes// thugs rjes dbye bsring yongs mi mdzad// bag chags stug po dus gcig 'joms// dregs pa rA tra'i gnyen por 'gyur// dman pa'i spyod pa zil gyis
234a3(1): gnon// sbrul 'jigs brjid pa gdug pa che// mnyen zhing lcug la dri ma 'byar// kha dog gsal zhing du mar snang // spyod pa 'di nyid sngangs shing 'jigs// nyid la brjid cing gzhan la gdug/ rang gzhan don
234a4(1): la 'dud cing mnyen// 'bras bu'i khyad par gsal zhing mthong // bskyed rdzogs che dang lam 'bras bu// gang zag blo la sna tshogs ston// dug gsum lam gyis log lta 'dul// thugs rje zin pa dman mi
234a5(1): gtogs// zhing lpags mthong 'jigs tshil khrag chu ser ba spur bcas// grang mnyen rlung skyob yan lag tshang // 'di ni zab pa'i spyod blangs pas// ngan pa'i blta ba 'jigs pa bskyed// dman la mos pa'i yid
234a6(1): skrag 'gyur// gnas dang 'pho dang zhi ba dang // khro brtan spyugs bskrad bsdus dang gtor// rgyas zhum 'pham rgyal dbang du bya// rdo rje'i theg mchog 'di la gnas// bstan pa dang ni nges pa dang // sgra tsam skra
234b1(1): min dgongs pa dang // thol byung dang ni yi ge dang // spyi dang gab sbas brda dang zabs// bla ma mnyes la drang zhing mnyen// las kyi rlung dang g.yul ngo bzlog/ gzhi lam 'bras bu lta spyod dang // dam tshig byin
234b2(1): rlob yan lag tshang // skam rlon ra ri dbang po tshang // rigs ldan pa dang zlum pa dang // spros pa nyer zhi chos kyi sku// dus gsum dgongs pa tshang zhing gtsang // longs spyod rdzogs sku rol pa skra// dag pa'i ting nge
234b3(1): 'dzin la gnang // khyim na spyod pa'i cha lugs 'dzin// gzhan don sprul pa drug la sogs// sku gdung ring bsrel lhag mar bcas// rigs dang pha ma gnyen 'dun dang // 'khor dang bstan pa gnas pa'i
234b4(1): tshad// phyir mi ldog dang skye ba gcig/ thogs pa tsam dang srid mtha' ma// mngon por byang chub gsal bar ldan// sems dpa' che ba'i lam thob nas// yongs rdzogs srid kyi pho brang rags// mi rtog pa la rnam
234b5(1): mi dmigs// mtshan ma'i spros las dben pa yis// thabs dang shes rab zung 'brel zhing // skabs don rdo rje theg par gsal// rak+ta rlan gdong dmar nag ldan// ser 'dres bgos sla bsnur bar nus// mi
234b6(1): dmigs thugs rje chags shing brlan// chos dbyings ye shes kun las gdong // nye bar dgongs shing ngang la gnas// che ba'i yon tan tshogs kyis brgyan// ye shes phra rags skad cig mkhyen// tha dad snang
235a1(1): zhing gzhan bsgyur bas// gdul bya'i rigs la 'tshams pa'i rkyen// lhag par rtags kyi don ldan pa'i// dkar zhing gsal mnyen zhi bsgo myur// phyir bsal sla tsha phyir gsal sla ba phrin las
235a2(1): don// thog ma'i mun pa ma lus sel// ye shes snang ba'i tshogs kun bskyed// drag pos las sogs myur du 'dul// khams dang bag la nyal ba dang // ji ltar 'tshams pa de bzhin ston// nges 'byung skal ba
235a3(1): yod pa yis// rnam grol go 'phang myur 'thob byed// bag chags cung zad mi gnas par// 'byin pa'i don de nye bar gnas// bcud mchog snum zhun rog pa mnyen// 'gyu ba'i nad sel bsal mi nus// dri dang
235a4(1): kha dog rab gsal bzhin// rdo rje thog mchog gya nom pa// rig pa can gyi gnyen por 'gyur// nyon mongs lnga dang drug nyid kyis// yan lag nad du gyur pa sel// grangs med dbar du chud mi za// blo ngan shes
235a5(1): rab chung ba yis// 'di la nges 'byung skal med de// dus la bab na sar gnas byed// 'di dag rdzogs phyir rab tu brgyan// gzhan yang nga yi bstan pa 'dis// rdo rje'i theg pa cher ldan zhing // khong du chud pa'i
235a6(1): mthu mnga' bas// glang chen ko rlon rab tu bgos// rgol ba mthun par tshar gcod phyir// stag gi sham du dkris pa'o// lto 'phye'i dug 'joms sbrul gyis brgyan// sems gnyis mi 'gyur tsarma'o// sku gsum
235b1(1): nga gi thod phreng brgyus// zhi ba'i snying rjes mi gnas chags// gzhan don gzigs pa rak+ta'o// dge ba 'phel byed thal chen te// kun gyi sems rtogs bcud kyis brgyan// gzhan yang gti mug 'dod chags
235b2(1): dang // zhe sdang 'jig tshogs phrag dog dang // ser sna nga rgyal ma brtags spyod// dbang byed rim bzhin rtags kyis brgyan// kha cig tu na sngon bzhin du// phrin las chen po mdzad pa'i dus// dregs pa rU tra de
235b3(1): 'khor bcas// byi na ya ga glang chen gzugs// mkha' 'gro chen mo stag mgo can// mtha' yas klu dang lha chen po// bsgral ba'i pags pa thod phreng dang // khrag zhag dang ni thal bas brgyan// thun mong khyad par
235b4(1): phyi dang nang // rtags kyi don mtshon tsam nyid de// don dam nges pa yul dang dngos// de la bya dang byed pa med// gtum zhing khro bas 'dul ba la// rang gi snang ba sangs rgyas mthu// zhes gsungs so// phrin las
235b5(1): 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ dur khrod chen po'i chas rgyan gyi rtags dang yon tan gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// mngon spyod las kyi rim pa las// mchod sbyin drag po 'di
235b6(1): gsungs so// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi drung // gru gsum khru gang rgya dang dpangs// mu ran sor gsum slar bstod de// khru gang e yi dbus nyid du// gcod pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri// ming dang mtshan ma
236a1(1): dbyings su dgod// phyi rol sras mchog phyag mtshan no// gri sa tshangs sgo can dag gi/ ro bsreg thal ba sa nag dang // rnga bong bong bu'i bdud rtsi byugs// 'bru nag me tog nag po dgram// tsha zhing
236a2(1): rtsub la rno ba'i shing // e yi dbyibs su brtseg par bya// dug shing gis ni phyogs mtshams bskor// 'phan gdugs rgyal mtshan bla re dang // ba dan zhal khebs nag pos brgyan// sor bcu rtsa gnyis rno dpal
236a3(1): ldan// dug khrag 'bru mar nag por bcas// khre 'bru khrag dang lan tshwa dang // skye tshe nim pa ro thal dang // nyung nag dug dang me tog nag/ sngon po gyo mo rdo phye dang // rtsub pa'i sha khrag sna tshogs dang / bong bu rnga
236a4(1): bong bya rog gi/ bdud rtsi sha khrag spu dang sgro/ tsher ma rus phye bshang gci dang // grog mkhar sa dang spu ma dang // dmigs pa'i bdud rtsi la sogs bstar// dus ni nag po'i phyogs dag gi/ phyi dro srod dang gung

236a6(1): po yum dang bcas// rang gi sngags bzlas las kyi chu// g.yas kyi phyogs su gzhag par bya// rdzas gzhan rnams ni g.yon phyogs su'o// stong pa nyid la bsam pa'i dngos// a yis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
236b1(1): dbyung // steng du sgra yig dang po las// rdo rje rtse dgu 'od 'bar ba// sa bon rgyu yis mtshan par bsgom// las kyi sgra brjod 'phro 'du yis// gtso chen rdo rje 'chang ba de// sbar bshad rtags dang ldan par

237a1(1): rab ldan pa// dam tshig gsang ba'i bka' dbang bya// mchod yon nag po dri nga bas// nag po'i cha lugs 'dzin pa mnyes// lce gzar kha la rang sngags bsam// g.yon gyis blug pa'i gzar bu
237a2(1): bzung // bdud rtsi gdug pa'i mar bcus te// shin tu gdangs pa'i zhal de ru// bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig dbul// oM badz+ra a na la ag+ni ma hA pu dza sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba shu ta hUM phaT/ mnyes shing bgegs

237b1(1): brtsam mtshon gyis gtub// gtso bo nas brtsam re re dbul// a mu ka mA ra ya dza la raM raM// bka' las 'da' ba'i sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dpal snying bsreg nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du rlog/ gang

239a1(1): dbye ba/ kyo ba 'dzin mdzad khro bo spros// de nyid gnas bcu dag nas dbyung / gzugs la bsdu ba'i gnas yin no// gdab pa'i gnas ni 'du byed kyis// lag pa yum bzhir byin brlabs
239a2(1): nas// rnam dag skye med yi ge yis// snang ba gsum nyid gsal bar blta'o// rgyu gsum ldan pa'i dbyings su bzla// byang chub sems kyi chu rgyun no// oM badz+ra ku mA ra kI li ki la ya hUM hUM/ a A/ sras mchog hUM

240b2(1): bzlas// bdag nyid stong pa'i gnas su dril// slar 'dus sbyor ba sngon pas lhag/ rdzas dang bdag nyid gso ba yin// ngas bstan lung bzhin gnas pa ni// yab yum sbyor ba'i sems phab pas// pha rol
240b3(1): sems rgyud nam mkha' gdon// hUM phaT ces pa'i sgra yis ni// rang bzhin gnas la gsol ba gdab// dbang bskur bas ni 'od 'bar gyur// yab kyi zhal nas yum gyi mkhar// hUM las skur gsal phaT kyis
240b4(1): gdon// slar yang bsdu dang gtor ba yis// 'og min gnas la gsos gdab cing // dbang bskur 'od zhu hUM du dmigs// phaT kyi sbyor bas lhums su 'phang // bsnyen pa dang ni nye bar bsnyen// bsgrub pa
240b5(1): bsgrub pa chen po ni// rdzogs pas skur bzhengs phyir byon nas// dbu rgyan ldan pas dbang bskur te// phaT kyis 'og min gnas su 'phang // tog dkar rgyal tshab dam pa yis// bcu gnyis mdzad pas 'gro
240b6(1): don rdzogs// rdo rje'i gnas su lus sbyor ba'o// srid chad mdze can mtshon shi ba'i// thod rus nang du dmigs pa gzhug/ mi shis gnas su gnan pa ni// A~M laM AHlaM hUM laM/ stam b+ha ya nan/ mo ha ya/ shri kro b+hi
241a1(1): kri/ badz+ra hUM ka ra hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ rdo rje ri rab 'phros pa yis// rab tu gnas pa'i sbyor ba brtsam/ ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// gnas ngan bag chags yongs mi ldang // rdo rje can dang
241a2(1): mtshungs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag shul mngon par spyod pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po des// drag shul rgyud kyi ting nge
241a3(1): 'dzin// mngon du spyod pa'i phrin las bshad// nga nyid nga dang 'dra ba yis// 'khor bcas sgra tshig drag po yis// rang gi gnas lnga 'bar zhing spro// mthar zug yul mnyes dngos grub bsdu/ oM badz+ra ki li kI la ya
241a4(1): d+ha d+hi ma ma karma/ mA ra se ni// sra marda na ya// sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // kun gyi rtsa ba'i phrin las so// yab yum bcas pa'i thugs ka nas// mgal me lta bu'i 'od 'phros
241a5(1): pas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor brtan zhing gsal// rgyud bskul byin brlab dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra ki li kA la ya d+ha d+hi ma ma karma/ a dzi ta a pa ra dzi ta/ dza ya bi dza ya ka tang ka ye mA ra se ni// pra marda ni ye
241a6(1): sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT// 'di ni gzhan gyis mi thub cing / rnam par rgyal ba'i phrin las so// bdag nyid khro bo'i tshogs kun gyis// drag sngags skrag ni gnam lcags kyi// zhun ma sa la brdab 'dra ba'i// 'od
241b1(1): 'phros gdug pa tshar gcod byed// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ a dzi ta a pa ra dzi ta dza ya bi dza ya ka tang ka ye/ ma ma ba shaM ku ru ma taM ka ra nya ka ra i daM/ d+ha d+hi ma ma karma a ra i dan shI g+h+raM kA ra ya/ mA ra se na sra
241b2(1): marda ni ye sarba big+h+nAM hUM phaT/ 'di yis ma lus gdug pa can/ tshar gcod las su 'dzud par byed// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das kun// srog nas drangs pa bsgrub pa che// gtso chen 'phro 'dus thams cad
241b3(1): bsgral// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya ba ra bi d+han+ma mA ra se na pra marda ni ye hUM phaT/ sarba big+h+nA a na ya ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban d+ha ban d+ha// gr-i h+Na gr-i h+Na/ ma tha ma tha/ tshin+da tshin+na/ b+hin+na b+hin+na/ ta thA ya ta thA
241b4(1): ya/ ha sa ya ra hri da na/ A be sha ya A be sha ya/ shi kri A na ya/ dza la pa ya dza la pa ya/ ta thA ya ta thA ya/ bi ta ya bi ta ya/ shi traM kA ra nya ya/ dza yi bi dza ye/ ka taM ka ye/ a dzi ti a pa ra dzi ti ba ya baM hUM phaT/
241b5(1): 'di yis 'jig rten dregs pa can// thams cad 'du byed las la 'khol// phyogs bcu khro bo'i lha rnams kun// mthing nag pa spu'i dkyil 'khor spro// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya/ mo ha ya g+ha ta ya badz+ra kI li kI la ya
241b6(1): hUM kA ra bi dza ya ni la daN+Da ya mAn+ta ka/ a tsa la ha ya g+h+ri wa/ a pa ra dzi ta a mr-i ta kuN+Da li/ trai lo kya bi dza ya/ ma hA ba la pa ra bi d+han+ma/ tshin+da tshin+na/ a pa ra dzi ta/ ma ra se ni ye pra marda ni ye sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/
242a1(1): 'di ni rab tu sgrol ba yis// khro tshogs 'khor bcas mngag pa'o// oM badz+ra ki li ki la ma mo hA ya g+ha ta ya/ su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+ra/ dza ya dza ya badz+ra/ ma tha ma tha badz+ra/ shi kri na ka ra ya/
242a2(1): ma ra se ni pra marda ni ye/ ma hA tsit+ta kha hI ma sha rbad/ ma hA sha ya zum myag rbad/ kaM ka sha ya mA ra ya phaT/ 'di ni rdzas kyis dmigs pa bsgral// khro bo khro mo sprul pa dang // yang sbrul pho nya tshogs dang
242a3(1): bcas// phung po lhag med rol par bya// oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya b+ha ga bAn/ mo ha ya g+ha ta ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoH// shi krin byi krin/ d+ha d+hi ma ma shI g+h+raM ka ra ya/ IM ru ru b+hak+Sha/ trag sha trag sha/ tsit+ta rag sha/ tsit+ta ni tung
242a4(1): tung / thum ling / tsit+ta gtub gtub/ nr-i dzaHphrig phrig/ shaM shaM khyer b+h+yo// nr-i dzaHmA ra ya rbad/ brnag pa kho na nyid la de/ 'di yi drod tshad brtag la dbab// mtshan ma brtan po dbyung bar bya// zhes bka' stsal
242a5(1): to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ drag po mngon du spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin sprul pa chen po'i phrin las kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// gti mug 'dod chags nga rgyal
242a6(1): dang / phrag dog 'dul ba rab mdzad phyir// slar yang rigs kyi khro bor bstan// sangs rgyas khros pas gti mug gcod// mtshon chen dkar po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dbyings nas thigs par shar// mi rtog
242b1(1): oM gyis dngos po sbyang // ye shes 'byung ba yum gyi mkha'// rnam dag dbyings nas shar ba'i b+h+rUM// phrin las yongs gyur gzhal med khang // rang lus rdzogs pa 'di nyid de// mtshon chen 'khor lo oM dkar
242b2(1): po// lus kyi sgo ru shar ba dang // 'phro 'du gsal ba'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa' yab yum gnyis// spyi bo'i steng du bsam par bya// 'di ni 'khor lo gzhon nu ste// bud+d+ha kI la ya zhes bya// mdun
242b3(1): rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas bzhi ru// badz+ra kI la ya sogs bsgom/ snying gar hUM mdzad yab yum sogs// sngar bshad bzhin du bsgom bya ste// oM dkar 'khor lo 'bar bar bsam// phung po 'khor los gtams
242b4(1): byas nas// rnam par shes pa 'khor lor bsgom// oM bud+d+ha kI li kI la ya sarba shAn+ti oM hUM phaT/ dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la/ zlum por 'dus rdzas las la mngag/ yul gsum mtshan ma brtan gyur
242b5(1): na// lha klu gnod sbyin bgegs rigs dang / 'du ba bzhi gyur yan lag nad// 'jigs dang dus min 'chi ba brgyad// mi dge gnod pa'i las la sogs/ ma lus zhi ba'i phrin las so// rin chen khros pas nga
242b6(1): rgyal gcod// mtshon chen ser po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dbyings nas thigs par shar// rtog med tAM gyis dngos po sbyang // kha dog rin chen tAM ser pos// dpral ba'i dbus su bsam par bya// 'di las
243a1(1): rin chen gzhon nu ste// rat+na ki la ya zhes pa'o// bud+d+ha kI la ya sogs dang // lte bar hUM mdzad la sogs bsgom// gser mdog tAM las rin chen 'bar// lus kun rin chen 'bar bas
243a2(1): gtams// rnam par shes kun rin po che// oM rat+na kI li kI la ya sarba puSh+Ti tAM hUM phaT// gser ram se po'i shing rnams la// gru bzhi gnas pa'i rdzas la mngag/ yul gsum mtshan ma rab brtan nas// tshe dang
243a3(1): longs spyod dbang phyug dang // bsod nams ye shes dregs pa dang // dpal dang 'byor pa rigs 'dzin dang / dga' bde rang gzhan phun tshogs pa/ kun tu rgyas pa'i phrin las so// pad+ma khros pas 'dod chags
243a4(1): gcod// mtshon chen dmar po 'bar lta bu// nam mkha'i dbyings nas thigs par shar// mi rtog hrIHyis dngos po sbyang // chos kyi pad+ma hrIHdmar po// mgrin pa'i mtshams su rab tu bsgom// 'di sbyor pad+ma
243a5(1): gzhon nu ste// pad+ma kI la ya zhes bya// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas bzhin// rat+na kI la ya sogs bsgom// dpral bar snang mdzad yab yum bsgom// gzhan yang rang gi gnas su bsgom// dmar gsal
243a6(1): hrIHlas pad+ma 'bar// phung po pad+ma'i rang bzhin te// rnam par shes pa pad+ma'o// oM pad+ma kI li kI la ya/ sarba ba shaM hrIHhUM phaT// zangs sam dmar po'i shing rnams la// zla gam dbyibs kyi rdzas la mngag/ yul
243b1(1): gsum mtshan ma brtan thob nas// phyi rol brtan pa'i sar bzhugs dang // log par blta dang the tshom can// nga rgyas dregs pas khengs pa dang // che btsan mtho btsun ldan pa dang // gdug rtsub gnod sbyor 'tshe
243b2(1): ba dang // 'gyur rlom sems dang ldan pa dag/ mos shing 'dud pas dbang du sdud// rgya gram khros pas phrag dog gcod// mtshon chen ljang gu rab 'bar ba// nam mkha'i dkyil nas thigs par shar// rtog med
243b3(1): hA yis dngos po sbyang // sku rdzogs las la byung ba ni// rgya gram brtan par hA ljang gu// lus kyi sgo ru shar ba dang // 'phro 'du gsal ba'i phyag rgya yis// ye shes sems dpa' yab yum bzhi/ gsang ba'i gnas
243b4(1): su bsam par bya// mdun rgyab g.yas g.yon gnas bzhi ru// pad+ma kI la ya sogs dang // rigs kyi sras bzhi bsgom par bya// phrin las gzhon nu rab sbyor bas// karma kI ya ya zhes bya// snying gar hUM mdzad
243b5(1): yab yum dang // gnas gzhan so sor khro tshogs bsgom// hA ljang rgya gram 'bar ba yis// lus kyi phung po rab tu gtams// rnam shes rgya gram ral gri ste// oM karma kI li kI la ya sarba mA ra ya hUM phaT// lcags
243b6(1): sam nag po'i shing rnams la// gru gsum dbyibs kyi rdzas la mngag/ yul gsum mtshan ma gsal ba dang // lus can lus med rab rgyu ba'i// 'jig smod snyoms dang gnod cing 'tshe// bar gcod sgrol ba'i
244a1(1): phrin las so// phrin las 'di dag khyad par ni// shar lho nub byang 'jam dang sdug/ mdzes dang rtsub pa khyad par gnas// dge sbyong rgyal po bram ze dmangs// rgan po dar ma bud med dang // rgyud
244a2(1): rtsub ldan pa gnad yin no// gtso chen las ni rigs kyi sras// gnas pa so sor sbyor ba'i mchog/ phrin las tha dad sbyor ba yis// lam lnga sku lnga ye shes lnga// rigs lnga'i tshul gyis bgrod cing bsgrub// nyon
244a3(1): mongs yul rab ltos pa yis// rigs kyi bdag po sbyor ba la// gang la gang gis gang gi phyir// rig pa 'dzin pa rnal 'byor che// mkhas rtogs shes rab ldan pas spyod// ces bka' stsal to// phrin las 'dus
244a4(1): pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las// rigs 'dzin tha dad kyi sgo nas phrin las bzhi so sor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu chen po rnams kyis
244a5(1): ni// nga yi bstan pa 'dzin cing bsrung // de phyir de yi tshul bshad de// srid pa las kyi mthu rtsal can// bcu gnyis lham bral bcas pa yis// dam tshig cho ga rab sbyor bas// rjes spyod nga yi rnal 'byor
244a6(1): yin// gzugs brnyan chen po'i drung du ni// e bdun bsnol ba'i pho brang brtseg/ gcod sreg brtan pa rnams kyis bskor// gser dngul zangs lcags rin chen dang // khrag zhag 'o ma mar gyi mtsho// mi rta myur
244b1(1): du bsgral ba'i khrag/ gsum gyi pho brang gsum du'o// lcags las byas pa'i phur pa ni// drag po'i gzugs can sor brgyad pa// dur khrod rgyu ba'i mgo nang du// wa dang sbyang khyi 'phar ba khyam// tsit+ta btsal te
244b2(1): gnas su dgod// rin chen sna bzhi'i dbus su dgod// kla klo'i yul nas thod pa ru// rigs gnyis bong bu bya lug snying // stsal ba mtshon chen gnas su dgod// rin chen mtshan ldan snod nang du// mi dbang
244b3(1): tsit+ta sha khrag bcas// sul bzhi phur pa la btod do// ming gi rgyud med rigs med kyi// thod par rdo thun khrag thun dang / skye sgo'i khrag thun rim bzhin bsag/ srin mo bcu gnyis 'di la brten/ drag po dkar
244b4(1): dmar nag pa yis// rgyal bu e yi mtshams gsum la// gling bzhi ri rab sa rdos byas// gcan gzan 'dab chags rgyal mtshan 'phyar// bshos chang mchod tshogs rgyan ldan god// nga rgyal chen po rab ldan
244b5(1): pas// lcam sras bod cing las la rbad// sbyor ba'i sgrol ba rab tu bskul// oM shwa na/ sha na/ sr-i la sr-i ka/ mu ka hUM dzaH/ trag rag+na ru tra bi ru bin nan mug ti baM ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ pad+ma d+ha ri ru ma ti tsi la b+ho/ hu
244b6(1): lu kyi hu me sen dza dza/ mu ti du ru tsa sa la mi dza dzA/ ya ma k+She yak+Sha d+he ba k+She bag sha ba ra hi k+Shi trag tshal pa dum bu ru shag b+h+yo/ so so'i gnas nas drang bar bya/ badz+ra shwa na shra na sri la sri ka ka pa tsit+ta nr-i dzaH/ sha la b+h+yo
245a1(1): b+h+yo/ ma hA yak+ka sna nag mo dun b+h+yo/ ma ma nr-i sha tsit+ta ma dzaH/ rbad ling ka mA ra ya b+h+yo// rag mo ag mo ro sha thun/ yak+ka tsit+ta shad shad b+h+yo b+h+yo// pra mun tsa mun shu la ko mun ha ri ma ma ra ya rbad
245a2(1): b+h+yo// zhes pas dmigs pa'i yul la rbad// badz+ra shwa na mu kha sha na mu kha shi la mu kha sri ga mu kha tsit+ta pa mug mug bruM rbad bruM rbad/ thib zib yaM yaM tsit+ta la bruM rbad rbad/ trag rag+na ma ma ru ti re ma ti mA ra ya tsit+ta la
245a3(1): mug thum rbad yaM/ trag rag sha ru ti re ma ti mA ra ya tsit+ta la gtub gtub/ trag rag sha ru ti re ma 'dzu tsit+ta ri la rbad/ rag sha ru ti bruM/ trag rag sha ru ti re ma dzA tsit+ta bruM yaM ri la rbad bruM/ rag mo tsi bi ri ma ra ma bruM
245a4(1): rbad/ yag mo tsi bi ri ma ra ya bruM rbad/ gardza tsi bi ri mA ra ya hur bruM rbad/ hu lu ma tsi bi ri mA ra ya hUM bruM rbad/ phung po myur du bsgral bar bya// drag po rnams kyis dmod pa ni// badz+ra su tri pa a pa ra tsit+ta tri tsa ba la
245a5(1): ma sha tsit+ta hUM phaT/ nr-i dzaHmA ra ya du ya ma tsit+ta rak+ta tshal pa// du ma pra ma du tsi ta la khug/ bam ri la/ ma ra phra ma a pa ra dzi ta/ a tri sa ma nr-i dza/ dun dun nr-i dza rbad bruM/ kun gyi rim pa'i rjes su
245a6(1): brtsam// brdegs shing brdeg pa 'phang bsreg dang // gzir ba'i las kyis tshar gcad pa// 'di ni lus ngag yid gsum ldan// shin tu dmigs pas myur du 'grub// phyi nang gsang ba rtags dang tshad// mngon
245b1(1): sum bzhin du gsal bar sbyar// thogs pa med par las 'grub byed// phrin las gcod pa'i mdo yin no// zhes bka' stsal to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sprul pa'i phyag brnyan dam tshig chen po'i
245b2(1): phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// rgyud don nye bar bsdus te bshad// rnal 'byor ye shes rang rig pa'i// bdag nyid dkyil 'khor rtsa ba ste// gzhon nu rigs
245b3(1): kyi gtso bo lnga// dus gsum sangs rgyas sras mchog rnams// kun sbyor nyis brgya lnga bcur rdzogs// khro chen phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor du// yab yum nye ba'i sras gnyis las// sprul pa dang ni nye bar
245b4(1): sbrul// thugs kyi bdag dang bcas pa yi// brgya dang bcu yi lha rnams snang // mngon par spyod pa la sogs pa'i// 'dus byas lnga rnams gzugs brnyan la// khro chen zhal gsum phyag drug ldan// so so'i rigs
245b5(1): kyi gtso chen lnga// gang gis 'dul ba der snang zhing // zhi dang dbang rgyas drag po yis// so so'i phrin las ngor 'byung ste// dbyibs dang kha dog rdzas dang sbyar// sku smad rang gi rgyu las grub// 'og gnyis skyed pa
245b6(1): zhabs kyi dbyibs// zlum po gru bzhi zla kham dang // gru gsum rnams ni khyad par yin// steng 'og zhi ba zlum po ste// logs bzhi rgyas pa skyed pa dbang // zur rnams drag po nyid yin no// gong ma'i gnas la
246a1(1): gzhal med khang // 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad ldan pa la// lte bar gtso bo yab yum bsgom// rtsibs la phyogs mtshams khro bo brgyad// yab yum steng 'og gnas su ni// hUM mdzad dang ni stobs po
246a2(1): che// yab yum sras dang bcas pa'o// skyed pa zla kham gnas su ni// khro brgyad kyis ni sras kun gnas// 'og min gnas sogs bzhi la ni// phra men sgo ma dbyung zhing bsam// rtsa ba la sogs gnas de
246a3(1): la// 'jig rten gnas pa bcu gnyis so// lcam dral nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// dbyibs dang sbyar ba'i gnas su bsam// gong ma'i gnas kyi logs bzhi ru// rigs dang phrin las rab phye ba'i// lhag ma'i sras mchog
246a4(1): bsgom pa ste// bdun cu rtsa brgyad phyung ba yis// rdzas la dmigs pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// 'di dag me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// rang bzhin ma grub snang ba ni// chos sku skye med phur pa'o// ma lus sku la
246a5(1): rab rdzogs pa// longs spyod rdzogs sku'i phur pa grub// ba spu'i bu ga'i tshul thams cad// 'bar ba'i khro chung gtams pa ni// bdag gzhan ma lus don byed pas// phur pa sprul pa'i sku yi mchog/ sku gsum
246a6(1): yongs rdzogs dkyil 'khor che// rang byung ye shes gnas la 'du// 'di ni sku yi dkyil 'khor yin// rigs lnga 'bru dgu kI la ya// thams cad gsung gi dkyil 'khor gsal// bris te yig 'bru dgod pa
246b1(1): dang // phur bu dgod cing dngos grub blang // thugs kyi dkyil 'khor rtsa ba lnga// bris te phyag mtshan so sor dgod// mchod cing las bcol dngos grub blang // gtso mo yum gyi spogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor
246b2(1): gnas su bri bya zhing // lha dgod rdzas spyad bskul bas rdzogs// bsgoms shing dgod pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bskul zhing yon tan ldan pa yis// rdzas kyi dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin dbyung // nyi shu rtsa gcig e yi
246b3(1): dbyibs// tshad dang ldan pa rdzas dgod cing // dngos grub blang bar tha dad do// rdzas bsag bskyed cing tshad ldan bri// rgyan rtags dgod pas 'chol ba rdzogs// stong dang rtsa brgyad bsgrub pa'o// dkyil 'khor
246b4(1): byang chub sems las byang // las kyi dkyil 'khor brtsig pa dang // bsag mchod gsad pa'i rgyu dang ni// chos ldan pha rol bskul ba yis// gzugs bsreg gnas spar las rnams kyis// ma lus 'dus par
246b5(1): brgyad du bstan// rigs can lnga la kun sbyangs pas/ bsnyen bsgrub sku gsung thugs kyi ngang // thig le gcig la rab tu 'dus// zhes bka' stsal to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ khyad par gyi rigs
246b6(1): kyi dkyil 'khor spro ba'i phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i rgyal po yis// rang gi 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs la// shin tu gdams pa 'di skad gsungs// kye ma sras mchog 'khor
247a1(1): gyi tshogs// sprul pa pho nyar bcas pa rnams// snyigs ma'i sems can gdul dka' ba// thugs rje'i thabs chen sna tshogs kyis// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ thams cad du ni snang zhing
247a2(1): ston// bdag gi don du bzhugs so snyoms// rang gi rnam rtog nye bar gnas// kha cig tu ni dge sbyong che// nyan thos rang rgyal spyod pa ston// la lar byang chub sems dpa' yi// spyod pa rlabs chen nus par
247a3(1): mdzad// kha cig la ni longs spyod rdzogs// dpe byad brgyad cur ldan pa'i sku// dul bar gnas la zhi ba dang // gdug pa can la khro bo ste// zhing khams rab tu bkod pa dang // gzhal med khang pa'i pho brang
247a4(1): rdzogs// gnyis med sbyor ba'i tshul can dang // rgyan gcig ldan pa'i sku yi rigs// yab dang yum gyi rnam pa can// gang gis 'dul ba der snang zhing // rigs drug sems can kun la yang // rang rigs gang
247a5(1): yin der 'byung bas// tshangs pa brgya byin dbang phyug dang // gnod sbyin mkha' lding mi'am ci// lha min dri za mi rnams dang // byol song yi dwags dmyal ba rnams// so sor gang 'dul de nyid kyis// rang gi rdo
247a6(1): rje 'dzin par 'gyur// dman pa rnams la rim pa ste// rtag pa ma yin sdug bsngal dang // mir skye sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang // phun sum tshogs pa rnyed dka' dang // skyabs 'gro gso sbyong bslab gnas
247b1(1): bcu// kun rdzob don dam rang bzhin gyis// sems dbang bsgyur te bdag med pa'i// rtogs pa rab rdzogs dbu ma ston// de nas lus ngag bya ba dang // spyod pa rab sgrub rnal 'byor ston// bskyed pa'i rim pa
247b2(1): la 'byor che// de yi rjes su rnal 'byor dang // rab tu rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor dag/ thabs dang shes rab 'jug pas don// sku lnga chos lnga ye shes lnga// lam lnga rigs lnga dag pa lnga// sa bcu stobs bcu ma
247b3(1): 'dres pa// bco brgyad nges par 'byung ba dang // bskal pa chen po grangs med gsum// skad cig tsam la rdzogs par byed// blo dang dbang po bsam pa dang // tha ma 'bring dang mchog gyur la// tshad med rnams
247b4(1): kyi khyad par gyis// brtan dang thob pa dus gcig dang // tshe gcig srid pa bar ma dang // gsum mam lnga'am bdun dag gis// rang gi sa la gnas par ston// 'byung ba chen po rnams kyis mthu// phan tshun log
247b5(1): par phyin srid de// gdul bar bya ba'i sras rnams la// dus la bab pa gang zhig na// sangs rgyas rnams ni cung mi 'da'// nga yi ye shes tshul 'di la// khyed rnams 'jigs par ma byed cig/ ces bka' stsal pa
247b6(1): dang // 'khor 'dus pa chen po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po khro bo chen po'i rgyal po chen po de nyid phrin las kyi rnam par rol pa chen po'i sgo
248a1(1): nas// yul gdug pa can 'dul ba'i rigs rnams kyi don rab tu rdzogs par mdzad pa la rjes su yi rang ba rgya che'i sgo nas bstod pa ni// kye ma bcom ldan rig pa'i rgyal po khro bo'i rje// dus
248a2(1): gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyi dpal chen po he ru ka/ rig pa'i rgyal po sku lnga ye shes lnga rdzogs lhun grub cing // dkyil 'khor gsum lnga brgyad kyi ngo bor sku la rab 'dus rdo rje 'chang // phrin las bzhi dang
248a3(1): gtso chen drag po mngon 'byung sbyin mdzad pa'i// gzhon nu lnga ldan myur 'byung 'khor dang bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor 'dus pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdus
248a4(1): te/ sku las 'od zer gyi tshogs chen po snang bar mdzad nas/ mi gnas pa'i dbyings chos nyid mnyam pa nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i ngang la dges pa chen pos bzhugs par gyur to// phrin las 'dus pa rtsa ba'i
248a5(1): rgyud las/ phyi ma'i tshul nges par 'byung bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las 'dus pa phur pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ bi d+yot+ta ma 'bum sde
248a6(1): las bsdus pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe/ gter rgya/
248b1(1): // / rgyug gdas pas rbA/ bang mas na pa rna sa ju
248b2(1): la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bla na med pa mngon par rab tu rdzogs pa'i rdo rje
248b3(1): he ru ka zhes bya ba de/ thig le chen po mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du srid pa'i chos kyi bsdus pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gnas rin po che las grub pa'i ri rab chen po'i rtse mo lha'i rgyal
248b4(1): po'i gnas// bde ba chen po'i klong / yum chen mo de kho na nyid kyi gzhir gyur pa mu kha le dgongs pa ma lus par shar ba'i klong // b+ha ga yangs pa'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin phyogs bcu'i nam
248b5(1): mkha'i khams yongs su khyab pa'i gnas na snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs nas/ rab tu gsang ba'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi rdo rje shugs chen po 'chang ba/ pad+ma'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i klong chen po dang gnyis
248b6(1): su med pa'i 'phro 'du dus gsum du rgyun mi chad par bkye ba las/ byin gyis rlabs kyi cho 'phrul chen po dpag tu med par snang bar 'di lta ste/ sa chen po dang / me chen po dang / chu chen po dang / rlung chen po dag
249a1(1): gi gnas pa dang // bsreg pa dang / gsher ba dang / bskyod cing g.yo bar byed pa'i mthu chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa snang ba las srid pa'i 'jig rten bskyed pa'i sa bon dang rtsa ba dang / bcud
249a2(1): dang bcas pa/ dngas ma dang 'bras bur bcas pa/ yon tan dang nus pa rdzogs pa/ phyogs dus rab tu phye ba med par bzhugs pa las/ dbyings kyi yum kun tu bzang mo srid pa thams cad kyi bdag mo/ he
249a3(1): ru ka thams cad kyi yum chen mo/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rig pa'i dbang phyug ma/ 'jig rten gyi khams las 'das pa thams cad kyi gtso mo/ de kho na nyid kyi gzhi mu kha le zhes bya ba de nyid rol pa chen po
249a4(1): gnyis su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs nas// bcom ldan 'das la skul ba'i dbyings kyi sgra chen pos gsol ba btab pa/ e ma ho// bla med mngon rdzogs rgyal po he ru ka/ snang stong gnyis med kun la
249a5(1): nga ba'i sku// mtshan med spros bral mi rtog grags pa'i gsungs// bde chen zag med zung 'jug khyab pa'i thugs// ma lus rang la rdzogs pa'i yon tan mnga'// phrin las mdzad phyir rol pa'i sku bzhengs
249a6(1): shig/ a la la ho// zhes bskul ba mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das des 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi ngang // mnyam nyid dbyings kyi ngang las mi g.yo
249b1(1): zhing // ma rtogs 'khor ba ngang gis bsgral ba las// 'khrul pa'i blo la dngos por yongs mi snang // gdul bya'i bsam pa rnam dag som nyi med// dus la ma bab zhi bar gnas par bya// zhes bka' stsal
249b2(1): to// de nas yang yum chen mos 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma ho// dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po las// ma nor ma lus mi zad mkhyen pa las// rtogs dang ma rtogs log pa'i blo can la// so so'i
249b3(1): ston pa rig dbang thugs las phyung // ye shes rtsal gyi dgongs pa dmigs med las// gang la bsngags pa'i bstan rab sgo dbyer gsol// zhes bskul bas// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de//
249b4(1): dbyings kyi yum chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// e ma ho/ srid gsum 'jig rten kun na rab bde ba'i// kha sbyor dga' ba skad cig gnas skabs bzhi// 'dod chags chen po mthong bzhad reg cing
249b5(1): sbyor// blo dang rigs las khyad par gang snang ba'i// mthar zug rim pa bzhin dus 'byung nus par ldan// mkha' bzhi pad+ma byang chub sems kyi gnas// nam mkha' khyab pa mnyam nyid sbyor mdzad phyir// ze'u
249b6(1): 'bru 'dab bcas pad+ma rgyas mdzod cig/ sa ma ya ho// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ ra ho haM/ rA ga yA mi/ sa ma ya badz+ra pra be sha ya phaT/ ces bskul nas/ yab yum gnyis kyi gzigs pa dang bzhad pa dang / reg pa dang skyod
250a1(1): pa'i rol pas snyoms par zhugs te/ 'od zer gyi 'phro 'du chen po g.yos pa las/ phyogs bzhi dang dbus kyi b+ha ga yangs pa'i snang ba chen pos khams gsum pa rnams la gsal bar mdzad de//
250a2(1): phyogs lnga dang / 'od lnga dang / rigs lnga dang / bsam pa lnga dang / rtsa ba lnga dang / 'bras bu lnga dang / nus pa lnga dang / khams lnga dang / byed pa lnga dang / las lnga dang / khyab pa lnga dang / dbang lnga dang / rgyu lnga dang /
250a3(1): rkyen lnga dang / bag la nyal lnga dang / kun nas ldang ba lnga dang / shes pa lnga dang / phung po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / 'gro ba lnga dang / yul lnga dang / 'dod pa lnga dang / spyad pa lnga dang / bsrung ba lnga dang / blang ba lnga
250a4(1): dang / dor ba lnga dang / bsgrub pa lnga dang / yon tan lnga dang / yan lag lnga dang / spyod pa lnga dang / ma 'dres pa lnga la sogs pa thams cad yum chen mo nyid kyi mkha' bzhi dbyings dang lnga las/ snang zhing gnas
250a5(1): par sprul pa mdzad do// gzhan yang phyogs bcu'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhing gi bkod pa rgya chen po dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo rdzogs pa dang / yab dang yum snyoms par 'jug pa tsam dang /
250a6(1): rgyan so sor snang ba dang / zhi ba'i rnam par snang ba dang / khro bo'i rnam par snang ba dang / khyab pa dang / rdzogs pa dang / tha dad pa'i sku rnams dang / khyad par du sku'i rigs dang / gsung gi rigs dang / thugs kyi
250b1(1): rigs dang / yon tan gyi rigs dang / las kyi rigs dang / dregs pa'i rigs dang / bsgrub pa'i rigs dang / sbas pa'i rigs la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa snang zhing gsal bar gyur
250b2(1): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das bla med rgyal po he ru ka chen po des mnyam pa nyid las bzhengs te/ cho 'phrul chen po rnam par sprul pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma
250b3(1): 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// tshogs chen ma lus pa la nyon// khyed kyi khams dang byed pa dang / lus dang rigs kyi khyad par dang / phrin las grub pa'i mtha' la sogs// thams cad pa las 'byung zhing
250b4(1): snang // lus dang ngag dang rnam par shes// nga yi sku gsung thugs kyi ngang // gzugs dang 'du shes tshor ba byed// sku dang ye shes rig pa'i ngang // bsam pa longs spyod la sogs pa// dgongs pa'i cho 'phrul
250b5(1): nyid las byung // gang zhig ji ltar 'dod pa dag/ nga yi rang bzhin shes par gyis// nga las ma gtogs chos gzhan min// btags pa tsam yang yod ma yin// de bas nga yi don rtogs phyir// gus pa'i yid kyis
250b6(1): mnyan par gyis// zhes bka' stsal to// de nas yum chen mo kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan he ru// 'di ltar bdag dang gzhan gyi chos// phyi
251a1(1): dang nang dang gsang ba dang // gsang ba chen pos rab bsdus pa'i// b+ha ga 'di la ci phyir dga'// phyogs dang ris kyi khyad par gang // 'od lnga kha dog ci yi phyir// bsam pa'i 'bras bu rtsa ba
251a2(1): dang // nus pa rnams ni gang las byung / khams dang byed pa las ni ci// khyab pa dbang dang bcas pa gang // rgyu dang rkyen gyis ci zhig bya// bag la nyal ba gang lta bu// kun nas ldang ba'i chos nyid kyi// shes
251a3(1): par bya ba ci zhig yin// phung po lnga zhes gang la bya// stobs lnga zhes pa su la mnga'// su zhig grol bar 'gyur ba yin// yul lnga yang ni gang zhig yin// 'dod spyad bsrung ba ji lta bu// blang dor bsgrub pa ji lta/
251a4(1): bu// spyod pa'i yon tan yan lag dang / ma 'dres chos kyi khyad par rnams// khyod las snang ba ci yi phyir// zhing dang zhing gi bkod pa dang / 'khor lo rdzogs pa gang las byung // kha sbyor bde ba gang gi phyir// ci
251a5(1): phyir thabs dang shes rab kyis// so sor rang la rdzogs par 'gyur// rang gi rig pa'i snang ba gang // ma lus snang ba'i don ched ci// de lta bu la gzhan dag gis// thob par bya ba'i thabs ni gang // bdag cag
251a6(1): rnams la legs par ston// zhes gsol to// gleng gzhi mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das mngon rdzogs rgyal po bla med he ru ka chen po des/ sprul pa'i cho 'phrul
251b1(1): mngon par spyod pa'i don du thugs rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku drag shul spyod pa'i cha lugs 'jigs byed chen po rab tu 'bar bar bstan nas gsung gi nga ro drag po'i
251b2(1): shugs phyung ba'i sgra chen pos gang bar mdzad do// de nas de'i tshe nam mkha'i khams kyi gtos thams cad sku'i rang bzhin gyis khyab cing / gsung gi brda'i sgra chen por grags la/ thugs zhi ba byang chub kyi sems
251b3(1): kyis dgongs nas bka' stsal pa// nyon cig srid pa'i rgyal mo che// khyod ni mu kha le zhes bya// sku yi dbu dang tsit+ta la// zhal lnga rtse mo lngar snang zhing // phyag bzhi zhabs brgyad mkha' bzhi dbyings// phyogs bzhi
251b4(1): dbus dang lnga ru grags/ shar lho nub byang dbus dag gi/ mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal lnga las// dkar zhing 'tsher dang sngo la gdangs// dmar bzhad ldang gtsigs mthing nag khro// ljags kun rdo rje rtse dgu
251b5(1): dang // rin chen ke ke ru 'bar zhing // pad+ma dgu brtsegs rgya gram can// 'khor lo rtsibs stong ldan par snang // bskyed dang bsreg dang bzlum pa dang // g.yo zhing khyab par byin gyis brlabs// shel gser ke
251b6(1): ke ru dag dang // in+d+ra nI la bai DUr+ya// 'od 'phros khyod kyi ral pa'i tshogs// bde gshegs rdo rje rin po che// chags pa dang ni phrin las kyi/ so so'i rigs kyi dam pa'o// thugs mchog rigs pa skye med
252a1(1): dbyings// rnam shes ye shes lnga 'byung srid// sbas pa gnyis dang phyag bzhi yis// pha rol phyin pa drug rdzogs nas// gtso mo drug rnams dbang sdud cing // bdud rtsi lnga la rol cing spyod// rnam
252a2(1): par thar pa'i zhabs brgyad rdzogs// blon mo brgyad kyis dran byed brdzis// mkha' bzhi phyogs bzhi dus bzhir gnas// cha snyoms byed pa gcig yin te// brtan dang smin dang gsher ba dang // skyed byed yangs
252a3(1): pa'i bdag nyid de// drod 'dzin brlan rtsub yangs pa yis// shel dang mar gad pad+ma dang // nI la bai DUr+ya dag go/ gsang ba'i mkha' la 'od 'bar zhing // rdo rje rin chen bye ru dang // lcags zangs ze 'bru'i rnam
252a4(1): pa las// dus chen bzhi dang 'byung ba lnga// gtso bo'i sku yi phyed kyis sbyor// so so'i rigs su snang zhing 'dus// de bas mu kha le zhes bya// gsang ba'i bde chen 'byung ba'i gnas// skye dang 'chi las rab 'das
252a5(1): shing // de la sdug bsngal yongs med pas// mya ngan 'das ma shes kyang bya// blang bya dor bya med pa yis// kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang bya// rnam par shes pa ma lus pa'i// mthar son pha rol phyin ma'o// phyi nang
252a6(1): gsang ba'i 'byung ba'i tshogs// rang bzhin sku las 'byung bas na// rang byung rgyal mo'ang khyod yin no// dus bzhi dbyings las shar bas na// 'byung ba dus bzhi cha snyom ma'o// srid pa'i rgyal mo'ang khyod nyid
252b1(1): do// rigs kyi gtso bo mkhar nub pas// rigs kyi gtso mo nyid yin no// nam mkha'i khams kun khyab pa yis// nam mkha'i rgyal mo'ang khyod nyid yin// pho dang mo dang ma ning dang // rgyal po rje dang bran dang
252b2(1): dmangs// rang gi ngang gis skye 'gro'i bdag/ ma yi tshul gyis thams cad bskyed// mo yis tshul gyis thams cad sdud// ma skyes skye ba med pa'i dbyings// mi 'gag 'gag pa med pa'i klong // ma ni thabs mchog
252b3(1): 'dod med mkha'// mo ni shes rab chags med klong // de bas khyod ni mu kha le// skyed pa'i ma mo chen mo ste// rtag par gnas pa'i bu mo la// sems drod chu rlung bkrag las bskyed// mkha' dang dbyings kyi
252b4(1): dradangs ma'o// kun gzhi yid kyi rnam par shes// nyon mongs yid dang sgo lnga yis// rnam par shes pa bsam pa yin// chags sdang rmongs dang sred pa dang // bsnyems pa las ni rtsa bar 'gyur// rgyud lnga'i 'gro ba
252b5(1): gnas skabs dang // dag pa'i sku lnga mthar thug gi/ 'bras bu'i tshul snang ba yin no// de yis don gnyis nus par 'gyur// dngos po rten dang g.yo ba dang // 'phel 'grib rang gi khams yin no// gzugs
252b6(1): rtogs 'gyur ba skye ba dang // 'gag pa dang ni byed pa yin// tshims shing ldang dang 'gro ba dang // 'byung dang 'jig par byed pa'i las// las dang skye ba sems dang chos// dngos dang bsam pas rab tu
253a1(1): khyab// ma yengs spro ba shes pa dang // myur dang rig pa dbang po mchog/ skyod cing byed pa sdig pa skyes// skal ba mnyam dang kun 'gro bas// ma lus rgyu zhes bya ba yin// bdag dang dmigs pa de
253a2(1): ma thag/ lus dang bsam pa rkyen du 'gyur// khams dang shes rigs las nyon mongs// rang bzhin gyis ni bag la nyal// 'du byed dmigs yul rnam par spros// bde sdug rtog pa kun nas ldang // sems las
253a3(1): snang ba yon tan dang // gzhi shes de yi rang bzhin no// gzugs tshor 'du shes 'du byed dang // rnam shes ma dag phung po ste// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab dang // rnam par grol dang ye shes kyis// rang
253a4(1): bzhin shes pa dag pa'i tshogs// dad pa'i mchog dang 'dzin pa dang // dran pa bzang dang shes rab dang // stobs lnga dag kyang de yi dngos// phung po lnga dang rigs dang las// 'dzin pa las grol yon tan
253a5(1): tshogs// gzugs sgra dri ro reg pa dag/ yul lngar snang ba 'dod cing spyod// dbang po'i bye brag tha dad de// sbyor sgrol ma byin len pa dang // rdzun dang ngag brlang spyad pa lnga// lus ngag yid kyi bya ba las// sdom
253a6(1): dang slob dang spang ba las// bsnyen dang bsgrub pa bsrung ba ste// dman pa'i yul dang bsten pa'i rdzas// gsang ba'i spyod pa grogs dang bcas// dge bcu yan lag phra dang bcas// don chen mthar thug blang
253b1(1): bar bya// 'jig rten chos dang de bzlog pa// dor bar bya ba nyid yin no// thun mong ba dang mchog gyur dang // rang gzhan don dang spyir 'gro dag/ bsgrub par gsungs pa nga nyid yin// gnas skabs gsum
253b2(1): dang mthar thug gnyis// bsgrub par bya ba'i 'bras bu lnga// yon tan tshogs su gyur pa'o// de dag gis ni phan par bsgrub// yan lag dag tu snang ba yin// bdag dang gzhan dang bar ma dang / dman pa mchog
253b3(1): gi spyod pa ste// rigs dang las dang rtogs pa dag/ gnas dang rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams// ma 'dres pa yi mchog yin no// gzhan yang srid dang zhi ba dang // 'khor ba pa dang mya ngan 'das// phyi dang nang du
253b4(1): brtags pa dang // sems dang sems las byung ba dang // rig dang ma rig yod med mtha'// rtag dang chad dang 'gro dang 'ong // skye 'gag gnas dang stong pa dang // rgyu dang lam dang 'bras bu yis// nus pa
253b5(1): dang ni yon tan tshogs// phrin las ma lus spyod pa rnams// thams cad khyod kyi rang bzhin te// de bas mu kha le zhes bya// khyod kyi 'byung ba spros pa'i dngos// 'jig rten srid pa snang ba'i gzugs// 'pho
253b6(1): 'jug bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid la// sa bon tshul du gnas pa las// rang gi thig le mnyam sbyar nas// dmigs med rnam dag ting nge 'dzin// skye med chos kyi dbyings su thim// dngos med bag chags rnam pa
254a1(1): las// de bzhin nyid kyi bsgom pa'o// de nyid mtshams su sbyar ba las// snying rje nam mkha' lta bur khyab// ma lus kun la khyab cing snang // khyod kyi sems kyi rnam pa las// rgyu yi mchog gyur hUM
254a2(1): gi dngos// mi 'gyur rtsa ba 'od kyi gzhi// khyod kyi nam mkha'i ngo bo las// e zhes snang ba stong pa'i bdag/ khyod kyi drod kyi ngo bo las// raM zhes bya ba 'bar ba'i 'od// khyod kyi dbugs kyi ngo bo las// yaM zhes
254a3(1): bya ba bskyod cing 'degs// khyod kyi chu yi ngo bo las// khaM shes bya bas dag cing tshims// khyod kyi sha yi ngo bo las// suM zhes bya ba brtan pa'i gzhi// khyod kyi rus pa'i ngo bo las// ko zhes bya ba gnas pa'i
254a4(1): sa// khyod kyi b+ha ga'i dbyings phyug las// b+ha ga bcom ldan bde chen po// pad+ma 'khor lo gsang ba'i dbyings// sa bon lnga dang bcu bzhi las// gtso chen sprul pa lnga bcu brgyad// ye shes snying po bla na med// bla
254a5(1): med khrag 'thung dpal gyi yab// 'jigs byed gsang ba'i rdo rje ni// mkha' 'gro kun gyi rter zhes bya// mkha' klong bde ba'i lam mchog ni// skye 'gro srid pa thar pa'i lam// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa'i
