254a6(1): phyir// mnyam gzhag ye shes pad+ma'i dbyings// mi dmigs pa las dmigs pa che// bcom ldan chu skyes dkyil 'khor ni// thabs las dbyings phyug bla na med// bdud rtsi chen po char du 'phro// byang chub sems
254b1(1): kyi thig le las// sbyor mdzad gnyis med bde ba che// mkha' 'gro brtan ma'i sems mchog ma// mi 'jigs pa yi 'bru gsum gyis// dug gsum dbyings su stongs byed cing // pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya las//
254b2(1): mchod sbyin rtag tu rgyas mdzad ma// mtshon du med pa'i sku mdog la// dkar la dag pa'i na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul zhabs bzhi brkyang bskums bzhugs// mkha' 'gro yang gsal sems ma'i mchog/ thogs
254b3(1): pa med pa'i dbu gsum gyis// khams gsum thig le'i sgo 'byed cing // sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' ljang gu bai DUr+ya// rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang mthar son phyag/ mkha' 'gro mnyen gsal sems
254b4(1): ma'i mchog/ rol pa chen po'i dbu gsum gyis// srid gsum thar pa'i sgo 'byed cing // dmigs pa med pa'i sku mdog la// dmar po dbang gi na bza' gsol// rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang mthar son phyag/ 'od
254b5(1): gsal 'bar ma sems ma'i mchog/ stobs dang ldan pa'i dbu gsum gyi// srid gsum thar pa'i sgo 'byed cing // snang du med pa'i sku mchog la// rin chen ne la'i na bza' brgyan// phyag drug gdengs shing
254b6(1): zhabs bzhi bgrad// mkha' 'gro bkrag gsal sems ma'i mchog/ 'gyur ba med pa'i dbu gsum gyi// sku gsum 'bras bu'i sgo 'byed cing // cir yang gsal ba'i sku mdog la// btso ma gser mdog na
255a1(1): bza' gsol// pha rol phyin pa'i phyag drug dang // rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i zhabs dang ldan// sa yi bdag dang gnod pa sbyin// chu bdag gshin rje brgyan byin dag/ rdzu 'phrul zhabs kyis brdzis par
255a2(1): snang // kun kyang bla med gdan yin no// rdo rjes b+han+da dkrug mdzad cing // dgra sta gtun shing brdeg pa dang // seng ge mchog chen 'dzin pa'o// pad+ma b+han+da dkrug pa dang // zhags pas bcings dang tri shUl
255a3(1): 'phen// ce spyang dang ni zhing chung stob// rgya gram b+han+da 'bar ba dang // dbyug pa dang ni rgyu phreng 'dzin// sbyang ki dang ni zhing chung stod// rin chen b+han+da 'bar ba dang // me dpal dang ni dbyug to 'phyar// stag mo
255a4(1): dang ni zhing chung stod// 'khor lo b+han+da 'bar ba dang // rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin pa yis// 'ug pa dang ni zhing chung stob// mche ba gtsigs shing 'jigs pa che// bzhad pa'i tshul gyis snying rjer ldan// khyod kyi lus
255a5(1): las bskyed pa yis// srid pa gsum du bde 'gro zhing // khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ma// mthing nag 'bar ba'i sku mdog la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang pos 'khor lo rin po
255a6(1): che// bar mas g.yang gzhi b+han dmar stob// tho ba ga'u lcags kyu 'dzin// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// mdog dkar sprin gyi na bza' can// 'ja' tshon spel ma'i cha ga can// lcags zangs 'khar ba'i snyings
255b1(1): zhags 'phen// nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// dkar mo shel gyi go zu can// lag na shel gyi spu gri 'dzin// khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog nag mo thod khrag 'dzin// bdud rtsi bde sbyor khros ma
255b2(1): ni// dmar nag bdud rtsi'i bum pa 'dzin// srid gsum 'tsho byed khros ma ni// ser mo zhing lpags g.yang gzhi gsol// srid pa kun gyi rgyas byed ma// dkar mo skra yi zhags pa thogs/ dbyings phyug rgyal mo zhes
255b3(1): bya ba/ sngon mo zhing gi dbyug pa thogs// srid pa'i bdag nyid chen mo ni// dmar mo rgyu ma'i zhags pa 'dzin// nam mkhar gcig pur spyod pa ni// ser mo g.yang gzhi chen po brdeb// dkar mo mig gcig ces
255b4(1): bya dang // mthing nag mche ba can gyi bdag/ dmar mo chen mo dbang gi rgyal// ser mo las kyi bdag mo che// b+han+da zlum po sul mang dang // lcang lo can dang rgya gram thogs// srid pa thams cad chags byed
255b5(1): ma// mthing nag g.yang gzhi rlon pa gyon// mchog chen snying rlon 'dzin cing za// srid pa kun gyi cha snyoms ma// dmar mo stag lpags rlon pa bgos// thod pa khrag bkang 'dzin par byed// 'dod khams gtso mo
255b6(1): chen mo ni// sngon mo stag gi g.yang gzhi gsol// lag na khram shing nag po 'dzin// ma mo e ka dza ti ma/ dkar mo sprin dkar 'ja' tshon bgos// kha T+wAM ga dang ti ra 'dzin// gling bzhi stong gi spyi phud ma//
256a1(1): dkar mo shel gyi na bza' can// lcags kyu 'od 'phro 'dzin cing dgug/ rin chen ri rab srid 'debs ma// sngon mo mu tig go zu can// rin chen g.yu yi ga'u 'dzin// rdo rje pad+ma gar dbang
256a2(1): ma// dmar ser mdog la go zu can// thod pa khrag bkang lcang lo 'dzin// har ting dkar mo dun ting nag/ shan ting dmar mo grub ting ser// dkar nag dmar ser go zu can// 'byung ba bzhi yi dkyil
256a3(1): 'khor 'dzin// skam pa mo dang phor thogs ma/ g.yang gzhi ma dang za ba ma/ gsod byed ma dang za byed ma/ snom byed ma zhes bya ba rnams// dkar dang sngo dang dmar dang ser/ rang gi mdog ldan go zu
256a4(1): gon// thod khrag dang ni mtshon cha thogs// mche gtsigs ma dang kha 'byams ma// mchu 'jib ma dang rkang ldag ma// dkar nag dmar ser thod khrag 'dzin// lha dang gshin rje klu gnod ni// dkar sngo dmar
256a5(1): ser srin mo bzhi// rdo rje thod khrag sbrul zhags dang / ne'u le'i rkyal pa rin chen 'dzin// 'di dag kyang ni ma lus kun// nga las byung zhing khyod la snang / de lus rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ste// rab tu grub par
256a6(1): bya ba yang // phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ ma lus 'dir ni shes pa dang / rang bzhin srid pa'i dkyil 'khor de// gnyis med ye shes dbab par bya// gsang chen sems kyi dkyil 'khor de// rtsa bar
256b1(1): gnas pa'i nyon mongs drug/ dbyings chen drug tu dbab par bya// rten cing 'brel 'byung chos bcu gnyis// bya byed yid chos rtog par bcas// rje dpon mo ni bcu bzhir dbab// sems las byung ba'i rtog pa
256b2(1): dag/ de dag ma lus 'khor du skye// de nyid der shes dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid kyang ni yang dag pa'i// dngos po'i mtshan ma ngang gis stong // dbyings las 'char zhing dbyings la thim// gnyis su med cing
256b3(1): gnyis su snang // du ma las ni gcig dang bral// zhi ba dben pa rtag cing bde// bdag med stong zhing mtshan ma med// smon med mngon par 'dus ma byas// thams cad shes shing thams cad snang // ma bcos
256b4(1): snying po bsam mi khyab// rigs kyi rgyal po rtags pa'i gzhi// tshogs kyi gtso mo srid pa'i bdag/ de las dman pa'i rigs can dag/ rang gi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dgug/ gnyis med bsten pa'i sbyor ba'i
256b5(1): chos// cho ga mnyam pa nyid du bya// gnyis su snang ba tsam gyi phyir// sgo lnga'i ngo bo gsum dag gis// mnyes pa chen po ma lus bya// ji ltar rig pa de nyid kyis// sku gsung thugs mnyes gyur pa yin// byang chub
256b6(1): sems kyi char chen dbab// gang la gang gis rtog pa yi// ngo bo de nyid brtags par bya// brjod pa ma lus de bzhin te// snying po sngags su shes pa yin// de ltar khyod kyis he ru ka/ srid pa'i rang bzhin rdzogs
257a1(1): shes na// mngon rdzogs bla med go 'phang 'thob// ces bka' stsal to// mu kha le'i rang bzhin srid pa'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid
257a2(1): kyis// nang gi lus la gnas pa ni// rtsa phran bye ba phrag brgya las// gnas pa stong phrag bdun cu gnyis// bsdus pas brgya dang nyi shu ste// 'khor lo'i rtsa ba bzhi la gnas// de nyid rnam pa gsum du
257a3(1): gnas// g.yas g.yon gyi ni dbu ma'o// mi bskyod snang ba mtha' yas dang // sems dpa' chen po kun sbyor te// dngas ma gsum gyi rang bzhin rgyu// yan lag dag tu grags pa yang // steng gi tshangs pa'i
257a4(1): gnas dag tu// sum cu rtsa gnyis rab tu gnas// 'og ma gnod pa bskyod pa'i gnas// grong khyer drug cu dag tu grags// me yi srid pa brgyad nyid ni// rnam par shes pa'i rten can no// ngan 'gro srid pa dgu po
257a5(1): ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i rnam grangs te// rtsib ma dang ni dra ba dang // pad+ma khri'u lta bu ste// rang bzhin gcig cing tha dad to// ma he a ho ngo bo dag/ rang gi rigs kyi kha dog ldan// g.yas dang g.yon dang zung 'jug
257a6(1): dang // thabs dang shes rab dbu ma ste// dkar dang ser dang mtshon du med// nyi ma zla ba 'dres dang bskyod// bde ba che dang longs spyod rdzogs// chos dang sprul pa zhes bya ba// ri rab dang ni dpag bsam
257b1(1): shing // nyi ma zla ba'i mtshams na gnas// rgya mtsho'i gting du gnas pa ni// rgod ma'i kha yi me 'byung ba'i// ri rab nub tu bzhugs nas ni// gnas skabs bzhi dang brgyad kyis so// de dag bzhon pa lnga yin
257b2(1): te// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag gi/ de dag bcu dang nyi shu dang // bzhi bcu brgyad cu brgya drug cu// rim gyis nyi khri chig stong dang // drug brgya la sogs bsam mi khyab// rnam par shes pa'i tshogs kun dang // skyes
257b3(1): bu dang ni de bzhin du// lhan cig gnas pas gnyis med de// don chen ma lus sgrub byed pa'i// rtsa bar gyur pa zhes bya ste// las kun byed pa yan lag yin// rtsa bzhi dbus dang lnga las ni// dngas ma yum chen
257b4(1): gtso mo lnga// nyi zla dang ni rgya mtsho dang // rang gi dngos dang brgyad yin no// khros ma bzhi dang sgeg ma bzhi// rgyan byed ma bzhi bcu gnyis dang // gtso mo bzhi dang bcu drug gi/ 'dod pa spyod pa'i 'khor lo
257b5(1): rdzogs// srid pa 'di dag thams cad kun// chags par byed dang snyoms pa dang // gcig tu gnas dang spro ba dang // nam mkha'i khams kyi rgyal mo dang // 'dod pa khams kyi gtso mo dang // gling bzhi stong gi spyi
257b6(1): phud dang // srid pa 'degs byed rin chen ma// gar gyi dbang mo gnyis las ni// srid pa'i gzhi 'dzin brgyad yin no// phyogs bzhir gru 'degs byed ma dang // las kyi dmag dpon chen mo bzhi// bcu drug
258a1(1): gis ni sum cu bzhi// gzugs khams pa yi 'khor lo'o// las kyi srin mo brgyad dang bzhi// dbang chen bzhi dang gdong mo bzhi// sa bdag mo dang ma mo brgyad// gsang ba gsum dang poH
258a2(1): gsum// nag po'i chung mar grags pa gsum// 'jigs byed ma mo chen mo gsum// sum bcu gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis// ngan 'gro'i srid pa dgag pa'o// drug bcu rtsa bzhi'i 'khor lo rdzogs// bya dang byed pa
258a3(1): bdag po gsum// kun gyi bzhon par bcas pa ni// ri rab dang ni yongs 'du'i shing // srog shing tshul du gnas pa yin// 'di dag ma lus khyod kyi lus// dkyil 'khor bzhi yi bdag nyid kyis// phyi yi don du
258a4(1): snang ba yin// longs spyod 'dod spyod dkyil 'khor la// dbyings drug lha drug rtsa ba ste// nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// de yi 'khor du gtogs pa ste// ri rab steng gi 'khor lo yi// gnas chen bsam gtan
258a5(1): bzhi la ni// bcu drug rang gi bdag po ste// bya dang byed pa'i tshul gnyis kyis// sum cu rtsa gnyis 'dod pa bsdus// drug cu bzhi la zug rngu med// bde chen 'bras bu'i 'khor lo rdzogs// gling bzhi dang ni gling
258a6(1): phran brgyad// lam rten chen po 'dzin pas ni// 'dzam bu gling du grags pa la// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya rdzogs// dmyal ba'i srid pa nyi shu dang // de yi nyon mongs nyi shur bcas// dbyings gnas pa dang 'thor
258b1(1): ba dang // sgrib pa gnyis bcas drug cu bzhi// nyon mongs las ni sprul pa yis// rab tu 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs// phyi yi rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi// lugs su byung dang bzlog pa yis// gnas dang yul du
258b2(1): snang ba ste// nyi shu rtsa bzhi kun la khyab// lus la rdzogs pa phyi dang nang / tshul de ma rtogs gzhan ma yin// rnal 'byor chen po grol ba'i tshul// 'khor lo bzhi la gang gnas pa// sad ldog 'bar 'dral 'du zhing
258b3(1): 'char// zag med bskyed pas bde bar 'gyur// rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gcig gis// pha rol skye ba bar ma do// drug gam bdun gyis slong bar brjod// de nyid g.yo dang rang gi khams// gzugs brnyan dag dang
258b4(1): gsum yin te// 'phar dang 'phro dang brtan pa dang // thod rgal rab tu 'bar ba'o// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag lnga// ngo bo ming gi bye brag go/ bsam gtan srog rtsol dbugs rngub dang // sdud dang 'dzin pa'i ting
258b5(1): nge 'dzin// ldang 'jug gnas pa gcig dang gsum// lus dang shes pa g.yo ba dang // rab 'bring za ma gsum gyi 'gyur// srog 'dzin me mnyam zur sel dang // gyen du rgyu dang khyab par byed// chos dang sprul
258b6(1): pa gsang ba dang // longs spyod bde chen dbang gi gnas// 'brel 'ju 'dzin 'phro rgyu ba'i las// zug rngu sgra 'byin 'gro 'od gcod// smra zhing 'khor ba 'dzin par byed// stong dang gsal dang ring ba dang / thung
259a1(1): dang bde bas lus khyab dang // gnas skabs rang gis byed par 'gyur// rgyu dang rab rgyu shin tu rgyu// mngon par rgyu dang yang dag rgyu// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// ba spu'i gnas kun khyab pa
259a2(1): ste// mthong dang thos tshor myang reg ste// bsam pa de nyid rtogs par byed// dor zhing brlab dang bsgom pa yis// rtsa ba yan lag kun la khyab// snang dang dran rtog byung rgyal dag/ mos pa lhag bsam mnyes pa
259a3(1): dang // yang dag thun mong lta ba dang // rten cing 'brel ba'i byin rlabs kyis// longs spyod snyoms 'jug bde ba bsgom// rgyas pa'i rten gyi nyi zla gnyis// g.yas g.yon mdun du ring dang zung // gsum gsum
259a4(1): dgu dang bu da dang rngubs// 'khor yug gsum gyi sbubs su sbed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor rab bsdams nas// dpag bsam shing gi yal ga bcing // nyi zla steng gi phyogs su 'phang // gling bzhi gling phran tshags su
259a5(1): gzhug/ glog dbyung 'brug sgra bsgrags par bya// glang chen stag dang sbyang ki wa// 'og ma'i gnas nas rim bzhin 'phang // rnam par grol bas lus la dgram// dbab dang bskyil dang bzlog pa dang // bgos
259a6(1): pa skye rags zhags pa dang // 'khor lo bus pa'i 'dug stangs kyi// bdud rtsi'i don du 'gyur ba'o// yul gnad dgu bcu rtsa bdun 'dra// dgu dang drug dang gcig tu bsdu// me dang thog dang shing dang srub// de
259b1(1): yi 'khor lo thig le ste// rang gi lam bzhin skyong ba'o// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gnas su byung // gtso bo brgyad kyi aM dang bcas// rab tu 'bar ba de nyid bsam// phyi nang gsang ba'i bzhon pa las// 'degs byed
259b2(1): 'byung dang snyom pa dang // 'jig dang gcod dang bying ba dang // las byed 'bigs dang kun tu khyab// dang po'i rgyu yi bye brag go/ gyen thur 'gro dang dwangs snyigs 'byed// snying rje med dang snying rje dang // snyom
259b3(1): dang 'byed dang sgom pa dag/ rten gyur byang chub sems yin no// nyi khri chig stong drug brgya dag/ 'byung dang 'jug dang gnas dang gsum// bcu drug re re skad cig ma// 'byung zhes 'gro ba 'khrul dang grol// ma
259b4(1): lus de yis byed pa'o// rgyal po pho brang 'khor 'dra bas// lus kyi dkyil 'khor las byed pa// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad de// shar lho nub byang mtshams bzhir bcas// lha klu phyogs dang zhing
259b5(1): skyongs shing // me chu shing dang sprin dang ri// sgra dang ba spu so sen mo'o// zil dang rlung dang 'phro ba yis// rang gi phrin las nges bsgrub pa// rtags dang yon tan skyed pa'i tshul// sdig dang 'bral dang spang ba
259b6(1): dang // thob dang rdzogs dang snang dang 'grub// bcom ldan b+ha ga las skyed cing // sbyang bya ba skyod bya gnas bya dag/ lnga dang bcu gsum gsum dang lnga// bdag nyid rdzogs pa der gnas so// de bas nga ni mngon
260a1(1): rdzogs pa'i// rgyal po bla na med pa'o// mu kha le zhes bya ba yang // mthar thug don gyi gzhi yin te// de nyid kho na'i bdag nyid do// zhes bka' stsal to// mu kha le phung po lus kyi dkyil 'khor
260a2(1): bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi// byang chub sems la gnas pa ni// thun mong dang ni khyad par te// don dam kun rdzob rang bzhin gyis// thabs dang shes rab
260a3(1): bdag nyid brgyud// sdom dang bsdam par bya ba dang // bslab dang shes par bya ba dag/ snang dang rtogs pa rig pa'i tshogs// sgyu ma rmi lam smig rgyu dang // mig yor sprul pa dri za'i grong // gzugs brnyan brag
260a4(1): cha sgra brnyan tshogs// ji srid tsam du mtshon pa las// skye mtha'i srid pa man chad du// smon lam tsam du dam bca' zhing // lus ngag yid kyis rab 'jug pa'i// rtsol dang bsgrub pa gang yin pa// phung pos bsdus
260a5(1): pa'i shes pa lnga// kun gzhi khyod kyi bdag nyid la// mkha' bzhi dbyings lnga nyid dang bcas// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lus dang yid rnams de yi yul// bskyed cing mched pa bcu gnyis kyi// rang bzhin bya ba
260a6(1): yid kyi dngos// bcu bzhi 'khor gyi rtsa ba ste// gzhan yang khams dang nyon mongs pa'i// nye ba las ni mngon gyur dang // kun 'gro lnga dang 'gyur ba bzhi// khyab pa gcig gis lnga bcu brgyad// gtso dang 'khor
260b1(1): gyis rab bsdus pa// thun mong sems kyi dkyil 'khor bstan// de las khyad par gyur pa ni// don dam shes pa zla ba'i gnas// byang chub sems kyi rgyal po ste// 'dod chags gtso mo yum dang bcas// mkha'
260b2(1): bzhi las ni dga' ba dang // skad cig gnas pa dbyings ma lnga// gnas skabs dang ni nus pa drug/ tshul gnyis kyis ni bcu bzhi ste// de dag 'khor du skye ba'o// de dang de las srid pa yis// brda' dang gnas
260b3(1): dang shes pa dang // phrin las byed pa la sogs kyi// rang gi chos dang longs spyod dang // bde chen sprul pa'i gnas dag tu// sgro dang bsdu dang brtan pa las// bya ba sna tshogs spyod pa dag/ chos kyi bdag tu
260b4(1): 'dzin pa grol// der snang chos kyi dbyings dkyil la// rig pa'i ye shes sna tshogs pa// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa grub// de yi 'bras bu tshul chen yang // sku drug las ni ma nor dang // ma lus mkhyen pa bcu/
260b5(1): gnyis te// don gnyis mdzad pa de dag dang // gzhan gyis rig par bya ba las// 'das byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa// gdul bar bya ba rnams la snang // dus gsum dus med rtogs pa dang // 'bad rtsol
260b6(1): bsam shes yod min zhing // gang la 'dod pa de bdag nyid// mu kha le yi chos nyid de// gsang chen sems kyi pho brang la// gab pa'i gter du snang ba ste// 'jig rten pa ru grags pa min// de bas nges bzung
261a1(1): brtag pa dang // bzlog cing dgrol bar bya ba ste// mnyam pa nyid du gang skyes pa// mnyam nyid skyes par de brjod do// snang ba dang ni sems nyid de// rgyu dang thabs dang 'bras bu dang // gzhi dang
261a2(1): lam dang rang bzhin dngos// lus dang longs spyod chud mi gson// gtong dang gzhan gyi don spyod pa// so sor 'gro bas thar pa dang // ma lus mnyam par rdzogs spyod pa// rig pa'i snying po byang chub pa// bla na
261a3(1): med pa yongs bzung zhing // rang bzhin mnyam nyid 'byung ba'i gzhi// thabs kyi gnas skabs 'bras bu gsum// stong dang mtshan ma smon pa med// rten byed lus la g.yas g.yon dbus// 'dod chags zhe
261a4(1): sdang gti mug gis// 'byung 'jug gnas dang 'du ba bzhi// phan gnod btang snyoms sbyor lags so// thog mar mnyam pa nyid du skyes// thabs kyi mnyam nyid skyes pa la// shes rab lhan cig skyes pa
261a5(1): yis// rab 'bring tha yi yul rnams la// 'du shes gsum gyis rab sbyangs te// sdug bsngal bral zhing bde ba dang // rnam par rtog pa spangs pa dang // dngos kun ma lus gsal ba yis// stobs dang drod dang
261a6(1): 'dren pa dag/ yan lag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// rigs kyi don du snang ba yis// lus dang sems kyis gzhan don spyod// mdangs ldan zhen pa ched 'dzin bral// zug rngu 'bad pa rtsol ba med// mchog gi yum dang
261b1(1): phrad nas kyang // rig pa 'dzin pa brnyes 'gyur zhing // ngan 'gro'i lus kyi rtog pa spang // skye 'chi las dang srid pa la// snga ma phyi ma rim gyis 'byung // gsang ba rig pa brtul zhugs spyod// dbang po pa las
261b2(1): sbaspags pa yis// mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i// rang bzhin yon tan rgyas pa yis// bar du gcod pa mtha' dag bzlog/ spros pa'i rtog pa nye bar zhi// 'dus ma byas shing lhun gyis grub// mtshon rdzogs
261b3(1): dpe byad 'bar ba dang // mnyam sbyor yan lag yul dang bcas// zag med bde ba rgyun mi 'chad// snying rje sreg dang mkhyen par ldan// yul snang dag pa rgud mi 'chad// mnyam nyid lhan cig skyes pa'o// rang
261b4(1): bzhin rgyu 'bras tshogs pa yis// dbyer med lhan cig skyes pa'o// nga nyid mngon du rdzogs pa ste// chos dbyings rig pa'i ye shes dang // dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med pas// dkar dmar mthing ga'i dbur
261b5(1): bstan cing // dbyings las 'gyur med mthing ga'i mdog/ bag chags 'joms byed g.yas rdo rje// chos kyi sgra sgrogs g.yon dril bu// gdug pa 'dul mdzad sbrul zhags g.yas// 'khor ba dbang sdud g.yon
261b6(1): b+han+da// dreg pa 'dul mdzad g.yas sta te// tshe grog mdangs sbed ga'u g.yon// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa zhabs bzhir bgrad// gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal phrag dog sel ba yi// glang chen mi dang stag
262a1(1): dang dom// thal ba rak+ta thod phreng dang // me ri 'bar bas brgyan pa'o// mu kha le ni dbyings kyi yum// mi 'gyur mthing nag chos kyi sku// ye shes lnga yi zhal byung zhing // 'byung ba lnga yi mkha'
262a2(1): gsang can// rdo rje dril zhags bdud rtsi g.yas// dril bu b+han+da g.yang gzhi g.yon// nyon mongs 'joms shing snying rjes 'dzin// 'chi med dngos grub stsol bar mdzad// bcud 'gyur bde ba ston pa dang // chos
262a3(1): nyid mnyam par longs spyod pa'o// zhabs brgyad rnam thar brgyad kyi ngang // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// don dam kun rdzob bden pa'i dngos// dbyer med 'du 'bral med pa dang // rgyun mi 'chad par spyod
262a4(1): pas te// don chen gab cing sbas pa'i gter// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i sku gsung thugs// dgongs pa'i khyad par gang yin pa'o// snang zhing srid pas bsdus pa dang // rnal 'byor lam gyi ye shes kyis// grol
262a5(1): zhing rtog pa ma lus dag/ shar zhing snang bar brtags pa de// mi spang mi 'geg lam mchog ste// de bas mu kha le zhes bya// zhes bka' stsal to// mu kha le gsang ba sems kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste
262a6(1): bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyis// lus la 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gang // thun mong chos su bshad pa ni// drag po sngags kyi cha byad can// phrin las mi bzad cher sbyar bas// dur khrod
262b1(1): 'jigs pa'i gnas song ste// srid pa'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten las// de dkyil mngon rdzogs he ru ka/ dbu dgu bco brgyad phyag dang ldan// chos nyid kun tu bzang mo nyid// mkha' bzhin dag pa'i rang
262b2(1): bzhin las// 'bebs dang bskyod dang skul byed ma// len tshor tshims par byed pa dag/ snom byed ma dang ma mo bdun// yab kyi rnam shes tshogs dag las// ma mo brgyad ni phyag g.yas la// yul brgyad phra men
262b3(1): phyag g.yon la'o// phra thabs bum thabs bsnams pa ni// phyag mtshan las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de yis 'jig rten dregs pa gzir// brgya byin gyi ni gdan dag la// sha las rnam snang gsal du
262b4(1): bskyed// gshin rjer drod las 'od 'bar gsal// khrag las mnyen gsal chu bdag steng // dbugs las yang gsal gnod sbyin gnon// mdun du bdud la bkrag las ni// de nyid gsal ma bskyed pa
262b5(1): yin// rgya mtsho ma dang nyi zla dang // bde chen byang chub sems rtsa las// dpal 'bar khro mo bskyed par bya// phung byed sbas pa'i ma bzhi dag/ so sor bskyed la bsgyel ba la// drangs ma bzhi las yum chen
262b6(1): mo// bde ba za byed rgyas 'debs ma// tshe 'phel ma dang rmongs byed ma'o// khros ma bzhi dang dges sde bzhi// gdan dang dbang po sgo bzhi dang // rnam shes rig par bcas pa las// khams gsum gdar sha
263a1(1): gcod ma bskyed// chags byed cha snyoms bsgyel ba la// gsang ba'i rtsa las dug gsum dag/ dbang sdud ma mo bskyed par bya// e ka dza ti spun drug la// gzhung chen rtsa las skye shi dag/ rtsa gcod
263a2(1): byed ma bskyed par bya// 'dod khams gtso mo spyan gnyis la// srog gnas pa yi rtsa la ni// pad+ma kro tI shwa rIr bskyed// nam mkha'i rgyal mo bsgyel ba la// lte bar gnas pa'i rtsa chen las// yak+ka kro ti shwa rir
263a3(1): bskyed// ma bdun gdan la snying rtsa las// rak+Sha kro tI shwa rI ma// dmag gi rgyal mo bzhi nyid dang // srid bzhi'i gdan la rkang lag bzhi// sa ma kro ti shwa rI'o// dbang phyug ma mo nyi shu brgyad// nyon mongs yid kyi
263a4(1): rnam shes las// g+hu h+ya kro tI shwa rI ma'o// bsgom bya ma mo bcu gsum la// lha chen drug cu rtsa brgyad bskyed// drag shul gdan gyi dkyil 'khor lo// mngon rdzogs rgyal po'i dbu gtsug la// rta mgo mgrin sngon
263a5(1): byung ba ni// thams cad dbang du byed pa ste// zhal nas hrIHyi sgra byung bas// thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o// nga rgyal gyi ni gdon rnams kyi// snying khrag zhal du rngub par byed// dam tshig pa la bzhag pa
263a6(1): yis// rgod cing gtong ba'i phrin las nyid// srid gsum ma mo mkha' 'gro dag/ dbang gi ma dang tshe yi bdag/ nad rims mthu dang rdzu 'phrul gyis// rang gzhan don du bsgyur ba dang // gang rigs pa las
263b1(1): dmigs pa ni// phrin las rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// spyi bdun dmag dang dpung bsdu dang // dmag drangs pa dang dpon bsko dang // ngo bslang lhag ma bsdu ba dang // mdun dpung bshigs dang gtor ba
263b2(1): dang // mchod dang dus gdab las rnams la// gcig tu dril dang so so yis// bsnyen pa dang ni 'khor lo bskor// sgo thun dbab pa brnag pa'i grogs// thams cad gzugs kyis bskang ba dang // zhi ba chen
263b3(1): por byas pa dang // dbang dang drag shul phur pa dang // phra men so sor dbye ba dang // ngan sngags thun gyis bsad pa'o// gnad la dbab pa'i blta spyod kyi// dgug pa gsum gyis gdags pa dang // ma lus
263b4(1): don la sbyar ba ni// phrin las rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rang las bsngags pa'i gnas de ru// yo byad gsum gyi phun tshogs nas// mtshan dang ldan pa'i grogs mchog dang // rnam shes rten rdzas bcu
263b5(1): gcig ldan// snod chen lcang lo yang dag ldan// rak+tar bcas dang mar me btang // shun pa'i sprin dang bla re dang // chas gos shun chen ral ga bgo/ spyi blugs zhwa dang phreng ba dang // rigs bzhi mchog gi phur pa
263b6(1): dang // stag dang glang chen bgo ba dang // sems can chen po lnga dag gi/ dbang po don snying yan lag dag/ rgyal mtshan bla re za ra tshag/ rang gi rigs dang rnam grangs mthun// mchod chen rab tu sbyar bas
264a1(1): ni// gnas dang phrin las dmigs par bya/ oM hUM badz+ra shrI he ru ka hUM a a/ oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shri he ru ka gu h+ya dz+nyA na kro tI shwa rI s+thAm/ ma ma yo gi nI ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM nyid bzhi mu kha le kro d+hi shwa rI
264a2(1): b+ha ga pad+mar+ya bde klong 'dus 'dus na snying dza/ sha yu ti ni hUM b+h+yo hUM/ A~M g+hi sa mu hUM ha/ oM dza la ram pa ha/ oM b+hi sha san ti ha/ oM b+hi yaM yaM ha/ oM ma hA lo te ha/ oM kro d+hI shwa rI b+ha ga pad+mar+ya hUM hUM/ oM badz+ra shAn ti
264a3(1): pad+ma ka ru ting b+h+yo/ AM mu tri ni b+h+yo/ au a shan tri ni b+h+yo/ au b+ha ga dun tri ni b+h+yo/ au kha mun dan tri ni b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra sur+ya bi to a to ye/ oM badz+ra pad+ma bi to a to ye/ A~M badz+ra kha rag bi to a to ye/ A~M badz+ra sring 'gro bi
264a4(1): to a to ye/ oM badz+ra a ke a ke b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra ta ko ta ke b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra nI la nI la b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra lan d+ha lan d+ha b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra dza traM mu raM shaM badz+ra dza traM mu raM shaM b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra kha rag snying kha rag ma b+h+yo/ trag rag sha trag rag
264a5(1): sha b+h+yo/ trag rag sha mu tra baM kha mu tra baM rak+Sha b+h+yo/ pra ka ra ka ti tiSh+Tha b+h+yo/ pra g+hi wa g+hi sha b+h+yo/ oM hUM ka ri ka/ ba rod+d+ha rod/ ni la chu mi ha/ kha T+wAM ga/ da la tsa la/ pad+ma tsan+da/ ma gu ra ga te/ ting saM ting saM/ e A ra li/
264a6(1): bu byi ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ trag rag sha trag rag sha b+h+yo/ a ting a ting b+h+yo/ byi ting byi ting b+h+yo/ su ting su ting b+h+yo/ yu ting yu ting b+h+yo/ badz+ra shAn+ti shin+taM b+h+yo/ badz+ra dun+ting dun+ting b+h+yo/ badz+ra ha ra ting ha ra ting b+h+yo/ badz+ra grub ting
264b1(1): grub ting b+h+yo/ te saM te saM b+h+yo/ a bar d+ha la a bar d+ha la b+h+yo/ d+ha la d+hu na d+hu na b+h+yo/ d+hi na ma ma ya sa ma ma ya sa b+h+yo/ rang gi las kyi mtha' yis te// gsang sngags thun gyis gsad dang gso// gang gis gang la
264b2(1): bsngags pa de// he ru ka yi gsung gi sgra// drag sngags bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// zhes bka' stsal to// mu kha le thun mong las kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang
264b3(1): khyod nyid kyi// sku dang mtshungs par bstod pa ni// hUM bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag zhal gsum phyag drug ste// zhal g.yas dkar ba chos kyi dbyings// g.yon dmar rig pa'i ye shes nyid// dbus
264b4(1): mthing gnyis med 'gyur ba med// phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje ni// bag chags rtog pa ma lus 'joms// bar ma dril bu chos sgra sgrogs// tha ma sbrul zhags gdug pa 'dul// g.yon gyi dang po b+han+da ni// 'khor ba
264b5(1): zhal du rngub cing gsol// bar ma g.yang gzhi ma tshogs 'dul// tha ma ga'u bkrag mdangs sbed// rdzu 'phrul zhabs kyi bdud bzhi gnon// dur khrod chas brgyad rdzogs pa ni// sa brgya mnan pa'i rtog pa
264b6(1): 'dul// kun tu bzang mo mu kha le// dbu gcig zhal ni phyogs bzhir gzigs// sku gcig mkha' gsang phyogs bzhir bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag 'gyur ba med// chos kyi sku yi dbu gcig las// ye
265a1(1): shes lnga yis kun tu gzigs// pha rol phyin drag phyag rgya las// dang po rdo rje dril bu bsdams// nyon mongs 'joms shing chos sgra sgrogs// bar ma dril zhags b+har+d+ha ni// khams gsum spros bral
265a2(1): sa la 'god// za ma bdud rtsi g.yang gzhi yis// thugs rje longs spyod mnyam par mdzad// mkha' bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khril// rigs lnga gcig tu skyed cing sdud// zhabs brgyad dregs pa'i lha brgyad
265a3(1): gzir// rnam par thar brgyad lam la 'god// gnyis su med pa'i 'phro 'du las// byang chub sems kyi sprin tshogs las// ye shes ma mo 'char zhing 'phro// las kyi ma mo rgod cing gtong // sprul pa'i ma mo mchod
265a4(1): cing lha// mngon rdzogs yab yum sku la bstod// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// sku mdog dkar mo shel ltar dag/ dkar la dag pa'i na bza' gsol// dbu
265a5(1): gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mi 'jigs seng ge'i gdong dang ldan// dang po rdo rje b+han+da 'bar// bar ma dgra sta gtun shing brdeg/ tha ma seng ge mchog chen snyod// zhabs bzhi brgya byin steng nas
265a6(1): bgrad// lho phyogs mkha' 'gro ba glang gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od 'bar gsal// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' mthing sngon bai DUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po rin
265b1(1): chen b+han+da 'bar// bar ma me dpal dbyug to bsnams// tha ma stag mo zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhi gshin rje'i steng na bgrad// nub phyogs mkha' 'gro sud ka'i gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo mnyen gsal ma// sku
265b2(1): mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dmar mo dbang gis mdzes// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po pad+ma b+han+da 'bar// bar ma zhags pa tri shU la// tha ma ce sbyang zhing chung stod// zhabs
265b3(1): bzhi chu bdag steng na bgrad// byang gi mkha' 'gro khyung chen gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// sku mdog ljang gu 'bar ba la// na bza' ljang gu bai DUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
265b4(1): bgrad// dang po rgya gram b+han+d+ha bsnams// bar ma dbyug tho rgyu phreng 'dzin// tha ma sbyang mo zhing chung stod// zhabs bzhi gnod sbyin steng du bgrad// nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro rdo rje mchu// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag
265b5(1): gsal mnyam// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' ser po btso ma gser// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dang po 'khor lo b+han+da 'bar// bar ma rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin// tha ma 'ug pa
265b6(1): zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhi bdud kyi steng na bgrad// yum chen rtag pa'i rgyal mo lnga// dbyings kyi yum la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma chen srid pa bde 'gro ma// khams gsum kun gyi yum mchog ste/ sku mdog
266a1(1): mthing nag 'bar ba la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag g.yas dang po 'khor lo bskor// bar ma g.yang gzhi bsnams shing
266a2(1): brde ba// tha ma tshe yi ga'u sbed// g.yon gyi dang po rin po che// bar ma b+han+da dmar gyis bkang // tha ma lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams// zhabs kun brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// ma gcig nyi zla zod phreng
266a3(1): can// sku mdog dkar mo 'od dang bcas// sprin dkar brtsegs pa'i na bza' can// 'ja' tshon 'od kyi cha ga can// nyi zla stong gi dbu zod can// phyag g.yas zangs lcags dkar nag la// snying gis bzlas
266a4(1): pa'i zhags pa 'phen// g.yon pas nyi zla'i zhags pa 'phen// zhabs gnyis brjid pa'i tshul gyis bzhugs// nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dkar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' shel gyi go zu
266a5(1): gsol// phyag na shel gyi sgra gri bsnams// khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' gsu yi go za gsol// phyag na zod khrag 'dzin cing gsol// bdud rtsi khros pa'i dbang
266a6(1): mo che// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' le brgan go zu gsol// phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// srid gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' ser po gser
266b1(1): ltar 'tsher// phyag na rgyal mtshan zhing lpags bsnams// dkar mo srid pa'i rgyan byed ma// lag na skra yi zhags pa thogs// sngon mo dbyings phyug rgyal mo ni// zhing gi dbyig pa phyag na bsnams// dmar po
266b2(1): bdag nyid chen mo ni// phyag na rgyu ma'i zhags pa bsnams// ser mo chen mo gcig spyod ma// phyag na zhing gi g.yang gzhi brde ba// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// phyag na b+han+da zlum po bsnams// nag mo chen mo
266b3(1): mche ba can// phyag na b+han+da sul mang thogs// dmar mo chen mo dbang sdud ma// phyag na b+han+da lcang lo thogs// ser mo chen mo tshe 'phel ma// phyag na thod pa rgya gram thogs// las kyi srid pa chags byed ma// sku
266b4(1): mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' g.yang gzhi rlon pa gsol// phyag na tsit+ta 'bar ba bsnams// rnal 'byor srid pa cha snyoms ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// stag lpags rlon pa'i na bza'
266b5(1): gsol// lag na zod pa khrag bkang thogs// ma mo e ka dzA Ti ma// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na bza' sprin gyi go za gsol// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// kha T+wAM dang ni zhing chen
266b6(1): bsnams// 'dod khams gtso mo chen mo ni// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// sku stod stag gi g.yang gzhi la// sku smad zangs kyi gleng mas g.yogs// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing thogs// gling bzhi spyi phud bdag
267a1(1): mo ni// dkar mo sgeg pa'i cha byad can// na bza' shel gyi go zu gsol// phyag na lcags kyu 'od 'phro thogs// rin chen srid 'debs chen mo ni// sku mdog sngon mo chen mo la// mu tig khu 'phang
267a2(1): go zu gsol// phyag na g.yu yi ga'u thogs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku yi cha byad dmar mo la// le brgan dmar mo'i go zu gsol// phyag na thod phrag bsnams shing gsol// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug
267a3(1): ma// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' gser gyi go zu gsol// phyag na zod khrag lcang lo thogs// ma mo ha ra ting dkar mo ni// sku la shel gyi go zu gsol// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub
267a4(1): ting ser mo chen mo ni// sku la gser gyi go zu gsol// lag na sa yi dkyil 'khor thogs// shAn ting dmar mo chen mo ni// sku la bye ru'i go zu gsol// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun ting nag mo
267a5(1): chen mo ni// sku la g.yu yi go zu gsol// lag na rlung gi dkyil 'khor thogs// srin mo chen mo skam pa mo// sku mdog dkar mo go zu can// lag na shel phur b+han+da thogs// srin mo chen mo phor thogs ma// sku
267a6(1): mdog sngon mo go zu can// phyag na thod phrag bsnams shing gsol// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi ma// sku mdog dmar mo go zu can// phyag na b+han+da thod sbram thogs// srin mo chen mo za ba mo// dmar mo phyag na
267b1(1): lpags rlon thogs// srin mo chen mo gsod byed ma// ser mo b+han+da ral gri thogs// srin mo chen mo ze byed ma// ser nag b+han+da lcags kyu thogs// srin mo chen mo snom byed ma// dkar mo b+han+da rlon
267b2(1): pa thogs// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// phyag na thod pa dkar po thogs// lho yi nag po kha 'byams ma// phyag na b+han+da sngon po thogs// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// phyag na b+han+da dmar
267b3(1): po thogs// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// phyag na b+han+da ser po thogs// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring // dkar mo rdo rje rtse gsum thogs// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring // sngon mo phyag na thod
267b4(1): dbyug thogs// dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring // dmar mo sbrul nag zhags pa thogs// nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring // ser mo ne le'i rkyal pa thogs// ma mo chen mo 'di rnams kyang // ye shes sngon du
267b5(1): brnyes byas kyang // phrin las tshogs kyi gtso bo ste// thugs ni dbyings las 'gyur ba med// gsung ni grag stong chos kyi gsung // sku ni sna tshogs sprul pa'i sku// yon tan ma lus phun sum tshogs// phrin las
267b6(1): drag shul gdug pa 'dul// res 'ga' 'jig rten srid pa'i tshul// res 'ga' gab sbas gsang ba'i tshul// res 'ga' rnal 'byor grol ba'i tshul// res 'ga' drag po sngags kyi tshul// kun kyang dur khrod chas
268a1(1): kyis brgyan// ma mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal bstod// ces bka' stsal to// mu kha le lus kyi dkyil 'khor la bstod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi// sku
268a2(1): gsung thugs kyi dgongs pa dag/ ma lus bskang bar bya ba yang // phyi ru thams cad gzugs kyis bskang // ri rab ri bdun bcas pa dang // gling bzhi gling phran bcas pa dang // rgya mtsho 'khor yug bcas pa
268a3(1): dag/ 'dod khams lha dang shes ldan mi// mkha' lding bya dang 'dab chags tshal// cang shes rta dang theg chen glang // shel dkar lug la tshe tshe ra// gcan gzan gdug pa zhe sdang khyi// mkha' la rgyu dang sa las
268a4(1): skyes// chu la gnas dang sa 'og 'dzul// sgra dang dri ro reg par bcas// ji ltar 'byor pa kun gyis bskang // nang du ma hA su khas bskang // lus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas pa bzhi// byang chub sems dpa'i pho brang
268a5(1): tshogs// bskyed dang srog dang rtsol ba dang // spel dang bsdu dang snyoms 'jug dang // 'jug pa gnas shing ldang ba dang // dbab dang bskyil dang bzlog dang dgram// bzung dang rang gnas dgram pa ni// de
268a6(1): dag bskang ba'i mchog yin no// gsang ba dbyings kyi ngang du bskang // snang ba dang ni stong pa ste// thabs dang shes rab nyid kyis so// bde ba'i rnam pa gsal ba ste// gsal ba de ni mi rtog pa'o// mi rtog pa ni
268b1(1): ye shes kyi// ye shes de ni dbyings kyis so// ma lus pa ni des bskangs pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa mnyes// yon tan tshogs su bskang ba yang // skyes pa'am ni
268b2(1): bud med kyis// ti ra rgyu mchog mtshan ldan de// phyi nang khrus kyis dag byas te// shes pa dag gis byin brlabs nas// lus kyis mngon rdzogs rgyal po ste// yid kyis mu kha le khyed nyid// rnam snang mdzad pa
268b3(1): rus pas te// 'od 'bar gsal ma drod kyis so// khrag gis mnyen gsal ma nyid de// yang dag gsal ma dbugs kyis so// gzhan yang don snying nang rol dang // dbang po yan lag nying lag gis// ma mo
268b4(1): tshogs dang bcas pa yi// sku gsung bcas pa ma lus bskang // phrin las khyad par las kyi mchog/ bsgrub pa'i don phyir bsgral ba'i rgyu// srog mdangs ji snyed gnas pa yis// phrin las bdag mo de dag
268b5(1): bskang // bsgrub pa chen po rkun du ni// bskyed dang dgug dang gzhug pa dang // bcing dang gnyis su med pa dang // spyan drangs pa dang phyag btsal zhing // mchod cing bstod pa bzlas pa yis// bskang bar bya ba
268b6(1): nyid yin no// 'di la byang chub bla med phyir// smin par bya ba 'di nyid kyi// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yis// zhi ba byang chub sems shes byed// bum pa dang ni shes rab dang // kun rdzob don dam byang chub
269a1(1): sems// rim pa gang gis yang smin bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bskang ba'o// nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa yi// snod bcud 'byung ba chen po dag/ rten sa gzhal med khang pa dang // brten
269a2(1): byed lha yi 'khor lor shes// lus kyi bya ba sngon song nas// 'dod pa'i yon tan mchod pa'i tshogs// sgra brjod tshig gis bstod pa dang // bzlas pa sngags kyi 'khor los te// sgra ni rnam pa ma lus pa// he ru ka
269a3(1): yi gsung yin te// bzlas pa rgyun gyi rnal 'byor yin// yid sems rtog pa bsam pa'i tshogs// myong reg 'gyu ba dran pa dang // blo dang bya byed 'dzin pa dag/ byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin las// 'dzin pa
269a4(1): dang ni bzung ba dang // bya ba dang ni byed pa'i tshogs// de dang mu kha le zhes pa'i// dngos por gyur pa thams cad de// nga dang khyod las ma gtogs pa'i// chos gzhan gang yang yod ma yin// nga yi rang bzhin
269a5(1): yongs shes shing // mtshan nyid go bar byas mtshungs shing // 'du 'bral med par thag chod cing // blang dor med par la dor nas// dmigs pa med par bsgom par bya// mnyam sa gtsang sgras gzhi bzung
269a6(1): zhing // rim pa'i tshul gyis smin byas te// byang chub chen po'i lam bgrod pas// ma lus 'thob par bya ba yin// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rigs kyis// tshe 'di dang ni bar ma do// brgyud pa'i skye ba tshun tshod
269b1(1): kyis// dam pa de nyid 'thob par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// nyid kyi sku gsung thugs las byung ba'i// yum chen mo mu kha le'i sku'i dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings kyi ngang du bsdus te// yab yum gnyis su
269b2(1): med pa'i bde ba chen por snyoms par zhugs par gyur to// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams ni// mngon rdzogs rgyal po yab yum gyi bka' rjes su bsgrub par gyur
269b3(1): to// bstan pa'i tshogs thams cad ni// rdo rje rigs pa 'dzin pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs la gnas par gyur to// mu kha le sku'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa kha skong ba'i le'u ste bdun
269b4(1): pa'o// // ma mo 'bum gyi ti ka bsdus pa/ rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang // bod kyi lots+tsha ba be ro tsa na bdag gis bskur cing zhus te gtan la
269b5(1): phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya/ shog ser las bris so// //
270a1(1): rgya gar skad du/ b+hid+yA ya d+ha ra sa mu dA ya mU la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
270a2(1): pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa'i gnas/ ri'i rgyal po dang /
270a3(1): grong khyer chen po dang / dur khrod kyi gnas ma rungs pa dang / mchod rten gyi gtsug lag khang dag na/ rig 'dzin gyi tshogs chen po rab tu 'dus pa 'di lta ste/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i rig pa
270a4(1): 'dzin pa dang / gsung gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / thugs kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / yon tan gyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / phrin las kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / rbod gtong gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / bsgrub pa'i rig
270a5(1): pa 'dzin pa dang / drag shul gyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / phyag rgya'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / sa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / rab tu smin pa'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / shes rab kyi rig pa
270a6(1): 'dzin pa dang / dam tshig gi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / sngags kyi rig pa 'dzin pa dang / slar gso ba'i rig pa 'dzin pa dang / de la sogs pa bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs nye ba'i sras su gyur pa'i rig pa 'dzin
270b1(1): pa du ma rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje'i 'dzin// chos kyi dbang phyug chos kyi rgyal// thos dang gzung ba rnams kyi don// rang gi rigs kyi 'khor la bstan// bde bar
270b2(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dgongs pa rab tu bsdus pa'i don// rtsa ba'i tshul du bshad pa ni// mchog dang bar ma dman la sogs// gdul bya'i khyad par gang snang yang // thog ma nyid du bstan pa'i
270b3(1): yul// sangs rgyas rnams dang de yi sras// gang gis 'dul ba de nyid la// de dang mthun pa'i gzugs ston te// 'bad pas rab tu brtsam par bya// dper na nad kyi gdungs pa zhig/ gso byed sman pa 'tshol
270b4(1): ba'i phyir// bar du 'bad pa bskyed pa ltar// 'di ni nyon mongs rtsa ba dang // yan lag rnams kyi nad kyis gzir// gnyen po'i sman ldan rdo rje 'dzin// thabs mkhas chen po ma gtogs pa// dman pa'i sman
270b5(1): pas nad de nyid// 'joms shing bsal bar nus ma yin// gzhan yang bus pa btsas ma zag/ ma yis bor na skyes bu gzhan// mthu stobs longs spyod ldan pa yis// gsos kyang 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ltar// thog
270b6(1): mtha' med pa'i 'khor ba nas// yang dag don la shed ma bye// mi shes rmongs pa'i bus pa rnams// ma dang mtshungs pa'i rig pa 'dzin// snying rje dang ni nus par ldan// shes rab phun sum tshogs des gso//
271a1(1): mig dang bral ba'i skyes bu ni// gsal ba can gyis ma khrid na// de nyid dang ni de 'dra bas// bkri zhing don byed mi nus ltar// ma rig rtsa ba yan lag gi// rab tu mdongs gyur rmongs pa dag/ ma
271a2(1): lus shes bya rab gsal ba'i// mig ldan rig pa can gyis ni// thar pa'i lam la bkri dgos pa// rdo rje can dag nye bar bsten// de yis nges par bya ba dag/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang gsung
271a3(1): yang // rig pa nyid du bya ba yang // yon tan ma lus thams cad dag/ gong nas gong du spel ba dang // nyon mongs rtog pa'i sgrib pa dag/ gnyen pos spangs shing sbyang ba dang // myur du brtan pa ma mnyam
271a4(1): kyang // 'phro mthud lam gyis bgrod pa'i phyir// bag chags bzang pos gnas par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dgra bcom nyan thos rang rgyal dag/ so so'i skye bo dang po pa'i// yon tan phun
271a5(1): tshogs ma lus pa// gong ma dag la brten nas 'byung // gsum// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ste drug/ dang lnga yi 'bras bu yis// drug dang nyi shu la sogs pa'i// 'bras bu bcu dang lnga sogs bskyed// de
271a6(1): dag 'di la brten nas sbyang // thun mong pa yi sangs rgyas dag/ grangs med gsum du thogs par snang // snyigs ma can gyi sems can dag/ tshe zung nad mang skal ba zhan// tshe gcig nus pa yod min pas// phyi
271b1(1): ma rnams su 'phro mthud de// theg pa chen po dge ba'i las// stong du 'phel bas skye bo dag/ rang rgyud gnas la de mi shong // dang po'i sar gnas la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' rnam dang 'phrad// de
271b2(1): bas gnas skabs mthar zug tu// 'bras bu chen po 'thob 'dod pas// ngoms pa med cing sdug bsngal brdo// skyo dub med cing dka' ba bzod// gtong phod yangs pa'i blo dang ldan// chog par mi 'dzin rtsol
271b3(1): ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa rab tu bsten// dper na 'jig rten skye bo gnas// las dang bzo la rtsol bar byed// 'di ni thar pa'i pha rol tu// bgrod cing phyin par 'dod pa yis// rdo rje 'chang ba'i tshul 'dra/
271b4(1): ba// mtshan nyid ldan pa cis mi bsten// rigs bzang rgyud dul spyod lam zhig/ thos dang yon tan brtson 'grus ldan// yang dag don rtog ston par mkhas// thos pas mi khengs shes rab che// 'jig rten rnyed
271b5(1): pa don mi bsgrub// snying rje byang chub sems kyis 'dzin// skyo med dka' ba ma lus bzod// man ngag ldan zhing lam la goms// gzhan rgyud rig dang drod tshad mkhas// ma lus shes bya'i gnas kun
271b6(1): rtogs// bslab pa'i gnas kun zhib par dpyod// tshe 'di'i yon tan don ma gnyer// de la sogs pa'i yon tan tshogs// ma lus rigs par ldan pa bsten// ston byed nges pa'i gang zag kyang // de nyid ldan
272a1(1): pa'i don sgrub bo// 'jig rten gso dpyad sgra dang gnas// rig pa nyid dang phrin las tshogs// gang bstan de nyid phyi yin no// 'tsho byed thabs sbyor lus dang sems// stobs skyed pa dang 'jig
272a2(1): rten pa'i// tshul mtshungs ngo tsha khrel yod bcas// rten 'brel tsom tsha tsam gyi gnas skabs so// grogs dang phung po nad dang dgra/ gnas dang 'brel ba longs spyod dang // bgegs dang sems dang brtson 'grus
272a3(1): nad// lam gyi grogs 'gyur cha mthun zhing // phyi/ nang da gsanga' ba'i cho gas brtan// rab tu smin par byed pa 'di// thos pa'i lam dang rim pa gnyis// ldan pas grol ba'i chos bsnyen zhing // mthong ba dang ni
272a4(1): gnas pa yis// gnas shing thob pa bstan byas pa// de dag de yis bye brag go/ dus gsum sangs rgyas rjes 'brang ba'i// kun nas bslangs pa'i bsam pa ni// 'jig rten khe grags rnyed pa dang // bkur sti
272a5(1): gzhan gyi ngor spyod dang // ngo tsha khrel lta dbang med dang // chags dang dregs pa rang rgyud phyir// lus 'di che btsan ldan phyir min// 'khor ba'i sred pa 'dod phyir dang // gcig pu zhi ba'i phyir min
272a6(1): zhing // gzhan don mchog tu bya phyir de// rang rgyud spyod pa'i mthun sbyor dang // 'khor ba'i yon tan dga' bde dang // zhi ba phyogs gcig dmigs pa bzlog/ mthar thug rdzogs dang gzhan don spyod// nad pa
272b1(1): sman pa sman nyid dang // nad sos pa dang de yi g.yog/ nyon mongs nad dang de sos pa'i// sman dang sman pa grogs bzhin no// rgyal po tshong dang de yi nor// dgra dang dbul ba'i 'du shes min// thos shing
272b2(1): bsam dang bsgom pa yis// sgrub dang rdol dang dug can gyi// skyon rnams spangs te ma yengs shing // ma brjed pa dang gnyen po'i don// bsngags par ldan pa'i 'du shes so// 'di la ma 'ongs dus dag tu// lta/
272b3(1): ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste// rdzogs byas sku yi bstan pa dag/ gnas pa'i dus su bab pa'i tshe// dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' dag/ gnas dus mnyam pa bzhi pa'o// gsung tsam 'dzin pa'i dus su ni// rab
272b4(1): tu lhag par blta bya ste// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// sku yi gdul bya rab zad de// ma 'ongs pa dag ma byung zhing // gsung tsam nyid la brten pas na// thugs brgyud skul ba'i sprul pa ni// dus de
272b5(1): nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur// rnyog pa'i dus kyi rten can dag/ las dang bsam pa ma dag pas// dngos kyi gdul bya ma yin te// gzugs mi mthong zhing sgra mi thos// de bas rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// ma dag yul
272b6(1): dang mthun pa'i tshul// rab tu spangs te khyad zhugs na// phan zhing rtogs par mi 'gyur te// dper na dud 'gror skyes pa la// lha mis don spyod mi nus bzhin// rnam pa ngo bo rang bzhin dag/ gcig dang mi gcig mthun mi
273a1(1): mthun// tha dad pa dang rtogs pas so// dus gsum bdag po ma lus pa// rig pa 'dzin pa bsten las byung // de nyid sngon nas yod min zhing // rang gar spyod pas 'grub pa yin// de bas rig 'dzin rdo rje
273a2(1): 'chang // ma yengs rgyun du bsten byas te// lus kyi spyod pa ma dag pa// mchongs rgyugs nyal dang 'phras dang rnyongs// sgo dgu'i zag pa dus min 'dor// sgeg dang 'gying bag 'bru tshugs dang // khri che ba dang
273a3(1): mthon por 'dug/ rgyan chas bzang po myur ba dang // bzhon pa dang ni byug dang mnye// bza' btung ro yis bstar pa dang // gzhan gyi bkur sti mchod dang mnyes// de yi drung du blang bya min// ngag gi smra ba ma
273a4(1): brtags pa// rdzun dang phra ma brlang po dang // tshig rtsub ngag 'khyal bab col dang // bzhad gad co 'dri ga zha dang // bsting tshig chags pa'i bre mo'i gtam// ma rangs pa dang ma gus dang // ma bsam ma brtags
273a5(1): ma dris pa'i// tshig dang ngo dga' lkog 'gyur dang // ngan pa'i tshul rnams brjod pa ni// nam yang smra bar mi bya ste// gzhan yang de yi drung du min// yid kyi bsam pa tshul min pa// 'dra mnyam zla dang drin mnyam
273a6(1): dang // grogs dang tha mal yon tan dang // skyon dag bsam par mi bya ste// rang rgyud tsam du brtag pa min// de bas de yi mig lam du// thal sbyar pus btsug spyi bos btud// de yi rkang pa gus pas
273b1(1): blang // mthong na langs shing phyag btsal te// bya ba thams cad de yi rjes// legs pa nyid du rab tu spyad// ngag tu 'jam pa'i tshig dag ni// brjod cing zhu ba nyid du bya// don ldan bstod pa yon tan
273b2(1): dang // bsngags dang che ba legs par brjod// yid kyis sangs rgyas yon tan dang // mtshungs pa nyid du blta ba ste// de las log pa gzhan mi bsam// khro dang bsdu ba nyid rnams spangs// bsam pa thams cad
273b3(1): legs bsams te// ma legs bsam pa mi bskyed de/ de la brjod pa ci zhig yod// bcom ldan rig pa 'dzin pa yis// thob bya ma lus de las byung // ci 'byor pa yi yo byad bstab// phyi ma'i dus na snyog pa
273b4(1): can// dus dang nyon mongs longs spyod dang // tshe dang lta ba mthar zug ste// myur du bgrod pa cung zad tsam// brgyad khri pa nas bcu yi dus// dus min 'chi ba shin tu mang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
273b5(1): dang // nga rgyal phrag dog la sogs dag/ stobs che de yi gnyen po chung // longs spyod rnams kyi phongs shing dbul// spros pa'i mtha' gnyis brgyad sogs 'dzin// de dus rig pa 'dzin min pas// skyabs
273b6(1): mchog sus kyang mi nus te// de la mthar thug blta bar bya// de la sdig dang bya min pa'i// nyon mongs las byung ma lus spangs// dge ba phyogs sdud bya ba'i cha// gnyen po'i phyogs rnams spyad cing bsgrub// spang
274a1(1): blang phyi nang mi bya ste// gtsug gi nor bu bzhin du bkur// dngos po bsam pa yul rnams kun// rnam dag sgo yi ting nge 'dzin// chos dang lus dang longs spyod dag/ rang gi dgos pa rab spangs
274a2(1): te// de nyid phyogs su rab tu spyad// lus ngag yid kyi 'bad pa gang // sku gsung thugs kyi rjes 'brangs shing // dka' thub spyad pa dang bsngos te// rim gro dang ni bsnyen bkur bya// thub pa chen po 'jig rten
274a3(1): mkhyen// gang du bstan pa 'das gyur te// lnga brgya phrag dgu'i dus nyid du// nga yi tshul ltar 'chos pa nyid// tshig don yan lag mkhas gyur kyang // nga rgyal dregs dang rloms pa yis// gzhan dag rten dang chos
274a4(1): kun la// khyad tu gsod cing gshe skur brjod// bslab bya kun la legs gnas kyang // gzhan don mi spro rang bzhin 'dod// sems kyi lhag bsam bzang gnas kyang // 'jig rten chos kyi rab g.yengs te// phra
274a5(1): mo'i rnal 'byor phyir spong byed// mthar zug gzhan don legs spyod kyang // yan lag gzhan rnams sdig par sbyor// legs spyad de yi yon tan dang // spro ba dag gi rgya che yang // gong ma'i rig 'dzin gtsor mi
274a6(1): 'dzin// lus ngag dge ba rab 'bad kyang // rang gi sems snang yang mi dul// man ngag rgyud la yod rlom yang // bsrung sdom gnang bkag mtshams mi shes// longs spyod phan pa'i sems yod kyang // bgrod
274b1(1): bya'i gnas la mi mkhas 'byung // gzhi dang ngang bzang legs gnas kyang // ltos pa'i gang zag blo ring dang // rtags dang drod tshad mi rtogs shing // sangs rgyas nyid tu khas 'che zhing // rloms pa tha dag skyed pa
274b2(1): 'byung // kha cig rang gi phyogs 'dzin cing // de nyid legs pa nyid du gzung // gzhan phyogs tha dad sna tshogs pas// thabs dang yan lag kun sbyor zhing // smod cing sun 'byin 'geg par bya// rjes su gzung
274b3(1): ba'i yul dag kyang // 'dod pa'i yon tan gtsor 'dzin cing // longs spyod g.yeng ba'i rjes 'brang bas// 'jig rten chos kyi dus 'das pas// 'di la don yod legs shes smra// kha cig nang gi yon tan
274b4(1): ldan// phyi rol chos kyis nyid 'ching zhing // gcig pu zhi bde 'dod pa dang // gzhan don nus kyang skyo ba'ang 'byung // kha cig mang du zos shing bsam// legs spyad rnams kyi don shes kyang // gzhan gyi 'jig
274b5(1): rten chos su mthong // rgya che chos la skyo 'gyod cing // gzhan 'jug pa'ang sun 'byin 'gyur// kha cig dang por mnyam bzhag pa'i// myong ba cung zad la brten nas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgyu// bka'
274b6(1): lung thos bsam 'gegs pa 'byung // kha cig mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i// mdo sogs brjod pa gtso bor byed// kha cig zhi gnas gnas bskyed cing // gzhi la yod pa yin zhes smra// kha cig rgyu yi tshogs la
275a1(1): 'bad// kha cig de yang sun 'byin zhing // thos bsam bsgoms pas grol zhing smra// de la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'// phyin ci log dang yang dag pa// de nyid gsum dang dgu la sogs// bzhi
275a2(1): dang brgyad dang bco brgyad dang // phra mo'i 'dod pa grangs med 'byung // de dag gcig gi gcig smod cing // 'geg dang sun 'byin khyad par 'byed// de yis rig pa 'dzin nyid kyang // brtag cing bstan par
275a3(1): dka' bas na// nga yi bstan pa'i tshul dag dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs bzhin du// legs par brtag cing mtshan nyid ldan// nges par bsten bya'i yon tan ni// sems can don phyir zhugs pa
275a4(1): yis// 'jig rten kha na ma tho spangs// bsags pa'i sdig pa stobs chen mdzad// gnyen po stobs dang ldan pas so// byin gyis rlabs dang mthu stobs rnyed// bar chad nyes pas yongs mi tshugs// bsod nams
275a5(1): tshogs la 'bad bskyed pas// yon tan bde 'dod yid bzhin 'grub// nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i tshogs// mtshan nyid shes pas bgrod par btub// sdig dang las ngan bsrabs pa yis// ngan 'gro srid par
275a6(1): yongs mi skye// thabs kyi lam mchog rab brten pas// thun mong ba dang mchog 'grub 'gyur// rnam thar bzang po'i rjes 'brangs pas// bstod dang bkur sti'i gnas su 'gyur// las dang bag chags
275b1(1): bzang spyad pas// phyi mar rig pa 'dzin pa 'phel// mdor bsdus tsam du bstan pa las// mtha' yas pa ni bsam mi khyab// tshul bzhin ma bsten skyon dag kyang // bya ba ma lus gcig pur spyod// 'phya zhing
275b2(1): smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// 'gyod cing bshags pa mi byed pas// sdig pa snga phyi rim bzhin bskyed// byin gyis rlabs dang mthu stobs 'gags// lus srog longs spyod par chad mang // nus pa dang ni yo byad
275b3(1): rnams// mi dge'i rgyu dang 'bras bur 'bab// nyon mongs lkugs par gyur pa yis// snang sems sdug bsngal tshogs su 'char// dge dang legs spyad 'phro med pas// bde skyid 'grib cing bsam
275b4(1): don ldog/ thabs dang shes rab lam med cing // grub pa lam gyi 'byung khungs 'gags// ngan par spyod pa'i rjes zhugs pas// brnyas shing smad pa'i gnas su 'gyur// nyes pa las kyi gnas brgyud
275b5(1): pas// sdig pa'i grogs dang 'phrad par 'gyur// 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas// sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rgyun// che chung drag zhan ring dang zung // ma lus dus gsum myong ba kun// rig pa 'dzin pa ma
275b6(1): bsten zhing // de yi rjes su ma 'brangs pas// des kyang rjes su ma bzung ba'i// skyon yin zhes su sangs rgyas gsungs// de bas dang po'i las can gyis// thog ma nyid du 'bad pa yis// rig pa 'dzin pa nye
276a1(1): par bsten// yid bzhin nor bu nyi ma dang // pad+ma zla ba sprin lta bu'i// rdo rje can gyi rig pa 'dzin// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku gsung thugs// ngo bo rang bzhin yon tan dang / sprul pa chos mthun
276a2(1): nyid yin no// zhes bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rdo rje slob dpon yang dag par gzung ba gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rig 'dzin
276a3(1): tshogs la 'di skad bshad// e ma rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// phyi ma phyi ma'i dus dag tu// skyes bu chen po rig pa'i sras// shes rab snying rje brtson 'grus dang // dad pa blo gros rigs ldan pas// shes dang
276a4(1): shes bya ma lus pa'i// don la rtag tu bsam pa'i phyir// 'dus byas chos kun ma lus pa'i// dngos po mi rtag 'du shes bsgom// phun sum tshogs pa 'di 'dra ba// rab tu rnyed par dka' ba bsam// 'khor ba
276a5(1): kun dang khyad par du// ngan 'gro'i gnas la yid 'byung zhing // thar pa myur du 'dod pa yis// tshad med bzhi dang pha rol tu// phyin pa drug gi gzhir byas te// bsdu ba bzhi dang snying rje dang // don dam kun rdzob
276a6(1): rnams kyis sbyang // rmi lam sgyu ma smig rgyu dang // sprul pa dang ni dri za'i grong // sgra snyan brag cha mig yor sogs// chos kun de dag tshul bzhin bsam// de las 'byung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir// yul gsum la ni
276b1(1): skyabs su 'gro// so sor thar dang rig pa 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab bya brten// de nas nga yi ston pa yis// blo chen rigs la gsungs pa yi// smin cing grol ba'i lam zhugs te// gnas dang yul
276b2(1): dang rig byed dang // rang gi sems kyis dben pa yi// rang dga'i gnas su 'dug nas ni// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyi// bsrung dang bkru dang brtags pa dag/ ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin du'o// sa dang gnas
276b3(1): kyi rim pa dag/ brtag cing sbrang dang gzung ba dang // blang dang byin gyis brlab pa rnams// legs par bshad pa ji lta bar// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba'i blos// rim pa dang ni dmigs par sbyar// rab
276b4(1): 'bring tha ma'i tshad ldan pas// gzugs dang dbyibs dang kha dog gi/ nges dang ma nges las rnams ni// rab tu 'bad pa legs sbyar te// rig pa 'dzin pa'i pho brang ni// rtsod dang skyon med dmigs pa'i
276b5(1): gzugs// brgyad dam bzhi'am bcu drug ni// lte ba khyams dang sgo bzhir bcas// rang gi rigs dang kha dog ldan// yongs su rdzogs pa'i rtags kyis brgyan// bsgrub bya sgrub par byed pa yis// rten dang rdzas
276b6(1): kyang de bzhin no// bsgom bya bsgom par bya ba dag/ sku dang gsung dang thugs dang ni// rtsa ba yon tan phrin las dang // drag shul spyod dang brten cing sngags// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa dang // sa dang lam
277a1(1): la gnas pa dang // blta ba phyag rgya rab rdzogs dang // mi 'gyur tshe la dbang ba dang // man ngag lung ston byed pa dang // shes rab rgyud la spel ba dang // dbang dang dam tshig ston pa dang // lam
277a2(1): gyis bgrod par byed pa dang // rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // phrin las dang ni rab 'dus pa'i// zhing skyong byed dang mkha' la 'gro// yab yum pho mo'i rnam pa dag/ phrin las sgrub par byed dang bcas// nga dang nga
277a3(1): yi tshul 'dra zhing // dbu rgyan thor tshugs rna rgyan dang // mgul rgyan dpung rgyan brang rgyan dang // snyan cha rin chen mgur chu dang // cod pan phyag gdub zhabs gdub dang // stod g.yogs smad g.yogs zar
277a4(1): tshags// pa ti dar la rnams kyis brgyan// rnga gling dung dang Da ma ru// dril bu cang te'u ting ting shag/ kha T+wAM gri gug thod pa 'dzin// rang gi sngags kyi sgra sgrogs pas// 'jig rten khams kun rab tu
277a5(1): grags// au badz+ra sarba gu ru hUM phaT/ de dag bsnyen pa'i yo byad kyang // sha dang bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga// dri dang sman lnga spos lnga dang // ro drug btung ba yan lag lnga// bsreg dang bdug dang btsos
277a6(1): pa'i rlangs// 'dod pa'i longs spyod ma lus shing // glu gar bro dang rtse 'jo dang // rgod dang steg cing 'khrig pa dang // rol dang stobs dang bza' ba dag/ ma lus mnyes par byed pa yi// thabs dang yan lag
277b1(1): bsam mi khyab// ji ltar mdzes dang 'byor pa rnams// bstod dang bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis dbul// nam mkha'i khams kyi 'jig rten nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// ji snyed pa dang ji lta ba'i// sku
277b2(1): gsung thugs dang yon tan tshogs// gtso dang 'khor dang yongs su srid// ma lus lus pa med pa kun// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'gying bag sgeg nyams 'jo tshul can// gar dang
277b3(1): 'dug stangs nyams dang sbar// ldeg dang g.yo dang 'bar ba dang // rgyugs dang mchongs dang 'khrig pa'i lus// rgod dang mu cor smra ba dang // gsang tshig sngags dang glu tshig ngag/ bde zhing gsal dang mi rtog
277b4(1): dang // zhi bar gnas dang lhag par mthong // mnyam par bzhag dang rjes la thob// ril por bzung dang rjes su 'jog/ so sor sdud dang bsam gtan dang // ting nge 'dzin dang srog dang rtsol// sgyu ma'i lus
277b5(1): dang 'od gsal dang // zung du 'jug dang spro ba dang // ngo bo rnam pa rang bzhin gyis// lam gyi chos su snang ba dang // rgyu dang 'bras bus yongs bsdus pa'i// chos kun rab tu snang bar bya// de ltar byas na rig
277b6(1): pa 'dzin// 'das dang ma 'ong da lta ba// thams cad kun gyis dgongs shing 'grub// grub pa drag po'i dngos grub dang // thod phreng bsam 'grub dbang du sdud// dang po gnas nas spyan drangs te// rang gi
278a1(1): gzugs brnyan dag la bstim// phyag btsal mchod cing bstod dang bsnyen// dbab dang dral ba dbang dang bstim// dran dang las su byas pas bsten// gnas bsgyur ba dang lta ba dang // yid la
278a2(1): bya dang sgom pa dang // sar gnas pa dang spyod pa dang // rab tu brten dang thob pa dang // ma lus pa dang rdzogs pa yis// rig pa 'dzin pa nyams su myong // zhes bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa
278a3(1): ba'i rgyud las/ bsgrub pa bsdus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rig 'dzin tshogs la 'di skad bshad// e ma rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs// phyi ma phyi ma'i dus dag tu// nga yi
278a4(1): rjes su rig pa 'dzin// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// shes shing lta ba 'di lta ste// srid dang zhi ba dngos dang stong // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// bde sdug rtog pa rab snang yang // chos can chos
278a5(1): nyid ma lus stong // shes pa'i gnas ni rdul tsam med// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // rten 'brel 'byung dang ldog pa sogs// rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis stong // dngos po mtshan ma mtshan nyid dang // mtshan
278a6(1): nyid gzhi la sogs pa kun// ma skyes mi 'gag mi rtag cing // ma chad mi 'gro mi 'ong ste// yod dang med pa'i phyogs bral ba// 'di ni kun la khyab pa'o// de ni rtogs par bya ba ste// bsgrub pa'i gzhi ni sems
278b1(1): yin te// snang dang srid pa sems las byung // de nyid brtag cing bstan du med// mkhas pa zhig gis tshol byed kyang // nam yang rnyed cing mthong ba med// sems can rang bzhin byang chub ste// byang chub nyid kyang
278b2(1): de yin no// de yang shes pa rig 'dzin mchog/ 'dod pa de la yongs mi 'byung // nam mkha'i mthar zug tshol ba bzhin// sgyu ma lta bur gang shes pa// de la mchog 'gyur yun mi ring // tha snyad tsam gyis mtshon
278b3(1): pa yis// rtogs shing rig par 'gyur ba yin// dper na rgya mtsho'i lan tshwa'i ro// ma myangs rtogs par mi 'gyur te// nam zhig rtsol bas myang gyur na// the tshom bral ba'i ro myangs te// kun gyi lan tshwa'i ro shes
278b4(1): 'gyur// de bzhin yang dag mtha' yi don// ma mtshon mtshon par mi 'gyur te// brda dang thabs dang byin rlabs dang // dpe don rtags kyi shes bya ste// ngos bzung drod tshad ldan byas na// rang rig ye shes
278b5(1): mthong bar 'gyur// gnas dang bgrod dang thob pa ni// zos pa tsam gyis mi 'byung ste// ji ltar sman gyi lo 'bras dag/ 'khrungs pas nad la mi phan bzhin// nyams su ma myangs chos rnams kyang // gnyen por
278b6(1): mi 'gyur de bzhin no// de bzhin chu chen sgrol ba dang // gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa dang // ri mo dmus long la bstan dang // 'on pa'i rna bar sgra sgrags dang // sa bon me yis bsregs pa dang // sa yis
279a1(1): rnyogs pa'i chu bzhin du// ma rtogs gzhi dang ma bgrod lam// ma bsgrubs 'bras bu de bzhin no// gzhan yang me ni gtsub shing dang // mar ni 'o ma la gnas dang // 'bras bu sa bon las 'byung
279a2(1): yang // ma bsrubs ma bsgrubs ma bskyed par// de dag 'byung bar mi 'gyur bzhin// ma mthong ma shes ma go zhing // ma bsgrubs ma brten de mi 'byung // thabs med shes rab 'ba' zhig pas// chad pa nyid
279a3(1): la bar 'gyur// thabs gcig pus kyang 'chings 'gyur te// shes rab bral bas grol ba min// gnyis ka med pa 'khor ba'i lam// phyogs gcig nyid ni gnyis kas 'chings// zung du 'jug cing dbyer
279a4(1): med par// spyad ces rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// dang por kun rdzob tsam du brjod// de shes nas ni yang dag bstan// phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzin// kha cig nga yi tshul 'chos shing // gang zag rtag pa'i
279a5(1): bdag yod ces// smra ba de dag sun dbyung ste// gang zag bdag ni byed pa po// bcu gnyis kyis bsogs byas pas rtag/ rang gi rgyu 'bras mi 'dor zhes// smra ba 'byung ste de mi rigs// rtag pa don byed med
279a6(1): pas stong // dper na ri bong rwa bzhin no// ma khyab don byed nus she na// rim gyis sam ni cig char byed// rim gyis zhe na rtag pa nyams// de la rim pa yod phyir ro// cig char zhe na de yi rgyu// nus pa thogs
279b1(1): med de 'bras bu// bskyed pa'i dus na de yod ltar// mi bskyed dus na yod dam med// yod na cig char bskyed pa nyams// de yis phyis kyang bskyed phyir ro// rkyen dang 'phrad pas 'byung zhe na// rtag par 'dod
279b2(1): pa de nyams te// rgyu yis bskyed par mi nus par// phyi nas rkyen gyis bskyed phyir ro// 'bras bu mi bskyed dus na ni// nus pa thogs med min zhe na// thogs med thogs bcas 'gyur ba yis// rtag par 'dod
279b3(1): pa de nyams so// de bas cig char don byed na// 'bras bu skad cig 'grub 'gyur te// skyes ma thag tu rgas pa dang // myu gu 'bras bur smin bzhin rigs// cig char don byed 'dod phyir ro// de ltar 'dod na
279b4(1): mngon sum skyon// gzhan yang khyod kyi 'bras bu de// mi rtag rgyu ni ma grub phyir// phyogs gcig rtags pas khyab ce na// 'bras bu yod dam med pa skyed// yod na bskyed pa mi dgos te// 'bras bu thug med skyon
279b5(1): du 'gyur// med pa skyes par 'dod na ni// med pa de la rgyus pan nam// phan na 'bras bu ma grub ste// gdags bya'i yul du ma grub phyir// phan btags med na bskyed pa de// ma grub gang zag bdag ces
279b6(1): pa// kun la phan btags med phyir ro// de lta bas na gang zag gi/ bdag tu 'dzin pa de bkag nas// chos la bdag 'dzin spangs pa ni// nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam gyi// chos kyi bdag ces yod par
280a1(1): brtags// dang po de yis gzung ba'i yul// phra rdul 'byar zhing ma reg pa// g.yag spu dang ni rtsa phung bzhin// de la 'dzin pa'i sems kun zhig/ tshogs drug don dam rdzas su 'dod// de ni mi
280a2(1): rigs ma grub ste// gzung yul chos can don dam du// med de gcig dang du mar bral// de yis ma khyab yod ce na// gcig tu yod dam du mar yod// gcig na phyogs dang bcas ma bcas// bcas na gcig tu
280a3(1): ma grub ste// phyogs cha 'dod pas du mar 'gyur// phyogs med yod pa ma grub ste// phyogs cha med pas dngos med 'gyur// de 'dod ce na sngar yod nyams// gal te du mar yod ce na// de nyid gcig la ltos ma
280a4(1): ltos// ma ltos du ma'i 'dod pa min// gcig med du ma mi 'grub ste// ltos na de nyid ma grub pas// ltos pa'i du ma ga la srid// gcig bgrangs du ma yin phyir ro// gcig pu'i sangs rgyas 'dod rnams
280a5(1): ni// phyi rol yul med de nyid la// 'dzin pa don dam rdzas su 'dod// de mi rigs te yul med na// de la 'dzin pa mi 'grub ste// rmi lam sgyu ma ma grub na// der 'dzin sems kyang mi 'grub bzhin// rang rgyal
280a6(1): 'dod pa 'gags par 'gyur// sems tsam 'dzin pa zhes bya ba// yul rnams sems kyi snang ba ste// gzung 'dzin gnyis kyis stong pa yis// bya byed gsal ba gzhan ma ltos// myang ba don dam rdzas su
280b1(1): 'dod// de nyid mi rigs dgag pa ni// 'dzin pa'i sems de chos can de// don dam 'jal ba'i don med// gzung bya'i yul de ma grub na// 'dzin byed sems kyi ci zhig 'dzin// phyogs gcig khyab pa med ce
280b2(1): na// sngar gyi 'bras bu 'gags pa yis// yod med skyed bral der gnod do// sems kyi skad cig snga ma las// phyi ma phyi ma skye ba'i tshe// rgyu 'bras rdzas su yod pa las// skye'am gal te med las skye// yod na
280b3(1): bdag gam gzhan las skye// bdag las skye na yod pas so// gzhan las skye na rgyu 'bras kun// nges med log par skye bar 'gyur// med las skye na snga ma yis// phyi ma la phan 'gyur ram ci// phan btags 'dod
280b4(1): na yod pa ste// phan btags yul du byung bas so// phan med bskyed pa ma grub ste// rgyu med gzhan la ma ltos phyir// skye'am mi skye skyon dang bcas// de phyir kun gzhi ma bcos pa// don dam spros dang bral zhes
280b5(1): bya// nga yi rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// dus gsum rgyud du 'di skad gsungs// kun gzhi la ni nyon mongs pas// btags pa'i nga bdag 'dzin pa de// lus kyi steng 'og mtha' dbus su// btsal bas gang
280b6(1): du'ang mi rnyed de// bdag gir 'dzin rnams de bzhin no// yul gyi khyad par sna tshogs kun// kun rdzob 'khrul ngo la snang ste// rab rib can gyis skra shad bzhin// sems la gzugs dbyibs rgyu dang
281a1(1): rkyen// 'byung ldog ltos pa yod min te// 'dus ma byas pas nam mkha' bzhin// yul gyi snang ba 'di dag kun// ma 'ongs mi 'gro gnas med de// 'ja' tshon sprin dang na bun bzhin// yod dang
281a2(1): med pa mtha' dbus kun// ma grub pa ni dbu ma'o// chos nyid dang ni de shes pa// spros dang bral la spros bral bzhag/ bsal dang gzhag pa ci yang med// dag pa nyid la dag pa snang // dag par mthong nas
281a3(1): rnam par grol// chos bdag med pa'i mthar zug go/ zhi bar gnas pas lhag par mthong // mnyam par gzhag pa'i rjes la thob// ting 'dzin las su rung ba ni// tshogs gnyis grub pa'i 'bras bu yin// rnal
281a4(1): 'byor pa yi blo khyad kyis// rim bzhi spyad pa 'og ma nas// gong ma'i sa nas sar 'phar te// lus ngag bya ba gtsor spyod dang // thabs spyod shes rab dman pa dang // dag pa gsum gyis gnas sbyang dang // zung
281a5(1): 'brel pa cher gnas dang // dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bral med// skad cig tsam gyi ye shes kyi// bsags thob brtan pas rten du 'gyur// kha cig tu ni mngon shes dang // spang ba lnga dang bgrod pa
281a6(1): bcus// dri ma dang bral shes rab thob// nus pa thogs med chos skur 'dod// kha cig tu ni smin cing grol// snod gyur bzhi dang shes pa gsum// 'jug pa lnga yi bdag nyid kyis// yongs rdzogs snang ba'i skur
281b1(1): 'dod de// mdor bsdus rang gzhan phun tshogs don// spang thob shes pa'i bdag nyid can// sbyangs shing rdzogs pas rten du 'gyur// khyab cing bden par nges dang ldan// ma 'ongs rnyog ma can gyi dus// nga yi
281b2(1): bde gshegs ston pa la// kha cig chos sku gcig tu 'dod// kha cig gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi// lnga dang drug gi so sor 'dod// rang gis grub pa'i tshul du snang // mtshan nyid gzhi ni chos sku gcig/ ltos med
281b3(1): ma byas lhun gyis grub// gnyis ni gzugs su snang ba ste// mkhyen zhing thugs rje nus pas 'phags// ma bcos ngo bo gzhi ru 'gyur// lnga dang drug ni nges pa dang // ma nges pa yi chos nyid kyis// 'dod pa'i
281b4(1): mthun phyogs ldan pa yis// de yi yon tan ye shes tshogs// yod dang med ces so sor smra// ji bzhin shes pa de nyid las// ma lus shes pa'i gzugs brnyan dag/ sems bskyed smon lam stobs kyis
281b5(1): 'byung // 'bad rtsol med pa'i don chen rdzogs// skye ba'i mtha' son rig pa 'dzin// bcu gnyis mdzad pa rim gyis rdzogs// skad cig nyid la sangs rgyas tshe// chos kyi sku yi rnam par 'byung // yongs rdzogs
281b6(1): sbrul shun brjes lta bu// a bcu'i rig pa 'dzin la snang // shun pa lta bu'i rigs drug 'dren// thun mong pa yi brtags pa yis// kha cig kun gzhi nges shes dus// skye med spros bral mngon sangs rgyas// ji
282a1(1): bzhin rtogs shing ji snyed mkhyen// ye shes tshogs dang byin rlabs kyis// nges pa lnga ldan skur gyur nas// sbrul sku sna tshogs bstan ces zer// kha cig gis ni chos sku nyid// sangs rgyas rnams
282a2(1): kyi spyod yul te// rig pa 'dzin pa longs skur bstan// so sor spyod pa'i skye bo yis// rang dang mthun pa'i sbrul skur mthong // gang gis brtags pa de ltar snang // kha cig ye shes rgyun chad de// chos sku sgrib pa
282a3(1): ma lus zad// chos nyid ngang du tha mi dad// gzugs sku gnyis ni de nyid kyis// byin gyis rlabs kyi rig pa 'dzin// sems bskyed smon lam btab pa dang // 'khor rnams bag chags sad pa las// yid bzhin
282a4(1): nor bu nyi ma'i 'od// bum pa bzang dang dpag bsam shing // 'bad pa med par gzhan don byed// nam zhig sprul pa'i gdul bya zad// chos nyid tha mi dad du 'gro// mya ngan 'das zhes nges par brjod// ces
282a5(1): bka' stsal to// rig pa 'dzin pa 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ rig pa grub pa'i tshul bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal la// rig 'dzin tshogs kyis 'di skad zhus// e ma rdo rje
282a6(1): rig 'dzin gtso// ston pa dus gsum sangs rgyas dang // 'khor tshogs gtso chen khyod nyid kyis// zhus shing bshad pa'i bstan pa 'di// sangs rgyas dgongs pa mi gnas shing // khyod kyi gdul byar ma gyur
282b1(1): na// nam zhig su yis gsal bar byed// 'dri zhing 'dzin dang nyan dang 'chad// bsgrub cing ston par byed la sogs// gang zag phyi dus ji ltar 'byung // phyogs gcig tsam du ston pa'am// yongs su chad par mi
282b2(1): 'gyur ram// bdag cag the tshom gcad tu gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso bo yis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs chen la// spro bar bya phyir bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rig 'dzin
282b3(1): tshogs chen rnams// nga dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi thugs// gnyis med ye shes bstan pa 'di// sems can las dang bsod nams kyis// mun pa'i bskal pa ma gtogs par// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'gro
282b4(1): don spyod// bzang po zhes bya 'di nyid la// byams pa seng ge rab gsal tshogs// snang mdzad rgyal po'i mthar thug pa// rang gi gdul bya legs par sbyang // da lta nga yi ston pas kyang // sprul pa dge sbyong cha
282b5(1): lugs can// gdul bya so so'i skye bo dang // nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la bstan// byang chub sems dpa'i rig 'dzin la// rdzogs par longs spyod sku yi bsdus// dman pa'i lus can drang ba'i phyir// tshangs
282b6(1): dang brgya byin dbang phyug che// lha klu gnod sbyin dri za srin// pha ma mkhan po slob dpon dang // glang po ri bong sreg pa dang // byol song yi dwags dmyal ba'i bdag/ rang gi rigs dang las dang khams// byed
283a1(1): pa'i tshul dang cha lugs kyis// mthun 'jug thabs su rab bstan te// thabs dang yan lag sna tshogs kyis// rang gi gdul bya'i don spyod 'gyur// ston pa'i gsung mchog dpag med
283a2(1): kyang // thams cad dga' dang nye bar 'khor// 'od srungs lag na rdo rje 'chang // blo ldan rnams kyis legs bsdus te// bstan la rgya cher ston par 'gyur// sku mchog mya ngan 'das 'og tu// lo ni brgya las
283a3(1): lhag gyur na// legs par gsungs pa 'gro la 'gyur te// de nyid du yang gang po dang // mong+gal bu la sogs pa yis// ldem po gnyis snang gzhung 'grol byed// dgra bcom pa ni mang zhig gis// bye brag smra ba
283a4(1): rab gsal te// gzhan yang rab tu mngon pa'i chos// bstan pa nyams dmas gyur tshe ni// gsal ba'i tshul khrims zhes bya'i bu// AR+YA sang+ga dbyig gnyen gyis// de dag rgyas shing gsal bar byed// gzhan yang
283a5(1): na ga rdzun dang // tsan+da kIt+ti Ar+ya d+he ba// nA ga b+ho d+hi zhes pa yis// blo chen spyod yul rgyas par ston// phyogs kyi ban glang zhes bya dang // kI ra ti chos shes bya ba yis// rang gzhan gtan tshigs rgyas par
283a6(1): byed// dbang po rab la bstan pa dag/ nga dang nga yi 'khor rnams kyis// rin chen glegs bam bris nas ni// in+d+ra bo d+hi dza zhes pa// blo ldan de la lag gnyen gyis// legs par gdams te bstan nas
283b1(1): ni// rab tu rgyas par phye 'gyur te// u rgyan yul gyi dur khrod du// rang byung mchod rten chen po la// stsal nas dbyings kyi yum la gtad// de nas las kyi dus sad de// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan
283b2(1): dang // phrin las rbod gtong mchod dang rten// drag sngags spyod dang las sna tshogs// gcig dang so sor phye ba yis// bka' rgyud de yi don 'grel bcas// ma lus gsal bar byed pa ni// d+ha na ko sha'i mtsho
283b3(1): gling las// pad+ma'i steng du brdzus skyes pa'i// rgyal po'i sras su rab bkur ba'i// rig pa 'dzin pa der snang 'gyur// ma la ya yi yul dag tu// skyes pa'i mi tra many+dzu yis// sku yi sgrub lugs gsal bar
283b4(1): byed// b+he ta li'i yul du sku 'khrungs pa// na ga rdzu na zhes bya bas// gsung gi sgrub lugs rgyas par ston// sing+ga la yi yul du ni// hUM zhes grags pa byung ba des// khyad par thugs kyi sgrub lugs ston// thar
283b5(1): mchog yul du skyes pa des// phrin las spyod pa gtso bor ston// za hor yul du sku 'khrungs pa// dri ma med pa'i bshes gnyen gyi// yon tan spyod pa legs par 'byed// u rgyan zo gar yul du ni// skyes pa'i d+ha
283b6(1): na saM skr-i tas// mngon rdzogs lha yi khyad par ston// lha yi zla ba zhes bya bas// 'jig rten rang rgyud mang po ston// zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya bas// drag sngags spyod pa bsgrub cing ston// 'byung gnas gsang ba zhes
284a1(1): bya bas// de dag bstan pa'i snying po ni// shin tu gsal zhing rdzogs par byed// gzhan yang u rgyan mkha' 'gro'i yul// dpal ldan so so'i mchod rten la// legs par bstan pa'i snying po
284a2(1): ni// brgya byin byang chub rgyal ba dang // btsun mo sras 'khor bcas pa yis// tshe 'dir grol ba mngon du byas// rjes su spyod la rim par bstan// u rgyan yul gyi rdzing phug dang // bar ta dang ni yang le
284a3(1): shod// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad tu// yon tan zhing skyong mkha' 'gro dang // klu dang phyogs skyong mchod rten dang // me chu sprin dang shing chen po// legs bcas rigs pa 'dzin rnams kyi// legs par skyong
284a4(1): zhing 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas byang phyogs mtha' 'khob yul// ti se gangs kyi shar ngos su// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// 'jig rten dbang phyug dngos gyur pa// chos kyi rgyal po de byung nas// kro d+hi yang
284a5(1): ti rA tri dri'i yul dang bcas// phrin las che la thugs gzhol te// rig 'dzin mdzad pa mthar 'byin byed// wa gI shwa ri'i thugs rgyud kyi// rig pa 'dzin gyis de bzhin te// bstan pa'i snying po rab tu 'dren// skye
284a6(1): ba 'ga' zhig rab bgrod de// las kyi tha ma rab sad nas// sngon gyi gdul bya lhag ma rnams// ci rigs su ni 'dul byed de// ma lus rgyas par spyod par byed// sprul pa'i skye ba dang po des// bstan pa'i snying
284b1(1): po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las bla med pa// ma lus gsal zhing rdzogs byed pa// rat+na bud+d+ha dz+nyA na yis// khyad par sku yi gsang ba ston// stong pa'i snying pos thugs rnyed de// rta mgo 'byung bas gsung
284b2(1): rnyed cing // rdo rje zla bas yon tan thob// mkha' spyod ma yis phrin las 'grub// shrI sid+d+has rang rgyud 'khol// dz+nyA na shrIs mo rigs 'grub// rnam snang mdzad pas drag shul spyod// brah+ma Na de ba puSh+pa yis// kun gyi
284b3(1): lung rtsal snang bar byed/ mthar phyin byang chub son par byed// de bas sngon gyi tshul 'di dag/ nub cing nyams par mi 'gyur te// phyi ston pas bstan pa/ nas mthar phyin spyod par 'gyur// che// de yi dus su rig pa
284b4(1): 'dzin// myur du thob par 'dod pa yis// 'chi ba'i dus la sleb kyang bla'i// gal te 'di nyid ma rtogs na// rten 'brel gzugs brtan shar ba la brtag pa yis// nges pa can myur du 'chi mi 'chi du shes par
284b5(1): 'gyur// gzhan yang rmi lam gyi bzang ngan la brtag pa dang // lus ngag gi skad che phung la brtag gnam gyi gzugs brtan la sa mi du ba la chad dam ma chad/ brtag pa dang / sems la snang ba'i ltas ngan pa rnams ni// tshe ring zung yang
284b6(1): bsam pa'i yul du shes pa byas dag gis// cho ga rten 'brel gyis bsla dang bzlog pa dang don la sgrar ba chos gsum gyis 'chi ba bslu ba yis// mthar thug gi nus pa ma rdzogs tshe 'di'i rten gzhan la 'pho ste// sems la dngos po'am mtshan ma
285a1(1): med par skye brga ba na ba 'chi ba'i sogs pa'i/ rnam rtog ste chags 'di 'jig rten pa'i snang ba'i rtags// sems kyi snying po spros bral la// lus 'pho dang sems kyi mar 'gro ba yongs ma grub// rang byung rig
285a2(1): pa 'dzin pa'o// gal te 'pho ba sbyang bar 'dod pa na// dben pa'i gnas su lam sbyangs la brtan pa thob par bya te// lam gyi grogs kyis mthun sbyar te// yi dam lha'i sku dang rdo rje sogs phyag mtshan hAM la sogs pa yig 'bru
285a3(1): yis// mthar zug chos nyid snying po gsal byas nas// rig pa 'dzin pa'i dmigs pa de// dag pa'i rten la 'phang bar bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur// rten gsal nus pa skyes na mchog/ de yi 'phen pa ma
285a4(1): rdzogs na// grong gzhan dag la 'jug pa ni// skyon bral rten bzang legs par sbyang // ngan 'gro chos lugs bsam zhing bskyed// lhag pa'i grogs kyis bsnyen bkur zhing // rlung sgo gnyis su snying po'i
285a5(1): mchog/ rnam par shes pa snying po nyid// thim par gyur te brtan par gnas// pha rol po la yon tan 'byung // bag chags bzang po'i dran pa dag/ grogs mchog de yis mthun par brjod// snga ma'i rten de
285a6(1): legs par sbyang // rig pa 'dzin pa ngo 'phrad 'gyur// stobs dang nus pa ma rdzogs na// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gang du'ang ma grub par ma do// dgon par zhugs pa'i mi lta bu// 'khor ba'i gnas
285b1(1): la thag bcas de// mya ngan 'das la nges par 'gro/ tha mal pa dang lam zhugs pa'i// snga ma'i shes pa de bor nas// lam gyi rtogs pa yang yang dran// ting 'dzin bsam pa'i bar ma do// smon pa'i sa mthong lta
285b2(1): bu ste// sgo gsum rtsol ba'i gnad kyis gtsun// snang ba 'di dang gnyid 'thug po// bar du rmi lam rtog pa ni// lus dang ma 'brel yid gzugs kyi// bde sdug nyams su myong ba ni// de lta'i gnyen pos grol
285b3(1): bar gzung // phyi rol 'byung ba rim gyis dgag/ gnas pa'i rlung gi 'jug bcad de// phyir ma'i skye ba ma blangs par// skye 'chi srid pa bar ma do// snga ma'i gzugs kyi rtog pa can// dbang po yul dmigs snyam
