285b4(1): pa dang // stobs dang nus pa thobs med cing // mtshungs ldan rigs kyis spong shing shes// rigs drug snang ba skye zhing 'char// sngar bzhin lam gyi goms pa mthud// tha mal phung po'i lus spangs pas// ngo shes
285b5(1): ma bsgribs 'jug par bla// snga ma'i 'khor gyi dge sbyong grogs// lha dang mkhan po slob dpon gyi// ji bzhin dgongs pa der snang bya// mthun 'jug rig pa 'dzin par 'khrid// phung po dor ba'i rnam rtog 'cha
285b6(1): yang 'chi// sku mchog lhun gyis grub pa dang // phyag rgya che dang tshe la dbang // rnam par smin pas yongs grub pa'i// rdo rje 'chang ba 'ba' zhig go/ de bas rig pa 'dzin pa khyed// ston pa rnams dang ngas bshad
286a1(1): pa'i// don la the tshom ma bskyed cig/ legs bstan 'grel byed lung dang bcas// nub par 'gyur bar ma dgongs shig/ theg pa chen po gang gsungs lam// log par bgrod par ma dgongs
286a2(1): shig/ tshe gcig rdzogs pa'i lam yin pas// dngangs shing skrags par ma byed cig/ nga yi bstan pa'i tshul 'di la// kha cig 'jug cing dga' bar byed// kha cig smod cing gshung bar byed// kha cig gnyis
286a3(1): 'dzin the tshom za// 'di dag dar zhing spyod pa'i dus// pram shrI d+he ba'i sprul pa ni// sems rgyud dag pa rab mdangs ldan// rig pa 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems// shAkya'i yul du byung nas ni// nga yi bstan pa'i
286a4(1): phyogs tsam dag/ mtsho skyes A ka ra zhes pas// gang bshad phal cher rgyas par byed// legs par bshad pa rab bsgrubs te// u rgyan yul du gdul bya sdud// nga yi rig 'dzin rnams kyis ni// de nyid byin/

286a6(1): 'bad pas// rim gyis myur ba'i sa lam sbyong // mthar thug sngar bshad gnyis su med// rang rig snang ba byang chub sems// dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin cing // lus dang rtsa rlung byang chub sems// ji
286b1(1): ltar rig pa'i don la 'jug/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // 'khor los sgyur dang lha yi lus// rgyun du gnas dang gdul bya'i ngo // lha ris phal dang ma nges tshe// chos nyid nam mkha' stong gsum

287a1(1): rgya gar skad du/ lo ka sto tra pU dza no bi ka sA la tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'jig rten mchod bstod sgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
287a2(1): bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po rdo rje 'dzin pa/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa thams

287b6(1): g.yon gyi zhal ni smug nag bsdus pa/ dbus kyi zhal ni mthing nag khro zhing rngams pa/ phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje 'bar bas g.yon gyi dung dmar dkrugs shing gsol ba// g.yas 'og ma brgyad na lha chen po

288a3(1): bapab dmar po bar snang khams su gtsigs pa/ sma ra ag tshom sprin bzhin du gtibs pa// dbu skra ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar zhing 'khyil ba/ snyan nas gdug pa'i sgra chen po 'byin pa/ sbrul gyi chun
288a4(1): pos yan lag dkris pa/ bdud dang rA tra bsgral ba dang / glang po che'i pags pa na bzar gsol pa/ stag gi pags pas sku smad dkris pa/ khrag dang zhag gi thig le dang ri mos brgyan pa/ thal chen gyis lus
288a5(1): byugs pa/ thod pa skam po dang rlon pa dang / sha khrag ra ri can gyi phreng ba byas nas brgyan pa/ zhabs brgyad kyis tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin chung ma dang bcas pa dag

289b2(1): phul ba// hrIHSh+T+r-iHbi kr-i tA na na ya ma pre ta dza/ ma ma ya mun ti b+ha tri dza/ zhes phul lo// de nas srin po'i sde dpon rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas ming gi snying po phul ba/ rak+Sha hi shaM ma ti rak+Sha ma shu tri dza/ zhes phul

291a1(1): nyid du ma rungs 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal nas// dam pa'i tha chag la bkod nas bzhag go/ 'jig rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs rab tu 'dus pa gleng gzhi'i le'u b+ha dang po'o// / de nas
291a2(1): 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i dbang phyug chen po yab yum la sogs pa'i dregs pa can gyi 'khor rab tu 'dus pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba'i
291a3(1): bdag po chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan gsang ba'i bdag/ 'jig rten gnas pa'i drag shul can// 'dod chags zhe sdang sred len gyis// gang gis mchod cing bsten byas na// bdag
291a4(1): cag rnams ni dga' mgu rang // khyod kyi bka' lung rjes bzhin du// brtul zhugs 'dzin pa de dag la// phrin las spyod pa'i grogs bya'i phyir// bdag cag so so'i gnas dang dus// rang gi sde dang 'khor
291a5(1): g.yog dpung // mthun pa'i las dang longs spyod dang // cha lugs rigs dang bsam pa dang // khams dang byed pa'i tshul dag dang // dam tshig sbyor ba'i khyad par dag/ bdag cag rnams dang ma 'ongs
291a6(1): pa'i// rig pa'i tshul 'dzin don phyir du// ma lus rgyas par bshad du gsol// zhes gsol pas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa can dag gi gtso bo dbang phyug chen po la
291b1(1): sogs pa rnams la so so'i sa dang gcig tu sbam pa dang / tha dad du sbyar ba dang / nges pa dang / ma nges pa dang / rim pa dang / 'chol ba dang / phyi dang / nang dang / gsang ba dang / sbas pa dang / tshogs pa dang /
291b2(1): 'thor ba dang / mthun pa'i rdzas dang / snying po dang / mngag pa dang / gnyer gtad pa dang / bskul ba dang / rbad pa dang / bzlog pa dang / tshar gcad pa dang / gzir ba dang / spog pa dang / las sna tshogs dag
291b3(1): gi sgo nas/ rol pa chen po'i gsang ba sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje/ dam tshig chen po las phyung ste bka' stsal to// nyon cig 'jig rten dreg pa'i tshogs// phyi ma'i tshe na snyigs ma'i dus// dge sbyong chen po'i bstan
291b4(1): pa 'di// so so skye bo rnams la snang // nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshul// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams kyi sku// rgyud dag pa la lam rdzogs gsal// spros med chos sku 'dul bral med// ting nge 'dzin la sbyangs pas
291b5(1): 'grub// bsam pa che la smon pa yis// rigs drug so so'i bdag por snang // las kyi dregs pa khyed rnams ni// 'jigs rten 'jigs par byed pa yi// gtum zhing dpa' la ches dpa' bas// gdul zhing drang
291b6(1): bar nus pa las// zhi bas 'dul bar mi nus te// rig pa 'dzin pa'i skyes bu ni// stobs ldan dregs tshogs kun 'dul ba// khams gsum spyi la dbang bsgyur byed// nga dang gnyis med sbyor ba yis/ las
292a1(1): kyi bya ba rab rdzogs pas// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs par// byin gyis brlabs pa'i dben sa ru// sgrib sbyangs bsod nams bsags pa dang // bar chad bdud bzlog las la
292a2(1): 'bad// mthun rdzas sa la pho brang bzhengs// dam tshig drag po'i rdzas kyis bran// thod mkhar bam mdzod ldan pa'am// e traM grangs dang sbyar bar bya// dregs pa'i lus ngag yid gnas rten// ngas bshad tshul
292a3(1): dang mthun par dgod// phyi rol sgo sogs rgyan 'jigs ldan// dur khrod chen po mngon du dbyung // tsa ra ma he chu glang dang // seng ge glang chen rta nag dang // bya khyi lug nag rnga bong dang // stag dang bya rgod khyi
292a4(1): phag gnag/ bdud bya chu srin nya rus sbal// rgod dkar rgod gnag rta dkar dmar// so bya dre'u ban glang rnams// rgyal mtshan sha khrag snying dang bcas// so so'i mthun pa'i gnas su bshams// 'bru bzang
292a5(1): bshos dang dam tshig rdzas// bdud rtsi sha khrag snying sbyar ba// rin chen bcud kyis sbreng nas ni// grangs mnyam yang na phyogs bzhir gzhag/ gdugs dang ba dan bla re dang // lnga ldi dra ba za ra tshags// 'di la
292a6(1): shis shing mthun pa ste// stag gzig dom dred 'phar sbrang dang // kang ka dur bya bya rgod khra/ mi rta ban glang ne le yi// sha rus lpags dang mgo yis bya// mda' gzhu mdung dang kha T+wAM ga/ ral gri chu gri spu gri
292b1(1): dang // tri shUl phur pa so mangs dang // mtshon cha drag pos bskor zhing gtams// mdzes dang mi mdzes snyan mi snyan// dri nga ba dang bsung ba dang // kha mngar tsha skyur rtsub pa dang // tsha grang 'jam rtsub dro dang
292b2(1): bsil// gzugs sgra dri ro reg rnams kyis// ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bstar// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa des// phyi nang gsang ba'i bsrung ba yis// gnod cing 'tshe ba tshar bcad de// bsod nams tshogs kyis
292b3(1): rang rgyud sbyangs// gzhan phan byang chub sems kyis bsgrub// chos rnams gnas lugs bzhin du bsgom// ma mthong ba la snying rje bskyed// ngo bo bskyed rgyu hUM du bsgom// de nas snod kyi gzhi mo lnga// ye shes 'byung
292b4(1): ba lnga ru bsam// steng du rin chen ri rab kyi// dbus su dur khrod gzhal yas khang // thod mkhar e traM sum cu la// gzugs brnyan bzhin du ting 'dzin bskyed// dbus su nyi zla pad+ma dang // ro bzhi bsnol ba'i
292b5(1): steng nyid du// rdo rje 'chang ba'i sku gsung thugs// nga nyid kun la snang bzhin bsam// yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma// gtso dang gnyis med sbyor ba las// thabs dang shes rab 'od zer las// e u'i
292b6(1): rnam pa sa bon tshul// 'phro 'dus gri gug khA T+wAM gsal// de nyid gsal ba'i rgyud sbyangs pas// 'dod khams dbang phyug gtso bo che// lha mo yum dang bcas par gyur// seng ge glang chen zhabs kyis
293a1(1): gnan// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag rngams// na bza' ljang nag bklubs ber gsol// gtso chen gri gug tsit+ta bsnams// yum gyis kha T+wAM thod khrag bzung // yab yum gnyis med thugs
293a2(1): ka nas// ya ma dun ting rak+Sha yak+ka// phyogs bzhir bdud dang gshin rje dang // srin po gnod sbyin sde dpon dag/ yab yum bcas pa gsal bar spro// gra he nA ga/ steng 'og du ni gza' dang klu'i// sde dpon
293a3(1): yab yum spro zhing bskyed// d+he ba tri dza du tri// gangs bzang lha dang gnam rgyal dang // spyi bdud sde dpon shar du bskyed// ma ma dza Ti DA ki maM// ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo dang // ral gcig ma dang mgyogs byed
293a4(1): ma// ma tshogs sde dpon lho ru'o// ru tra a b+hi ba yang haM shaM/ gnod sbyin btsan dmar rol btsan gyi// sde dpon nub kyi phyogs su bskyed// bi tri tir thi rmu du// bgegs dang mu stegs dmu bdud kyi// sde dpon byang
293a5(1): gi phyogs su'o// tri ye ra tri sa tri na tri// srid pa'i srog gi bdag po dang // gnod sbyin klu tsha bdud rgyal po// sku lha gsang ba rdo rje legs// nag po chen po chos srung rje// shar lho nub byang sgo bzhi bskyed//
293a6(1): rol khyams la dregs pa can// so so'i 'khor g.yog mang po dag/ bka' nyan gsung sdod tshul du bskyed// rang rang sngags kyis brtan par bya// dbang po'i yul du gsal ba dang // 'jig rten rang rgyud so so
293b1(1): yi// gnas nas 'od kyi kyo ba dang // gsang ba'i snying pos myur du bod// ting nge 'dzin gyis tshul 'dra ba// rang gi gzugs brnyan lus la bstim// rang rgyud pa dang gzugs brnyan bsre// oM AHhUM AM badz+ra tsaN+Da
293b2(1): sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT// sku gsung thugs ldan byin brlabs shing // rdo rje 'chang bas dbang bskur bya// dur khrod gnas kyi sgo bzhin nas// bka' nyan las byed sde brgyad kyis// lus ngag gus
293b3(1): pas phyag 'tshal zhing // phyi nang gsang ba'i 'dod yon tshogs// 'tshe zhing gdug pa'i bsam pa can// gzugs can gzugs med bcas pa rnams// dregs pa'i tshogs la mnyes par 'bul// sku yi cha lugs so/
293b4(1): so yi// don rtags mthun pa'i tshig gis bstod// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan dang // phrin las smos te thugs dam bskul// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku gsung thugs// gsal brtan chad dang ldan pa yis// nam
293b5(1): mkha'i khams kyi mtha' khyab kun// rang gi yul gsum gsal bar dmigs// dregs pa'i sde dpon re re'i drung // rdul snyed 'dul byed gnyen por gnas// phal pa re re'i gnas drung du// sde dpon chen po de
293b6(1): bzhin bsam// bka' nyan gsung sdod g.yo mi nus// cung tsam 'da' bar mi spyod cing // rang gi 'dod pa mi spob la// skad cig tsam la don bsgrub dmigs// de nyid kyis ni gtso chen gyi// bsnyen cing bsgrub
294a1(1): pa tshad rtags ldan// yongs su rdzogs par gyur nas ni// dregs pa'i sde dpon tshogs rnams kyi// so so'i gzugs brnyan gsal btab ste// rang gi ming gi snying po dang // gcod 'phrog yi ge spel
294a2(1): te bzla// dus tshod grangs dang mtshan ma yis// tshad bzung ma nor grub pa yi// rtags la bab ste las la sbyar// nga nyid rjes su sgrub byed pas// dregs pa myur du dbang du sdud// ces bka' stsal to// 'jig
294a3(1): rten pa'i sde dpon gyi tshogs nye bar bsgrub pa'i rtsa ba'i las kyi gnyer gtad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// de dag kun tu ngas bshad pa'i// sde dpon chen po rang gnas
294a4(1): nas// 'bod dang gzhug dang mnyes pa dang // bstod dang thugs dam bskul ba dag/ tshig brjod 'di yis bstan par bya// hUM thugs rje rnam dag dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// chos sku stong nyid dbyings las
294a5(1): ma g.yos kyang // 'jig rten dregs pa'i tshogs rnams gdul bya'i phyir// khro chen dpa' gtum 'jigs byed skur bstan pa// thugs dam dgyes bskul gsang ba'i yum dang bcas// ma rtogs shugs kyis 'dul
294a6(1): phyir gshegs su gsol// dregs pa'i dbang phyug 'jig rten lha yi gtso// 'dod pa'i lha mo bde chen 'byung gnas ma// 'khor tshogs drag shul mthu stobs dpung gi bdag/ khro gtum gdug pa'i rtsal 'chang
294b1(1): dpal dang ldan// rdo rje 'chang ba'i bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub// dam tshig cher dgongs gnas 'dir gshegs su gsol// oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn aSh+Ta na ya e dzaHb+h+yo// A gats+tsha ya sa ma ya hri hr-i// dur khrod gsang ba
294b2(1): mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// lha chen nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs su// bcom ldan khro rgyal rngom brjid 'bar ba'i sku// yab yum dgyes par rol cing bzhugs su gsol// snang srid dregs pa ma lus sde dpon
294b3(1): gtso// 'dod khams bdag po dgyes mdzad yum dang bcas// lha srin tshogs kyi gtso chen 'khor dang bcas// phrin las mthun pa'i gdan la bzhugs su gsol// badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn aSh+Ta na ya e dzaHb+h+yo// sa ma
294b4(1): ya tiSh+Tha badz+ra dzaHhUM baM hoH// dus gsum sangs rgyas thugs kyi snying po mchog/ chos kyi sku las gzugs sku 'gro don sprul// che btsan 'gran zla med pa khro bo rje// dbang sdud yum dang bcas la phyag 'tshal
294b5(1): lo// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus sras dang bcas// dam chos bstan pa'i tshul srung 'dzin rten mgon// zhing bcu sgrol mdzad phrin las drag shul can// sde dpon sum cu'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// badz+ra sarba
294b6(1): duSh+TAn aSh+Ta na ya e dzaHb+h+yo// na ma A ral+li ho// dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum la// sku gsung thugs mnyes mchod pa 'bul ba ni// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan bla re dang // phreng ba phye ma lnga ldi za
295a1(1): ra tshags// bdug spos me tog mar me chab bsil dang // gzugs mdzes sgra snyan dri zhim ro bro dang // reg 'jam 'dod yon ma lus ji snyed pa// 'phags pa'i thun mong mchod tshogs bzhes su
295a2(1): gsol// khyad par gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul ba ni// dug gsum gnas su sbyangs pa'i sha rus khrag/ dug lnga sman du sgrub pa'i dam tshig rdzas// stobs mchog nus pa ba li mchod pa'i dngos// thugs rje mthun
295a3(1): pa'i ngang gis bzhes su gsol// dpal chen yab yum bka' bzhin rjes bsgrub pa'i// dbang phyug chen po yab yum mnga' bdag rje// 'jig rten 'das kyang 'khor ba'i cha lugs 'dzin// bka' yi bstan srung
295a4(1): sde dpon sum cu la// 'dod pa'i yon tan mchod cing sbyin pa ni// dkar dmar ser ldang la sogs mdog/ zlum po gru bzhi la sogs dbyibs// che chung sbom phra ring thung tshad// mdzes dang mi mdzes sdug mi
295a5(1): sdug/ 'byung ba rten 'brel rol mo'i sgra// glu tshig bstod dbyangs snyan pa'i tshig/ spos sman bdud rtsi me tog dri// bsreg gsur bam sungs dri dang ngad// kha mngar tsha sbyar bska ba dang // lan tshwa spo dang bying ku
295a6(1): dang // 'jam rtsub bsil yang tsha dang dro// so so'i yon tan tshogs dang bcas// 'dod dgur 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol// bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // don snying lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// dbang po lnga dang yul
295b1(1): lnga dang // phung po lnga dang nang rol lnga// 'tshe zhing gnod dang bar du gcod// gdug par sems shing log par blta// mi mthun phyogs sngar bcas pa rnams// so sor 'bul gyis bzhes su gsol// badz+ra sarba
295b2(1): duSh+TAn aSh+Ta na ya e dzaHb+h+yo// ma hA ba li ta// a mr-i ta/ su ka ta mAM sa/ rak+ta pi ba tha ba su ta sa ma tha/ i daM gr-ih+Nan+ta sa ma du kha kha khA hi khA hi// bcom ldan dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul dang // yum chen khams
295b3(1): gsum spyi 'dul 'khor bcas kyi// sku mchog 'gyur med me long gzugs brnyan bzhin// gsal zhing rtog med snang la ma 'gags pa// sku lnga lhun grub rdzogs pa'i dngos grub stsol// gsung mchog 'gag med
295b4(1): brag cha sgra brnyan bzhin// snyan dang mi snyan grags stong tshangs pa'i gsung // gsung dbyangs nam mkha'i mtha' khyab dngos grub stsol// thugs mchog spros bral bsam 'das chos kyi dbyings// mi rtog bde
295b5(1): chen thabs dang shes rab dang // rtsol med mi g.yo mchog gi dngos grub stsol// yon tan brjod kyis mi lang sna tshogs te// 'das dang ma 'das mchog dang thun mong gi/ grub pa brgyad dang mthar zug dngos
295b6(1): grub stsol// 'jigs pa brgyad sogs zhi dang 'byor pa rgyas// log lha mos pa'i tshul gyis dbang sdud cing // mngon spyod dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i dngos grub stsol// badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn aSh+Ta nA ya e dza kA ya sid+d+hi wA
296a1(1): ka sid+d+hi tsit+ta sid+d+hi gu Na sid+d+hi d+hi karma sid+d+hi ts+tsha hUM hUM// bcom ldan dregs pa kun 'dul ni// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad de// sku mdog mthing nag khro zhing rngams// g.yas kyi zhal gsum smug nag
296a2(1): bgrad// g.yon gyi zhal gsum kham nag gtsigs// dbu skra ral pa me dpung 'bar// spyan dgu sdang mig bzlog cing bgrad// shangs nas srid pa'i rlung nag 'thor// snyan nas stong gsum 'brug sgra ldir// sma
296a3(1): ra ag tshom me ltar 'bar// mche gtsigs srid gsum rtsa ba gcod// phyag dgu g.yas g.yon dang po yi// rdo rje thod khrag dkrug cing gsol// g.yas kyi 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na// dregs pa lha chen brgyad
296a4(1): bsgral ba'i// g.yang gzhi mgo bor bcas te bsnams// g.yon gyi 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na// klu chen brgyad kyi b+han+d+ha ru// dregs pa'i snying khrag bkang nas gsol// dpa' ba'i chas brgyad sku la gsol// zhabs
296a5(1): brgyad brkyangs bskums dor thabs kyis// khams gsum bdag po sde bzhi mnan// yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis mthing nag sku// rdo rje phyar zhing zod khrag stob// gnyis
296a6(1): thugs kyi phrin las kyi// 'jig rten dregs pa bran du 'khol// lha srin sde brgyad las la 'gyed// dgra bgegs gdug pa rtsad nas gcod// khro rgyal gtso la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal gyi bka' bzhin
296b1(1): las mdzad pa'i// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // phyag g.yas gri gug tsit+ta g.yon// lha mo u ma de bI ni// sku mdog mthing nag gtso la 'dud// phyag g.yas rtse
296b2(1): gsum thod khrag g.yon// seng ge glang chen gdan la bzhugs// sde dpon dregs pa kun gyi gtso// yab yum sku la phyag 'tshal bstod// bdud kyi rgyal po'i sde dpon ni// khram shing g.yas la dgra sta
296b3(1): g.yon// bdud rta nag po'i khri la bzhugs// sbyor yum bdud mo re ma ti// khram bam g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// bong bu ga dmar gdan la bzhugs// gshin rje'i sde dpon chen po ni// be con g.yas la thod
296b4(1): dbyug g.yon// sbyor yum gshin rje za byed mo// phyag gnyis srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// yab yum ma he chu glang gnon// srin po'i sde dpon glog phreng can// phyag gnyis thog ser 'dril zhing 'phen// srin po
296b5(1): sbal mgo khrag mig ma// phyag g.yas phur pa khrag por g.yon// yab yum 'brug dang rnga bong zhon// gnod sbyin sde dpon me dpal can// phyag g.yas rin chen g.yon ral gri// sbyor yum gnod sbyin nag mo
296b6(1): ni// phyag g.yas spu gri g.yon sbyang mo// stag seng phag mo zhabs kyi gnon// gza' bdud sde dpon chen po ni// phyag g.yas mda' gzhu g.yon sbrul zhags// sku smad sbrul 'khyil 'brug chen gnon// sbyor
297a1(1): yum thog gi bu yug can// g.yas g.yon phyag gis thog ser 'bebs// zhabs gnyis 'brug mo kha gdong gnon// klu rgyal sde dpon chen po ni// phyag g.yas sbrul zhags g.yon nad rgyal// sbyor
297a2(1): yum klu mo nag mo ni// sbrul mgo phyag mtshan yab kyi tshul// yab yum chu srin rus sbal gnon// phyogs bzhi steng 'og gnas bzhugs pa'i// dregs pa'i sde dpon 'di dag ni// kun kyang sku mdog mthing nag
297a3(1): la// khros pa'i cha byad 'jigs tshul can// dur khrod g.yang gzhi'i chas kyis brgyan// rang gi tshogs 'dul phrin las mdzad// yab yum bcas la phyag 'tshal bstod// gnod sbyin lha yi sde dpon ni// shel gri ba
297a4(1): dan dkar po 'dzin// rgod dkar ru bzang zhabs kyis gnon// gnam rgyal chen po'i sde dpon ni// phyag g.yas dar dkar g.yon shel gri// rta dkar rdog dmar zhabs kyis gnon// spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum
297a5(1): tsece// phyag g.yas ba dan g.yon shel gri// zhabs gnyis rdo rta gro bo gnon// dkar po'i sde dpon chen po gsum// shar phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// srid pa'i ma mo sde dpon mo// 'khor lo g.yas la
297a6(1): me long g.yon// zhabs gnyis 'brug mo mgo dgu gnon// sngags kyi srung ma chen mo ni// tsit+ta g.yas la g.yu sbrang g.yon// dre'u rta nag po zhabs kyis gnon// mkha' 'gro nag mo mgyogs byed ma// nad rkyal
297b1(1): rgyu zhags kyang g.yon la tshon drub g.yas// so bya nag po chibs su chibs// nag mo'i sde dpon ma mo gsum// lho phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// rdo rje bdud 'dul chen po ni// g.yas g.yon phyag gis thun
297b2(1): khrag 'phen// brag btsan srog zan dmar po ni// mda' gzhu 'phen zhing dar dmar 'phyar// che btsan ging gi rgyal po ni// shang lang dang ni zhags pa 'dzin// dmar po'i sde dpon chen po gsum// kun kyang rta
297b3(1): dmar zhabs kyis gnon// nub phyogs sbyong la phyag 'tshal bstod// bi nA ya ga bgegs kyi rgyal// phyag g.yas kha T+wAM g.yon thod khrag/ phyi rol skyong ba'i mu stegs gtso// tri shUl g.yas la thod khrag
297b4(1): g.yon// dmu bdud chen po bkrag med ni// mda' gzhu dang ni shang lang 'dzin// nag po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon gsum// bdud rta nag po zhabs kyis gnon// byang phyogs gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// tshangs
297b5(1): pa'i rgyal po srog gi bdag/ skra gri g.yas la nyi zhags g.yon// seng ge dkar mo zhabs kyis gnon// bdud kyi rgyal po nor gyi bdag/ bdud zhags g.yas la spu gri g.yon// ban glang sna ring zhabs kyis
297b6(1): gnon// sku lha'i rgyal po yul gyi bdag/ phyag g.yas rdo rje g.yon ba dan// ra dkar gnam ru zhabs kyis gnon// nag po chen po tshogs kyi bdag/ phyag g.yas bing chen g.yon gri gug/ rta nag mgyogs pa
298a1(1): zhabs kyis gnon// phyogs kyi sde dpon chen po bzhi// sku mdog dkar ser dmar nag mdzes// sgo bzhir gnas la phyag 'tshal bstod// sde dpon dregs pa 'di dag ni// khros shing gdug pa'i
298a2(1): tshul 'chang zhing // na bza' g.yang gzhi 'jigs pa'i chas// sna tshogs mdzes pa'i rgyan dang ldan// rang gi 'khor g.yog tshogs kyis bskor// sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bsam mi khyab// mchod bstod chen pos khyed
298a3(1): bsgrub na// so so'i tshogs 'dul phrin las mdzod// ces brjod cing // ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yis// dregs pa'i sde dpon mchod cing bstod// 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// 'jig rten gtso bdag
298a4(1): myur du 'grub// rdo rje 'dzin dang gnyis su med// ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon nye bar grub pa rdo rje'i dam tshig mchod bstod kyi le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya
298a5(1): 'jig rten dregs pa dbang sdud cing // tshar gcod las la bkol ba'i phyir// byin rlabs gnas pa'i dbang bskur bshad// gsang zhing dben pa'i gnas dag tu// sngar bshad las kyi pho brang
298a6(1): bshams// yo byad rdzas kyi khyad par tshogs// ma lus pa ni gzung bar bya// rdo rje 'chang ba rjes 'brangs bcas// mtshan nyid ldan pa mngon sum sbyar// dus kyi grangs dang mtshan ma'i rtags// bsnyen pa lung
298b1(1): bzhin brtson par 'bar// gzugs brnyan bdag po slob ma rnams// khyad par gnas pa'i sta gon bya// bris dang brkos la sogs pa yi// sde dpon rnams kyi gzugs brnyan dag/ phur pa grangs dang mnyam
298b2(1): par dgram// gzhan yang bum pa mchod gtor dang // dug gtor thun gtor thun rdzas dang // sha khrag bshos dang bza' btung tshogs// rgyal mtshan ba dan mda' dang gzhu// dpa' ba'i chas dang rol mo'i
298b3(1): sgra// rab tu bstar zhing mdzes par bshams// rdo rje 'dzin pa ting 'dzin bsar// las kyi rgyal pos mchod bstod bya// rgyu dang mdangs kyis thugs dam bskang // bshags dral gcugs sbyang dbab par
298b4(1): bya// mos shing spro dga' drangs pa yis// bdud 'dul gtso la skyabs su 'gro// bstan pa bsrung bar sems bskyed de// bla ma sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin// he ru ka dang gnyis med la// gdug byed log lta 'dul
298b5(1): nus pa'i// mthu dbang chen po zhu 'tshal gyis// brtse ba'i thugs kyis dgongs nas ni// dkyil 'khor dam par gzhug tu gsol// nyon cig skal ldan rigs kyi bu// dus gsum sangs rgyas sku
298b6(1): gsung thugs// gnas pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// spro bas 'jug pa khyod legs kyis// mngon spyod brtul zhugs dam pa yis// dam tshig chen po'i sar 'dug cig/ mgon po he ru ka dpal rje// 'dus
299a1(1): pa'i 'khor tshogs bcas pa yi// drag shul spyod pa'i pho brang du// mdzes pa'i me tog bdag 'bul gyis// rdo rje'i dam tshig 'di bzhes la// dregs pa 'dul nus dngos grub stsol// pra ti gr-ih+Na puSh+pa
299a2(1): hUM// dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi// rjes 'jug rigs kyi bu khyod ni// thog ma med nas da lha'i bar// bstan pa bsrung ba'i skal ldan te// sde dpon dbang chen dkyil 'khor 'dir// bstan la rab dga'i
299a3(1): sems kyis ltos// badz+ra sa ma ya maN+Da la tsak+Shu pra be sha phaT// rdo rje bdud rtsi dam tshig chu// 'di las dus gsum 'da' mi bya// grub pa'i 'bras bu gnyis yin te// tshul bzhin mi 'da' bro dor cig/ ma hA sa ma
299a4(1): ya i dan ti na ra kan Sha ba mi laM// rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin can// thugs rjes rtag tu byin brlab cing // 'di nas rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi bar// mthu stobs dngos grub stsal du gsol// badz+ra sa ma ya tsit+ta sid+d+hi
299a5(1): sid+d+hi hUM// thog ma'i sangs rgyas sras bcas kyi// rjes su bsgrub pa bdag yin gyis// 'jig rten 'das dang ma 'das pa'i// lha dang dregs pa mthu stobs can// gtso dang 'khor du bcas rnams kyi// sku
299a6(1): gsung thugs kyi dam tshig dgongs// rdo rje slob ma rig 'dzin la// dbang bskur dngos grub stsol mdzad cing // nus chen rtags mtshan bstan du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan gyis// khri stan chen po'i steng
299b1(1): 'dug la// snod ldan slob ma mdun bzhag ste// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i bum pa yis// sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur bya// gnyen po gtso dang gdul bya'i yul// dregs can yab yum 'khor bcas
299b2(1): kyi// mdzes pa'i sku gzugs sku yi dbang // so so'i bstod tshig snying po dang // smon lam bcas pa gsung gi'o// rang rgyud gnas dag don rtags kyi// ches skur dbang bskur thugs kyi ste// rigs sbyangs stobs
299b3(1): la ngang gis gsal// phur pa drag shul rdzas kyi dbang // mchod gtor bshos cha sku gsung thugs// ma lus mnyes par byed pa ste// yo byad tshogs kyis longs spyod spel// rgyal mtshan ba dan sgra dang
299b4(1): bcas// dus rnams kun tu mnga' thang rgyas// sha khrag dug gtor thun rdzas rnams// dregs pa'i sde dpon dbang sdud cing // pho nya phrin las bskul mdzad de// mngon spyod gdug pa tshar bcad dbang // 'di
299b5(1): dag kyang ni gzugs brnyan sgra yang 'dra// don ngo shes pas dbang bskur te// chos kun spyi dang dregs pa yi// sde dpon so so'i dam tshig stsal// thugs rje dang ni rtogs pa yis// rang gzhan don gyis sgrol byed
299b6(1): pa'i// dpag med don chen 'dir 'dus te// tha dad mi gnas gcig yin no// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid kyis// phyi nang 'khor 'das so sor snang // ma lus dbang sdud zil gnan phyir// so so'i snying
300a1(1): po tshad kyis bstim// nga rgyal brtan pos mdun du bsgyel// don snying sha rus khrag sogs bza'// dug gsum tshar gcad dbyings nas dbyung // gzugs brnyan bstim la rab tu gsal// dbang
300a2(1): bsdu las bcol gdul bya'i phyir// zhabs 'og bcug ste bran bzhin sgo// dam tshig rdzas mchod sngar bzhin gso// dam tshig dbab cing bstod bskul bcol// 'jig rten lha srin khyed rnams kyang // nga dang
300a3(1): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// zhal mthong lung bstan mchog stsal kyang // srid pa'i sa bon phra mo yis// da rung 'jig rten las la spyod// rang rgyud rtsub mos phan gnod byed// da ni bka' yi dam tshig zung // ma
300a4(1): 'ongs dus na bsgrub bya dang // sgrub par byed pa de dag la// mnyam par kun la dbang bsgyur te// chos nyid rig pa'i rgyal po rdzogs// theg mchog ma 'dres cir yang ston// ma lus myur du rdzogs bya'i
300a5(1): phyir// rgyal tshab spyi bor bzhag gnas pa// kun tu bzang po nyid 'thob 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po nye bar bsgrub pa'i rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
300a6(1): ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs mnyes bya'i phyir// mthun rdzas gzugs kyis bskang ba ni// ri bo'i rtse'am chu yi mdo// 'jig rten dbang chen 'du
300b1(1): gnas su// skal med yul la mchod sbyin gtang // thod mkhar re mig dgu brtsegs sam// yang na gling bzhi ri rab brtsig/ 'bru dang sha khrag sna tshogs la// rin chen spos sman me tog gsal// dregs pa'i
300b2(1): bdag po so so yi// gzugs brnyan rang gi 'khor dang bcas// sku mdog phyag mtshan yongs rdzogs shing // rang gi gdan khri bzhon par bcibs// ri rab thod mkhar yang steng du// lha chen yab yum 'khor
300b3(1): bcas bzhugs// bang rim re mig dang po ru// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin gza' dang klu rnams kyi// sde dpon yab yum 'khor bcas dgod// gnyis pa la ni dkar po dang // nag mo
300b4(1): dmar po nag po yi// sde dpon bcu gnyis gnas su bya// gsum pa'i phyogs bzhir sgo srung bzhi// 'khor bcas rang gi gnas su dgod// tha ma gsum mam bzhi pa la// phyi nang gsang ba sbas pa dang // gab pa
300b5(1): gter dang drag po sngags// las byed btags chags lha ma srin// sde brgyad gzugs brnyan gnas su dgod// gtso chen so so'i mthun rdzas ni// rang gi gdan nam bzhon pa yi// srog chags gzugs ni
300b6(1): snga'am bcu// brgya'am stong ngam nus tshad bya// skyes pa bud med glang chen rta// ba glang ra lug bya dang khyi// longs spyod dkor rdzas sngar bzhin no// sde brgyad phal pa kun la ni// shes ldan mi dang byol song ste//
301a1(1): 'dab chags gcad gzan ri dwags dang // sa chu gnas dang phyugs dud tshogs// mthong thos dran pa rnams kyi gzugs// ji ltar nus pa'i grangs kyis bskor// 'di dag skong ba'i yo byad
301a2(1): de// 'gro ba'i glud du dbul ba ni// rin chen ngar mi rgyan ldan dang // nam mkha' sems kyi gzugs brnyan dang // sku gsung thugs ldan ljang bu dang // shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang // skyes pa bud med
301a3(1): phyag cha dang // rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams// dregs pa so so'i sku mdog dang // mthun par grangs mnyam gnas su dgod// mchod gtor bshos cha mar me dang // gling tshad chung ngu de bzhin no// bzlog
301a4(1): bsad drag po zor gyi rdzas// smin pa'i sa la zor phor du// gru gsum mnyam byas dug khrag dang // thun rdzas sna tshogs sbal ba dang // gdug pa'i shing gi rtsang phur dang // b+han+da dug thun gtor mar bcas// bzhi
301a5(1): brgya drug cu sum cu gnyis// ci rigs sbyar te mdzes par dgod// steng du zhing lpags g.yang gzhi'am// dar nag tshon skud gdugs kyis dbub// tha mar ras bzang yol ba bre// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa
301a6(1): yis// gtso chen bskyed cing rdzogs pa dang // dregs pa mchod bstod mnyes byas nas// gzugs brnyan mthun rdzas bsngo ba ni// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin nga rgyal bsar// bdud rtsi mchod skyems rak+tas sbreng // sha
301b1(1): chen spos kyi dri gsur dbul// rnga gling rol mo'i sgra chen bsgrag/ mda' chen ba dan nag pos g.yab// hUM nga ni dpal chen he ru ka/ gdul dka' ma lus 'dul bar byed// 'jig rten dregs pa zas su
301b2(1): za// khams gsum srid gsum nga yi dbang // snang srid 'khor 'das nga yi bran// nga yi bka' bzhin 'dir 'dus shig/ nyon mongs dbang gis dregs pa yi// lha bdud gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin
301b3(1): gza' klu rgyal po dang // ging dang ma mo lha btsan dang // rang gi sde dang g.yog tu bcas// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // ri rab chen po'i yang steng
301b4(1): na// lha chen dbang phyug chen po bzhengs// btsun mo u ma de bI bzhengs// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// chibs su seng ge glang chen bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// g.yas na pho rgyud pho nyar
301b5(1): 'gyed// g.yon na mo rgyud las la 'khol// 'khor du 'jig rten dregs pas bskor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // rtsal gyi rgyal po seng ge dang // stobs kyi rgyal po
301b6(1): glang chen dang // shes ldan mi dang cang shes rta// theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i ba// rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan ra// thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya// khyed kyis bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul//
302a1(1): rin chen rgyan ldan ngar mi dang // sems kyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha' dang // sku gsung thugs ldan ljang bu dang // shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang // pho glung mda' dang mo glud 'phang // rgyal
302a2(1): mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams// nyid kyi sku mdog dang mthun pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bul// dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang // mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang // snang gsal 'od ldan mar
302a3(1): me dang // rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra// zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i ro// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul// lha chen yab yum 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi
302a4(1): dam tshig rjes dgongs te// mdos glud mthun rdzas bzhed pa'i dgor// sna tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyed kyis srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyod kyis bstod// rnal 'byor sku
302a5(1): dgra khyod kyis sgrol// sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i// stong phrag brgya cu'i bgegs rigs dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang // glo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ ye 'drog sum brgya drug cu'i
302a6(1): tshogs// dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang // gshis ngan gum pa bco lnga dang // gzugs can dgra dang gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams// zhi dang bsal dang bzlog pa dang // gdul
302b1(1): dang tshar gcod las mdzod cig/ ri rab chen po'i shar phyogs nas// srid pa'i rgyal po skos rje ni// bdud rnams kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// ral pa nag po mun ltar
302b2(1): gtib// spyan mig nyi zla 'khyil pa 'dra// rno dpal mche ba zla tshes gtsigs// sma ra kham nag srid rtser 'bar// chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// khram thogs bdud sde
302b3(1): g.yas nas rol// sho thogs rtsis pa g.yon nas 'gyed// snang srid pho bdud khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // shugs ldan rta nag la
302b4(1): sogs pa// khyod kyi bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul// rin chen ngar mi la sogs pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bul// dam rdzas mchod gtor la sogs rnams// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul// srid
302b5(1): pa'i bdud rje 'khor bcas kyi// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs la// ji ltar bcol ba'i las mdzod cig/ bdud mo chen mo re ma ti// ma bdud kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// dpal ldan lha mo 'jigs gzugs
302b6(1): can// nag mo sha bzlog bdud kyi ma// sku la mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su bong bu ga dmar bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// ma bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed//
303a1(1): nag mo stong sde las la 'dzud// snang srid bdud mo khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir byon// cang shes bong bu la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // srid pa'i
303a2(1): ma mo 'khor bcas kyis// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i lho phyogs nas// gshin rje ya ma rA dza ste// gshin rje'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog nag po ral pa can// gdug
303a3(1): pa'i thod sbrul g.yang gzhi'i brgyan// gcan gzan gdug pa'i pags pas dkris// sha za'i mgo bcad thod du bcings// zhal bgrad mche ba rab tu gtsigs// ma he nag po chibs su bcibs// khyod kyis cho
303a4(1): 'phrul bstan pa ni// gshin rje pho mo pho nyar 'gyed// 'chi bdag gshin rje'i btsun mo ni// gsod byed mon mo'i tshul 'dzin cing // gshin rje mo yi sde dpon bzhengs// za byed dur khrod chas kyis
303a5(1): brgyan// g.yang gzhi nag po spu la gsol// chu glang nag po chibs su bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// yi dwags pho mo las la 'dzud// snang srid gshin rje khyod kyi 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas
303a6(1): 'dir bzhugs// ma he chu glang la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // gshin rje pho mo 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i nub phyogs nas// srin po
303b1(1): nag po glog phreng can// srin po'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// glog dang 'od kyi phreng bas brgyan// 'brug chen 'ur ba chibs su bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa
303b2(1): ni// srin po 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed// srin mo gsod byed las la 'dzud// gcan gzan gdug pa phyi nas rol// 'khor du snang srid srin pos bskor// srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma// srin mo rnams kyi sde
303b3(1): dpon bzhengs// sku mdog dmar nag 'asdigs su rung // lus la khrag gi lab nag gsol// rus sbal dkar po'i thor tshugs can// chibs su rnga bong gdong drug bcibs// khod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa
303b4(1): ni// srin mo kha 'bar pho nyar 'gyed// gdong srin nag mo las la 'dzud// snang srid srin mo'i 'khor dang bcas// srog gcod srin po yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug
303b5(1): sngon rnga mo la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // srin po pho mo 'khor dang bca'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i byang phyogs nas// gnod sbyin yak+Sha me dpal can// gnod sbyin kun gyi
303b6(1): sde dpon bzhengs// sku mdog mthing sngon 'bar ba la// me dpung 'tshubs ma na bzar gsol// stag seng rngam pa chibs su bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// g.yas nas me 'bar ya la la// g.yon
304a1(1): nas dud 'thul phyu ru ru// gnod sbyin stong sde pho nyar 'gyed// zhub can 'bum sde las la 'dzud// 'jig rten gnod sbyin 'khor gyis bskor// gnod sbyin chen mo glog len ma// gnod sbyin pa
304a2(1): mo gdug pa can// nag mo rdo rje lcags mchu klu yang ma// snyan cha rin chen ne les mtshan// sku la wasta nag po gsol// chibs su lcags kyi phag mo bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// nor 'dzin mo ni pho nyar
304a3(1): 'gyed// glo min nag mo las la 'dzud// gnod sbyin mo ni 'bum sdes bskor// shan pa gnod sbyin yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// stag seng phag mo la sogs pa'i// mthun
304a4(1): pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // gnod sbyin pho mo 'khor dang bcas// ci ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i steng phyogs nas// gza' bdud chen po mi bzad pa// ming ni khyab 'jug rA hu
304a5(1): la// gza' bdud chen po'i sde dpon bzhengs// mgo dgu smad sbrul mig mang lus// chibs su 'brug chen glog 'gyu bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// 'brug sgra stong gsum ldi ri ri// nam mkhar
304a6(1): glog 'od khrugs se khyug/ gza' phran rgyu skar pho nyar 'gyed// thog ser ki kang drag tu 'bebs// gza' bdud stong gi 'khor gyis bskor// gnam sman thog gi thu yug ma// gdong mo rnams kyi sde dpon
304b1(1): bzhengs// sku mdog dmar skya mdzes pa la// na bza' go zu mdzes pa gsol// 'brug sgra glog gi 'od la zhon// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// gza' chen nyi zla klad la 'khor// rgyu skar tshogs ni zhal la
304b2(1): 'char// lha sman 'bum ni pho nyar 'gyed// gdong zor ma mo las la 'dzud// zor gdong srin mo'i 'khor gyis bskor// gza' gdong gnam sman yab yum 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir
304b3(1): bzhugs// 'brug chen 'ur ba la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // gza' bdud gdong mo sman dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po'i 'og phyogs nas// klu
304b4(1): bdud nag po mgo dgu pa// klu rnams kun gyis sde dpon bzhengs// sku stod dud ka nag po la// tsha ba'i 'bu srin nyi li li// sku smad dug sbrul nag po las// grang ba'i sbal lcong khral la la// chibs su chu srin
304b5(1): mgo dgu bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// klu rgyal stong ni pho nyar 'gyed// klu bran 'bum ni las la 'dzud// klu bdud gdug pa'i 'khor gyis bskor// klu mo yak+Sha nag mo ni// klu bdud mo yi sde dpon
304b6(1): bzhengs// sku mdog dud kha 'asdigs bag can// sbrul nag gshibs pa'i ral pa las// mdze dang shu ba'i tsha tsha 'phro// sbrul gyi thul ba na bzar gsol// sbal sbrul nye'u thar ra ra// rus sbal nag po chibs su
305a1(1): bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// klu rigs lnga yi sprul pa 'gyed// sa bdag gdug pa'i pho nya gtong // snang srid klu mo'i 'khor dang bcas// gdug pa klu bdud yab yum
305a2(1): 'khor// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// chu srin rus sbal la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // klu bdud pho mo yab yum 'khor// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri
305a3(1): rab chen po mdzes pa yi// bang rim gnyis pa'i shar phyogs la// gnod sbyin rgyal po gang ba bzang // srid pa lha yi sde dpon bzhengs// mdog dkar ral ka 'bar ba gsol// lha g.yag dkar po chibs su
305a4(1): bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// gnod sbyin stong ni pho nyar 'gyed// lha dmag 'bum ni las la 'dzud// ba dan can ni g.yas nas rol// go mtshon can ni g.yon nas rol// gnod sbyin lha yi 'khor
305a5(1): dang bcas// skyes bu rnam rgyal chen po ni// rgyal phran kun gyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' dar zab ber chen gsol// rta dkar rngog dmar cibs su bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// rgyal phran
305a6(1): stong sde pho nyar 'gyed// grong rgyu phra mo las la 'dzud// ze rgyal phra mo'i 'khor dang bcas// spyi bdud rgyal po gu rum tse// mi ma lha yi rje dpon bzhengs// sku stod rgya bya'i skrag pa gsol// 'bum bye smad kyi
305b1(1): sham thams can// dbu la shel rmog dkar po gsol// chibs su rdo rta gro bo bcibs// khyed kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srid pa'i khyung chen klad na lding // stag seng dar ma phyi nas rol// stong dpon mched lnga
305b2(1): pho nyar 'gyed// ma sang spun dgu las la 'dzud// lha ma srin gyi 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu dkar po sde gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// gnam ru rta dkar gro bo sogs// mthun
305b3(1): pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // dkar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i lho phyogs su// ma chen srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// snang srid ma mo'i sde dpon
305b4(1): bzhengs// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// chibs su 'brug mo yid mgyogs bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// tshogs kyi rje mo pho nyar 'gyed// sman mo lnga bcu rtsa brgyad 'khol// snang srid ma mo'i
305b5(1): tshogs kyis bskor// e ka dza ti ral gcig ma// bka' yi srung ma'i sde dpon te// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su dril rta nag po bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// srin mo nag mo
305b6(1): pho nyar 'gyed// phal mo nag mo las la 'khol// mon mo nag mo sna tshogs sbrul// nag smug 'bum gyi 'khor gyis bskor// dpal ldan lha mo mgyogs byed ma// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// na
306a1(1): bza' mthing nag go zu gsol// chibs su so bya rog po bcibs// khyod kyi cho 'phrul ston pa ni// rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nyar 'gyed// sna tshogs mkha' 'gro las la 'dzud// snang srid mkha'
306a2(1): 'gro'i 'khor gyis bskor// dpal ldan nag mo sde gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// 'brug dang dre'u rta so bya sogs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // nag mo sde gsum
306a3(1): 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i nub phyogs nas// skyes bu rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// gnod sbyin ru dra'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen
306a4(1): gsol// ral pa nag po mun ltar gtibs// chibs su dre'u rta nag po bcibs// khyed kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// zhing lpags bgos pa pho nyar 'gyed// ral chas bgos pa las la 'dzud// snang srid ru dra'i
306a5(1): 'khor gyis bskor// btsan rgyal srog zan dmar po ni// srid pa btsan gyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku la dar dmar ral ga gsol// chibs su rta dmar glog 'gyu bcibs// dbu la bse rmog dmar po
306a6(1): gsol// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// btsan po kha bzhi pho nyar 'gyed// mgyogs pa'i sde brgyad las la 'dzud// snang srid dregs pa btsan gyis bskor// skyes bu yab shud dmar po ni// rgyal 'gong rnams
306b1(1): kyi sde dpon bzhengs// sku la zab dmar ber chen gsol// chibs su rta dmar yid mgyogs bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// g.yas na bro brdung tshi li li// g.yon na bshud glu kU ru ru// rta zhon
306b2(1): stong ni phyi nas 'brang // srid pa'i btsan 'gong 'khor dang bcas// skyes bu dmar po sde gsum ni// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// dre'u nag rta dmar la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas
306b3(1): kyis thugs dam bskang // dmar po sde gsum 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim gnyis pa'i byang phyogs na// bi nA ya ka bgegs kyi rgyal// log 'dren kun gyi sde dpon
306b4(1): bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su rta nag mgyogs pa bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// rgyal chen bzhi ni pho nyar 'gyed// phyogs skyong tshogs ni las la 'dzud// snang srid
306b5(1): bgegs kyi tshogs kyis bskor// dbang phyug gu lang nag po ni// mu stegs tshogs kyi sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su stag seng ma he bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan
306b6(1): pa ni// sa bzhi kun ni dmag gis 'gengs// bar snang mtshon dang dar gyis bkang // nam mkha' glog dang 'od kyis 'gengs// gcan gzan 'dab chags rgyugs shing lding // mu stegs nag po'i 'khor gyis
307a1(1): // bskor// dmu bdud nag po bkrag med ni// dmu bdud nag po'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// chibs su dmu rta nag po bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa
307a2(1): ni// dmu bdud 'bum phrag pho nyar 'gyed// dmu bran stong sde las la 'dzud// snang srid dmu yi 'khor gyis bskor// skyes mchog nag po sde gsum yang // dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// stag/
307a3(1): seng ma he la sogs pa// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang / phyi rol nag po'i tshogs dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// ri rab chen po mdzes pa yi// bang rim gsum pa'i shar phyogs
307a4(1): nas// tshangs pa dkar po srog gi bdag/ lha chen ging gi sde dpon bzhengs// srid pa gsum du myur mgyogs can// sku la bya rgod thul pa gsol// chibs su seng ge dkar mo bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul
307a5(1): ston pa ni// ging chen bco brgyad pho nyar 'gyed// ging bdud pho mo las la 'khor// mi rta ra lug bya dang khyi// stag dang bya rgod la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // bang rim gsum pa'i
307a6(1): lho phyogs nas// gnod sbyin rgyal po nor gyi bdag/ sku la dom gyi skrag pa gsol// chibs su ban glang sna ring bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul ston pa ni// skyes pa brgya dang bud med brgya// nyan thos rdo rje sngags
307b1(1): pas bskor// 'bag seng mon bu bsam mi khyab// stag seng ban glang sgra dang spre'u// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // bang rim gsum pa'i nub phyogs nas// rdo rje mdzes pa zhes bya ba// 'jig rten lha
307b2(1): yi sde dpon bzhengs// sbyin thang shel gyi na bza' gsol// ra dkar gnam ru chibs su bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// 'dzin shing bzhi bcu pho nyar 'gyed// the brang stong sde las la 'dzud// tsa ra
307b3(1): rgya po la sogs pa'i// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam bskang // bang rim gsum pa'i byang phyogs nas// lha chen nag po chen po ni// bstan pa bsrung ba'i sde dpon bzhengs// na bza' ljang nag ber chen
307b4(1): gsol// chibs su bdud rta bra nag bcibs// khyod kyis cho 'phrul bstan pa ni// lha dmag tshogs kyi dbugs 'byin cing // lha min g.yul ngo rab tu bzlog/ phyogs skyong dpal mgon las la 'dzud// mi rtar
307b5(1): lug bya dang khyi// nag po'i tshogs kyis thugs dam bskang // dregs pa'i bka' nyan sgo srung bzhi// rang gi bka' nyan 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs// mthun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam
307b6(1): bskang // dbang chen sde bzhi 'khor dang bcas// ji ltar bcol ba'i phrin las mdzod// bang rim tha ma'i phyogs bzhi nas// phyi yi lha srin sde brgyad dang // nang gi lha srin sde brgyad dang // gsang ba'i lha srin sde brgyad dang // sbas
308a1(1): pa'i lha srin sde brgyad dang // yang gsang gter gyi lha srin dang // drag po sngags kyi lha srin dang // las byed myur mgyogs lha srin dang // btags shing chags pa'i lha srin dang // sde brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa
308a2(1): rnams// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang ba ni// shes ldan mi dang cang shes rta// theg chen glang dang 'dod 'jo'i ba// rin chen lug dang gtsang ldan ra// thos gsang khyi dang mkha' lding bya// khyed kyi bzhed pa'i dkor du 'bul// rin chen
308a3(1): rgyan ldan ngar mi dang // sems kyi gzugs brnyan nam mkha' dang // sku gsung thugs ldan ljang bu dang // shing glud yul mkhar mtshon pa dang // pho glud mda' dang mo glud 'phang // rgyal mtshan ba dan ru mtshon rnams// nyid kyi sku
308a4(1): mdog dang mthun pa// rnal 'byor rnams kyi glud du 'bul// dam rdzas sbyar ba'i mchod gtor dang // mthun rdzas ldan pa'i bshos cha dang // snang gsal 'od ldan mar me dang // rgyan ldan mdzes pa'i gling tshad dang // mdzes pa'i
308a5(1): gzugs dang snyan pa'i sgra// zhim pa'i dri dang bda' ba'i ro// khyed kyi thugs dam bskang phyir 'bul// 'jig rten dregs pa 'khor dang bcas// sngon gyi dam tshig rjes dgongs te// mdos glud mthun rdzas bzhed pa'i dkor// sna
308a6(1): tshogs sbyar ba 'di bzhes la// sangs rgyas bstan pa khyod kyis srungs// dkon mchog dbu 'phang khyed kyis bstod// rnal 'byor sku dgra khyed kyis sgrol// sgrub pa po la bar gcod pa'i// stong phrag brgyad cu'i bgegs rigs
308b1(1): dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad rnams dang // glo bur gnod pa brgyad cu gcig/ ye 'brog gsum brgya drug cu'i tshogs// dus min 'chi ba rnam brgyad dang // gshis ngan 'gum pa brgyad cu gcig/ gzugs can
308b2(1): dgra dang gzugs med bgegs// rmi lam mtshan ltas ngan pa rnams// zhi dang bsal zhing bzlog pa dang // gdul dang tshar gcod las mdzod cig/ ces brjod rang gi mthun rdzas bstab// bskang bzlog bsad
308b3(1): dang gso la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa'i phrin las bcol// gang la dmigs pa de bzhin 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mchod bstod rgya chen
308b4(1): po'i sgo nas nye bar bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// dregs pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di rnams kun// ngo bo rang rig byang chub sems// ma skyes dbyings las g.yo ba
308b5(1): med// 'jig rten gnas dang mthun 'jug ste// mchod dang bstod pas mnyes 'gyur bas// 'jig rten mchod bstod ces su grags// phyi nang gsang ba'i bye brag ni// snang dang srid pa'i dkyil 'khor ba'i
308b6(1): rdzas// 'dod chags gzhi dang 'bru bcud rtsi// gnyis med pha rol snang byed pa// ngang gi ngang du mnyes byed cing // so so'i mtshan dang dpe byad dag/ nges par bstan pa nang gi'o// kun gsang ba'i bdag po'i de
309a1(1): nyid dang // gnas skabs mchod bstod phyi yin no// dbang po'i yul gyi longs spyod dang // gtsang sme'i rtog pa sbyang ba'i rdzas// 'dod chags gzhi dang 'bru bcud rtsi// gnyis med pha rol snang
309a2(1): byed pa// ngang gi ngang du mnyes byed cing // so so'i mtshan dang dpe byad dag/ nges par bstan pa nang gi'o// sems dang sems la snang ba'i tshogs// thams cad ye nas dkyil 'khor che// ma bcos rang bzhin
309a3(1): lhun gyis grub// 'ong nas ma lus 'dus pa las// chos gzhan med de yul nyid dang // yul du 'dzin pa snang ba'i bdag/ gnyis med rtogs shing khong du chud// mchod bstod rab tu gsang ba'o// lus las
309a4(1): sbrusprul zhing bsgrub pa'i sku// 'bru bcu sgra yi 'khor lo gsung // rang grol snying po ma bcos thugs// lha klu gnod sbyin btsan dang bdud// srin po gza' dang mo rigs rnams// dregs shing gdug dang khro zhing
309a5(1): gtum// myur mgyogs rmugs dang 'thib pa dang // drag dang bcings pa so so'i sde// ri rab bshos gtsang rgyan dang bcas// 'bras lug snying rtse tsa ru'i dbyibs// dkar dmar bcud ldan dmigs kyis
309a6(1): mchod// pha dang rgyal po grogs dang lha// ma dang rje khol bran dang bu// bsten pa rang gi tshul yin no// che btsan dbang gi dngos grub dang // longs spyod 'phel zhing mngag par sla// rgyud 'jam skyabs che bka'
309b1(1): nyan cing // drag rtsal ldan zhing slar mi ldog/ shin tu nye ba'i yon tan te// rang la rtsub cing 'cha' ba dang // longs spyod mi 'byor mi 'phrod dang // glo bur nad kyis gzir byed cing // slar ldog bkra shis
309b2(1): nyams pa dang // bsgo ba mi nyan don med cing // rang rgyud rtsub cing khengs pa dang // rigs brgyud mi 'phel kun gyis brnyas// bsam don mi 'grub mnga' thang nyams// rgyud don sbas pa ma shes skyon// khrims
309b3(1): kyi bdag po lta bu'i lha// gnad kyis bcings shing bsgrub par bya// dbang chen pha dang mtshungs pa'i bdud// mtshungs med grogs dang 'dra ba'i btsan// gnod sbyin khrims kyi gtso lta bu// srin po srog la rgol
309b4(1): paba'i gshed// gza' rgod lag yan bzhin lta bu// sdong ba'i dug sbrul lta bu'i klu// mo rgyud dbang chen rje dpon la// mtshungs ldan de yi gnyen pos bsgrub// khugs su ma bcug bsgo mi nyan// so sor gnad
309b5(1): med bdud tu 'gyur// gtsud phur ma thebs slar la ldog/ rang gi nga ros ma bsten g.yel// lto ba ma dkrugs las mi myur// log gnon ma bsten bdag nyid stobs// dbang du ma 'dus bsgo mi nyan// gnad
309b6(1): kyi yan lag brgyad kyis ni// mchod bstod bsgrub ste phrin las bcol// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi zab pa'i mchod bstod gnad kyi le'u ste drug pa'o// /
310a1(1): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'jig rten dregs pa'i sde dpon rnams// drag po'i las la sbyar ba ni// dur khrod gdug pa'i gnas dag tu// rtsa ba'i bsnyen pa sngon song nas// so so'i mthun pa'i
310a2(1): rdzas bsags te// drag po'i las kyi khang pa ni// e dbyibs sum cu ldan par bsham// phyi nang gsang ba sku gsung thugs// gnas dang byin brlab bskang dang mchod// spyi dang so sor bsngags pa dag/ rab tu
310a3(1): bde ba 'dod pas dmigs// gzugs sgra bsam pa'i nus pa yi// lus dang lus kyi 'khrul 'khor dang // srog dang srog gi snying po yis// sems dang sems kyi ngo bo las// phyi nang kun tu bsngags pa de// 'phro
310a4(1): 'du 'od kyi drang zhing dgug/ rang gzhan dmigs pa de la bstim// sha rus khrag sogs ma lus bzas// dregs pa'i sde dpon sku gsung thugs// ma lus mnyes pa 'di yis bya// gang la dmigs pa tshad kyis
310a5(1): sgrol// ting nge 'dzin gyi brtul zhugs kyis// bral dang myur ba blo yi stobs// 'di la the tshom mi bya ste// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang ba'i bka'// gal te 'bar bas mngon spyod cing // myur du 'pho bar bya ba ni// rno
310a6(1): dpal tsha rtsub dri nga ba'i// yam shing gdug pa'i dbyibs ldan brtseg/ gdol pa rigs ngan shan pa dang / g.yung mo grogs bral khyim gyi mes// sbar zhing dug khrag dngar ba la// gzugs brnyan rdzogs par
310b1(1): longs spyod pa'o// slar yang dmigs te lhag ma 'bul// gtso dang 'khor gyi rab phye ba'i// drag po'i tshig gis rab tu sbrengs// dregs pa'i bdag po so so yi// che brjod gnad dang bcas pa yis// bstab cing
310b2(1): sbyin pa rim bzhin bya// drang srong phrin las rdzogs par bya// thal chen dang ni drag po'i rdzas// dme khrag gsum dang gsod byed gsum// mtshon dpal rin chen gsum gyi dbyig/ rang byung bkra shis ldog pa'i
310b3(1): rdzas// nang du 'du 'phrod sbyar ba ni// sgra tshig ting nge 'dzin ldan pas// stobs chen 'khor los dbab cing 'phang // dregs pa 'khor bcas las su dmigs// gzhan yang mchod rdzas gzugs brnyan
310b4(1): bcas// rab tu bstan pa'i dmigs pas bstim// 'gyu gnas sa dang chus phug dang // sra gsher 'thab dang phung shul dang // rgya mtsho'i dbus dang sa yi lce// mtshon gyis brdegs dang rlung gis bsgyel// bag
310b5(1): med lhung zhing me chus 'joms// lung nas dbyung ba'i rten 'brel te// brnags pa'i yid kyis 'dzin phur gdab// gdug byed 'khor dang zas su gtad// ji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par// thar par mi 'gyur
310b6(1): las bgyis kyang // byams dang snying rje'i sems mi gtong // 'di ltar mngon par spyad pa yis// bstan la rab sdang phyir 'gyur ba'i// rjes 'brang log par lta ba rnams// tshar gcod sgrol zhir 'dul ba yin//
311a1(1): zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i phrin las drag po'i las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// 'jig rten dregs pa rang gi
311a2(1): gnad// gsang ba'i snying po drag shul gzungs// kun bsdus dril dang phye bar bstan// badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn/ lo ka pA ram aSh+Ta na ya// ma lA he shwa ra de ba de bI/ du bdud phrag sngags sor bzhag byas dun ting / ya ma gshin rje
311a3(1): pre ta wi kr-i tA na na/ rak+Sha srin pa rak+ka/ yak+Sha gnod sbyin k+Sha te byi tri gza' pa tra/ a be swan la dza/ na ga kla gu li sha dza/ tsa la bgegs Da ki gsum du tri tsa ra sa ma du tri/ ma ma ma mo ru lu/ man sngags brang tra ra tsa du ma ti// ma mgon
311a4(1): po ha kA la rA tra rA tra tig ma sang sna tir mu stegs thig ka tha a btsan b+hi shu tri pa ze'u rang sha li haM 'gong po shaM tri dza/ rA dza rgyal po ging ka srog bdag ra/ sA du tri dgra lha/ nA tha ka dma? la/ A gats+tsha hrI hrI dza dza/ bod pa'i sngags
311a5(1): so// oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn e ka pa ra sarba pany+tsa a mr-i ta A gats+tsha ba l-i ta gr-ih+Na sa man ta gr-ih+Na tu ma hA ga Na pU dza kha kha khA hi khA hi/ 'di dag sbyar bas mchod par 'gyur/ sarba A yurmi tra sid+d+hi bu tra brta na sid+d+hi pu tra ba hu
311a6(1): b+ha dra ba su d+ha ra rat+na puSh+Ti sid+d+hi/ ma hA dz+nyA na sarba d+harma gar+b+ha ka ya wA ka tsit+ta sid+d+hi sid+d+hi/ pha la sid+d+hi ma hA sid+d+hi A be sha ya A/ ha ha ho ho/ rab tu sbyar bas dngos grub blangs/ sarba sha truM yak+ka rbad rbad b+h+yo b+h+yo// 'di yis
311b1(1): rab tu rbad par bya// nr-i hur zum dza sha tAM tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ rU pa ya gan d+ha rbud rbud phaT phaT/ ma ra ma ra/ zum zum/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ tshal pa tshal pa/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha thun thun rbad/ 'di yis
311b2(1): dmigs pa rab tu gsad/ mA ra ya mA ra ya a phri pre ta ka hring hring tri sha pa li ru pa ya bin ta bin ta hu lu hu lu rbad nan/ laM nan/ a nan hUM nan staM b+ha ya staM b+ha ya nan/ zhes pa yis ni gnan par bya/ sarba ma ra
311b3(1): ta ka raM rata dza la rata dza la rata s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ ho ha ya ho ha ya/ rat+na tsa ya ratra tsa ya/ zhes pas ma lus bsreg par bya/ mA ra ya sha tAta thun b+h+yo thum ri la b+h+yo na he thun A be sha ya b+h+yo// dmigs pa 'di yis
311b4(1): 'phang bar bya// badz+ra u tsa ta ya phaT/ a pri sarba b+h+yo bzlog/ sa ma ya rbad su myag bzlog/ sri sa ya sarba parmi dur na b+h+yo bzlog/ pha rol nus pa 'di yis bzlog/ ma hA b+ha ri sha ya/ a be sha ya pra tsa ya be tsa ya be tsa ye/ zhi bas
311b5(1): lugs 'byung chu dbab po// na ga gra he bi tsa ya/ phreM phreM hril hril shar shar ra ma na tsa ga na phreM hril shar shar pa phob// drag pos bzlog cing bsdam pa'o// ma hA shin+taM puSh+Tita ba shata ku ru ma ra ma ra dza ya karma ma le a mu
311b6(1): ka sid+d+hi su sid+d+hi ka ra swa sti swA hA/ phrin las thams cad rab bsgrub pa'o// mthun pa'i rdzas dang ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi khyad par so sor dbye// gnas bsgyur dang ni grub pa'i mtha'// snying rje byams pas rab
312a1(1): bskul zhing // kun du khyab pa'i mchod sbyin bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang du bya// drag pos bsgral zhing tshar bcad pa'i// las kun rang gzhan don du spyad// 'jig rten gnas pa'i snying dang srog/ yi ge
312a2(1): gsang ba rang 'byung gnas// mngon du rgyu ba thugs ka te// ring thung pho mo khrag dang dung // chags sdang snying srog snying rje brtse// rdo rje pad+ma rlung dang gnas// thabs dang shes rab chos can dang // chos nyid las
312a3(1): kyi 'bras bu yis// ming mtshan gnad mtshang bod dang drang // grogs dang ldan pas las la sbyar// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po rnams kyi las sna tshogs kyi rtsa ba'i snying po gnad kyi le'u
312a4(1): ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni// 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams// tshul bzhin rab tu bsgrub pa yis// grub cing nye ba'i rtags rnams ni// dngos dang nyams dang rmi lam
312a5(1): brtag/ 'di las so sor 'byung 'gyur te// dga' zhing mdangs ldan stobs rnyed dang // bde dang rtogs pa sgro skye zhing // mngon rgyu yid kyi gdeng thob cing // nyam nga bag tsha dogs med ldan// nus ldan phrin las
312a6(1): mthar phyin rtogs// 'di dag la sogs rigs par 'byung // lus 'jam dbugs kyis mi gnod cing // yangs shing bstan la spyod par dga'// nad dang gdon gyis brdzi mi nus// 'byung ba'i nus pas mi
312b1(1): bskyod cing // kha dog mdangs ldan sdug cing mdzes// 'di la sogs pa lus 'byung brda// ji ltar bsgo ba gzhan gyis 'dzin// nga dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung // mthun pa'i tshul gyis yongs mi 'dor// snyan
312b2(1): dang mi snyan ci brjod rnams// tshangs pa'i dbyangs bzhin yid du 'ong // grags thos tsam gyis dbang du byed// tshul rjes 'asdug pa ngag gi brda// gang la brtsam pa de 'grub cing // ma zhum mi spang mi 'dor
312b3(1): bas// dbang dang ldan zhing mi g.yo la// gsang ba'i mthu stobs rab tu thob// yid kyi yul du brda 'byung ba'o// snga phyi de ma thag pa yi// bag chags ma yin rmi lam ni// rgyal po mkhan po slob dpon dang // che
312b4(1): btsan rigs ldan rgyan bcas ldan// gcan gzan 'dab chags dud 'gro dang // skyes pa bud med bus pa sogs// nye bar grub pa'i rtags yin no// bran 'bangs mngag pa'i tshul 'changs shing // bka' bsgo
312b5(1): nyan pa las byed rtags// rang gi gnas nas glu len zhing // rgyang mig blta ba g.yel ba'i rtags// rang la chad pa'i las brtsams shing // nyes lan 'dod pa ldog pa'i rtags// zas skom 'dod cing khre len
312b6(1): snyostsogs// rang nyid gnod 'gyod ma bskangs rtags// 'tshams shing ngud mos 'debs byed pa// ma dag lus snang nyams pa'i rtags// ngag gi bsgo ba mi nyan cing // slar zhing tshur la 'khol 'dod pa// gnyen
313a1(1): pos dbang du ma gyur rtags// mtshon cha rtul zhing chad ma ldan// nus med bya ba mi 'grub pa// sngags kyi nus pa ma grub rtags// gzhan 'dod rang la med pa dang // rang gi yid la 'dod med
313a2(1): rnams// mchod bskang mthun rdzas ma tshang rtags// sha rus khrag sogs longs spyod cing // ngo mthon rab tu che ba ni// las byas 'grub pa'i rtags yin no// pha rol dmag tshogs mang byung zhing // sgo med khang
313a3(1): par bdag zhugs pa// ngan sngags gzhan gyis bzlog pa'i rtags// bye brag sde brgyad so so nas// mi dang dud 'gro 'dab chags sogs// pho tshogs nag po bdud kyi rtags// mo tshogs rgyan bzang ma mo
313a4(1): ste// rje btsan 'bag seng gtsug lag khang // bus pa sgra smre rgyal po rtags// mi rta khra sbyang ri dwags ni// brag btsan ri btsan rtags yin no// chu gnas dud 'gro klu yi rtags// ma he ra lug mig mang
313a5(1): dang // mun pa bu yug gza' yi rtags// skyes pa chas bzang 'byor pa can// ri mtsho la gnas gnod sbyin rtags// nya dang shan pa bya ba dang // dmag mi go mtshon srin po'i rtags// 'di dag sngar bshad bzang
313a6(1): ngan sbyar// bye brag bsgrubs pa'i rtags su 'gyur// zhes bka' sprul to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po sgrub pa rtags kyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dregs pa can gyi
313b1(1): khyad par rdzas// mdzes pa'i gzugs brnyan sku yi rten// ming nas bod pa gsung gi rten// phyag mtshan dam pa thugs kyi rten// lug g.yag dkar po sbal sbrul nya// glang rta sngon po rin po che// g.yul gshoms
313b2(1): myur bsgral bya gcan dang // snrel bu shel nag bya nag dang // rta lcags khyi dang rgod nag dang // ra phag bya khyi dkar po dang // kla klo ra rog dom khyi gnag/ sbrul nag bya rgod ra skyes dang // rta ra bya khyi dmar
313b3(1): po'o// snying khrag mgo dang rgyal mtshan ni// lha klu gnod sbyin srin po dang // ma mo bdud dang rgyal po ging // gshin rje gza' dang btsan rnams kyi// rim bzhin so so'i brten pa'i rdzas// rab tu gsang ba nyid yin no// e ldan
313b4(1): gdugs bcas rgyud med kyi// thod pa mtshon cha phur pa dag/ dug khrag rin chen drag po'i 'bru// kun tshogs rab tu gsad pa'i rdzas// klus bzung snod ni sha khrag bcas// rus bzang rigs med myur song
313b5(1): chu// myu gu sna tshogs dri ldan rdzas/ cu drag dbab pa'i rdzas yin no// mchod rten ri rab rgya gram bcas// sme rdzas rigs ngan mgo bo gsum// dmigs pa'i 'bab rdzas rtog ma yang pad+ma ni// slar la bzlog pa'i rdzas
313b6(1): yin no// rab tu mnan pa'i rdzas yin no// dug khrag tshogs dang mtshan ngan snod// dmigs pa'i rten la 'phangs pa'i rdzas// ngan pa'i sa yi rten mkhar dang // gdug cing rab tu tsha ba'i shing // 'bru nag dug
314a1(1): khrag bsreg pa'i rdzas// gzhan yang dbang chen dregs pa'i 'khor// so so'i rigs dang sder bcas pa'i// mthun dang ma mthun gtsang dang sde// sngags pa'i rdzas kun shes par 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus
314a2(1): na rdo rje 'chang // rang gi rig 'dzin byang chub sems// brtul zhugs can gyi grub pa yis// dbus dang mtha' 'khob yul rnams dang // sangs rgyas zhing gi 'jig rten khams// kun nas sde dpon g.yog bcas
314a3(1): pa'i// yid dang dngos po'i yul can rnams// khams dang rigs dang bsam pa dang // byed pa rten gnas yo byad dang / ma lus rdzogs par rab tu rtogs// shes ldan mig can rnams la ston// de tshe dregs pa'i
314a4(1): tshogs chen rnams// da lta nga yis gdams pa bzhin// yang dag don las ma 'da' zhig/ khyed rnams kyang ni dus nam zhig/ las kyi gnas ngan len spang ste// byang chub sa la myur 'gro yis// de bas bka' yi/
314a5(1): dam mnos la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin sgrubs shig/ gsang chen nga yi bstan pa'i tshul// phyi rol phyogs la sogs pa yis// nyams shing dmas par mi 'gyur bar// rgyas shing brtan par khyod kyis
314a6(1): byos// zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i rten rdzas dang las kyi gnyer bsgo ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
314b1(1): gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po'i sku'i rnam par rol pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdu bar mdzad de/ dgyes pa'i gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus pa'i 'khor gyi
314b2(1): tshogs// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i// 'jig rten dbang chen gtso chen rnams// mthar zug mya ngan 'das nas kyang // dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// bstan pa'i tha tshig sgrub pa dang // rnal
314b3(1): 'byor las kyi grogs mdzad cing // dregs pa'i sku gsung thugs nyid dang // yon tan phrin las sna tshogs ston// phyi ma'i dus na rig pa 'dzin// skyes bu brtson ldan rnams kyis ni// gnyis su 'dzin par yongs mi bya// yul snang phyi/
314b4(1): nang ma lus kun// rang rig sems kyi rgyal por bsgrub// de ni ma bcos yul mi bral// ma chad ma lhung bdag po med// gnyis med mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub// nges 'gyur spang blang stsol sems bral// ma lus rtsa ba snying gi
314b5(1): srog/ de nyid shes bya rab tu blang // dbang gi rgyal po 'chang bar 'gyur// gal te nga dang dregs pa can// so so rang rgyud ldan pa yi// gnyis 'dzin yid kyis rtog dpyod cing // mtshan ma rab tu sgom byed
314b6(1): pa// rkang med khams gsum bgrod 'dod cing // mig med stong gsum blta dang mtshungs// bdud bzhi dga' ba skyed par byed// de bas rigs mchog che rnams kyis// gsang bdag nga nyid shes par gyis//
315a1(1): zhes bka' stsal te nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po chos nyid de bzhin nyid spros pa dang bral ba'i dbyings su thim par mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po 'khor dang bcas pa
315a2(1): chos sku mthar thug tu bsgrub par gdams pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // dregs pa can gyi sde dpon 'jig rten mchod bstod bsgrub pa rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po
315a3(1): chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bsgyur zhing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ rgya rgya rgya//
315b1(1): \u0f7fthAg+naHmnaH/ waH/ \u0f7fmaH// rgya gar skad du/ ro dra man+ta sa mu dA ya mU la tan+ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthu stobs thams cad kyi bdag po la phyag
315b2(1): 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid ri rab chen po'i yang steng / lcang lo can gyi gnas mchog/ rab tu brgyan pa'i pho brang chen po na// yum
315b3(1): chen mo 'byung ba lnga'i bdag nyid mo dang / gnyis su med par snyoms par zhugs te/ sku las 'od zer sna tshogs rab tu spros nas 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gdug pa can dang // dregs pa can dang / gzi brjid
315b4(1): can dang // drag shul can la sogs pa dag gi gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo zhing bskyod par mdzad pas/ de dag gi sde dpon dang 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams rlung gi shugs kyis bskyod pa bzhin
315b5(1): du lhags pa ni 'di lta ste/ gshin rje 'chi bdag nag po chen po yum dang bcas pa dang / bdud nag po chen po me'i kha rlangs can dang / yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma dang // srin po'i rgyal po
315b6(1): gsod byed nag po yum dang bcas pa dang / gnod sbyin chen po gang ba bzang po dang / yum gnod sbyin mo sha za ral gcig ma dang / lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po dang / rA tra'i bdag po thar pa nag po dang /
316a1(1): dmu rje bcan pa rgyal po chen po dang / phyi rol lha'i bdag po ka la nag po dang / khyab 'jug chen po kun tu rgyu dang / klu'i bdag po gzhon nu gtum po dang / lha'i rgyal po li byin chen po dang /
316a2(1): gnod sbyin chen po lag dgu pa dang / bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dang / klu bdud chen po yab shud dmar po dang / gzhan yang lha dang klu dang lha ma yin dang za byed dang / yi dwags dang 'byung po'i tshogs
316a3(1): dang / pho nya'i tshogs 'bigs par byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu 'dus so// de nas com ldan 'das kyis gdug byed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas/ dur khrod chen po'i
316a4(1): dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par mdzad de// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor dag/ gzugs su snang ba rab tu 'jigs// sgra ni mi snyan drag cing gtum// dri ni mi zhim rul myags sum// ro ni kha sgyur tsha
316a5(1): ra bro// reg bya tsha rtsub mi sdug spyod// zhe sdang chen po me 'bar zhing // nga rgyal keng rus brag tu spungs// gti mug mun nag rab tu 'thibs// 'dod chags khrag gi chu chen brub// phrag dog rlung ni rab tu
316a6(1): 'khrugs// ti ra chen po'i longs spyod dang // stag gzig gcan gzan ce spyang dang // kang ka dur bya 'dab chags tshogs// sha za khrag 'thung rus pa 'joms// bam dang rul dang myags pa dang // 'byed dang
316b1(1): bral dang gzhig pa dang // zos dang 'thor dang rab tu 'thor// brul dang zag dang brlag pa dang // rtse dang rgod dang glal ba dang // 'jigs shing gdug dang rngams pa yi// rol pa'i longs spyod rab tu sprul//
316b2(1): kun kyang gdug pa'i sems 'chang zhing // gsod gcod bsha' gtub lus kyi las// tshig rtsub brlang po'i nga ro 'byin// khros pa'i brtul zhugs drag po yis// ma lus 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'i// mngon par
316b3(1): spyod la rab tu bkod// 'di ltar mthong zhing snang gyur kyang // kun rdzob tsam du snang ba las// sems can gcig gi ba spu la// cung zad gnod pa yongs med de// rang gi rnam rtog bde bar spyod// nges pa'i de
316b4(1): nyid kho na'o// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje 'chang ba'i rgyal po yis// dus
316b5(1): gsum rgyal ba sras bcas kyis// thog ma med pa'i dus nyid nas// ma lus bstan pa bsrung mdzad pa'i// gsang bdag chen por dbang bskur phyir// gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje 'chang // lnga brgya'i grogs dang
316b6(1): bcas pa yis// so so'i gtso chen mdun nyid nas// rang gi stan las rab tu langs// mngon du spyod pa'i sprul pa mdzad// thugs la gnas pa'i sa bon las// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug kun// lja
317a1(1): nag rlung gis rab tu dkrigs// khrag gi rba klong 'khrugs shing g.yo// sha rus gtams pa'i sa gzhi la// bskal pa'i me ri rab tu 'bar// b+han+da 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // gdug cing 'jigs
317a2(1): su rung ba ni// stobs chen rnams kyang nyer mi spyod// phrin las ma lus rdzogs mdzad gzugs/ phyi nang mtha' dbus kun la khyab// bstan la rab sdang pha rol po'i// phung po zhabs kyi gdan du bting // 'od
317a3(1): ldan gtsang ma yum dang bcas// che ba mchog gi skur mdzad de// rigs can mthar gnas dbur bstan cing // stong pa bco brgyad dag cing stong // phyag gis dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgral// b+han+ta tsit+ta g.yas
317a4(1): g.yon bsnams// thugs kyi dbang rtags dang por bzung // thugs rje mi 'gyur mthing nag mdog/ mi 'jigs rig par ldan pa'i zhabs// bdud bzhi phyogs dang bcas pa gnon// ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i
317a5(1): phyir// ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// 'bar ba'i spyan gyis khams gsum gzigs// gdangs pa'i shangs kyis srid gsum rngub// snyan gyi rlung sgras stong gsum khyab// rno dpal tshems kyis gdug pa sgrol/
317a6(1): ljags 'dril rkan sgra drag po rdeb// khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud// dpa' ba'i chas kyis rab tu brgyan// sprul pa'i lha rnams sku la rdzogs// stobs ldan de nyid mnyes mdzad pa'i// 'byung ba che la dbang
317b1(1): bsgyur ma// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi la// gri gug tri shUl bdud rtsi g.yas// b+han+d+ha zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon// gtso bdag tshul 'dzin rab tu sgeg/ dgyes mdzad rab tu rol pa las// 'dul byed
317b2(1): sprul pa rab tu spro// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun gyi// gtum po gdug pa'i tshul 'chang ba'i// drag sngags bdag po ma lus kun// rang nyid so so'i 'khor bcas pa'i// rten dang gnas pa re rer snang //
317b3(1): rang dbang med par 'dud cing g.yo// oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn e ka ya ma ma b+hi ra b+ha gr-ih+Na hUM phaT// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin lha dang log lta can// dmu rje che dang phyi rol phyogs// gdug byed
317b4(1): mkha' la rgyu ba dang // byol song lto 'gro'i lus 'dzin dang // nga rgyal 'chang dang sprul pa can// mtha' 'khob gnas bcas ma lus rgyu// lha bdud mi ma yin gyi gnas// kha ba can du phyogs shing srid// las kyi
317b5(1): lus kyi nus pa 'byin// ma lus rnam pa thams cad kun// shugs drag rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin// rab tu 'dar zhing mdun du gnas// thugs rje'i bdag pos dgongs mdzad de// gtum rngams 'jigs byed
317b6(1): chen po'i sku// gsang tshig drag po'i gsung gi sgras// ma lus tshims par bka' glal pa// e ma 'asdig rten khams kun gyi// drag sngags bdag po dregs pa can// rngon gyi rdo rje 'chang chen dang // nga yi bka'
318a1(1): las ma 'da' bar// khyed rnams rang gi 'khor dang bcas// so so'i lus dang btags pa'i ming // rigs dang rten dang byed pa'i las// sde dang cha lugs longs spyod rnams// 'jigs byed
318a2(1): gnas 'dir myur du ston// khyed rnams 'di las 'gal byed na// nga yi sngon gyi dam tshig gis// khyod kyi lus sems srog dang bcas// ma lus gtan nas brlag par bya// zhes bka' stsal nas// drag sngags
318a3(1): kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bka' stsal to// A~M sarba duSh+TAn ta ka na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ ya ma ra tsa pre ta ka s+ya ma ma k+She ta mA ra ya hrI hrI dza dza/ du pra phrag ra tsa dug dun ma ting mA ra ya hrI hAM dza dza/ rag sha rag mo ma ya ra ti
318a4(1): mA ra ya hr-i hri dza dza/ yak+Sha a pa sma rak+Sha mi du shaM pa mA ra ya dza dza/ ma hA de be shwa ra ra tsa mA ra ya hrI hrI dza dza/ ma taM ka ru tra ka la mA ra ya kA la hI hrI dza dza/ mun mun pa dza tsit+ta mA ra ya hrI hrI dza dza/ tir+thi ka ma te ma hA mA
318a5(1): ra ya hrI hrI dza dza/ byi tri pa tra ro ga ti dza mA ra ya hrI hrI dza dza/ nA ga rA dza ku ma tsa ta d+hi ra ya hrI hrI dza dza/ rA dza b+hu ling e sa ma ya hrI hrI dza dza/ ma ha khu lengs bi hu mA ra ya hrI hrI dza dza/ badz+ra sA d+hA se e tsa mA ra ya hri hr-i dza
318a6(1): dza/ a b+hi shu tri ling mA ra ya hri hri dza dza/ nr-i hur thum dzaHsha tAM mA ra ya rbad/ ces brjod cing sku 'jigs byed 'bar ba de slar yang 'jigs su rung bar bstan te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing khams stong gsum
318b1(1): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma rungs pa'i sgra chen po dang / 'od dang glog 'bar ba dang / rlung gi shugs drag pos rab tu gang bar gyur to// bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa phyogs bcu'i
318b2(1): dregs pa can rnams kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas te rab tu 'dus nas/ rang rang gi rigs kyi dregs pa dag phul te/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mdun du nye bar gyur nas/ bka' rab tu bsgrub par rtsol
318b3(1): bar gyur to// drag sngags 'dus pa rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ byin rlabs chen pos dbang du bsdus pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud kyi rgyal po me'i kha
318b4(1): rlangs can zhes bya ba/ mdog nag po kha nas me 'bar ba/ khram shing dang bdud zhags nag po thogs pa/ zhing lpags kyi gos gyon pa/ yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma zhes bya ba/ khram shing dang thod pa rlon
318b5(1): pa thogs pa/ zhing lpags gon zhing bdud rta nag po la khyod shug gnyis car zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdud kyi ris kyi lha tshogs dang bcas nas rings par lhags so// de bzhin du 'chi bdag
318b6(1): gshin rje zhes bya ba/ mdog nag thod pa gri gug 'dzin// chung ma gshin rje za byed ma// gri gug thod pa phyag gis 'dzin// khyo shug zhing lpags rlon pa bgos// ma he chu glang zhon nas ni// gshin rje pho mo'i/
319a1(1): tshogs dang bcas// 'gal byed gzir zhing myur du lhags// srin po gsod byed yab yum yang // mdog nag zhing gi pags pa bgos// ral gri gri gug yab kyi g.yon g.yas kyis bzung // g.yon yum
319a2(1): gyis mi mgo yab kyi g.yas thod khrag thogs// stag dang seng ge bzhon pa bskyod// srin po'i tshogs bcas myur du 'khod// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po dang // chung ma sha za ral gcig bcas// mthing nag mgyogs
319a3(1): byed rta la zhon// zhing lpags gyon te phyag gnyis kyis// ral gri yab g.yon dar nag zhing lpags sum g.yas bzung // gnod sbyin tshogs dang bcas te bskyod// drag sngags bdag po sde dpon te// shar lho nub byang
319a4(1): phyogs dag gi/ gnas su gtso la 'dud cing 'khod// dbang phyug chen po zhes bya ba// 'jig rten lha yi sngags bdag ni// dkar po ba dan shel gri thogs// dar dkar gos can gnam ru zhon// dregs pa'i lha
319a5(1): bdud 'khor dang bcas// rengs par lhag ste shar phyogs 'khod// thar pa nag po zhes bya ba// mdog gnag mchod gtor dug zung 'dzin// dom nag zhon te zhing lpags bgos// sde dang bcas te lho phyogs
319a6(1): 'khod// dmu rje btsan po zhes bya ba// dar nag dang ni zhags pa thogs// ber nag gyon te dmu rta zhon// rang gi sder dang nub phyogs 'khod// mu stegs nag po chen po yang // kha T+wAM dang ni tri shUl 'dzin// mi
319b1(1): lpags bgos te ma he zhon// rang gi sde bcas byang du 'khod// khyab 'jug rog ti zhes bya ba// mthing nag khram shing dgra sta 'dzin// sprin nag bgos shing 'brug rngon zhon// gza' bdud tshogs bcas steng nas
319b2(1): 'khod// klu rgyal sog ma med ces pa// ser nag sbrul lpags na bza' can// bum pa dang ni rus sbal 'dzin// chu srin zhon te klu tshogs bcas// 'og gi phyogs su 'khod cing 'dug/ gzhan yang li byin lag
319b3(1): dgu dang // ze skyes gtso dang yams shud kyi// so so'i blags kyi bdag po dag/ dkar ser dmar po'i mdog ldan zhing // shel gri thogs dang sa shing lag dgu 'gyed// dar dmar mdung dang dkang ring ral gri
319b4(1): 'dzin// rta dkar bya rgod ra skyes dang // rta dmar zhon te zhing lpags bgos// so so'i sde dang g.yog bcas shing // phyogs kyi sgo bzhir gnas par 'khod// gzhan yang lha klu gnod sbyin dang // ma mo gshin rje
319b5(1): srin po bdud// ru tra mu stegs 'gong zel dang // gying dmu gza' dang rgyal phran sman// snang srid lha srin dregs pa can// sde dpon chen po rnams bcas 'khod// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // yang gsang
319b6(1): dang ni drag po dang // btags shing chags dang sbas pa dang // las byed shan pa thor shod dang // che grags btsan dang ma mo dang // mun 'thib stong 'khrugs srog gcod dang // gleng zhing dbang che la
320a1(1): sogs rnams// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang ba yi// bka' bzhin rjes su sgrub byed pas// ma thogs dur khrod gnas chen du// 'dar zhing myur ba'i shugs dang bcas// rang gi nus pa rab bstan te//
320a2(1): bka' nyan gsung sdod rjes 'brangs gnas// de ltar 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa'i bdag po sngags kyi stobs dang ldan pa de dag gis/ rang rang gi 'khor dang / rigs kyi sde dang / mthu dang longs spyod
320a3(1): kyi khyad par dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bstan nas 'di skad ces kyang gsol to// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po/ bdag cag la sogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams na gnas pa ma rungs pa'i
320a4(1): tshogs gdug pa dang / sdang ba dang / gnod pa dang / shugs dang / 'tshe ba dang / rtsod pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / byams pa dang / snying rje dang phan pa'i sems skye bar mi nus pa rnams te/ rang rang gi
320a5(1): khams dang / byed pa dang / rigs dang / las kyi bya ba dang / rten dang / nus pa dang / dbang gi khyad par dag dang mthun pa'i bstan pa mi bzad pa stobs dang ldan pa dag bka' stsal bar gsol/ zhes gsol
320a6(1): to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la rab tu bkod pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// sku yi che ba rab bstan cing // gsung gi snying po
320b1(1): gnad bskul te// thugs kyi dgongs pa cher mdzad nas// 'jig rten dregs pa mthu stobs can// 'dus pa'i 'khor la bka' glal pa// hUM 'asdig rten dregs pa'i tshegs chen rnams// nga yi bka' bzhin nyan
320b2(1): par gyis// nga ni chos sku bde chen te// ye nas ma bcos lhun gyis grub// snang ba'i sku la dngos po med// ye shes sku ste sku yi mchog/ nga ni sngags gsung mthu chen te// ye nas tha snyad sgra dang bral/ brjod pa'i
320b3(1): gsung la 'dzin pa med// ma 'gags gsung ste gsung gi dpal// nga ni bden pa'i thugs mchog ste// ye nas mtshan ma yang dag bral// gnyis med thugs la rtsol ba med// skye med thugs te thugs kyi dpal//
320b4(1): nga ni yon tan tshogs chen te// lhun gyis grub cing bsam mi khyab// smon med dgos pa ma lus 'byung // dngos grub chen po bskyed pa'i gzhi// nga ni phrin las mdzad pa ste// yongs rdzogs brtson pa'i bdag
320b5(1): nyid can// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon du spyod// sna tshogs gzhan don lhun gyis rdzogs// 'jig rten sngags bdag dregs pa can// gtso chen dbang bsgyur khyed rnam kyang // nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi//
320b6(1): thugs dang ye nas gnyis su med// gsung dang dbye ba yod ma yin// sku las so sor mi blta ste// yon tan mnyam pa nyid du rdzogs// phrin las gcig ste thun mong bsgrub// thog ma med nas da// lha'i bar//
321a1(1): nyon mongs las kyi rgyu 'bras kyis// gnas ngan len gyi phung por smin// nga rgyal dregs pa'i lus ngag sems// stobs dang nus pa dpag med rdzogs// che btsan dbang phyug ldan gyur kyang // yang
321a2(1): dag nges pa'i don ma rtogs/ don dam bden pa khong ma chud// spros bral dge la blo ma phyogs// rang rig rgyal po'i stobs ma rnyed// skye med dbyings kyi rtsal ma shar// bde chen gnas kyi gdeng ma thob// mtshon
321a3(1): med bcud kyi ro ma myong // chos nyid sku yi gzugs ma mthong // ye shes klong gi sgo ma phyed// de bas rigs kyi bu rnams kyis// rang gi gnas la rab tu rtogs// lus la bdag tu yongs ma bzung // ngag la
