321a4(1): brjod par ma smra zhig/ sems la dngos por ga la rtog/ gnas yul rigs khams sde dang dpung // rten rdzas longs spyod dbang skal rnams// nga dang nga yir gzung bya min// thun mong dang ni tha dad gcig/ de
321a5(1): dag ma lus stong pa ste// stong pa nyid kyang de dag go/ de las gud na gzhan med de// gzhan las gud na'ang de med cing // ma skyes ma 'gags mtshan nyid med// ma phri ma bsnan ma bslad cing // ma bcos ma
321a6(1): bsgyur ma byung la// ma skyes ma bsgrubs ma bshad pa'i// don chen de ni rang nyid las// phyi nang snga phyi steng dang 'og/ phyogs mtshams 'khor 'das lus dang sems// kun nas rnyed pa ma yin te// 'di na'ang yod
321b1(1): pa ma yin no// sha khrag lpags pa rus pa dang // snying dang glo ba snod rnams dang // dbang po yan lag bcas pa la// bde chen dam pa de mi gnas// de las gzhan na'ang gnas med de// gnas ma grub la
321b2(1): gnas shes brjod// gnas yod snyam na der rtogs shig/ ci 'dra ci zhig ji lta bu// gang nas 'ongs shing gang du song // gang na 'dug cing ji zhig byed// dbyibs dang kha dog ming dang mtshan// rigs dang
321b3(1): khams la rab tu rtogs// de la de yis der bltas pas// mthong ba med pa blta ba'o// gang la gang gis gang bsgoms pas// bsgom dang bral bar bsgom zhes bya// ci la su zhig cir spyod pas// spyod rgyu mi
321b4(1): gnas spyod pa che// su la sus thob ci bsgrubs pas// ma grub rang gnas 'bras bu ste// ma lus med cing rnam pa yi// yon tan yongs rdzogs dbang phyug go/ zhi dang rgyas dang mngon du spyod// dbang du bsdu ba
321b5(1): phrin las yin// rang la rdzogs shing rang gis grub// zag chod pa dang bstan pa dang // tshad ldan mthar byin la bzla dang // 'das dang ma 'das ston pa dang // bshad dang nyan dang sdud pa dang // gnas dus
321b6(1): yon tan skyon rnams ni// rang gi de nyid rtogs pas 'grub// ces bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ don dam pa'i gnas nye bar bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas
322a1(1): rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dgongs pa chen po 'di gsungs te// ye nas ma byung ma skyes pa'i// chos nyid don gyi snying po ni// gzung 'dzin mtha' bral ma rtogs te// nga bdag 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog gis//
322a2(1): dregs shing gzir ba'i rA tra de// ma bsgral ba ni nyes pa ni// thabs dang shes rab snying rje gsum// mthun zhing mtshungs ldan sras kyis bsgral// dam pa'i don de ma rtogs par// dngos por bshad pas 'khor
322a3(1): bapabar ltung // mkhas rtogs ldan pas bshad pa yis// 'phags pa mnyes shing sems can sgrol// tshogs gnyis rdzogs te sku gsum thob// rnam rig mthong bas don thag gcad// brtul zhugs drag pos bsgrub
322a4(1): pa brtsam// dbang du bsdu dang 'dul ba'i phyir// 'jig rten las kyis bsdus pa'i rgyud// nga dang ston pa rnams kyis bshad// chos dbyings dur khrod rang gnas su// rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyis ni// sangs
322a5(1): rgyas bstan pa'i don du bsdus// snyigs ma rab tu bdo ba'i dus// bstod cing gtsug lag ltos pa'i chos// skyon dang yon tan tshul du 'byung // bstan pa 'jig byed las ngan can// drag sngags stobs kyis
322a6(1): bsgral byas na// rdzogs dang spangs pa thob par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor gnas pa'i rten yin te// lha dang sngags dang ting nge 'dzin// rdzas rnams rgyu dang rkyen du 'gyur// ling+ga nya bo dmigs pa'i rten// ming rus
322b1(1): byang bu rnam shes dang // snga tshe 'khor ba'i rten yin no// 'gugs 'dren gyis ni de dag dgug/ pho nyas las kun sgrub par byed// sngags kyi rdzas kyis dpal bskyed cing // thun rdzas rnams kyis myos pa dang //
322b2(1): rengs lkugs mtshon 'debs rdul du rlog/ gnad du 'bebs shing snying nas 'dren// lha dang 'byed cing rtsa ba gcod// byang chub sems kyi dngos po ni// don po khrag gi lan bu'i lan ma'i yang 'og/ kun gzhi til
322b3(1): 'bru tsam zhig gnas// rtsa ba klung gnas dra ba ste// phur pa me dpal lta bu yis// bsdus shing bsregs te gcad pa yis// dmigs pa rten dang bral bar byas// bkrag dang gzi mdangs rang la bsdus// phrin
322b4(1): las rnam bzhis gzir ba las// dge sdig ngo bo nyid du mnyam// blta spyod ldan pas zhing bcu de// pha rol bla med gnas su bsgral// bar ma do yi rnam shes ni// hUM dang phaT kyi 'phro 'du yis// sbyang dang sbar
322b5(1): ba'i las rnams bya// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i sras su bskyed// phung po lhag ma tsam nyid ni// rten gsum gyis ni rab tu sbyang // chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan par bya// 'di ni pha rol snga na med// bsgral ba
322b6(1): dus gsum sangs rgyas dang // rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' yi// spyod pa rlabs chen bshad pa'o// drag chags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// /
323a1(1): @/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// las kyi bye brag 'di gsungs te// thog mar 'di la shis pa'i gnas// dur khrod chu gling ri yi sul// khros shing gdug pa'i gnas de ru// rab tu gnas shing gdeng ldan
323a2(1): pa'i// dam tshig gnas pa'i bsgrub pa ste// yongs su rdzogs pa'i slob ma yis// sngon du bla ma mnyes byas nas// lhag pa'i lha nyid stobs dang ldan// rdo rje 'dzin pa he ru ka/ nye bar bsten dang gnyis su med//

323a4(1): pa'i rten// 'dom gang la sogs tshad dang ldan// lte ba la ni 'khor lo'i rtsibs// bzhi'am drug gam brgyad du dgod// bar khyams phyogs bzhi sgo bzhir bcas// rim pa gsum gyi thod phreng ldan// rang gi
323a5(1): rigs pa bsngags pa yi// dbyibs dang kha dog rgyan dang rtags// thams cad ldan pa nyid du bya// dregs pa can rnams sku yi rten// bres sam brkos sam brtsigs pa dag/ rang gi gnas su mdzes par dgod//
323a6(1): gsung gi snying po'ang de bzhin no// thugs rten rang gi phyag cha'am// sngon nas bsngags pa'i rdzas yin no// rang sngags gsang ba'i 'khor lo dang // mthun gzugs srog gi rgyal mtshan rnams// nang du mtshon
323b1(1): pa'i rten du gzug/ de dag tsit+ta so so ru// dmigs pa'i snying po dril te gzhug/ gsang ba sbas pa'i rten du 'gyur// de yi byang shar phyogs mtshams su// nga yis sngar bshad rgyud nyid las// e dbyibs bzhi dang
323b2(1): brgyad bcu gnyis// khru gang mdzub gang thur du brko// bdug cing dregs pa'i rdzas kyis byugs// bdug cing bsreg pa'ang de yis so// de nyid dgod pa'i rdzas rnams ni// rgyud med gzugs ngan ka pa la// seng
323b3(1): sdeng gser shing yan lag skyes// dpal ldan drag po'i phur pa dang // shel nag gnam ru nag po dang // gyi ling dkar dang gdong dmar dang // brda mi gcig dang srid shing dang // tshar dkar dang mgrin snyan
323b4(1): dang // sa spyod chu spyod rnams kyis lus// phyi nang bar dang gsang bas brgyan// dregs can spyi yi mnyes pa'i rdzas// rgyan ldan gzugs dang rnga gling sgra// gsur chen dri dang sha khrag ro// tsha rtsub reg dang 'bru
323b5(1): bcud bshos// sha chen dam tshig bdud rtsi'i tshogs// rab tu bstar zhing 'bad pas sbyar// dpa' zhing brtul phod skyes bu yis// nga yi sngon gyi phrin las bzhin// khro la khros pas zhi mdzad de// tha mal gnas
323b6(1): pa'i 'byung chen lnga// drag po sngags kyi 'byung bar bsgom// keng rus 'bar ba'i ri rab bam// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i gzhal med khang // b+han+da gnas rigs gsum gyis brtsig/ ti ra gsar rnying tshogs kyis
324a1(1): gtams// rak+ta dmar po brub cing 'bab// tshil chen dud pa 'khyil zhing 'phyur// dbang po don snying 'phyangs shing 'phrul// bdud rtsi bshang gci dri bsung ldan// yan lag nyid lag skams shing nying nga
324a2(1): snyil// sha dang pags pa brgyang zhing 'phyar// phyogs bzhi mtshams dang steng dang 'og/ gcus dang 'phyar dang bskums dang brkyangs// rgyal mtshan dang ni za ra tshags// ba dan bla bre lhab lhub dang // 'phur ma
324a3(1): dang ni lhab ma dang // mi mgo ka pA la rnams dang // rab tu mdzes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan// gzhal yas khang pa de 'dra ba// rab tu bsngags pa 'di la bshad// dregs pa'i bdag po yum dang bcas// sbyor zhing
324a4(1): bsnol ba de nyid kyis// bdag gi rang bzhin yongs su bskyed// 'phro dang las kyi khyad par dang // bsdu dang rang gi gnas su brten// skur gyur mtshan nyid ngo bo dang // byang chub sems kyi bya ba yis// yum dang
324a5(1): bcas pa yongs su rdzogs// de yi las kyang sngar bzhin du// rgyas mdzad rang gi spyan snga ru// dmigs pa myur lhag de yi 'khor// bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang // gnod sbyin drag po sde dang klu// rang gi chung
324a6(1): mar bcas pa dag/ ngas bshad bzhin du rigs par bsam// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag ste/ lha dang ma mo rgyal po ging // btsan 'gong dmu dang mu stegs dang // rang gi sde dang dpung du bcas// ma lus dregs
324b1(1): pa can gyi tshogs// 'di la rab brjod gang yin pa// de nyid du ni gsal bar bya// nga yi sku dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes rigs kyi dbang bskur zhing // byin gyis brlabs la rgyas btab ste// de la rang
324b2(1): bzhin gnas pa bstim// yongs rdzogs sku yi brtan par bsgrub/ phyag batshal mchod pa 'bul zhing bstod// rab tu mnyes pa rgya cher bya// phyi bshad nang dang gsang ba yis// bsdu dang sbyor dang sgrol ba dang //

324b6(1): gnam lcags thog gis 'joms// lha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis gsor// ma mo dpag chen mda' 'phen 'bigs// gza' bdud stobs chen sgyogs kyis brdeg/ klu ni sa 'og ral gri'i spos// thams cad
325a1(1): 'dul zhing gcod pa'i sngags// mun pa gling 'khrugs bdud kyi skad// ngu 'bod lta bu'i gshin rje ste// ro len dur ba srin pos khrid// lce mdud drag po gnod sbyin no// bka' chad drag rtsal lha yi
325a2(1): dmod// ngu 'bod gdung ba ma mo ste// 'brug sgra glog 'byin gza' bdud do// klu yi sbrul nag dug lces so// 'jig rten lha srin rang sgra yis// phal pa rnams la dmod par byed// de ni drag sngags dmod pa'o//

325a6(1): bdud po nag po kha mun de ba mi la tsho// ka la mu tri mA ra ya dgra bo snying ling tsit+ta rbud/ nr-i zlum khrigs/ nr-i zlum khrigs/ bram bram ro la 'dus/ zed spug dro spug bdud rjes chod/ bdud mos rol/ bdud
325b1(1): bus gtor// baM khyigs/ pra ma nr-i sha trUM mA ra ya rbad// mun pa gling 'khrugs zhes bya ba// ma 'ongs bdud kyi rang skad de// drag tu brjod cing spug mar brab// gang la dmigs pa de myur du// snang srid bdud kyis
325b2(1): srog nas 'dren// mi nag go mtshon bcas pa dang // sngags nag bud med mon dang rdo// khyi nag rta nag bya nag dang // rgod nag dre'u nag shel nag dang // ri nag mtsho nag shing nag tshogs// dmag dang 'khrug
325b3(1): pa 'thab pa dang // 'khrid dang gsod dang bsha' ba dag/ las byed grub pa'i rtags su 'gyur// de nas nya po bstab cing bsgral// gri mtshon phur pa rnams kyis gtub// lhag ma bdud rtsi sha khrag sbyar// ku ku

325b5(1): gzhug/ pho thod steng nas spyi bor phug/ bcings dang dgab pa drangs pa dag/ sngar bshad rdzas kyis brab cing brdeg/ ya ma me da k+She/ rA dza sa do me/ ru tsa na ya ni/ ro ma tsa ni/ ya ma ra tsa mu ka snying khrag rtsa la
325b6(1): rbad/ ya ma dbugs la rngubs/ ro tsa ya ma ra tsa ra tsa bta ri la rbad/ ya ma ra tsa hri sti snying ling chod/ ya ma snying / ya ma khrag ya ma du baM ri la rbad/ gshin rje bsdus shing dril ba'i blags// rab tu bablags te
326a1(1): tsit+tar brab// sha khrag chen pos mnyes par bya// gsod byed nag po'i tshogs rnams kyis// don snying rlon par ster ba dang // snying dang thod pa 'phar ba 'byung // de nas las la sbyar bar bya// gang la
326a2(1): dmigs pa myur du sgrol// gtum khros srin po'i dmod pa ni// myur shi'i thod par de snying nang // dmigs pa rnams kyi gzugs brnyan de// ming sngags ldan pa stsal bya ste// le brgan kha dog dar gyis dkris//
326a3(1): sngon dmar skud pa'i dra bar gzhug/ ti ra gsar pa kha phye la// dbang po don snying nang rol gyis// srin po bskang zhing dmod pa bzla/ rag sha srin po sa mun dzaH/ rag sha rU tra hur hur b+h+yo// rA tra gnyen po dgra
326a4(1): la b+h+yo// dgra bo mu li shig sod gtor// hab lo ho ba le kha thun b+h+yo// rag sha dza tri ta dza/ du ra dur shan dza/ rag sha rbad/ nr-i mA ra ya sod/ dmod pa rdzas la bzlas shing brdeg/ mi nag shan pa'i tshogs rnams
326a5(1): kyis// khrid dang gsod dang don snying ster// las la sbyar ba tshul bzhin gyis// dgra bo'i dngos po myur du sgrol// drag rtsal gnod sbyin drag sngags ni// rta dkar snying dang thod pa ni// nya bo gzhug pa'i snod du
326a6(1): bsngags// rin chen la phug mu pa la// snying sna khrag sna sbyar bas mchod// gnod sbyin srog tig dmod pa brjod// yak+ka baM hu da ri dza/ ma ga ma bag sha dza/ ru ru ma ru tra ma ti dza/ yak+ka snying la shad shad du dza/
326b1(1): yak+Sha srog la breng thun dza// nyi shar tshogs dang 'od dang sgra// rlung dmar dug dang bu yug 'ong // bsad pa'i rdzas kyis drag tu brdeg/ lhag ma bsreg cing rlung gis gtor// de nyid khrag gis lkugs te sgrol//
326b2(1): drag rtsal lha yi drag sngags ni// lha g.yag dkar po'i snying nang du// brnags pa'i gzugs dang ming rus bri// rngon dmar skud pas ske nas gdags// rje rigs thod pa'i nang du gzhug/ dar dkar gyis ni kha
326b3(1): bcad la// tshon skud sna lngas bcing bar bya// bya rgod dar ma'i sgo rtsa ni// srog rtsar bcug la dkyil du brtol// dkyil 'khor mda' gang gru bzhi la// dbus su gru gsum thur du bru// lha rdo gsum gyi skyed pu la//
326b4(1): gang gi thod pa gzhag par bya// thun rdzas bshos gtsang rngon cha dang // ru dkar snying dang shel dkar snying // bya dkar snying dang ru mtshon dang // ba dan dkar po rten du gzug/ nyung dkar dzags kyi mda'
326b5(1): mchog ni// thun gyi rdzas su gzhag par bya// drag sngags snying gi nang du brab// stobs ldan rdo rje 'dzin gsal bas// lha rnams 'dus pa'i drag sngags sbreng // ma ha de ba te dza hi dza/ saM pra ma na rak+Sha kaM ka sa ma
326b6(1): ya hUM/ de ba rA dza ma hA ni dza// dgra bo mA ra ya thun rbad/ thun rbad/ shag len dza dza/ shag len dza dza hUta hAta tsa tur mu kha rag sha man/ kata ka ya ma hAta/ ma hA de ba a mu ka mA ra ya sod// 'jig rten
327a1(1): dregs pa mthu rtsal can// lha yi bod rbad bsad gsum dril// drag tu bzla zhing snying la brab// rtags ni rgyal po rje dpon dang // skyes pa stag chas dar thogs dang // zhub can pho tshogs 'ong ba ni//

327a3(1): nam// 'jig rten lha chen gnas sar mnan// lha yi da la yams dgra la 'bebs// nad bdag ma mo'i drag sngags ni// snrel gri mo yi thod pa ru// de yi snying nang ling+ga gzhug/ mthing nag dar gyis kha bcad la//

327b2(1): rgod nag tshogs chen lhags// dngos su sha dang mgo sug ster// tsit+ta dngos su 'phar ba dang // bsad rtags yongs su rdzogs pa dang // snying la phur pas gdab cing gsad// dug shing mo la sbyin bsreg bya//

327b4(1): po'i// thod par snying nag ling+ga gzhug/ srog rtsar gri lcags sbu gu gzhug/ nyung dkar nyung nag zangs lcags phye// thun du badzags te thod par brab// ma ra ya pa shaM mi ki du ru du ru/ ma ti dza la ti dza/ tsa pa ma ni

328a1(1): chen gshog can 'khyug pa dang / bar snang 'ja' yis khengs pa dang // dgra bo dngos su khrid nas 'ong // rgod dang ri dwags gsod pa dang // don snying nang rol ster zhing rol// de 'dra'i bsad
328a2(1): rtags rdzogs pa dang // snying dang ling+ga hom mer bsreg/ gnod rdzas dgra yi yul du gtor// thod pa klu yi rten sar sba// chu 'khyags ser ba khrag tu 'bebs// hur thum nad kyis glo bur 'chi// kha lkugs rkang
328a3(1): lag rengs par 'gyur// gdug pa klu yi drag sngags ni// lung gsum 'dus pa'i dben gnas su// stegs bu mthing nag gru gsum brus// dgra yi pha mes mgo bo'am// yang na mdze can thod pa ru// dgra yi

328b1(1): shu ba sgang lo 'byung // stobs ldan gnyen pos rab tu gtsun// de nas byang bltas chu mig tu// ba li gtang zhing bden pa gdar// thod pa ling+gar bcas pa gnan// klu rgyal 'khor dag bcas la gtad// phung po

333a6(1): gzhal yas na/ gdug byed ru tra ti ra'i khri steng nas// mdangs ldan nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng na/ dregs pa'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtso// bcom ldan dpal chen stobs ldan nag po ni// sku mdog mthing nag
333b1(1): rab tu 'bar// sa dgu rdzogs pa'i dbu dgu bstan// stong pa bco brgyad ldan pa'i phyag/ zhabs kyis 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi gnon// dbus mthing g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba// khro zhing bzhad dang
333b2(1): gtsigs pa'i zhal// ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// khams gsum ma lus spyan gyis gzigs// shangs kyis srid gsum ma lus rngubs// snyan gyis stong gsum 'brug sgras 'gengs// tshems kyis gnod
333b3(1): gdug ma lus sgrol// ljags kyis glog dmar 'jig rten khyab// khro gnyer 'od kyis dbang du sdud// phrin las rigs kyis dbu la brgyan// bco brgyad phyag gi dang po gnyis// dbang sdud rdo rje dril bu
333b4(1): 'dzin// g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag brgyad na// dregs pa'i lha brgyad b+han+da g.yas// tsit+ta srog rtsa g.yon na bsnams// 'bar ba'i chas kyis sku la brgyan// sprul pa'i lha brgyad sku la rdzogs// g.yas g.yon
333b5(1): zhabs kyis dregs pa gzir// ma rungs gdul dka' rnams kyi gshed// lo lta rA tra 'dul ba'i dpal// 'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yum// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sbyor// gri gug tri shUl bdud
333b6(1): rtsi g.yas// b+han+da zhing chen g.yang gzhi g.yon// mthing nag 'od kyis kun tu khyab// ched 'ga' rigs kyi sprul pa ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// sku mdog mthing nag khro zhing rngams// phyag drug
334a1(1): g.yas g.yon dang po yis// rdo rje dung khrag dkrugs shing gsol// g.yas g.yon 'og ma'i phyag bzhi yi// lha brgyad klu brgyad tsit+ta rol// yum chen zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// sku mdog mthing
334a2(1): nag zhabs gnyis sbyor// g.yas kyis nam mkha' stong pa 'degs// g.yon gyis 'jig rten sa gzhi gnon// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga 'char ma// dpal chen yum gyi byin rlabs las// sprul pa dregs pa pho mo'i
334a3(1): tshogs// bdud nag me yi kha brlangs can// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // khram shing tri shUl g.yas na bsnams// g.yon gyis kha T+wAM zhags pa 'phen// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// zhabs
334a4(1): gnyis gdug pa'i snying la gzir// yum chen bdud mo khrag 'dzag ma// khram bam thod khrag phyag na bsnams// sku la zhing lpags gsar pa bgos// bdud rta nag po chibs su bcibs// zhabs kyis dgra
334a5(1): bgegs shugs kyis sgrol// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog nag/ phyag g.yas thod khrag gri gug g.yon// btsun mo yum chen za byed ma// gri gug thod pa phyag na
334a6(1): bsnams// yab yum zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// ma he khros dang chu glang bcibs// zhabs kyis dgra bgegs pho mo gzir/ srin po gsod byed sku mdog nag/ phyag na ral gri thod phrag bsnams/ yum chen
334b1(1): gsod par byed pa mo// gri gug mi thod phyag na bsnams// na bza' zhing lpags rlon pa gsol// stag seng rngams pa chibs su bcibs// gnod sbyin gang ba bzang po yang // zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog
334b2(1): sngo// dar nag 'phyar zhing zhing lpags rdebs// yum chen sha za ral gcig ma// yab kyi tshul 'dzin grub pa mo// zhing lpags gyon te gyi ling bcibs// drag sngags bdag po chen po ni// dbang phyug chen po lha yi
334b3(1): gtso// mdog dkar shel gri ba dan 'phyar// na bza' dar dkar ber chen gsol// chibs su gnam ru dkar po bcibs// thar pa nag po rA tra'i gtso// mchod gtor dug thun phyag na bsnams// zhing lpags
334b4(1): gon te dom nag bcibs// dmu bdud rje dpon nag po ni// dar nag 'phyar zhing ti ra bgrad// ber nag gsol zhing dmu rta bcibs// mu stegs ka la yag sha ni// mthing nag kha T+wAM tri shul 'dzin// zhing
334b5(1): lpags bgos te ma he bcibs// khyab 'jug rog ti nag po yang // khram shing dgra sta phyag gis 'dzin// sprin nag bgos shing 'brug sngon bcibs// klu rgyal bA ru Na yi rje// ser nag sbrul gyi na bza'
334b6(1): gsol// bum pa rus sbal phyag gis 'dzin// chibs su chu srin mgo dgu bcibs// rgyal po har mdzes zhes bya yang // mdog dkar shel gri dar dkar 'dzin// sras mchog 'bar ba dmar po ni// mdung ring
335a1(1): g.yas la shel gri g.yon// rdo rje mdzes pa 'jam pa yang mdog dmar po// ru mtshon dar dmar phyag gis 'dzin// khu le lag dgu 'bar ba yang // mdog ser sprul pa lag dgu 'gyed// zhing lpags
335a2(1): bgos shing ti ra gnon// drag sngags bdag po gtso 'khor bcas// rang gi rigs kyi 'khor 'dul ba// so so'i sprul pa bsam mi khyab// gcod par byed pa bdud kyi sde/ 'ching bar byed pa btsan gyi
335a3(1): sde// gsod byed shan pa srin po'i sde// gdug rtsub 'chang ba gnod sbyin sde// drag rtsal ldan pa lha yi sde/ nad gdon 'bebs pa ma mo'i sde// nam mkhar dbang bsgyur gza' yi sde/ glen lkugs gdug pa klu yi
335a4(1): sde// sde brgyad dmod pa'i drag sngags can// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// 'khor dang sde rigs brjod mi lang / phrin las mi zad longs spyod gter// yon tan nus pa dpag tu med// zhe sdang can la khro
335a5(1): bar ston// nga rgyal can la lhag par ston// 'dod chags can la mi sdug ston// gti mug can la myos par ston// ser sna can la phrog par ston// phrag dog can la 'jigs par ston// khyod kyis mi 'dul
335a6(1): gcig med kyis// mchod cing bskang ba'i mthun rdzas bzhes// bcol zhing gnyer ba'i las mdzod cig/ bstod cing bsgrub pas dgyes par mdzod// de nas rang gi snying po dang // 'jig rten dregs pa'i bdag
335b1(1): po rnams// so so'i sngags kyis las la sbyar// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po yis// byang chub sems kyi bsam pa yis// ltos dang re ba kun spangs te// sangs rgyas bstan la rab dmigs nas// drag sngags bdag po
335b2(1): nyer bsgrubs na// nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sa thob cing // sems can rnams kyi ston par 'gyur// thun mong ba dang nye ba dang // mchog gyur ring ba'i dngos grub
335b3(1): rnams// dpa' bo de la mngon du 'byung // yon tan mchog gi stobs rnyed cing // 'jig rten chos la rab bsngags pa'i// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang // sa chen po la gtogs pa yi// rlabs chen rnams
335b4(1): kyang nus par spyod// mthu stobs nus pas bsnyems pa yi// gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus shing // rang gi dbang du khug pa dang // bsgo ba rdzob pa med par 'gyur// zhes bka' stsal to// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo
335b5(1): rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las/ bstod pa yon tan brjod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen pos/ nyid kyi sku 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs su sprul pa de/ thugs chos nyid zhi
335b6(1): ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sku'i gnas thams cad la 'od zer gyi dra ba dpag tu med pa phyung nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dregs pa can gyi gnas thams cad
336a1(1): khyab par mdzad nas/ ma rungs shing gdug pa dang / gtum pa'i sems dang bsam pa thams cad ma lus pa zhi ba byang chub kyi sems dang ldan par gyur te/ phan pa dang / bde ba dang / gnod pa
336a2(1): med pa dang / brtse ba dang / yi dga' ba dang bcas pas phyogs der snang bar gyur nas// thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma bcom ldan rdo/
336a3(1): 'dzin// khyod kyis bstan pa gsang chen 'di// ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag tu// rab tu rgyas par 'gyur zhe na// bdag cag 'jig rten dregs pa can// zhi ba'i sems su gnas byas pas// rjes su spyod pa gang
336a4(1): yin pa/ de la phan pa rgyas par bstan// phrin las dang ni blta spyod kyi// khyab pa de la yongs rdzogs shing // grogs dang bran dang dmangs bzhin du// gang gis bsgo ba de bzhin bgyi// dam tshig lha yi yon tan
336a5(1): dang // rol pa'i ting 'dzin ldan de la// bka' las 'da' bar mi spyod cing // gsung bzhin bsgrub par rab tu spro// bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis// ji ltar bsngags pa'i las rnams ni// bdag cag nus
336a6(1): pas myur du bsgrub// byin gyis brlab par gtsor mdzod cig/ ces gsol nas rang rang gi gnas su dengs shing byin par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gyi bkod pa rnams dang / rang gi 'khor gyi
336b1(1): snang ba thams cad kyang nyid kyi sku'i dbyings su bsdus shing sku nyid kyang chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin du gnas par mdzad do// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud las// phrin las kyi gnyer phul ba'i le'u ste bcu
336b2(1): gcig pa'o// drag sngags 'dus pa rdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud ces bya ba rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po slob dpon chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba bai ro tsa na bdag gis bskur zhing zhus te gtan la
336b3(1): phab pa'o// rgyal po'i bla dpe'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya'o// rgya rgya rgya'o// gu h+ya// / @#// rgya gar skad du/ su ga ta sa mu da ya tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i
336b4(1): rgyud ces bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa/ mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas shing / sgyu ma'i dpe brgyad
336b5(1): ltar gnas pa las/ skye 'gag med cing bdag dang gzhan du mi mthong ste/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos thams cad byang chub sems su gcig la/ snang ba du mar tha dad par snang ste snang yang gcig dang du
336b6(1): mar brjod pa las 'das so// kye kye byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni// ngo bo gcig las med pa las// gcig la snang ba tha dad pas// gcig dang du ma'i brjod las 'das// zhes gsungs so// dpe mnyam
337a1(1): pa nyid dang / don mnyam pa nyid dang / chos thams cad lhun gyis grub pa mnyam pa nyid do// e ma ho// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// gcig dang du ma'i brjod las 'das// 'di zhes
337a2(1): gcig tu bstan par dka'// 'khor ba nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// zhes gsungs so// ma bcos ma bslad par rtogs na// yid bzhin nor bu 'dra ba'i phyir// gang ltar byas kyang lhun gyis grub// dbye ba med pa'i
337a3(1): don rtogs so// byang chub sems kyi ngo bo ni// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing // cir yang med par cir yang snang / don dam kun rdzob gnyis su snang // gcig dang du ma gnyis su snang // 'khor ba nyid
337a4(1): kyang mya ngan 'das// ma rig nyid kyang yang dag lam// byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na// rtog pa g.yeng ba chos kyi sku// ma rig ye shes tha dad med// so so snang ba phye ba tsam// ma rig pa yang lam du
337a5(1): gcig/ dang po gang nas ma byung bas// tha ma gar yang 'gro ba med// dang po skye ba'i rgyu med pas// tha ma 'chi ba'i lam yang med// dngos po ci la yang mi gnas pas// 'di zhes gcig tu bstan tu med// skye
337a6(1): zhing 'pho ba'i gnas med pas// bsad cing bcad pa bsgrub tu med// ma rig pa yi rtog pa yis// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// rdo rje lta bur gnas pa la// sgyu ma chu zla brag cha 'dra// zhes gsang ba'i
337b1(1): tshig tu gsungs so// kye kye thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs las// stong gsum rgyal ba'i skus gang yang // byang chub sems las g.yos pa med// dper na nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin// dkar dmar sngo ste ngos
337b2(1): gzung med// de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin yang // 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// mi shes par snang 'ja' tshon 'dra// de phyir ma bcos ji bzhin bzhag/ ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu gsungs so// bde
337b3(1): bar gshegs pa kun gyi gtso// yab yum sras dang bcas snang yang // byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gcig/ skye 'chi med pa byang chub sems// 'du 'bral med de chos kyi sku// bzang ngan med de 'khor 'das
337b4(1): chos// rgyu 'bras med de mnyam pa nyid// 'gag pa med de sems nyid ni// dper na rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra// nam mkha' bzhin du ye nas gnas// nam mkha' 'di ni 'di 'dra zhes// tshig tu rab tu brjod du
337b5(1): med// de bzhin sems kyi rang bzhin yang // 'di zhes gcig tu bstan du med// bstan na gzung 'dzin 'khrul pa'i chos// bstan du med pa blta ba'i mchog/ bsgom du med pa sgom pa'i mchog/ bsrung du med
337b6(1): pa'i dam tshig ni// ma bsrungs bzhin du lhun gyis grub// ma nor pa yi chos nyid la// rang bzhin skye med chos kyi dbyings// ma bcos pa yi byang chub sems// rgyu dang 'bras bu ma bkag chos// dper na rgya mtsho
338a1(1): chen po la// chu bran thams cad 'bab cing 'du// de bzhin byang chub sems nyid las// 'khor 'das gnyis ka 'byung zhing 'du// zhes rdo rje'i tshig tu gsungs so// e ma ho// bde bar gshegs
338a2(1): pa'i snying po ni// nam mkha' bzhin du brtag dka' zhing // me long gzugs bzhin gzung du med// brag cha bzhin du brjod dang bral// bcud kyi rdo rje snying po 'di// bdag dang gzhan du brjod du med// bstan
338a3(1): du med pa'i chos nyid 'di// brjod du med par go bar gyis// brjod med brjod pa brjod pa'i mchog/ mnyan bsam bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis// blo yi rtog pa kha phye la// nges pa'i don 'di rtogs par
338a4(1): gyis// nges pa'i don 'di ma rtogs na// bsgom dang bsgrub pa yun ring kyang // mi shes gzung 'dzin 'ching ba'i rgyu// de phyir rtogs pa sngon du 'gro/ rtogs pa gdeng du ma gyur na// ci ltar spyad kyang 'ching ba'i
338a5(1): rgyu// rtogs pa'i gdeng gi lta ba ni// dngos po gshis kyi gnas lugs brtags// nges pa'i don 'di ma rtogs na// mnyam bzhag bsgom pa chags pa'i rgyu// spu gri'i nags tshal la sogs kyang // rang gi rtog
338a6(1): pas brtas pa'i phyir// de phyir rtogs pa sngon du gtang // rtogs pa'i don 'di rab tu gces// zhes bde bar gshegs pa nyid kyi chos kyi sku skye ba med pa las chos nyid rang sgrar byung ba'i ngang las/ longs spyod
338b1(1): rdzogs pa'i sku skye ba'i cho 'phrul du 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa/ gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lor gsal ba la/ ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / rgya phyogs bcur yongs
338b2(1): su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med pa rgyas pa'i gru bzhir gyur pa'i nang dkyil 'khor dgu la 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud zlum po gru chad bzhi dang sgo bzhir ldan pa/ rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/
338b3(1): phyi rol byang chub kyi shing la sogs pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ phyi nas bltas pas nang gsal ba/ nang nas bltas pas phyi gsal la/ ye shes lhun gyis grub pa'i gzhal yas khang du gsal bar gyur
338b4(1): to// de ltar rang bzhin 'og min gyi gnas na/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad til gyi gang bu bzhin tu gnas te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / yum kun tu bzang mo dang / bde bar
338b5(1): gshegs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang bcas pa rang bzhin gyis gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / yum kun tu bzang mo gnyis chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas//
338b6(1): 'di skad ces gsungs so// kye kye// gtso bo gtso mo 'khor bcas kyang // rang bzhin 'og min gnas mchog na// chu zla gzugs brnyan 'dra ba la// nyon mongs dri mas gos pa med// rang bzhin don gyi dbyings
339a1(1): na bzhugs// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ston pa ltar// rang bzhin 'og min chos dbyings nas// gsung gis don rnams mi ston te// thugs kyis chos rnams mjal bar ston// zhes yab yum gnyis
339a2(1): po mnyam pa la bzhugs nas/ mnyam pa dang rtogs pa'i sgo nas gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po// 'og min gyi gnas na yum dang 'khril tshul du
339a3(1): bzhugs pa las/ yab kyis glengs pa// kye kye/ dag pa dri ma med pa'i chos// bla med byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs// 'khor ba'i rnam rtog gzhom pa dang // drag pos 'gro ba drang ba'i phyir// yab yum gnyis med
339a4(1): 'khril ba'i tshul// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu brjod do// de nas yum yang mnyam pa nyid kyis 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bskul ba// kye kye/ bde gshegs rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// mnyam pa chen po'i don bstan
339a5(1): nas// gang la 'dul ba bstan pa'i phyir// mi 'gyur rdo rje'i gtso mchog la// gnyis med chen pos 'khyud par bya// zhes gsungs so// de nas dgyes pa chen po des// gsang ba'i thugs mnyam pa'i ngang gis//
339a6(1): kye kye snying po don gyi gtso// bde bar gshegs pa kun gyi sras// 'khor ba yongs kyi ded dpon po// gnyis su med pa'i yum dang bzhugs// zhes glengs te mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
339b1(1): so// de nas yum gyis bskul ba// kye kye bde gshegs kun gyi gtso// ma rig mun la 'joms pa'i bdag/ kun kyang 'gro ba'i don bya'i phyir// dri med gsal ba nyi zla'i 'od// chos nyid mnyam pa'i klong na
339b2(1): bzhugs// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso/ mun pa 'joms pa'i shes rab 'od// 'gro ba sgrol ba'i ded dpon gtso// 'khor ba'i dri ma 'khrud pa'i chu// 'gro ba yongs kyi gnyen gcig po// gnyis med bde/
339b3(1): ba'i dbyings dkyil du// dgyes pa chen po dbab tu gsol// zhes yum gyi mnyam pa'i ngang la gnas nas de skad ces gsungs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po des/ rgyal po dga' ba zhes bya
339b4(1): ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rdo rje'i tshig 'di skad glengs so// kye ho rgyal ba 'gro ba'i don bya'i phyir// rigs kyi yum dang gnyis med par// pad+ma chen po gdangs su gsol// 'khor gyi rnam pa
339b5(1): bskyed du gsol// gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// de nas yum chen mo nyid kyi bsam pa g.yos par gyur to/ e ma ho// ston pas bstan pa 'di bstan phyir// 'khor ba 'dul ba'i ded dpon
339b6(1): gtso// dgyes pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo yis// gnyis med dgyes par gyur nas ni// gsang ba chen po'i char chen phob/ a la la ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ a nu rA ga ho/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ hUM trAM hrI haH/ de nas yab yum gnyis su
340a1(1): med pa las/ bde bar gshegs pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa thon par gyur nas/ rang bzhin gnyis su med pa mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// gleng slong ba'i
340a2(1): le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa kun gyis/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces zhus so// kye kye bde gshegs chos kyi
340a3(1): sku// rtog pa'i dra ba gzhom pa'i phyir// bde gshegs rigs brgya'i sgrub pa'i thabs// legs par rgyas par bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pas// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos gsungs pa/ nyon
340a4(1): cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs thams cad ni// rigs brgyar 'dus pa ngas bshad do// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// 'du 'dzi spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sa yi
340a5(1): cho ga legs byas la// mgon po thugs dam can rnams mchod// bkra shis sa la maN+Dal bya// 'dom gang rgyal chag gang dpangs// rnam lnga sman gyis chag chag gdab// stangs stabs khro bos mtshams bcad
340a6(1): la// dkyil 'khor thig ni gdab par bya// thig g.yog grogs dang rab ldan pas// ye shes lnga ldan srid bu yis// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// slob dpon nub la slob ma shar// rdo rje khu tshur
340b1(1): byin brlabs la// pho brang dgu pa'i thig tu gdab// thig ni bcu drug btab pa la// cha ni bzhi bzhir mnyam par dbye// rtsa ba dbus cha gnyis te mtha' gnyis dor ba sgo// rgyan dang chas bya dbus brgyad cha las
340b2(1): sgo 'gram dang // ya phubs logs la sgo khyud ngos la tshon sna lngas// bskor bya khyams kyi cha la longs spyod 'gram gyi cha// rin chen pha gu logs rgyab cha la 'gram dang phyed// logs rgyab cha gzhan ka ba cha lnga ya
340b3(1): phubs btegs// rdo ra rnam bzhi rgyan gyis rnam mdzes rta babs dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo rtse bran gdugs mdzes ri dwags bcas// ba dan 'phan dang rin chen rgyal mtshan mdzes par bya// pad phreng me 'od rdo
340b4(1): rje'i phreng bas mdzes par bskor// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor rang gzhung ci rigs mdzes par bskor// sa tshon sna lnga dpa' bo 'bru lnga yis// ye shes lnga dang ldan par byin brlabs la// dbus su rigs sbyar mu khyud
340b5(1): 'od zer ldan// rtsibs bzhi rigs kyis dbye zhing gong ra mdzes pa'i tshon// mu khyud rdo rje'i ra ba gru chad khyams tshul phyogs// sgo bzhi rigs dang sbyar la brtsig pa rigs kyis dbye// 'dod yon khyams dmar
340b6(1): rin chen pha gu ser// dra ba dra phyed ser la da ru ka ni ljang / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dgu la sgo rgyan bcas// phyi khyams phyogs kyis phye la sgo yang de dang bstun// rtsig pa dkar mthing ser dmar ldang gis
341a1(1): bskor// 'dod yon la sogs gong 'dra rta babs la sogs sgo rgyan bya// mu khyud pad+ma'i phreng ba rdo rje phreng ba ldan// phur pa mda' dang me long ral gri la sogs dgod// dar dang ras kyi yol bre
341a2(1): tshon skud dra bar gzhug/ de ni bsnyen bsgrub gnyis ka'i dkyil 'khor yin// zhes gsungs so// rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor bri ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs
341a3(1): pa'i lha tshogs rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das te bde gshegs gtso// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das
341a4(1): kyis bka' stsal pa// dam pa rigs brgya'i bsgom rim la// thog mar byang chub sems bskyed de// yan lag bdun gyis tshogs bsags la// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// stong zhing bdag med ma bcos
341a5(1): bsgom// kun tu snang ba'i ting 'dzin ni// khyab pa'i snying rje chen por bsgom// de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// rang sems yi ge a ru gsal// yi ge a yi byin rlabs las// e las nam mkha' yaM las rlung // baM
341a6(1): las chu dang suM las gser// laM las ri rab raM las me// b+h+rUM las rin chen gzhal yas khang // dkyil 'khor dgu la dkyil 'khor gcig/ dbus kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru chad sgo bzhir bcas pa la//
341b1(1): phyi khyams rgyan gyis mdzes byas pa'i// gzhal yas gsal bar grub par bsgom// de nas nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan// lha rnams kun gyi gnas su gding // de nas rang sems yi ge a// dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i
341b2(1): gdan steng babs/ spro bsdus 'od zhu 'khor lor gsal// rnam par snang mdzad kun bzang mo// shar du mi bskyod sangs rgyas spyan// lho ru 'byung ldan gos dkar mo// nub tu snang mtha' mA ma ki/ byang du don
341b3(1): grub dam tshig sgrol// shar phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dbus su kun tu bzang po dang // yum gcig rdo rje dbyings phyug ma// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' la// lho ru rdo rje rgyal po'o// nub tu rdo rje chags pa
341b4(1): la// byang du rdo rje legs pa'o// shar du rdo rje sgeg mo la// lho ru rdo rje bdug pa mo// nub tu rdo rje lcags kyu ma// byang du rdo rje me sgron ma'o// lho yi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo 'jam dpal gzhon nu
341b5(1): dang // yum gcig rin chen dbyings phyug ma// shar du rdo rje rin chen la// lho ru rdo rje gzi brjid che// nub tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan la// byang du rdo rje bzhad pa'o// shar du rdo rje phreng ba ma// lho ru rdo rje bdug pa
341b6(1): mo// nub tu rdo rje zhags pa ma// byang du rdo rje bde ba mo// nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo spyan ras gzigs dbang la// yum chen pad+ma dbyings phyug ma// shar du rdo rje chos dang ni/ lho ru rdo rje non
342a1(1): po dang // nub tu rdo rje smra ba ste// byang du rdo rje 'khor lo'o// shar du rdo rje dbyangs can ma// lho ru rdo rje mar me ma// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// byang du rdo rje gsal bkra ma'o// byang gi phyogs kyu
342a2(1): dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'chang chen sangs rgyas dang // yum chen las kyi dbyings phyug ma// shar du rdo rje las dang ni// lho ru rdo rje srung ba dang // nub tu rdo rje gnod sbyin te// byang du rdo rje khu tshur ro// shar du rdo
342a3(1): rje gar bsgyur ma// lho ru rdo rje byug pa mo// nub tu rdo rje dril 'khrol ma// byang du rdo rje thog 'bebs ma'o// shar lho'i mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo sa yi snying po la// yum chen rdo rje sems ma ni// shar
342a4(1): du chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang // lho ru dbang phyug rgyal po la// nub tu bkod pa'i rgyan dang ni// byang ru rin chen 'od 'phro'o// shar du bde ba rgyas 'debs ma// lho ru bde ba rmongs phyed ma// nub tu bde ba za byed
342a5(1): ma// byang du bde ba tshe 'phel ma'o// lho nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo nam mkha'i snying po'o// yum chen rin chen sems ma'o// shar du snang ba'i mchog dang ni// lho ru phyag rgya'i rgyal po'o// nub tu
342a6(1): spobs pa'i rgyal po dang // byang du spobs pa brtsegs pa'o// shar du khrus kyi lha mo la// lho ru rgyal mtshan lha mo'o// nub tu bla re'i lha mo la// byang du gdugs kyi lha mo'o// nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor
342b1(1): du// gtso bo byams pa chen po la// yum chen pad+ma'i sems ma'o// shar du pad+ma'i rgyal po la// lho ru pad+ma dam pa'o// nub tu rdo rje mi g.yo ba// byang du rdo rje thogs med dang // shar du lha mo pad+ma can// lho ru lha mo
342b2(1): 'dzin byed ma// nub tu lha mo skyon bral ma// byang du lha mo rnam rgyal ma'o// byang shar mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo sgrib pa rnam sel dang // yum chen las kyi sems ma la// shar du rin chen dbang phyug
342b3(1): ma// lho ru rdo rje thub pa'i las// nub tu dag par ston pa dang // byang du mi g.yo ba yi mtha'/ shar du lha mo dbyangs can ma// lho ru lha mo dri med ma// nub tu lha mo sgra gcan ma// byang du lha mo thogs med
342b4(1): ma'o// dkyil 'khor phyi yi bar khyams la// shar stod mi yi thub pa la// shar smad lha yi thub pa'o// lho stod lha min thub pa la// lho smad byol song thub pa'o// nub tu yi dwags thub pa ste// byang du dmyal
342b5(1): ba'i thub pa'o// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma// lho ru rdo rje zhags pa ma// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// byang du rdo rje dril bu ma'o// de ltar lha tshogs brgya po rnams// sku ni phyag rgya chen po la// gsung ni sngags kyi
342b6(1): dam tshig ste// thugs ni phyag rgya chen por ldan// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// snang la rang bzhin med pa ni// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan nam// chu zla nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra// zhes gsungs
343a1(1): so// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// dam pa rigs brgya'i lha tshogs kyi// skyed pa rtsa ba'i sngags bshad pa// dbus kyi
343a2(1): lha tshogs bskyed pa ni// oM bud+d+ha be ro tsa na oM/ oM badz+ra dwe Sha ra ti oM/ oM badz+ra ak+Sho b+hu hUM/ oM badz+ra bud+d+ha lo tsa na hUM/ oM rat+na sam+b+ha ba tAM/ oM badz+ra paN+Da ra ba sa nI tAM/ oM badz+ra a mi ta b+hA hrIH/ oM badz+ra mA ma ki hrIH/ oM
343a3(1): badz+ra a mo g+ha sid+d+hi hA/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya tA rA hA/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor rnams kyi sngags/ oM badz+ra sa mAn+ta b+ha dra hUM/ oM badz+ra d+ha rA hUM/ oM badz+ra satwa hUM/ oM badz+ra rA dza hUM/ oM badz+ra rA ga hUM/ oM badz+ra swa d+hu hUM/ oM badz+ra lA s+ye
343a4(1): hUM/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ oM badz+ra ang+ga sha hUM// oM badz+ra dI bi shwa ra ti hUM/ lho phyogs dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sngags/ oM many+dzu shrI ku mA ra mu la tAM/ oM badz+ra rat+na d+ha rA hUM/ oM badz+ra rat+na hUM/ oM badz+ra sUR+Ya tAM/ oM badz+ra ke tu hrIH/
343a5(1): oM badz+ra ha sa hA/ oM badz+ra mA le hUM/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe tAM/ oM badz+ra pA sha hrIH/ oM badz+ra su kha hA/ nub phyogs lha tshogs dkyil 'khor sngags/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta a ba lo ki ti ka ru Na ma hA rA dza hrIH/ oM pad+ma d+ha rA hrIH/
343a6(1): badz+ra d+harma hUM/ oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na tAM/ oM badz+ra b+ha ShA hrIH/ oM badz+ra tsakra hA/ oM girti hUM/ oM badz+ra A lo ke tAM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta hrI/ oM badz+ra rA ga ra ti hA/ byang gi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sngags/ oM badz+ra pA Ni sa man+ta hUM/ oM badz+ra
343b1(1): karma d+ha rA hUM/ oM badz+ra karma hUM/ oM rak+Sha tAM/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha hrIH/ oM badz+ra san+ni hA/ oM badz+ra nr-i t+ye hUM// oM badz+ra gan+d+he tAM/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De hrIH/ oM badz+ra A be sha hA/ shar lho mtshams kyi lha tshogs sngags/ oM k+Shi ti gar+b+ha rat+na oM/
343b2(1): oM badz+ra nirti hUM/ oM d+harma ke tu hUM/ oM ke tI shwa ra rA dza tAM/ oM b+hA ha laM rA dza hrIH/ oM rat+na pra b+hA hA/ oM badz+ra kha T+wAM ka pra dza la ya hUM/ oM badz+ra a mo g+ha sha ra ya tAM/ oM badz+ra rA ga sa ma ya hrIH/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De dza la ya hA/ lho
343b3(1): nub mtshams kyi lha tshogs sngags/ oM A kA sha gar+b+ha swA hA oM rat+na ni tre tAM/ oM A lo ke a gra pra be ho hUM/ oM mu dra rA dza pra b+ha ta tAM/ oM pra ti b+hA na rA dza ne hrIH/ oM pra ti b+ha na ku Ta ye ha/ oM badz+ra A prA baM hUM/ oM badz+ra
343b4(1): ke tu tAM/ oM bi tA na d+ha hrIH/ oM tshar+tha hrIH/ nub byang dkyil 'khor lha tshogs sngags/ oM hrI ma hA me tri hUM/ oM pad+ma ni ti oM oM ka ma la rA dza ma hA rA dza hUM// oM pad+mo t+ta ma pad+ma d+ha ra tAM/ oM badz+ra ak+Sho b+h+ya hrIH/ oM a mo g+ha
343b5(1): rA dza ya nAM/ oM bi ma le karma many+dzu Sha ya hUM/ oM dza li mi li hu ba tre ba tu sa ba tre tAM/ oM ta ka ru na dza la pra tsa pad+me hrIH/ oM tra sa ni bi tra sa ni ba tra sa ni hA/ byang shar dkyil 'khor lnga tshogs sngags/ oM sarba Ni ba ra
343b6(1): Na bi shwa d+ha ra ya ba re oM/ oM karma ni te oM/ oM rat+ne sha dar rat+na d+ha ra hUM/ oM karma sid+d+hi rat+na d+ha rA ya traM/ oM A ra ha shA d+ha ra ya hrIH/ oM a tsa la ak+Sho b+hu d+ha rA ya hA/ oM dza ye dza ye ba ha sarba sha ni hUM/ oM dz+wa la pra
344a1(1): dz+wa la dA hA pa tsa tAM/ oM gan+d+he tsu ru ma hA pa sha ra a ti ti hrIH/ oM ha ka hu ru na pra ka ri hA/ dkyil 'khor 'khyams la thub drug sngags/ oM mu ne kri swA hA/ oM mu ne trAM hUM swA hA/ oM mu ne sr-i swA hA/ oM mu
344a2(1): ne praM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir sgo ma'i sngags/ oM badz+ra aM ku sha dza/ oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ oM badz+ra s+pho Ta baM/ oM badz+ra g+haN+De hoH/ dam pa rigs brgya'i rtsa ba'i sngags// sku bskyed
344a3(1): gsal gdab bsnyen sngags yin// ces gsungs so// dam pa rigs brgya'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog
344a4(1): phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// dbus su rnam par snang mdzad dkar// g.yas pa ye shes 'khor lo la// g.yon pa dngul dkar dril bu'o// zhabs ni mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// yum chen kun bzang bdag nyid
344a5(1): dkar// g.yas pas yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud// g.yon pas dril bu 'dud pa'i tshul// shar du mi 'khrugs mthing ga la// phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga 'dzin// yum chen sangs rgyas spyan ma ni// rgyan dang cha lugs
344a6(1): yab dang mthun// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan ser// phyag na rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// yum chen gos dkar yab dang mthun// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dmar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// mA ma kI ni yab
344b1(1): dang mthun// byang du don yod grub pa ldang // phyag na ral gri bsnams pa'o// dam tshig sgrol ma yab dang mthun// shar gyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su kun tu bzang po dkar// phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga
344b2(1): bsnams// rdo rje dbyings phyug yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje sems dpa' dkar// phyag na rdo rje rtse lnga bsnams// lho ru rdo rje rgyal po ser// phyag na rdo rje lcags kyu bsnams// nub tu rdo rje chags pa
344b3(1): dmar// phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// byang du rdo rje legs pa ldang // phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o// shar du rdo rje sgeg mo dkar// phyag na 'gengs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lho ru rdo rje bdug pa ser// phyag na spos
344b4(1): kyi sprin spro ba'o// nub tu rdo rje lcags kyu dmar// phyag na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje me sgron ldang // phyag na gsal ba'i sgron me'o// lho yi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su 'jam dpal gzhon
344b5(1): nu ser// phyag na rin chen ral gri'o// rin chen dbyings phyug yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje rin chen dkar// phyag na rdo rje rin chen bsnams// lho ru rdo rje gzi brjid ser// phyag na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
344b6(1): bsnams// nub tu rdo rje rgyal mtshan dmar// phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje bzhad pa ldang // phyag na so 'phreng bsnams pa'o// shar du rdo rje phreng ba dkar// phyag na rin chen phreng ba
345a1(1): bsnams// lho ru rdo rje me tog ser// phyag na me tog bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje zhags pa ma/ phyag ni 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// byang du rdo rje bde ma ldang // phyag na bsil yab bsnams pa'o//
345a2(1): nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// pad+ma dbyings phyug yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje chos ni dkar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho ru
345a3(1): rdo rje rnon po ser// phyag na ral gri bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje smra ba dmar// phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje 'khor lo ldang // phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// shar du rdo rje dbyangs mkhan
345a4(1): dkar// phyag na pi waM bsnams pa'o// lho ru rdo rje mar me ser// phyag na mar me bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje gsal bkra ljang // phyag na rma
345a5(1): bya bsnams pa'o// byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo phyag na rdo rje ldang // phyag na rdo rje bsdams pa'o// las kyi dbyings phug yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje las ni dkar// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram
345a6(1): bsnams// lho ru rdo rje srung ba ser// phyag na go cha bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje gnod sbyin dmar// phyag na mche ba bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje khu tshur ldang // phyag ni phyag rgya khu tshur mdzad// shar du rdo rje gar
345b1(1): bskur dkar// phyag rgya sna tshogs bsgyur ba'o// lho ru rdo rje byug pa ser// phyag na spos chu bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje dril 'khrol dmar// phyag na dril bu 'khrol ba'o// byang du rdo rje 'bebs ma ldang // phyag na
345b2(1): bum pa'i chu rgyun bsnams// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo sa yi snying po dkar// phyag na rin chen snyems ma bsnams// rdo rje sems ma yab dang mthun// shar du rdo rje rgyal mtshan dkar// phyag
345b3(1): na chu srin gser mdog bsnams// lho ru dbang phyug rgyal po ser// phyag na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// nub tu bkod pa'i rgyan ni dmar// phyag na me tog bsnams pa'o// byang du rin chen 'od 'phro ldang // phyag na
345b4(1): rin chen bsnams pa'o// shar du bde ba rgyas 'debs dkar// phyag na kha T+wAM bsnams pa'o// lho ru bde ba za byed ser// phyag na mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// nub tu bde ba rmongs byed dmar// phyag rgya thugs
345b5(1): kar bsnol ba'o// byang du bde ba za byed ldang // phyag na dril bu bsnams pa'o// lho nub mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo nam mkha'i snying po dkar// phyag na rin chen za ma tog/ rin chen dbyings phyug
345b6(1): yab dang mthun// shar du snang ba'i mchog ni dkar// phyag na rdo rje bsnams pa'o// lho ru phyag rgya'i rgyal po ser// phyag na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o// nub tu spos kyi glang po dmar// phyag na 'od kyi za ma
346a1(1): tog/ byang du spobs brtsegs kun 'dren ldang // phyag na gser tog mdag pang lcags kyu bsnams// shar du khrus kyi lha mo dkar// phyag na khrus bum bsnams pa'o// lho ru rgyal mtshan lha mo
346a2(1): ser// phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// nub tu bla re'i lha mo dmar// phyag na bla re bsnams pa'o// byang du gdugs kyi lha mo ljang // phyag na gser gdugs bsnams pa'o// nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil
346a3(1): 'khor du// dbus su gtso bo byams pa dmar// phyag na klu shing pad+ma bsnams// pad+ma'i sems ma yab dang mthun// shar du pad+ma'i rgyal po dkar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lho ru pad+ma dam pa ser// phyag na
346a4(1): pad+ma kha ma bye ba'o// nub tu rdo rje mi g.yo dmar// phyag na bsam gtan po ti bsnams// byang du thogs med rgyal po ljang // phyag na lcags kyu gser g.yu bsnams// shar du lha mo pad+ma dkar// phyag na dpal be'u
346a5(1): bsnams pa'o// lho ru lha mo 'jigs byed ser// phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// nub tu lha mo skyon bral dmar// phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// byang du lha mo rnam rgyal ldang // phyag na rgyal mtshan bsnams
346a6(1): pa'o// byang shar mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo sgrib pa rnam sel ldang // phyag na po ti bsnams pa'o// las kyi sems ma yab dang mthun// shar du rin chen dbang sdud dkar// phyag na rin chen zur
346b1(1): brgyad bsnams// lho ru grub pa'i las ni ser// phyag na rin chen rgya gram bsnams// nub tu dga' ba ston pa dmar// phyag na rdo rje rgya gram bsnams// byang du mi g.yo mtha' ni ldang // phyag na rgya gram bsam
346b2(1): gtan mdzad// shar du lha mo skyabs can dkar// phyag na gdu bu bsnams pa'o// lho ru lha mo dri med ser// phyag na bum pa bsnams pa'o// nub tu lha mo sgra sgrogs dmar// phyag na 'bud dung bsnams
346b3(1): pa'o// byang du lha mo sgra sgrogs ldang // phyag na gser gyi nya bsnams pa'o// dkyil 'khor phyi yi bar khyams la// shar stod lha yi thub pa dkar// phyag na pi wang bsnams pa'o// shar du lha min thub pa sngo// phyag
346b4(1): na go mtshon bsnams pa'o// lho ru mi yi thub pa ser// phyag na gseg shang par bu bsnams// nub stod byol song thub pa nag/ phyag na po ti bsnams pa'o// nub smad yi dwags thub pa dmar// phyag na rin chen
346b5(1): sgrom bu bsnams// byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa nag/ phyag na me chu bsnams pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi ru// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma// phyag na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa
346b6(1): ser// phyag na zhags pa bsnams pa'o// nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dmar// phyag na lcags sgrog bsnams pa'o// byang du rdo rje dril bu ldang // phyag na dril bu bsnams pa'o// de ltar phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi
347a1(1): yi// bde gshegs thams cad dam pa rigs brgyar 'dus// rigs brgya bsdus pa rgyal ba rigs lngar 'dus// de yang chos sku thig le nyag gcig dang du 'dus// zhes gsungs so// bde
347a2(1): gshegs rigs brgya'i sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas yang dang nges gsungs pa// bde gshegs rigs brgya'i lha tshogs rnams// rgyan dang cha lugs mtshan dang dpe
347a3(1): byad ldan// mnyam par ma 'dres 'ja' tshon ri mo 'dra// snang la mi rtog me long gzugs brnyan 'dra// sku mdog rigs kyi phyag rgya so sor gsal// gsung gi phyag rgya oM hUM trAM hrIHhA lnga/ so so'i rigs kyi yig/
347a4(1): 'brur gsal// thugs kyi phyag rgya phyag mtshan ni// g.yas pa so so'i phyag mtshan bsnams// g.yon pa thams cad dril bu bsnams// de ltar rigs brgya gsal bsgoms la// chos sku thig le gcig tu
347a5(1): bsgom// sku gsung thugs su byin rlob cing // ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA la badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta wA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra sa
347a6(1): b+ha ba at+ma kaT+TaH/ oM ma hA bu n+yat+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA pa at+ma ko&H/ oM ma hA ya daR+sha dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hA la at+ma kon+yaH/ oM ma hA sa ma hA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa sAt+ma koT+TaH/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kr-i t+ya nuSh+TA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA la
347b1(1): At+ma ko&haM/ oM pra t+ya bek+Sha Na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha wa At+ma ko&haM/ de ltar byin brlabs dbang bskur nas/ phyag rgya chen po bsgrub par bya// dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed pa'o// zhes gsungs so// dam tshig gi dkyil
347b2(1): 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas kyis dpal kun tu bzang po la gsol pa/ ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor de lags na// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ji ltar
347b3(1): bsgrub// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dgug pa ni// thugs ka'i hUM gi 'od zer gyis// sprul pa'i lha mo 'phros pa yis// chos kyi dbyings kyi
347b4(1): pho brang nas// dam pa rigs brgya'i lha tshogs la// snyan gsan phab ste spyan drangs la// mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa de// 'od kyi nang du spyan drangs la// dam tshig la ni ye shes bstim// gnyis su med par
347b5(1): brtan par gzhug/ gzhal las khang gi sgo bzhi nas// thugs las sprul pa'i gsang yum bzhis// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis phyag kyang btsal// 'dod yon lha mo lha tshogs kyis// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa
347b6(1): rnams// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis tshim par mchod// mchod cing bstod pa dag par 'bul// bzlas pa'i 'phro 'du bya ba ni// oM A li kA li pany+tsa dz+nyA na sa twa kro d+ha mu na ye swA hA// dam pa rigs brgya 'dus pa'i
348a1(1): sngags// lha rnams thugs kar nyi ma'i steng // ye shes sems dpa' gsal bkod la// de yi thugs kar zla ba'i steng // sngags kyi phreng ba gsal bkod de// 'od zer 'phro 'dus bsnyen pa
348a2(1): bya// bdag gzhan don gyi bzlas pa rnams// gang 'dod tshad du phyin par bzlas/ de nas ting 'dzin gtong 'dod na// lha tshogs rnams la bshags pa bya// gtor ma byin gyis brlabs la gtang // bkra shis
348a3(1): brjod cing phrin las bcol// de ltar bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba ni// zla drug zla ba bcu gnyis sam// lo gsum lo drug bcu gnyis kyis// rig 'dzin sa la nges par sbyor// zhes gsungs so// rang bzhin gyi dkyil
348a4(1): 'khor bsgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// rtags thon bsnyen bsgrub thon pa dang // cho ga'i rim pa rab rdzogs nas// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdu byas te// dam tshig
348a5(1): sems dpa'i lha tshogs dang / ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ni// gnyis med gcig la gnyis su dbye// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// oM AHhUM muM gyi sngags brjod pas// bdag la zhal
348a6(1): bstan dbyings su gshegs// dam tshig sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor de// sgo ba rim gyis byang nas bsdu// sgo ba thub pa drug la bsdu// thub drug byang shar dkyil 'khor la// mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim
348b1(1): gyis bsdu// phyogs bzhi byang nas rim par bsdu// shar nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor la// mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim gyis bsdu// dbus kyi lha tshogs byang nas bsdu// dbus kyi gtso bo nyid la
348b2(1): bsdu// gtso bo thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' la// de yang rdo rje nas tsam la// de yang yi ge hUM la bsdu/ hUM yang rim gyis thig le la// thig le chos kyi dbyings su bsdu// de yi ngang du blo bzhag la// slar yang
348b3(1): lha yi ting 'dzin du// skad cig langs te spyod lam bya// 'di ltar bskyed rdzogs don bsgoms na// nges par legs pa'i don mthong nas// rig 'dzin sa la rdzogs par sbyor// zhes gsungs so// dam pa rigs
348b4(1): brgya'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'o// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud las mjug rdzogs rim gyi le'u ste dgu pa'o// // bde gshegs dam pa rigs brgya'i sgrub thabs bstan pa'i skabs te dang po'o// de
348b5(1): nas spyi dpal chen po kun tu bzang po la/ rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma ho spyi dpal kun tu bzang // 'gro ba'i log rtog gzhom pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// ye shes
348b6(1): da pa'i sgrub thabs gang // sgri dpal yab kyis bka' stsol cig/ de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal yab kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// ma rtogs pa dang log
349a1(1): par rtog/ phyogs rtog yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul bar dgongs nas gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgras btags ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab
349a2(1): mtshon te// khong nas gsang sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gab// thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs te// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung // snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la bstan// lus dang
349a3(1): longs spyod gtong la sbyin// slob dpon mnyes par bya ba dang // sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dbang rnams rdzogs par byas pa yis// 'dod yon g.yeng ba kun spangs te// dka' thub spyod pas ma
349a4(1): gdungs par// ting 'dzin thub pa'i sa phyogs su// rab tu bde ba'i bstan la 'dug/ byams dang snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms bzhi po rab bsgoms nas// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// sku
349a5(1): gsung thugs ni bsgrub bya zhes// bdag ni bsam pa brtan byas te// rang snying sa bon 'od zer las// sprul pa'i mchod pa'i tshogs spros te// mdun gyi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams dang // bla ma la sogs rnams
349a6(1): mchod de// de nas sdig pa bshags pa dang // skyabs gsol la sogs byas nas ni// bgegs rnams ma lus gzhom pa'i phyir// sna tshogs hUM las bskyed pa yi// rdo rje'i sa gzhi bsam par bya// rnam rtog 'du
349b1(1): shes kun spangs na// bgegs kyi sbyor ba yod mi 'gyur// de bas rnam rtog bgegs yin pas// yang dag rig pa nyid kyis bsrung // dang po stong nyid byang chub sems// skye 'gag med pa'i don gsal
349b2(1): nas// snying rje'i yul gyis blangs nas ni// sa bon shin tu gsal bar gyur// rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spros// phyogs kun gang bar gsal gyur la// bsdus kyang 'phel
349b3(1): 'grib med pa'o// de las ming tshogs gsal ba kun// spro zhing bsdu ba de bzhin te// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// rten 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// de nas mtha' dbus med pa yi// 'og min chos 'byung bsam
349b4(1): par bya// de nas yaM las byung ba yi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// de steng yi ge raM las ni// me yi dkyil 'khor bskyed par bya// de yi steng du baM bsams te// de las chu yi dkyil 'khor ro// chu yi
349b5(1): dkyil 'khor steng du ni// yaM las ye shes sa gzhir brtags// rin chen 'bar ba ri rab steng // b+h+rUM las ye shes gzhal yas khang / ye shes chen po'i rang bzhin no// rgya rnams yongs su ma chad pa// bsod
349b6(1): mas ye shes tshogs rgyas pas// kun tu gru bzhir gnas gyur pa// ye shes lhag pa'i glo 'bur mdzes// thams cad ngo bo gcig pa'i phyir// rtse mo kun tu 'dus pa yin// rin chen rgyan sogs bye brag
350a1(1): gis// bsam mi khyab par spras par gyur// tshad med bzhi yi sgo khyud la// rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs ldan// kun nas bskor ba'i kha khyer la// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// phyi dang nang
350a2(1): med kun tu snang // 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud dang / gru chad bzhi ldan par khyams dang // dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// dbus su mi 'jigs seng ge'i khri// brgya byin 'od gsal nyi zla
350a3(1): dang // chags med pad+ma so sor mdzes/ gdan ni sum brtsegs dag tu gnas// seng ge'i gdan gyi dbus su ni// dam pa'i yi ge'i sa bon las// de las pad+ma rdo rjer btags// so so'i snying pos mtshon par
350a4(1): bya// de las sangs rgyas sku ni spro// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// sems can don kun rdzogs mdzad nas// de nyid la ni thim par gyur// phyag rgya yongs su gyur pa las// kun bzang yum dang ldan
350a5(1): pa ni// zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar zhing gsal// zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan gyis mdzes// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs las// sprul pas sems can don rnams mdzad// kun tu
350a6(1): bzang mo 'jo sgeg tshul// in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog 'dra// rgyan dang dbu rgyan yab dang mthun// phyag g.yas rdo rje thugs kar brten// g.yon pas dril 'dzin yum la 'khril// yum gyis pad+ma thugs kar
350b1(1): brten// g.yon gyis nyi ma'i las su 'khril// dbu ni 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// de ltar yongs su bskyed pa ni// gnyis med chags pa'i sbyor bas drangs// de bzhin gshegs pa kun 'dus nas// yab la de
350b2(1): bzhin gshegs rnams thim// rdo rje'i lam du phyung nas ni// yum gyi pad+ma'i mkha' dkyil du// byang chub sems kyi 'phro 'du las// ye shes dkyil 'khor rdzogs par sprul// de nas snying rje'i chags pa
350b3(1): yis// sems can ma lus bsdus byas nas// dkyil 'khor phyi rol 'khod nas ni// de dag 'jug par gsol ba 'debs// gsol ba btab pa'i tshig brjod nas// thams cad dkyil 'khor 'jug par
350b4(1): 'gyur// bdud rtsi'i 'od kyis reg par gyur// thams cad rang bzhin sangs rgyas shes// de ltar rgyal po'i byin rlabs kyis// rang lus rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che// rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i
350b5(1): sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma ki/ me rlung gos dkar dam tshig sgrol// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug
350b6(1): ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so// de nas rgyal ba
351a1(1): sangs rgyas rnams// so so bzhin du dgod par bya'o// yongs sbyangs gsung gi yi ge ni// yab kyi thugs kar zim gyur nas/ yum gyi pad+ma'i chags rlan gyis// yab yum gnyis med thig ler
351a2(1): sbyor// de ltar rgyal ba snyoms zhugs nas// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs mngon 'dra ste// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru dang // byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// rab tu rtog pa rnam bzhi yis// mngon rdzogs rgyal po
351a3(1): de nyid nges// de ltar rtog pa rnam bzhi yis// rgyal ba'i sku ni mngon spyod las// bu sha rA ga'i kha dog 'dra// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te// g.yas pa 'khor lo thugs kar brten// g.yon pa dril bu yum la
351a4(1): 'khyud// thabs dang shes rab zhabs gnyis ni// mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs skyil krung bzhugs// mdun dang rgyab med kun tu zhal// mtshan dang dpe byad kun tu ldan// 'od zer 'bar ba'i tshogs chen
351a5(1): las// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs spro// rgyal ba rigs lngas dbu brgyan cing // sna tshogs rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// btsun mo snang ba'i dbyings phyug ma// gzhon tshul 'khril ldem shin tu chags// cha
351a6(1): lugs la sogs yab dang mthun// g.yon pa dril bu yab la brten// g.yas pa nyi ma las su 'khril// phung po dbang po rnam shes kun// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du bsgom// skye mched khams rnams byin
351b1(1): gyis brlabs// sku gsung thugs kyi 'bru gsum gyis// 'od zer rnam pa mang po spros// phyogs bcu'i sku gsung thugs bsdus nas// bdag gi sku gsung thugs la ni// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhugs par
351b2(1): bsam// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA wA ka badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ de ltar sku gsung thugs gsum
351b3(1): du// nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// yum gyi sku yi dkyil 'khor la// yig 'bru rnam gsum rnam shes la// yig 'bru'i byin brlab tshul bzhin bya// de nas yum ni byin brlab bya// oM AHhUM swA hA// gnas lnga dag
351b4(1): tu dgod par bya// de ltar yab yum sku rdzogs nas// dkyil 'khor chen po rnam 'phrul phyir// gnyis med chags pa'i sbyor don du// rdo rje pad+ma byin gyis brlab// hUM las rdo rje rab tu shes// oM las byung ba'i
351b5(1): nor bur bsam// oM las pad+mar bskyed par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma ko&haM/ bsnyen pa dang ni nye ba'i bsnyen// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor
351b6(1): du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor du// byang chub sems kyi byin rlabs las// yig 'bru rnams kyi 'phro 'du yis// sa bon mtshan ma sku rnams rdzogs// sum bcu drug gi dkyil 'khor 'gyur// de las 'gro ba
352a1(1): rmongs pa la// bstan phyir dkyil 'khor bstan par mdzad// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// bcom ldan rdo rje mi bskyod dang // yum chen kun tu bzang mo bsgom// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i
352a2(1): rtsibs steng du// bcom ldan rin chen 'byung ldan dang // yum chen na bza' dkar mo bsgom// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// bcom ldan snang ba mtha' yas dang // yum chen mA ma ki yang bsgom// byang
352a3(1): phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// bcom ldan don yod grub pa dang // yum chen dam tshig sgrol ma bsgom// de yi phyi rim rtsibs mtshan la// shar phyogs sa yi snying po dang // yum du badz+ra lA s+ye bsgom// lho ru
352a4(1): nam mkha'i snying po dang // yum du badz+ra mA le bsgom// nub phyogs spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // yum ni gi ra ti bsgom par bya// byang du phyag na rdo rje dang // yum du badz+ra nir ti bsgom// de yi phyi rim gru chad

352a6(1): dpal dang // yum du badz+ra gan d+he ma'o// sgo bzhir sgo ba sgo ma ni// shar sgor khro bo rnam par rgyal// yum du rdo rje ro langs ma// lho sgor khro bo gshin rje gshed// yum du rdo rje mi pham ma// nub sgor khro bo rtsa
352b1(1): mchog dpal// yum du rdo rje ral gcig ma'o// byang sgor khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// yum du rdo rje spyan gcig ma'o// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// dkyil 'khor
352b2(1): yongs su rdzogs pa la// rgyal ba mchod pas mnyes par gyur// mnyes nas sems can don bya zhes// dkyil 'khor dam pa bstan gyur na// sems can ma rig kyis bsgribs nas// dkyil 'khor mthong ba'i

352b6(1): dang gsung dang thugs rnams kyi// bye brag sna tshogs ston mdzad pas// 'gro ba so sor 'dul ba bzhin// byin rlabs 'dul ba ston par mdzad// so so'i bsam pa'i bye brag gis// lha dang mi yi theg pa
353a1(1): sogs// theg pa rnam lnga so sor ston// rjes su bstan pas 'gro btul nas// 'gro ba sangs rgyas sar bzhag ste// slar byon khyams pa thub drug dgod// steng du lha yi thub pa la// shar phyogs mi
353a2(1): yi thub pa'o// lho ru lha min thub pa la// nub tu yi dwags thub pa ste// byang du dmyal ba'i thub pa'o// 'og tu byol song thub pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor gsal bstan nas// khyad par kun tu bltas nas ni// sku
353a3(1): ma bzhin du dmigs nas kyang // so so'i yab yum bye brag la// lus kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod// phung po dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin oM du shes par bya// spyi bor yi ge oM bkod de// lce la A
353a4(1): ni rab tu gnas// snying dang lte ba chu sor ni// hUM dang swA ha rim pa bzhin// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// k+Shi traM hrIHdza rim bzhin bsam// me thi hUM dang mAM dang bzhi// mig sogs phyi rol rim bzhin bsam/ de ltar
