353b1(1): bzhin bsam// sku gsung thugs su dbang bskur zhing // ye shes yongs su rdzogs bya'i phyir// rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan kun la bsam// thub pa lus kyi dkyil 'khor dang // byin rlabs dbang skur ma gsungs
353b2(1): so// zhes gsungs so// sku phyag rgya bskyed pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// sku bskyed gsal brtan rtsa ba'i sngags// oM dzi na dzi
353b3(1): ka/ muM d+hA tI shwa rI/ hUM badz+ra d+h+rika/ swa rat+na d+hIka/ oM a ro li ka/ ha pradz+nyA d+hI ka/ laM dwe Sha ra ti/ maM mo hA ra ti/ paM rA ga ra ti/ taM badz+ra ra ti/ k+Shi he rA dza ya/ traM A gar+b+ha ya/ hri pad+ma pra da ma/ dzaM ku ru pA Na hrIH/ hUM lA s+ye sa
353b4(1): ma ya stAM/ traM mA l+ye sa ma ya staM/ hI gI ra ti ra ga haM/ aM ni ra ti rA ga yA mi/ me d+ha rA ya swA hA/ b+hI nisma raM b+ha ya swA ha/ hUM swa rA dza ya swA hA/ mr-i shri a rA gA ya swA hA/ dza d+hA pe pra be sha/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha/ baM di pa pu gi ra/
353b5(1): ho g+han d+he tsit+ta ho/ oM mu ne kr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ oM mu ne hUM trAM swA hA/ oM mu ne praM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+She swA ha/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ oM pra dz+nyA na ta krita phaT/ hU ya mAn taM krita phaT/ hUM pad+ma na ta krita phaT/ hUM big+h+nAn ta
353b6(1): krita phaT/ hUM badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro ti shwa rI dza la nI hUM phaT/ hUM rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro ti shwa rI dza la nI hUM phaT/ hUM pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dza la nI hUM phaT/ oM karma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dza la nI hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsit+ta
354a1(1): oM/ a a a badz+rI b+ha dra sa man+ta a/ sku bskyed gsal brtan rtsa ba'i sngags// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis snying po yin// zhes gsungs so// sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags bstan pa'i
354a2(1): le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bzhugs tshul ni// brgya byin la sogs phyogs su gnas// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu'i mdog tu
354a3(1): 'tsher ba ni// gtso bo gdan la rdzogs pa'i tshul// 'khor rnams sems dpa'i tshul du bzhugs// so so'i sku mdog yab dang mthun// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas na mthong zos sdom pa dang // myong
354a4(1): dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams// btsun ma'i tshogs dang ldan par bsam// mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par
354a5(1): bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// yab yum bzhugs tshul phyag mtshan ni// rnam snang dkar po 'khor lo bskor// mi bskyod mthing ga rdo rje bsnams// 'byung ldan
354a6(1): ser po rin chen bsnams// mtha' yas dmar po pad+ma bsnams// don grub ljang gu rgya gram bsnams// kun tu bzang mo dril bu bsnams// sangs rgyas spyan ni thor tshugs bsnams// gos dkar mo ni rin chen
354b1(1): bsnams// mA ma ki ni pad+ma bsnams// sa snying dkar po rin chen myu gu bsnams// nam mkha'i snying po dkar po ral gri bsnams// spyan ras gzigs dbang dkar po pad+ma bsnams// phyag na rdo rje ljang gu dril bu
354b2(1): bsnams// byams pa dmar skya gar gyi gun+d+he bsnams// kun bzang dkar po rin chen snyems ma bsnams// sgrib pa rnam sel sngon po po ti bsnams// 'jam dpal dkar ljang me tog ut+pal bsnams// mA le
354b3(1): sngon mo rgya gram me long bsnams// lA s+ye sngon mo rin chen 'phreng ba bsnams// gIr ti dmar mo pi wang rgyud 'dren bsnams// nI ra ti ljang gu gar gyi cod pan bsnams// bdug pa'i sprin 'phro ma ni spos me
354b4(1): bsnams// dga' ba'i mdangs ldan ma ni pad+ma bsnams// gsal ba'i 'od ldan ma ni mar me bsnams// ga na d+he ljang gu dag byed dri chab bsnams// dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i tshul// gnyis med dbyings
354b5(1): kyi ngang du 'khril// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul che// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// sgo bzhir sgo skyong yab yum
354b6(1): ni// gshin rje gshed po dkar po thod dbyug bsnams// stobs chen sngon po rdo rje rtse gsum bsnams// rta mgrin dmar po thod sbrul pad+ma bsnams// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang gu rgya gram bsnams// ro langs
355a1(1): dkar mo 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu bsnams// mi pham sngon po rdo rje zhags pa bsnams// ral gcig dmar mo rdo rje lcags sgrol bsnams// khro gnyer ma ni ljang gu dril bu bsnams// dkyil 'khor
355a2(1): 'khyams la thub pa drug/ lha yi thub pa dkar po pi wang bsnams// lha min thub pa sngon po go cha bsnams// mi yi thub pa ser po gseg shang bsnams// byol song thub pa ljang gu po ti bsnams// yi dwags thub
355a3(1): pa dmar po sgrom bu bsnams// dmyal ba'i thub pa nag po me chu bsnams// de ltar sangs rgyas bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// phyag rgya chen por gsal bar bskyed// snang stong dbyer med dkyil 'khor ni// ye nas ma
355a4(1): bcos lhun gyis grub// ces gsungs so// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// thugs kyi sa bon 'od zer las// phyogs bcu'i
355a5(1): dkyil 'khor spyan drangs te// phyogs bcu dus gsum dkyil 'khor tshogs// mi dmigs dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// bde gshegs thams cad spyan drang ngo // lcags kyu la sogs phyag rgya bzhis// rang rang
355a6(1): dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa dang // nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ de ltar ye shes
355b1(1): dkyil 'khor dang // dam tshig dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bya// dkyil 'khor kun la mnyam bltas nas// sgyu ma mig yor lta bur blta// de nas lha la mchod pa'i phyir// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor
355b2(1): zhing // mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// bdag gi snying ga'i sa bon las// 'od zer mang po'i zer 'phros te// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kun 'dus te// bdag
355b3(1): nyid kyis ni thugs kar thim/ rdo rje'i lam du phyung nas ni// byang chub sems kyi mkha' dbyings nas// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer las// mchod pa'i lha mo'i tshogs spros te// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mchod par
355b4(1): byed// de nas lha mo'i tshogs rnams kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// dgyes pa'i glu blang bstod par bya// de nas bsnyen bsgrub bzlas pa ni// lha rnams kun gyi thugs ka ru// zla dkyil steng du
355b5(1): rang 'dra yi// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bsgoms la// de la bzlas pa'i sngags kyis bskor// oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ma hA su kha dz+nyA na d+hA d+hA a/ ye shes lnga yi 'od zer gyis// phar 'phros bde gshegs thams cad
355b6(1): mchod// tshur 'dus dngos grub rnam gnyis bsdus// spro bsdu mgal me lta bur bskor// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma yi// bsnyen pa'i rim pa rdzogs par bya// zhes gsungs so// ye shes rang bzhin gyi dkyil
356a1(1): @'khor sgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// de ltar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// bskyed pa yongs su rdzogs byas te// slar yang bdag nyid thugs gar bsdu// de nas
356a2(1): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor ni// stangs dpyal gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur// cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni
356a3(1): rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson na// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu drug tshun chad kyis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad
356a4(1): kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi// zhing khams bsam yas rnam dag dang // rgya dang bral ba'i
356a5(1): gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong na nye bar bsnyen pa dang // rgya chen gsungs pa'i don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes snang ba'o// gcig
356a6(1): dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi gzigs te/ rang byung ye shes gnas med snang // log par rtog pa rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan
356b1(1): phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas nas// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // de ltar rgyal mchog dpal ldan pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba bsgrub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor
356b2(1): gyi// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba'i shes rab
356b3(1): rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus snang ba rnams// kun tu bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes
356b4(1): sgyu mar snang // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod par 'bul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rab snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil
356b5(1): 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le de nyid dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag gi zhal mthong
356b6(1): ba'o// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam
357a1(1): sbyor ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thugs kyis 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dus pa'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor ba// bya byed med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs
357a2(1): pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom la mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun dam lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur
357a3(1): na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes pa yis// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i ye shes bsgom pa'i
357a4(1): gnas// mkha' dbyings dang po dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po yab yum bsgom// gang zhig glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan na/ dngos
357a5(1): grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin las langs nas su// spyod lam rnam par dag par gnas// snang ba'i dngos po so sor ni// lha yi dkyil 'khor shin tu bsgom// yang na sgyu ma la sogs
357a6(1): tshul// zas la sogs pa bza' ba ni// rgyal ba'i byin rlabs mngon sum nas// bdud rtsi lngar ni byin brlabs te// lce yi dbang po rab sbyangs nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs kar bkod// rgyal ba'i tshogs
357b1(1): rnams tshims par byas// dam tshig nyams pa tshul bzhin bshags// yang na rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// byin rlabs kyi ni rnam par bya// sems can thams cad mthong ba na// snying rje byams pa'i sems
357b2(1): bskyed de// sangs rgyas nyid du bya'o zhes// smon pa'i sems ni khyad par can// blo can rnams kyis rtag tu bya// de ltar dus bzhi nyin mtshan du// rnal 'byor tshul la gnas pa yin// zhes gsungs so// rdzogs
357b3(1): rim bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsgrub pa'i skabs te gnyis pa'o// de nas spyi dpal kun tu bzang po la// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la sogs pa rnams kyis 'di skad
357b4(1): ces gsol to// e ma spyi dpal kun tu bzang // rigs lnga'i sgrub thabs bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen
357b5(1): rnams// rigs lnga'i rigs 'dzin bsgrub 'dod na// dben par maN+Dal byi dor bya// bdud rtsi lnga yis chag chag gdab/ oM hUM swA AM hA/ dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i dmigs rten dgod// yang na rdul tshon dkyil 'khor
357b6(1): bzhengs// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi gru chad dang // sgo bzhi sgo khyud rgyan bcas bri// dang po byang chub sems bskyed de// bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang // byang chub snying po'i rgyu yin yang // rtog pas
358a1(1): bsgribs pas 'khor bar 'khyams// rigs lnga'i dngos grub thob bya'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed do// de nas de bzhin nyid bsgom pa// chos rnams mi dmigs gdod nas
358a2(1): dag/ stong zhing bdag med bsgom par bya// de nas kun snang ting nge 'dzin// gong gi don de ma rtogs la// khyab pa'i snying rje chen po bsgom// de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// rang sems dri med a dkar las// e
358a3(1): yaM baM suM laM raM las// 'byung ba lnga yi mkha' dkyil du// rin po che yi ri rab brtseg/ de steng b+h+rUM las 'phro 'dus pas// kha dog sna lnga'i 'od phung las// rin chen sna lnga'i gzhal yas khang // 'bar ba'i 'khor lo
358a4(1): bas bzhi mdzes// ye shes bzhi yi gru chad la// tshad med bzhi yi sgo yis mdzes// rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs la// chos kyi dbyings kyi 'khor yug byas// phyi nang med pa'i gzhal yas bsgom// de dbus glang
358a5(1): chen shar seng ge/ lho ru rta mchog nub rma bya// byang du shang shang khri brtsegs steng // nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng la// dbus kyi gdan steng a dkar bsam// 'phro 'dus don byas 'khor lor gyur// de las rnam par
358a6(1): snang mdzad bskyed// yum du sangs rgyas spyan ma bsgom// yab yum gnyis ka sku mdog dkar// phyag na 'khor lo 'dzin pa la// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// rgyan dang chas kyis sku la
358b1(1): brgyan// yab yum gnyis su med par bsgom// yab yum gnyis kyi thugs ka nas// rigs bzhi sangs rgyas bskyed pa ni// shar du seng ge'i khri steng du// yab kyi thugs nas hUM 'phros pas// don gnyis byas
358b2(1): nas rdo rjer gyur// de las rdo rje sems dpa' ni// sku mdog mthing ga 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bzhugs// g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten
358b3(1): pa'o// yum gyi thugs nas mAM 'phros pas// kun tu bzang mo yab dang mthun// lho phyogs rta yi khri steng du// yab kyi thugs nas sna 'phros pas// don gnyis byas nas rin chen 'bar// de las rin chen 'byung
358b4(1): ldan ni// sku mdog ser po 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bzhugs// phyag g.yas rin chen thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dkur brten pa'o// yum gyi thugs las lAM 'phros
358b5(1): pas// gos dkar mo ni yab dang mthun// nub phyogs rma bya'i khri steng du// yab kyi zugs nas AM 'phros pas// don gnyis byas nas pad+mar gyur// de las snang ba mtha' yas ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis skra
358b6(1): mdog dmar// zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// g.yas pas pad+ma thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// yum gyi thugs nas pAM 'phros pas// mA ma kI ni yab dang mthun// byang
359a1(1): phyogs shang shang khri steng du// yab kyi thugs nas hA 'phros pas// de las don yod grub pa ni// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ldang // zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i skyil krung bzhugs// g.yas
359a2(1): pas ral gri thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// yum gyi thugs nas tAM 'phros pas// dam tshig sgrol ma yab dang mthun// de ltar rigs lnga yab yum ni// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul
359a3(1): che// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// dbu rgyan phyag rgyan zhabs rgyan ldan// snang la rang bzhin med pa ni// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan nam// rnam mkha'i 'ja' tshon ji bzhin no// de ltar dam tshig
359a4(1): bskyed byas nas// ye shes dkyil 'khor spyan drang ngo // gnyis su med par bstim byas nas// mnyes pa'i tshul gyis phyag 'tshal la// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// bstod cing dngos grub gsol ba
359a5(1): btab// gnyis su med pa'i bsnyen pa dbul// oM hUM swA AM hA/ lAM mAM pA mAM taM/ rigs lnga so so'i thugs ka ru// nyi zla ga'u kha sbyar te// so so'i yig 'bru gsal byas bzlas// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs sku
359a6(1): gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las dkyil 'khor mnyes// khams gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dug lnga spangs nas rigs lngar gyur// 'gro drug lam lnga'i sdug bsngal spang // sku lnga ye shes thob par
359b1(1): bsgom// zhes gsungs so// de nyid rigs lnga phyi ltar sgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// de nyid rigs lnga'i nang sgrub ni// bde gshegs thams cad rigs lngar
359b2(1): 'dus// rigs lnga bdag nyid phung po yi// khams dang skye mched 'byung lnga las// logs nas btsal zhing bsgrub tu med// rang nyid ye nas rigs lnga yin// gzugs kyi phung po de bzhin rigs// rnam shes phung
359b3(1): po rdo rje'i rigs// tshor ba'i phung po rin chen rigs// 'du shes phung po pad+ma'i rigs// 'du byed phung po las kyi rigs// sha ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// rus pa rdo rje'i rigs yin te// drod ni rin po
359b4(1): che yi rigs// khrag ni pad+ma rigs kyi yum// dbugs ni las kyi rigs kyi yum// kha dog dkar po de bzhin rigs// kha dog sngon po rdo rje'i rigs// kha dog ser po rin chen rigs// kha dog dmar po pad+ma'i
359b5(1): rigs// kha dog ljang gu las kyi rigs// sa ni de bzhin rigs kyi yum// nam mkha' rdo rje rigs kyi yum// me ni rin chen rigs kyi yum// chu ni pad+ma rigs kyi yum// rlung ni las kyi rigs kyi yum// lus ni
359b6(1): rnam shes de bzhin rigs// yid kyi rnam shes rdo rje'i rigs// mig ni rnam shes rin chen rigs// sna yi rnam shes pad+ma'i rigs// rna ba'i rnam shes las kyi rigs// lus kyi dbang po de bzhin rigs kyi
360a1(1): yum// yid kyi dbang po rdo rje rigs kyi yum// mig gi dbang po rin chen rigs kyi yum// sna yi dbang po pad+ma rigs kyi yum/ rna ba'i dbang po las kyi rigs kyi yum// gti mug de bzhin
360a2(1): gshegs pa'i rigs// zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// nga rgyal rin po che yi rigs// 'dod chags pad+ma'i rigs yin no// phrag dog las kyi rigs yin no// zhe sdang yul ni rdo rje'i yum// gti mug yul ni de
360a3(1): bzhin yum// nga rgyal yul ni rin chen yum// 'dod chags yul ni pad+ma'i yum// phrag dog yul ni las kyi yum// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba chen po lnga// kha dog lnga dang yul lnga dbang po lnga// rnam shes lnga dang dug
360a4(1): lnga ye shes lnga// gti mug rnam dag chos dbyings ye shes yin// de bzhin rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// zhe sdang rnam dag me long ye shes yin// rdo rje'i rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// nga rgyal rnam dag
360a5(1): mnyam nyid ye shes yin// rin chen rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// 'dod chags rnam dag kun rtog ye shes yin// pad+ma'i rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// phrag dog ma spangs nan tan ye shes yin// las
360a6(1): kyi rigs kyi ngang du sangs rgyas so// zhes gsungs so// rigs lnga nang sgrub kyi le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// gsang sngags zab mo'i man ngag 'di// thabs lam zab
360b1(1): mo'i sgo nas bsgrub// nyon mongs dug lnga lam du slong // gti mug de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes yin// zhe sdang rdo rje'i rigs yin te// me long lta bu'i ye shes yin// nga rgyal rin
360b2(1): chen rigs yin te// mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes so// 'dod chags pad+ma'i rigs yin te// so sor tog pa'i ye shes so// phrag dog las kyi rigs yin te// bya ba nan tan ye shes so// gti mug phra rags ci skyes
360b3(1): kyang // gti mug mtshan nyid btsal bar bya// gti mug mtshan nyid ma grub pas// gti mug skye ba'i yul btsal bas// yul yang ma grub stong par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing shes tsam na// gti mug ma spangs de
360b4(1): bzhin rigs// chos dbyings ye shes thob pa'o// zhe sdang phra rags ci skyes kyang // zhe sdang rang bzhin btsal bar bya// zhe sdang rang bzhin ma grub ste// zhe sdang skyes pa'i yul btsal bas// yul yang ma grub stong
360b5(1): par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing shes tsam na// zhe sdang ma spangs rdo rje'i rigs// me long ye shes thob pa'o// nga rgyal phra rags ci skyes kyang // nga rgyal rang bzhin btsal bar bya// nga rgyal rang bzhin ma grub
360b6(1): ste// nga rgyal skye ba'i yul btsal bas// yul yang ma grub stong par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing shes tsam na// nga rgyal ma spangs rin chen rigs// mnyam nyid ye shes thob pa'o// 'dod chags phra rags skyes tsam
361a1(1): na// 'dod chags rang bzhin btsal bar bya// 'dod chags rang bzhin ma grub ste// 'dod chags yul yang stong par 'dug/ de ltar shes shing rtogs tsam na// 'dod chags ma spangs pad+ma'i
361a2(1): rigs// kun rtogs ye shes thob pa'o// phrag dog phra rags ci skyes kyang // phrag dog rang bzhin btsal bar bya// phrag dog rang bzhin ma grub pas// phrag dog yul yang stong par 'dug/ de ltar rtogs shing
361a3(1): brtan tsam na// phrag dog ma spangs las kyi rigs// bya ba nan tan ye shes thob// gti mug spangs na de bzhin rigs mchog spang // de bzhin ris spangs chos dbyings ye shes med// zhe sdang spangs na rdo rje
361a4(1): rigs mchog spang // rdo rje rigs spangs me long ye shes med// nga rgyal spangs na rin chen rigs mchog spang // rin chen rigs spangs mnyam nyid ye shes med// 'dod chags spangs na pad+ma rigs mchog
361a5(1): spang // pad+ma rigs spangs kun rtog ye shes med// phrag dog spangs na las kyi rigs mchog spang // las kyi rigs spangs nan tan ye shes med// dug lnga spangs na rigs lnga'i sku lnga med// rigs kyi sku lnga
361a6(1): spangs pas sangs rgyas gdung rgyud bcad// grub par mi 'gyur dub pa'i skal bar 'gyur// dug lnga bsgrub na 'bras bu ye shes lnga// gti mug ma bkag ye shes klong gi lam// zhe sdang ma spangs ye shes rtogs
361b1(1): pa'i lam// nga rgyal ma bkag ma nor rang gi lam// 'dod chags ma bkag chos kyi dbyings kyi lam// phrag dog ma spangs gnyis su med pa'i ngang // nyon mongs dug lnga ye shes lnga yi lam// de yang stong pa bde
361b2(1): ba chen po lnga// 'bras bu skye med ngang du ma spangs lhun gyis grub// dug lnga rin chen dgos 'dod 'byung ba yin// zhes gsungs so// rigs lnga'i gsang bsgrub kyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nyid
361b3(1): rigs lnga bsgrub pa'i skabs te gsum pa'o// de nas spyi dpal kun tu bzang po la// rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas la sogs pas zhus pa// e ma spyi dpal kun tu bzang // gsang chen rigs gcig ji ltar
361b4(1): bsgrub// de skad gsol ba gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// sku gsung thugs kyi sgrub thabs 'di// khyad par mi mthun bye brag rnams// rang
361b5(1): bzhin gcig la gsum tshang ba// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dus// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod na// dben zhing nyams dga'i gnas dag tu// maN+Dal byi dor byas nas ni// shel ltar gsal ba'i hUM bris
361b6(1): la// dmigs pa'i rten du gzhag par bya// dang po de bzhin nyid ting 'dzin// cir yang mi rtog mi sems bsgom// de nas kun snang ting nge 'dzin// yongs la khyab pa'i snying rje bsgom// de nas rgyu yi ting nge
362a1(1): 'dzin// rang sems hUM du gsal bar bsgom// de las 'od 'phros bde gshegs mchod// sku gsung thugs la mchod pa phul// khams gsum sems can rtog sgrib sbyangs// tshur 'dus 'od du zhu
362a2(1): ba las// dngul dkar rdo rje rtse dgur gyur// de la 'od 'phros zhu ba las// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpar gyur// sku mdog dngul dkar lta bu la// zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar
362a3(1): 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// glang chen bsnol ba'i khri steng na// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan steng na// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan par bsgom// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul che// gsal 'tsher lhun
362a4(1): sdug gzi brjid 'bar// de lta bu yi skur bsgoms te// spyi bor 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng du// oM dkar shel ltar 'tsher ba bsgom// mgrin par pad+ma 'dab bzhi'i steng // AHdmar dmar la drangs
362a5(1): par bsgom// snying gar rdo rje rgya gram steng // mthing nag hUM gcig bsam par bya// de lta bu yi sgra de ni// 'dod chags can gyi 'jug sgo ste// zhi ba'i sgo nas 'jug pa'o// khro bo'i sgo nas 'jug pa ni// sku mdog
362a6(1): mthing nag 'bar ba la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis zhabs gnyis bgrad// g.yas pa rdo rje thugs kar 'dzin// g.yon pa dril bu dku la brten// stag gi sham thabs sbrul gyis brgyan// glang chen ko rlon zhing
362b1(1): lpags gsol// ming ni badz+ra he ru ka/ rdo rje khro bo zhes kyang bya// rdo rje dgyes pa zhes kyang bya// khro rngams gshe gtum 'bar ba'i gzugs// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// dus mtha'i me ltar bzod par
362b2(1): dka'// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba brjid// thug choms ri rab 'bum snyil skad// skyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che// de lta bu yi khro bo la// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge
362b3(1): dgod// zhe sdang can gyi 'jug sgo ste// khro tshul can gyi sku ru bsgom// sangs rgyas thams cad rigs brgyar 'dus// rigs brgya bsdus pas rigs lngar 'dus// rigs lnga rdo rje'i rigs su 'dus// rgyal ba
362b4(1): rigs lnga la sogs pa// thabs kyi phyag rgya ma lus kun// chos sku rdo rjer ro gcig pas// ji ltar snang ba de ltar yin// de ltar rgyal ba gcig bsgoms pas// gcig nyid med la kun gyi ngang // rnal 'byor rig
362b5(1): pa 'di ldan na// bde gshegs ma bsgoms gang yang med// ces gsungs so// gsang chen rigs gcig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// sku gsung thugs kyi
362b6(1): sgrub thabs 'di// khyad par mi mthun bye brag rnams// rang bzhin gcig la gsum tshang ba// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'dus// skye med shes rab dbyings kyi ngang // mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don// 'gro don
363a1(1): rdo rje sems dpar bzhad// chos rnams thams cad 'gro ba mtha' dag ni// sgra med don dam dbyings su ra gcig pas// de cad dus gsum rgyal ba'i chas cad de// kun tu bzang ba rje
363a2(1): sems dpa'i ngang // de lta bu yi lha de ni// rang rig ye shes 'du 'bral med// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin yin// zhes gsungs so// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu
363a3(1): pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// oM ni bde gshegs kun gyi sgra// a ni bde gshegs kun gyi gsung // hA ni bde gshegs kun gyi thugs// mo ni khams gsum sems can lus/
363a4(1): ni khams gsum sems can dag/ hUM ni khams gsum sems can yid// oM gyis lus kyi sgrib pa sbyang // A~M gis ngag gi sgrib pa sbyang // hUM gis yid kyi sgrib pa sbyang // oM gyis sku yi dngos grub thob//
363a5(1): gis gsung gi dngos grub thob// hUM gis thugs kyi dngos grub thob// ces gsungs so// gsang chen rigs gcig yig 'bru gsum gyi le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // gsang chen rigs gcig bsgrub pa'i sku
363a6(1): sa te gsum pa'o// // de nas bde bar gshegs pa thams cad thugs zhi ba mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa las/ de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud ma traM ka ru tra zhes bya ba de bdag tu rmongs pa dang / rtag pa la
363b1(1): mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis/ yang dag pa'i lam dang bral nas/ gab pa'i gsang ba dag ma rtogs par/ sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs te/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub
363b2(1): mor gyur nas/ rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// tsha ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs nas/ shin tu grang ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// tsha ba dang grang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams brgyud cing / bskal pa stong phrag bcu
363b3(1): gnyis su nyams su myong ngo / de nas bdud ma traM ka ru tra des/ yan lag sna tshogs pa dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs pa dang / nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa'i lha'i rigs dang / lha ma yin/
363b4(1): tshangs pa dang / 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus so// de lta bu'i gdug pa can de/ bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyis mkhyen pas gzigs nas/ thugs rje'i byin rlabs sam/ bde ba gshegs
363b5(1): pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa'i byin rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ru ka/ sku smug nag 'bar ba la/ dbu nyi shu rtsa gcig/ phyag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsnams pa/
363b6(1): dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis 'jigs par brgyan nas/ sku shin tu 'jigs pa'i cha lugs su bstan nas/ yum khro mo gnam zhal ma zhes bya ba/ dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa/ g.yas dang po rdo rje 'og ma na go rI ma
364a1(1): brgyad/ g.yon dang po b+har+Na dmar gyis bkang ba/ 'og ma na pra men ma brgyad/ dur khrod kyi chas kyis brgyan pa/ shin tu gtsol 'dud par gyur te/ yab yum gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba las/
364a2(1): bopo 'chol ba sna tshogs spros te/ stong khams khro bos bkang nas/ bdud ma traM ka ru tra la sogs pa'i dregs pa thams cad btul zhing bsgral te/ khog pa dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang du gyur to// dkyil 'khor dgu
364a3(1): pa 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi/ bar khyams gru chad sgo bzhi/ lcags rir bcas pa/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi/ dbus dang bcas pa/ gzhal yas khang du grub pa'o// dkyil 'khor bzhi'i phyi rol yang / phyi khams sgo
364a4(1): bzhi sgo rgyan dang bcas par gyur to// de'i phyi rim rak+ta khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khor yug gi phyi la rdo rje'i ra ba dang / me ri me dpung gi 'khor yug dang ldan par gyur to// de lta bu'i gzhal yas khang de yang phyi thod pa
364a5(1): rnam gsum gyi brtsig pa/ nang dur khrod kyi rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa phyi rol na dur khrod kyi gnas brgyad yod pa/ de lta bu'i dur khrod kyi gzhal yas khang de'i dbus su yab che mchog he ru ka dang / yum khro mo
364a6(1): gnam zhal ma gnyis gnas pa las yab yum gnyis kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las kyi sprul pa las/ shar du thugs kyi sprul pa badz+ra he ru ka dang / lhor sku'i sprul pa gshin rje gshed po dang / nub tu
364b1(1): gsung gi sprul pa pad+ma dbang gi rgyal po dang / byang du phrin las kyi sprul pa rdo rje gzhon nu dang / shar lhor yon tan gyi sprul pa bla med he ru ka dang / nub byang du 'jigs pa'i stobs las sprul pa dregs pa kun
364b2(1): 'dul dang / byang shar du brjid pa'i stobs kyi sprul pa stobs ldan nag po dang / lho nub tu rig 'dzin rdo rje'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyang dus gcig tu lhags so// de dag thams cad kyang so so'i
364b3(1): btsun mo'i 'khor du bcas pas 'khod de// rang gi 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas so// de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab par sprul to// khro bo mngon byung gi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig
364b4(1): pa'o// // de nas khro bo'i 'khor tshogs rnams kyis/ dpal chen po la phyag dang bskor ba byas te zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ khro tshogs kun gyi rje btsan po// shin tu khro zhing gtum pa
364b5(1): yi// gdug byed log lha'i ru tra rnams// zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// 'khor ba'i gnas nas ji ltar 'dul// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos
364b6(1): bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// dregs pas khengs pa'i ru dra rnams// zhi bas thul bar ma gyur pas// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa ni// thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin/
365a1(1): te// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// bka' bzhin bskyed la bsgrub bya'o// dang po khro bo bsgrub pa'i gnas// dur khrod chen po rab 'jigs la// gdug pa'i lha srin 'du ba'am// gcan
365a2(1): gzan 'dab chags khros pa'i sa// gnam sa gru gsum sar gnas pa// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas chen der// gnas kyi bdag po mchod pa'i phyir// gtor ma gtang zhing glud kyang sbyin// bden pa bdar zhing
365a3(1): bka' yang bsgo// sa sbyangs bka' sgrogs bsod nams bsags// phyi mtshams gcad cing dam sri mnan// sgo byang gdags shing dkyil 'khor brtsig/ bdud rtsi lnga yi chag chag gdab// ba su ta yi thag pa
365a4(1): yis// dkyil 'khor dgu yi thig tu gdab// kun kyang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// gru chad par khyams sgo bzhi ldan// kun kyang lcags ri ldan pa bri// de rnams phyi khyams dkyil 'khor la// sgo bzhi sgo rgyan rta
365a5(1): babs ldan// 'dod yon rin chen pha gu dang / dra ba dra phyed 'khor yug dang // 'bar phreng rdor phreng ldan par bri// de yang dur khrod tshon rtsi'am// yang na sa tshon lnga la bya// dbus rnams mthing nag gru gsum
365a6(1): la// zla gam dmar po gsum gyis mdzes// phyi rim ldang la 'od zer 'phro// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi phyogs kyis dbye/ shar dkar lho ser nub dmar byang ldang // mu khyud thod phreng dkar por bya// gru chad ldang la bar
365b1(1): 'thams phyogs// bani rigs la brtsig pa lnga// kye moM lcags ri nag pa'o// dkyil 'bar dgu ka de bzhin za// h+yaM khams phyogs la grwa ban rigs// brtseg pa mthing dkar mer dmar ldang // 'dod can
365b2(1): thams dmar pa gu mar// dra ba dra byed mthing la mda' yab ldang // sgo khyud rta babs mdzes pa'i tshan// phyi rol rak+ta'i rgya mtsho dmar// rdo rje'i ra ba mthing nag la// me ri'i phreng ba dam mer ro// de sar
365b3(1): dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// nang chen bla ro'i gur yang dbub// ba sra nya ma phreng bas bskor// mda' bzhi ma long dar sna ba'i// ral gri bzhi dang thar pa bzhi// dkyil 'khor rgyan du dgram par bya// thacwa dag
365b4(1): dang mar ze dgra/ thar pa dgu la sogs pa dgram// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'bar yin// zhes gsungs so// tsha ba rol pa'i sgrub thabs kyi rdul chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi len hUM nyi bu rtsa gci
365b5(1): pal// / de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// phrin las thams su blang ba ni// dang po mtshams bcad bgegs bskrad la// phyogs mtshams 'jig rten lha ru gsal// brda' sgo dbye zhing brdal rgya
365b6(1): 'tshal// dam bca' byin dbab bshags pa bya// mchod rdzas byin gyis brlabs shing dbul// de nas ting 'dzin rim pa bzhin// dang po de bzhin nyid bsgom pa// chos rnams sems kyi rang bzhin te// gdod
366a1(1): nas ma skyes stong par bsgom// kun tu snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin// khyab pa'i snying rje sems can don// yongs la khyab par bsgom par bya// de nas rgyu yi ting nge 'dzin// ye shes sems dpa' tshon
366a2(1): gang ba// thugs kar hUM dang ldan par bsgom// de las raM yaM khaM gsum gyis// dngos dang mtshan ma bsreg gtor bkrus// mthing nag e yi nam mkha' la// rgya gram rlung gi 'khor lo chags// rak+ta khrag gi rgya
366a3(1): mtshor 'khyil// zhing chen 'bar ba'i sa gzhir chags// 'byung ba drod snyoms me dpung 'bar// keng rus chen po'i ri rab brtsig/ smug nag b+haM gyi 'phro 'du las// dur khrod chen po'i gzhal yas khang // pho brang
366a4(1): dkyil 'khor dgu pa la// kun kyang 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir mdzes// gru chad khyams dang sgo bzhir ldan// phyi khyams sgo dang sgo khyud dang // mu khyud rdo rje 'bar phreng dang // dur khrod rgyan dang chas kyis brgyan// phyi
366a5(1): nang med par gsal ba yi// ye shes lhun grub gzhal yas bsgom// de dbus byol song gtso brgyad khrir// ye shes sems dpa' babs pa las// spro bsdu'i cho ga gsum sbyor bas// che mchog he ru'i skur gsal
366a6(1): bskyed// sku mdog smug nag 'bar ba la// dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gdengs// phyag na bud+d+ha bzhi bcu gnyis// zhabs brgyad bgrad pas gdan brgyad gnon// dur khrod 'jigs
366b1(1): pa'i chas brgyad gsol// rngom brjid chen po'i sku ru bsgom// g.yon phyogs mAM gyi 'phros 'dus las// khro mo gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de// khams chen bco brgyad rtsad bcad
366b2(1): nas// stong pa bco brgyad dbyings la sbyor// g.yas pa thabs mchog gtso la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// yab yum gnyis med sbyor byas te// yab kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje la// oM las rtse lnga phaT
366b3(1): kyis mtshan// yum gyi gsang ba'i pad+ma la// paM las 'dab bzhi AM gis mtshan// gnyis med rol pa'i brdas bskul te// phyag rgya bzhi yi sbyor ba bya// byang chub sems kyi sprin spros pas// mkha' las khro bo
366b4(1): 'chol pa spros/ hUM hUM hUM hUM/ bi shwa kro d+ha dza la maN+Da la ha la ha la phaT phaT/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs mtshams nas// bdud dang dregs pa rA tra rnams// thugs rje tshad med kyis bsgral nas// ma sring chung ma
366b5(1): mdza' mo rnams// bran du bsdus nas bka' nyan gyur// 'khor bcas ma lus dbang du bsdus// de nas khro bo'i sprin bsdus nas// phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhir 'dus pa las// so so'i rigs kyi gtso bor
366b6(1): gsal// btsun mo khrag 'thung yum rnams kyang // so so'i sku la 'khril bar bsgom// de nas dbus kyi gtso bo ni// che mchog yab yum thugs ka nas// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las// shar du rak+Sha he ru ka/ rak+Sha kro
367a1(1): d+hi shwa rI yum// lho tu gu h+ya he ru ka/ gu h+ya kro d+hi shwa rI yum// nub tu bi shra he ru ka/ bi shwa kro d+hI shwa rI yum// byang du yak+ka he ru ka/ yak+kha kro d+hi shwa rI yum// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams
367a2(1): su// shar du dri za 'dul byed lha// lho ru gshin rje 'dul byed do// nub tu klu gdon 'dul byed la// byang du gnod sbyin 'dul byed do// shar lhor me lha 'dul byed la// lho nub srin po 'dul byed do// nub byang
367a3(1): rlung lha 'dul byed la// byang shar dbang ldan 'dul byed do// steng phyogs lha gdon 'dul byed la// 'og phyogs sa bdag 'dul byed do// sgo bzhir mthar byed sgo ba bzhi// shar du pradz+nyAn+ta krita la// lho ru ya mAn+ta
367a4(1): kr-i ta do// nub tu pad+man+ta krita la// byang du big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita do// phyi rim lcags ri nag po la// bka' srung ce spyang ma brgyad de// che mchog lha tshogs nyi shu bzhi// gtso 'khor bka' srung bcas pa bsgom// shar gyi
367a5(1): dkyil 'khor chen po ru// gtso bo badz+ra he ru ka/ badz+ra kro d+hi shwa rI yum// yab yum gnyis kyi thugs ka nas// yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du las// shar du bud+d+ha he ru ka/ bud+d+ha kro d+hi shwa rI yum// lho ru rat+na he ru ka/ rat+na kro d+hi
367a6(1): shwa rI yum// nub tu pad+ma he ru ka/ pad+ma kro d+hI shwa rI yum// byang du karma he ru ka/ karma kro d+hi shwa rI yum// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar du go rI sed+ha gnyis// lho ru tso rI byA g+h+r-i gnyis// nub tu
367b1(1): pra mo sri la gnyis// byang du bi tA shwa na gnyis// shar lhor puk+ka gr-i D+ha gnyis// lho nub g+hasma kang+ka gnyis// nub byang sma sha kA ka gnyis// byang shar tsaN+Da u lha gnyis// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir gdong mo bzhi// shar
367b2(1): du rta gdong lcags kyu ma// lho sgor phag gdong zhags pa ma// nub tu sbrul gdong lcags sgrog ma// byang du sbyang gdong thal byed ma// phyi rim lcags ri nag po la// bka' srung srin mo nyi shu brgyad// gtso 'khor
367b3(1): bka' srung bcas par bsgom// lho phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// gtso bo 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// sbyor yum za byed be tA lI// sgrol yum e ka tsa tI ma// yab yum gnyis med byin rlabs
367b4(1): las// 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gshed chen bzhi// shar du ya ma rA dza dang // sbyor yum g.yu yi ral gcig ma// sgrol yum nam gru re ma ti// lho ru myos byed 'bar ba dang // sbyor yum gtum mo ser nag ma// sgrol
367b5(1): yum khrag gi mnga' bdag mo// nub tu gshed chen ma ru tse// sbyor yum lha mo 'od zer ma// sgrol yum gling bzhi kun 'byams ma// byang du ral pa tshar dgu ma// sbyor yum nag mo re ma ti// sgrol yum srin mo mgo
367b6(1): 'phyangs ma// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar du kong rtse brag 'joms dang // yum du rdo rje ral gcig ma// lho ru gshin rje ya ba ti// yum du dred kyi ab sham mo// nub tu gshin rje rmig pa
368a1(1): dang // yum du sgeg mo bus 'gro ma// byang du lha mchog dud ka la// yum du smug nag ral gcig ma// shar lhor a ba glang mgo dang // yum du drang srong dkar sgyu ma// lho nub gshin rje mig dmar
368a2(1): la// yum du khrag gi ral gcig ma// nub byang gshin rje til pa dang // yum du rlung lha spyan gcig kyang gsum ma// byang shar chos kyi rgyal po dang // yum ni spyan gsum mche gtsigs ma'o// steng du gshin rje nag
368a3(1): 'joms dang // yum du shel gyi gdong dgu ma'o// steng du gshin rje phya sang la// yum du shel mig khro mo'o// 'og tu gshin rje dmar po ste// yum du nag mo ral gcig ma'o// 'og tu gshin rje thod dbyug
368a4(1): dang // yum du dmar mo mgo dgu ma// sgo bzhir gshin rje'i sgo ba bzhi// shar du dung gi bya rgod mgo/ lho ru nag po stag gi mgo/ nub tu bse yi kang ka'i mgo/ byang du lcags kyi spyang ka'i mgo/ phyi yi lcags ri
368a5(1): nag po la// ging bdud ma mo shan pa gnas// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa bsgom// nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// dbus su khro rgyal dbang chen po// yum du sgeg mo ral gcig ma// g.yas su las kyi
368a6(1): rgyal po la// g.yon du las kyi rgyal mo'o// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la// shar du ye shes zil gnon la// yum du khro mo mi pham ma'o// lho ru las kyi khro bo zil gnon la// yum du rdo rje khro gnyer
368b1(1): ma'o// nub tu ye shes ma mo zil gnon dang // yum du rdo rje spyan gcig ma'o// byang du khyud chen zil gnon dang // yum du rdo rje ro langs ma'o// dkyil 'khor phyi khyams phyogs bzhi ru// shar du pho rgyud zil
368b2(1): gnon dang // yum du rdo rje las byed ma'o// lho ru mo rgyud zil gnon dang // yum du gshin rje las byed ma'o// nub tu klu rnams zil gnon dang // yum du klu mo las byed ma'o// byang du gza' rnams zil gnon
368b3(1): dang // yum du gnod sbyin las byed ma'o// phyogs bzhi sgo bzhir sgo ma bzhi// shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu ma// lho sgor rdo rje zhags pa ma// nub sgo rdo rje lcags sgrog ma// byang sgor rdo rje dril bu ma// phyi yi lcags
368b4(1): ri nag po la// kham brgya dmus long khyi spyang dang // pho nya la sogs bka' srung dgod// pad+ma gsung gi lha tshogs rnams// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa bsgom// byang phyogs dkyil 'khor chen po ru// dpal chen
368b5(1): rdo rje gzhon nu dang // yum mchog 'khor lo rgyas 'debs ma// yab yum gnyis kyi byin rlabs las// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la// shar du bud+d+ha kI la ya// lho ru rat+na kI ya la// nub tu pad+ma kI la
368b6(1): ya// byang du karma kI la ya// dkyil 'khor bar mtshams phyogs mtshams su// shar du rnam par rgyal ba dang // yum du rdo rje snyem ma'o// phra men stag dang bya rgod mgo/ lho ru gshin rje gshed po dang // yum du
369a1(1): dur khrod bdag mo'o// sprul pa sha ba 'ug pa'i mgo/ nub tu khro bo rta mgrin dang // yum du rdo rje gtum ma'o// sprul pa byi la pu shud mgo/ byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang // yum du rdo rje rlu 'byin
369a2(1): ma'o// sprul pa seng ge pha wang mgo/ shar lhor dbyug pa sngon po dang // yum du rdo rje sder mo'o// sprul pa g.yag dang bya rog mgo/ lho nub mi g.yo mgon po dang // yum du rdo rje gtun khung ma// sprul pa gzi dang
369a3(1): khwa yi mgo/ nub byang gzhan gyis mi thub dang // yum du rdo rje mda' snyem ma// sprul pa sbyang ki khra yi mgo/ byang shar khams gsum rnam rgyal dang // yum du rdo rje skyod byed ma// sprul pa dom dang sre mo'i
369a4(1): mgo// steng phyogs khro bo hUM kA ra// yum du rdo rje sgra 'byin ma// sprul pa phag dang smrig bu'i mgo/ 'og phyogs khro bo stobs po che// yum du rdo rje gsod byed ma// sprul pa dred dang byi la'i mgo/ dkyil 'khor
369a5(1): phyogs bzhir sgo ba bzhi// shar sgor pu shud mgo can la// lho ru s+ya ka'i mgo can no// nub tu srin bya'i mgo can dang // byang du khra yi mgo bo can// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// bse mo bzhi dang re ti bzhi// shA
369a6(1): na bzhi dang ging bdud bzhi// shan pa bzhi la sogs pa dgod// phur pa phrin las lha tshogs kyi// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa bskyed// shar lho mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo bla med he ru ka/ yum du nyi
369b1(1): bzhi bde mchog ma// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i rtsibs bzhi la// shar du rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam snang gsal// lho ru rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// nub tu rtag pa'i rgyal mo gnyen gsal 'bar// byang du
369b2(1): rtag pa'i rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// g.yas su rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal ma// g.yon du srid pa bde 'gro ma// mdun du nyi zla thod phreng ma// zla gam bzhi la khros ma bzhi// shar du nyi ma khros pa la// lho
369b3(1): ru khrag 'thung khros pa'o// nub tu bdud rtsi khros pa la// byang du srid gsum khros pa'o// mtshams su dgyes sde chen mo bzhi// shar du dkar mo mig gcig ma// lho ru nag mo mche ba can// nub tu dmar mo dbang
369b4(1): sdud ma// byang du ser mo tshe 'phel ma'o// gru chad bzhi la ma bzhi'o// shar lhor rgyan gyi rgyal mo dang // lho nub dbyings phyug chen mo la// nub byang bdag nyid chen mo ste// byang shar gcig pu chen mo'o// khyams
369b5(1): la sman mo bskyed par bya// byang du srid pa chags byed ma// nub tu srid pa cha snyoms ma// lho ru 'dod khams gtso mo ste// shar du e ka dza TI ma// shar du gling bzhi spyi phud ma// lho ru rin chen srid 'degs
369b6(1): ma// nub tu pad+ma gar dbang ma// byang du rdo rje gar dbang ngo // shar lhor har ting dkar mo la// lho nub dun ting nag mo'o// nub byang shan ting dmar mo la// byang shar grub ting ser mo'o// shar du dkar mo
370a1(1): @mche gtsigs ma// lho ru nag mo kha 'byams ma// nub tu dmar mo mchu 'jib ma// byang du ser mo rkang ldag ma// shar du srin mo skam pa mo// shar du srin mo dri snom ma// lho ru srin mo phor thogs
370a2(1): ma// lho ru srin mo skos byed ma// nub tu srin mo g.yang gzhi ma// nub tu srin mo za ba mo// byang du srin mo gsod byed ma// byang du srin mo za byed ma'o// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir sgo ma bzhi// shar du lha yi
370a3(1): sring mo la// lho sgor gshen rje'i sring mo'o// nub sgor klu yi sring mo ste// byang sgor gnod sbyin sring mo'o// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// yang gab bzhi dang sbas ma bzhi// gdong mo bzhi dang phung gsum
370a4(1): ma// gsang ba'i ma gsum pho nya gsum// ro kha ma gsum bsgom par bya// ma mo rbod gtong lha tshogs kyi// gtso dang 'khor du bcas pa bsgom// nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// gtso bo dregs pa kun
370a5(1): 'dul dang // yum du khams gsum spyi 'dul ma// yab yum thugs kyi sprul pa las// g.yas su dbang phyug chen po la// g.yon du u ma de bI'o// rtsibs bzhi dbang chen yab yum bzhi// shar du ya ma rA/
370a6(1): dang // yum du za byed nag mo'o// lho ru gshin rje brang dkar dang // yum du nag mo re ma ti// nub tu srin po glog phreng can// srin mo sbal mgo khrag mig ma'o// byang du yak+Sha nag po dang // gnod sbyin mon mo
370b1(1): nag mo'o// steng du gza' bdud rA hu la// gnam sman thog gi bu yug ma'o// 'og tu klu bdud mgo dgu dang // klu mo yak+Sha nag mo'o// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar stod nor bu bzang po
370b2(1): la// shar dbus gnam the dkar po'o// shar smad spyi bdud gu ru ma tse// lho stod srid pa'i rgyal mo la// lho dbus e ka dza Ti ma// lho smad nag mo mgyogs byed ma'o// nub stod ban chen bdud 'dul la// nub
370b3(1): dbus srog zan dmar po'o// nub smad btsan 'gong dmar po'o// byang stod bi nA ya ka la// byang dbus kA la nag po dang // byang smad nag po bkrag med do// sgo bzhir dbang chen sde bzhi ste// shar sgor srog
370b4(1): bdag tshang pa la// lho sgor rgyal po be dkar ro// nub sgor sku lha gsang ba la// byang sgor mgon po nag po bsgom// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// lha srin sde brgyad dmag tshogs bsgom// byang shar dkyil 'khor
370b5(1): chen po ru// dbus su stobs ldan nag po la// yum du 'byung lnga'i bdag mo'o// yab yum thugs kyi sprul pa las// dkyil 'khor rtsibs bzhi'i phyogs bzhi ru// shar du 'chi bdag nag po dang // yum du 'chi
370b6(1): bdag nag mo'o// lho ru mi yi kha rlangs can// yum du nag mo khrag 'dzag ma// nub tu srin po gsod byed dang // yum du srin mo gsod byed ma// byang du gang ba bzang po dang // yum du sha za ral gcig
371a1(1): ma'o// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs mtshams su// shar du ma hA de ba la// lho ru thar pa nag po'o// nub tu rmu rje btsan po la// byang du kA la nag po'o// steng du gza' bdud nag po rA tu
371a2(1): la// 'og tu klu rgyal sog ma med// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir bka' nyan bzhi// shar sgor li byin har legs la// lho sgor khu le lag dgu'o// nub sgor rdo rje legs pa la// byang du yam shud dmar po'o// lho nub
371a3(1): mtshams kyi dkyil 'khor du// rig 'dzin dkyil 'khor bsgom pa ni// dbus su che mchog rig 'dzin la// shar du yang dag rig 'dzin no// lho ru 'jam dpal rig 'dzin la// nub tu pad+ma rig 'dzin
371a4(1): la// byang du phur pa'i rig 'dzin no// dkyil 'khor bar khyams phyogs bzhi ru// shar du lhun grub rig 'dzin la// lho ru phyag rgya'i rig 'dzin no// nub tu tshe yi rig 'dzin la// byang du rigs kyi rig 'dzin
371a5(1): no// sgo bzhir rdo rje slob dpon bzhi// shar du dam tshig dbang gi slob dpon la// lho ru man ngag lung gi slob dpon la// nub tu shes rab rgyud kyi slob dpon te// byang du nyams chag skong ba'i slob dpon
371a6(1): no// phyi yi lcags ri nag po la// dpa' bo dpa' mo mkha' 'gro rnams// bka' srung dag tu 'khod pa'o// dkyil 'khor phyi yi bar khyams la// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod// shar du mi sring tshangs ma
371b1(1): dang // 'khrug mo dmar mo zhes bya dang // 'jug srid gzhon nu ma rnams so// lho ru dmar mo dbang sdud ma// zhi ba be con srin mo dang // za ba mo rnams bskyed par byed// nub tu dga' ma ra ro ma// gcig pu
371b2(1): ma dang yid 'phrog ma// grub pa mo dang rlung mo'o// byang du gsod byed me mo dang // phag mo dang ni rgan byed ma// sna chen mo dang chu lha mo// sgo bzhir dbang phyug sgo ma bzhi// shar sgor nag mo lcags kyu ma// lho/
371b3(1): sgor ra ru zhags pa ma// nub sgor bum sna lcags sgrog ma// byang sgor gsus 'dzin dril bu ma'o// phyi yi 'khor yug rgya mtsho la// mkha' 'gro chen mo sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // sa bdag sum cu rtsa gnyis
371b4(1): dang // ging chen bco brgyad lang ka dang // ma bdun sring bzhi 'bar ma brgyad// pho nya drug cu rtsa bzhi dang // 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro ma'o// de ltar lha tshogs thams cad ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan
371b5(1): ldan par bsgom// bskyed dang mthar phyin bya ba'i phyir// so so'i rtsa ba'i sngags las bskyed// ces gsungs so// ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas yang
371b6(1): dag nges gsungs pa// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa ni// 'og min chos dbyings pho brang nas// pho brang ye shes dgur gnas pa// dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen po ru// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs
372a1(1): te// chos sku dmigs med ngang las ni// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gnas nas// dam tshig dkyil 'khor gnas chen du// gnyis su med par brtan bzhugs la// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med
372a2(1): bstim// mi g.yo brtan par bzhugs su gsol// ye shes dkyil 'khor brtan par bya// gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis ni// gzhal yas so so'i sgo rtsayang bzhi nas// gnyis med dbyings su phyag kyang 'tshal// de
372a3(1): nas mchod pa'i rim pa ni// phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa dang // 'dod yon phyi yi mchod pa dang // dam rdzas nang gi mchod pa dang // bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa dang // rak+ta dmar gyi mchod pa dang // rmad byung gtor
372a4(1): ma'i mchod pa dang // zab mo sbyor sgrol mchod pa rnams// dkyil 'khor dgu yi lha la mchod// bshags pa bya zhing bstod pa bya// gnyis su med pa'i bzlas pa bya/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM ru lu
372a5(1): ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka ya mAn+ta ka ha na ma tha b+hany+dza hUM phaT/ oM pad+man+ta kr-ita badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya grI ba hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kI li kI la ya sarba big+h+nAM baM hUM phaT/ oM gu h+ya dz+nyA na shrI he ru ka gu h+ya dz+nyA na kro d+hI shwa rI s+t+waM ma ma
372a6(1): yo gi nI ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM phaT/ oM kA la rU pa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gu ru sarba sid+d+hi hUM phaT/ dbus su spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// che mchog lha tshogs thugs ka
372b1(1): nas// sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// shar du spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// yang dag lha tshogs thugs ka nas// sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// lho ru spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// gshin rje'i lha tshogs thugs ka
372b2(1): nas// sngags kyi 'od zer spro bsdu bya// nub tu spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// dbang chen lha tshogs thugs kar bya// byang du spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// phur pa'i lha tshogs thugs kar bya// shar lhor spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// ma
372b3(1): mo'i lha tshogs thugs kar bya// lho nub sgro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// rig 'dzin lha tshogs thugs kar bya// nub byang spro bsdu byed pa'i tshe// dregs 'dul lha tshogs thugs kar bya// byang shar spro bsdu byed pa'i
372b4(1): tshe// stobs ldan nag po yab yum gyi// thugs kar sngags kyi spro bsdu bya// bsnyen bsgrub lo zla zhag sogs bsgrub// rtags dang mtshan ma byung ba dang // dngos grub rim gyis blang bar bya// dus bzhir tshogs
372b5(1): dang gtor ma gtong // lhag ma gtong zhing brtan ma bskyong // dkyil 'khor bsdu zhing smon lam gdab// phrin las las kyi kha tshar rnams// gang 'dod bya ba bsgrub par gsungs// zhes gsungs so// rang bzhin
372b6(1): gyi dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsum gyi skabs te bzhi pa'o// // de nas spyi dpal kun bzang he ru ka la/ 'khor gyi rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma
373a1(1): tso s+thi dpal he ru ka/ gsang sngags zhi khro rgya mtsho yi// sngags kyi bye brag bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor
373a2(1): tshogs rnams// rdo rje dbyings kyi lha tshogs kyi// sngags kyi rim pa bstan pa ni/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsit+ta oM/ a a a/ badz+rI b+ha dra sa man+ta oM/ kun bzang yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags/ oM dzi na dzi ka hUM badz+ra d+h+ri ka/ swa rat+na d+h+ri ka/
373a3(1): aM a ro li ka/ ha pradz+nyA d+hi ka/ rigs lnga yab kyi rtsa ba'i sngags/ laM te shwa ra ti/ mAM d+ha tI shwa ra ti/ maM mo ha ra ti/ paM rA ga ti/ taM badz+ra ra ti/ rigs lnga'i yum lnga'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// k+Shi hi rA dza ya/ traM A gar b+ha ba
373a4(1): ya/ hri pad+ma pra da ma/ dz+hi ku ru pA Ni hri/ me d+ha rA ya swA hA/ b+hI nis+tha ram b+ha ya swA hA/ hUM swa rA dza ya swA hA/ muM shrI aM rA gA ya swA hA/ sems dpa' brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags/ hUM lA s+ya sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA l+ye sa ma sa s+t+waM/ hri
373a5(1): gI ra ti ra go ha/ a ni ra ti rA ga sa ma yA mi/ dzaHd+hU pe pra be sha/ hUM puSh+pe A be sha/ baM dI pa su gi ri/ ho g+han+d+he tsit+ta/ sems ma brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags/ oM mu ne kr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne sr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne hUM trAM swA hA/ au
373a6(1): su ne br-i swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ thub pa drug gi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ya man ta kr-ita phaT/ oM pra dz+nyAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM pad+man+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM big+h+nAMn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro ti shwa rI dza
373b1(1): la nI hUM phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dza la nI hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa rI dza la nI hUM phaT/ oM ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro tI shwa rI dza la nI hUM phaT/ sgo ba yab yum sngags so// rdo rje dbyings kyi
373b2(1): sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // che mchog yon tan gyi lha tshogs kyi sngags bshad pa/ oM shrI ma ha kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro tI shwa rI hUM phaT/ che mchog he ru ka yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM shrI ma hA
373b3(1): rak+Sha he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma ha g+hu h+ya he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma hA bi shra he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM shrI ma hA yag sha he ru ka hUM phaT/ rigs bzhi yab kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM rak+Sha kro d+hi shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM g+hu h+ya kro d+hi shwa rI
373b4(1): hUM phaT/ oM bi shwa kro d+hi shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM yaka sha kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ rigs bzhi yum gyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA kro d+ha ga ra dza ga ra dza hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha da ha da ha hUM Ta/ oM
373b5(1): ma hA kro d+ha pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha tshin+da tshin+da hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha b+hin+da b+hin+da hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha s+phoT
373b6(1): sgros+phoT hUM phaT/ dregs pa 'dul ba khro bo bcu'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA kro d+ha ya mAn kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kro d+ha pad+man+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ ta kr-ita sgo ba bzhi'i
374a1(1): rtsa ba'i sngags so// che mchog yon tan gyi lha tshogs kyi rtsa sngags kyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// // yang dag thugs kyi lha tshogs kyi rtsa sngags bshad pa ni/ oM badz+ra shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM
374a2(1): badz+ra kro d+hI shwa rI hUM phaT/ badz+ra he ru ka yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM rat+na shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ oM karmA shrI he ru ka hUM phaT/ rigs bzhi khrag 'thung rtsa ba'i
374a3(1): sngags so// oM bud+d+ha kro d+hi shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM rat+na kro d+hi shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma kro d+hi shwa rI hUM phaT/ oM karma kro d+hi shwa rI hUM phaT/ khrag 'thung yum bzhi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra go rI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsau rI hUM phaT/ oM
374a4(1): badz+ra pra mo hA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra be ta lI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra puk+ka sI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra g+ha sa ma rI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sma sha nI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra tsan+da lI hUM phaT/ go rI brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra seng ha mu khI hUM phaT/
374a5(1): oM badz+ra b+ha g+h+ra mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra shrI ga la mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra shwa nA mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gr-id+d+ha mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kang ka mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ka ka mu khI hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra u lA ka mu khI hUM phaT/ phra men
374a6(1): brgyad kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra Ar+ya te dza teng dzaH/ oM badz+ra a mu khe hUM/ oM badz+ra lo ga bam/ oM badz+ra b+hasmin pa la ya ba tu ho/ sgo ba bzhi'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// yang dag thugs kyi rtsa ba'i sngags kyi le'u ste nyi
374b1(1): shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas 'jam dpal sku'i lha tshogs kyi sngags bshad pa/ oM a kro te ka hUM phaT/ oM be ta lI rak+Sha many+dzu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM e ka dza Ti trag rag sha mu tra/ snying kha ra ka/ ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ 'jam
374b2(1): dpal gshin rje gshed po yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ya ma rA dza ti tha li hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza pre ta byi tri ti baM ma ra ta ka hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza pre te dza la hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rA dza ka mak+She pre to ka hUM phaT/
374b3(1): gshed bzhi yab kyi rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM rag mo rag mo snying rtsa sha la ma b+h+yo/ oM rag mo rag mo khrag la mu sham b+h+yo/ oM rag mo rag mo ting laM ma b+h+yo/ oM rag mo rag mo ting ting ka la ma b+h+yo/ gshed bzhi sbyor ba
374b4(1): yum gyi sngags so// oM te na te byid hUM/ oM ya ma na de byi hUM/ oM ya ma na ga te byi hUM/ oM kha rag di byi hUM/ gshed bzhi sgrol ba yum gyi sngags so/ oM ya ma badz+ra kro ta rag sha hUM phaT/ oM ya ma shrI ti hUM phaT/ oM ya ma
374b5(1): ma hA pa ta hUM phaT/ oM ya ma hri ku ru hUM phaT/ oM ya ma pa ti hUM phaT/ oM ya ma Ar+ya da ra hUM phaT/ oM ya ma rag sha hUM phaT/ oM ya ma sarba pa ta hUM phaT/ oM ya ma a s+thi ram hUM phaT/ oM ma da na ri tsa hUM phaT/ oM ya ma de
374b6(1): ba raM hUM phaT/ oM ya ma hri di baM hUM phaT/ phyogs skyong bcu gnyis rtsa ba'i sngags so/ oM ma ma ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ oM rag mo rag sha ru lu b+h+yo/ oM yag mo ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ya ma rag sha hri ti snying ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma rag sha ru
375a1(1): lu b+h+yo/ oM rag mo ta na ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma nA ga ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ba ya de ba ru lu b+h+yo/ oM yag mo ru lu ru lu b+h+yo/ oM ma ma badz+ra ru lu b+h+yo/ oM e ka rag mo ru lu b+h+yo// oM ka lI ra ka mo ru lu b+h+yo/ phyogs skyong
375a2(1): yab yum rtsa ba'i sngags so// oM ya ma a ku sha dzaH// oM ya ma pA sha hUM/ oM ya ma sgo Ta baM/ oM ya ma g+haN+De hoH/ gshin rje sgo ba bzhi'i sngags so// 'jam dpal sku'i lha tshogs kyi rtsa ba'i sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste

375a6(1): oM rA ga kro d+hI hUM/ oM tsi ta kro d+hi hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+hI hUM/ oM ya ma kro d+hi hUM/ oM nA ga kro d+hi hUM/ oM ya ga mo kro d+hi hUM/ zil gnon khro mo brgyad kyi sngags so// shrI badz+ra aM ku sha dzaH/ hrIHbadz+ra pA sha hUM/ hrIHbadz+ra s+pho Ta baM/

377a5(1): rak+Sho ra tset+ta hri hri dza/ yag shak+Sha tsat+ta hr-i hr-i dza/ lag mo k+Sha tsi&hr-i hr-i dza/ de ba a tsit+ta hr-i hri dza/ ru tra ni tsat+ta hr-i hr-i dza/ mun pa mun pa tsiSh+Ta hr-i hr-i dza/ tir thi ka tha tsiSh+Ta br-i dza hr-i dza/ rA hu la pa tsit+ta hr-i hr-i dza/ nA ga pra tsiSh+Tar+tha
377a6(1): hr-i dza/ rA dza tsa tsa tsit+ta hr-i hr-i dza/ haM sha ma tri tsit+ta hr-i hr-i dza/ badz+ra sA d+hA tsit+ta hr-i hr-i dza/ ya ma tri shu tsit+ta hr-i hr-i/ dmod pa drag sngags kyi le'u ste sum cu so bzhi pa'o// // de nas dpal gyi bka' sdod kyi lha
