379b6(1): so// trag rag sha mu tra b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma rag mo/ snying kha rag b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ma ma snying gzer trag rag sha thun b+h+yo/ ma ma trag sha srog gzer thun rbad b+h+yo/ ma ma trag rag sha snying srog rtsa la thum thum b+h+yo/ zla gam
380a1(1): dbang gi bdag mo ro kha ma bzhi'i srog sngags so/ ru ni dun ti ru la ya dza/ du ru dza la ni ha na dza// ru ma ra ma ha te dza b+h+yo dza/ 'brub khung las kyi bdag mo las kyi 'bar ma rtsis kyi ma mo nag mo
380a2(1): phung gsum ma'i srog sngags so// ku ma rag sha na tri rbad/ sri ma ra du rbad ya/ ru ru ma ti rbad ya/ ba ya ru ru rbad ya/ chum chu ma ni ma tsa rbad ya/ sha ba ru pa ya/ chem chem rbad ya/ rbad bu rbad bu shag pa rbad ya/
380a3(1): rag sha thum rmugs rbad ya/ ru ru ra ti rbad ya/ bla srog snying gi bdag mo gsang ba'i ma gsum/ gsang ba'i pho nya gsum gyi srog sngags so// ma mo rbod gtong gi srog sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gcig
380a4(1): pa'o// // de nas slob dpon gyi bka' srung gyi srog sngags phul ba/ oM badz+ra DA ki nI b+h+yo/ oM rat+na DA ki ni b+h+yo/ oM pad+ma DA ki nI b+h+yo/ oM karma DA ki ni b+h+yo/ mkha' 'gro sde bzhi'i srog sngags so// oM badz+ra king
380a5(1): ka ra ra tsa b+h+yo/ oM badz+ra rat+na king ka ra rA tsa b+h+yo/ oM pad+ma king ka ra rA tsa b+h+yo/ oM karma king ka ra rA tsa b+h+yo/ dpa' bo sde bzhi'i srog sngags so// rig 'dzin bka' srung gi srog sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe gnyis
380a6(1): pa'o// 'jig rten 'das pa dang 'jig rten pa'i bka' srung gi sngags bstan pa'i skabs te lnga pa'o// // de nas spyi dpal chen po he ru ka la/ phyogs bcu'i rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma spyi
380b1(1): dpal he ru ka/ bde gshegs bsgrub pa bka' brgyad kyi// lha tshogs zhi khro thams cad kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal
380b2(1): pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// che mchog yon tan 'dus pa'i lha tshogs la// gtso bo dpal chen che mchog he ru ka/ 'jigs pa'i dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// sprul pa'i phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis
380b3(1): te/ zhabs kyang dor thabs rnam pa brgyad du bgrad// sku ni spug nag 'bar ba shin tu brjid/ rtsa ba'i zhal ni sku yi mdog dang mtshungs// dbus kyi dbu drug mthing la rngams/ g.yas kyi rtsa zhal dkar la
380b4(1): 'tsher// g.yon gyi rtsa zhal dmar la gdangs// g.yas kyi gnyis pa sngo la gtsigs// g.yon gyi gnyis pa ljang la rngams// g.yas kyi gsum pa dkar la gdangs// g.yon gyi gsum pa dmar la 'dril// g.yas
380b5(1): kyi bzhi pa nag la gtsigs// g.yon gyi bzhi pa ldang la 'tsher// g.yas kyi lnga pa dkar la bzhad/ g.yon gyi lnga pa dmar la gshe// g.yas kyi drug pa sngo la gtsigs/ g.yon gyi drug pa ldang la 'dril// g.yas kyi
380b6(1): bdun pa zur mig gzigs/ g.yon gyi bdun pa thur mig gzigs// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na// zhi ba bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis bsnams// g.yas kyi phyag na yab rnams bsnams/ g.yon gyi phyag na yum rnams
381a1(1): bsnams/ thub drug spel mar bsnams pa'o// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dang po na// byed pa yid ni rdo rje kun bzang bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dang po na// bya ba chos ni kun
381a2(1): bzang mnyam gzhag 'phro// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi gnyis pa na/ rnam par snang mdzad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi gnyis pa na// kun tu khyab pa dbyings phyug dril bu
381a3(1): bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi gsum pa na// rdo rje sems dpa' mi bskyod rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi gsum pa na// bskyed mdzad sangs rgyas spyan yang thor tshags bsnams/ bzhi
381a4(1): bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bzhi pa na// rin chen 'byung ldan ser po mchod sbyin re skong bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bzhi pa na// sdud byed mA ma kI yang thor tshugs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas
381a5(1): kyi lnga pa na/ snang ba mtha' yas 'joms byed pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi lnga pa na// bsreg mdzad gos dkar mo ni pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi drug pa na// don yod grub pa
381a6(1): mthar phyin rgya gram bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi drug pa na// skyod byed dam tshig sgrol ma ut+pal bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bdun pa na// sa snying dkar po rin chen myu gu
381b1(1): bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bdun pa na// lA s+ye dkar mo me long rgya gram bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi brgyad pa na// nam mkha'i snying po gcod byed ral gri bsnams/ bzhi bcu rtsa
381b2(1): gnyis g.yon gyi brgyad pa na// mA le sngon mo rin chen phreng ba bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi dgu pa na// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag na pad+ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi dgu pa na/ gI
381b3(1): ra ti dmar mo pi wang rgyud 'dren bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu pa na// phyag na rdo rje 'joms byed rdo rje bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu pa na// nI ra ti ljang gu gar gyi cod pan
381b4(1): bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gcig na// rgyal ba byams pa dmar smyu gun+d+he bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gcig na// bdug pa'i sprin 'phro ma ni spos me bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa
381b5(1): gnyis g.yas kyi bcu gnyis na// kun tu bzang po rin chen snye ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gnyis na// dag pa'i mdangs ldan ma ni me tog bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu
381b6(1): gsum na// sgrib pa rnam sel klu shing lo ma bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu gsum na// gsal ba'i 'od ldan ma ni mar me bsnams/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bzhin// 'phags pa 'jam
382a1(1): dpal ut+pal mthing ga bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu bzhin// gan d+he ljang gu dag byed dri chab bsnams/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bco ldan// big+h+nAM ta kr-ita be con tho ba
382a2(1): bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bco lnga na// thugs dam skul mdzad ma ni lcags kyu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu drug na// ya mAn ta kr-ita 'joms byed thod dbyug bsnams// bzhi bcu
382a3(1): gnyis g.yon gyi bcu drug na/ gnas nas spyan 'dren ma ni zhags pa bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu bdun na// pad+ma ta kr-ita dral byed dgra sta bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu bdun
382a4(1): na// brtan par bzhugs mdzad ma ni lcags sgrog bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bco brgyad na// pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita gcod byed ral gri bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bco brgyad na// rtog bral
382a5(1): 'gyed mdzad ma ni g+haN+De bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi bcu dgu na// lha yi thub pa pi wang rgyud mangs bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi bcu dgu na// byol song thub pa chos 'chad pusti
382a6(1): bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas kyi nyi shu na// lha min thub pa thags bzang go cha bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon phyi nyi shu na// yi dwags thub pa rin chen sgom bu bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yas
382b1(1): kyi za ma na// mi yi thub pa shAkya gseg shang bsnams// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis g.yon gyi tha ma na// dmyal ba'i thub pa me chu bsil drod bsnams// zhabs brgyad byol song gtso bo brgyad kyang brdzis// stag gzig
382b2(1): seng ge dom rnams ni// g.yas kyi zhabs bzhi'i 'og tu mnan// glang chen ma he chu srin sbrul// g.yon gyi zhabs bzhi'i 'og tu mnan// lha brgyad g.yas kyi zhabs kyis mnan// klu brgyad g.yon gyi zhabs 'og
382b3(1): mnan// nyi zla pad+ma'i steng na bgrad// yum chen gnam zhal dbyings phyug ma// sku mdog dud ka cir yang ston// dbu dgu rol pa'i ye shes dgu// stong pa bco brgyad phyag tu gdengs// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje
382b4(1): bsnams// g.yon gyi dang po b+han dmar dkrug/ g.yas brgyad go rI bum thogs brgyad// g.yon brgyad sed+ha khrag thogs brgyad// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums yab dang mthun// yab yum rgyan ni dur khrod
382b5(1): chas// rgya byi'u lcags chas 'dul byed bse khrab chas/ gcan gzan gzig chas sprul pa rdo rje'i chas/ rin chen sbrul chas dpa' bo stag gi chas// gzi mdangs mi lpags chas dang dmar gsal khrag gi chas/
382b6(1): rtsal chen seng ge'i chas dang gdug pa dom gyi chas/ 'jigs pa'i rgyan chas rab tu brgyan pa'o// bcom ldan dpal chen rak+kha he ru ka/ dbu gsum smug nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po
383a1(1): 'khor lo pad+ma bsnams// bar ma gnyis ni ti ra rgyu zhags 'dren/ tha ma gnyis na khyung chen ba su 'dren/ rak+Sha kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril/ g.yas pa 'khor lo g.yon pa dung dmar stob// bcom ldan
383a2(1): dpal chen gu h+ya he ru ka/ dbu gsum ser nag mthing dkar dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rin chen thod khrag bsnams// bar ma gnyis na dgra sta rgyu zhabs 'debs// tha ma gnyis na stong gi 'jig
383a3(1): rten bsnams/ gu h+ya kro d+hi shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas na rin chen g.yon pa dung dmar stob// bcom ldan dpal chen bi shra he ru ka/ dbu gsum dmar nag mthing ga dkar po'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po
383a4(1): pad+ma b+han dmar bskyil// g.yas g.yon par ma stong gi 'jig rten bsnams// tha ma gnyis na dgra sta gshol yang 'dzin// yum chen bi shwa kro d+hi shwa rI ni// g.yas pa pad+ma g.yon pa dung khrag stob// bcom ldan
383a5(1): dpal chen yak+ka he ru ka/ dbu gsum ldang nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rgya gram b+han dmar dkrug/ bar pa gnyis na ral gri zhags pa 'dzin// tha ma gnyis na dgra sta thong gshol
383a6(1): 'dzin// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrad// yag shwa kro d+hi shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas pa rgya gram g.yon pa dung khrag lto ba// dri za 'dul byed khro bo dkar po la// zhal gcig phyag gnyis
383b1(1): 'khor lo tri shUl bsnams// me lha 'dul byed dmar ser me dpal dbyug to bsnams// gshin rje 'dul byed mthing nag dgra sta zod dbyug bsnams// srin po 'dul byed spug nag ral gri zhags pa
383b2(1): bsnams// klu rnams 'dul byed dmar po spu gri zhags pa bsnams// rlung lha 'dul byed dmar skya b+han+da rnga yab bsnams// gnod sbyin 'dul byed ljang gu rgya gram dril bu bsnams// bgegs rnams 'dul byed
383b3(1): mthing ga dgra sta rtse gsum bsnams// lha gdon 'dul byed sngo skya mda' gzhu 'gengs/ sa bdag 'dul byed dud ka tho bzhags pa thogs// ya mAn+ta kr-ita dkar po lcags kyu bsnams/ pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita ser po zhags
383b4(1): pa bsnams// pad+man+ta kr-ita dmar po lcags sgrog thogs// big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita ljang gu dril bu bsnams/ che mchog yon tan lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// // yang
383b5(1): dag thugs kyi lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan dpal chen badz+ra he ru ka/ dbu gsum mthing nag dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rdo rje kha T+wAM rde'u chung g.yas// ti ri'i dbyug
383b6(1): pa dung dmar rgyu zhags g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrad// yum chen badz+ra kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas pa kha T+wAM g.yon pa dung khrag stob/ bcom ldan khrag 'thung bud+d+ha he ru
384a1(1): ka/ dbu gsum smug nag mthing ka dmar ba'i zhal// ti ra'i dbyug pa rdo rje khyung chen g.yas// rgyu zhags b+han dmar ti ra'i ba su g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums
384a2(1): bgrad// yum chen bud+d+ha kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// bcom ldan dpal chen rat+na he ru ka/ dbu gsum ser nag mthing ga dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rin chen
384a3(1): byis dbyug dgra sta g.yas// stong gi 'jig rten b+han dmar gshol cu gnas cang ni g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskum bgrad// rat+na kro d+hI shwa rI sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa
384a4(1): dung khrag stob// bcom ldan khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka/ dbu gsum dmar nag mthing ga dkar ba'i zhal// phyag drug pad+ma be con dgra sta g.yas// stong gi 'jig rten b+han dmar gshol ni g.yon// zhabs
384a5(1): bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrad// pad+ma kro d+hI shwa ri sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// bcom ldan khrag 'thung karma he ru ka/ dbu gsum ldag nag dkar dang
384a6(1): dmar ba'i zhal// phyag drug rgya gram ral gri dgra sta g.yas// stong gi 'jig rten b+han dmar gshol ni g.yon// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab brkyangs bskums bgrad// yum chen karma kro d+hi shwa rI sku la
384b1(1): 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob/ go rI b+han dmar byis dbyug g.yon// tsau rI mda' gzhu 'gengs ma ser// phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan dmar// be ta byi za rdo 'phyar nag/ puk+ka dmar ser
384b2(1): byis rgyu 'dren// g+hasma dung dmar khrag 'thung ljang / sme sha mthing nag byis snying za/ tsaN+Da ser skya byi lus 'bral// sed+ha ser mo zhing za seng // bya g+ha dmar mo lag bsnol stag/ sr-i gA nag mo byis ldag wa// shra na
384b3(1): mthing ga sha 'drad sbyang // gr-ih+Na dmar mo dung gri rgod// kaM ka dmar spug zhing chung ngur// kAM ka nag mo b+han gri bya// u lU mthing ga lcags kyu 'ug/ rta gdong dkar mo lcags kyu 'dren/ phag gdong sngon mo mche
384b4(1): zhags sdom// dmar mo spre'u gdong lcags sgrog sdom// thal byed ljang gu dril 'khrol sbyang // yang dag zugs kyi lha tshogs sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe bzhi pa'o// // 'jam
384b5(1): dpa' sku yi lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus nag zhal// rdo rje be con
384b6(1): yang ral gri dgra sta g.yas// sdigs mdzub mdung thung b+han dmar g.yon// dur khrod chas brgyad sku la brgyan// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs kyis// yi dwags ma he'i steng na bgrad// be ta nag mo sku la
385a1(1): 'khril// dgra sta 'phyar zhing dung dmar stob// sgrol byed e ka dza Ti ni// be DUr mdog sngon gsal 'tsher la// tri shUl g.yang gzhi g.yas na 'phyar// zod rlon tsit+ta g.yon na stob// ya ma rA dza
385a2(1): gshin rje gshed// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// 'khor lo tri shUl lcags kyu g.yas// kha T+wAM dgra sta rgyu zhags g.yon// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yu yi ral gcig g.yon
385a3(1): nas 'khril// gtso la 'khyud cing dung dmar stob// sgrol yum nag mo re ma ti// ral gri ne'u le'i rkyal pa thogs// myos byed 'bar ba gshin rje gshed// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus ser nag/ be con ral
385a4(1): gri dgra sta g.yas// b+han dmar 'khor lo lcags kyu g.yon// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// gtum mo ser nag g.yon nas 'khril// gtso la 'khyud cing dung dmar stob// g.yas na sgrol yum ser nag
385a5(1): la// chags gzhi khrag gi bdag mo ni// g.yas pa spu gri tsit+ta zhags pa g.yon// gshin rje gshed po ma ru tse// g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// be con dbyug to kha T+wAM g.yas/ b+han dmar kha T+wAM rgyu
385a6(1): zhags g.yon// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yon na lha mo 'od zer ni// gtso la 'khyud cing b+han dmar stob// g.yas na gling bzhi gtsug 'byams ma// g.yas pa mi snying tshangs par bcug/ g.yon
385b1(1): pa dung dmar b+han+da 'phyar/ ral pa tshar dgu gshin rje gshed/ g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ldang zhal// be con gtun shing rgya gram g.yas// b+han dmar rgyu zhags 'khor lo g.yon// g.yon na ljang nag
385b2(1): mgo 'phyangs ma// g.yas pa dgra sta g.yon dung khrag/ gshin rje nag 'joms mthing nag zhal// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na// dgra sta 'bar ba g.yon na thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// nag
385b3(1): mo ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// gshin rje phya sangs dkar 'tsher zhal// g.yas pa tshe yi bum pa 'dzin// g.yon pa rdo rje'i gshol yang bsnams// zhabs
385b4(1): gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// shel gyi gdong dgu g.yon nas 'khril// shel gyi gri thogs yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// kong tse brag 'joms dkar ser zhal// rdo rje brag nag
385b5(1): g.yas pa na// me yi 'khor lo g.yon na thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// shel mig khro mo g.yon na 'khril// g.yas pa lcags kyu yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob/ a ba
385b6(1): glang mgo smug nag zhal// g.yas pa kha T+wAM lcags kyu g.yon// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// dkar skya mche gtsigs g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa skar mda' thogs nas 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han
386a1(1): dmar gtso la stob// ya ba ti ni sngon nag zhal// g.yas na ral gri g.yon lcags kyu// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yon du dred kyi ab sham 'khril// g.yas pa khram shing thogs
386a2(1): nas 'khyud// g.yon pa b+ha na dmar gtso la stob// gshin rje mig dmar smug nag zhal// gcod byed ral gri g.yas pa na// ti ra'i dbyug pa g.yon na thogs// khrag gi ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas
386a3(1): pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// gshin rje rmig pa dud ka'i zhal// thod pa'i phreng ba g.yas pa na// g.yon pa lcags sgrog dmar po sdom// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// nag mo pus 'gro
386a4(1): g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab kyi mgul du 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gshin rje til pa sngo nag zhal// g.yas pa spu gri 'bar ba thogs// g.yon pa b+han d+ha rak+tas bkang // zhabs
386a5(1): gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// g.yon nas spyan gsum mche gtsigs 'khril// g.yas pa yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// gshin rje bdud 'joms spug nag zhal// rdung
386a6(1): byed tho ba g.yas pa na// rak+ta b+han dmar g.yon na bsnams// smug nag ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob// chos kyi rgyal po dkar ser
386b1(1): zhal// rdo rje rtse gsum g.yas pa na// g.yon pa bdud kyi khram shing thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// rdo rje ral gcig g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa nyi zer zhags pa 'dzin// g.yon pa dung
386b2(1): dmar yab la stob// gshin rje 'bar ba dmar po'i zhal// skye 'gro'i rtsis byang g.yas pa na// g.yon pa gtun shing 'bar ba thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// dmar mo mgo dgu g.yas nas
386b3(1): 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud tri shU la 'dzin// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob// gshin rje thod dbyug mthing nag zhal// ti ra'i dbyug pa g.yas pa na// bdud kyi sho d+he g.yon na thogs// zhabs gnyis gyad
386b4(1): kyi dor stabs bgrad// nag mo phag mgo g.yon nas 'khril// g.yas pa yab kyi mgul nas 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso la stob/ dkar zhing 'tsher ba bya rgod mgo// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na// lcags kyu
386b5(1): 'bar ba g.yon na thogs// mthing nag 'bar ba stag gi mgo/ rin chen dbyug pa g.yas pa na// rgyu zhags 'bar ba g.yon na thogs// le brgan 'bar ba kang ka'i mgo/ me yi pad+ma g.yas pa na// lcags sgrog
386b6(1): 'bar ba g.yon na thogs// ljang nag 'bar ba spyang ki'i mgo/ rgya gram 'bar ba g.yas pa na// shel gyi dril bu g.yon na thogs// 'jam dpal sku'i lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi
387a1(1): bcu zhe lnga pa'o// // pad+ma gsung gi lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan dpal chen rta mgrin rgyal po ni// sku mdog dmar po bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// dbu
387a2(1): gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug kha T+wAM rdo rje sbrul zhags g.yas// dril bu b+han dmar lcags sgrol g.yon na bsnams// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// zhabs bzhi
387a3(1): brkyangs bskums gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul// yum chen e ka tsa ti sku la 'khril// sku mdog dmar nag spyan gsum sdang mig bgrad// g.yas pa kha T+wAM bsnams nas yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung dmar gtso
387a4(1): la stob par byed// sprul pa'i phra men byi la pu shud mgo/ sku mdog dmar nag bskal pa'i me ri 'dra// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa phur bu 'debs// ye shes zil gnon khro bo'i rgyal po ni// sku mdog dmar
387a5(1): nag ser yang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo sdang yang dbus dmar zhal// g.yas pa 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// g.yon pa pad+ma ral gri dril bu bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums
387a6(1): zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen mi pham khro mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// las kyi khro bo zil gnon khro bo ni// dbu gsum
387b1(1): g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug pad+ma dbyug to spu gri g.yas// kha T+wAM dgra sta rgya gram g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang
387b2(1): gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen khro gnyer dmar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// ye shes ma mo zil gnon khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar
387b3(1): zhal// phyag drug sdigs mdzub lcags kyu sbrul zhags g.yas// lcags sgrog kha T+wAM rnge'u chung g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad
387b4(1): 'tsher// yum chen ro langs dmar mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// ye shes bya khyung zil gnon khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug rdo
387b5(1): rjes dang me khyung g.yas// nam mkha' chu rlung byang khyung g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum gcig spyan gcig dmar
387b6(1): mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// pho rgyud zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon sngo dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje thog skam rgyu zhags
388a1(1): g.yas// dung khrag thod rlon zhing dbyug g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen rdo rje las byed sku la
388a2(1): 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung khrag stob// mo rgyud zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje ral gri mda' ni g.yas// zhags pa
388a3(1): sdigs mdzub gzhu ni g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen gshin rje las byed sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab
388a4(1): 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar stob// klu rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug sbrul dkar sbrul ser sbrul dmar g.yas// sbrul khra sbrul sngo sbrul
388a5(1): nag g.yon na bsnams// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// klu mo las byed dmar mo sgra la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung
388a6(1): dmar stob// gza' rnams zil gyis gnon pa'i khro bo ni// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ljang dbus dmar zhal// phyag drug rdo rje ral gri zhags pa g.yas// dung khrag seng ldeng dbyug pa khyung chen
388b1(1): g.yon// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums zil gnon tshul du bgrad// dbu gtsug rta mgo ljang gu rta skad 'tsher// yum chen gnod sbyin las byed sku la 'khril// g.yas pa yab 'khyud g.yon pa dung dmar
388b2(1): stob// sgo ba dkar po lcags kyu thogs// sgo ba ser po zhags pa bsnams// sgo ba dmar po lcags sgrog thogs// sgo ba ljang gu dril bu thogs// pad+ma gsung gi lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u
388b3(1): ste bzhi bcu zhe drug pa'o// // phur pa phrin las lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan dpal chen rdo rje gzhon nu ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi sku mdog mthing // g.yas
388b4(1): dkar g.yon dmar dbus ni mthing nag zhal// g.yas gnyis rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga bsnams// g.yon gyi gnyis na kha T+wAM me dpung bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas
388b5(1): brgyad sku la brgyan// 'khor lo rgyas 'debs mthing nag sku la 'khril// g.yas pa kha T+wAM thogs nas yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob par byed// thugs kyi sras mchog bud+d+ha kI la ya// dbu gsum
388b6(1): g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rje dgra sta bsnams// bar ma gnyis na rgyu zhags ral gri bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku smad dngul phur
389a1(1): zlum po e yi gdan la bzhugs// lho phyogs sras mchog rat+na ki la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po me dang dgra sta bsnams// bar ma gnyis
389a2(1): na ral gri be con bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku smad gser phur gru bzhi e yi gdan la bzhugs// nub kyi sras mchog pad+ma kI la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon ser dbus dmar
389a3(1): zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po ral gri mdung thung bsnams// bar ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs shing 'phen// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// sku smad zangs phur zla gam e yi gdan la bzhugs// byang
389a4(1): gi sras mchog karma kI la ya// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ljang zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po mdung dang gri gug bsnams// bar ma gnyis na lcags kyu ral gri bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri
389a5(1): rab phur bu 'dril// sku smad lcags phur zur gsum e yi gdan la bzhugs// hUM chen sngo skya ser dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gengs
389a6(1): shing 'phen// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums tshangs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje sgra 'byin sku la
389b1(1): 'khril// g.yas pa be con g.yon pa thod khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa phag gi mgo bo can// g.yas pa tho ba g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa smig bu'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa nyi zla g.yon pa phur bu
389b2(1): 'dril// rnam rgyal dkar po sngo dang ljang ser zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na 'khor lo tri shU la// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i
389b3(1): mtha' mnyam gdangs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums brgya byin gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje snyems ma sku la 'khril// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon pa thod khrag stobs// yab kyi sprul pa stag gi mgo bo
389b4(1): can// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa bya rgod mgo bo can// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// khro rgyal dbyug sngon dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo/
389b5(1): rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na me dpal dbyug to bsnams// za ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums drang srong
389b6(1): gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje sder mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa thod khrag stobs// yab kyi sprul pa g.yag gi mgo bo can// g.yas pa dbyug to g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa
390a1(1): @bya rog mgo bo can// g.yas pa me dpal g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// khro rgyal gshin rje sngo sgra ldang sngon zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na thod dbyug dgra sta
390a2(1): bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums grul bum gdan la bzhugs// yum chen dur khrod bdag mo sku la
390a3(1): 'khril// g.yas pa thod dbyug g.yon pa thod khrag stobs// yab kyi sprul pa sha ba'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa dgra sta g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa 'ug pa'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa zhags pa g.yon
390a4(1): pa phur bu 'dril// mi g.yo mgon po ljang sngon smug nag zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na ral gri zhags pa bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i
390a5(1): gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums bden bral gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje gtun khung sku la 'khril// g.yas pa tho ba g.yon pa thod khrag stobs// yab kyi sbrul
390a6(1): pa gzig gi mgo bo can// g.yas pa ral gri g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa khwa ta'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// rta mgrin dmar po dkar dang sngo ba'i zhal// g.yas
390b1(1): g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na spu gri zhags pa bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs
390b2(1): bskums chu lha'i gdan la zhugs// yum chen rdo rje gtum mo sku la 'khril// g.yas pa spu gri g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa byi la'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa zhags pa g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum
390b3(1): gyi sprul pa pu shud mgo bo can// g.yas pa spu gri g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// 'dod rgyal dmar skra ser dang ljang dgu'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na ba dan rnga yab
390b4(1): bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums rlung lha'i gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje mda' snyems sku la
390b5(1): 'khril// g.yas pa tho ba g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa sbyang ki'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa ba dan g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa khra yi mgo bo can// g.yas pa rnga yab g.yon pa phur bu
390b6(1): 'dril// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ljang nag dkar dmar zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na rgya gram dril bu bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa
391a1(1): nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums gnod sbyin gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje rlung 'byin sku la 'khril// g.yas pa dgra sta g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi
391a2(1): sprul pa seng ge'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa pha wang mgo bo can// g.yas pa me sgron g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// khams gsum rnam rgyal dkar dang dmar ba'i
391a3(1): zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis na rdo rje sbrul zhags bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi
391a4(1): brkyangs bskums bgegs kyi gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje gsod byed sku la 'khril// g.yas pa gri gug g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa dom gyi mgo bo can// g.yas pa dril bu g.yon pa phur
391a5(1): pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa sre mo'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa lcags kyu g.yon pa phur bu 'dril// stobs chen dud ka nag dang ljang gu'i zhal// g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// bar ma gnyis
391a6(1): na tho ba zhags pa bsnams// tha ma gnyis na ri rab phur bu 'dril// rdo rje'i gshog pa nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam gdengs// zhabs bzhi brkyangs bskums sa bdag gdan la bzhugs// yum chen rdo rje skul byed
391b1(1): sku la 'khril// g.yas pa rtse gsum g.yon pa dung khrag stob// yab kyi sprul pa dred kyi mgo bo can// g.yas pa rdo rje g.yon pa phur pa 'dril// yum gyi sprul pa byi ba'i mgo bo can// g.yas pa sogs le g.yon pa
391b2(1): phur bu 'dril// sgo ba dkar po lcags kyu pu shud mgo/ sgo ba ser po zhags pa skya ka'i mgo/ sgo ba dmar po lcags sgrog srin bya'i mgo// sgo ba ljang gu dril bu khra yi mgo// phur pa phrin las kyi lha tshogs kyi sku
391b3(1): mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe bdun pa'o// // ma mo rbod gtong lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// bcom ldan bla med he ru ka/ sku ni mthing nag 'jigs tshul
391b4(1): can// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rdo rje sbrul khyung sbrul zhags g.yas// b+han+da zhing g.yab ga'u g.yon// dur khrod 'jigs pa'i chas kyis brgyan// zhabs bzhi bgrad pas ma mo gzir// yum
391b5(1): chen kun tu bzang mo ni// bzhi zur zhabs brgyad phyogs mtshams gnon// mkha' bzhi bde klong gcig tu 'khyil// dbu gcig zhal lnga srid pa gsal// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya la// dang po rdo rje dril bu
391b6(1): 'bar// bar ma dril zhags b+han+da ldan// tha ma bdud rtsi g.yang gzhir ldan// sna tshogs bsgyur ba'i sku mdog la// na bza' sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// shar gyi mkha' 'gro seng ge'i gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo
392a1(1): rnam snang gsal// sku mdog dkar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dkar po shel ltar dag/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang po rdo rje b+han+da 'bar// bar ma dgra sta gtun shing brdeg/ tha
392a2(1): ma seng ge mchog chen snyod// lha yi mkha' 'gro ban glang gdod// rtag pa'i rgyal mo 'od gsal 'bar// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' ston po bai DUr+ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang
392a3(1): po rin chen b+han+da 'bar// bar ma me dpal dbyug to la// tha ma stag mo zhing chung snyod// nub kyi mkha' 'gro phud ka'i gdong // rtag pa'i rgyal mo snyan mnyen yang gsal 'bar// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba
392a4(1): la// na bza' dmar mo dbang gis mdzes// dang po pad+ma b+han+da 'bar// bar ma zhags pa tri shU la// tha ma ce sbyang zhing chung snyod// zhabs bzhi chu bdag steng du bgrad// byang gi mkha' 'gro rdo rje'i mchu// rtag pa'i
392a5(1): rgyal mo yang gsal g.yos// sku mdog ljang gu 'bar ba la// na bza' ljang gu be DUR+Ya// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang po rgya gram b+han+da dmar// bar ma dbyug to rgyu phreng 'dzin// tha ma sbrang mo
392a6(1): zhing chu snyod// zhabs bzhi gnod sbyin steng du bgrad/ nam mkha'i mkha' 'gro rdo rje mchu// rtag pa'i rgyal mo bkrag gsal 'bar// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// na bza' ser po btso ma gser// dbu gsum
392b1(1): phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dang po 'khor lo b+han+da 'bar// bar ma rgyal mtshan spu gri 'dzin// tha ma 'ug pa zhing chung stod// zhabs bzhir ya bdud steng na bgrad// srid pa bde 'gro khams gsum yum// sku
392b2(1): mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// g.yas gyi dang po 'khor lo bskor// g.yon gyi dang po rin po che// g.yas kyi bar ma g.yang gzhi brdeb// g.yon gyi b+han+da dmar gyi
392b3(1): bkang // g.yas kyi tha ma tshe 'dzin cing // g.yon gyi tha ma lcags kyu thogs// zhabs drug rgyud drug sgo yang gcod// dkar mo nyi ma'i thod phreng can// na bza' sprin dkar brtsegs pa la// 'ja' tshon 'bar ba'i
392b4(1): mtha' chag can// nyi zla stong gi thod phreng can// phyag na zangs lcags dkar nag la// snying brgyus pa yi zhags pa 'phan// nyi ma khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog dkar mo 'bar ba la// sku la shel gyi go zu
392b5(1): mnabs// phyag na shel gyi spu gri bsnams// khrag 'thung khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog sngon mo 'bar ba la// na bza' g.yu yi go zu gsol// lag na thod pa khrag bkang bsnams// bdud rtsi khros pa'i dbang
392b6(1): mo che// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// na bza' le brgan go zu mnabs// lag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams// srid gsum khros pa'i dbang mo che// sku mdog ljang nag 'bar ba la/ na bza' ljang gu
393a1(1): be DUR+Ya// lag na zhing lpags rgyal mtshan thogs// dkar mo srid pa'i rgyan byed ma// lag na sgra yi zhags pa thogs// sngon mo dbyings phyug rgyal mo ni// lag na zhing gi dbyug pa thogs// dmar mo
393a2(1): bdag nyid chen mo ni// lag na zhing gi rgyu zhags 'dzin// ser mo chen mo gcig pu ma// lag na mi yi g.yang gzhi brdeb// dkar mo chen mo mig gcig ma// lag na b+han+da zlum po thogs// mthing nag chen mo
393a3(1): mche ba can// lag na b+han+da sul mang thogs// dmar mo dbang gi rgyal mo ni// lag na b+han+da lcang lo thogs// ser mo chen mo las kyi gtso// lag na b+han+da rgya gram thogs// srid pa'i ma mo chags byed mo// sku
393a4(1): mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// gos su mi lpags rlon pa gon// lag na mi snying rlon pa thogs// srid pa cha snyoms chen mo ni// sku mdog dmar mo chen mo ste// stag lpags rlon pa'i go zu la// mi lpags rlon
393a5(1): pa'i na bza' bklubs// lag na thod pa khrag gis bkang // 'dod khams gtso mo chen mo ni// sku mdog sngon mo chen mo la// sku stod stag gi pags pa la// sku smad zangs kyi zhabs mas g.yogs// lag na khram
393a6(1): shing nag po thogs// e ka tsa ti ral gcig ma// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// gos su sprin dkar go zu yi// mtha' ma 'ja' tshon 'bar bas 'khrigs// lag na kha T+wAM mi ro thogs// gling bzhi spyi phud chen
393b1(1): mo ni// dkar mo sgeg pa'i cha byad ma// shel gyi go zu sku la gsol// lag na lcags kyi 'od phreng thogs// rin chen srid 'degs chen mo ni// cha byad sngon mo chen mo la// mu tig khu 'phang go zu can// lag na
393b2(1): g.yu yi ga'u thogs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku yi cha byed dmar mo la// le brgan 'bar ba'i go zu can// lag na thod pa khrag bkang thogs// rdo rje gar gyi dbang phyug ma// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba
393b3(1): la// na bza' gser gyi go zu can// lag na ban+da khrag bkang thogs// har ting dkar mo chen mo ni// sku la shel gyi go zu gsol// lag na me yi dkyil 'khor thogs// dun ting nag mo chen mo ni// sku la g.yu
393b4(1): yi go zu gsol// lag na sa yi 'khor lo thogs// shan ting dmar mo chen mo ni// sku la byi ru'i go zu gsol// lag na chu yi dkyil 'khor thogs// grub ting ser mo chen mo ni// na bza' ser po'i go zu
393b5(1): gsol// lag na rlung gi 'khor lo thogs/ srin mo chen mo skams pa mo// sku mdog dkar mo go za can// lag na shel pur d+han+da thogs// srin mo chen mo phur thogs ma// sku mdog sngon mo go za sngo// lag na
393b6(1): b+han+da khrag bkang thogs// srin mo chen mo g.yang gzhi mo// sku mdog dmar po go zu dmar// lag na b+han+da thod sbram thogs// srin mo chen mo za ba mo// sku mdog dmar mo go zu dmar// lag na b+han+da lpags
394a1(1): rlon thogs// srin mo chen mo gsod byed ma// skra mdog ser mo go za sar// lag na b+han+da gri snod thogs// srin mo chen mo za byed ma// sku mdog ser mo go za sar// lag na b+han+da lcags
394a2(1): kyuklu thogs// srin mo dri ma snom byed ma// sku mdog dkar mo go zu can// lag na b+han+da rlon pa thogs// shar gyi dkar mo mche gtsigs ma// lag na b+han+da dkar po thogs// lho yi nag mo kha 'byams ma// lag na
394a3(1): b+han+da sngon po thogs// nub kyi dmar mo mchu 'jibs ma// lag na b+han+da dmar po thogs// byang gi ser mo rkang ldag ma// lag na b+han+da ser po thogs// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring // dkar mo rdo rje rtse
394a4(1): gsum thogs// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring // sngon mo yi mgo thod dbyug thogs// dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring // dmar mo sbrul nag zhags pa thogs// nag mo sder chen gnod sbyin sring // ser mo
394a5(1): ne le'i rgyal ba thogs// ma mo rgod gtong lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe brgyad pa'o// // 'jig rten mchod brten lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa
394a6(1): ni// dpal chen dregs pa kun 'dul ni// dbu gsum phyag kyang drug pa ste// dbu gsum kham nag sbrul nag mthing // g.yas g.yon dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// g.yas kyi gnyis pa lha brgyad
394b1(1): mgo/ g.yon gyi gnyis pa klu brgyad mgo/ zhabs bzhi dregs pa'i snying gar brdzis// yum chen khams gsum spyi 'dul ma// g.yas pa rdo rje yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa dung khrag gtso la stob// lha srin sde brgyad
394b2(1): gtso bo ste// dbang phyug ma hA de ba ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// gri gug g.yas la tsit+ta g.yon// chibs su rtsal chen seng ge bcibs// btsun mo u ma de bI
394b3(1): ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' ldang nag ber chen gsol// rtse gsum g.yas la thod khrag g.yon// chibs su 'degs pa'i glang chen bcibs// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// sku mdog
394b4(1): nag po 'bar ba la// gcan gzan gdug pa'i lpags rlon gsol// be con g.yas la thod dbyug g.yon// chibs su ma he sngo nag bcibs// gshin rje gsod byed nag mo ni// sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba
394b5(1): la// na bza' dar nag go zla gsol// phyag na srid pa'i 'khor lo bskor// bdud po skos rje drang dkar ni// sku mdog nag po 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// khram shing g.yas la dgra sta
394b6(1): g.yon// chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs// bdud mo nag mo re ma ti// sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// khram bam g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// chibs su bong bu gA pa
395a1(1): bcibs// srin po nag po glog phreng can// sku mdog nag po 'bar ba la// lus la glog gi phreng ba can// thog chen g.yas la glog chen g.yon// chibs su 'brug dang glog la bcibs// srin mo
395a2(1): sbal mgo khrag mig ma// sku mdog dmar nag 'bar ba la// na bza' khrag gi lab nag gsol// khrag phur g.yas la khrag por g.yon// gnod sbyin yak+Sha me dpal ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na
395a3(1): bza' dar nag go zu gsol// rin chen g.yas la mtshon cha g.yon// chibs su stag mo rngams pa bcibs// gnod sbyin mon mo nag mo ni// sku mdog nag mo 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag go zu gsol// spu
395a4(1): gri g.yas la spyang mo g.yon// chibs su lcags kyi sbrang mo bcibs// gza' bdud chen po rA hu la// sku mdog dud ka mgo dgu pa// sku stod mi la sku smad sbrul// mda' gzhu g.yas la sbrul zhags
395a5(1): g.yon// chibs su 'brug chen kha gdangs bcibs// gnam sman thog gi bu yug ma// sku mdog dmar skra 'bar ba la// na bza' gser gyi go zu gsol// thog chen g.yas la ser chen g.yon// chibs su
395a6(1): 'brug mo yid mgyogs bcibs// klu bdud nag po mgo dgu pa// sku mdog nag po dud kha la// sku stod mi la sku smad sbrul// sbrul zhags g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// chibs su chu srin nag po bcibs// klu mo
395b1(1): yak+Sha sngon mo ni// sku stod dud kha nag po la// sku smad gdug pa sbrul du 'khyil// sbrul zhags g.yas la nad rkyal g.yon// chibs su rus sbal nag po bcibs// srid pa'i lha rab sham po ni// sku mdog dkar
395b2(1): gsal gangs ri 'dra// sku la dar dkar ral ga gsol// dar mdung g.yas la shel gri g.yon// chibs su lha g.yag dkar po bcibs// skyes bu gnam the'u dkar po ni// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba
395b3(1): la// na bza' za 'og ber chen gso// dar mdud g.yas la ral gri g.yon// chibs su rta dkar phrum dmar bcibs// shar du spyi bdud gu rum rtse// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na bza' rgya byes
395b4(1): dkar po gsol// ru mtshon g.yas la ral gri g.yon// chibs su rdo rta gro bo bcibs// ma mo srid pa'i rgyal mo ni// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// na bza' dar dkar go zu gsol// 'khor lo g.yas
395b5(1): la me long g.yon// chibs su 'brug mo ral chen bcibs// sngags srung e ka dza Ti ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag ber chen gsol// tsit+ta g.yas la spyang mo g.yon// chibs su dril

396a1(1): rdo rje bdud 'dul ni// sku mdog dmar nag 'bar ba la// na bza' mthing nag ber chen gsol// khrag zun g.yas la nyung thun g.yon// chibs su dre'u rta kham nag chibs// brag btsan srog zan
396a2(1): dmar po ni// sku mdog dmar po 'bar ba la// na bza' dar dmar ral ga gsol// bse mdung g.yas la mda' gzhu g.yon// chibs su btsan rta dmar po bcibs// btsan 'gong yam shud dmar po

396a5(1): nag ber chen gsol// rtse gsum g.yas la zod khrag g.yon// chibs su rtsal gyi seng ge bcibs// rmu bdud nag po bkrag med ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' dar nag ral ga
396a6(1): gsol// shang lang g.yas la mda' gzhu g.yon// chibs su rmu rta mchong rgod chibs// srog bdag tshangs pa dkar po ni// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// sku la bya rgod thul pa gsol// spu gri g.yas la
396b1(1): nyi zer g.yon// chibs su seng ge dkar po bcibs// rgyal po chen po be har ni// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// sku la dom gyi slog pa gsol// bdud zhags g.yas la spu gri g.yon// chibs su ban
396b2(1): glang sna ring bcibs// skyes bu sku lha gsang ba ni// sku mdog dkar po 'bar ba la// skyen dkar stod kyi slog pa gsol// rdo rje g.yas la ru mtshon g.yon// chibs su ra skyes dkar po chibs// mgon po ma hA
396b3(1): kA la ni// sku mdog mthing nag 'bar ba la// na bza' ljang nag ber chen gsol// gri gug g.yas la bing chen g.yon// chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs// re re la yang 'khor g.yog ni// 'bum phrag
396b4(1): gnyis gnyis 'khor dang ldan// sprul pa yang sbrul bsam mi khyab// ces gsungs so// 'jig rten mchod rten gyi lha tshogs kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa'o// // dmod
396b5(1): pa drag sngags lha tshogs kyi// sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// lha mchog stobs ldan nag po ni// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// dbu gsum mthing nag drag po'i zhal// phyag drug g.yas g.yon
396b6(1): dang po rdo rjes dung khrag dkrugs// g.yas kyi gnyis na lha brgyad tsit+ta bsnams// g.yon gyi gnyis na klu brgyad tsit+ta bsnams// zhabs bzhis dregs pa pho mo gzir// 'byung ba lnga yi bdag mo ni// zhal gcig/
397a1(1): phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing // g.yas kyi phyag gis nam mkha' 'degs// g.yon gyi phyag gis sa gzhi gnon// zhal nas 'byung ba lnga yang 'char// 'chi bdag gshin rje nag po ni// zhal gcig

398b3(1): rig 'dzin dang // pad+ma gsung gi rig 'dzin dang // phur pa phrin las rig 'dzin dang // ma mo rbod gtong rig 'dzin dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i rig 'dzin dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rig 'dzin dang // tshe la

398b6(1): 'dzin gyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o// // che mchog yon tan bka' srung ni// ce spyang dregs pa ma brgyad ni// shar gyi phyogs kyi ce sbrang ni// dbu ni seng ge'i mgo bo

400a1(1): mgo bo can// lcags sgrog g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar nag rta yi mgo bo can// rdo dbyug g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar ser byi ba'i mgo bo can// rdo rje g.yas la b+han dmar
400a2(1): g.yon// dmar nag khyi yi mgo bo can// zhing dbyug g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dkar dmar pu shud mgo bo can/ pad+ma g.yas la b+han+da g.yon// ljang ser sha ba'i mgo bo can// zhing chen g.yas la b+han

400a5(1): bsnams// g.yon na zod pa khrag gis bkang // sngo skya bya rog mgo bo can// zangs gri g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// srin mo phyogs kyi sgo ma bzhi// nag mo khu byug mgo bo can// lcags kyu g.yas la b+han
400a6(1): dmar g.yon// sngon mo ra yi mgo bo can// zhags pa g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// dmar mo spre'u'i mgo bo can// lcags sgrog g.yas la b+han dmar g.yon// ljang nag sbrang mo'i mgo bo can// dril bu g.yas
400b1(1): la b+han+da g.yon// yang dag thugs kyi lha tshogs srin mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa'o// // 'jam dpal sku yi bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan
400b2(1): bstan pa ni// gri thogs ging gi bka' srung ni// shar phyogs ging chen dkar po ni// sku la dung khrab dkar po gsol// phyag na dung gi ral gri bsnams// lho phyogs ging chen ser po ni// sku la gser khrab ser po
400b3(1): gsol// phyag na gser gyi ral gri bsnams// nub phyogs ging chen dmar po ni// sku la bse khrab dmar po gsol// phyag na bse yi gri yang bsnams// byang phyogs ging chen sngon po ni// sku la g.yu khrab sngon po
400b4(1): gsol// phyag na g.yu yi ral gri bsnams// khram thogs bdud kyi bka' srung ni// shar bdud rol po ral pa can// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing bsnams// khrab bdag srog bdud mche ba can// phyag na bdun
400b5(1): kyi khram shing bsnams// zla bdud yor po zhags pa can// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing bsnams// srog bdud gser gyi sta re can// phyag na bdud kyi khram shing bsnams// sho thogs rtsis pa'i bka' srung ni// nyi
400b6(1): ma dang po'i rtsis byed ging // dkar po lag na sho rdo thogs// nyi ma gnyis pa'i rtsis byed ging // ser po lag na sho rnge thogs// nyi ma gsum pa'i rtsis byed ging // dmar po lag na sho rde thogs// nyi ma bzhi pa'i
401a1(1): rtsis byed ging // sngon po lag na sho rnge thogs// srog gcod shan pa'i bka' srung ni// nad gtong ma mo'i shan pa ni// nag mo chen mo kha gdangs ma// lag na thun dang ral gri thogs// myos pa
401a2(1): btsan gyi shan pa ni// dmar po 'jigs byed khro gtum can// lag na btsan gri dmar po thogs// glen pa klu yi bshan pa ni// sku mdog mthing nag sbrul lpags gsol// lag na sbrul gyi zhags
401a3(1): pa thogs// gdug rtsub gza' yi shan pa ni// sku mdog nag po 'jigs pa'i tshul// g.yas na mdung nag dar nag 'phyar// g.yon na snying dang zhags pa thogs// 'jam dpal sku'i bka' srung gi sku mdog
401a4(1): phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // pad+ma gsung gi bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// sku las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// dung gi dred mo mgo gsum zhon// gsung las
401a5(1): sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// zangs kyi 'phar ba mgo brgyad zhon// thugs las sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// lcags kyi sbrang mo mgo dgu zhon// yon tan sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// g.yu yi spyang mo rkang gsum zhon// phrin las
401a6(1): sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// gser gyi seng ge rngam khri zhon// gnyis med sprul pa'i kham rgya mo// dung gi seng ge mgo dgu zhon// shar phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// 'brug chen sngon po chibs su chibs// na bza' le
401b1(1): brgan dpung thung 'bar ba yang gsol// lag na lcags kyu dgra sta thogs// lho phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// lcags kyi sdig pa chibs su chibs// phyag na lcags kyi khyung chen bsnams// na bza' sa yi ras ma
401b2(1): gsol// nub phyogs long ba rgyab sbrel ni// ban glang dkar po chibs su chibs// na bza' glu 'brug pags pa gsol// lag na sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs// byang phyogs dmus long rgyab sbrel ni// lcags kyi spyang
401b3(1): mo rkang gsum zhon// na bza' zhing gi g.yang gzhi gon// lag pa sbrel nas gar stabs byed// shar gyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// dung gi khyi mo ral pa can// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// gser gyi khyi mo
401b4(1): ral pa can// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// zangs kyi khyi mo ral pa can// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa'i khyi// g.yu yi khyi mo ral pa can// shar lho mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// byu ru'i khyi mo ral pa can// lho
401b5(1): nub mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// mchong gi khyi mo ral pa can// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// bse yi khyi mo ral pa can// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa'i khyi// shel gyi khyi mo ral pa can// shar gyi
401b6(1): phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// dung gi spyang mo ral pa can// lho yi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// gser gyi sbrang mo ral pa can// nub kyi phyogs nas rgyug pa ni// zangs kyi spyang mo ral pa can// byang gi phyogs nas rgyug pa
402a1(1): @ni// g.yu yi sbrang mo ral pa can// shar lho mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// mthing shul spyang mo ral pa can// lho nub mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// mu men spyang mo ral pa can// nub byang mtshams nas rgyug
402a2(1): pa ni// mchong gi spyang mo ral pa can// byang shar mtshams nas rgyug pa ni// ra gan sbrang mo ral pa can// shar gyi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// dkar mo zla 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// lho yi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// ser
402a3(1): mo nyi 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// nub kyi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// dmar po me 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// byang gi phyogs kyi pho nya ni// sngon mo chu 'dab 'jigs pa'i gzugs// rlung 'brug sngon mo g.yu yi
402a4(1): 'dab gshog can// me 'brug dmar mo me yi 'dab gshog can// klu 'brug sngon mo sbrul gyi gshog pa can// chu 'brug dkar mo sprin gyi 'dab gshog can// sna tshogs gzugs can rdo rje'i 'dab gshog
402a5(1): can// pad+ma gsung gi bka' srung gi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu rtsa lnga pa'o// // phur pa phrin las bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa ni// shwa na mu kha zhes bya
402a6(1): ba// lcags kyi spyang mo mgo dgu pa// mi mo lcags kyi ral can zhon// lag na lcags kyi phur pa 'dril// sr-i ka mu kha zhes bya ba// gser gyi 'phar ba lce brgyad la// mi mo gser gyi ral can zhon// lag na
402b1(1): gser gyi phur pa 'dril// sri gal mu kha zhes bya ba// zangs kyi wa mo rkang gsum la// zangs kyi mi mo ral can zhon// lag na zangs kyi phur bu 'dri la// shra na mu kha zhes bya ba// lcags kyi khyi mo ral pa can// mi
402b2(1): mo lcags kyi ral can zhon// lag na dung gi phur pa 'dril// re ma ti zhes bya ba ni// nag mo ral pas stong khams khyab// g.yas na mchog gi phur pa 'dril// chibs su dril rta rkang gsum bcibs// re ma dza
402b3(1): zhes bya ba ni// ser nag rma bya'i thul pa gsol// phyag na mchog gi phur pa bsnams// chibs su dril rta rkang gsum bcibs// re ma dzi zhes bya ba ni// dmar nag re lde nag po gsol// phyag na mchog gi phur pa
402b4(1): bsnams// chibs su dril rta rkang gsum bcibs// re ma dzu zhes bya ba ni// ljang nag dar nag go zu gsol// phyag na mchog gi phur pa bsnams// chibs su dril rta rkang gsum bcibs// rdo rje ya byin zhes bya
402b5(1): ba// mthing nag lcags phur ral pa can// chibs su bdud rta nag po bcibs// rdo rje de byin zhes bya ba// ser po gser phur ral pa can// lag na gser gyi phur pa 'dril// chibs su gza' rta ser po
402b6(1): bcibs// rdo rje bse byin zhes bya ba// dmar mo bse phur ral pa can// lag na bse yi phur bu 'dril// chibs su btsan rta dmar po chibs// rdo rje phag byin zhes bya ba// ljang mo g.yu phur ral pa can// lag
403a1(1): na g.yu yi phur pa 'dril// chibs su klu rta sngon po chibs// shar phyogs srin po'i skyes bu ni// srin po byad can phur pa'i lha// dkar po lag na phur pa 'dril// lho phyogs gshin rje'i skyes bu
403a2(1): ni// gshin rje nag po phur pa'i lha// nag po lag na phur pa 'dril// nub phyogs ya bdud skyes bu ni// sog po mig ring phur pa'i lha// dmar po lag na phur pa 'dril// byang phyogs gnod sbyin skyes bu
403a3(1): ni// mon pa gdong ring phur pa 'dril// shar bdud dkar po mche ba can// lag na dung gi phur pa 'dril// lho bdud sngon mo ral pa can// phyag na g.yu yi phur pa 'dril// nub bdud dmar po zhag pa
403a4(1): can// phyag na zhags pa phur pa 'dril// byang bdud ldang nag ral gri can// phyag na ral gri phur pa 'dril// shar gyi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// phra ma rA dza srin po'i gtso// dkar po lag na phur pa 'dril// lho
403a5(1): yi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// ya ma rA dza gshin rje'i gtso// sngon po lag na phur pa 'dril// nub kyi phyogs kyi dmag dpon ni// d+ha sha grI ba bdud kyi ging // nag po lag na phur pa 'dril// byang gi phyogs kyi
403a6(1): dmag dpon ni// yak+kha grI ba gnod sbyin ging // ser po lag na gri yang thogs// phur pa phrin las kyi bka' srung gi le'u ste lnga bcu drug pa'o// // ma mo rbod gtong bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan
403b1(1): bstan pa ni// mtsho sman rgyal mo dpal mo ldan// sku mdog sngon mo me long thogs// dkar mo chen mo dbu gsum ma// lag na b+han+da skam po thogs// srid pa'i bu mo dam tshig can// ser mo b+han+da skam
403b2(1): po thogs// smug nag chen mo dbu lnga ma// lag na b+han+da rlon pa thogs// khram kha stong gi dbang mo che// dkar mo lag na b+han+da thogs// ri rab gling bzhi'i dbang mo che// ser mo lag na b+han+da thogs// theg chen sa
403b3(1): gzhi'i dbang mo che// sdug mo lag na b+han+da thogs// rgya mtsho'i gling gi dbang mo che// lag na b+han+da sngon po thogs// gnam gyi ye d+ha ra chen mo ni// nag mo mun pa'i go zu can// lag na b+han+da khrag
403b4(1): bkang thogs// bar gyi glog ma srin mo yang // khrag gi bud med dmar nag la// lag na b+han+da khrag bkang thogs// sa yi phung byed nag mo ni// mun pa'i bud med chen mo la// lag na b+han+da khrag bkang thogs//
403b5(1): gsang ba'i ma mo rbod byed ma// nag mo chen mo lcags kyu thogs// pho nya lcags kyi khyi mo khrid// gsang ba'i ma mo 'khrugs byed ma// lag na khrag gi lcags kyu thogs// pho nya zangs kyi khyi mo khrid// gsang ba'i ma
403b6(1): mo sgrol byed kyang // lag na 'gugs pa'i lcags kyu thogs// pho nya dung gi khyi mo khrid// ma mo chen mo ro kha ma// nag mo thod pa khrag bkang thogs// ma mo chen mo tsa muN+Di// smug mo thod pa khrag bkang thogs// ma
404a1(1): mo chen mo nam gru ma// nag mo thod pa khrag bkang thogs// shar gyi stag srin zor ba gdong // dkar mo lag na zor ba thogs// lho yi bam srin dred mo'i gdong // ser nag lag na zor
404a2(1): ba thogs// nub kyi kong srin ban glang gdong // dmar po lag na zor ba thogs// byang gis 'brog srin chu srin gdong // sngon mo lag na zor ba thogs// ma mo rbad gtong gi bka' srung gi sku mdog phyag mtshan
404a3(1): bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga bcu bdun pa'o// // rig 'dzin rnams kyi bka' srung ni// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// dkar mo rdo rje thod pa thogs// rin chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// ser mo rin chen thod
404a4(1): pa thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// dmar mo pad+ma thod pa thogs// las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro ma// sngon mo rgya gram thod pa thogs// 'jig rten las kyi mkha' 'gro ma// sna tshogs gri gug thod
404a5(1): pa thogs// rdo rje rigs kyi dpa' bo ni// sngon po rdo rje thod pa thogs// rin chen rigs kyi dpa' bo ni// ser po rin chen thod pa thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi dpa' bo ni/ dmar po pad+ma zod pa thogs// las kyi
404a6(1): rigs kyi dpa' bo ni// ljang gu rgya gram thod pa thogs// 'jig rten las kyi dpa' bo ni// sna tshogs bri dang thod pa bsnams// rig 'dzin rnams kyi bka' srung gi/ sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga
404b1(1): bcu brgyad pa'o// // dpal gyi bka' sdod kyi sku mdog phyag mtshan bstan pa// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams skyong ba yi// dbang phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad ni// srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang // tshangs pa
404b2(1): dmar ser pad+ma 'dzin// lha chen dkar ljang tri shul 'dzin// gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'dzin// gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'dzin// brgya byin dkar mo in+d+ra gdengs// rdo rje ser mo tsan dan
404b3(1): 'thung // bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma 'dzin// zla ba dkar mo puN+Da ri// be con ldang nag dbyug to 'phyar// srin mo sngo nag zod khrag 'thung // za ba ser nag pa su 'dren// dga' ba dmar mo ka tar 'chang // stobs
404b4(1): chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma// rdo rje ser mo spu gri gcod// 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor srung dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'dzin// gsod byed dmar mo ral gri'o// me mo
404b5(1): dmar ser gsal shing 'dzin// phag mo nag mo mche zhags thogs// rgan byed dmar mo zhing za ba// sna chen ljang nag zod khrag 'thung // chu lha sngon mo sbrul zhags 'dzin// rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje
404b6(1): ser mo zhags pa 'dzin// rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// rdo rje ljang nag dril 'khrol dgyes// mkha' 'gro sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad// dkar po rdo rje lcags kyu thogs// rin
405a1(1): chen rigs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad// ser po rdo rje zhags pa thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad// dmar po rdo rje lcags sgrog thogs// las kyi rigs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad// sngon po rdo rje
405a2(1): dril bu thogs// rdo rje ging chen bco brgyad ni// rdo rje rigs kyi ging chen bzhi// dkar po lag na shel gri thogs// rin chen rigs kyi ging chen bzhi// ser po lag na gri yang thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi ging chen
405a3(1): bzhi// dmar po lag na gri yang thogs// las kyi rigs kyi ging chen bzhi// sngon po lag na gri yang thogs// steng 'og ging chen rnam pa gnyis// sku mdog dkar nag 'od zer 'phro// lag na ral gri thogs
405a4(1): pa'o// rdo rje lang ka bco brgyad ni// rdo rje rigs kyi lang ka bzhi// lag na rdo rje tri shUl thogs// rin chen rigs kyi lang ka bzhi// lag na rin chen tri shUl thogs// pad+ma rigs kyi lang ka bzhi// lag na pad+ma
405a5(1): tri shUl thogs// las kyi rigs kyi lang ka bzhi// lag na rgya gram tri shUl thogs// steng 'og gnyis kyi lang ka ni// lag na sna tshogs tri shUl thogs// gnod sbyin snying nas 'dren pa'i 'bar ma brgyad// 'bar ma
405a6(1): nyi ma'i zhags pa can// 'bar ma me 'bar glog phreng 'dzin// 'bar ma gshin rje skar mda' gtong // 'bar ma srin mo mdung thung 'phen// 'bar ma chen mo lce 'bebs ma// 'bar ma chen mo khyud thogs
405b1(1): ma// 'bar ma rlung bdag ral gri sna// 'bar ma 'jigs byed ban glang sna// sa bdag chen mo sum cu gnyis// sa bdag bdud 'dul chen mo brgyad// sku mdog dkar gsal 'bar ba la// lag na lcags
405b2(1): tho ba thogs// gza' bdag gza' 'dul chen mo brgyad// sku mdog ser mo 'bar ba la// lag na zhags pa phur bu thogs// sa bdag kla 'dul chen mo brgyad// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// phyag na
405b3(1): lcags sgrog phur bu thogs// sa bdag btsan 'dul chen mo brgyad// sku mdog dmar mo 'bar ba la// lag na tri shUl phur bu thogs// phyi nang las byed pho nya ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi bstan pa ni// rdo rje rigs

406a1(1): @/ nag mo me yi kha rlangs 'bar// ma mo chen mo re ma ti// nag mo phyag na nad rgyal bsnams// ma mo ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// sngon mo phyag na khram bam bsnams// sring mo chen mo rnam pa bzhi// sring
406a2(1): mo byis pa'i dur byed ma// gling bzhi mgyogs ma lha yi sring // sring mo chen mo 'tsho byed ma// mkha' la khyung lding gshin rje'i sring // sring mo chen mo sdom byed ma// dmar mo g.yag thod klu yi sring // sring mo chen

406b2(1): gnas// la la sa yi 'og na gnas// la la nam mkha'i mthongs na gnas// la la dpag bsam shing la gnas// la la bar snang khams la gnas// la la gcan gzan sder chags zhon// la la rmig pa kha brag

407a2(1): ba thogs// kun kyang gdug pa'i lag cha thogs// kun kyang dbugs dang srog la dga'// kun kyang sha za khrag 'thung ma/ kun kyang mdangs 'phrog bcud len ma// rgyal po blon mo yang g.yog bcas// 'bum
