407b1(1): 'byor bsdus la dga' ba la// bskyed rdzogs phrin las bsdus te bstan// dben zhing dgon pa'i gnas dag tu// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhal phyes la// phyi mtshams bcad la nang mtshams bsdams// gsang
407b2(1): ba'i mtshams bcad bshags dang brlabs// sngon du 'gro ba'i las rnams bya// de nas bskyed rim don la 'jug/ de bzhin kun snang rgyu las ni// 'byung ba lnga yi rim pa brtsigs// b+h+rUM las ye shes gzhal yas
407b3(1): khang // dkyil 'khor dgu yi gzhal yas ni// kun kyang 'khor lo bzhi pas mdzes// khyams dang sgo bzhi lcags rir bcas// phyi khyams sgo bzhi rgyan dang ldan// lcags ri zlum po rdo rje'i ra// phyi rim bskal pa'i
407b4(1): me 'bar bskyed// de nang gdan khri bskyed pa ni// dregs pa 'gro drug byol song gdan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su gding // dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i gdan steng du// rgyu yi ye shes sems dpa'
407b5(1): babs// cho ga gsum gyi sbyor ba yis// che mchog he ru'i skur bskyed la// dbu dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad la// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du bgrad// dbus kyi dbu gsum mthing la rngams// g.yas gcig dkar
407b6(1): la g.yon gcig dmar// g.yas gcig dmar la g.yon gcig ldang // g.yas gcig dkar la g.yon gcig dmar// g.yas kyi dang po rdo rje bsnams// gnyis pa kha T+wAM rtse gsum bsnams// gsum pa gsang
408a1(1): ba'i rnge'u chung bsnams// bzhi pa 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad bsnams// lnga pa rin chen 'bar ba bsnams// drug pa pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsnams// bdun pa ral gri rnon po bsnams// brgyad pa dgra sta
408a2(1): kha leb bsnams// dgu pa 'dren pa'i zhags pa bsnams// g.yon gyi dang pos b+han dmar bsnams// gnyis pa zhing gi dbyug pa bsnams// gsum pa gser gyi thong gshol bsnams// bzhi pa me shel nyi ma
408a3(1): bsnams// lnga pa chu shel zla ba bsnams// drug pa rin chen ri rab bsnams// bdun pa chu yi dkyil 'khor bsnams// brgyad pa me yi dkyil 'khor bsnams// dgu pa rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsnams// zhabs
408a4(1): brgyad glang chen dregs pa brdzis// glang chen ko rlon ya bskor// zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i stod g.yogs la// dpa' gtum stag gi sham thams can// gdug pa sbrul gyis sku rgyan byas// thal chen khrag zhag mtshan
408a5(1): mar btab// dbu la rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// thod pa'i phreng bas dbu rgyan byas// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// 'bar ba'i gar dgu ldan par
408a6(1): bsgom// yab kyi g.yon nas grib ma'i tshul// yum chen khro mo gnam zhal ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis yab dang mthun// g.yas pa kha T+wAM yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa b+han dmar gtso la stob// gnyis su med
408b1(1): par 'khril bar bsgom// yab yum mkha' gsang byin rlabs las// mkha' las khro bo 'chol ba spros// phyogs bcu'i dregs pa bsgral nas ni// slar 'dus dkyil 'khor brgyad la dgod// dkyil 'khor brgyad
408b2(1): kyi gtso bor gsal// shar du badz+ra he ru ka/ lho ru 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// nub tu rta mgrin rgyal po la// byang du rdo rje gzhon nu'o// shar lhor bla med he ru ka/ nub byang dregs pa kun 'dul la// byang
408b3(1): shar stobs ldan nag po'o// so so'i yum bcas rdzogs par bskyed// lho nub rig 'dzin slob dpon yin// de nas gtso bo yab yum gyi// byang chub sems kyi 'od zer dang // rtsa ba'i sngags rnams brjod pa
408b4(1): yis// so so'i 'khor tshogs rdzogs par bskyed// che mchog yab yum sprul pa ni// che mchog rigs bzhi yab yum bzhi// dregs pa phyogs skyong 'dul byed bcu// ta kr-ita sgo srung khro bo bzhi// bka' srung ce spyang
408b5(1): ma brgyad bsgom// badz+ra he ru yab yum las// rigs bzhi'i khrag 'thung yab yum bzhi// go rI brgyad dang phra men brgyad// gdong mo sgo ma bzhi dang ni// bka' srung khro mo nyi shu brgyad// 'jam dpal gshin rje
408b6(1): yab yum las// gshed bzhi sbyor yum sgrol yum bcas/ phyogs skyong bcu gnyis yum dang bcas// mgo brnyan sgo skyong gshin rje bzhi// bka' srung ging bdud rtsis pa dang // srog gi shan par bcas pa
409a1(1): bsgom// pad+ma dbang chen yab yum las// las kyi sras mchog yab yum gnyis// zil gnon khro rgyal yab yum dang // sgo skyong pho nya sgo ba bzhi// bka' srung kham brgya ma drug dang // sbrul sku
409a2(1): dmus long bcu drug dang // za byed dpal gyi khyi spyang dang // pho nya 'bar ba'i gshog pa bzhi// dur mo 'brug mo chen mo bzhi// rdo rje gzhon nu yab yum las// sras mchog rigs bzhi kI la ya// khro bo bcu dang
409a3(1): khro mo bcu// za byed bcu dang gsod byed bcu// mgo brnyan sgo srung chen mo bzhi// bka' srung sho na bse mo bzhi// re ti mched bzhi bcu gnyis so// ging bzhi bdud bzhi shan pa bzhi// bla med he ru yab yum
409a4(1): las// rtag pa'i rgyal mo rnam pa lnga// ye shes rje mo bcu bzhi dang // sman mo nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang // sgo skyong sring mo chen mo bzhi// bka' srung yang gab ma bzhi dang // sbas pa'i ma bzhi gdong mo bzhi// phung byed
409a5(1): ma gsum ro kha ma gsum dang // gsang ba'i ma gsum pho nya gsum// dregs pa kun 'dul yab yum la// dregs pa nyi shu rtsa drug bskor// sgo skyong dbang chen dregs pa bzhi// stobs ldan nag po yab yum
409a6(1): la// dregs pa can ni bco lngas bskor// sgo ba bka' nyan rnam pa bzhi// bka' srung so so'i 'khor g.yog ldan// rig 'dzin rdo rje thod pa rtsal// rigs kyi rig 'dzin drug dang ni// grub pa'i rig 'dzin rnam pa
409b1(1): bzhi// sgo bzhir rtsa ba'i slob dpon bzhi// bka' srung dpa' bo dpa' mo dang // mkha' 'gro sde bzhir bcas pa'o// phyi khyams dbang phyug nyi shu bzhi// sgo bzhir dbang phyug sgo ma bzhi// phyi yi lcags ri
409b2(1): 'khor yug la// mkha' 'gro ging dang lang ka dang // ma sring 'bar ma pho nya dang // mkha' 'gro 'bum phrag yangs pa rnams// rang bzhin dpal gyi bka' sdod pa'o// de ltar lha rnams gsal bskyed la// sku
409b3(1): gsung thugs su byin brlab cing // ye shes lnga yi dbang yang bskur// rang bzhin gnas nas spyan drangs shing // gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// dgyes pa'i tshul gyis phyag byas la// mchod pa dbul
409b4(1): zhing dgyes par bstod// so so'i snying po bzlas brjod 'bad// phrin las bcol zhing bshags pa bya// tshogs dang lhag ma'i las rdzogs nas// gtor ma gtor la dkyil 'khor bsdu// spyod lam bzhir yang lha
409b5(1): bsgom bya// yang na rdzogs pa'i rim pa la// ma bcos rang gsal rang sar bzhag/ ces gsungs so// bskyed rdzogs 'bring po'i le'u ste drug cu zam pa'o// // de nas spyi dpal kun bzang he ru ka
409b6(1): la// 'khor gyi rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa// e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ rnal 'byor blo dman gang zag la// bsdus pa'i bskyed rdzogs bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen
410a1(1): pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// rnal 'byor shin tu bsdus dga' la// bskyed rdzogs shin tu bsdus te bstan// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// 'du 'dzi
410a2(1): spangs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom 'dod nas// sngon du 'gro ba'i las byas nas// de bzhin nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin// rang bzhin dngos med spros pa med// kun snang kun khyab snying rje'i
410a3(1): ngadang // rgyu nyid mthing nag yi ge hUM// 'byung ba yum lnga'i dkyil 'khor brtsegs// keng rus ri rab rtse brgyad steng // dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // tshom bu dgu yi dkyil 'khor bskyed// dregs pa nyi
410a4(1): zla pad+ma'i gdan// kun la gdan du gding bar bya// gdan steng rgyu yi yi ge las// dpal chen khrag 'thung chen po'i skur// cho ga gsum gyis gsal bar bskyed// bdag nyid che mchog he ru ka/ mthing nag dbu
410a5(1): gsum phyag drug pa// zhabs bzhi gyad kyi dor stabs bgrad// dbu gsum g.yas dkar g.yon dmar ba// dbus ni mthing nag sku dang mthun// phyag drug g.yas kyi dang po na// rdo rje rtse dgu bsnams
410a6(1): pa'o// bar ma rdo rje rtse lnga pa// tha ma rdo rje gsum mo// g.yon gyi dang po b+han+da ni// lcang lo khrag bkang gsol ba'o// bar ma thod rlon dmar gyis bkang // tha ma thod skam dmar bkang ba'o// zhabs gnyis gyad
410b1(1): bzhi yin nas kyi dor stabs so// sku stod glang chen ko rlon gsol// sku smad stag gi sham thabs can// zhing chen g.yang gzhi'i na bzar gsol// thod pa tshar gsum phreng bas brgyan// rdo rje'i gshog pa khyab par
410b2(1): gdengs// khrag zhag thig le'i mtshan mas brgyan// thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' la// sngags kyi phreng bas bskor ba'o// yum ni zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// g.yas pa gri gug yab la 'khyud// g.yon pa
410b3(1): dung khrag gtso la stob// skra mdog rigs dang mthun pa la// ska smad gzigs gi sham thabs can// yab yum gnyis su med par 'khril// bskal pa'i me dpung klong na bzhugs// 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'jigs
410b4(1): par bsgom// yab yum gnyis kyi thugs ka nas// phyogs bzhi'i mtshams bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// mthing nag hUM gi 'phro 'du las// shar du badz+ra he ru ka/ lho ru 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// nub tu pad+ma
410b5(1): dbang chen no// byang du rdo rje gzhon nu ste// shar lhor bla med he ru ka/ lho nub rig 'dzin thod pa brtsal// nub byang dregs pa kun 'dul ba// byang shar stobs ldan nag po'o// yum rnams yab dang tshig rdzogs
410b6(1): bskyed// so so'i 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho rnams// rang bzhin dag gis gnas pa las// sku mdog phyag mtshan gsal mi dgos// skad cig rdzogs pa'i tshul gyis bskyed// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs
411a1(1): shing // ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur bya// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor spyan drangs shing // gnyis su med par bzhugs su gsol// gnyis med ngang du phyag kyang btsal// bdud rtsi sman gyi mchod pa
411a2(1): dang // gtor ma rak+ta bdud rtsis mchod// bstod cing phrin las bshags pa bya// bzlas pa bya zhing spro bsdu bya// oM ma ha kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM a kro te ka hUM phaT/ oM ha ya grI wa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra
411a3(1): kIki li kI la ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM ka la rU pa hUM phaT// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ gsang ba sngags kyi bsnyen pa bya// tshogs dang lhag ma'i cho ga yang // rim
411a4(1): pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// gtor ma gtong zhing gtor gzhung mnan// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' rang la bsdu// skad cig lhar bskyed spyod lam bya// zhes gsungs
411a5(1): so// bskyed rdzogs shin tu bsdus pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas spyi dpal he ru ka la/ 'khor gyi rig 'dzin rnams kyis zhus pa/ e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ rnal 'byor rgyun du bsgom pa
411a6(1): la// rgyun gyi yi dam bshad du gsol// de skad gsol pa gsan nas kyang // spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// sems can ye shes bskyed pa dang // rnal 'byor
411b1(1): rig 'dzin bsgrub pa'i phyir// bde ba'i stan la rab 'dug nas// hUM las 'od zer 'phros pa las// phyi nang gsang ba'i 'od zer 'phros// bla ma dang ni yi dam lha// bde gshegs thams cad spyan drangs
411b2(1): la// phyag 'tshal mchod cing bshags pa dang // rjes su yi rang gsol bskul gdab// skyabs gsol lus dbul dge rtsa bsngo// tshad med bzhi yang bsgom par bya// de nas stong pa'i ting 'dzin bsgom// 'od
411b3(1): phung tshur 'dus bdag rang nyid// de yi nang du hUM gnas pa// de las tsa 'phros 'khor lor gyur// lto bar nyi bsam hUM de nyid// de las gnod mdzes rgyal por gyur// de thugs hUM gi 'phro 'du las// khro bo chen
411b4(1): po bcu ru gyur// hUM bzhi'i gsang sngags brjod pa yis// khro bcu'i sprul pas gdug pa dgug/ sku gsung thugs kyi phur bus gdab// btul zhing sbyangs nas nam mkhar gyur// de las hUM gi 'phro 'du las// rdo
411b5(1): rje'i gur dang ra ba dang // dra ba nyid du gyur pa'o// hUM gi 'phro 'dus slar la bzhu// stong pa nyid las 'od phung byung // de las nyi zla kha sbyar gyur// de steng rang sems yi ge hUM// 'phro 'dus 'od du zhu ba las// rdo
411b6(1): rje dang ni dril bur gyur// de las bde gshegs 'dus pa'i sku// rdo rje khro bo he ru ka/ sku mdog mthing nag zhal gcig la// phyag gnyis rdo rje b+han dmar bsnams// zhabs gnyis brkyang bskum dor stabs
412a1(1): kyis// pad+ma nyi zla'i steng na bgrad// yum yang yab dang mthun par bskyed// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs shing // ye shes sems dpa' spyan drangs la// phyi nang bdud rtsi'i mchod pa
412a2(1): 'bul// de ltar bsgom la bzlas pa bya// nyi steng ye shes sems dpa' yi// mtshan ma la sogs gsal bsgoms nas// 'od zer la ni yig 'bru bskyed// ma gsal bar du bzlas pa bya// oM AHhUM zhes bzlas
412a3(1): pa bya// de nas rdzogs pa'i rim pa bsgom pa ni// lha nyid sems su shes par bya// rang nyid lha la lha nyid rang // bskyed rdzogs gsum gyi sa lam sbyang // zhes gsungs so// rgyun gyi rnal 'byor gyi bsdus don/ khro
412a4(1): bo phyag rgya rkyang pa'i sgrub lugs kyi le'u ste drug cu rtsa gnyis pa'o// bsdus dang shin tu bsdus pa phyag rgya rkyang pa'i lugs kyi skabs te bdun pa'o// / de nas spyi dpal kun bzang he ru ka la zhus pa/
412a5(1): e ma spyi dpal he ru ka/ phyi sgrub rdul tshon dkyil 'khor la// brten nas sgrub pa ji ltar lags// spyi dpal chen pos bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// bde gshegs bsgrub pa bka'
412a6(1): brgyad lha// phyi ltar bsgrub na ji ltar bsgrub// phyi mtshams nang mtshams sngon 'gro rnams// mchod rdzas byin brlab la sogs bya// de nas ting 'dzin rnam gsum dang // 'byung ba rim brtsegs gzhal yas
412b1(1): khang // gdan dang bcas pa bskyed nas ni// rgyu yi ye shes sems dpa' las// gtso bo che mchog he ru ka/ sku mdog phyag mtshan cha lugs ni// rgyas 'bring bsdus pa'i rim pa dag/ shar du yang dag lha tshogs
412b2(1): la// lho ru gshin rje'i lha tshogs la// nub tu pad+ma'i lha tshogs so// byang du phur pa'i lha tshogs so// shar lho ma mo'i lha tshogs so// lho nub rig 'dzin slob dpon te// nub byang dregs pa kun 'dul la// byang
412b3(1): shar stobs ldan nag po'o// phyi khyams dbang phyug nyi shu brgyad// 'khor yug dpal gyi bka' sdod do// de ltar bskyed cing gsal brtan bya// sku gsung thugs su byin brlabs shing // ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur
412b4(1): bya// spyan drang bzhugs gsol phyag 'tshal mchod// bstod cing bshags pa dag par dbul// so so'i rtsa sngags bsnyen par dbul// 'od dang 'od zer spro bsdu bya// bskul zhing phrin las bcol bar bya// tshogs
412b5(1): dang lhag ma'i cho ga rnams// rim pa bzhin du dbul bar bya// gtor ma gtong zhing gtor gzhong mnan// ye shes sems dpa' gshegs su gsol// dam tshig sems dpa' rang la bsdu// skad cig lhar
412b6(1): bskyed spyod lam bya// ma bcos spros bral dang la gnas// de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// zhes gsungs so// phyi rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la brten nas bsgrub pa'i rim pa ste le'u drug cu rtsa gsum
413a1(1): pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs pa// nang bsgrub lus kyi dkyil 'khor la// brten nas bsgrub pa bshad pa ni// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// skad cig ma yi ting 'dzin
413a2(1): las// che mchog he ru'i skur bskyed la// spyi bor rig 'dzin slob dpon bsgom// dpral bar 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// mgrin par pad+ma dbang chen no// thugs kar badz+ra he ru ka/ lte bar rdo rje gzhon
413a3(1): nu'o// gsang bar bla med he ru ka/ rkang g.yas dregs pa kun 'dul la// rkang pa g.yon la stobs ldan no// de rnams yum dang 'khor du bcas// rang bzhin 'khor du gnas par bsgom// de rnams thugs kar
413a4(1): zla dkyil steng // yi ge hUM gi 'phro 'du yis// hUM ring hUM thung sgra las drangs// dregs pa kun 'dul stobs ldan nas// hUM gi 'od zer 'phros pa yis// rtsa'o che yi nang nas zhugs// bla med he ru'i thugs kar
413a5(1): 'phros// de las rdo rje gzhon nu la// de las badz+ra he ru las// de las pad+ma dbang chen las// de las 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// de las bla ma'i thugs kar ro// de las 'od zer 'phros pa yis// lus kyi
413a6(1): mgo mjug khyab pa yi// nyon mongs dug lnga dug gsum dang // bag chags sgrib pa rtsad nas bcad// chos kyi dbyings su sangs rgyas pa'o// de ni bsnyen pa zhes bya'o// de nas bsgrub pa'i dus su ni// bla
413b1(1): ma'i thugs nas 'od 'phros pas// 'jam dpal gshin rje'i thugs kar spros// de nas pad+ma dbang chen no// de las badz+ra he ru ka/ de las rdo rje gzhon nu'o// de las bla med he ru ka/ de las rtsa chen g.yas
413b2(1): zhugs pas// dregs pa kun 'dul thugs kar spros// de las rtsa chen g.yon zhugs pas// stobs ldan nag po'i thugs kar 'phros// de las ging bdud gshin rje sogs// phyag na mtshon cha thogs pa
413b3(1): 'phros// gzas pa'i dgra bgegs rtsad bcad nas// slar 'dus dregs 'dul stobs ldan gyi// thugs kar 'dus te 'khor ba ni// sgrub pa las sbyor zhes su bshad// de las 'od de yang 'phros pas// rim pa
413b4(1): bzhin du 'od 'phros nas// spyi bo 'khor lo'i gshin rje dang // bla ma'i thugs kar 'phros nas ni// rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes de// zla ba ches pa lta bur rgyas// sgrub pa chen po zhes bya'o// bdag nyid gdod nas
413b5(1): ma grub pa// rdzogs pa chen por la bzlas pas// sangs rgyas zhes kyang de la bya'o// de ltar yang yang spro ba ni// dam tshig sems dpa' zhes kyang bya// mar la spro bar byed pa ni// las kyi sems dpa' zhes kyang
413b6(1): bya// de nas yar la bsdu ba ni// ye shes sems dpa' zhes bya'o// de ltar 'od zer spro bsdu yis// bag chags sgrib pa khad kyis 'bri// ye shes zla ba tshes ltar skye// de ni rdzogs chen rnal 'byor ro// bar 'dir tshig/
414a1(1): chad 'dra song ngam dpyad// sbyor dus yab yum gnyis ka las// lha bkod 'od zer spro bsdu dang // yul gsum gsal bar gyur pa dang // 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi gzhom pa dang // gsang ba'i dgra
414a2(1): gsum gsod pa dang // 'gro drug g.yang sa bcad par bya'o// zhes gsungs so// nang lus kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang dag nges gsungs
414a3(1): pa// gsang ba'i sgrub pa bstan pa ni// rig pa ye shes dkyil 'khor la// brten nas a ti yo gar bsgrub// ma nor ma bcos chos nyid ni// btsal ba'i bsam pa kun las 'das// thams cad dbyer med
414a4(1): mnyam pa'i ngang // de bzhin nyid las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i de bzhin nyid ces bya// snang ba med pa'i chos nyid la// khyab dang ma khyab gnyis med de// kun tu snang las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i kun tu
414a5(1): snang zhes bya// btsal ba med pa'i chos nyid las// ma bskyed par ni thams cad 'byung // rgyu nyid las ni khyad par 'phags// a ti'i rgyu yi ting 'dzin no// btsal ba med pa'i chos nyid las// bsgrub tu med pa'i
414a6(1): 'bras bu shar// 'byung ba lnga las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i 'byung ba rim brtseg yin// 'gyur ba med pa'i chos nyid las// phyogs dang ris la mi gnas shing // mtha' dang dbus la mi dmigs
414b1(1): pas// sems nyid ye nas 'gyur ba med// gzhal yas khang las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i gzhal yas khang zhes bya// mi dmigs bsam gtan dbyer med pas// ma bcos spros pa med pa'i dkyil// skye
414b2(1): med yongs la khyab pa'i 'khor// 'gyur med don rtags mnyam pa'i ngang // mtshan ma'i dkyil 'khor las khyad 'phags// a ti'i dkyil 'khor bskyed ces bya// dbye ru med pa'i sems nyid kyi// phung po khams
414b3(1): dang skye mched rnams// ye nas dbyer med rdzogs sangs rgyas// lha tshogs bskyed las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i lha tshogs bskyed ces bya// dngos med sems kyi ye shes kyis// mtshan ma'i snang ba dbyings su
414b4(1): bskyod// a ti'i dbang bskur byin brlab bya'o// rang byung rig pa'i ye shes ni// btsal zhing bsam pas mi bskyod de// chos kyi dbyings su gshegs pa ni// spyan drangs don las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i lha
414b5(1): tshogs spyan drangs yin// spros pa med pa'i chos nyid dang // btsal du med pa'i sems nyid ni// mnyam pa'i ngang du rtogs pas na// bzhugs su gsol las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i bzhugs su gsol zhes
414b6(1): bya// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i dbyings// 'du 'bral med par gnas pas na// phyag btsal ba las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i phyag btsal de la bya// chos nyid btsal du med pa las// chos can
415a1(1): mchod pa'i rkyen du snang // sems nyid btsal du med pa las// skye mched khams rnams mchod par snang // nam mkha' dmigs su med pa las// 'byung ba sna tshogs mchod par snang // thams cad
415a2(1): chos nyid rgyan du gsungs// mchod pa phul las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i mchod pa phul zhes bya// thams cad mi dmigs mnyam pa'i ngang // dmigs med bsam 'das brjod du med// bsnyen pa phul las
415a3(1): khyad par 'phags// a ti'i bsnyen pa phul zhes bya// gnyis su med pa'i sems nyid kyis// thams cad bla med 'gyur ston pas// pho nya bkye las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i pho nya bkye zhes bya// khams gsum
415a4(1): sems can thams cad dang // dus gsum gsum gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // thams cad dbyer med dbyings su bsgral// dgra bgegs bsgral las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i dgra bgegs bsgral zhes
415a5(1): bya// snang ba'i yul ni chos nyid la// stong pa'i sems ni ye shes che// gnyis su med par rtogs pas na// phur pa gdab la khyad par 'phags// a ti'i phur pa gdab ces bya// 'khor ba thams cad dong nas
415a6(1): spusprug/ skye shi rtsad nas bcad pas na// tshogs mchod phul las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i tshogs mchod phul zhes bya// thams cad dbyings la bkod pas na// lhag ma'i mchod pa khyad par 'phags// a ti'i
415b1(1): lhag mas mchod ces bya// ma skyes pa yi chos nyid kyis// skyes pa'i phung po skye rgyun bcad// mi dmigs pa yi nam mkha' yis// dmigs pa'i 'byung ba zil gyis mnan// thams cad skye shi'i rtsa ba
415b2(1): bcad// gzir mnan byas las khyad par 'phags// a ti'i gzir mnan zhes kyang bya// 'khor ba'i rgyu nyid yang dag byang chub lam// thams cad mya ngan 'das las khyad par 'phags// skye med rdo rje lta bu'i
415b3(1): nga nyid las// skye shi 'pho 'gyur med pas khyad par 'phags// de lta bu yi don la gnas pa yis// rtogs pa'i blo ldan rnal 'byor gang gnas pa// de yi don la 'dris na sangs rgyas yin// btsal du med pa'i
415b4(1): don rtogs bsgom pa yin// a ti'i yo ga'i don rtogs ngo mtshar che// zhes gsungs so// gsang ba rig pa sems kyi dkyil 'khor la brten te sgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa lnga pa'o// phyi bsgrub dang nang bsgrub dang
415b5(1): gsang bsgrub bstan pa'i skabs te brgyad pa'o// // de nas spyi dpal chen pos ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams la bka' stsal pa// nyon cig 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs
415b6(1): rnams// bde gshegs zhi ba'i sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// 'jam dpal sku yi sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// pad+ma gsung gi sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du
416a1(1): 'dus// yang dag thugs kyi sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// che mchog yon tan sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// phur bu phrin las sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i
416a2(1): nang du 'dus// ma mo rbod gtong sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// rig 'dzin slob dpon sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// 'jig rten mchod rten sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang
416a3(1): du 'dus/ dmod pa drag sngags sgrub pa ste// de yang rgyud 'di'i nang du 'dus// de phyir bsgrub pa bka' brgyad 'dus// bka' brgyad 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya// zhi ba khro bo thams cad 'dus// zhi khro 'dus pa'i
416a4(1): rgyud ces bya// bde gshegs thams cad 'dus pas na// bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud ces bya// rgyud 'dis dngos grub ster bas na// mi zad dngos grub gter gyi rgyud// gtad do 'khor tshogs 'dus pa
416a5(1): rnams// tshong zhig rig 'dzin sa thob rnams// khyed kyis yongs su gzung bar gyis// zhes gsungs nas spyi dpal kun tu bzang po chos kyi dbyings su thim mo// rgyud yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa drug
416a6(1): pa'o// // lta ba thams cad kyi yang rtse/ man ngag thams cad kyi sdebs/ bstan pa thams cad kyi srog shing / sgrub pa thams cad kyi bcud/ phrin las thams cad kyi rtsa ba/ bsgrub pa bka' brgyad 'dus
416b1(1): pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ khro bo 'dus pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ bde gshegs 'dus pa'i rgyud ces kyang bya/ dngos grub gter gyi rgyud ces kyang bya/ spyi dpal kun tu bzang po'i dgongs pa bkod pa'i mdo zhes kyang
416b2(1): bya/ 'byed par byed la lde mig gi rgyud ces kyang bya'o// rgyud kyi mtshan bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu rtsa bdun pa'o// slad kyi mjug bsdu ba'i skabs te dgu pa'o// rdzogs so// // rgyal po khri srong lde'u btsan gyi
416b3(1): phyag dpe/ rgyas btab nas rin po che'i gter du sbas pa'o// gter rgya/ sbas rgya/ gtad rgya// // bka' brgyad chud gsang ba 'dus pa/ gter kha 'og ma/
